name: Ocean view 1 bedroom Kiahuna condo
summary: This Kiahuna Castle Resort one bedroom condo is located on the ground floor of Building 20 in the sunniest part of Kauai at Poipu Beach and is 100 yards from one of the nicest beaches in the entire island. The condo stays cool with ceiling fans and has indoor and outdoor dining.
space: It is located on one of the most beautiful island's in the world.
description: This Kiahuna Castle Resort one bedroom condo is located on the ground floor of Building 20 in the sunniest part of Kauai at Poipu Beach and is 100 yards from one of the nicest beaches in the entire island. The condo stays cool with ceiling fans and has indoor and outdoor dining. It is located on one of the most beautiful island's in the world. It is walking distance to great beaches. The check-out cleaning fee is $160 plus tax, regardless of the length of stay.  Mid-stay cleanings will be required on stays of 10+ days at a rate of $70 plus tax.  If someone stays 10 days, they have a cleaning on the 5th day.  If someone stays 15 days, there is a cleaning on the 7th or 8th day.  Additional cleaning can be requested for a fee. You will pay Castle Resorts directly. It is the only fee that is not paid for through your Airbnb booking.
neighborhood_overview: It is walking distance to great beaches.
notes: The check-out cleaning fee is $160 plus tax, regardless of the length of stay.  Mid-stay cleanings will be required on stays of 10+ days at a rate of $70 plus tax.  If someone stays 10 days, they have a cleaning on the 5th day.  If someone stays 15 days, there is a cleaning on the 7th or 8th day.  Additional cleaning can be requested for a fee. You will pay Castle Resorts directly. It is the only fee that is not paid for through your Airbnb booking.
house_rules: We would appreciate it if you take your shoes off outside.

host.host_about: I’m a freelance Motion Picture Location Scout/Manager.

reviews.comments: The reservation was canceled 48 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Our experience was positive.  Check in was easy.  The condo was comfortable, well maintained, and adequately equpped.  It's within a 100 yards or so of a great beach, and not far from shops and restuarants.  The restaurant at Kiahuna Plantation is itself very good.    The only problem, and it wasn't much of a problem, is that we could occasionally hear our upstairs neighbors (the unit is at ground level in a small 2 story building, which is part of a larger and well maintained complex).  You should also know that the pool is across the road and so are the tennis courts, which were in the process of being resurfaced, and gym.   All things cnsidered, I was very pleased with Peter's condo.

This accomodation was our last spot during the Hawaii journey. We loved Kaua'i very much and it was also because of Kiahuna Planation Gardens resort. We had a great view from the appartment, as it is only 100 metres from the beach, overlooking gardens. It is also near famous snorkeling and diving spots,  so we enjoyed it fully. Finally, you can see on horizont also whales, which was trully amazing experience! The appartment is fully furnished accomodation and strategically located, so I can only recommend it to everyone. ALoha

Everything was perfect.

Close walk to the beach.
First Floor
Good Hot Shower
Great Fitness Club, Pool, and Hottub.

Peter was cordial, very prompt with emails, and easy to book with.  The resort was even better than the photographs depicted, and the site was centrally located from everything we needed.  Plus, the guest services at Kiahuna Plantation were excellent.

The Kiahuna Plantation Resort is very well maintained and the grounds are beautiful. You can see the ocean from this unit. Out the patio to rolling green grass and then the beach. Best stretch of sandy beach in the Poipu area. The unit is very comfortable. You can hear the ocean at night. We would definitely stay there again.
Excellent location on Poipu Beach!  The condo was great and fit all four of us well, even with a shared bathroom.  It was handy to have a kitchen. We would stay here again!

Peter made booking very easy and was prompt with responding to my questions.

The staff at the resort are hit-or-miss; some are very pleasant and accommodating and some are not.

A few thoughts:
* Excellent location in Poipu! A few minutes walk to the beach and to restaurants.
* The lanai is great to catch the morning sun while eating breakfast.
* There is no air conditioning in the unit but the ceiling fans are nice.
* The grounds are maintained constantly (so expect noise from the gardeners on most days).
* As someone else mentioned, you will hear everyone and everything - especially if someone is heavy-footed in the upstairs unit.

I felt the furnishings were a little on their last legs (the sofa cushions seemed sad, the carpet was frayed and stained, etc.) but I would recommend the unit because of the location.

We had a lovely 5 nights at Kiahuna Plantation. It was perfect accommodation in a great location on Kauai.
The apartment was clean, presented beautifully and in an ideal position at the resort.
2 members of our group used the gym facilities every day and that was only 5 minutes from the apartment.
We had a great morning snorkelling out front of the Marriott. We hired our snorkelling gear from the Kimo shack near the gym and shops - cheaper than the snorkelling gear at the Marriott. Amazing fish, very easy location to snorkel. One of the locals advised to go snorkelling before 11.00am and it was perfect.
I would definitely recommend this apartment and location if you are hiring a car on Kauai. Even though it is one bedroom the sofa bed opens out to a queen size sofa bed so accommodated 4 of us very well.
We drove all the way up North to see the sights and went to the Waimea Canyon - great drive with splendid views.
We shopped at the Big Save supermarket in Koloa Town as we did use the BBQ facilities at the resort. 
Thanks for the opportunity to stay at your holiday location through AIRBNB.
Andrea Johnston

The condo is a lovely place to stay and to relax. It is equipped with all the things you need for a comfortable stay! The plantation is maintained very well and it's only a few steps to one of the world's best beaches, poipu beach. Although the climate was hot, a nice soft wind chilled the rooms down all day long. Would stay here again!
Fantastic location in a wonderful, chill location. Unobstructed view of a lovely grassy lawn all the way to the ocean. Accommodations are fantastic and comfortable. Wish we could have stayed longer.

An amazing place to stay. Quiet and close to the expensive town of poipu. However, there are many local gems nearby, just need to search for them via Yelp or locals. It was said you can hear some of the tenants upstairs, however doesn't necessarily find it bothersome. So close to the beach and the stars at night is amazing. Sounds and smell of beach within less than 100yrds to the sand. You really can't beat this. I would stay there again for sure.

My 2.5 year old daughter, my husband and I stayed at Peter's condo in Kauai for a week. We enjoyed it very, very much. The location is perfect - very close to the beach and a shopping center across the street. The apartment was clean and has a great atmosphere. We would definitely like to come back!

The apartment was great - just what we were looking for.  Tidy, and with everything we needed. And about 100 yards to the beach with an unimpeded view of swaying palm trees and the ocean.  Would strongly recommend it to friends.  Peter was really helpful as a host, and answered all the questions we had.  Great experience all round... we loved it.

We had a minor snafu at check-in, but Peter was quick to respond and sorted everything out.

The rest of our vacation was perfect. The condo and property were exactly as described and had everything we needed for a great relaxing vacation.

When we come back to Kaua'i we'd love to stay here again.

When we made the reservation we selected Peters place because of the location. The pictures did not do the place justice. We were pleasantly surprised how nice it was. The grounds were lovely. The first night we were cold because there weren't any blankets. We let the front desk know and they immediately brought them to us.  We were very comfortable there. Location was perfect. Peter was a wonderful host. Always got right back to us with any questions we had. We would highly recommend his condo.

This condo is perfect. Close to beach and shops and beach bars. Beach chairs and towels provided. Bring all your own food incl sugar basic coffee for one day included. Basic furnishings and a furnish bed with good and ample pillows. Smart tv . Book a surf lesson at the beach shack and ask for Kyle as your instructor! You will not be disappointed. Tell Kyle Karin from the PNW said aloha! This condo is a great value.
Fine accommodations and outstanding set up for beach access and other activities. Peter responded to all inquiries very quickly.

We loved our stay at Kiahuna Plantation.  The resort was beautifully landscaped and very convenient to shopping, dining and the beach.  It was quiet and peaceful.  There are gas grills conveniently located close to the condo that we used almost every night in our week long stay.  We loved snorkeling at nearby Lawa'i Beach where we also saw green turtles.

Peter's condo was the perfect place to stay in Kauai for our family of four. The condo is located in a well maintained property on Poipu Beach. The place is totally safe, and I had no problem in letting my 7 year old twins running around in the lawn. The kitchen is fully equipped and all the utensils, pots, plates etc are very clean, and we actually cooked inside way more than what I have expected (so since we did not eat out that often, we actually spent less than what I have anticipated :) ). We also used the common gas-powered grills located close to Peter's unit. The lanai (porch) is furnished with a table and 4 chairs and 2 long chaises, and that was a nice touch, since it allows us to enjoy dinner outside, overlooking the beautiful yard, with coconut palms at the end of it.  The nice surprise is that you can actually see the ocean from the lanai too! The condo has everything you have at home to make life easier (hair dryer, bathroom towels, kitchen towels, a sponge with Cascade, dish washer, iron and iron board, broom, TV etc). It was truly a home away from home.
The beach is so close to the condo. Literally a short minute walk. The concierge hut close to the beach is handy with beach towels and free chairs you can actually take on the beach.
Although the pool is not on the same property (you have to cross a busy street to go to it), it is a nice touch. Sometimes, the crashing waves were too much for the children, so we all happily went to enjoy the calmer waters of the pool, where more clean towels are provided, and the pool is equipped with bathrooms, showers, and also a bar/restaurant.
Our vacation in Kauai was simply amazing, and I think that a crucial part for our family was Peter's condo, which made everything easy, effortless and straightforward for us.
This is a one bedroom unit, with a couch/bed in the living room (which is not ideal), but we made it work. 
I would definitely recommend this condo to everyone, and we will be back too one day!
Manuela
Very nice 1BR unit in a unique resort that has beautiful flowers and many amenities within the resort.  Comfortable unit with a nice view of the ocean and nice artwork by the owner.

The listing description was accurate and Peter emailed beforehand about check-in procedures which were easy to follow. The location was perfect to walk to the beach, stores across the street, and the pool. The ground floor was easy access for my 84-year old mom. It was just enough space for my mom, sister, and I. We enjoyed the rest and relaxation of Kiahuna Plantation and seeing different beach sunsets each evening. At the BBQs we enjoyed meeting other guests from all over. It was a great place to visit the rest of the island. Overall, it was a wonderful experience.

My wife and I and our two small children had a wonderful stay. This unit lived up to our expectation and then some. Our kids loved waking up and running out onto the open grassy area right outside our lanai. Situated between the pool and Kiahuna Beach, it could not have been more centrally located on the south shore. We are looking forward to staying here again in the future!
It was great, you should go! Nothing not to like about this rental. Great location and awesome swimmable beach with restaurants and sights nearby. Seriously go right now.
Loved the location within the development.  Unit was clean, comfortable and just what we needed to return to after a hard day of snorkeling and sunning!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Very beautiful resort site. Next to the Poipu beach and walking distance to Poipu shopping center. 5mins drive to Koloa town center. I'd love to stay in the resort for my whole trip. Will definitely recommend it!

We loved this place! The beach was beautiful and the area had a genuine Hawaii vibe. We got some fantastic beach pics here, and even a rainbow over the water one early morning.  The beach was not crowded and almost empty in the early morning. The downstairs unit meant we could stroll in and out as if in a cottage close to the shore. The beach was an easy walk through gardens and grass. The furnishings were nice too. The louvered windows and shutters made it easy to get that indoor-outdoor melding that makes Hawaii so special. The hotel next door has an outdoor beachside restaurant. Also walkable is a small shopping area with other restaurants, a Starbucks, and shops that supply tourist basics. Grills are plentiful and cleaned daily. I'd stay here again in a heartbeat.

This is a great condo, located on a beautiful resort on a great beach, walking distance to one of the shopping complexes in Poipu with restaurants, ice cream and all the shops you need. Condo was tastefully decorated and had everything you need. Very pleased with our stay!

Upon entering the Kiahuna Plantation you know your tropical vacation has started.  Surrounded by overhanging trees and carpeted by short cropped grass the grounds exude paradise found.  The architecture is distinctly plantation style with shutters and fans.  The view out the sliding glass doors is of grass leading up to a line of palm trees and the ocean beyond.  Peter keeps the place stocked with items you need for enjoying the beach.  My wife and I used the kitchenette to prepare breakfast and we grilled fish and steak at a nearby gas grill for dinner.  This was a great launching point to explore up to Hanalei or west to Waimea canyon.  We hated to leave and highly recommend to anyone from couples to families with kids.
One of the best if you want to stay on poipu beach. Very pleasant stay.
This development is classy.  None of the glitz that is all too common these days.  Tasteful and in apprecation of the beauty of nature surrounding the grounds.  Spotless and beautiful!
The location was perfect. We loved seeing the ocean beyond swaying palms from our patio. The condo had everything we needed. It was lovely and peaceful - we would love to go back.
Beautiful, quiet and idillic setting right next to the ocean. Good location to access Waimea canyon and the park.
Peter's place was fully equipped with everything you might want, and the decor was lovely. The location, at Castle Kiahuna, was beautiful. We enjoyed our stay there very much!

My mom, sister and I enjoyed a wonderful stay in this unit at Kiahuna Plantation.  The location of the unit in the complex is ideal.  You can see the ocean through the swaying palms and it is a short, easy stroll through the grass to the beach.  The beach hut supplies towels and chairs, and the unit provides additional chairs, umbrellas, and other gear if you choose to beach elsewhere.  The bed in the bedroom was quite comfortable.  The pull out was fine, a typical hideabed matress.  We loved having a full sized fridge and living space.  The complex is also conveniently located to shopping and restaurants.  All three of us wouldn't hesitate to go back and stay in this unit.  Peter was also great about getting back to me with questions prior to our stay.

Place was exactly as described by others. Its a very relaxing and tranquil location. Very close to the beach. Makes it easy to take a dip in the ocean then relax on the patio for lunch then to go back to the beach without any trouble. The place was comfortable and relaxing
Great location. Wish we had stayed longer. Next time...

Peter's place was exactly as described.  Really beautiful sunsets and walking distance to the Marriott, Sheraton and a handful of shops and places to eat.  I left a few days early I wasn't feeling well and Peter kindly credited me those days.

Peter's place was fantastic! What a great place to end our vacation. After spending a very active time in the north of Kauai and on the big island, this place was perfect to unwind and relax. Diving is close, the beaches were great, and lots of food/shopping very close by. They complex has everything you need for the beach, including towels and chairs, and lots of rental gear. The place was very clean, and exactly as described. The location of the condo was great, it isn't directly on the beach but one row back, and you can sit on the patio and look out over the water between other buildings and lots of lush greenery - very peaceful and relaxing. The complex is a very family-friendly place.

The only thing we did notice is that sound travels pretty easily, even with the shutters all the way closed. It wasn't a problem for us though, the place was very quiet and relaxing. We had a great time and would love to come back!
The place was perfect. We went with a group of friends and enjoyed the sunset, sunrise, stargazing from this location. Totally recommended!
A beautiful place with all the amenities  you would need.
Paradise position on Poipu beach very relaxing and restful but the beach was beautiful while staying there such a tropical paradise would love to visit again

Peter's unit is very clean and nicely furnished. The location is great, sitting back just a short walk from the ocean overlooking a well-maintained lawn with numerous palm trees. We cooked in most nights and found everything we needed among the kitchen amenities. We would definitely stay here again!

This is a comfortable, well-equipped, fairly spacious condo in a good location. The view from the patio and the grounds of the complex in general are beautiful! Peter was very helpful and check-in/check-out was quick and easy.
Overall great place to stay. If you love Poipu (and we do), you cannot beat the location. You just can't.
Great condo. Great location. Great communication from host. Highly recommend.
Great location and amenities. Other than no A/C this is a wonderful place to stay.

My family of four enjoyed our stay at this unit.  We had a great view of the property, including a little bit of beachfront.  The lanai opens up to a sweeping lawn, which was perfect for our kids to play football and soccer with their friends and other kid guests.  The interior is well maintained and clean.

We spent a week in this condo and it was a comfortable place to stay. The location is good if you want to spend time at Poipu beach, as it's only a short walk away. Although this is technically a privately-owned property, it's located in a resort that is managed a lot like a hotel. However, there is no mid-week housekeeping service and the pool is across a major road (it's also pretty small and full of children). There are a couple of decent restaurants within walking distance, but you're better off taking a short drive to Koloa. Tip: Little Fish Coffee across the street is very good!

Charming room with orignial island artwork by owner and his wife. Ocean view was better than expected! Great location close to shopping, beach and gym. Very nice to be so close to the beach and have all beach supplies, gas bbq, books, etc provided. Great value for the price!
Easy access to the beach, restaurants and shops.
Wonderful week in Poipu! Great location on property, the beach was awesome!

We've stayed at Kiahuna Plantation over 7 times so we're familiar with the condos. Peter's place was a great location on the property, right in front of the large grass area ideal for kids to play. The ocean view is just okay...you need to be on a higher unit to really get a good view of the ocean. The room needs some updates, but it's fine for what we needed and affordable. Our main complaint was the poorly stocked kitchen for the basics. No salt and pepper, minimal kitchenware, etc. We went with another party that booked the room directly above us (which was substantially nicer) and we were constantly going upstairs to use their spices, kitchen gadgets, etc. We cooked most of the time during our 8 night stay. The pull-out was horribly uncomfortable...our kids were supposed to sleep on it, but ending up abandoning it the first night. And they have low standards considering they are 2 and 4. Finally, both the porch light and the kitchen table light were out when we arrived. Not Peter's fault and the property managers took care of it immediately, but it was just an added annoyance. We probably wouldn't stay in Peter's condo again, since there are so many other better units on the property. But again, it was affordable and basic...you just may want to check out the kitchen amenities first before heading to the market.
Thoroughly enjoyed the lanai and garden area

The condo was great. Super quick walk to the beach, check in and check out were very quick and easy. The place is clean, and had all the amenities we needed for cooking, grilling, making drinks etc. Our 1 year old enjoyed running around on the grass while we lounged on the patio. The condo is walking distance to good food and was super close to the beach. Couldn't ask for more.

Peter's place was just what our family was looking for.  An easy walk to the beach, or across the street to the pool or coffee.  The unit itself fit our family of four just fine, with our 3yo and 8yo on the pullout sofa.  There are not a ton of kitchen supplies, but enough for us to get by when we were eating in.  We spent most of our time sitting outside or at the beach or pool.  Our kids were able to run across the lawn to our friends nearby, and we were grateful for that open space as opposed to a spot closer to the water.

Peter's place is in a great location.  The athletic club is across the street and opens at 6:00am for a quick workout before the mid morning hikes.  The back porch has an unobstructed view of the beach with an expansive lawn surrounded by mature palm trees.   It's located in a complex but the layout feels private.  There is a shopping area with restaurants across the street if you feel like grabbing a bite out.  Inexpensive beach rentals (boards, snorkeling equipment, etc.) are available on the beach.   Clean grills just a few yards away.  Use the one by the beach for the view.....
Lovely location, the view every morning was perfect and we loved having the beach so close.

Peter's property was outstanding! Within walking distance to a beautiful beach, he was also very responsive and helpful when we had any issues. I would highly recommend staying here during your stay at in Kauai! Thanks again Peter
Great location.  Lovely spot on Poipu beach.
Perfect spot at an awesome place...We've stayed at Kiahuna before but this was our first time staying with Peter. When we come back we'll be sure to book through him again!

The Kiahuna Plantation is a beautiful condominium resort. They have a real attention to detail on the landscaping and grounds. The views are spectacular of the ocean. Peter was a good host and took care of our needs. The condo was clean and comfortable.

This was a beautiful property but be aware that there is a bit of a walk to get to the beach and ocean.

Very family friendly place (with small children).
Peter’s place is great!!

Beautiful spot. So easy to live in, made you feel right at home. Cute coffee shop across the street. Easy access to the beach. It has the best parts of staying at a hotel, while feeling like having your own home. Carpeted for the most part and furniture has round edges and made of wicker, the living room goes directly onto the back patio which goes into a field of grass making it very child friendly. 
Hope to stay here again in the future!

Steps to the beach, and one of the very best beaches in all of kauai for its consistent sun, amazing sand, surf, and snorkel.  

Couple good restaurants across the street, and also a market so you can cook your own meals in the unit if you want. 

The condo itself has an authentic hawaiian feel, and is also very clean and comfortable.   

We greatly enjoyed our stay and will be back.
We had a lovely stay. Peter's condo is in a great location literally steps from the beach in sunny Poipu. I would recommend it to anyone.
Excellent, very close to beach!
Nice Resort, but very aged property. Be aware of the high cleaning charges US$ 125) you need to pay over and above all Airbnb charges.
Easy walk to beaches and two shopping centers
Lovely unit in a beautiful location! Perfect for couples looking for some quiet time on the beach.
Beautiful plantation home a few feet away from the ocean!  What more do you need?! We will definitely return for another stay in Poipu.
The condo was in a perfect location for everything. The grounds are immaculate. For two people, it’s perfect. The sofa bed mattress leaves a little to be desired   Great stay and I’d do it again.

Great location! Short walk to the beach, adjacent restaurants, and amenities. Heads up, no AC so it's necessary to keep the plantation shutters cracked which lets in outside noise. But the cool ocean breeze adds to the Hawaii ambience and relaxation. Highly recommend this spot on the South shore. Don't miss out on a road trip east to Waimea Canyon!
Great place! Highly recommend.
Fantastic location! So close to the beach (amazing view) and close enough to walk to restaurants and other fun spots in town. Our family really enjoyed our stay here.
A good stay for a good price.

Kiahuna is a fantastic spot for enjoying Poipu and this property is right in the middle of it. 

The lenai opens into a beautiful grassy open space that connects to the beach. The beach is beautiful. Monk seals showed up two days in a row.

The pool across the street at the Poipu athletic club is fantastic for families. Use of their gym and fitness classes is a fantastic bonus. 

The condo itself is well appointed, welcoming, clean and comfortable. We enjoyed every minute of our stay.

We loved this place and will be back!

Great place! Location was awesome, the grassy area was great for my 4 yr old, she loved chasing after birds. The place is well equipped with beach stuff- chairs, umbrella, sand toys, boogie boards and snorkel gear!

Peter's places is located in the Kiahuna Plantation Resort. It is amazingly located next to Poipu beach, the apartment is 5 min walk to the beach, with amazing views. We swam with turtles and seals right in front of the apartment. Snorkeling and surfing (for beginners) are great in that spot. The restaurant in the resort is also very good. Highly recommend staying there.

We absolutely loved staying at Peter’s condo. We arrived a few hours early for check in, but were welcomed to use the Athletics Club facilities straight away. Our boys had both struggled to sleep on the plane and were exhausted from the trip (and many plane changes) from Australia and were thrilled to have a place to rest, eat and play. The staff there were extremely accommodating! Once we were able to check in, I couldn’t stop looking at the view!! Absolutely beautiful. As are the grounds of the whole resort. It really is stunning. We were so relaxed there and felt immediately at peace and ease. 
The condo is small (though not as small as I had anticipated), but I chose it specifically as it is ground floor with a HUGE expanse of grass out the front. The boys were able to enjoy that space to run and explore while we watched from the deck chairs. Very chill.

The condo was very comfortable and I couldn’t possibly think of a thing we wanted and didn’t have access to- including two soft bathrobes.
The beach was only a couple of minutes walk away and we really appreciated the beach gear that Peter keeps at the condo- especially the snorkeling gear! 

Highly recommend. I can’t wait to come back!

We had a wonderful stay in Peter’s home. The grounds were beautiful! The ocean was marvelous, the waves were huge! The sunshine was welcome! The home was perfect, clean, and exactly what we needed! We had stayed on the north side of the island for 6 nights and wanted one night to explore the south. We didn’t realize how difficult it would be to find a place for only one night and how expensive! After we arrived, we wished we had given ourselves at least two nights in Peter’s place!  It was close to the ocean and the grounds were so beautiful with palm trees everywhere and nice grass. We couldn’t get out of the ocean to go see the sites because there were such nice waves!  It was a completely different experience than being on the north. We loved both sides of the island but would have liked a little more time south. Peter’s home was very comfortable and conveniently located. We only wish there were rules about where you could smoke bc we kept trying to sit out on the private patio but a nearby neighbor was smoking and who wants to smell that when you can smell the salty air??  Hope to return again!
Beautiful place to stay, 2 minute walk from the beach, very nice grounds.
Beautiful views. Wonderful large grass area in front. Easy walk to the beach.
This was a great place.   Extremely high value.  I highly recommend it.  Peter is quick to respond to all correspondence.  Again, a great rental experience.

This was a fabulous location--close to the beach, great view & beautiful surroundings.  The unit we were in was very clean and the perfect size for my husband and I.  There was good shopping/dining near by.  It would be the perfect place for young folks without physical limitations or considerations & who can sleep on anything (the bed was just awful).

Loved the location and it met all of our family’s needs. Unit is a bit dated and has carpet, but the price reflects this and the location more then makes up for it. Peter is easy to work with and very responsive. Would not hesitate to stay again!

Kiahuna plantation is a beautiful location to stay on the south side of Kauai and Peter's condo is in an excellent location. Peter is quick in his replies and thorough in documentation. Nothing was left to be desired. I'm going back!
Great location in Poipu, near several beaches, shopping centers, and restaurants. Great home-base for exploring around the island. Space is perfect for a small family.
Wonderful location, great space for cooking, beautiful grounds, and comfortable bed!

Pros. Good location. Nice unit. Well kept resort
Cons. Ocean view description a stretch. Unit very hot at night as security warned us to shut louvered doors since it is a ground floor unit.

Check in and check out was a breeze. Peter was quick to reply to my messages and the condo was exactly as described. I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend if you are looking to stay in the south of Kauai as the location is unbeatable!

Just spent a week at this condo. The location is perfect. Wonderful views and so close to everything. The beach, laundry, bbq, trash bins etc were so close which made it perfect especially when traveling with a 9 month old. Shops and restaurants were right across the street. Ended up going to the pool a lot which our son was a big fan of. Condo was well equipped with everything you may need. Note the unit gets a lot of sun so while you’re out and about make sure to close the wooden shades so it stays cool for when you get back. Would definitely stay here next time.
Amazing location.

We absolutely loved staying at the Kiahuna. To walk outside and be greeted by the ocean is something special.  The condo is in the perfect location - we were able to walk to coffee, the beach and dinner all within 5 minutes.  Poipu Beach is exceptional!

We had a wonderful stay and would definitely recommend to others.  Very tastefully furnished, good size for a couple, this is a large community and we have stayed a few times in other condos but would recommend this location, we like to be able to walk out the lanai and down to the beach to watch the sunset. The Sheraton is a short walk along the beach for a cocktail or dinner.  You can walk everywhere, shops, beaches, restaurants.  There are bbqs around for grilling, we preferred to eat out but if we were staying longer would definitely have used them.  The pool area is across the street and also very nice. 
 Would highly recommend.

We had an absolutely fantastic holiday at Peter's place with our two young kids.  The location is perfect - so close to the beach, the great pool at the athletic club, and delicious coffee at Little Fish.  The view from the unit is lovely and our kids loved having an open field to race around on.  The spacious grounds are stunning and very well maintained.  Check in was easy (even after midnight) and the staff were very helpful and responsive.  The fresh beach towels whenever needed were a fabulous perk.  We would come back in a heartbeat!

This is a comfortable condominium with a beautiful view, easy beach access and close to good restaurants and shopping. The rooms were clean and the kitchen was well stocked. The host is very kind and easy to get a hold of. Check-in and check out were both very straight forward. We would happily stay here again!

Peter's condo was the perfect place for our family's first visit to Kauai. The location couldn't be beat - the grounds around the condo were well maintained, the beach was amazing and the athletic club amenities were well enjoyed. The condo was exactly as described and very comfortable for us and our 2 daughters. The kitchen was well stocked with dishes and there were boogie boards, snorkelling gear and beach toys in the condo as well.

This is a great location and the nearby beach is lovely.  The grounds are well kept and parking was ample.  The unit itself is a bit outdated and did not have any kitchen basics (ie salt/pepper, oil, etc).   We went with a group and were able to see two other units which were much more updated and well stocked.  There is a blow dryer, even though the listing has it crossed out.  The snorkel gear in the closet was helpful, however getting the closet door open was tricky.  All in all, we had a good time.

name: Studio with bathroom and kitchenette in Newtown
summary: This private studio is inside our family home. It has its own private entrance & you access your private bathroom via a shared hallway with a partition, which separates your private space from the rest of our home. The queen-size bed sits in one corner, with a kitchenette in the opposite corner (no kitchen sink), leaving the rest of the room as a living area with TV. There is a clothes rail with hangers in the shared hallway next to the partition. Please don’t come past the partition uninvited.
space: Your room is like a hotel suite, but without the expense. Your kitchenette includes a fridge, microwave, toaster, sandwich press, kettle and pod coffee machine. Also like a hotel suite, there is no kitchen sink. Tea and coffee are provided as well as milk, fruit, cornflakes, muesli and various spreads. We have added a bluetooth speaker so you can listen to your own music. There is a heater and ceiling fan in your room. There is also whole-house heating and air-conditioning, which can be put on by request.
description: This private studio is inside our family home. It has its own private entrance & you access your private bathroom via a shared hallway with a partition, which separates your private space from the rest of our home. The queen-size bed sits in one corner, with a kitchenette in the opposite corner (no kitchen sink), leaving the rest of the room as a living area with TV. There is a clothes rail with hangers in the shared hallway next to the partition. Please don’t come past the partition uninvited. Your room is like a hotel suite, but without the expense. Your kitchenette includes a fridge, microwave, toaster, sandwich press, kettle and pod coffee machine. Also like a hotel suite, there is no kitchen sink. Tea and coffee are provided as well as milk, fruit, cornflakes, muesli and various spreads. We have added a bluetooth speaker so you can listen to your own music. There is a heater and ceiling fan in your room. There is also whole-house heating and air-conditioning, which can be put on b
neighborhood_overview: Newtown is an interesting and vibrant place with great restaurants, bars, pubs and shops and a lovely community spirit.
notes: Please note, there is no kitchen sink in your studio. I am happy to put your dishes in our dishwasher, or if you prefer, there is a washing up basin that you can fill with the shower head and empty into the toilet (not after 9pm please by reason of noise). For the same reason, please turn the bathroom fan off when you aren’t in there. We also kindly request that you do not put glass or ceramic near the bathroom sink. We are a family with two children, 14 and 11 years (bedtime is 9-9.30pm). We are friendly and welcoming and will consider any requests to make our guests' stay as comfortable as possible. We will make an effort to keep noise to a minimum during your stay and we ask that you do the same for us. Keeping your door (and bathroom door!) closed while you are in there helps insulate us from each other’s noise. Thank you
transit: Newtown Station is 10 minutes walk and there are buses to the city a few minutes walk away on Salisbury Rd. We are within walking distance of RPA hospital and Sydney University. There is unrestricted parking on one side of the road and 2 hour parking on the other until 8pm, which becomes unrestricted overnight.
access: Guests have their own private entrance to the studio, which is separated from the rest of our house by a partition in the hallway. Please respect our privacy by not coming past the partition uninvited.
interaction: This is advertised as a private space within a house, so interaction is by your request only
house_rules: We would like our guests to be aware that this is a private space at one end of our family home and to be respectful of that. This is a no smoking house with no pets. If you are going to smoke outside, please do it away from the front door, preferably in the back lane and do not drop cigarette butts on the ground please. Thank you

host.host_about:
I am originally from Northern Ireland. I live here in Newtown with my partner, from Yorkshire, and our two Aussie kids. We love living in such a vibrant area with such great cafes, restaurants & bars and such a great variety of shops. We have a lovely community here, plus we are really close to the city.
The mottos I like to live by: "Kindness costs you nothing" and "Take nothing personally".

reviews.comments:
Dont think you can ask for more from the host and the accommodation. No excuses here. If you are creative you can make almost anything with the kitchenette. Perfect location
. All the privacy you need and conversation (mostly by text) but the host is always happy to pop in. 
Bed is comfortable and all the netflix ypu can have at your leisure. Go for it!

Michele immediately responded to our request to stay at her place. Her place is very clean, comfortable and safe. The location is quite and relaxing, but also a few streets away busy with restaurants and plenty of coffee shops. Michele made us feel welcome. Thank you, Michele.
Nice accommodation and close to the active area of Newtown.Really caretaking hosts.
Great spot with very welcoming & helpful hosts.

호스트 미쉘은 엄청 친절하고 연락도 잘되는 호스트에요! 연말 연시라 걱정되는 것도 많았는데 잘챙겨주고 배려도 많이 해주었어요 트램에서 조금 걸어야 하지만 집도 깔끔하고 주변에 유명한 곳이나 음식이 많아서 좋았어요! 그리고 간단한 과일이나 잼이 있어서 꺼내 먹을수도 있어요! 시드니에서 즐거운 시간을 보낼수 있게 해주었어요! 숙소를 찾는다면 여길 추천할께요!!

Michelle is a very friendly and good host! We are many worries about the holiday season, but I felt good about taking care of us. I had a little walking from Newtown station, but it was nice house, and a lot of famous places. We have a great time in Sydney! If you find accommodations, I recommend you here!

Michele was so helpful and accommodating during my trip to Sydney. She was on point with anything extra I needed and even though the hallway between the main room and bathroom is just behind a partition I never felt like my privacy was compromised. Definitely recommend staying here if Newtown is convenient for your time in Sydney.
Lovely clean and quiet little space. Michele's communication was excellent. Would love to stay again.
The place is so clean and it pretty much has everything you need inside, just like the hotel!
Lovely hip street, Michele was a really lovely helpful host and the accomodation was clean and comfortable!

Easy and welcoming communication before we arrived.Arriving late at night was no problem at all.The place was spotless,well equipped,comfortable and beautiful (Website hidden by Airbnb) not expect to have fresh fruit,coffee,tea,shampoo etc. provided,awesome!The place was an entirely private section of a family home,perfectly cool on a hot summer day and very close to all great things in Newtown.Would certainly stay there again!

I was only able to stay at Michele's location for the one night, upon arrival to Australia prior to other arrangements. It's a good quiet neighborhood and I had a good quiet stop. I stretched my legs a bit for a nice long walk from there to Chinatown and back, was able to use the Wifi for all my work needs, and appreciated the milk and berries & grapes available in the fridge.

Michele is an amazing host, thoughtful, considerate, she made sure from the start we'd have a great stay at her place.
Don't think twice, just book it!

Thanks again Michele :)

Michele's place is in a great location, in a lovely green neighbourhood that's an easy walk to the train and all of the action. Communication was great, and she kindly let us store our bags until we left for our flight later in the day.

I only stayed at Michele's for one night but I'll definitely be back next time that I'm in Sydney! The accomodation was perfect, so close to the main streets of Newtown and public transport whilst also being secluded enough that I was able to relax and wind down during the night. The room had everything I could have asked for and even felt like my own little hotel suite. Michele was nothing but accomodating throughout my entire stay and I'd definitely recommend staying here to anybody thinking about it.

Michele gave us a warm welcome and explained the suite to us on arrival. Place is handy to Newtown and public transport. Sofa bed was comfortable, and has a little kitchenette which is ideal for staying a few nights. Bathroom is brand new and very functional given the size. I would certainly recommend Michelle's place to other travellers.

I had a great stay here in my old neighborhood, in the two days before my wedding. 

As a former local I can attest to the convenient location, it's a short walk to the heart of Newtown.

The place was very clean and Michele has thought of everything to ensure a comfortable stay. 

She's a very attentive host, friendly and helpful and respectful of privacy. 

Can highly recommend staying here if you're looking for the inner west experience.

Stunning place to relax in a beautiful part of Sydney! Michele could not have done more to make us feel welcome! Fantastic communication, easy to find and little extras like beautiful fresh fruit for an early breakfast made our stay extra special. Loved it! Thank you!
Michele was very quick to respond to enquiry, nice clean room in a quiet street, only stayed one night but would be a great place to stay for a longer trip
Fantastic accomidation. Clean and comfortable room. Small touches to make your stay enjoyable. Respectful and friendly hosts. We will be staying again. Thank you so much!
Great location and studio very well equipped. Easy access to city and night life in Newtown.
I felt well looked after at Michele's place. Great location on a quite residential street but really close to lovely bars, cafe's, food and transport.  Good communication and much care taken.

Michele is an incredible host. She is always in contact and responsive to all our queries. The room is cozy, clean, convenient and with nice amenities. Pretty near to king street (hip venue for hip bars, clothes and food).
So kind and accommodating  thanks Michele for your understanding and hospitality. Stellar!

A welcoming touch was some fresh fruit and a jug of milk in the fridge. A quiet tree-lined street, with a few planes flying over in the evenings (not-too-loud). An easy walk to the restaurants of King Street. We'll stay again.
Perfect, affordable and private for a young couple. Feel like we were really catered to. Michele has excellent attention to detail. We had a really nice time. Thanks again!

Put simply, this is the best value place you can stay in the Sydney inner city. 
Amazing location, and set up, if you're local or from overseas do not pass this place up!

Michele was a fantastic host and always willing to help out with requests! The place itself is exactly as pictured, if not better as the sofa bed has been upgraded to a real bed. It is clean and the kitchenette is well stocked. Would definitely recommend staying here to my friends and would consider staying here again next time. It is a short 10min walk to Newtown station which is a few stops from the city centre which is really convenient.
A great room to hang out in around Sydney. Was close to Newtown and plenty of restaurants and shops. We walked everywhere.
Michele is a wonderful host and the suite is fantastic. Great location, comfortable and cosy. Highly recommended!
Michelle was really easy to deal with and made an emergency visit to elderly incapacitated parents much less stressful than it otherwise may have been.

We only had a short stay for a a quick trip to Sydney. This place was perfect: clean, close to local shops, venues and well equipped with all the essentials and more. Lovely modern bathroom and comfy bed.
Great place! Would happily go back. Clean, friendly and nice ambience in a good area in Sydney. Michele was a thoughtful host who had everything covered and organised.

Michele was incredibly welcoming and kind, helping us with any request or question. The apartment has a very comfy bed and a superb bathroom, and was neat and clean when we entered. The neighborhood is very quiet, although it is only a short walking distance (about 8 minutes) from the train station, several pubs and coffee places and lots of restaurants. The only drawback is having a central air conditioning system, controlled from Michele's part of the house right next to the partition, though whenever heating was needed she quickly turned it on (responding in just a minute or two).

Overall, this is an excellent value for your money's worth, and I highly recommend it.

Michelle's place has a great feel and is more like a studio apartment. The private bathroom is a bonus and the privacy provided by a simple divider in the hallway is adequate while allowing for the homeliness of not being totally isolated from the family life of the house. Everything is brand new but one gets the impression that, even if it wasn't it would still be beautifully presented in Michelle's wonderful style. She has thought of everything which makes the stay a memorable experience.
房间很好,超级干净｡洗手间也很漂亮｡房东人超nice,送了我们草莓和牛奶｡但是隔音不是很好,而且冬天住的话有点冷,暖气是整个房子的,关上房间门就没有暖气了｡

A lovely quiet location close to the best in Newtown, plus a short walk to the train station. Really clean, comfy bed, 2 big sofas, as new bathroom, lots of coffee pods and a little fridge. Highly recommend.

Had the perfect stay at Michele's place. Everything is clean, comfy and as advertised and I had everything I needed. Location is great as well! Would definitely stay here again when next in Sydney. Thanks so much Michele!

The accommodation of Michele is very clean and very practical! The bedding is really very comfortable. Michele is an attentive host and very attentive. I highly recommend this accommodation. Also the area is great close to everything but very quiet.

Great spot.

I would not hesitate to stay here again if I came to Sydney!

Really lovely studio apartment. Michelle was a fantastic host and really went out of her way to make sure everything about our stay was comfortable and convinient.

Check in was all too easy and my partner and I really enjoyed coming back to the accommodation after a busy day of sight seeing.  It is very comfortable accommodation and Michele is extremely helpful and makes herself available if need be.  Newtown is a great spot also.

Very convenient, private and well-resourced room near King Street, Newtown.

better than we had hoped for in all respects

Michele is certainly a super host. The studio was more than what was described and superbly appointed! Lots of lovely little touches from the groovy red door to the lovely chest as a coffee table! The bathroom is beautiful and the shower fantastic. Great bed and super comfy couches. A really top place to stay and perfect for our needs on this trip to Sydney.

The room had everything to feel at home. Thanks for the strawberries, cereal options, coffee, tea, spreads... Loved the red door and the location. Very close to the main restaurants, cafe, train station and bus area. Super private and comfy.

My husband and son stayed at Michelle's Air bnb and said it was very clean, comfortable and central.  Michele went out of her way to make their stay comfortable and she was a great communicator.  Thanks Michele.  we will certainly keep your place in mind for future stays.

A great location right near the Center of Newtown. It was a very homely and welcoming space that Michele has gone above and beyond to make her guest feel welcome and safe. Especially as a solo traveler it was great to know she was easy to contact and always there to help if I needed anything. Thanks for being such a great host!
A great location for seeing family and also only a short walk to places like King Street in Newtown and the train station. Comfy accomodation and just as described, thanks Michele.

I've stayed at Michele's place before and, once again, it was an enjoyable and problem-free experience.
The are is clean and inviting with useful and thoughtful touches like the coffee machine, toaster, kettle etc
It's definitely still on my "list of good places to stay" :)

Michele was  very accommodating, all communication was quick and clear. The studio accommodation was super conveniently placed (Walking distance to Enmore Theatre/Newtown), immaculately clean and cosy. Lovely inclusions such as breakfast cereal, tea, coffee and milk. Would thoroughly recommend. Thank you again Michele.
A very comfortable Airbnb with a great location and all modern the conveniences you need thank you again to our hosts.
excellent host! super quick communication and a very convenient location!

The flat got everything I needed. The neighbourhood is very quiet at night, but it is also quite close to the Newtown city centre. You can see the graffiti on the house when walking to train station. Just the bathroom is actually outside of the room which you will need to step to the hallway. Other things look fine and nice.

We stayed with Michele for one night in September 2018. The room is within their home, but has its own private entrance and bathroom. The guest area is only separated from the hosts home by a curtain (there are doors on both the bedroom& bathroom!) although it is still very quiet and private. Michele is a great host and has set the space up well with a comfortable bed, nice towels & linen and tea and breakfast cereal provided. The location is great - a very quiet back street but only a few minutes walk to the bars and restaurants of Newtown.

I spent two nights at Michele's place and had a great stay. It's near some cool cafes in Newtown (which Michele kindly recommended), and it's an easy walk to the train station. The space itself is fairly small but it's bright, modern and clean and had everything I needed. The fruit and cereal were great to have in the morning and the shower was excellent. Michele was also very accommodating about me dropping off my bag earlier in the day and was always quick to respond to any messages. I would happily stay here again!
This is a fabulous area to stay in and we enjoyed  the atmoshere and vibe.
Fantastic location and a lovely place to stay when visiting Sydney.

Really lovely cosy place in a vibrant and hip part of town. Cleverly and tastefully appointed to make a great cost effective studio. Michele is a fantastic host as well, with cereals, coffee, tea, milk,  and offering to go beyond with helpfulness. Thoroughly recommend.
Great space and wonderful host

Michele has thought of everything to make your stay easy and comfortable. Amenities are clean and modern. Close proximity to cafes, park, hospital, university and the city. It’s perfect for all types of trips
Great stay in Newtown! Close to everything and very accommodating host.

Despite being one of the smaller Airbnbs we’ve stayed in this holiday this is one of my favourites. Well located, easy check in and it feels very cosy when you come in, especially after a flight. I appreciated the nice touches like plenty of breakfast supplies and the strawberries, and Michele was very communicative
Great place! Cosy, clean, tidy and also an amazing location. Quick responses too. Definitely will stay again!

I had a really nice but very short stay.
Arrived quite late & left early so I didn’t manage to meet my hosts but our communication was great & they were so flexible.
The place has so many thoughtful touches to make the stay more convenient. Comfortable bed also.
Just make sure you close the windows when you go to sleep as the airport is not far away.
Stress free check in. Excellent communication. Wonderful space. Definitely 5 star!
Terrific value. Fantastic location, quiet but close to the action and transport. Clean, comfortable and well appointed ...All you need for a comfortable stay.
Lovely place in a great location within walking distance of Newtown train station and shops and restaurants. Great host. Beautiful bathroom!

Highly recommended to stay in such a convenient location. A short walk to Enmore Theatre for those seeking an easy overnight stay. Great communication form the host, lovely atmosphere and well priced for the area.
Very clean and modern.

Michele's place is very clean and comfortable accommodation within walking distance to everything  in/ around Newtown.  Nicely furnished with many extra finishing touches. Would definitely consider using again.
Great location, Great place! have stayed here before and will stay again! Thank you!
It was clean and comfortable!
This is a gorgeous apartment in a beautiful part of Newtown. A perfect base for exploring the city. Michele is a fantastic host. Highly recommend :)

Michele has been great.
He helped us since the beginning with their info and immediate answer.
Also if Michele was not in Sydney at our arrival (due NYE) he take care that we'll safely find and enter into the apartment.
House is in good position, quite and safe, good equipped.we enjoy our stay in Michele apartment and we hope to see him another time.

Really nice place — clean, friendly, very nicely furnished — with a fridge — cereal, fruit, bread, bread, coffee and a pitcher of milk waiting for us.  It has dishes and flatware, and a plastic tub and drainer for washing dishes. The bathroom/shower are upscale and very nice.  Michelle is quick to respond to emails and phone calls, and is very helpful.  I’m sorry we weren’t able to coordinate our respective timing so we could meet in person.  
The location — Newton — is downscale trendy — close to the metro train station, so getting to places was fairly easy.  We were pleased with our stay there.  Amazing murals and graffiti.
Nice room in great location. Perfect for a return stay in my old stomping ground.
Michele was quick to respond and very helpful when I wanted to extend my stay. Place was nice and clean too. Would recommend.

Great place to stay. Safe neighbourhood that isn't far from the station (10 minute walk) along pretty tree lined streets with late Victorian houses, many with iron lacework balconies. The main room was very clean, airy and the bed was comfortable. Loved the over head fan which kept me nice and cool. The bathroom was equally very clean and the shower worked well. Good coffee making facilities and well equipped kitchenette.
Michele responded to messages promptly and was very accommodating. Her places fits 2 people really well, and it is a short walk to the train station.
Great location.  clean. perfect.
Everything you need for a comfortable stay in a great location.
Cannot recommend highly enough. Brilliant place in the best location. Thanks Michele!

This is a very nice apartment at 7 min. walking distance from restaurants. It is ideal for a short stay. A small breakfast is included (cereals, few fruits, coffee) and should be eaten on the old chest while be sat on the sofa. Air conditioning is central, so don't expect it to have necessarily a cool temperature. The bathroom is outside the apartment, but close to the room. So you need to get out in a short passage that would normally goes the other apartment, but that is closed with a panel, to enter the bathroom. Because the top of the passage is open, when getting to the bathroom, you need to be quiet to ensure not disturbing the other people. Because that the only water point is at the bathroom, it's a bit complicated to wash the dishes, but Michele offers to wash it with her dishwasher. Communication with Michele is smooth and easy, and overall, it's a good quality for the price.
interesting and stylish accommodation that has everything you need and everything you want is close by
Michele was a lovely host & has a terrific space:)
Loved the fresh fruit and coffee machine and the bathroom is brand new.
It is a very clean and cosy room with ensuite bathroom inside the owners family home, but with your own entrance. We had everything we needed and the location in Newtown is great.

We had a great stay at Michele’s place. The location was in a quiet area but just a couple of minutes walk to the centre of Newtown, which was lively and full of restaurants and bars. It was very easy to get in and out of the centre of Sydney on the train. The studio itself was very clean and had everything we needed for our stay. We wouldn’t hesitate to recommend staying here!

Nice and clean studio, everything as described. The bathroom is very modern and very clean. Bedsheets and towels as well as milk, coffee and cereals provided.

But keep in mind: If you are looking for a perfectly private accommodation this isn't it. You have your own room with your own front door. However, to get to your bathroom you need to use the hall the family also uses. There is a six-foot high partition in the hall but of course you can be heard/can hear when entering the bathroom etc.. Also not having a sink in your room can be a little awkward - although Michele offers to do your dishes if you send her an e-mail and leave the stuff by the partition. It's kind of like sharing a flat without talking to each other but hearing there is someone next door. Still, the family is very quite so if you don't mind that, it's fine.

Newtown is the perfect location to discover Sidney, many botique shops and hip restaurants - it costs around 3 Aus $ to get to city centre by train; 10 mins walk to the station.

name: Experience Kona Farm
summary: You will be staying in a spacious three bedroom house on a one acre certified organic coffee farm. The farm is within a mile of a shopping center and quality restaurants. Ocean access is within 10 minutes drive. Bathroom renovated to all tile and soft tub added to screened in porch.
space: In addition to coffee orchards, this farm has vegetables in raised beds, medicinal plants, and an organic hydroponic growing system. The rooms were renovated in 2014,  freshly painted, and decorated with a touch of Dali art. One of the two bathrooms is more rustic and is scheduled for remodeling early this year. It is fully functional. There is a spacious double living room, a large covered porch space with a hammock, three bedrooms, and an entry porch. The house is close to basic shopping and restaurants. Several beaches and ocean access points are within a 10-15 minute drive. These are excellent areas for snorkeling and diving.
description: You will be staying in a spacious three bedroom house on a one acre certified organic coffee farm. The farm is within a mile of a shopping center and quality restaurants. Ocean access is within 10 minutes drive. Bathroom renovated to all tile and soft tub added to screened in porch. In addition to coffee orchards, this farm has vegetables in raised beds, medicinal plants, and an organic hydroponic growing system. The rooms were renovated in 2014,  freshly painted, and decorated with a touch of Dali art. One of the two bathrooms is more rustic and is scheduled for remodeling early this year. It is fully functional. There is a spacious double living room, a large covered porch space with a hammock, three bedrooms, and an entry porch. The house is close to basic shopping and restaurants. Several beaches and ocean access points are within a 10-15 minute drive. These are excellent areas for snorkeling and diving. Guests have access to all rooms in the house, including the kitchen and two ba
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is rural and quiet. Though close to the main road, the houses are tucked away on small one lane roads and are mostly on small farms. It is safe to walk around the neighborhood at night, although one should leave space for cars approaching on the narrow road. There is a close by farmer's market on Friday and Sunday.
notes: There is no dishwasher.  The wifi is satellite based and is fast enough for most uses. It is on a  semi capped plan that I can add to. Email and web surfing is easily supported. Running HD movies can use up a lot of GB. Antenna servicing is being done this week and is likely to improve the system. (Dec 1, 2016) I will update
transit: Public transportation is poor on the island although there is a bus stop in front of the Manago Hotel, which is within 10-15min walking distance. This location is best for a person with a rental car as the bus comes only a couple times a day.
access: Guests have access to all rooms in the house, including the kitchen and two bathrooms. We live on a separate property.
interaction: I will try to greet you and introduce you to the house when you arrive. I will also be available for advice on how to enjoy the island. You will have some organic coffee that was grown on the farm, vegetables from our CSA and organic true cinnamon from my other farm. More will be available if wanted. Tuesdays are often workdays on the farm so there may be a few people caring for the plants on that day. You can help if interested or even take a farm tour of the main farm or produce business for a small fee. My produce company has access to the best food on the island including tropical fruits like mango and dragon fruit, along with mushrooms, lettuce, and other produce
house_rules: Please respect neighbors by being quiet after 10 pm. There is no smoking in the house, but it is OK on the porch, if you clean up your ashes. No pets are allowed. There is an additional charge of $25/person/night when more than two people rent the property. For children under 16 the charge is reduced to $10/person/night. Children are handled under special offers.

host.host_about: Organic farmer of food and medicines. Run a local produce company called Adaptations that supports the development of a local food system. Also interested in guitar, scuba and nature based activities

reviews.comments: Four of us stayed at Kane's lovely coffee farm in Captain Cook. It was such a neat experience - the coffee, tons of freshman fruit, avocados all over. We took some for our trip into Hilo that we are still eating for dinner. The place is big, plenty of room for 4 of us. You are up in the mountains, but towns and food are very close.

If you want to get away from the big resorts and condo projects, this is the place. Remote, peaceful, authentic. Tane was a gracious host, and even brought us fresh vegetables and fruit from the farm.

Beautiful secluded spot, an easy 15 min drive to awesome snorkel and kid friendly beaches. Our 4 yr old loved having Tane or my husband shake the orange tree to get ripe ones. The lanai was fantastic for afternoon lounging. This place was just what we needed, outside of the tourist areas, and in the bush. We were sad to go!

Great House and a Great Host. The home is exactly as shown, and the Lanai is fantastic. Tane had left us some produce from the farm and we had a great time talking about Local Issues. 
Thanks for the great stay 

(Don't use the Iphone Imaps App to find the house as on much of the big island it is not helpful) (The house access is not difficult)
We had a great stay. Loved our little gift box they left.Wouldnt change anything.

Thank you, Tane for your warm welcome. The place was just like on the website, super spacious and rustic. It felt like the "real" Hawaii. We really enjoyed the area and your place was the perfect base!

Six of us stayed at Tane’s Captain Cook house for three nights.  The home was very accommodating and comfortable. Tane made us feel like welcomed guests, which enhanced the experience (e.g., gave suggestions for things to do, provided essentials such as soap and shampoo for the bathrooms, paper plates and tinfoil for our picnics, etc.). We really enjoyed the coffee and produce that was provided and the recommendations for snorkeling and breakfast were spot-on!  If we’re ever back in the Captain Cook area, we’d gladly return to this house.

Tane's wonderful farm spot was spacious, pretty, close to many wonderful spots near Captain Cook / Kona, and a great deal for the price if you have a group. Tane gave us free local coffee, fresh fruit, & great advice on local spots. He also had a lot of thoughtful ideas to share about Hawaii's development & environmental issues. Highly recommend staying here.

If you want to get away from the throngs of tourists in Kona, this is the place! Yet it's still just a short drive to lots of restaurants and points of interest. Climb a neat one lane winding road to the house. Lush green fruit trees and coffee bushes are everywhere. 

The house is big, simple/rustic and clean. Nice big covered deck with dining table and chairs makes it a great place to eat outside, even when it's raining! 

It's a little tricky to find, so call or text Tane for precise directions. (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps couldn't find it, and there are several houses with the same number on that road. If you're a light sleeper, bring earplugs, as the jungle comes alive at night with the sounds of birds, frogs and the occasional rooster. But we didn't find it a problem.

Tane was a wonderful host and provided us with an unforgettable experience. The grounds were beautiful and the house was plenty big enough for our family with 2 adults, 4 teens, and an 8-year-old. We will definitely be back!

Tane's place is beautiful!  We loved being ensconced in the lush (organic - yay!) vegetation and relaxing on the Lanai. Upon arrival we were greeted by a wonderful gift of coffee and fruit that made us feel very welcome. This was the perfect base for us.

We really enjoyed our time at Kona Farm. The house was as described. The setting was neat and lush. We enjoyed the welcome gifts. Tane was away but Kapula was very helpful. We really enjoyed ourselves.
The land has incredible energy.  The place was comfortable and clean.  He left us a sweet note, sweet fruit, and was super friendly and easy to communicate with.
Tane was warm, welcoming, generous, and made himself available for any help or questions. We couldn't have asked for a better host.

This country house is so relaxing- the roosters wake you up and the frogs sing you to sleep! The host is very communicative, helpful and welcoming with local fruit from his farm and local info. The house accommodates two families easily but is basic and not fancy. If you like resort hotels you may not be thrilled. It's the real Hawaii, being in nature and close to all the best spots in south Kona- don't even bother going to town- it's all here. If you like adventure and local life, this is the place! I would definitely come back.

I loved staying in the Farm. Beautiful scenery and smell of nature. The house was clean and equipped with everything we needed and more. I was very impressed. Tane was a great host, very attentive and answered all our questions. He left us a few gifts from the farm that won my heart.
The house accommodates a large group, we had rooms to spare. The beds were very comfortable. We really enjoyed the living room area, very spacious with comfy couches, where we sat at the end of our day to recap our adventures. It's a great place to stay if you like quiet and be away from the high traffic touristy area.  It's about a 15 minute drive from the hotels and restaurants  in Kona. Overall, it was a very good experience, better than some hotels I have stayed in over the world. I would definitely stay there again.

Tane is an excellent host, friendly and helpful. He was concerned about us finding the place, and gave us excellent directions, as well as keeping in touch and giving us his phone no. to offer us help in the search, which we used!  When we entered the place we were welcomed with a gift of some of his homegrown coffee, and fruits, as well a a booklet of directions and local tips and activity suggestions. searching. He later came by to check on us and see how things were going and offer some helpful local tips. 
    His house was beautiful, we loved it! The lovely kitchen was large and inviting to work in, and we loved eating on the lanai, enjoying the beautiful, luxuriant flowers and plants flourishing in the farm yard.  The beds were very comfortable, and bedrooms were large; and there were two nice bathrooms, which made things easier. The living room couches were comfy, and the house was spacious, clean and comfortable; all we could have hoped for. We probably spent most of our time on the lanai~and there was a hammock there too! The location was wonderfully private, up a long winding rural road, quiet and peaceful; you couldn't even see any other houses around.
   We would definitely stay there again, we were sorry to leave it! We highly recommend Tane as a gracious, helpful host of a wonderful house.

Unfortuantely, I was called away for a familhy emergency, however the rest of my crew were able to show up.  Despoite the fact that I had personally madeall of the arrangements and made all contact it was no problem whatsoever for my husband to check in to the house!  He said that there was fresh fruit, coffee and some other farm fresh goodies there to greet him and the rest of the familhy that showed up the following day.  All resports I got were that the house was great, andeveryone was comfortable.  Thank you Tane, I hope that I personally get to stay at your home soon! Aloha and Mahalo

Tane was an Excellent host. He came to the house when we first arrived and provided information about the community we would not have been able to find through a guide book.  He left us fresh fruit, coffee beans, and cinnamon to enjoy. 

His large home is situated up a long narrow road that truly ends in farm country. Rosters wake you up in the morning, and crickets put you to sleep.  From the windows you can see the sun set, fruit trees and lush vegetation. The neighborhood is a great location to pick up all the amenities you desire and a perfect place to get away from all the people and hustle in Kona. Its a 20 minute drive from an beautiful volcanic beach and snorkeling location. 

We had a very pleasant say.

Tane does a great job making his guests feel welcome.  We were able to check in a bit early with no problems and he left us some wonderful treats; coffee grown right on the property, cinnamon from his other farm, and tons of fruit (some of which I've never seen before!)  He also gave us great recommendations for snorkeling.
The location of the house is wonderful, it feels remote but is only minutes away from town (and Da Poke Shack-go immediately!).  The washer/dryer and porch hammock were a plus and it was nice that drinking water was provided.
This house would be perfect for a large group visiting Hawaii on the cheap.  We definitely underutilized it!
Tane was very accommodating, very responsive to texts.  The house was nice, we enjoyed early morning walks up the road.

I loved The Owl’s Nest, as Tane’s place is called, and we saw an owl fly by our first evening.  Six of us - my three grown children and two of their partners and I stayed for 9 days and had such a great time.  The place is spacious and very comfortable, including all the beds.  In the mornings on the lanai, I’d watch the sky lighten and listen to the roosters, watch butterflies on the poinsettia tree – we identified so many different birds (bring your binoculars)!  We ate avocados and oranges from right out the door, ate the  fruits Tane left us (some I had never seen before) and enjoyed the coffee and cinnamon from his farms. The spacious kitchen was perfect for family cooking and card games after dinner. We snorkeled and swam with dolphins at Two-Step (15 or so minutes away) and highly recommend The Poke Shack on the way.  Tane was very responsive to texts, and we all enjoyed our conversation with him when he dropped by.   Such a perfect hideaway!

Tane was very welcoming!! The driveway up was very narrow and dark at night but Tane  gave thorough instructions on how to get to the location which helped a lot. It was very scenic, peaceful, and beautiful during the day. We all loved his house! He had multiple beds available and they were all comfortable. We would definitely go back if we were going to the Big Island!

We enjoyed Tane's place a lot. It is a really charming and comfortable house in a green and quiet location.

We were a group of 11 and both the adults and the little ones enjoyed their stay.

The porch is amazing, especially early in the morning. 

Tane is a great host, he paid a lot of attention to make sure everything was alright for us. Tane welcomed us with some local coffee, fresh cinamom and fruits, this is a really nice touch.

We highly recommend this place!

Tane was very helpful in guiding us to his farm house. The road to the house is narrow, but we were able to navigate fairly easily even with the mustang the rental agency gave us. Tane left us some really great treats! We both thought that was really nice.

The house is big, with plenty of beds and rooms for a larger group. The view is gorgeous. I loved listening to the birds and other little critters outside. The linens were plentiful and smelled very freshly laundered. Honestly, we didn't spend a lot of time at the house. We had plans with family who live locally. We definitely enjoyed our stay.

Tane was a great host and Owls Nest was a great place to stay.  Tame provided some great coffee from the farm and some delicious fruits too! Lots of space for sleeping, our family of five had plenty of room and still some empty beds. House was stocked with the odds and ends we needed to cook the food we bought from the convenient grocery store right down the road. The kids loved exploring the property. Highly recommended. We'll try to stay here on our next trip.

The Owl's Nest is one of the best places we have ever stayed in on vacation. Tane is an attentive host who is easy to communicate with, and quick to respond to messages. The property is set back in the slopes and has one of the most beautiful private roads that leads up to the front gate. The property is exactly as described, on a coffee farm with ocean view on the lanai. The setting is very quiet, and the starry night sky is so peaceful. Tane made sure we got to the property, and kindly gave us tropical fruits, coffee from his own farm, and fresh cinnamon (not to be missed, so real and flavorful, we are ordering more!) He stocked the entire house with everything a family would need. This is the most fully stocked vocational rentals I have ever stayed at. There are actually four bedrooms, one with a twin, two with one queen each, and one with two queens. 
Overall, I highly recommend this rental and it's wonderful host.

Tane could not have been more welcoming and responsive. We must have texted him 100 times. He always responded with tips and suggestions to optimize our time on the island, and to make sure we were comfortable at the house and things were in working order.  We arrived to a complimentary supply of delicious fruit, coffee and cinnamon. When we ran out we were able to purchase more from Tane who delivered fruit to our door almost daily at an excellent price for the island. Tane even delivered a brand new set of snorkel equipment to our door when we told him we were looking for some.  Tane also accommodated a last minute change in our reservation when a tropical storm was forecast for the island. He refunded two days of our stay.

The location was a bit more out of the way than we expected, perhaps in retrospect we would have opted for a spot on the water side of the highway, but this spot is unique and in a real, rural neighborhood.  Ideal spot to access points both north and south, e.g. including 2-step, Captain Cook, Volcanoes Natl Park, Kona area. 

If you are a neat and clean freak, then this place is not for you.  There was dirty clutter that I put out of view and out of the way upon arrival, and I had to clean the kitchen upon arrival.  Dirty and very worn sponge in the sink, no mattress pad on the bed, felt the springs through the sheets, hair in the shower drain, bathroom sinks needed a scrubbing, old and dirty bars of soap, etc.

Tane was very responsive in trying to get the wifi up to speed for us and paying for more gigabytes (or something like that). The wifi worked, but was often slow. It did not interfere with our stay because were were gone all day, but we could not stream movies from our  laptop onto the TV at night as we had planned to do.  If we had needed wifi to get work done while on vacation (not advisable of course! but sometimes necessary), the wifi would not have been sufficiently up to speed.

In sum, best host you could ask for, unique and beautiful spot, roomy home, well equipped kitchen, but not for neat or clean freaks.

Our family of 5 had a fantastic stay at Tane's Owl's Nest property! Situated in the middle of a beautiful tropical farm, it was definitely the most unique place I have rented.
