This location is absolutely stunning and the suite is lovely, too.  Perfect for my stay on all fronts.  Yanick was helpful and kind and responsive.  I hope to be back!

Yanick is a very likable host! The place is a lovely home and is suitable for a single traveler as well as groups. The location was spectacular, and it was very quiet at night inside the unit. This is the spot to stay in if you are experiencing Montréal for the first time!
Historic and charming! One can almost feel the ghost of Charles Dickens (a one time visitor) wandering the halls of this former hotel in the center of old town Montreal!

Lovely, cosy and quiet loft in old Montreal-was just as described. There were beautiful views and a homey atmosphere. Yanick is a superb host. He was quick and spot on with answers to all my questions and has an extremely welcoming manner. He waited there to greet me despite a fairly late arrival and as other guests have mentioned went the extra mile supplying fruit, milk and breakfast food for the stay. Loved the loft!

Yanick was a very nice man.  He meet with us when we arrived and provided more than we needed.  There was food in the apartment which saved us a bit of money, and everything worked well.  One thing to note is the fact that there are no near by places to buy beer at a wholesale value, meaning there are only bars and restaurants around the apartment.  We had to walk over fifteen minutes away to find a place that sold beer (it was in Little China).  Other than that the stay was pretty much perfect, although like Yanick said, the apartment was a little small for four people.  Although we managed just fine.
L’appartement est très bien situé, surtout quand on a à travailler au centre-ville. Dans un lieu historique, majeur pour les Patriotes. Merci!

Yanicks place was very clean and in a perfect location for a nice weekend getaway in the old port of Montreal. He graciously left us food for breakfast and greeted us when we entered. We had everything we needed and more! Would definitely reccomend this apartment to family and friends or anyone looking for a great place in a great location!
Great place amazing location!! Espresso and fruits a lovely extra - highly recommended

Yanick was an amazing host during my time in Montreal. He was great with communication and made sure I was satisfied throughout my stay. There were also several thoughtful touches, such as a fully stocked kitchen. 

The place itself is in an ideal location for touring Montreal. It's a beautiful loft in a historic building. You know you're staying in a great place when you see other tourists stop to take pictures from the outside :)

Overall, a wonderful stay and I hope to be back!

I would rate an 11 on a scale of 1-5. Yanick met me at his home and walked me through the operations. He left breakfast items,fresh fruit, o.j., coffee, tea, in addition to the usual bedding and such.  The location is outstanding! Most convenient and charming district; great restaurants, shopping, Two museums, plus a spa are within walking distance. The Metro is an easy walk. This is a modern unit with beams from the 17th century. The original structure is otherwise hidden, but Charles Dickens stayed at the same address. Next time I visit Montreal I hope this unit is available.

This is a great loft in a great location! Yanick ensures to have breakfast and coffee available. It was very warm in such cold weather. No issues and Yanick checked up on us through our stay which was nice.

Il s'agit d'un petit studio très propre et très bien situé dans le cœur historique de Montreal
Le propriétaire est très réactif aux messages, aimable et ponctuel.
On aurait aimé savoir qu'il s'agissait d'un studio car Une chambre est précisée dans l'annonce. Mais comme il s'agit en réalité d'un studio le lit est dans la pièce à vivre. 
On entend donc le bruit du frigidaire la nuit par intermittence.
Le lit situé dans un coin n'est pas facilement accessible pour la seconde personne. 
Si vous louez en janvier, il vaut mieux regarder les dates du festival de musique electro " Igloofest" qui a lieu le jeudi, vendredi et samedi 2 semaines en janvier car on entend un peu les bruits de la scène .

My experience here was wonderful and I'd highly recommend to anyone staying in Montreal.  I'd never stayed in this area and wanted to try it out.  Yanick's place was perfectly located just a couple blocks from the Metro.  Also, you could walk out the front door and be directly in the middle of the cobblestones of Old Town.  He was very good about making sure everything was perfect and was kind enough to text me during my stay to make sure I had everything I needed.  When I arrived, there was fruit and breakfast options available, along with simple things like a couple bottles of water and an amazing coffee maker.  He just got all the details right.  Definitely stay here if you can!

We stayed in this lovely loft for one night on our honeymoon and are so glad we did! Everything about this place is fantastic: it’s comfortable and clean; it’s a quiet unit right in an unbeatable and lively location; Yanick’s hospitality and communication is great; five stars all over!
Very cute spot in the heart of old port. Yannick the host was very helpful. Loved it!

Yanick’s place was completely awesome! The space was beautiful, in a great location and had everything you could need for your stay in Montreal. Yanick was easy for communicate with and the check in process was very simple. Was nice  to explore all day and then come back to  lay on the couch and watch Netflix on the TV ;)

If ever my wife and I travel to Montreal again, we will certainly be looking to see if this place is available first thing. It was a great stay and the Old Port district is so charming. We walked to the Bell Center for a hockey game from here with no problems, enjoying the downtown sector as well. An altogether pleasant part of our honeymoon.

There is a reason why Yanick and his BNB have a 5 star rating!  He is a very gracious host, communicative and very accommodating.  The loft is clean, cozy, and in a great location.  
I will be returning upon my next visit to Old Montreal!
Perfect location. Minutes from subway, restaurants and shops. Cozy and comfortable space. I would definitely stay there again.

Yanick was a wonderful host! His place is adorable and the location is perfect. It’s an easy walk all throughout Old Port, with great access to bars, restaurants, coffee shops and historical landmarks. The apartment has every amenity you would need and Yanick’s communication prior to check in was superb. Looking forward to booking this place again for future visits :)
I highly recommend Yanick's place. He is very nice and his place is located in one of the best locations in Montreal.

Yanick was a great host - very quick to respond and accommodating - and his place was great. I had been a bit concerned from the photos that it might be chilly being an older place that looked a bit like a converted attic, but when I arrived it was nicely warm and I didn't have to make any temperature adjustments. The place is very private and secure, with the extra benefit of a keyed common entry and keyed private entry. I had expected something like a single room in a hostel-like setting but it's actually more like a hotel including an elevator. All the photos are accurate and the location is great - easily walkable distances to explore the city. My best AirBnb experience yet and I'd definitely stay again.
This is the place to be.  Loved every minute of the trip.  The location is in a exciting part of Montreal as well.
This place is just pretty cool. Its right in the old part of Montreal. We really enjoyed our time.

This is an exquisite location! It was perfect for walking distance to several wonderful sight seeing destinations. It was really nice to have breakfast items and water left for me. I was very happy with my stay.

My friend and I had such a lovely stay in Montreal at Yanick's studio apartment. It was clean, comfortable, and he generously provides an array of breakfast foods and cooking staples (oil, vinegar) and amenities to actually cook dinner too (which we did). The neighborhood felt extremely safe. Thank you so much for hosting us, Yanick.

Emplacement très bon, à 5 minutes du Métro et dans la Vieille Ville. Excellent rapport qualité/prix. Bon accueil, le frigo était garni pour le petit déjeuner ! Beaucoup d'attentions de la part de Yannick, logement très propre et confortable. Je recommande ! Idéal pour une ou deux personnes.

First off, Yanick's description of the location is spot-on! His loft is located right on St. Paul Street in the heart of the old town. If you want the European experience without going overseas, then this is the spot.  Yanick's loft is wonderful.  It's comfortable and well appointed with anything you may need if you forget to pack something :-) As a host he was kind enough to wait for us when we were arriving late (which we very much appreciated) and he gave us some good tips on the surrounding area.  Finally, you cannot beat the value. What Yanick offers is unbelievable at the price - you cannot go wrong here.
Nice place near everything!
Yanick was a wonderful host, and his home was so beautiful and in the perfect location. We loved everything about it and it really made our trip special!!

Cozy studio apartment with all of the amenities needed to comfortably spend a day indoors, or return to rest after a busy day of exploring. The neighbourhood is quiet and very peaceful at night. We enjoyed being removed from the liveliness of downtown at the end of a busy day. We didn't spend a great deal of time in Old Montreal as we found it expensive and preferred to explore the more culturally diverse areas of Montreal. It was easy to walk to most of the areas that we had more interest in exploring. Overall Yanick's home was cozy with lots of extras (Nespresso, fruits, milk, eggs, cereal, etc). It was very clean and Yanick was responsive and punctual. We weren't left waiting for him to arrive and greet us after our long drive, which we appreciated.

O apartamento é ótimo, localização perfeita, 5min andando pro metro, 10 andando para á Notre-Dame, 2 min da roda gigante. Apesar de ser um local muito turismo, durante a noite é muito tranquilo, ótimo para relaxar! O apartamento tinha cereais, café suco e iogurte! Vale cada centavo!

Lovely apartment, walking distance from all the tourist attractions but also very quiet and fully equipped, if you ever want to escape the crowd and spend an evening at home. The perfect place to explore old Montreal! Also, Yanick is a great host: he always available and flexible about my check-in and chek-out time.

Yanick’s place is a cozy studio apartment near everything in Old Montreal. You can’t beat this location. Open the door, and you’re in front of Marche Bonsecours. It’s perfect for two people. Everything you need to cook a meal is in the kitchen and the bathroom has everything you forgot to bring.  Yanick was there to greet us when we arrived to show us around and explain the Nespresso machine to us (which we needed). The water bottles and coffee he provided came in handy! We would definitely stay here again.

The stay was perfect, Yanick is a very nice person, the flat is prepared perfect!
Thank you!
Great location - host was easy to communicate with.  Handsome decor.  Just loved it

This was our first Air BnB experience and I’m glad it went smoothly.  Our host, Yanick is very nice. 
The place is very clean.  Plenty of hot water and excellent water pressure. The location is perfect, everything is close by, you are right on old Montreal East.

We are so thankful for the breakfast items provided as we could not find a restaurant nearby that served breakfast (we only checked the street of St. Paul), so we went back to our room and made egg sandwiches, yum!

We will definitely be back and would definitely recommend this place! ❤️

This place is amazing. We can't fault it! A beautiful apartment right on the middle of the old part of town - so accessible. Teena brought us everything we needed for breakfast and made us very welcome when we arrived. Oh and the shower was probably the best one I've ever (Website hidden by Airbnb) powerful! There's a lot of thought that's been put into this listing and it really all adds up to make a perfect stay!

Surrounded by history and culture, Yanick's place is in a perfect location in Old Montreal. There are countless restaurants, bars, galleries and churches nearby (within five minutes or less), and Ste-Catherine is only a 15-minute walk away. Yanick was kind enough to stay up and let us in well after his regular check-in time—great host.

This is a very cute little apartment in the heart of all of the action of Old Montreal. The location literally could not have been better as it is at the back of the building (so it is quiet), but only steps from great restaurants, shopping, and entertainment. Yanick is a great host. He not only provides sight-seeing tips, but umbrellas, bottled water, high end coffee, and breakfast items. We truly enjoyed our stay and will be back.
Excellent location. Walk to everything. Very clean apartment. Nice extras in the fridge for breakfast.

Beautiful space and AMAZING location! Yanick is such a thoughtful host. he was there to explain everything when I checked in and was very understanding when my flights to Montreal were delayed three times and I checked in very late. Place is very clean and tidy and the bed and pillows are very comfortable. I would love to stay there again when I'm in Montreal. beautiful eats around the apartment and it's very close to all the touristic destinations in the city. Loved my stay!

Our stay at Yanick's was wonderful! It was such an amazing location to explore Montreal from - so close to the metro and within walking distance of many great galleries, museums, parks, restaurants and, of course, the Old Port! We would definitely love to stay here again! Thanks so much for the great stay!
This best Airbnb we have stayed in to date. Yanick is a wonderful host and went the extra yard in every aspect. I could not recommend this place highly enough!
Great location in the heart of old port. Super close to public transport, restaurants and bars. The space is nice and light and Yannick thoughtfully included supplies to use during our stay.

Excellent compromis.
Appartement fonctionnel et idéalement situé pour découvrir Montréal au mieux.
Fantastic studio in the heart of the old city. Yanick was kind and met us to show us the place and give us the keys. Thanks, Yanick!

The location of Yanick's sweet little loft was incredibly convenient for exploring.  We didn't take our car out of the garage once we arrived walking to great sights to see, places to shop, and of course great food.  A very comfortable bed after a day full of activity was a huge plus.   If we get a chance to visit Montreal again in the near future I'd certainly hope The Loft was available.
Incredible location! Perfect. Yanick made the entry easy and we had no problems. Would highly recommend!
Amazing place in the heart of old downtown!! Yanick is quick to respond and his apartment has everything you need!!
This location is really as good as it gets for visiting the old city of Montreal. In addition, the apartment was generously stocked with breakfast foods.

Nice and clean loft in a perfect location. It is right on Saint Paul St. Comfortable bed. Has all necessary amenities. Thoughtful host, Yanick met us at check-in and shared some local tips. I would definitely recommend.
The perfect place for Montreal escape!

If you have never been to old historic Montréal, this is the place in the heart of it.
The metro is in walking distance, clean, will take you SAFELY to Park Mont Royal, large, green and safe,( bus 11) or the botanical gardens. Walk downtown, eat in Chinatown, shop on rue St. Cathrine. Airport taxis take you to the front door, literally, for $ 30 US.
Yannick had lots of breakfast supplies, including a great Nespresso machine .
Yanick’s place is in an amazing location in the heart of old Montreal. The place was very cute and the check in process was very easy! I’d stay there again!

Me alojé con mi esposa 5 noches en setiembre 2018. El departamento es de un ambiente en el 4to piso (con ascensor) en muy buen estado. La ubicación es perfecta, en el medio de la zona del puerto antiguo de Montreal, caminando a muchos restaurantes, bares y tiendas. Siempre tuvimos botellas de agua, café Nespresso, cereales, jugo, yogurt, fruta... el anfitrión muy atento y preocupado por los detalles. Volvería a quedarme en mi próximo viaje.
We enjoyed a lot the stay. Very considerate details like the amenities, and breakfast options. We liked the wooden floor.

Yanick's place was exactly as described. Fantastic location in Old Montreal with a ton of restaurants and bars conveniently close by. Check-in was easy and Yanick provided everything that was needed including breakfast foods and drinks in the refrigerator. He also responded very quickly to questions that I had during my stay.  The place was clean and cozy. I highly recommend his place if you travel alone or with 1 to 2 others.
Convenient location and very clean!

This is a fabulous little apartment in a dream location.  Right in the heart of Old Montreal, you’re surrounded by places to check out, restaurants to eat in, and walks along the waterfront.  
The kitchen was such a treat, so well stocked - I saved money and time by eating at ‘home’ occasionally.  And the style, with those beams!, was excellent.  Couldn’t have been happier.
Great location if you want to be in the heart of Old Montréal. I would definitely stay there again.
Great location, clean charming unit with nice view of street life. Enjoyed my stay. Easy check-in process.

We loved Yanick's place! A great location to get anywhere with really affordable parking nearby. Right in the heart of everything but incredibly quiet at night. Can't recommend it enough as a perfect spot to land in Montreal!

This loft is in a great location. We stayed two nights and enjoyed the space and Netflix in the evening after spending all day walking and eating our way through Montreal’s lovey neighbourhoods. 

The directions to the loft were excellent and Yanick was waiting for us to check in when we arrived early.
Check out was straight forward too.

Would recommend this for a romantic getaway.
Amazing location and a great host. Clean, very comfortable bed, with food for breakfast in the fridge. Thank you Yanick for a great hospitality.
Perfect location!

A fantastic location and a great little base for your holiday! Yanick is a great host and is easy to communicate with. And as a bonus, he thoughtfully provides provisions for breakfast which makes your stay so much easier! The location of the apartment is amazing and transport was really easy with the nearby Metro station. I would definitely stay here again.

Best Airbnb I have stayed in! Can’t beat the location if you want to see Vielle Ville. On the oldest street in the City. Everything was superb in the space—all I needed plus quality soaps/options/bath products/tea/Nespresso machine, soft sheets, eggs, cheese, cereal, more than I’ve seen in a typical Airbnb. Well designed space, comfortable, amazing views from window.  I just might go back!
Had a great stay! Beautiful location and charming space.
Great place & location for anyone wanting to explore old Montreal. Will definitely spread the word.
Great place, great location, great host
Yanick’s place was nice was a great location downtown. The apartment was not ready until several hours past check in. Yanick was friendly and helpful. The place was cozy.
Perfect cozy space in Old Montreal! Yanick is a great host and the apartment is clean, spacious, and very cute! Could not have imagined a better place for my stay in Montreal!

Yanick's apartment was wonderful. It is a great, cozy place for two people and in a good location. Everything was very walkable and Yanick offered suggestions for food and activities. The apartment was clean and stocked with breakfast amenities.
Perfect everything!  If I go to Montreal again, I will still stay here. Five-star recommendation!

Yanick's place is perfect for solo travellers as well as couples, with a cozy feel to it. The location is perfect, check in and check out were  a breeze, and communication was excellent. The place itself is very well equipped with everything you need for a comfortable stay.  All in all, this was one of the best Airbnbs I stayed at, and I would love to come back and stay here on my next visit to Montreal.

I was very busy at a conference during my week-long stay, so I hope to stay there again sometime. Location amazing, place was perfect for my needs, very reasonably priced, having a bit of starting food in the fridge was extremely useful especially when just arriving. Really great!!!
Great host, great location , great apartment!

Yanick's place was absolutely wonderful. as soon as you walk in, you're in a much larger loft than the pictures can show. There were nice breakfast amenities during the stay, as well as the place being very clean. 
Lastly the location as mere steps from just about everything in  vieux Montréal, and even then, public transportation and the more hip downtown is within walking 10-20 minute walking distance.
Fantastic location in the heart of Old Montreal near an abundance of restaurants, bars, and other shops. The complimentary coffee and breakfast was appreciated. Would highly recommend!
He was very helpful with local restaurants and parking. A lot of stuff in the kitchen for breakfast which is amazing.
Nice place on Old Montreal. Thanks Yannick
Won’t be disappointed in location or studio
great place
Fantastic space, fantastic location.
Nice, clean space. Enjoyed the clear instructions and parking tips. Definitely would recommend again.

Our first night we walked to the port to ice skate and then to a great little brasserie for dinner and music. It was so nice to have both at our fingertips. The location was out of the way for the heavy tourism which made for nice and quiet nights. 

The mattress is firm so take that into account if that matters to you. 

Thanks for a nice clean apartment during our stay in Montreal!
Great stay - thank you Yanick!

Yanick's place was so good and it is within walking distances of many tourist attractions and even a metro station. He is also very accomodating, helping me to check in even outside the designated check in times.

name: Apartment for 2 guests
summary: Bright. Stylish. Clean. Convenient. City Centre. Couple-friendly. Family-friendly. Quiet. Space-efficient. I hope you would also describe in the same way after you stay at my high-floor flat
space: Located in the city centre and at the junction between Mong Kok and Yaumatei, my flat is a convenient home-away-from-home for family and travel companions.  Within 3-5 minutes, you can reach MTR  (subway), Temple Street, Ladies’ Market, Jade Market, Fruits Market, 24-hour supermarket, local eateries and shopping mall.  Please do enjoy every detail that I specially choose for you in this flat, see the complete list furniture, equipment and beddings at the bottom.  Just to highlight for guests with kids, to ensure kids' safety, windows are upgraded to 5-star hotel standard with special hinges and lock.   Take a look at the pictures and they show you exactly how the flat looks like.  May I happily share with you that I am honoured to receive Airbnb's 'Super Host' status recently -  only top 5% hosts among the world are awarded with this recognition, and this assures you the kind of hospitality that you would be receiving.  I look forward to welcoming you all! Amenities: Building:  24 hour

house_rules: No smoking No pets Pls put rubbish to public rubbish bin outside the apartment Pls do wash dishes before check out Copies of passport, flight itinerary and name card have to be provided before check-in / confirmation of booking

host.host_about: I am from Hong Kong, a frequent traveller, who knows well what you need and hope to go beyond to let you have an enjoyable stay in my flat and Hong Kong.

reviews.comments:
The location is very convenient. It took us 3 minutes’ walk to MTR station and 2 mins to Mong Kok Nathan street and Ladies’ street. There are so many restaurants nearby and even a 24 hours supermarket downstair. I love the egg tarts, and my friends like milk tea, and street food around the corner as well. Local noddle shop opens till 4am around the corner as well. I never get hungry :P. KK is an amazing host to recommend us restaurants nearby as well. 
 
The flat is very nice decorated, modern and stylish. I would say the flat is very clean, furnitures, toilet, and kitchen are all new. We all feel so relaxed and confortable. I can tell KK put much thoughts behind with his choice of furnitures. The flat is very practical and cost effective for us as a party of 4. We feel safe here as we got asked by the security guard a few times. We even got English TV channels like CNN, BBC, and can play Youtube at TV, and it is a 4K high tech internet TV!!! Wifi is steady and fast, it is a bonus as we cannot survive without wifi. 
 
I like the sunlight in the day and the night scenes through the windows. Even we are in so central location, being high up in the building make us away from traffic, that we all have a very sweet night sleep. I can tell the mattress is very high quality and it is so comfortable, and my friends mentioned even the soft-bed is so comfortable. Thanks KK and I would recommend the flat to any guests for sure !!

KK is an excellent and THOUGHTFUL host. I have travelled for over 20 countries and I can tell KK went extra mile to ensure my stay is a pleasant one. He replied fast and accurate when we first contact him when making reservation, and even takes good care of us after check-in. My auntie feel secured and great to know a friendly and reliable host at a new place, thanks very much for that. 

We are a family of 3 with my auntie’ baby. My auntie worked in hotel business and was so impressed that the washroom has a THERMO ventilator to keep her baby warm at bath. Water is also hot even in such cold winter. The windows are all installed with 5 stars hotel-grade adjustable safety locks to ensure her baby stays safely inside the flat while we can enjoy the city night scene through the big windows at high-floor.  

The LOCATION is so PRIME and we never feel hungry, and a lot of eateries are downstairs. It took us 4-5 minutes’ walk to the MTR, it is soooo CONVINENT and there are already many interesting local stores downstairs along the way to the MTR.

The flat is so CLEAN and all the furniture are NEW. The flat even has a WASHER-DRYER and a stylish cooktop that make our stay perfect !! I like the violet colour of the theme wall that I feel so relaxed. Tips: If you are travelling with lover or friends of 3-4, it would be a best choice.  Thanks KK to be our host.

Kk has been very nice at welcoming us and showing us around his flat. The flat itself is tiny but incredibly well furnished and designed. We never felt like it was too tiny for 4 people, and it's incredibly clean. Kk was also really helpful when we needed an extra set of keys and he REALLY likes to share his favourite spots in the city with travellers. 

Staying at KK's flat has definitely been a wonderful experience and I'll consider doing it again next time I'll be in HK.

This apartment was the perfect find for me. It was in the quieter section of Mongkok(if there is such a thing) and from its location allowed to get a great view of the area. KK was the perfect host he had sent me a video prior to coming over giving me the HK highlights and once I arrived he was the perfect host having prepared notes for me for restaurants and directions to MTR station and the correct exits to use.(Very important to know) The apartment was fabulous and it was newly renovated and quite spacious by HK standards. Hong Kong is a city that has so much to see that this apartment was the perfect haven to relax before regrouping and exploring again. I had a very positive stay and would highly recommend it to anybody wanting to experience the true Hong Kong in particular Mongkok and Yu Ma Tei. Thank you KK

the most fantastic experience in HK is KK's flat~ very cozy and comfortable and tidy! It is amazing that everything is available!!! All of us are satisfied with this flat. In Mongkok, there are many canteens under the flat, we never felt hungry. and there's a 24h supermarket, very convenient. Besides, KK is a very kind and thoughtful person, we have connected for 2 months, I have met some problems during the order, very appreciate for KK helping me solve the problem. This flat is really perfect and can't be better, whatever the facilities and the area. If   I come to HK next time, this flat will be our first choice. Thx KK a lot.

Kk is really a nice guy!He's very thoughtful and good to us!Some tips he provide us was also useful before our planning.
To be honest,it's better ask Kk for information than do the raiders.He would provide you the best choice and accurate information as a local.
We have  4 girls.Everything in the flat can be satisfaction including washing machine and clothes stand.(we love the washing machine the most!!!)
My other friends were so surprised that I could with ths price for such a nice flat in Hong Kong after I showed them this flat.A clean and comfort space to stay in fully equipped.
Thanks to the good location,we never feel hungry ☺️
My friends and I were so satisfied with the flat and Kk

KK apartment is cozy and just perfect. It has new design and much attention to the small details. It had everything !!!! And all was in New condition . the bed is very comfortable and the apartment is quiet even it is just a few minutes from busy mong kok.
KK was easy to deal with. Fast !! To reply and always available to assist. Check in and out was a breeze.
I had stayed in many apartments in HK and can say this is one of the best. Highly recommended!! Thx KK .

KK from the get go was the perfect host and nothing was too hard or difficult for him to make sure our stay in Hong Kong was comfortable as possible. Unfortunately, we didn't get to meet KK as he was always but even then dealing with KK (and his friend Mr. Lai) remotely was effortless and efficient. The apartment itself is a newly renovated and equipped with all the necessities that will make you feel right at home. The location of the apartment is on the quite end of Mongkok. However, it’s only a stone throw away from MongKong and Yau Mai Tei MTR, major shopping centre (Langham), restaurants and a 24hour supermarket.

Our stay was very positive stay and I would highly recommend KK’s apartment to anybody. KK, thank you and we look forward to seeing you again when we come back to HK.

The house was very clean and indeed newly renovated. The space is snug and cozy just nice for the 4 of us. The location is primely located near to local shopping streets and MTR just about 5-10mins walk away. A great place to set foot upon to begin our adventure in hongkong.

Mr KK is friendly and provided us promptly with many useful tips for the recommended local delights and best places to shop. As our stay happen to coincides with the 7th day of Lunar new year, Mr KK surprised us with angbaos for each of us with a a really heartwarming note sending his well wishes.

The flat was very clean and well equipped. It was quite small but really cute and cozy. The wifi connection was fast. The location was good since the flat is a 5 min walk to the mtr station. There's a nearby grocery store open 24 hours. And Mr. Tam was accommodating and punctual.

The location was excellent, just a few minutes away from the subway station (Yau Ma Tei). The place was clean and quite at night.  The flat had everything descriped in the listing page. The bed was very comfortable. KK was very nice who kindly explained to us the neighbourhood when we arrived. He also provided us a Super map showing the shopping and eating hot spots. Thank you very much KK. We highly recommend this flat.

The accommodation was, overall, a pleasant one. It is clean, well equipped and able to sleep up to 5 adults--although moving around the room may be slightly inconvenient due to its compact size (which is the case with most Hong Kong accommodation). What's more, it is a convenient walking distance away from the MTR and the heart of Mongkok, where Ladies Street is located. Safety, too, is not an issue as the place provides a round-the-clock security guard.

Checking in and out is a breeze, and the host, Mr KK, is a friendly man who is always helpful with suggestions of what-to-do and what-to-eat. 

Will definitely recommend this place if you are visiting Hong Kong :)

Our stay was cozy and convenient. KK's apartment is in the heart of Mon Kok which worked out great since my fiancées cousin lives nearby. The apartment was clean and modern, we had four in our party and it was definitely tight, but to say we felt at home in a very different country is a good way to recommend the place. KK was super accomodating and kept us up to date, he even helped us extend our stay at the last minute, I would have no reservation before staying at any of his current or future Air BNB's. Thank you!

This is my second review for KK, since he so graciously allowed us to extend our stay for another day at the last minute, our stay was amazing and please see my previous review for more info, but we would recommend the place to our friends and family for sure and would stay there again in the future in a heartbeat.

The flat is described as "Bright. Stylish. Clean. Convenient. Quiet....." on this page. Totally agree to these! I love the super fast wi-fi, KK is very efficient and thoughtful. Would not hesitate to recommend his flat to friends and would definitely book again in my next visit.

Mr KK just was perfect. He help us very very much with everything and we are very satisfied with his service. Flat was very nice, place is on perfect location close to everything,  metro is just a few minutes away. Place vas very clean and good equipped.  All recommendations!!!

這是我第一次到香港旅行,房東非常的熱心,主動提供我們很多的資訊,人非常的好,房子非常乾淨,配備一切齊全,地理位置非常方便｡有了房東,完全不用擔心在異國會害怕擔心｡
很開心這次選擇了這間住宿,讓我們留下很快樂的回憶~~

Our stay at KK's home has been great. He is very helpful & given us very detailed list of places to get yummy food. 
His home is very clean & tidy. Make us feels like home. It also near to MTR & accessible to many places of interest. 
KK was so kind that he went the extra mile to bring us the HK map the next day when he knew that we forgot to get one from the airport. 
Highly recommended to all!

Since there has been miscommunication with the date I supposedly booked and the flat is still occupied, we initially checked-in the nearby hotel with very limited space and awful odor. The next day, Mr. Tam offered to get our luggages at 1pm and check-in late since they still have to clean the flat. We basically used our first day in HK to move here and there. 

After moving to his flat, we finally had some time to rest before pushing with our itinerary. Mr. Tam helped us out giving a map with some nearby restaurants where we can buy food. He gave us some tips on what can we order and asked him to write it in their local language for me to easily communicate with the locals. 

All throughout our stay in HK, KK can be easily reached through a mobile app. I just give him the places where we plan to go for the day and he give us the shortest/easiest way to our destination. Including the approximate fares. 

KK's flat is a good place to relax and rest after a long tiring day. The amenities in the pictures are exactly what it is when we stayed. Our family enjoyed our stay and will definitely communicate with him again when we have our vacation in HK!

My family went to Hong Kong for holiday, my son with 3 years old, my husband and I and we stayed at CK's place that was a great location and fitted for all of us. The place is very nice, same as shown in the pictures, with all the ammendities we needed and, as I told about the location, is very close to MTR that you can go anywhere in HK also, even it's in MongKok area is very quiet that you can sleep very well the whole night. CK was very helpfull, he make us to be as we were at our home. He helped us also with our check-in in town that made us very happy with the arrangements. Trully recommended to others whom is looking for a nice place to stay in HK for some days.
房间干净整洁,布置很现代化,很适合年轻人｡位置也很好,距离地铁不远的闹市区｡热心的房东还为我们准备了免费的饮品｡抵达的时候,空调和音乐都已经被Mr.Tam 提前设置好了,很贴心｡

I stayed in KK's apartment for two weeks. It was fantastic!  KK is super-helpful - absolutely deserves the super-host award. (He even provided a little welcome package and a little welcome message on his blackboard). The apartment is sparkling clean. The renovation is lovely with lots of attention to little details - as good as the photos. Location fantastic - close to all the tourist action but also in a very "local" neighbourhood so you get a taste of everyday life in Mong Kok.  Quiet as well. Would absolutely stay again, and have recommended to me friends and colleagues.

KK was very helpful right from the confirmation of our stay! He provided us lots of travel information and even suggested a few itineraries to ease our traveling to a foreign place. On our arrival, as it was a rainy day, he directed us to the neighboring cafe just outside the MTR and walked us to his apartment. It was a nice gesture to receive a welcome message on the wall at the entrance when we entered the house! The apartment was clean and bright with windows every corner. It was fully equipped with all the necessities we needed (just as described on his page and the photos). Location was a few minutes walk from Yau Ma Tei MTR which was perfect for us to commute. On the departure day, he was kind enough to let us leave our luggage and ensured that there was no delay on our ferry trip to macau due to the bad weather condition. Thanks KK for your hospitality. We hope to see you again! :)

KK was very helpful from the booking to the end of trip.
A very detailed map and welcome snacks made a very warm welcome.
The super fast broadband and the internet TV  kept the 2 kids occupied.
There are security around the clock and the flat is very near shopping areas.We were grateful that have a late checkout at 10pm as our flight was at 2am.
It was a nice and convenient place to stay and  we will definitely recommend it to our friends going to HK.

Thank you for your hospitality and your delicate attention for the breakfast.
The flat was like we expected, clear and cleen

KK was THOUGHHTFUL, incredibly HELPFUL with my trip to HK. As soon as I booked the apartment he offered help and advice about how to get from the airport to the apartment (several route options), where to eat, etc

The apartment itself is great, CLEAN, CONVENIENT, close to MTR, newly refurbished. The beds and pillows are very comfortable and the rooms get a lot of light day-time since it's on a high floor with many windows. I appreciate the installation of the 100% sun-block curtain, very considerate!

The a/c is very good and strong. The bathroom is very clean and the shower has lots of hot water. My friend appreciated the 4K smart internet TV, complimentary cable TV, the high speed stable wifi, and 2-in-1 washer dryer in the apartment, too. 

There is also a lot of eateries downstairs for fresh egg tarts and other Chinese pastries, and an outstanding wonton noodle restaurant up the street. The MTR is really close by as well, and you can walk to Ladies' Street and the night market. 24 hours security makes me feel SAFE. GREAT PLACE!

Mr KK is very helpful with our recent stay in Hongkong. He is also very patient with us. 

The apartment is clean and very much well arranged. I would definitely go back there to stay when we go back to Hongkong.

All the best Mr KK. Thank you very much for everything

Mr. KK has been a very accommodating host. As it was our first time to HK, KK has given us lots of suggestions on where we could actually visit. 

Due to a last minute change in schedule, we asked if we could meet him at the apartment one hour earlier, and he agreed despite the busy schedule and accommodation. 

The apartment was delightfully nice, in pristine and clean condition. Not to forget, the location was excellent, in the middle of Kowloon and accessible by both Mongkok and Yau Ma Tei MTR. 
Overall, it has been an excellent stay and we would definitely return to this apartment should we visit HK again.

I am really very thankful to KK as we are  kinda of lost in the area and he is very helpful and even ask where is our location n even guide us how to reach his place. He met us and even help us with our luggage.. his place nevertheless is very clean and comfortable..He is the best host that i met with in Airbnb..he has take his time to print a colored map to show us where is the shop n food at our nearby area...thumbs up for the service..i would sure recommend to everyone n anyone in Airbnb to stay at his place...you will never regret..Thanks again for the drinks , KK. Cheersssss..

It's fantastic holiday... KK is real super host. He help us alot start from beginning till we leave Hongkong. The apartment is clean and suitable like at the picture, close to MTR.
Kids very happy, especially the internet facility. 
Thanks alot to Kk and air bnb.
Highly recommended to use this apartment and services

Sie sie...

Heru K
Indonesia

As a first time Airbnb user, the experience was fantastic. The stay at Mr Tam's place has been pleasurable. I was with family and all had positive remarks about the place and Mr Tam. 

We were greeted by a welcome note by the door (including a bday greeting for my brother). He gave clear instructions in terms of general housekeeping.  His flat is great and the tips he provided were very useful.  The linens, beds and toiletries were well prepared. The flat overall is well kept and comfortable. There were a few goodies that he also set aside for us, which I thought was very nice of him. He also printed out a map for our use.

What i liked most about this host is his responsiveness. From the reservation process to checkout, it was definitely a breeze. 

I would definitely recommend Mr Tam and his flat. Everything's brilliant.
Everything was great! It was a cozy stay near the MTR station which is very convenient. KK is very helpful and welcoming as well. We enjoyed our stay at the apartment.
KK是個很貼心的房東,面對我們臨時的狀況也能很迅速的解決,使我們這趟旅程玩得很開心:) 房間位於交通十分便利的地方,而且相當舒適,就像在家裡一般放鬆,我們過了愉快的四個晚上!

Mr KK emailed us detailed instructions to get to the apartment, and welcomed us upon our arrival, with maps and brochures for exploring Hong Kong. The apartment is exactly as shown in the listing and had everything we needed. The apartment is situated close to the MTR and Nathan St and is highly recommended.

Mr KK was an excellent host, from the time we first inquired about his apartment to the time we checked out. He made the reservation and check-in process very simple and answered all our questions promptly and accurately. He was always available to answer questions when we needed help. 
The apartment was exactly as listed; a little small for our standards, but it provided a great place to stay for a few days in Hong Kong. We were just a couple of blocks from all the action in Nathan Road, the Ladies St Market and MTR (subway) stations. Still, the building is very quiet and located in an old neighborhood street. We were fascinated by the huge contrast between this street (which looks like we guess many streets in HK looked 50 years ago) and Nathan street (which looks like Times Sq in NY), only a minute away.
All in all, we were very satisfied with this property and with Mr. KK. We would definitely stay there again.

Host kept in communication from booking right up until check out. Mr KK was hospitable and welcoming throughout and responded very punctually. He provided helpful advice regarding both the apartment and general travel tips for Hong Kong. The apartment was clean, pictured as such and had instructions for using amenities. Checking in and out was super easy. Highly recommended and will definitely stay again if going to Hong Kong.

Lovely & cozy little apartment!!
I'm so surprised~
Cus Host KK was so much kind!
& Preparing welcome snack & juice and so on!
It was so touching!

And security was very good!
That flat have very nice equipment!

Thank you so much
I have a nice day in Hong Kong

The flat was exactly like the description. Small but very convenient for our 3 days stay. Everything was arranged perfectly. Mr KK was very helpful, even before our arrival with collecting traintickets for us and he provided us with all the information we needed.
房子地点非常好去哪里都很方便｡房子布置很有品味很舒适｡房子主人很细心,人非常好,我们由于离港时间问题凌晨才到一直等我们,进门还写着欢迎语很温馨,一直与我联系各种事情很周全,谢谢啦,下次来港还住这里,

We had great fun living in KK's house.
He has put much effort by heart to ensure our pleasant trip.
A map with his remarks, local maps, coupon of the turbojet ,VITA lemon tree are kindly offered.
It's clean and quiet at night,with a good sight when looking around. Everything is of high quality and easy to use.
I strongly recommond to live here!;-)

Me and my family were in HK for a holiday this summer. During the time we stayed, we had a very pleasant time at the flat! The location is perfect especially for buying fresh seafood and fruits! :) That was the highlight for my parent. The flat is very cosy and is adaptable for 4 people! It's very clean and safe! There's a gate outside the main door as well as a code lock system! We mainly cooked at the flat and the washing machine is in good condition ~ very easy to use! The bathroom is quite small but it's very clean and modern! Like any typical HK bathrooms, the shower, toilet and sink is not separated but all in one room! The shower overhead will spray over the toilet seat and sink which will make the floor wet! But it'll dry up very quick because of the hot weather :) KK is friendly and attentive to your every need. I asked KK that I needed an iron and he went to get me one straight away. He provided me with a local map which was very useful and recommended all the best places to eat. He even message me during the week to see if I needed anything ~ very accessible through watsapp. Checkout was very simple. Overall, we was very satisfied with our stay and will most likely come again to KK's flat the next time we visit HK! :) thank you Kk for being such a wonderful host! :)
房东人非常好超级nice｡因为飞机延误,KK等我们到凌晨两点办理check in,还为我们准备了HK地图和一些vouchers,并且跟我们介绍了周边的情况｡第二天晚上还及时关心我们是否遇到什么问题需要帮助,很感动,下次去HK还是会选择住在他这里,周边交通也很方便｡^.^

Nous avons vécu un très bon séjour à Hong-Kong, merci à KK (Mr Tam) d'y avoir contribué.
L'appartement est tel que sur les photos, c'est petit mais très fonctionnel.
A 3 adultes voire 4 c'est parfait pour un séjour d'une semaine.
C'était super propre, très calme et très bien situé à 5 minutes du métro et des bus, en plein quartier typique et populaire au bon sens du terme, sans aucun problème de sécurité et avec commerces ouverts 24/24 !
Il n'y manquait rien ou presque, nous avons suggéré un micro-onde à KK, mais c'est un détail mineur.
KK a été parfait, à l'heure pour le RV, sympa et toujours disponible par mail / SMS ou autre pour nous aider durant le séjour. Il nous a fourni plein d'information et même traduit un menu d'un Wonton noodle restaurant pour nous ! 
Son conseil de prendre le bus pour repartir à l'aéroport était pratique.
Bref, pour nous 3 c'était impeccable, nous recommandons sans réserves.

It was our 1st out of the country trip with my family. Also my 1st time to book with airbnb for our accommodation. Mr.KK's place was the perfect place we are looking for. It was one of the best in town. Clean and cozy. Everything was organized and available on his flat. We are very thankful for the map he provided and his tips on how to explore hk. I will definitely recommend this place to everyone.

Mr KK it's a nice host, he was always in contact with us, and gave us a good welcome.

The flat is clean, in perfect conditions, the bath and kitchen work great , the internet is pretty fast!  

The flat is in a great location! is near 24 hour supermarket, 2 metro stations, one big mall, is near electronic, clothing, sportswear shopping streets, exchange services and food locals, movie theaters.

Our whole family really enjoyed staying in this apartment during our holiday. KK is a fantastic host, even before we landed, he already check our luggage collection belt and text us. He prepared all the maps for us to explore around Hong Kong and also the area near the apartment. The apartment was clean and family-friendly, we could use the kitchen to prepare food for our 2-year old daughter. Envy thing was nicely designed and showed thoughtfulness of the host. The location of the apartment is very convenient, which is only a few minutes walk to the MTR station, and there are quite a lot of shops and restaurants for us to shop ard and to choose the food from. Overall, it was a pleasant stay and I will definitely recommend this to my friends.

KK是位很棒的房东｡前期沟通非常顺畅,耐心解答各种问题,反复确认入住时间｡由于临时有事,KK未能亲自带我们CHECKIN,但却发来详细的文字和视频告诉我们如何DIY,感觉有点闯关游戏的意思｡视频非常专业,里面还详细介绍了周边的概况,可爱小熊令人印象深刻｡房子位置便利,非常好找,各种方便｡房间干净整洁,麻雀虽小,五脏俱全!对于我们三个只在香港路过的朋友来说已经足够｡KK非常贴心地准备了几乎全部可以用得上的东西,还有门口的欢迎词｡期待下次再“见”!

Landlord who is very easy-going, as long as you like his house, he would like to explain the usage of every equipment very carefully. Rooms are very clean and well-decorated. What a fantastic living experience!

My family and I thoroughly enjoyed our time in KK's apartment. It felt like home to us and my 2 year old was able to settle right in, which was the most important to me. KK was very accommodating, patient and kind. We had issues with our flight (being delayed), immigration and getting a taxi that we arrived at the apartment almost 4 hours later than the time we had initially told KK. But he was understanding and nice enough to still be waiting for us at almost 4am outside of his apartment, even gave us a tour of his apartment and told us about the all amenities. He also left a map with directions as to where the closet MTR station was, Cha Chaan Teng, bakeries etc. 

Checkin and checkout was rather simple and straight forward, which we all like! Being in a foreign country and not speaking the language you don't have to worry when you're at KK's. First you have to go through the first security door, which will only be opened with a key or by the 24hour security guard, then you go to your floor and open another security door, and enter a unique code into the another door after that! Felt safer than a hotel room! 

I overall enjoyed my time in KK's apartment, and would definitely be contacting him if I have the chance of returning to Hong Kong and would definitely recommend him to anyone who is looking for accommodation in Hong Kong.

KK is a very nice and helpful host.
He gave us clear instructions and directions of his flat and the living area.
The location is perfect, close to transport (mtr or bus), lots of food around and trendy shopping malls are just a few steps beside.
We enjoyed staying in KK's flat, comfortable and relaxing!
Highly recommend KK's flat if you want to stay in HK :)

We had a wonderful trip in HK and KK is very kind and helpful. His apartment is in center and located in the great location. Even his room is a little bit small, it is functional. We really enjoyed and recommend others to stay here in the future.

KK was very helpful in providing us with details and information on how to get around on top of the instructional information on the uses of his place. He even has instructional manual written around the house in case you forgot. The house is small but the facilities were well prepared. The place is very accessible to MTRs and other destinations as well.

First of all, KK was a fantastic host. He provided detailed information and was readily available for questions if anything came up. He even gave us a map of the immediate area marked with points of interest. The apartment was clean and comfortable with a nice view and good amenities. Four of us stayed there quite comfortably. I would definitely recommend staying there and would stay there again.

KK was a great host ! We were slightly delayed due to late flight arrival but he was still there to show us around the place and shared information on nearby facilities (malls, restaurants and shop). The personalised map helped us a lot in navigating the area. The place is located in an hardware shops area but the apartment is maintained in tip top condition. The place was a bit small for 4 grown adults but everything that we need was there. Internet was fast and the TV was a welcomed bonus.

 KK was very patient with our questions and gave us good recommendation on dinner places and how to get to the airport on our day of departure. Will not hesitate to recommend him and this place for future visitors.

当你踏入房门那一刻开始,就明白为什么这间房那么舒适,添置的设备一应俱全｡房东人很细心,会把房间情况给介绍一遍,如有出行问题还会热心解答,更让人感动的是,玄关处有面墙作为黑板,房东会为房客在进门那一刻看到写着你的名字的欢迎语,宾至如归的感觉,很惊喜｡地理位置也是十分方便,步行便可到达购物,用餐,地铁等目的地,再一次谢谢房东的协助,这是我第一次使用airbnb体验,以后还会继续使用,在旅程中寻找惊喜｡

KK was really helpful and furnished us with all the necessary information we needed when staying in his apartment. The apartment is exactly as shown and it's cozy with everything we need which is very thoughtful. The location was perfect for shopping as well as late night supper. The apartment is very clean and bright. This apartment is highly recommended with close proximity to ladies market as well as the MTR stations.

좋았습니다. 숙소 가는법도 다양한 루트로 사전에 미리 알려주었습니다. 숙소는 MTR Yau Ma Tei역(Mong Kok 한 정류장 전)이고, 로컬 안에 있습니다. 도보로 레이디스 마켓, 운동화 거리 가능합니다. 더 묵고 싶었지만, 예약이 다되어 있어서 하루만 묵었습니다. Mr KK분을 숙소 앞에서 만났고, 열쇠를 주면서 설명해준 뒤 직접 문 열어서 해보라고 해주셨습니다. 숙소에 도착한 뒤 간단한 집 소개와 창문가에서 지도(개인 추천 장소를 써놓은)를 보며 위치 설명을 해주셨습니다. 저희가 도착하기 전에 음악, 핫포트, 에어컨 미리 다 켜두셔서 시원했습니다. 공간 활용을 아주 잘 해두셔서 놀랬습니다. 나중에 참고하려고 사진 찍어왔습니다. 펜션처럼 있을꺼 다 있지만 화장실에는 수건,바디워시 밖에 없으니 나머지는 챙겨가시면 좋습니다. 좋은 여행 되세요^^. Thank you Mr KK!!

KK was a wonderful host, always checking on us before and during our trip. The flat was comfortable for our family of 4 and the location are added bonus as it is close to most major attraction. Will definitely suggest to others intrested to visit Hong Kong.

KK was a very accommodating host. Gave excellent advice on how to get around and what to do in HK both before we arrived and while we were there.  He was exceptionally quick in answering any requests. The apartment is very small to us (coming from Australia), but I understand this is typical for Hong Kong and we adapted very quickly accepting this is all part of the experience.  It is very clean and furniture and equipment all work beautifully, in fact I would say most equipment and furnishings, etc are new.  The apartment is only a few minutes walk to a supermarket, bakery and underground trains. We thank KK for his contribution in making our stay in HK so enjoyable and have no doubt he will do the same for any of his future guests.

This is my first time using Airbnb and the experience make me feel awesome. The flat is exactly the same with what you see from the website. The flat is clean and all the furniture / appliances are consider new and comfortable. KK is really a wonderful host, the map provided by him with his hand sketches make us easier to explore the neighbourhood and also the delicious local food.  This is my 2nd time to visit Hong Kong, so i can understand the sizes of the flat in HK is quite typical small. Overall is a enjoyable and amazing stay for me and my family.

The apartment is in a wonderful location.. you enjoy the convenience of food and closeness to the MTR and with the quietness at night for a good rest. 

KK's provision of the map and also videos of how to get about the apartment was very helpful and easy to understand. Checking in and out was with no fuss at all.  Would definitely recommend this place for first timers to Hong Kong :)

Mr KK's apartment is clean & the location is great,within walking distance to ladies market and MTR.The beds are super comfortable.There are 5 of us and he gave enough pillows.Although the apartment is of standard HK size,it is value for money.
He gave links to purchase tickets with discout online and even advised us on the  price for our chartered van. 
Thank you Mr KK for your assistance during our time in HK :)

Highly recommended for travelers who want to stay in a accessible place! The apartment is very near to the MTR and is well located near the heart of HK - Mongkok! 

The apartment is very neat and clean. Most importantly, is well equipped! The host is extremely friendly and nice. The moment we stepped into the apartment, we saw a welcoming note on the wall with our names written on it! After moving in, the host even gave us a map with the nearby eatery written on it. He is approachable and even told us how to get to the places of interests!

If you are looking for a reliable, clean and convenient apartment, this is definitely the place to stay in!

Everything is almost fine until the time we want to check out. We requested additional 10 minutes to close our bags to leave but the host attitude was so disappointing and rude. And the towel provided is also small (20x80) but the host mentioned it is standard size.. Seriously..???

Staying at Mr KK's was a most pleasing experience. As mentioned in other reviews, Mr KK was very helpful, positive and obliging. Due to heavy traffic at the airport, we ended up being half an hour late, but Mr KK was very patient and helpful. He gave us very precise directions and even had a map on hand that had some landmarks marked out for our easy reference. The flat was as described and pictures true to form. Everything was of high quality and well-maintained, and true to description. The flat was high floor and quiet, and there were plenty of windows which allowed for natural sunlight. I was travelling with 2 senior citizens and the flat was comfortable for them. In terms of amenities, there is an early market selling fresh produce, and a lot of cha chan teng, restaurants and supermarkets nearby. The flat is literally walking distance to 2 MTR stations and very very convenient. Definitely recommended and I would stay here again!

The apartment is clean & cosy. It's good for 2-3 guests. Location is convenient. Host is very helpful and responsive. He even prepared a map to show us the nearby eateries. Towel provided is small, you may consider bringing your own bath towel.

KK was a great host and the flexible check-in time was very helpful. The apartment was very clean and modern, and the location in Mong Kok was close to both the train station and major points of interest like the Ladies Market. Thanks!

We had an amazing stay at KK's place last week! I was with my wife, my kid and my sister and the space was just perfect for us, very comfortable! The location was also something that we we're extremely happy about, lots of restaurants and convenience stores in the area, and the YMT MTR was just a 5-min walk from the flat. KK, thank you very much for your hospitality! Couldn't ask for a better host!

We enjoyed the stay at this accomadation immensely. The host is very helpful, considerate and a nice guy. He helped us with travel tips and shopping tips in HK. We went to HK on the coldest day in HK in a very long time. The host was very helpful in providing help to us with heating options and warning us a priori on how we could be better prepared for our stay.

The flat is located very close to transport, busy shopping areas and most of the tourist attractions in HK. Lots of restaurants, and all kind of options closeby. The flat location is super convenient, and the flat itself has all amenities one can ask for.

Overall its a great place to stay if you are in HK!

The host was very friendly and helpful from the very beginning to the end of our stay, KK was very kind to give us a tour of his apartment and showed us nearby good eats and shopping. The apartment accurately shows what is depicted in the apartment, it is also quite small and cosy.

KK was an amazing host that helped us make out trip to Hong Kong unforgettable.  He provided us with a detailed tour of the apartment and a map of the local area with key points to transportation.  I would highly recommend his apartment for anyone who is looking for authentic living conditions in one of the busiest areas of Hong Kong.  However, the space is rather tight for some people who have mobility issues (older travelers) who may not be use to tight quarters.  For the seasoned traveler, this apartment will supply you with everything you need as a base to explore.

I had a really great time in Hong Kong! Mr. KK is a very nice host. He helps us on everything since very beginnings of our booking. The apartment is Located at a very convenient and lively area which you could find the supermarket, restaurant...etc easily. Also, the apartment is very cozy, it makes us feel like home;)
If I have chance to visit Hong Kong again. I would love to stay here again!

Это было моим первым путешествием подобного рода, с проживанием не в отеле. Мистер CK оказался очень щепетильным и ответственным хозяином, он дал подробные инструкции о том месте встречи. Он ожидал нас у под'езда. Квартира соответсвует фото, но я не ожидала , что на такой маленькой площади можно разместить гостиную, спальню, кухню. Я была с мамой и семилетней дочерью, и можно было бы разместить двоих не очень крупных людей. В квартире было все необходимое, включая средство для стирки)))! Район очень удобен. Рядом, отмеченый во всех туристических путеводителях, Ladies Market, но делать там особо нечего, кроме покупки магнитов! Можно быстро добраться до станции метро Tsim Sha Tsui, где расположена Аллея звёзд и прочие достопримечательности! В плане еды тоже все прекрасно, есть все-от аутентичной Китайской кухни до фаст-фуда. Мистер CK рассказал где можно поесть и купить продукты. Моё первое путешествие с сайтом Airbnb оказалось очень удачным, если я ещё поеду в Гонконг, с удовольствием остановлюсь у мистера CK!!!

KK was a great host & was very accommodating with helping with our luggage to the apartment, arranged to provide us a travel cot & bathtub for our baby, and provided helpful suggestions about the local area (restaurants, transport options, supermarkets etc). We definitely appreciated his hospitality!

The main reason we chose to stay here (as opposed to a hotel) was so that we could make use of kitchen & laundry facilities, given that we were traveling with a baby.

Overall, the place is relatively comfortable & modern, however there are some things which we were not satisfied with:

1. We felt that this place was small, even for HK standards. Storage for luggage for tight & was difficult to bathe our baby due to lack of space. 
2. The kitchen was more like a kitchenette & found it difficult to cook food for our baby. The kitchen tap doesn't have hot water & had to resort to getting hot water from the shower. This made washing up dishes inconvenient. (No hot water from bathroom sink either)
3. The shower space often flooded as the drainage couldn't cope with the water flow. We suspect the drainage point may have been blocked. Note: shower and toilet is in the one space.
4. Air con units in the main living area only have a cooling function, and the apartment was cold. There was only one heater in the bedroom & one in the bathroom. (KK did provide a fan heater)

Everything was smooth from the airport transfer via taxi to the apartment as the address given was very clear. Mr Lam met us and provided us some tips and map labelled with locations to the shops ,24 hr supermarket and mtr to walk to. There is a very good bakery selling egg tarts that were awesome! Apartment is functional and  bathroom very clean and newly renovated. location is central and good. There is a popular cha chan teng called Tai Hing around the area selling good roasted meats and milk tea. Going back we called a cab to airport and driver had no problem finding the apartment; waiting for us just outside the gate.

We stayed as a couple at Mr KK's place for a week in mid March. The place is exactly as shown as in the photos; very clean, bright, dust free, with space to store our luggage and plenty of places to hang up our things. There were many nicely thought out items which made things very convenient and certainly appreciated; a washer/ dryer for our clothes, little slippers, hair dryer and various items which were very handy. Thank you for the little coffee/ tea sachets- and being from Melbourne we sure do love our coffee! 
The apartment is located in a very convenient location- with the MTR about 4 mins walk and lots of eateries down below- including vegetarian restaurants which was very handy. It is also very close to Nathan Road where it is one of the large arterial roads connecting many areas of Hong Kong. On Nathan there were buses easily getting to Hung Hom in one direction and toward Sham Shui Po in the other direction. We walked several times from TST back to the apartment - and a leisurely stroll took us approx 30 mins. 
My mother stayed over one night and there is a pull out sofa to accommodate more people however we feel that the place is best suited for two people for longer stays. 
Overall a lovely place to stay, smoke free, welcoming, clean and a very attentive host with excellent communication- def a host you'd want whilst travelling!

Mr. KK is very friendly and helpful. He provided us with detailed tour of his apartment and a map of the local area with nearby eateries and shopping. The apartment is minutes away from MTR station, and Mr. KK has given clear instructions for us for daily travel. The apartment is clean and neat, and the location is convenient. On the day of our check out, Mr. KK has extended our check out time as it worked well for our flight time. Will definitely stay again if i visit HK the next time.

KK fully deserves his superhost status!  His customised map with all the best eateries and conveniences around Mongkok neighbourhood was fabulous - as big foodies, we enjoyed all his recommendations.  KK was in touch throughout our stay and made extra efforts to help well into our trip to Macau - very thankful for his reminder of the peak weekend and advance ferry booking, and his recommendation for an outstanding Portugese restaurant in Macau and top must sees.  You really get to enjoy local culture with modern comforts and at great value with KK.  Too many nice touches to mention, from leaving us a nice snack to umbrellas due to weather and useful instructions throughout this apartment.

His apartment was small like other HKG apartments for 4 of us but perfect for a couple - so well appointed, thoughtfully and comfortably furnished, super clean and what an outstanding location in the local heart of Hong Kong!  I would recommend a stay with KK anytime.  My family and I really enjoyed ourselves.  Jeannette

It was my first experience in Airbnb,and it was really good.KK is so nice and patient,he gave us many useful informations.The flat located in YauMaTei,it's easy to find and near the subway station so it's so convenient to any places in hongkong.There are only 5mins to walk to Nathan Road,so it also perfect to those people who loves shopping^^
Thanks again,looking forward to stay in your place next time!!

The host was very friendly  during my stay in hongkong. The apartment is generally clean and tidy. Also, all the facilities are in good conditions as well . Will love to stay in his apartment the next time i visit Hong Kong :)

5 STARS ***** 

Amazing Hongkong Experience.. 

I was travelling to Hongkong from Chicago with my wife and a 1 1/2 year old toddler and my parents joined me in Hongkong from India. I was extremely nervous for this trip as we had never traveled this far as a family with parents before. We choose KK's room based on reviews and decided to go with his apartment due to the following reasons. 
1. Fully equipped kitchen - Very Important for a Vegetarian Indian family. My parents don't eat meat hence we wanted ability to cook quick meals. 
2. Proximity to key areas - Heart of Hongkong. Very close from all areas. We saw every place possible using MTR and bought the Octopus card which is so convenient. Again a recommendation provided by KK. 
3. Trust - Travelling to a foreign country with Kids you need to have a trusted travel advisory/ host who will be available for any questions/ emergencies - KK was very prompt in responding to every single question I had in planning this trip. 
4. Travel Recommendations - KK provided us amazing recommendations and detailed instructions to see various places, Dim Sum, Breakfast and shopping. 

The apartment was a cute Hongkong size apartment. We got used to the size in a few hours and then it was all good. Everything is arranged smartly and the apartment has everything you need for cooking and a comfortable stay. Wifi was fast. 
Tsim Sha Tsui is a very good restaurant which KK recommended which had very good Vegetarian and non pork and non beef options. 

I highly recommend this apartment and look forward staying here again if I happen to visit hongkong again.

OMG where do I start you guys! Can I give a ten star review because a five star is obvious not enough lol!!! 

KK is super sweet, and considerate and welcoming and everything you can imagine, the apartment is perfect, yes it's not very big but hey it's hong kong!! it's so cozy and big enough for my family (3 members), my parents loved it, they said they will never go to hotels anymore (and they use to go to 5 star hotels in HK).

TBH I hesitated a bit with a little concern when KK asked for the copies of my passport and flight infos, so I water marked my copies with AIRBNB PURPOSE (lol) and I thought to myself "this is not a hotel?!", well I was wrong, they were so professional, It's almost like you are living in a hotel, only you have a personal assistant!

His apt is in the heart of kowloon district, walking distance to everywhere! and because it's located in a residential area, downstairs you can find so many local restaurants and shops that hasn't been "tourists commercialized" aka "very local" (you will know what I mean once you lived there), if you want to have a local hk experience and dive in, this is the place!

KK's not the first person I contact on airbnb but his apt is my very first experience. I wanna say thank you for letting me have this happy memory, and see you very soon!
Its real Hong Kong flat and if you want to feel HK experience, then go for it.

Our host KK took great care of us, regularly checking if everything was all-right. Flat is ideally located to live the real Hong Kong experience. It is clean and nice to live in. We particularly enjoyed the personal welcome message when opening the flat door.

It was wonderful to stay at KK's flat while our family vacationed in Hong Kong.  KK has been a great host and gave us lots of timely support before and during the stay.  The flat is tight for 4 adults but still provide us with enough sleeping space.  It also had all the necessary appliances especially a washer/dryer which was much needed during a longer stay.  The flat also situated close to the heat of Mong Kok district and only 3 minutes away from the MTR station.  There are also lots of eateries around the building.  I would not hesitate to stay at the flat again when I visit Hong Kong in the future.
环境不错,很干净,地点也很近朗豪坊,附近也有好多吃的｡虽然房子比较小,但香港房子就是这么小,反正挺干净的｡

Our family are very happy during the time at KK place.
The place is equipped with many electric instruments and cooking utensil... It is very convenient, ..close to MTR, supermarket, and many restaurant of local foods.

Also, KK is very responsible.  On the first day we arrive, KK informs that electricity for the whole building is down.  He arrange the hotel in the area nearby his place.  On the next day, he manage to move our luggage from the hotel to his place in the afternoon after the electricity return.  So, we still go out and visit the places as our plan.

Definitely, we will stay at his place for next HK trip.
The apartment is very modern and clean. The host is responsive and helpful, he even prepare map and recommended places in the neighborhood. Recommended

回来好一阵子了,现在才给KK写REVIEW真是不好意思｡

整体来说KK是个蛮细心与设想周到的屋主｡到达当晚为我们做了一个小小导游服务让我们对住宿附近的环境有了相当的了解,还附上他制作的一个小地图｡而且我们隔几天要过澳门玩的行程,也很细心的给我们做了些意见参考,实在太感激他了｡

至于他的房子,就真的要给个赞了｡所谓麻雀虽小,五脏俱全,设备齐全不在话下,而且还保持得相当干净｡ 住起来还真舒适自在,就像家一样不像一般旅馆那么压迫感｡保安也相当安全｡其中一天因两老累了,就选择呆在房子里休息,我们就在附近买了些菜还可以做些简单的菜色来吃｡

下次在去香港的话,我还是会再选择这里｡

KK was a fantastic host, greeted us at the apartment and provided us very useful info on where to get great food and shopping.  

The apartment matched the descriptions on the website, very clean and tidy and all the amenities required for a comfortable stay. 

Location was very convenient, only a few minutes walk to Yau Ma Tei or Mong Kok MTR.

The flat is in a really great location. Very colourful neighbourhood with great traditional places to eat and drink nearby. The place is small (ideal for a couple, a bit of a squeeze for more people), but very clean and cozy. Ideal for a weekend break to explore HK. Mr. Tam, the host, is very attentive and will proactively reach out to help resolve any issue you might have during your stay.

Perfect for my small family....2 adults and 2 kids( 7 & 5 yrs old)

The house have a complete kitchen equipment, great for asian cooking, the privacy is there, and the host is actively assist you....almost instantly reply to all of your question....feel like home when staying here....

We had a wonderful travel in HK. One of reason we stayed a awesome apartment. Its the space not much, but includes all the necessities. A last thing the host is super friendly and tell us so much info trips. Ops I have to say it's a good location to go where you wanna go.

The host is fantastic. He is fast in responding and helpful. He provided us with a map on our location and highlighted the places that we should take note, such as supermarket, mtr, places to eat and etc. The unit is conveniently located near mtr, restaurants, cafes, 'woman street', Mongkok & 'temple street'. Despite being overseas himself, Mr Tam, sent a wat app message to check if we were coping well in Hong Kong. There is a cooking area and washing machine in the kitchen. Free wifi . No bathtub, just a toilet bowl, standing shower, basin and mirror in the toilet. Only 1 person in the toilet each time. Shampoo, toilet paper and shower gel provided.. Kitchen has all the utensils you need, including children cutlery set.  Clean and modern design. 
The apartment and lift lobby is really small. It is not suitable for wheel chair bounded.  Overall, it is a good place to stay but please take note that the apartment & lift lobby is small (typical Hong Kong's place).
Clean and neat apartment, tastefully decorated! KK has been so helpful with much details, not only with the apartment but with the local area as well. 5 stars experience!  Thank you KK!
우리가길을잘몰라해메고있을때 친절히길을설명해주고 숙소에도착하고나서 친절하게 숙소설명을해주고 숙소주변에 구경거리들을 지도로보여주고 직접설명해주어서좋았다  또 숙소는 사진과 조금크기만작을뿐거의비슷해서 깔끔하여좋았다  또  숙소는 몽콕역과야우마타이역에  가까이있어 교통을이용하기매우  편했다 우리는 5일동안즐거운 여행을보낼수있어  매우 좋았다.

4명이서 3박 이용했는데 4명이서 조금은 좁지만 지내기에는 괜찮았어요! 전반적으로 깨끗하고 좋았고 비교적 높은 층이라 전망도 좋은 편입니다. 에어컨도 시원하게 잘 틀어지고 밤에는 오히려 틀고 자기에는 추울 정도.. 지하철역은 Yau Ma Tai역이랑 좀 더 가깝고 걸어가려면 넉넉히 7~8분정도 걸리는 것 같아요! 큰길까지 5분정도(?) 걸리는데 큰길에 다양한 버스가 많아서 정말 편리했던 것 같아요. 주변 골목도 그렇게 위험해 보이지는 않고 숙소 문도 이중잠금이라서 더 좋았던 것 같아요. 주변에 24시 마트도 있고 야시장과도 가까워서 하루 일정 마지막에 야시장 들르기에 정말 좋은 숙소였습니다~호스트분도 굉장히 친절하셔서 첫날 숙소 도착해서 여러가지 많이 알려주셨습니다. 사실 소파침대가 처음이라 불편할까봐 걱정했는데 정말 편하고 좋았습니다. 근데 이전 에어비앤비에서는 샴푸가 있어서 안가지고 갔는데 여긴 샴푸가 없어서 결국 구매했어요ㅠㅠ 그래도 전반적으로 좋았던 숙소였습니다. 추천합니다!!

숙소가 깨끗하고 없을 것 없이 다 구비되어있습니다. 홍콩의 주거 특성상 무척 작은 공간에 놀랐지만 공간활용도가 무척 높고 좋아서 불편한 점 없이 지낼수 있었습니다.
호스트가 친절합니다!

The host is really helpful and friendly with the assistance we need. We encountered rainy days in HK and he sent a useful reminder on the umbrella we can use as well as the mode of transport we can take. The room is clean and the door has a security lock which enhanced our safety in addition to the security guard downstairs:) The facilities are high tech & clean such as smart TV, washing machines, secured door lock etc. The sofa bed, blankets, bedsheets are clean and comfortable. Great apartment to recommend for all!!

5 mins walk to YauMaTei MTR.  Can easily walk to Mongkok & Jordan.  Lots of places to eat in the neighborhood.

Communicated before & during our stay with KK via (Hidden by Airbnb) .  He allowed us to check in early.  He was always quick to respond.  Very convenient.

The place is small by American standards, but it accommodated my husband, daughter and me fine.  I wouldn't recommend more than 3 people in the flat though. 

Bath towels provided were smaller than American standards and so we bought some bigger towels in Mongkok. 

Shampoo & conditioner not provided.  

No wardrobe or dresser for clothes.  Some hangers were provided.  Had to keep our clothes in our luggage.
離地鐵站很近!

這次是大學認識的四個人一起旅行,對比了很多家hostel,主要希望四人能住在一起,又有像從前一起在宿舍生活的感覺｡最後上Airbnb找到KK的房間,看了照片覺得非常喜歡,離地鐵站也很近｡實際入住也是如照片,但網頁上沒辦法看到的是KK人很熱心､細心,在牆壁上寫了"welcome Abby& Friends",還有提供uno､撲克牌⋯⋯等很多貼心的細節｡自製地圖並告訴我們附近有什麼地方好玩､好吃,持續的在 (Hidden by Airbnb) 上關心狀況｡最感動的是要回國的前一晚颱風登陸香港,KK提醒我們很多事情,持續幫我們關注更新最新狀況,也很通情達理的讓我們延後check out,待到風球變小｡

總之,是一次蠻溫馨的體驗,不管是空間或是人｡

因为台风天气行程一直处于不确定状态,kk很有耐心一直帮我关注进展协调时间｡
香港的房子确实是很迷你,不过麻雀虽小五脏俱全,该有的都有,而且油麻地挺方便的,正好在中心的地方,到哪儿都很近｡
kk很贴心准备了附近的地图和全港地图,省了很多事｡龙珠饼店的蛋挞真的很好吃,而且离地铁站很近｡翠华餐厅的态度太差了,不推荐去｡
简而言之,在香港度过了愉快的四天~
非常不错的单元,真正是麻雀虽小 五脏俱全｡适合小家庭入住,可以洗衣做饭｡洗衣液和油盐酱醋需自备｡
房東很nice,細心介紹了屋裡所有物品使用方式跟注意事項,手繪了街區地圖給我們作嚮導,提供了不少遊玩建議,房子很漂亮,乾淨,整齊,廚房裡餐具,洗衣機,排插等什麼都很齊全,拿來就可以用了,下次過去希望還能租到你家,棒棒噠!

KK i s a very nice host,he helped me a lot during my trip,this house is filled with white,is a very nice ,clean and modern house.This house is just 5min to the subway station.if possible ,I will make a reservation again when I come to HongKong next time!

とても親切な対応をしていただきました｡ありがとうございました｡
連絡してもすぐに返事をいただき､追加で便利な情報をいただけました｡
夜までたっぷり遊べるｴﾘｱで大満足です^^
美味しいものも多く､近辺の地図をいただけたのがとても役立ちました｡

KK has been really helpful and provided all the information I needed. Flat is cozy and clean, and has all the amenities as described on the page. I would really recommend this flat to anyone who wants to find a decent place to stay in the city centre.

The place is nicely kept and every thing is available in a small area. It is about 5 to 7 mins walk to Yau MA Tei MTR and 10 mins to Mong Kok. You can also take the red mini bus from this place to Sai Kung.  Overall the stay is pleasant . The place could fit 4 of us but I feel that 3 would give you a comfortable space .
정확했습니다!
가기 전부터 체크아웃 할때까지도 너무 친절하게 안내해주셔서 감사했어요. 사진 그대로고 위치도 좋고 무엇보다 깨끗해서 좋았어요.
very close to mrt and food. my son was sick on the first day of arrival and the host is very helpful in providing info about seeking doctor.

홍콩 자유여행을 꿈꾸신다면 여길 추천합니다 주인분이 영어도 잘하셔서 의사소통에 문제도 없구요 위치도 좋고 좁게 보이지만 4명이서도 편안하게 지냈습니다 ㅎ if you want to take a trip in hong kong with your friends, i recommand here. The host is really nice and good at english. also he prepares everything for us. the location is close to the station and several viewing sites. you feel that the house seems small but it s cozy enough to stay for 4 ppl.
