Great location ! Near shopping mall, supermarket, only 5 minutes walk to the nearest mtr. Love the apartment! It was clean. Tidy and comfy. Feels like home. The host is very nice and will help you 24 hours a day :)). Love to stay there !
Very tidy n cozy appartment. Host always Prompt reply. Highly recommend
房间虽小但用品齐全

Strategic location; MTR station, street food, mini mart, pharmacies are just within the walking distance. The apartment is cosy and fully furnished. It can accommodates us with 3 Adults + 1 Kids. Owner is kind and helpful by providing guide map with the useful tips. He's explaining the surroundings, amenities, rules clearly. We have a great trip !!

여행을 시작하기 전부터 친절하게 여러가지사항을 미리 커뮤니케이션 하였습니다.
지하철역과 가까워 공항에서 지하철로 이동이 가능하겠더라구요.
저희는 가족여행이라 택시를 이용했지만요.
숙소도 깔끔하고 주변여행에대한 정보 및 질문에 대한 답변도 친절하게 답변해 주었습니다. 다음에  또 홍콩에가면 다시 한번 묵겠습니다.

good location. few mins walk to 2 MTR. The place is clean and tidy, even have kitchen for cooking and washing machine to use. The host is friendly and helpful! When during typhoon, the host even advise us the situation. About the transport and places that might be still operating.
KK非常负责,之前怕我们定房时间有偏差反复询问到港时间｡他房子虽小五脏俱全,非常整洁,我们4个女生入住,没有问题｡房子位置非常好,离旺角和油麻地的地铁都不远,周边有好多地道的香港小吃,购物也非常方便｡我们到的那天,KK有会议不能帮我们办理入住,提前很久告诉了我们自助入住的方法,非常新鲜的体验呢｡

Location is good - a couple of minutes from Yau Ma Tei station, 6 minutes away from Mongkok station. The flat is very clean, not a speck of dirt in sight. The place is small, but typical for Hong Kong standards; there were 5 of us who stayed in the flat, and it was perfect for us.

The host was very nice! We stayed only for one night, but she made us feel very welcome. She was very attentive and accommodating.
很好的房子,麻雀虽小五脏俱全,只是冷气机的声音大一点,还有开关的指示灯有点亮｡房东很热情,也很细心,下次来还会联系｡

KK is a great host. I truly appreciate the very helpful and timely communication. The apartment is clean, comfortable and very well equiped.  Location is as good as it gets, in my humble opinion. Overall, we enjoyed our stay and highly recommend KK's apartment to other travelers.
its a good place to live in the real HK live and KK is really nice to provide a private flat for travelors. if it is posibal i will state for another time

K.K was really nice and accurate host. My flight was origianlly late and delayed a bit, so I met him almost midnight. Once I arrived at the airport, he checked my flight's status and my luggage belt number, and he sent that information to me while he knew my current status that I would be more late. We met just in time and he explained everything about the studio's facilities. The location is quite good, it's just within 5 minutes walk from Yau Ma Tei station, and within 10 min. walk from Mongkok station. There is a wellcom mart which is 24hr. opened. The room was a bit narrow, but we understand HK's situation so it could be bearable.

Walking distance to MTR Yau Ma Tei, Ladies Market and Temple Night market.  Super clean apartment with Smart TV.  The Washer + Dryer is a plus point, as we bring home clean clothes :-) Great host Mr. Tam!
房东很热情!因为有事所以我们是自助check-in,给足够了提示所以也很顺利!附近很热闹,逛街吃东西都很方便!
To any body who like to visit Hong Kong during festival season, this is a nice place (easy access to MTR and varies of restaurant) to stay .

KKさんはとてもｺﾐｭﾆｹｰｼｮﾝを取りやすい方だ｡丁寧の案内ﾋﾞﾃﾞｵを送ってくれたおかけで､分かりやすかった｡お部屋は広くないが､基本の生活用品が全部揃っていた｡場所的には､24時間営業のｽｰﾊﾟｰやｺﾝﾋﾞﾆ､駅にも近いから､とても便利だった｡また機会があれば､ここに泊まりたいと思う〜｡


房東KK好好人､係來噶前一日傳左如何利用房門等等的小影片､第一次來都可以好快尋到,真系好細心｡雖然房間唔算大､不過基本噶生活用品好齊全｡附近有24小時超市､便利店同埋地鐵站､非常方便｡如果下次有機會來香港､都會選擇來宜度｡多謝照顧~

The stay was great and the host was available to guide us through our stay before and during the trip.He helped us prepare a little surprise for our friend's birthday and gave us lots of tips and improved our itenary loads! On top of that, the apartment was sufficiently, if not bigger, than most other rooms offered at the same price. really enjoyed hong kong because of all of this! will def. recommend this place!!!
It was very great to stay in this apartment. KK is thoughtful host. He gave us some useful information for trip. And the apartment was perfect for us also
KK人非常NICE,值得推荐
KK人非常好,非常耐心也非常热情,虽然我们在约定时间之外迟到了但KK也没有怪我们真的非常感动也非常感谢｡房子很干净也很舒服,KK还给我们推荐了吃饭的地方,告诉我们哪个地铁站更方便等等等等｡大家住的也十分舒服｡
离地铁口近,交通便利,整洁干净,Kk在入住前提供的信息很全面细致,入住很顺利,谢谢!
Mr. Tam is quite communicative and helped us so much during my stay.

Small apartment but great location. 
Owner KK is very nice and can answer all questions. 
Just ask him whatever when you need any help, don't be shy...
The place is easy to find. The host is helpful anytime. A warm and sweet place for a family trip!

It was very nice time in here. KK is really kind and careful.
 몽콕역이랑 야우마테이역 사이에 있어서 접근성은 정말 좋고(야우마테이가 조금 더 가까워요.), 주변에 식당이나 레이디스 마켓같이 쇼핑할 곳도 있어요. 호스트 정말 친절해요. 모르거나 궁금한거 계속 물어봤는데 답장도 빨리해주셨어요. 그리고 무엇보다 숙소 앞에 있는 웰컴마트 근처 타코야키집은 꼭 가보는걸 추천합니다. 사바사이지만 개인적으로 꿀맛이라 매일 사먹었어요.ㅎ(와사비소스를 뿌려주는데 싫어한다면 조금뿌려달라고 하거나 반만 뿌려달라고 하면 됩니당.) 숙소 앞에 있는 마트에 한국 식료품이나 생활 용품이 약간 있어 놓고 온 것이 있다면 살 수 있어요. 물가는 한국하고 별 차이 없는 듯 해요. 요리할 수 있긴하지만 간단한 것만 가능해요. 프라이팬은 없고 요리를 하실 계획이시면 기름이나 소금같은 약간의 재료를 가져가시는걸 추천합니다. 그리고 숙소도 꽤 깨끗하고 건물자체가 깨끗한 편이고 안전한 것 같아요. 처음에 가면 호스트가 지도 주면서 주변에 맛집도 알려주는데 저희는 과일가게를 제일 많이 이용했어요. 저는 사촌언니들이랑 3명이서 이용했는데 셋 다 만족해서 다음에 오면 여기서 또 머무르고 싶다고도 했어요 ㅎ
房屋的一切就如图片所示,位置便利,KK非常热心｡
짧게 잘 머물다 갑니다^^ 침사추이에서 애매하게 가깝다보니 택시를 안태워주는 경우가 몇번 있었어요 그래도 호스트께서 넘 친절하시고 하나하나 잘 알려주셔서 편했습니다 :)
Small but cozy.. Very near to Mongkok ladies market st. and sneakers st. Very friendly and warming welcome! good communication.
Good location between Mong Kok and Prince Edwards , walking distance to ladies market!Host is very precise,  apartmen is small but fully furnished. Good for cup le or family with 2 kids

This flat is clean and has a good location from Yau Ma Tei station(MTR). There also are many bus stops near this house. A heater for a bathroom and hot water work well.
But here is good for 3 people I think there are 5 beddings though.
The best thing is the host. Tam answered my message as soon as possible and did the best to help us. Big thank you Tam :)

Host was great at providing suggestions and recommendations for local places to eat/things to do. Location to local fare was fantastic! Apt was refinished with new modern touches but extremely small for 3 adults and one child. Short walk to MTR station and lots of local restaurants however you will have to speak or read Chinese to communicate with people since it was not a tourist location.

Kk is very responsive and helpful. He provides the little touches in the house that is very thoughtful. 

The location of the flat is excellent. It's central to everywhere and only a few minutes walk to the MTR. Very easy to move around. 

The flat is suitable for couples or 2 person. For a family ( 2 adults and 2 kids) I would say it's not ideal. The size is too small. 

However, if you are looking for location and accessibility, it's great.

Small but cozy environment.. Location was great - walking distance between Yau Ma Tei and Mongkok MTR station. It's good for couple or family with 2 young kids. There are 24hours supermarket, lego shopping mall for kids and restaurants that are open from breakfast till supper - very convenient location. 
KK is a friendly host and provided info to our queries before and during the trip.
This flat is located at the strategic place with lots of eateries, near shopping area and most importantly the flat is clean & with comfortable bedding.
入住非常开心,房东kk非常热情,我们找不到路还特地过来接我们,住的地方附近都是很多美食店,朗豪坊也在附近,非常棒的一次体验!

Value for money for my relatives to stay, a party of 4 (2 adults and 2 kids). Super cozy and clean flat with thoughtful design. 

Tam is incredibly hospitable and patient. Check in was listed at 2:00 pm, but he was kind enough to go extra mile to provide an earlier check in at 1pm. He provided lots of recommendations of local food and places to visit before the trip, prompt communication. 

A lovely experience, and a great taste of local life! Love to be back.

The flat is very cozy, clean, and safe with friendly security guards. The building is close to everywhere and train station. Good for our family of 3. We highly recommend this place. The bathroom, open kitchen and living room are well organized. We were really surprised with a few of the thoughtful things such as boiling water that Tam prepared for our arrival. Tam made us feel really welcome.
房东非常热情,房屋位置出行非常便利｡
房子环境很好 交通也非常便利 到地铁站步行距离就可以到

I loved how the location was great, and the flat was cosy but very practical and smart use of the space available. KK was extremely helpful and considerate as well, very deserving of his superhost status. Great amenities in the flat especially the ventilator, TV and air-conditioning. Great food options for every budget nearby and public transport was convenient as well. Awesome place, KK! :D

KK's place was great for our stay in Hong Kong. The neighborhood is full of natives, so the place is as authentic as it gets. It is also conveniently close to the Metro (approximately an 8 min walk), so getting around while staying here is very straightforward. KK was very responsive as well, and provided detailed instructions on checking in and out. Recommended!
Was very good our staying, KK was extremely helpful, the location, the comfy, everything was perfect!
Flat is near MTR station (Yau Ma Tei approx 5mins walk), 24hrs grocery store and some restaurants  :) Host is very responsive to my questions. Easy self check-in. Clean and cozy

We will definitely stay in this place again when we visit HK the next time! The flat is clean and tidy, just enough space for the four of us (two adults and 2 kids). It is near the MTR and Nathan Road which made it easy for us to explore the city. Mr. KK was able to communicate with us clearly and promptly responded to our queries. His assistance made our travel hassle-free.

For starters we were a little worried that we had to do a self check in as KK our host got stuck in an other meeting, but KK ensured that we dont panic and feel lost. He sent us videos on how to go about with explanation at every single step. We were bowled over by the accuracy of his videos. KK was always ready to help you with suggestions and was always checking on how our stay was and how are we enjoying it. We were bowled over by the use of technology in the house. we literally had everything inside the cosy comfy house. The house was very near and welcoming. We loved our stay at KK's place in HK and would recommend it all those people who love to travel and explore while travelling. We literally had a taste of how life is in the busy city of Hong Kong. The house is very close to MTR (the best way to explore any place) and both the markets. On once side is the beautifully lit night market and on the other is the bustling full of life ladies market. It was great fun staying and exploring the city. Thanks again KK for being a wonderful host and hope to meet you in person the next time we are there. 

Happy Travelling!
Cheers!
Sukanya
Good

The flat is very light with perfect view around. It's well equipped for everything you might need! The location is very convenient - 5min to MTR, 24h supermarket very close and a lot of restaurants and little shops. Mr KK was very helpful and reacted very quickly. Overall we enjoyed our stay there very much!

KK could not have been more helpful, from checking us in to providing accurate and most helpful advice throughout.  This included finding a pharmacist who was available that evening and updating us on what museums were open during our stay.  His advice on checking-in our luggage for the return flight meant that we made the most of our final day.  KK ensured that we had a custom made experience in Hong Kong. We would definitely recommend him.
Mr Kk is a great host, highly recommended
非常感谢KK的招待!入住让他多等1个小时,退房时间候因为带孩子不方便又延迟一小时,非常不好意思!房间位置不错,而且干净又离地铁站步行可到,香港房问虽小但五脏齐全-kk很好,对于第一次来香港的我给了很多建议和帮助-非常感谢

We have a great time staying at KK's place. The location is perfect, within 5mins walking distance to Yao Ma Tei station and 10mins to Mongkok station. There are several nice restaurants and plenty amenities nearby also. KK is a very friendly and helpful host to share lots of information to us. All in all, it was a great experience staying here. Highly recommend =)

got more than enough of pillows and blanket, and all the kitchen cookware if u need, but i believe the nearby food is more convenient than what we estimated!
and if u r lazy of walking ard, his paid cabletv got 24 hours movies channel 241 for mandarin 243 for english, can spend ur lazy time in his unit!
位置很好,出门2个街区就是油麻地闹市区,夜宵  小吃街遍布,临近地铁站,能方便转战到其他地方游玩,房间很干净整洁,屋内设施齐全,房东人很好,沟通方便,很感谢,有机会还会再来玩｡
预订后与房东的交流非常顺利,给予了我们一行人在如何前往､周边交通等方面给予了很大的帮助｡房间位置很好,距离最近的地铁站很近,非常方便｡房间干净､卫生,有了房间强劲的冷气,夏日香港的炎热也少了几分肆虐｡总的来说,是一件前往香港非常值得尝试的房间｡
kk人超级好 也非常细心 房子的地理位置也很方便~很棒哦~
房子不大但是很干净,什么都有很方便,房东人很不错呢｡
非常适合家庭入住的小房子,有感受到香港房子小但五脏俱全的味道｡交通方便,即使拖着三岁的小朋友,走到油麻地地铁站也只要几分钟,周边有翠华,添好运,稻香等等好吃的｡谢谢KK,Cheers.
We stay for 4 nights, it was conveniet apartment, good locations, near by public transport. Mr. KK is easy to communicate and always care for your need. Check in and check out was easy.
Tam人很好,耐心解答了很多问题｡房间的空调稍稍有点吵,但不久就会习惯｡房子位置很好,接近女人街
房东人特别好,服务赞,公寓设施都很齐全,环境整洁,应有尽有,住着非常舒适,一百分一百分!交通也很便利,步行几分钟就能到地铁口,各人觉得很不错很适合居住,出去玩累了回到公寓,有冷气又有超级舒服的软软的沙发｡
위치는 야우마테이와 가까웠어요! 하지만 비밀번호의 불명확성으로 들어가는데 애먹었습니다!!!숙소는 깨끗하고 청결하고 경비아저씨도 좋았어요!!! 4명이서 사용하기 충분합니다! 안에서 고기도 구워먹고 좋았어요!
靠近油麻地地铁站,交通非常便利｡房东Tam人很好很幽默,会给我们提供地图,指出附近的好吃的｡总之,我们对这次的住宿非常满意!
Good location, clean apartment! Nice landlord. Recommended!
房间住的很舒服 位置也很好 离旺角和油麻地都很近
离市中心非常近 房间很干净 而且房东人特别热心 很棒的体验哦 下次还会来找这个房东

KK's place was neat, clean, and affordable. The place was perfect for 2 or 3 westerners. It was a lot smaller than it looked like from the pictures. But there were only 2 of us so it was fine. 5 people would be a little cramped for me. KK was also an awesome host. He was very quick to reply to any questions I had, and he knows everything you need to know about Hong Kong. He also gave us many suggestions of methods of arrival from the airport, places to eat, and using the subway/bus stations. I had a great time staying at KK's.
清洁,东西齐全,吃也方便｡
层数还不错刚好看到繁华的街口.房东人超好超细心.特地画了一张小地图给我们参考还很耐心给我们讲解入住事项.地段很棒.下楼走三个街口往左一直走就是朗豪坊了.那一段地方很多东西吃而且购物一流.总的来说还是非常的nice.
All fine, great place to stay in Kowloon. Thanks KK for your valuable tips.

The location is very nice very near to Mongkok. And also easy to find if you follow the information given by the host. The host replies messages really quickly. The self check-in is great, which makes things more flexible.

About the amenities, we could only find shower gel. So for people who plan to live in, maybe you should take things like toothpaste yourself. 

The house is kind of small for 5 people, but we were only three so it was fine for us. 

All in all, the house is lovely and the host is very nice. We spent a great night there. Btw love the CD in the house.
非常感谢热情招待,地理位置很好,晚上非常热闹｡
位于中心地带,交通非常便利,房间很干净,唯一不足就是空间较小,适合两个人居住
房屋干净整洁,还配备了电源转化器､雨伞､地图｡手绘地图可以很方便找到周围的交通餐饮｡位置在闹市区,周围交通､餐饮､购物都非常方便,晚上出门也很安全｡房间比较小,可能香港寸土寸金吧｡
虽然房间有点小,但是真的很干净,交通也还方便
房东人非常好,日常用品也齐全,一室一厅一卫一厨,比酒店实在是好太多了

KK is a very thoughtful host, and he made it very clear for check in details, he also provided great tips for Hong Kong one day tour, the good restaurants around. His hospitality made our trip to Hong Kong becoming very easy and comfortable. We will recommend his place to our friends if they wish to visit Hong Kong.

Great place to stay in HK. Good location and accessible to most of the well known tourist spots like Disney, Victoria Peak, Mongkok and Tsim Tsa Tiu using MTR that is so economical. Clean and hospitable host
저언시이회기간이라서이 호우텔가굑이 넘나비싸 대안으로택. 비이수우기때는 호텔가능거시나음. 나아쁜후기는지이운다하여 이러케씀

kk is SUPER kind person.
and, good location, clean room, reasonable price, everything is good.
I reccommend it.
交通便利,安静
Strategic place to stay for food and shopping. MRT nearby too. The place is clean and host is helpful.

地理位置优越,离地铁口很近……附近餐馆也多
房子虽小,但也是五脏俱全……另外房东KK非常nice
Beautiful apartment. Easy to get to mass transit from it.
He was really helpful and hospitable. The place was like a one bedroom condo,  stylish and comfortable, very near to MTR, night markets and local food establishments. I will recommend this place.

Mr. KK is a very accommodating host.  Though his flat is quite small for a family of 5, it is strategically located at the heart of the city; thus, accessible to almost all areas esp. malls and restaurants.  The place is also clean and equipped with basic kitchen needs (except microwave oven) so cooking (for breakfast) is feasible. And yes, wifi is wonderful! It was a truly pleasant experience to stay in an Airbnb flat than in a hotel...value for money.
Place was small and suitable for small family for 3 persons. Its convenient as supermarket, night market are nearby. We enjoyed our stay at KK’s house.
房東很好人 房間乾淨舒適

The apartment is in a great location and very close to shops, MTR and restaurants. It is also a convenient location to get to other areas in HK. We did a lovely walk down Nathan Road down to TST, taking in all the sights, doing some shopping and taking in the atmosphere.

KK left gave us a very good map marked with some key places for food and treats.

There is nothing negative to talk about the place of mr. KK and the host itself. The whole family‍‍‍is very thankful to mr. Kk for being such a great host !words are not enough to express how happy we are. We enjoyed so much our stay in hongkong because of him and his place. His place is so comfortable to stay especially with a family visiting hongkong,near to restaurantnear to shopping and near to mtr and bus. All amenities that we need is there. We suggest this place to anyone who would like to visit hongkong . Will surely come back for the host and his place. See you soon mr KK and  May God bless you more!
真的是一应俱全,设施非常完善,地理位置也很合适

Excellent host, very thoughtful and helpful. Assisted us in finding places to go. 

Flat is very well located great area to walk and explore. Lots of restaurants and shops and very close to Nathan Rd. 

Overall we had a lovely trip and really enjoyed our stay.

name: Happy House
summary: Hıı guest,  If you choose my house , you will be happiness .Because My house location is center of İstanbul , near by  Taksim 2,2 km , metro station is 0,5 km .And house have excellent views of and it's very comfortable & very clean.Happy holidays
description: Hıı guest,  If you choose my house , you will be happiness .Because My house location is center of İstanbul , near by  Taksim 2,2 km , metro station is 0,5 km .And house have excellent views of and it's very comfortable & very clean.Happy holidays

host.host_about: I am a hospitable & friendly person and You can find the same property in my (Website hidden by Airbnb) house is center of Istanbul and 3 min to metro station.

name: Cozy 1 BR apartment, walkup
summary: Small, cozy place just for yourself, wifi, hot water. Tin Hau MTR Station 3 min, 15 mins to Central/TST, near restaurants, good for light travelers, 4/F with no lift. You will have the whole apartment to yourself. The bedroom has a double bed and there is a sofa in the living room. Good for 2-3ppl.
space: One bedroom apartment in Tin Hau, very close to MTR station. 45 Mins to Airport by Bus, 10 mins walk to Causeway Bay. It is a 4th floor walk up building. It’s one bedroom apartment, which will be yours. I don’t stay in this apartment and you will not be disturbed.
description: Small, cozy place just for yourself, wifi, hot water. Tin Hau MTR Station 3 min, 15 mins to Central/TST, near restaurants, good for light travelers, 4/F with no lift. You will have the whole apartment to yourself. The bedroom has a double bed and there is a sofa in the living room. Good for 2-3ppl. One bedroom apartment in Tin Hau, very close to MTR station. 45 Mins to Airport by Bus, 10 mins walk to Causeway Bay. It is a 4th floor walk up building. It’s one bedroom apartment, which will be yours. I don’t stay in this apartment and you will not be disturbed. You can use everything in the apartment including flat screen TV, Micro, and fridge. Please keep everything clean. I will be on holidays and I am renting my space out for someone who is looking for clean and comfortable space. I will be available through Whats app or airbnb. Near to MTR, supermarket, laundry services, Seven 11, good restaurants around here and a quiet place. Victoria park right behind and will take you to causeway
neighborhood_overview: Near to MTR, supermarket, laundry services, Seven 11, good restaurants around here and a quiet place. Victoria park right behind and will take you to causeway bay in a 10 mins walk.  Its on the main island, central is very close. Business hub and night life is very accessible.
notes: Feel free to ask me any question, have a good trip while your stay here.
transit: MTR is the best to get around in Hong Kong. Central and Tsim Sha Tsui are just 15 mins by MTR, Wanchai about 10 mins. Direct bus A11 to/from airport near my place.  Many bus stops near by and tram stop to get all over Hong Kong. Very convenient location for sightseeing.
access: You can use everything in the apartment including flat screen TV, Micro, and fridge. Please keep everything clean.
interaction: I will be on holidays and I am renting my space out for someone who is looking for clean and comfortable space. I will be available through Whats app or airbnb.
house_rules: I am a tidy person and like the same.   No Visitors. No Smoking.   Turn off the utilities after use :)   Please keep the washroom tidy and dry.   No outside shoes all around the house please. You can please take them off and keep in a corner before going out again. Thanks a lot.

host.host_about:
Living and working in Hong Kong. I have been an Airbnb host for few years now. Since I just moved to a new apartment so the current listing is relatively new. I am a very easy going and laid back and people say I am a warm person. Hong Kong homes are small and so is mine, but its warm and cozy. Hope you feel at home. so far I had great experience with my guests and they all made me a better host each time. Hope you will be my next guest!

I usually respond to msgs within few mins. However, I follow HK time UTC +8, so please bear with me if you are contacting me from another side of the world.

Happy holidays!!

address.street: Tin Hau, North Point, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Very cozy room, very kind host, placed in very convenient area. Good for light travelers.
Very cozy place to stay in Hk.

It was a great experience staying with Romi, everything was very smooth and I have great memories of the stay.
The place is unbeatable because of its location, cost, cleanness and the kind host. :)
The place is perfect for 1 person , you will have to go up for 4 floors to the apartment (no elevator) but it is not a problem at all, another good thing is that the metro station is very close to the apartment (3 minutes walking), it is quiet and secure, more over you can also walk to causeway bay and it would take around 12-15 minutes.
I definitely recommend Romi's place, Romi, thank you for hosting me :)

when the guest stay at home, My host alway be with them. she is very kind and her maid clean up every day. I stayed very comfortable and good time at here. There are many delicious restaurant and good dessert store.  Thanks her for make me a precious memory.

Romi is such a great and kind host who gave me instant help when I got lost, her place is in a good location nearby MTR station and bus stop, and also central library and victoria park. Many restaurants with various food to choose with nearby.
The place is really cozy and clean to stay, could be recommended to any traveller.

Romi是ㄧ位很棒的屋主,可以給你很多好意見與即時幫助;房子位置臨近公車站與地鐵天后站,交通位置也非常好,樓下也有許多不同餐廳可選擇｡
房間非常非常整齊舒適,真的可以推薦給大家!
first, sorry for the shoes! It's a cozy house. Romi is a nice host, she often asks if you need help! the place is very convient,everything is good.

Romi was an excellent and very friendly host. It felt like home away from home. Place was clean and easily accessible through Metro. Many convinience shops, restaurants were just on the same street. Romi provided all necessary instructions to access the place. No trouble getting into the appartment. It was my first and best experience booking with airbnb. I will book this place again. :)
Host is nice. Cozy and convenient place.
Nice place to take a rest! I really like it! And they are so kind! ♥
Lovely cozy place to stay. Only issue is climbing up 4 floors.. place is centrally located close to TIN HAU MTR. . Ramandeep has been a great host..
Romi was very prompt in responding to queries. The room was small but it was clean and cosy. It was situated in a very good location and Romi made it feel like home.

I stayed at Romi's flat for five nights. Romi was very responsive before arriving and provided great details for arriving at her apartment in Tin Hau. Upon my arrival I was greeted by Romi. She was extremely helpful in getting me situated in both the flat and HK. The highlight of the stay was getting to try her Masala tea!!
The apartment is quite small, but ideally located in a very accessible location. Also, if you are traveling with a lot of luggage the stairs may prove to be unfriendly to you. This is a great place to stay if you need an accessible location and a place to return to at the end of the day. 
Overall I had a good stay and would recommend for short stays.

Romi has been very helpful during my stay. Her place is very close to the MTR station and surrounded by convenience stores and varies restaurants. 
It could be a choice for your stay in HK.
The apartment is not hard to find.Small sweet and quiet clean.Romi is really nice host too.Nice first experience afterall.

The house is really small but clean , cozy and cheap. The location is awesome! Very convenient to take bus or subway to anywhere. The street is a little busy and noisy at night.Romi and her boyfriend are friendly.
It was a great stay in Hong Kong. Everything was perfect, thank you for your host:-)

This was my first time when i used Airbnb. This experience was nice. Romi is very hospitable and her place is so cosy and clean. She give clear information about location so it's easy to find. The location is the biggest advantage. I highly reccomend this place.

It's my first time using airbnb and it's a good experience. Romi is a good host. Her flat is comfy and cozy. The location is great, 2 min walk to metro and many restaurants and desserts downstairs. Would stay again next time if I come to HK by myself.
Great location ,it is within walking distance to the MTR.Romi is a perfect landlady who is kind to provide me with all the tourism information.And the India tea is tasty!
Romi was very responsive. The location was easy to find thanks to the clear description. It was a pleasant stay, and thanks for the yummy hot tea! All the best!
Romi was kind enough to host me an extra night, definitely appreciated. Thanks Romi!

It was a pleasure staying with Romi and Pankaj. They were delightful hosts who were eager to share some great tips on local vegetarian cuisine (which I definitely appreciate!). The bed was a bit small for me (I'm 5'11"), but I'd definitely stay with them again!

Romi was an excellent host, she makes you feel at home. She always answered my messages quite fast, both before and during the stay. Really nice place, perfectly clean, exactly as you see in the pictures. Good location, and very safe area even if you arrive home late. If I come back, I will try to stay here again!

The host gave me clear instructions to finding and getting in to the room which helped me a lot. It was close to an MTR station so it was quite convenient.
The host was kind and helping.
The only complaint is that the bed was hard and not comfy.

Romi's house is cosy
She is good host
Romi is extremely hospitable and patient. Despite my last minute request for late check out, she agreed and waited for me. Would recommend her place for long and short stay. :)
Romi is a good host. The location is great, just 5 mins walk to the Tin Hau MTR station. There are many restaurants and desserts downstairs. I highly reccomend this place.

Romi was warm and welcoming and is ever ready when we need her. She's very accommodating to our needs too. The space is enough for one person but I came with 2 friends so it's a little bit squeezy but it's enough for us to just rest our feet and body after much walking on the streets! 

Her place is very near to the attractions that we intended to go, so yea.. satisfied!
像其他香港房间一样,别指望有多大｡沙发很小,只适合女生吧!但是位置很方便,从天地铁站A口出只有5分钟,那一条电器街还很多好吃的,推荐天后甜品店,荣发茶餐厅和德昌鱼蛋粉的早茶!Romi人很好,还给我品尝了印度婚礼上吃的传统点心:)
Very good, all as described; perfect location with LOTS of restaurants nearby.

Romi is an excellent host and the flat was nice. 
Near to to the Tin Hau MTR station. 
Very good price/quality ration :)
Easy to find. Near the restaurants. Only 1 hour to/from airport. Highly recommended
First experience with AirBnB. Great host, great location and altogether a great experience. Thanks!
Great!
awesome
I had to cancel, but, she seemed very gracious and had excellent instructions on accessing her premise
It is a very nice and convenient place to stay. Thanks a lot, Romi.
Listing was very accurate, very well situated and clean. Great experience!
The listing was exactly what I expected. The apartment was small but exactly what I needed to lay my head down at at night. Great value for an excellent  location in Hong Kong. Romi is a great host.
she has been nice to stay me comfortably.
The room was clean and it's got an comfortable/relaxing atmosphere! I'd be happy to stay another time.
舒适的小房间,如果沙发再长些就更好了｡
this is my first time using airbnb...Romi's house is so cool…I sleep so well these two nights!

Cozy studio...the strategic location, many restaurants nearby, I like Violet Bakery and Mak's noodles which are just a few steps from the house. Romi is friendly and helpful..
The sofa bed is just nice for me, not suitable for height more than 165cm

I could not have asked for a better place to stay. The room is quite small so it's best to fold away the bed after every sleep, but for a happy camper like myself it was perfect. Romi is a very chill lady and a pleasure to talk with. The location is also very convenient, especially for the price she charges.
Romi is very friendly. The place is nice too. Traffic here is convenient. Will consider here next time.
今次系我第一次用呢個軟件｡感謝Romi一直的協助!房間一應俱全,交通便利｡重點系Romi好nice｡而且講房間打掃得非常乾淨｡我覺得好過住酒店
说实话……整体环境感觉不怎么样,尤其睡觉只能算是将就一晚上｡房东也并不是很热情,不过还好不太干涉房客｡

It is my first time using airbnb. The room is quite clean and cozy .Very close to the Tin Hau station, Lots of good food nearby.Romi is very friendly and (Website hidden by Airbnb) would be better if the sofa could be longer. I'd be happy to stay another time.

The listing description was accurate, and after booking, the instructions for getting to the place from the airport and getting the key were perfect.

The location was the highlight of my stay. The apartment is only a short walk to Causeway Bay, one of the most happening neighborhoods in Hong Kong. And it's right down the street from the MTR, making access to everywhere easy. There are also a lot of bus stops nearby, and a lot of restaurants and dessert places right down the street. This really couldn't be beat!

The fold-out couch was quite comfortable for sleeping, and I had plenty of room to put my luggage in the room. There were also outlets accessible from the bed and couch. 

Romi was easy to get in touch with before and during my stay. She was a gracious host while I was living in her apartment: she helped me with the washing machine and folding out the couch, and we had a couple of nice chats, but mostly were respectful of each other's space. 

I had a great stay, I would definitely stay here again on a future trip!

The place was exactly as described and shown on the pics. I felt at home immediately. Romi is a great host, easy-going and fast to answer any kind of question. The location of this place is perfect, very close to MTR, airport bus, food, shopping.
I recommend this place to anyone who will be outside most of the day and needs a place to sleep for great value for money.

Romi was an excellent host ,communicated clearly ,her place is exactly as advertised ,cozy ,neat & clean. Perfect for what I needed. Easy to find through well thought out directions. Lovely neighborhood too.

A very comfortable stay in a great location. It was very easy to find the place and Romi was incredibly responsive to any questions. There are many places to eat nearby and you can easily walk to the MTR or bus stations. The place itself was clean and cozy. I had been traveling for three weeks when I stayed here and it was the perfect place to recharge, relax and be able to explore Hong Kong. I would definitely recommend it. Thank you Romi!
Great stay experience in Romi 's place. Very convient to subway and downtown. lots of restaurant and store near by. Can't wait to plan the next trip

Really did like the apartment. Perfect for staying for a few days. It is near to the MRT station and also to the tram, so with this you can directly reach every place in Hongkong. Romi was very nice and also quick in responding here. So I can definitive recommend it.
房子很干净,离地铁也很近,就是空调声音有点大,房东人也很好,总体很不错｡

Romi's place is really tidy and make me feel comfortable.
And it is convenient that the MTR just in five minutes away.
What a good place to stay !

Romi's place was was clean and comfortable, perfect if you want to be out all day and centrally located so you could pop in to rest a bit before heading out again. 

instructions to locate the flat were quite clear and Romi is always around on (Hidden by Airbnb) if you have trouble locating  the place.  

Had a nice chat  with her one of the days and she was very friendly.

Location of the house is very convient, close to the park, subway, many buses, tram. The apartment was very clean. Housing corresponds description. The room is small, but has everything you need. I liked it very much.

Romi's place was extremely cosy and clean. It as only 5 min from the MTR, which is extremely convenient. Along Electric Road were also delicious street food and a convenience store. Thank you for having me!

The room is on a convenient street. I can hang out around untill very late. And it is just like Romi said, cosy and tidy. Romi is friendly. Maybe people with better oral English than me will communicate better:) A happy trip.
Awesome location. Pleasure to meet you Romi

Romi is a good host, very responsive and helpful. Directions was clear. The room is very clean and cozy, air conditioning and wifi functioned very well. It was well located, 3-5 mins walk from Tin Hau MTR. There are many restaurants and desserts stores downstairs. Really enjoyed my stay! Highly recommended!

The place matches exactly its description. The room is indeed small, but the place was very comfy, not leaving me wishing I had gone for somewhere bigger at any point. Also, Romi was kind at all times, and I would definitely recommend her place to any traveller that needs a place to rest whilst exploring Hong Kong.
Quite good but a little bit confusing location:)
Very comfortable. You feel like home. The location of the house convenient, five minutes walk from the metro station. Everything is fine.

The listing was exactly what I was expecting. Although the apartment was small, it was very comfortable and super clean. The host was very nice and accommodating and she was able to answer all of my questions as it was my first time in Hong Kong. The apartment is less than 5 minute walk to the metro station and only one stop away from Causeway Bay. There were a few times where I walked to Causeway Bay as it is less than a 15 minute walk.

Had a great stay with Romi. Flat is super clean with everything you need. Neighborhood is super convenient with one of the best sushi takeover I've seen minutes away. Most important, she's a sweat and helpful person!
Just don't be tall as a Dutch and you'll be great
It was great to stay with you - a cozy little haven above street food paradise.
I have never met such a tidy and clean room. Amazing clean! Romi is warm hearted and helpful. The apartment is very very easy to find if you go by subway.

Great location! It’s easy to find- just a 15 minutes walk to Causeway Bay, and about 5 minutes to the next MTR. I couldn't enter the room when I arrived, because I came before check-in time (If you do so, don’t forget to tell her ;) ), but she managed the situation like a pro. Romi was an awesome (and stylish) host! We had some nice conversations and you can ask her anything about HK. The staircase can’t be described as neat (compared to western european standards), the apartment however is lovely and equipped with everything you need. I stayed here for a week and would advice everyone to stay at Romi’s place. Thank you for everything, Romi!

Es war wie beschrieben. Sehr saubere Unterkunft.
Die Lage ist super, viele Restaurants, U-Bahn, Straßenbahn direkt vor der Türe. 
Die Nebenstraßen der Causeway Bay auf dem Weg ins Zentrum zu nutzen lohnt sich, wegen der kleinen Restaurants.
Anfahrt war denkbar einfach.
Good place and convenient!
It was Pretty nice trip
很方便,距离天后地铁站很近

Romi is really nice and considerate, although she wasn't not at home, my concern was addressed by her in an efficient way. By the way, the room is nice and comfortable, the location is also close to city center, highly recommended!
Good location

жил неделю, хороший район, метро рядом, также рядом различные ресторанчики на любой вкус. Сама квартирка небольшая, для гонконга это нормально, в комнате диван, который раскладывается в кровать, не очень удобно, но все же лучше чем жить в хостеле. есть все удобства, туалет, горячий душ, микроволновка, холодильник, стиральная машина. Сама хозяйка живет в маленькой комнате, когда я жил возвращалась часто ночью, для того чтобы ей пройти в свою комнату нужно было пройти мимо меня, тк входная дверь находится в той самой комнате, где живет гость. самая хозяйка дружелюбная, оставила приятное впечатление, хотя толком и не общались. Для больших и тучных людей комната врядли подойдет. А так за такую цену в гонконге все равно нормальное жилье не снять, поэтому для тех кто не любит хостелы идеальный вариант. главное что все есть, а  добираться до всех достопримечательностей очень удобно на метро.

Romi's apartment was clean and as described. However, as she needs to walk through the rented room to reach her own sleeping room, it is rather disturbing when she and her friends come home at 3am and leave at 5am. There are hotel rooms available for almost the same price and in which you do not need to care about such issues. I cancelled my stay midway through.
英式楼层4F其实就是五楼｡楼下就是便利店,还有其他各式档口 直行到头就是天后地铁站 很方便｡Romi也会给予很大的自由空间给我们 谢谢她准备的一切｡

The host is kind. And I really liked its location. 

Room was very clean, and I felt it comfortable to stay.
地理位置很好~但是住宿體驗很差,床是一個沙發,房間是睡客廳,而且房東不會幫你把床鋪好,還要自己鋪,跟野外宿營一樣,不過房間比較乾淨,但是很吵
Very nice, good location, old building. Sofa bed is in the living room which is quite small. The bathroom is small too. Fresh experience to me, a little shocked.
非常方便,地方有点点小,但是很温馨~比较适合一个人阻住,两个人可能就有点拥挤,Romi 非常友善,希望下次还可以继续合作｡
Nice service. Like in the home. Tks Romi, all the best in the future : )
虽然房间好干净,但系张梳化床真系好难训,第一次遇到滴甘无诚意既出租房,无下次｡

Cozy apartment with great location. Many restaurants are nearby, easy to fill your stomach :) only one short part is no elevator, we two girls had to carry two big luggages to go to the 5th floor. Next time we'll bring small ones !!
The entire condition is very great. But it was a little bit difficult to find the location maybe because of feature of Hong Kong. Also, I think it's better to show how to open the iron door.
Everything as described. I particularly liked the bed, was very nice considering I needed to catch up on a lot of sleep due to jet lag.

Nice apartment. Not huge but clean and cosy. got everything you need. Basic simple good value.

Need to walk 4 levels so beware if you have heavy luggage!
our trip did not go as planned unfortunately, however she was very understanding and accommodating.
Nice convenient spot

This place is lovely, perfect for one person and ok for two.  It is 2 blocks away from Victoria Park, a great place to walk and hang out.  It is two blocks in the other direction from the metro station, Tin Hau and metro is very easy to use.  There are great dumpling places on Electric Drive!  Really good food everywhere.
在香港性价比很高的住宿,很干净,就是楼层有点高,房东反应很快,很热心

Everything in Hong Kong is cramped, but this felt like it was value for the money. The neighbourhood had everything one needed so there was never any problems like that. It was however quite the few flights of stairs to get up there, so make sure you can walk in stairs. Cheers!

The place was lovely! Big enough for two. It was a bit difficult for me to find the flat, therefore, recommended the host to add some photos to avoid confusions. The host was super prompt with replying back despite being away. The wifi can be on and off occasionally. Overall, loved the place! Its at a convenient location!

The place it’s quite nice, near mass transportation, crowded road, most important think because i’m a muslim there’s halal food near the apartment it has a certificate of halal.
The apartment is quite small than i expected but there’s not a big issue, it’s enough for 2 adult & 1 child

Nice cosy house.
Pros-
Not far from MTR
Good food joints and shops nearby
Cons-
Climb stairs ( as written in description)
Sofa bed can be extended but still not a comfortable place to sleep.
Some construction on upper floor, so some thumping during the morning hours.
It’s a good place to stay. Great location and convenient check-in. Always get quick responses from Romi :)

Квартира расположена очень удобно, близко от метро, близко от центра. В квартире есть необходимые предметы для использования в быту. Это намного лучше, чем обычный гостиничный номер. Все было чистое, но не новое. В квартире тихо, несмотря на то, что она расположена очень близко к центру. Были небольшие проблемы с роутером вай-фай. В квартире есть переходник для розетки, но в нем сгорел предохранитель. Предохранитель можно заменить, он стоит 2 доллара и продается в магазине за углом. Я довольна этим проживанием!

Thank you for having us in your place. It's really great and your helps are really appreciated.
I'll come to your place again if I come back to Hong Kong
nice place near MTR station, climbing stairs (4 floors) is something you should note before booking this place !
This place is super clean and exactly what you see from the listing. It's also in a great location with lots of great restaurants and food around. I highly recommend!

It’s such a nice place to stay.
Quite convenient to do everything, and if u wanted to live like a local in HK, Romi’s place must be one of them. 
The neighborhood’s safe and hospitality, we had such a GREAT time.
Thx Romi!
good
非常乾淨,周圍的餐廳非常美味,MRT沒有描述中的那麼遠,很近,再次拜訪香港的住處首選
Romi's place is very cozy, clean and centrally located. It's a good value. Will definitely stay again.

I had a comfortable stay at Romi's apartment. It was very centrally located and just a couple minutes walk from the Tin Hau MTR station.  Romi responds to messages very quickly, made me feel very welcomed. If you don't mind  the 4th floor walk up, I highly recommend a stay here.
Very clean and beautiful house. Thank you!
房东特别好,这个房源性价比真的高,推荐!
房子很好,位置很优越

Romis appartment is very nice and clean, and it is centrally located. We liked it very much. Many beautiful details. For HK conditions it is nearly large. You only consider if you like to walk up to the 4th floor, because there's no elevator. Thank you, Romy.

Small place very close to Tin Hau MTR and next door to Victoria Park. A lot of eateries and bars around. Very easy to find entrance with Romi’s description. Staircases are quite dirty and entrance to the apartment is small due to metal gate on it. Couch is uncomfortable and it was not set up for third person. We had to find bedsheets ourselves even though Romi was always in touch. In all it was good place to stay one night. Thanks.

地理位置方便 近維園 及地鐵站｡但要行5層樓梯 拖著行理比較吃力｡而熱水爐是儲熱式 要開後半小時才能沖涼 沖涼時間也要很快｡
房間 也算整潔
Отличное расположение, квартира чистая, уютная, в ней могут разместится 3-4 человека; рядом рынки и супермаркеты, весь необходимый транспорт, а также, огромный парк! Хороший вариант ;)
쮠쫘류 집이 쬡뀨 뚸뤄왔오. 위취뉸 죻왓음

Apt.mit tollem Blick ueber den Lidopark hin zum Copacabanastrand und Atlantischen Ozean.Modern,tropical eingerichtet,bietet das Apt. alles was man braucht um sich wohl zu fuehlen.Ein Katzensprung und man ist am Meer.Supermaerkte,Apotheken,Bars,Restaurants,Churrascarias,Galetos.....,Rio Sul Shopping Center mit ca. 400 Geschaeften in 2Min. mit Bus oder Taxi erreichbar wenn das Wetter mal nicht so schoen ist. host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Z33,Bicicleta,VN800,Brasilian JiuJitsu De la Riva,TV 05 07 Huettenberg,Handball Bundesliga,Hondkaes met Musik,Sport,RadioMusic99.9 Rio de Janeiro,Beachwalking,Dogs,Aquarium,Hangmat,Angeln.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Had an excellent stay in Kai's beautiful apartment for a week over the holiday and New Years. He's an excellent host with great communication and tips for places to see during our stay which was very nice. Location is perfect with an amazing view of The beach and great taste for apartment style. Would recommend and stay again upon a return. Thanks again Kai! - David + Jamie.

Kai was very welcoming, warm, and friendly.  Gave us lots of tips about local places to eat, drink and dance.  He gave us the perfect spot on the beach with senna.  The apartment was just like the picture even better.  It had welcoming drinks and fruit.  Apartment clean and great view!!!!! I felt safe there.  Like the door man.  Markets, shopping, great neighborhood!! Kai was always available to answer questions.  We used (Hidden by Airbnb) . Super easy to communicate
Amazing place to spend New Years ever! Kai was a great host, any questions he was happy to help. The view was incredible, we were really happy with the whole stay.
Hospedagem muito tranquila, apto confortável, proximo a restaurantes, e metrô,  Kai muito receptivo e atencioso.
Kai é um excelente anfitrião, super amável, flexível e atencioso. O apto está muito bem localizado e tem vistas lindas!

El lugar es increible!! Superó ampliamente nuestras expectativas. Kai nos estaba esperando en el edificio al momento de nuestra llegada. Nos hizo una visita por todo el departamento, explicando cada detalle para no tener ningún imprevisto. En la heladera nos encontramos con bebidas de cortesía para nuestra llegada!!

Con respecto al departamento, super cómodo, muy limpio y completo. Con una ubicación increible. A una cuadra de la playa de Copacabana, con un ventanal con una vista a la playa INCREIBLE!! 
Seguridad las 24 hs. A pocas cuadras del metro. 

Sin duda volveríamos a instalarnos en el mismo lugar!!

Un grande Kai ! Muy atento en todo sentido. 
Siempre predispuesto. Muy recomendable !

Kai is an amazing host. Very friendly and gives really good tips. The place itself couldn't be located in a better spot, close to lots of great restaurants, the metro, and Copacabana beach. The building also has 24 hr security which is an added feature. Overall an amazing stay at Kai's and would highly recommend.

name: Ocean front apartment great views
summary: Spectacular apartment, with 180 degree views of Bondi  Beach. Modern kitchen & bathroom. Large living room plus sun room with daybed. Close to cafés, bars & surf club. Live the beach lifestyle & wake up to the sound of waves!
space: Very large apartment, with huge living area and sun room to chill out in. Sun room could accommodate young kids and we're happy to supply baby cot. There is a roof top terrace above apartment with sweeping views of beach. Guests have access to everything in the apartment  I will meet guests Waking up and rolling out of bed for a swim, then grabbing breakfast and coffee. Going for walk from Bondi to Bronte along the coastal walk. Having a relaxing beer at the RSL club 2 mins from our unit.   Bus stop across the road takes you to Bondi Junction train station, or the city. You can also grab a taxis 24/7 on the street.  No smoking in the apartment. There is a roof top terrace above apartment where you can smoke. No pets allowed.

host.host_about:
Married with 3 beautiful girls, a lovely wife and now a puppy. Love the water and swim at the beach as much as I can. Lived in the area for 30 years and love the beach life style. Into cycling, surfing and skiing. Also a life long traveler and have lived and worked overseas in U.S & Canada. Travelled extensively in South & Central America.  I really enjoy meeting new people and helping them have a great experience here in my home.
Moto: "You've got one life, enjoy it"

reviews.comments:
What a great apartment! Absolute beach front. Amazing views.  Open plan, light, bright with a great designer feel thanks to gorgeous furniture and a wonderful art collection.

Mal was fantastic. Very welcoming and helpful. Going above and beyond expectations by dropping in a great DVD collection! Very thoughtful. The vase of gorgeous fresh flowers was a lovely touch also.

Bondi is now a mecca for some seriously great restaurants, groovy little bars and some of Sydney's best coffee. We were spoiled for choice.

We loved our stay here and will most definitely be back. Thanks Mal!

Great apartment with a great host. Mal met us on day one & went out of his way to ensure we were happy guests. New kitchen & bathroom added to the value of the apartment with the incredible location & views. We felt right at home in Bondi, immediately. 

Having 3 kids of his own, Mal was extra helpful with the loan of a cot, high chair, stroller & dvd's which made travelling with our own little one that much easier. 

I'll be booking with Mal again when next in Sydney.

Absolutely great place to stay and a wonderful experience. The apartment itself is very nice and very comfortable; it is light, airy, relaxing - all the things a beachside apartment should be. And the location just can't be beat. It is right on the beach and right next to everything you want to be near, while retaining the laid-back 'neighbourhood' vibe that the best parts of Bondi seem to manage. The views are, needless to say, spectacular. 

Mal was very friendly, offering us some local insights into places we might want to check out (or avoid) and although we didn't call him again after we checked in, he was sure to let us know we could call if we needed anything. In short, the perfect place to stay in Sydney. Would go back again in a second.
Great spot

We booked the room VERY short notice (the day before, flying in from Europe :) and where a little worried if Mal would be able to arrange for our move in so quickly. You bet he did :) He was down in Melbourne on the day of our arrival but he had it all arranged, the place was in top condition, and the crib was waiting for our little girl. Mal was great in all respects, a good example being how quickly he sorted out an issue with the Internet Service Provider. He even left me a temporary data SIM card for the few hours of downtime (that were not his fault)! He also put together a list of day trips and even kept a few of our suitcases for us while we went onwards to travel the country. We were so thankful as it saved us trememdous hassle and airflight baggage fees. The apartment itself is exactly as the pictures show - really awesome and in the midst of Bondi. We had a great time and will for sure return to visit Mal´s place when we come back to Sydney.

This was a great location next to the beach with plenty of room for a family of four and a great view of the beach.  Mal was very responsive and provided restaurant recommendations.  We enjoyed our stay on Bondi Beach!

Mal was absolutely fantastic!
He made us very welcome and comfortable within his apartment.
The pictures and description of the place doesn't do it justice, as it is magical!
The neighbourhood was great, cafes, restaurants, and locals were all wonderful!
Would love to stay here again!
The host was great, the apartment was perfect and the neighborhood is amazing. A great place for a great vacation.

We had a wonderful time at the apartment. Waking up to the view and having a coffee early in the morning was the best part. The place is fantastic and it's well equipped with anything you need to have some rest and days off

Fantastic location with spectacular views! Mal was very accomodating, meeting us on the day of arrival (even though we were late) and allowing for a later check out (was a lifesaver given our late flight out). Very well furnished and the perfect little getaway.

Good apartment. If you've got kid(s) be aware that there is no door for the bedroom. At all. Also if you come in a car, the parking outside is 1P or 4P and incredibly expensive, up to $17 per hour. You can find free parking about 10-15 minute walk away. Bondi waves always work so if that's your thing this place is worth the steep price

Staying at Mal's place was an absolute delight.  The photos are true to the decor but cannot begin to properly describe how wonderful it is to be perched up in your "Sydney home" watching the world go by on Bondi Beach. The best location in Sydney by far! And Mal is the perfect host.  So quick to respond to all enquiries and goes above and beyond to make your stay really special.  Thanks for everything  Mal. I am telling all my friends in NZ about your place and coming back for sure.  Mals tip for Jo and Willy Depot Cafe was brilliant. .. Great food.  Great people.  Not touristy. Made you feel like a local.
Great apartment with a really nice view of Bondi beach. Superb location with everything within walking distance.

Mal is a very nice  host, he always solve my problems and all questions related to the apartment settings on time. Apartment is very clean. the Actual sea view is not bad, same as the picture shown on the website. it is a fantastic place to enjoy your holiday time.

This was one of the best trips I've taken thanks to Mal and his beautiful apartment. It was exactly as advertised and in the best location you could ask for. We were directly across the road from Bondi Beach and the apartment was incredibly clean and comfortable. Mal had provided us with everything we could possibly ask for - beach towels, internet, movies, fresh fruit and tips on what to do in Bondi. I will definitely recommend Mal's apartment to friends and family and I hope to return soon myself!

Mal was very prompt in all my replies and queries to him. He was also kind enough to allow me to place my luggage in the apartment before check in time.
The location of this apartment is good, some shops and eateries within 7 mins walk and the view of the beautiful beach is to die for. Apartment is a pretty run-down building but the interior of Mal's apartment is cozy.
After dropping our luggage, we left the apartment for cleaners to clean up the place.
When we check in officially after 4 pm, fresh bedsheets were provided. house was cleaned up. 
There were some leftover food in the fridge though, probably by guest before us. There were some baby roaches crawling around the kitchen stove/ cabinets. flooring was abit sandy and sticky. But I have to say the wind was really quite strong...hence the sandiness.

The kind size bed in the Bedroom & single bed outside is very comfortable.
I enjoyed reading my book, watching the clear blue sky and gorgeous view...plus the lovely breeze on the single bed or dining table. 
Overall, it's a lovely place to stay.

Mal was a great host. We arrived early. Mal was there to meet us. The communication was very easy through text messages and phone calls. He even helped us carrying a huge suitcase from ground floor to the third floor.
Great holiday staying right on the bondi beach!
Highly recommended!
Amazing place! Perfect location and very clean and modern place!

The place was great.  Mal was always  near the phone when I had any queries, and was amazing at accomodating unusual check in/out times.  I would definitely stay here again.  The bus is right outside the door and in only a 45 minute ride you are in the heart of the city.  Had a wonderful time.

We stayed at Mal's place right on Bondi Beach for four days and it was HUGE! For a family of four, it was really great because we could spread out. The kitchen was also great and had full sized appliances. The beds were dreamy and the location, if you like to be ocean front, was amazing. We rented a car which now in hindsight was only good for heading out to the zoo or back to the airport because parking around there was awful. And really, there was enough to do right around there so we barely used the car anyway. Mal came over and met us and showed us around the apartment a bit. He actually brought us bread, milk, butter and orange juice, which we were not expecting at all. Plus, he gave us a bit of history on the place, the neighborhood, and a bit on Sydney which was great. He was very friendly and we enjoyed talking with a local. Internet was good and there was a washer and dryer on the roof, too, which was convenient. Just get some coins for it. Highly recommend. I am thankful for AirBNB reviews bc we have stayed in some awesome places over our travels!
Awesome place right on the beach. very happy to recommend to others. Mal was easy to contact and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
Perfect location! Mal's cafe and dining suggestions are spot on !

The location is very convenient to the beach, cafes and the beautiful coastal walk.  The building itself is a little weather beaten and the entrance to the apartment a bit unkempt - we had to remove a box of garbage to go up the stairs.  The apartment is efficient and comfortable however the dishwasher was very hard to open and when I did it had dirty dishes inside and the linens were worn.

What an amazing spot! A great location, close to all that Bondi has to offer... I was hosting friends visiting from abroad and they'll now leave with some pretty special memories of this part of the world... 
Great communication from Mal made things simple and straight forward and he has plenty of local knowledge for first time visitors...
All in all a great stay...
Great stay. Really nice apartment right on bondi. Host very accommodating. Would recommend.
Very good
perfect apartement, really well situated. only problem with the dishwasher we didnt arrive to make it work.
Amazing location. Waking up facing Bondi was a great experience. Walking distance to public transport, shops, food and beach.

Great location right on Bondi Beach with spectacular views, only a short stroll the beach front shops. Mal made check in easy for us and was helpful with any questions that we had. The only downside is that there is no free parking available anywhere nearby and we had a vehicle.

We stayed in this apartment for 2 nights over a weekend and found the location excellent. The apartment has great views of the beach. It was well equipped, clean and comfortable.  The owner was very helpful and easy to work with. We would definitely recommend this apartment to other visitors.

Our family had an excellent weekend at Mals place. The apartment was in an excellent location, had an awesome view and was more spacious than the photos depicted. It was pretty chilly at night but there were extra blankets to pile on the beds and a heater in the living room. Would recommend staying and thought it was good value for our family :-)
It was a beautiful location, and provided us with everything we needed !

Mal was a pleasure to deal with as this was my first time booking a place using Airbnb. The place was exactly as the photographs show and is in a fantastic location. Cannot recommend Mal and this apartment any higher

I can vouch that the view is real and gorgeous! This apartment is in the perfect location, especially for surfers or aspiring surfers. Even in the winter, classes are offered. Transferring over the keys (the hardest part of airbnb in my opinion) was painless and Mal was easy to coordinate with. We enjoyed the Italian place he recommended and the burrito place down the street.  The cab app he recommended was a lifesaver for getting me to the airport without dropping a ton of money on an uber or lugging around my bags! On colder days, I highly recommend using the dehumidifier Mal provides, because the heater causes a bit of condensation. The second and third bed don't have much privacy, but would be great for families on a vacation.
Mel was a great host. Location was ideal and close to everything you'll need while at Bondi.

Mal is an attentive host and a friendly, warm guy. Before I arrived Mal sent a couple of recommendations for good local eats and was happy to help me figure out where to park a vehicle safely, without cost. When I arrived I was very glad for the tea and coffee Mal provided in the kitchen.

The photographs for the view and the apartment are accurate and the location is top notch. I stayed in the front room in a single bed and my Mum stayed in the bedroom. A little street noise wafts up at nighttime but nothing particularly late and nothing troublesome. Morning runs along Bondi beach and the Eastern Beaches headlands walk were amazing.

The building is older, although the apartment was renovated sometime in more recent years and perfectly comfortable. Heaters provided in each major room made Sydney's winter fine. There is no lift in the building, so it has walk-up stairs to the third floor. There is a roof terrace commanding fine, unobstructed views of the bay and Bondi beach. 

Definitely on my list to stay again.
在邦迪海滩结束了澳洲行,非常愉快,感谢Mal,房中的景色特别好,邦迪沿岸的行走更是令人叫绝,遗憾的是没有全部走完｡从这里去city也很方便,买张公交卡坐333,380直接去｡特别感谢的是Mal为我们延长了最后一天下午的停留时间｡这是一次非常棒的体验!

Mals place was amazing and Mal is an awesome host, very welcoming and willing to help. The apartment is in a ridiculous location and it is actually more impressive than the photos. If your going to stay in Bondi, always check if Mals is available, you will love it.

Mal was great to deal with and easily contactable.  He let us know about some of the local places to go to and had a booklet with some things to do in the local area available for us to look at.  The unit was fantastic and the view was amazing!  It was so close to Bondi Beach and we were able to walk to the shops and restaurants and there was public transport just across the road.  We would love to go back and stay another time!

We made a last minute booking and although Mal was out of town,  he responded quickly and gave clear direction on how to access the apartment. He was also flexible on check in and out times. The view is amazing, exactly as portrayed in the pictures. We didn't spend much time in the apartment but it is clean and has everything you need to enjoy your stay.  So much to do and great places within walking distance to eat and drink. Only warning would be for those with physical challenges- apartment is on the 3rd floor with no lift.

Our booking was last minute and Mal responded very quickly. He was not in town at the time, but we were able to access the apartment easily.
The views from the room are just as pictured – amazing! The location is perfect for a stay at Bondi…wish we could have stayed longer!
We didn’t spend a lot of time in the apartment, but it certainly has everything you need for a comfortable stay.
The apartment is absolutely fabulous, I highly recommend it. Mal is also helpful and responsive. I will  stay there next time I am in Sydney.

Fantastic location to truly experience Bondi.  
Apartment offered all needed, & the comforts wanted, by an adult, teen & child.

Very good. Mal delivered sheets & pillow cases to us at 8 o'clock at night (and a bottle of wine that evaporated very quickly) & remade the beds after his cleaner let him down on 2 separate occasions. We had a great chat and contact with Mal via AirBNB App or text was prompt & courteous. As a person who lives in and around the area Mal knows all the ins & outs & is very pleasant to deal with. Apartment is right across the road from the beach Bondi is a very funky area with a mix of both residents & tourists. It is a great place to just chill out & people watch or to get in amongst it. Each day you will see people surfing off the main beach from dawn to dusk. Many of you will know that the TV Show Bondi Rescue is shot down here in the Summer months. Great walk along the coastline also from Bondi to Coogee Beach (about 8 km). This takes you past the famous Icebergs Pool & Restaurant/Bar. The walk is well worth doing as is also eating & drinking afterwards at The Pavillon in Coogee (plenty of food options available & Gluten free meals as well - try the sashimi you won't regret it) Our daughter is gluten/lactose/MSG intolerant and we found all places that we ate at locally were able to cater for this. We ate at Raw Bar (my girls said best sushi they have had), Porch & Parlour (breakfast, coffee & dinner place - great tunes played the night we were there - White Stripes, SRV, etc.). Bondi Hardware (On Hall Street, shared plates/Tapas restaurant - good indie vibe & acid jazz being played when we we there) Aquabar Cafe (Next door to Porch & Overlooks Beach - good breakfast & great coffee) & Trio Cafe Bar locally. The Apartment itself is as you see it a 1 bedroom with 2 further beds available in the front room (1 bed slides out from under the other). Small bathroom but more than adequate & clean, has good water pressure & plenty of hot water for showers & great WiFi. Fridge in kitchen is excellent & heating in both bedroom & lounge also very good & simple to use. Easily caters for a family of 3 like us or 4 people using both beds in front room. Beds were good to sleep on (main bed is king size). Foxtel TV provided (basic package, so no sports, movies or some entertainment programs). Also DVD player & Sony sound dock that you can play your IPods/Phones through via Bluetooth. Buses available across the road which can get you to Bondi Junction & into the city. We used Uber extensively - X, Taxi & Black. Never had to wait more than 5 minutes for a pickup. Now for the fusspots, these comments didn't affect us nor detract from the great time we had, but some people can be more picky...
Fantastic location! Awesome view, would definitely recommend the unit for a nice weekend away.

Key was ready for us.  Book of information was provided and we were made to feel welcome.  The location is fabulous with great views straight across to Bondi Beach.  Bus stop outside the door.  We loved our experience of being so close to the beach and of staying in an old Bondi "flat".  Many thanks, Mal.

Loved staying here! The pictures of the house and view are completely accurate and it is a complete gem!

Can't wait for another weekend away.
Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt in einer typischen Beach Wohnung. Alles tip top. Nette Cafés in der Nähe, der Bondi Beach direkt vor der Türe. Genial. Thanks to Mal.
Easy access, close to everything and incredible veiw.

If you want to immerse yourself in the bondi beach vibe, this is the perfect apartment. The view is magical and you can be on the beach and in the water in less than 3 minutes! Mal was welcoming, generous and helpful. Thank you for a wonderful stay.

Mal was great- very helpful, lots of tips and quick to respond. The flat was just as you see in the photos, amazing location right opposite the beach and within easy walking distance of anything you could want to do in Bondi. The rooftop is the cherry on top and the perfect spot to kick back after a day on the beach. Everything worked, the place was clean and we loved it. Would definitely come back!
Amazing apartment in a prime location. Highly recommended.

This was an amazing apartment in a brilliant location. Just a stones throw from the beach, a supermarket and plenty of dining options all within a short walk. The apartment was lovely and spacious with everything you could need and more. Mal welcomed us, made sure we had everything we needed and told us about a great kids pool at the north end of the beach for our toddler. We'd love to come back and visit again one day.

Mal's apartment is incredible, such a wonderful spot. Mal was a great host, really accommodating and generous with his time. 

Highly recommended.
Mal was a great host. Everything was ready and available in the apartment. Mal was also accommodating when I stayed an extra day

Amazing appartment with a stunning view. The pictures on the profile are accurate, you cant stay much closer to the beach than this. 
The appartment is well equipped, spacious, clean and his free WIFI.
There is a bus stop just outside the door which makes it really easy to commute to the city and back. 
Though Bondi can be really busy at the weekends the appartment is not in the middle of the "party section" which gives you peace and quiet when needed. 
Mal was the perfect host who was always quick to reply via messages or App to any questions we had. It was even possible to have a later check out as we were flying out late. 
We had an amazing stay and couldnt have asked for more !! Highly recommended to anyone !!!

Mal was an excellent host, very friendly and on top of it with suggestions if we needed them. The place is clean and cozy but the best part is the view of the ocean and the easy accessibility to the best Bondi has to offer. We were there for two days, didn't have a car and didn't need one as the ocean, cafes, Bondi Icebergs and sea front walks are right at your footsteps!

A very convenient apartment, with Bondi beach literally steps away from the front door. Beautiful views! 

A word or warning: if you're driving parking is all metered at a rate of $7 an hour so it works out very expensive if you're not planning to drive around whilst you're staying. 

Mal was a great host and very accommodating - some great suggestions for dining and drinking in the local area. 

Wifi was very handy to look up places to visit. Would definitely recommend this place to others!

A beautiful home with an excellent view. Mal kept the place in perfect condition and our stay was a pleasure. Though we didn't catch him, he was easy to communicate with and I would recommend his place to anybody - one of the best spots in Sydney.

We stayed at Mal's apartment for 4 nights and were very happy there.  The view and access to Bondi Beach made the experience wonderful!  Access and communication with Mal were very easy.  He gave us lots of good advice on restaurants, local activities and night life.  We had a fantastic time and would stay there again.  Highly recommend!

Luxury location but not exactly luxury accommodation. This apartment has great space and potential and the owner is lovely, however it would benefit from new towels, bedding, windows that actually shut, a paint job and a plumbing upgrade. Advertised as luxury but be aware you are paying more for location which as mentioned is pretty fabulous. If location is primary concern than this is unbeatable.

Mal was very nice and arrived with some groceries and fresh flowers a few hours into my stay and also shared with me some favorite spots to visit in the neighborhood! 

Overall, a really nice place to stay - great location in North Bondi, easy check-in process, good communication leading up to the stay, and it felt very safe (for a solo woman). Mal was great with offering to let me check out later on Sunday if it was better for my flight schedule.

I would not describe the apartment as "luxury" as the post does, but it could be there with some minor improvements. I did love the natural light and high ceilings! 

The apartment building was quite loud many of the nights (thurs/fri/sat), but that's no fault to Mal of course, just the neighbors. They typically quieted down by around midnight or one - and it is Bondi after all - nothing that wasn't solved with a pair of earplugs.

Great overnight stay! Mal was very hospitable with excellent communication and was flexible with check-in/check-out times. Quaint space with lots of light and very comfortable. Thanks so much adding to a lovely weekend away!
Mal was very accommodating and super friendly. We had a fabulous time at his place!
Fantastic location, fantastic home, fantastic host.
Mal was fantastic and easy to communicate all logistics! He offered lots of suggestions of where to go nearby for food, drinks and local sites.  We had a wonderful time in AU!

Mal was a wonderful host and his properties are just as described.  He met us when we landed and gave us a nice orientation to the house as well as some information on how to get around and where to find groceries and restaurants.  The house was very clean and well stocked, and we had everything we needed.  If we had questions while we were there, Mal was always very responsive and helpful.  We would definitely recommend his properties.

The apartment is very centrally located (only a 2 minute walk to the beach and a 5 minute walk to the main shopping strip. Mal was extremely communicative, answering all our questions within minutes. The apartment is large enough to comfortably fit multiple guests and was well-equipped with everything we needed, especially kitchen utensils. Neighbours are a bit noisy and at the time of our stay there was no rooftop access, but otherwise we enjoyed our stay and would come here again.
Nice apartment, close to the beach and no problems at all with Mal. :)
Amazing location on the beach! Spacious apartment with plenty of sunlight and a beautiful view. Mal kept us up to date and was very responsive.
Amazing view! Great location

Amazing location & amazing host!
But not luxury, just reasonable.
Great Bondi peach pad. Literally steps to Beach and great restaurants/coffee/bars.

The apartment is in an amazing location with great views over Bondi. It was the perfect pad for my parents to stay in while visiting from the UK and they would love to sta there again. Mal was really responsive to all of our questions and great to deal with. Thanks Mal!
This place is in a great location, across the road from the beach. RSL and shops are only a short walk. If your after a view this is the place to stay.
If you want to wake up to the sound of the ocean, this is your spot
The apartment was in an excellent location with amazing views of Bondi beach. Mal was very helpful with our late check out request.
Great communication from start to finish. Amazing location right on Bondi. Certainly an enjoyable week.
What a great place. Cannot fault it. To top it off yhe views of Bondi Beach just across the road are amazing. Mal is a wonderful host who will make sure your stay is confortable
Stunning location.

Was an amazing little apartment for the weekend. Perfect views. The only thing was that the bathroom door was quite hard to shut and the fire alarm battery was dead which meant it kept beeping every so often. Would highly recommend this place. couldn't have been happier with it! Mal was great at communicating with me prior to arriving. Just need the leak on the ceiling to be fixed! :) Thanks again!!
Mal is a great host who responds to my text really fast. Overall, it's a good apartment very near to the beach.

Mal's place in Bondi was just perfect for our quick weekend getaway to a wedding in Bondi. We enjoyed all the benefits of the beachfront location with the comfort of a nearby clean, quiet and cosy space to escape back to.
Great location with a stunning view of North Bondi Beach. Close walk to an array  of restaurants and cafes. Also a market close by which was very convenient.
What an incredible location!!! The apartment is spacious and has everything you need. Comfortable bed. You can't beat the view!
Enjoyed our stay
Great place, in a great location across from the beach. The rooftop was great too.

Mal's apartment was great and he was a helpful and responsive host. The apartment was as described and right on the beach and public transport straight across the street. Close proximity to great bars and restaurants. We had a really wonderful time. I'd suggest if someone is sleeping in the sun room that you pack a sleeping mask as the street lights are a little bright. Would 100% recommend this place to stay. Will be back!

The location was perfect with amazing Bondi beach views. Mal is an attentive Host.
Good accommadation but not luxury.
A hole in ceiling that needed to be fixed with a bowl to catch the drips in the sunroom area and no wifi for our stay which was disappointing.
Great cafes, bars, outdoor entertainment.

Sensational weekend at the best end of bondi.  Great views, like having your own home right on the beach. Close to the best cafes, easy to park, easy to get around and Mal was so easy to communicate with.  Best weekend

A gorgeous apartment in the perfect location. Quiet and scenic, right on the beach, but just a minutes walk to all of great restaurants, cafes and shops that Bondi has to offer. Also super-handy to public transport which made it easy to explore wider Sydney from this location.

The appartment is very well located, close to Bondi, with an incredible view.
Mal is very welcoming and caring, providing all the information necessary, allowing our privacy, and very fast at responding, such a pleasure to have a host like this!  Thank you
The apartment is well located in Bondi with sensational views over the beach. Check in process was easy and Mal was easy to communicate with. No issue whatsoever and a very comfortable stay.

Mal's place in central Bondi was perfect. A great location, just over the road from the beach and close to cafes, restaurants and bars and a clean and comfortable top floor apartment with a great view. Highly recommend.

Really cute apartment. Mal was very responsive and kind, moreover the apartment is extremely well located. Great to live in it but not exactly up to the expectations for general maintenance of the house. There is a big mold stain caused by a leak in the roof and a pot on the floor to catch the drips. The windows could have been a bit cleaner and there were other signs of mold in a few spots.
Amazing location and view
We had such a wonderful time, Mal was very helpful, the apartment was so central and a stones throw to the beach.
Fantastic place to stay - amazing location - would definitely recommend
Fantastic location, beautiful unit! can't wait to come back!  thanks again
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great location , nice view !

This was the first time I had ever used air bnb. Overall the apartment was great. Location was perfect with great views of Bondi beach. It is on the third floor, so consider this if you have a lot of luggage. Apartment could have been a bit tidier, but I think the turnaround was a little rushed - I assume that for the most part things are all ship shape. Our host left us alone, which was fine but a check in text asking if everything was OK would have been appreciated and thoughtful.
Superb Bondi Location - you can‘t live closer to the beach than that. Great for a couple. Small caveat is that the appartment can get quite warm during the day.

Great location , nice sized unit and great host.We met Mal when we arrived and he was on hand to help with anything we needed..Perfect size for a couple or with 1 child. Will definitely stay there next time we are back in Sydney.

Mal’s communication is excellent, with replies coming back quickly. 
The view is fabulous.
