host.host_about: Brazilian expat living in Hong Kong for work

address.street: Hong Kong, Hung Hom Bay, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The place is true to its description. Very nice, clean, accessible and convenient. Located at the heart of  hung hom bay and near tst. Would definitely recomment his place for tourists alike.

We had a very enjoyable Christmas eve, we really like Dimas's apartment, the flat was perfectly clean, Dimas very friendly and helpful.
We are looking forward to staying there again.
The reservation was canceled 226 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had a great stay at Dimas's place. Everything is provided just as what the listing says. Great communication through the whole entire trip. Provided immediate assistance if needed. Prompt location and easy access to Hung Hom station and bus stop. Door guards by the entrance, so don't have to worry about safety issues.

Dimas' place is very nice. Very clean, roomy, and well decorated. It also has a nice view and access to a gym. He is very responsive and his helpers were very helpful. However, the apartment has poor wifi and cellphone reception so take note if those are important to you.

Overall great experience. Dimas is a good coordinator. Everything went smoothly. The house is very nice and super clean.  It is also  in a convenient location close to a major MTR/ train, and bus station. Nice view of  Victoria Harbor also. He has all the conveniences you would expect in a nice home.  I would definitely recommend.

I stayed with my family members for a short stay of 4 nights at the apartment. The host was friendly and the instruction given was very clear. The apartment is walking distance from the Hungham MTR station. Apartment was clean too and his helper waited for us at the taxi stand to bring us up to the apartment. Very comfortable place, not forgetting the awesome view too!

Than you Dimas for accepting us to stay at your apartment. It was fantastic experience. Every thing was great. Transportation was convenient, food from near by restaurants are delicious. Whenever we have questions Dimas always respond in timely manner. Definitely recommend Dimas' place to my friends.

Dimas's apartment is neat tidy, spacious.  Quiet environment.   Helper Juvy joyous n helpful.  We did not spend much time inside the apartment as we went shopping n enjoying local food surrounding.  Bus stop below apartment can take u to TST, yau ma teh, Mongkok bus 212 30x   Going to ferry terminal to Macau, 115 115P.

Dimas's flat is really cozy. I stayed there with my parents and they were quite happy with the place. Bus right under the apartment can go directly to central station, Tsim Sha Tsui, and the MTR station is about 10 mins walking distance. Everything is convenient and the restaurant nearby is delicious. Also thanks Juvy and Elaine helped us a lot^^ It was really a great experience in HK.
Dimas house is pretty good, clean and tidy environment is beautiful.Dimas particularly friendly, if go to Hong Kong agin, also want to stay here again

Really really enjoyed my stay at Dimas' apartment.
The pictures describe the apartment very well. 2 BR, very clean and spacious for HK. It was complete with all the necessary amenities and facilities for an actual stay. 
The arrival process was very smooth, with Dimas' helper meeting us at the lobby and guiding us to the apartment. 
Nothing to fault, highly recommend, and I would definitely come back.
The apartment is really great with a very beautiful sea view. And Dimas is a really nice and supportive guy. My girlfriend and I had a very good day in his apartment

Dimas's apartment very nice and clean. It's very comfortable to stay there. Dimas replied message very fast and his helper was friendly too. We had great stay in Dimas's apartment. Definitely will recommend to friends
It was a very wonderful experiences stay in his house . Clean and comfortable . Dimas is very nice and very helpful. I will definitely book his room again next time if I need to .

Apartment is absolutely amazing. Why?
- very clean, very nice, air-conditioned, modern and spacious
- excellent location for intensive exploration all parts of HK (and a trip to Macau)
- Everything is close - taxi, shops, restaurants, MTR, ferry, buses... 
- A21 Citybus from the airport take you to the Hung Hom Station and costs only 33 HKD. From there it is only 15 minutes walk to the apartment. 
- The view from the living room - awesome 

Dimas is a very good host, all the time we had a quick and good contact with him. It's a pity that we couldn't meet him personally, but he has a very nice and friendly helpers. We highly recommend this place. We spent a week there in 3 persons, it was very comfortable. If I could ever visit HK once more for sure I would stay in this apartment again. 

Jeszcze raz bardzo dziękujemy Dimas, pozdrowienia z Polski :)
숙소 설명이나 숙소 위치 모두 좋았고, 공항에서 숙소까지 찾아가는것도 어렵지 않았습니다. 대부분 침사추이 주변을 추천하는데 hunghom역에서 걸어서 10분이면 도착했던 이 숙소가 오히려 좋았던것 같습니다. 바다도 보이고 주변에 마트도 여러개있고 식당도 있어서 편리한 점이 많았네요.

The apartment is nice, clean and fully equipped. The kitchen has all equipment for cooking. The apartment has 2 bedrooms. It is exactly as on the photos. Nice view of HK Island from the window.

The arrival process was also very smooth.

The apartment has a good location, near the Hung Hom metro station (about 7 minutes by walk). Also there is a free shuttle bus to Hung Hom and Tsim Sha Tsui MTR stations. Bus and taxi stops also located near the building.

Gym, swimming pool and children playground located in the building and you can use them for free, however pool was closed for winter season (starting from November 1) during our stay. Also the small convenience store located in the building.

There are several supermarkets (middle size) with walking distance. 

Hung Hom promenade is located in 5 minutes by walk.

WiFi was fast and stable (however the signal is not strong in several areas of the apartment, but in the most places it was good and fast).

Dimas replied all messages very quickly and he was very helpful before and during our stay. Dimas is a very good and friendly host.

Dimas's house is really good. i stayed for 4 day. 
there is good place to go anywhere in HK. 
All of thing in the room are clear,perfect and comfortable. the night view what i saw in dimas's living room is also really good.

One of the best thing experienced in HK was Dimas's apartment. Dimas and his helper, Lina, are so friendly and can give you some good advises for your trip. The house is nice and clean with full equipment. Felt relax with Hong Kong island view in main side and pool view in another side. You just need two clothes in your luggage thanks to a washer :). Quite convenient to get Hung Hom MTR by 5-7 mins on foot, but you should ask Dimas the way from MTR to the building carefully in the first time. Taxi stand in the building is very useful for the group of 3-4 people from the airport to the building. A small issue is soundproofing of the apartment is not really good. Sometimes, you can hear sound from neighbor houses and lobby outside. However, it is not important. Last year, I discovered Hong Kong island and this time was Kowloon island. All were wonderful!
Its really good n cozy room...room condition also great..really great trip..thanks~~

Dimas is a very sweet owner, he left some candies and wine for christmas! His house is exactly what the photos look like, the view is good. There are many shops and dining places nearby. A convenient place.
Great apartment !
公寓很好,地理位置非常优越,房东很热心｡赞!
I stayed at Dimas's place for a few nights! Comfortable, clean, quiet and a great location!

My kids and I enjoyed staying at Dimas' apartment because it was clean, secured and quiet.  The view from the apartment window was fantastic!
Dimas' assistant was very patient, polite and kind and gave us good instruction to guide us to the apartment on the day we arrived Hong Kong.
The surrounding area was clean and it was handy to buses and taxi to Monk Kok, Causeway Bay, Times Square etc...
We will definitely recommend friends to stay at Dimas's apartment in future.

Great host, great place! Upon reaching the block where the apartment is located, it only takes Dimas helper, Juvy, less than 5 mins to meet and bring us to the apartment. Apartment is well kept and the host / helper is extremely helpful and reachable. Will return.

Thanks Dimas and Juvy for the memorable stay.

Dimas is a great host .. His apartment was like home to us in our 9 days stay. Check in and check out through his helpers was a Breeze. Juvy who stood in for Lina was extremely patient and helpful on my first day with questions on washing machine and dryer. Dimas was very prompt in replying to my requests and queries throughout my stay. 

Some tips.. Complimentary shuttle bus is available from the apartment to Hung Hom station and Tsim Sha Tsui and return. Access to complimentary shuttle only by room keycard. Strictly one card per person. 

Easiest way to get to the apartment is by Citybus A21 from airport to Hung Hom station HKG 33 followed by a short taxi ride to the apartment HKG22. Ask Dimas for the name of apartment in Chinese or Cantonese. 

There's a bus stop outside the apartment.. buses to Tsim Sha Tsui, Mong Kok, Yau Ma Tei, Star Ferry and Central. Unfortunately, the bus stop for the return leg is not directly opposite the apartment. 

Festival Walk is only 2 stations from Hung Hom station on East Rail line.. very convenient .. You would fall in love with this mega mall that's frequent by locals

There was someone there to meet us and explain how things worked, although it would have been helpful to have something in writing eg we never did fathom the aircon. However, the apartment was exactly as described and we found it comfortable, well-appointed and convenient. We thoroughly recommend it!
Our only suggestions for improvement are a second access key and making some storage space available for guests to put their clothes.

We were staying just two days in Dimas place. Excellent apartment, excellently located. Easy access to major sites in Hong Kong. Dimas proved to be a very helpful host, always timely responding with detailed and useful advises on transportation etc. Very much recommended.

Dimas had a really great little apartment in Hong Kong. It was a great launchpad for the three of us travelling, especially being so close to Hong Hum MTR station. Dimas was great at communicating with us about the apartment, and the arrangements for checking in and out were simple and straightforward. Definitely a competitive apartment, and at a really great price.

Dimas place is fantastic. The whole building is new. Not like many of those hk buildings which are old n look unhygienic. Totally True to the pic he had posted. We had 4pax. Just nice for all of us. We love the view of the hk island from the living room! 

Dimas has been a great help n shown lots of patience n kindness through the whole booking n staying process. He even left us chocs n a sweet welcome note when we arrived.

Original check in time was 3pm. But the helper who was cleaning up the apt at that moment told us it's alright to come over to drop off the luggage at 1pm since the previous guest left at 11am. We were delighted as we arrived hk at 7am. By the time we reached the place at 1245pm, she told us she had cleaned up the place n we can stay n use it. : ) 

Fantastic service by the host. 10/10!

Dimas is very nice, he explains everything detaily. 
The house is exactly the same as description. 
Highly Recommend!

The flat is located very near to HH Promenade and TST via shuttle bus. After TST tour, we just walked along promenade to the flat.
Furthermore, security is safe, near mini mart (little bit more expensive), cool seaview and comfortable beds.
If my family visit HK again, we hope to stay here again.
地点环境不错,楼下就有的士,巴士站和接驳车不然就算步行到地铁也不算远,走五到十分钟就有超市,餐厅等,还能算便利的,屋子有种回到家的感觉

This space was great for staying in the Kowloon area. There is a covered walkway to the hung him station very close which made travel on the area extremely easy. The actual space is small by American home standards but more than enough when compared with either US hotels or most Asian homes. Very clean and the staff in the hotel were extremely kind. Dumas had everything in place. The space is safe for small kids (covered outlets etc.) but be careful and intentional if your kid is as active as ours. To be honest after several days of travel in multiple countries, Dimas' place was a breath of relaxation.
The host canceled this reservation 62 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This stay was better than I could have imagined for my first trip to HK. The apartment was very clean and had a great view of the passing ships. I highly recommend staying here as an option if you don't mind taking a taxi or ferry to get around, and if you like a quiet setting.
정확하고 쉽게 찾을 수 있었씁니다.

Very good apartments with seaview,clean and comfortable ,downstairs have small shop,subway is very close! I will recommend this apartment to my friend! Price is also very good,thAnk you so much Dimas!

Dimas' place is fantastic, extremely clean and well organized. The only tiny struggle we went through was that the helper of Dimas told us the next guest is checking in at 12pm so she's wondering if we can check out before the original check out time, that made us feeling a little bit uncomfortable. Also if you plan to stay in HK without traveling with your luggage, you're gonna have to pay extra at the train station to put your luggage there for a while. Dimas' place doesn't provide the luggage service. But all in all Dimas' place is my best Airbnb experience so far!

숙소는 깨끗하고 아늑하고 너무 좋았어요! 사진이랑 똑같았고 에어컨도 방마다 있어서 정말 좋았어요! 뷰도 좋고 디마스와 리나 역시 우리에게 매우 친절했어요! 하지만 침사추이로가는 무료셔틀버스와 수영장은 카드 하나로 한사람만 이용할 수 있기때문에 우린 이용할 수 없었어요. 그점이 매우 아쉽네요. 하지만 가격도 싸고 집도 너무 좋아서 홍콩여행 내내 아주 행복했습니다!!

Dimas' apartment makes us feel like home. It's very comfortable, well equipped and economical!. You can enjoy the great seaview and the amazing swimming pool from the house. I will highly recommend Dimas' apartment.

Although we never met Dimas in person, the house actually speaks a lot of him. A rotary member, father of  a lovely girl, marathoner. The house is extremely tidy and clean, exuberant of uplifting spirit. The swimming pool is perfectly located to have a great view of the harbor and provides long hours in the shadow both morning and afternoon, which is really nice considering the scorching sun.

The house is extremely clean and tidy. Everything is perfect in this house. The assistant of Dimas, decoration, sea view are perfect. I will stay at Dimas' s place if I visit Hong Kong next time. Highly recommended. Thank you Dimas!

Everything in Dimas apartment was as He described in offer. Great neigborhood, nice and very clean apartment, easy communication with owner. I would recommend this place for anyone who want to stay in Hong Kong.
Thanks to You our stay in Hong Kong was great, comfortable and we will remember this city for a long time!
非常完美的房子,设备一应俱全,和照片没有区别,很好 (Website hidden by Airbnb) Airbnb全球房源代订,总价85折优惠,详细报价请咨询 q..q  477263

깔끔하고 전망이 되게좋다. 식기가준비되어있어 직접요리를 해먹을수도있고 근처 슈퍼마켓과도가깝고 지하철역과도 가까워 자유여행을하기에 만족스러운 숙소였다.
 수영장을이용하기위해선 1인당 열쇠가1개필요한데 열쇠가 부족한게조금아쉽다.

Dimas' place was as expected, clean, tidy and comfortable. Very convenient with MTR, bus stops and taxis close by. Dimas and his helper provided clear communication all the way, they were very helpful hosts indeed! Highly recommend this place!
We are very happy and glad to choose Dimas' apartment for our short stay in Hong Kong.  The apartment is clean and his helper is helpful too.  We surely recommend his place to even our friends.
It was my first experience to stay at Airbnb accommodation. The apartment is clean and comfortable,   and the location is easy to access downtown of Hong Kong. Last week I had a relaxing weekend!
Buen barrio, excelente departamento y Dimas fue muy accesible.

El departamento es realmente muy cómodo, bien ubicado, limpio y esta totalmente equipado. Dimas fue muy atento y rápido en responder.
Las fotos no reflejan lo bueno que es.
Totalmente recomendado

Dimas's place was great, the helper was very nice also. Nothing to complain really!!
Definitely will stay there again next time visiting Hong Kong.
房间很干净,客厅的窗户可以看到海,位置非常方便,助理丽娜也非常友善｡第一次找具体位置由于语言不通有点慢,但最终还是找到了｡
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

숙소키로 침사추이까지 무료 셔틀을 탈 수있어서 정말 좋았습니다
방마다 에어컨이 있고, 깨끗합니다
good

Very good view from the apartment, to see the 炮台山, And clean as well, just one thing, if possible to have some chopsticks in the kitchen.
BTW, the host is very handsome(see from the photo in the room).
靠近红磡,高端住宅~
The flat is definitely the same with the pictures. Lina is very nice and helpful. My families liked the flat very much! You shouldn't miss this one if you travel in hk with friends or families!
Convenient, comfortable, with grade.
Great accommodation and everything was depicted as on the website. Will definitely consider this place again if we visit Hong Kong in the future.
非常惊喜的房间,下次再来香港会作为首选｡距离红磡站步行10分钟｡广九直通车,地铁,往罗湖口岸的车这里都有,有点闹中取静的味道｡客厅一扇窗正对维港,在香港这样寸土寸金的地方感觉很奢侈啦｡房间里有很多主人生活的痕迹,照片､奖牌､还有宝宝玩具,感觉像回家一样亲切｡遗憾的是,之前没做好功课,花车巡游,烟花都没看到,而且最后发现最佳观赏点就在距离房间步行几分钟路程的尖沙咀海滨公园｡
非常好的体验!房间很干净,也很安静｡房间与家人一起住也不显得太挤｡窗外风景漂亮｡
靠近红磡体育馆,如果是看演唱会后步行就可以达到公寓,比较方便｡
Good house. Clean and comfort.
房间真的很好,很干净｡
跟朋友们住得非常舒服 很温馨 跟住自己家一样 房东的客厅墙上挂好多长跑比赛的各种奖牌 房东就是我最崇拜的那类优秀的运动好先生 如果下次再过去还会继续住你家!
Lovely apartment and good location for foodie

Dimas's place was an extremely nice, clean apartment with two small bedrooms, a nice bathroom, living room, and kitchen. Everything about the apartment itself is very nice. On the other hand, the location is not great. Luckily I've stayed in Hong Kong for a few months and know my way around, as the location is definitely not good. It takes at least 10 minutes to walk to the MTR and then at least a 10-20 minute ride to be anywhere in HK with things to do. Additionally, we were only given one key card, so when we tried to use the pool, they would only let one of us in--obviously we didn't go. Overall, it's a great place; however, know that it's not centrally located and you'll need to get additional keys if you all want to use the apartment building's amenities.
Super appartement, très bien placé et equipé.
Great place. Three of us stayed in this two bedroom apartment. The building is actually a hotel and private apartments. Great view from the window.
房间非常干净整洁,厨房设施一应俱全,环境景色非常好,位置虽然市中心但稍微有点绕,不过房东的指路指南非常非常详细,性价比很高!
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The apartment is very clean and has pool, sightseeing is beautiful
房间很好,清洁整齐!

由于天气原因所以飞机取消
但房东人非常好积极配合我取消了订单
房东真的人超级好下次去香港还会订这家!
超级棒的房源    客厅对面就可以看见维港     住宅干净且舒适     下次来香港还会再定Dima s 的这家旅店噢
特别棒,卫生干净,环境非常棒,夜晚安静,房东很贴心什么都备有,交通也很方便,红磡附近也有很多好吃的店,离维多利亚港也不远,非常的满意,就像住在家里一样,很温暖｡下一次还要预定｡

This is a great place. It's in a convenient location with restaurants nearby, but it's not central. Closest station is about 10 minutes walk away. It's a well managed community. The room is very clean and nice and comes with a kitchen. It's perfect for 3 people or fewer, but it could fit a 4th one on the sofa. The sofa is pretty small, though, so sleeping on the sofa is defiantly not going to be very comfortable. Using the room key you can use the facilities like the pool. There is also free shuttle to TST and Hung Hom stations (which requires room key to use), which is convenient.
房子在红磡体育馆附近,下机坐大巴A21  房间比图片看的还要舒服,真的超级漂亮､干净和贴心,住的真的很舒适!!对了这里还有公共游泳池,每天早上都有外国美女在游泳｡楼下就有公交站,去油尖旺都有巴士,逛超市､吃早茶走大概一公里不到就有｡下次有机会去香港还会住这里.超赞.
如果有大件行李的话从机场打车过去比较方便,离地铁站10分钟的步行距离出行方便｡房间设施齐全,可以安心使用｡

숙소가 호텔같은 분위기로 고급스럽고 청결했으며, 전망도 좋았음, 단지, 카드가 1장밖에 없어서 호텔처럼 수영장, 셔틀버스 등을 이용 할 수 없었습니다. 인원수대로 줄 수 없냐고 여러번 질의하였으나, 집주인용과 손님용 딱 2장을 가지고 있다고 하였습니다. 조금 아쉬운점이죠.. 나머지부분은 완벽했습니다. 적극 추천합니다. 여러분들이 이용 할 수 있었으면 좋겠습니다.
Very good
Dimas' apartment is very nice. good location, sea view, comfortable, it is just my favour.
在香港那寸土寸金的地方,能订到这样的民宿,哇,喜欢的不得了!离红磡体育馆很近,离地铁站也很近｡吃喝玩乐都很方便｡晚上看完演唱会走回家,舒服极了｡下次再来香港,即便是不看演唱会,也要订这里｡

美好的家庭旅游中,我对于住宿的要求相当高也是研究和准备时间最长的,倒是餐饮和娱乐都可以随遇而安｡Dimas的房子,位置相当棒,到黄浦和红勘地铁站步行都在10分钟之内,三公里触达尖沙咀商业街和码头,周边的配套设施齐全,有24小时超市,中餐西餐日料比比皆是｡晚上在窗边也能看到维多利亚港夜景的一隅｡值得推荐的是,房屋里设施一应俱全,做饭只需要食材,洗衣机带烘干,可以考虑不用带那么多衣服的｡太多感受了,不一一叙述,有缘人会感受到Dimas屋子给香港之旅带来的快乐和舒心,如果还有机会香港旅游,我还会住这里｡
The room was very tidy and clean, and the location was quite good. We were happy to live there for two days. Highly recommended!
My dream house in the future! I lived nearby for one year, but it is the first time to live in Harbourview Horizon. The house is really nice and suitable for 3-4 people. Sharelle gave us many help.
房子很好,很干净,在海景酒店的楼上,可以看到海边,住起来也比较自在,很棒,下次去还会预定!
我是带父母旅行,有家的感觉,小区环境优美,到海边很方便｡
挺好哒,大家可以住这家哦
A nice place to stay in Hongkong.

地理位置很好哦 距离理工大学很近 走去维港也不远呢 ~附近超市餐饮一应俱全 有免费的车到尖沙咀 但一张房卡只可一人使用 不过打车过去也不远 大概30多港币 到机场大概300左右 
房间里设施比较齐全 不过没有牙刷牙膏和抽纸巾这类用品 
房东应该也是会住在这里的 个人物品蛮多的 房间有全家福照片 很温馨 有各地极限运动的照片 还有满墙的马拉松奖牌 健身器材 电子琴 乐高等 全方面发展的帅哥一枚 
助手也相当友善 有时间观念 
缺点就是他们都不会中文 哈哈 我的英文又不好 好尴尬
The host is very nice and respond so quick . The room is clean and easy to find. Will come to stay again next time.

Very nice apartment and owner! Have all necessary facilities, Convenient transportation to Whampoa, Tsim Sha Tsui, KCR & MTR station is several minutes walk, and so many restaurants and supper market nearby.
房間與圖片一樣,時尚簡潔,今次與親友一起入住,會推薦給其他朋友｡
Nice view and clean
Convenient location with easy access to public transport and shops, clean apartment, check-in was good and easy. I recommend this apartment!
Nice view from the living room window!

The place was clean and as described. The place was close to MTR station.

Would recommend the place for sure.
Great place to stay.  Nice harbor view from seating room & good location.  Only problem that we can hear talking & baby crying from next doors at night; otherwise, very quiet in the area.
我们是一家人入住的,房子很整洁干净,交通也方便快捷,是一次很棒的体验｡
地理位置 环境 设施都没得挑,性价比很高,推荐~
很棒的房東和房間,地點有很多bus或地鐵站也很近
So tidy and clean, besides, location near the hungkom station about 5-8minutes,and bus station is downstairs. It's value to stay
hung hom역 앞에 위치하여 편리하고 숙소는 매우 깨끗함 바퀴벌레 하나 없는 매우 깔끔하고 안전한 집임. 뷰가 너무 좋다.4명이서 정말 좋은 집. 깔끔떠는 한국인이 추천하는 굿집. 다음에 또 온다면 재방문 의사 있음. 매니저도 매우 친절. 알라뷰 쏘 홍콩♡

非常棒的住宿体验!公寓非常温馨舒适,有环境有海景~可以看到维港夜景~楼下有泳池,酒店里也有健身室,附近有港铁红磡站和黄埔站,也有百佳和很多餐厅,一应俱全,应该都是5~10分钟的步行距离~Sharelle跟我的前期交流也非常耐心,我们英文不怎么好也非常耐心交流,当天还没有吃饭就过来帮我们check in,第二天check out的时候还送给小孩礼物｡很感动!还在公寓内看到帅气房东非常多马拉松比赛奖牌,和很多玩极限运动的相片,我们都非常敬佩,是我学习的对象!以后来香港有机会还会选择这个体验感最棒的公寓
The house was same as the picture. Public transport easy to access. Restaurant and convenient store just walking distance.
小巧精致且舒适的海景公寓,设施齐全,家庭旅行及商务出行皆宜｡
如果不会英文沟通起来会比较困难､但房子确实漂亮､景色也好､坐车很方便
由于访港的目的大不同,这次主要是带家人走户外活动及逛街,所以时间大部分在户外,跟其他国家的休闲度假不同｡因此宅在这里的时间很短,厨房基本不使用｡而这里空间已超出同等价位的酒店了,孩子们还能在客厅玩,连主人放置的LEGO玩具都拼了起来,当然离开前已原封不动放好了｡主人日常的生活痕迹随处可见,这是一般国内B&B很少的,good晒啦!
Великолепные апартаменты Все как в описании. Очень уютно и чисто. Расположение идеально, особенно для гостей из Гуанчжоу.
홍콩에서 두번째 숙소 였는데 최고 였습니다. 조용하고 시설 깨끗하고 근처에 산책로도 있어서 좋았습니다.
The host canceled this reservation 41 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

While we (there was three of us) only stayed at Dimas' for two nights, it was long enough to gain a positive experience. Dimas' apartment is modern, clean, with all its amenities available to the guests and offers a pretty view on the Island. I am a big guy but found the single bed in the smaller bedroom (which has its own desk) very comfortable.

Dimas and his helper were easy to communicate with and to schedule the pick-up & return of the key.

The pool is nice, too!

Will definitely consider staying there next time I am in HK.

완전 맘에 들었어요 
깨끗하고 전망좋고 숙소내의 편의 시설 (레인지, 세탁기, ....) 이용해서 좋았습니다.
정신없이 돌아다니던 하루를 편하게 정리 할 수 있는 숙소 입니다.
1층에 상점이 있어서 간단한 식음료 구입 가능하고
5분쯩 걸어서 1블럭 걸어나가면 24시간 오픈 대형슈퍼도 있고 식당도 많아서 포장해다 숙소에서 먹으면 됩니다.
( 벤츠 전시장이나 졸리비 검색 하면됩니다.)
졸리비도 있고 딤딤섬도 있고 베이커리도 있고 대현 슈퍼에는 한국 식품도 꽤 다양하게 많이 있어요 
숙소가 있는 블럭은 완전 조용하고 깨끗한 마을이고 1블럭 건너가면 완전 다른 분위기의 홍콩마을을 경험해 볼 수 있습니다.
홍콩은 택시비도 그 다지 비싸지 않아서 MTR 사용도 좋지만 택시 타고 이동하는 것도 추전합니다. 저희는 MTR로 이용하려 계획했다가 어린 아이가 있어서 택시타고 다녔어요, 로비에 내려오면 택시가 항상 대기하고 있고 돌아오면 출입구 앞에서 바로 내려서 숙소로 가니 정말 편하고 좋습니다.
저희 가족 완전히 맘에 들었고 다음에 홍콩에 온다면 몇번이고 다시 올 숙소 입니다.

It was the best !! Cannot ask more. Swimming pool , gym , sauna  and harbor view . Free shuttle to Tsim Sa Tsui . Walking distance have 24hours open supermarket . Dimas is very energetic and warm hearted person . You will find all his medals and pictures inspire you. Highly recommend !

I’d like to say helper Sharelle is very helpful.The room is clean and well equipment. Good location with sea view from living room. Restaurant and shops is very near here. Five minutes walking to MTR.
good
so good!
Nice room, good view and location. Good trip with my friends, thanks Dimas and Sherelle.
집 깨끗하고 뷰도 멋졌습니다. 침구류가 좋아서 푹 잤습니다.
Amazing place with tons of amenities. I can say the place is better than staying at any 3-4 star hotel. Walk to hung hom station is less than 10 minutes.
一間很乾淨很舒服的住房
The view of the hostel was really really  nice!! Cozy and comforatable!!
非常棒的住房体验,如果下次还有机会入住,一定要去游泳池游泳!
really good apartment in hongkong

Simply amazing place! My friends and I couldn't believe that we could book such a place in Hong Kong. It was spacious and clean. Walking distance from the Hung Hom or Whampoa MTR station. Comes with a view of the Hong Kong Island. Friendly and accommodating host and helper.  Over-all, a great great find! :)
非常非常好的民宿 风景美丽 设施齐全 出行方便 楼下就是公交巴士站 离地铁站也不远 在香港绝对是超高性价比了

Dimas's apartment was great. Sharelle was very helpful too. We enjoyed our stay of 12 days there. It was close to all transport and very safe. We would happily recommend it our friends in future. Thank you !

침사추이 지역이랑 가깝지만 걸어다닐 정도는 아니에요! 대신 4명이상 여행객이라 주로 택시 이용하신다면 완전 추천합니다!! 
에어비앤비라서 약간 홍콩에 많은 그런 작은 집들 중 하나이려나 싶었는데, 약간 한국으로 따지면 롯데캐슬에 1인용 오피스텔이 있다면 이런 느낌일까 싶은 건물이었어요! 
뷰도 하버뷰라 너무너무 좋고 11층이라 높이도 적당하고, 따뜻한물 잘 나오고 더우면 에어컨 틀고, 그리고 숙소 근처에 약간 동네 상점 밀집지역? 같은게 있고 딤딤섬이 있어요! 딤딤섬 진짜 대 핵 꿀맛이고 거기서 파는 길거리 음식 다 맛있었어요! 슈퍼도 가깝고 침사추이랑도 가깝지만 바글거리지 않고 조용한 동네였다는!! 4인팟 완전 추천합니다!!! 
(대신 신발 신고 다니는 집 형태라서 슬리퍼 하나씩 들고가시기를 추천해요!!)

装修紧凑温馨!非常不错 和sharelle交流也很愉快 
唯一就是如果4人入住需要有一个睡沙发 除此之外是完美的体验

친구 4명이 매우 저렴하게 깨끗한 숙소를 이용 했네요. 
샴푸,린스,바디워시,물비누, 수건,드라이기 등이 갖춰져 있습니다. 
역에서 가까워서 여러명이 있으면 택시를 이용해도 될꺼 같아요.
역에서 찾아갈때 메트로 쇼핑몰 들어가서 오른쪽 대각선으로 보면 커피숍이 보입니다
거길 지나서 웨딩홀 지나서 에스컬레이트를 두번 내려가서 나가시면 됩니다. 
저희가 헷갈렸던 부분입니다.
그리고 신발을 신고 들어 가므로 슬리퍼를 가져가지면 매우 편할것입니다. 
샤워하고 다시 신발을 신으니 찝찝 하더군요.  
그리고 근처에 ParknSHOP 이라는 슈퍼마켓이 있습니다. 숙소 옆에 학교 앞에 신호등을 건너서 쭉 직진하시면 됩니다 그 근처에는 식당도 있는데 이용은 안해봤네요. 
저는 대만족입니다. ^^
너무 좋아요 강추합니다!
入住了三个晚上,除了浴缸堵塞导致其中一天未能洗澡外,其他都很好,sharelle一直在积极协调,非常负责和认真,房子是海景房,景色很好,房间也非常干净,还有洗衣烘干一体机,真的非常方便,愉快的体验!
Wonderful place, i will book it next time.
It's only a 10-minute walk away. It has one living room and two bedrooms. It has a kitchen and a view of the sea,The landlord is a sports enthusiast, very friendly, will come again next time

summary: Sunny, spacious and clean room on a quiet street which offers a doorman service for nearby shopping. Centrally located flat 3 minutes walking distance to Kabatas ferry, funicular to Taksim Square, metro and tram lines.

Walkable distance to Central Park. 4th floor apartment in quiet building. The neighborhood is very safe. Close to a bunch of NYC museums.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: We had a great experience at Sara's place. The studio is surprisingly very quiet and had all we needed to enjoy the city. Sara was a great host! She promptly returned email and calls, and was very accommodating to give and receive keys! An overall great experience

Sara's place was great! She was very prompt in her communications with us, and we were very happy with how everything went. The apartment is very clean and conveniently located close to Central Park. Thank you Sara!

Sara was very prompt and accommodating in her correspondence - before booking and during our stay. The apartment is located conveniently, the subway and Central Park is only a 10 minute walk and lots of eating options nearby. We loved the apartment, it was very clean and well maintained. Would be happy to book this place again the next time I visit NYC.

Sara's apartment was absolutely LOVELY. Clean, spacious and very cozy. Sara was very easy to reach and VERY helpful.  We had a GREAT experience at Sara's apartment. Definitely would recommend her to others.
Sara's place is extremly nice and clean. Sara was also very easy to reach and helpful. We had a great stay there.

Here is a breakdown of my experience at Sara's apartment-

The apartment: CLEAN! If you are a neat freak (like me) then this is important.  I've had a couple of airbnb experiences before where hosts didn't provide fresh sheets (yes, really) but this wasn't a problem here.  The apartment comes fully stocked with all the linens and toiletries you will ever need.  The place is studio, but it's decorated so nicely and organized in a manner that makes it seem a lot bigger than it really is.  The room is on the fourth floor of a building with no elevator, so keep that in mind when packing.  The stairs were a bit annoying at first, but I actually preferred it to staying on a lower floor having to hear people walk by. 

Location: Lots to eat.  SO many restaurants.  If you're a wino, you're in the right neighborhood.  Even though you're on the UES, this neighborhood is super cozy.  Also, walking distance to the subway, which provides a straight shot to downtown.

Host: Extremely helpful.  Never met her in person, but she arranged a very easy key pick-up.  Every time I had a problem, Sara was prompt to respond and helped very quickly.  She also provided a packet of information on good restaurants nearby and instructions on navigating public transportation.  Who does that?? It was super helpful, and was a really nice touch to the stay. 

Overall: I strongly recommend this place.  Sara was a great host and I would definitely stay here again.

Had a great couple of nights at Sara's place. Sara was easy to communicate with and kindly left information about the area, and a bottle of wine. The apartment was clean and quiet and well heated. 
Would stay here again. Thanks, Sara

Sara was a fantastic host!!  She was extremely easy and pleasant to work with in regards to getting the key, getting responses to questions, etc. She met me at the apartment and even carried my suitcase up the stairs for me!   Along with a list of instructions, she leaves you recommendations for restaurants and other things in the area.  The apartment is on the UES and is EXTREMELY convenient for all transportation and getting around the city.  This will be my new go-to place to stay when visiting my daughter in NYC!!

We had a great time staying at Sara's place. It was very clean, spacious for a NYC studio and near some great bars and restaurants. During our stay we could easily travel to the Village, SOHO and Brooklyn using the metro. There are also some great shops in the neighborhood too.

Sara was a great host and had everything we needed ready for us. She was very accommodating and quick with her responses. We could not have stayed in a better place.

Sara was warm and welcoming. She was there to greet us at the apartment, and happy to answer all of our questions. Without prompting her, she provided us with plenty of tips about local restaurants, entertainment, and other handy geography. The apartment was spotless, roomy and in a lovely building and neighbourhood. We felt safe and welcome! We would highly recommend her space to anyone staying in New York City. Easy access from the subway and bus routes. And a lovely walk to Central Park!

Perfect location on the Upper East side: close to the subway and a number of great restaurants and bars, not to mention Central Park and the Met! Sara was a great host and stayed "on-call" even though traffic gave us a late arrival. The apartment was lovely and Sara provided clean towels - even tiny shampoo, conditioner and toothpaste. We also food a bottle of red wine on the coffee table, along with helpful info and maps to help us get acquainted with the area. Thank you Sara!

Staying at Sara's place in the Upper east side was amazing! Everything was exactly as she described, the apartment was clean, beautiful, comfortable and in an amazing location. Sara was a perfect host- she was responsive, very helpful and accommodating with any questions we had and was lovely to deal with. When we arrived, we had all the information and instructions needed typed out for us with helpful maps and transit information printed, as well as suggestions for local restaurants and grocery stores. She left a beautiful bottle of wine for us to enjoy and luxurious linens, towels and soaps. 
The neighbourhood was perfect and family friendly, easy walking distance to Central Park, the subway and the Met. The apartment was quiet and very comfortable, with great A/C despite the heat wave outside. We would definitely recommend Sara's place for any guests and we would stay there again if visiting NYC.

Sara was very flexible with our check-in and check-out times. Really worked to help us out. Thanks Sara! She met with us to give us the keys and left a writeup of details associated with the unit (and a bottle of wine!) The apartment is on the 4th floor with no elevator, but that didn't matter to us. The apartment was great: clean, tidy, surprisingly spacious, and in good repair. There's even a laundry option if necessary. Kitchen looked well stocked, but we didn't use it. We kept the AC on 24/7 and that kept the room at a very comfortable temperature from typical NYC summer heat and humidity. No doorman, but the area seemed very safe and the downstairs door was secure.

The location of the apartment is excellent. A short (~7 minute) walk to the 4, 5 and 6 trains which connect to pretty much everything. Lots of restaurants, pubs and bars in the area. A few blocks to central park. Typical New York street parking (aka nonexistent!) But garages everywhere! Also easy to get on the FDR freeway.

In short, everything as listed (or above and beyond!).

Thanks Sara!
Our stay was excellent! The apartment was exactly as advertised - great location and VERY clean!

Sara's place was clean and charming, had everything we needed. The apartment was in a convenient spot for us, with the subway only within a 5 minute walk. The only downside was that it was a four floor walk up without an elevator. Sara herself was a great host - meeting us, assisted us with bags, and provided a personalized packet with neighborhood info and suggestions. To top all that off, she welcomed us with a bottle of wine; just super nice. Overall, great place and great host!

Hôte sympathique et accueillant , Sara nous avait attendu jusqu'à tard dans la soirée (23h) . Elle nous a mis immédiatement à l'aise , tout en nous faisant ressentir d'être chez nous . L'appartement est exactement comme sur les photos . C'est un charmant petit studio, très bien aménagé et très propre , ordonné . Tout était préparé par Sara pour passer un excellent séjour . Ustensiles et certains aliments tels que le café était déjà disponible par notre hôte. Les instructions rédigées sous forme d'un dossier , très détaillés comprenant l'ensemble des fonctions et rangements de la maison , ainsi que les restaurants et commerces à proximité. Elle met également à disponibilité une carte des réseaux de transport. Tout au long du séjour elle resta disponible par tous les moyens de communications et à la moindre question .
En ce qui concerne le quartier , calme et bien fréquenté , avec la présence de plusieurs restaurants et boutiques pour faire ses courses . L'arrêt de bus est à moins de 100m , tandis et le métro à moins de 10mn de marche , ce qui pour une ville grande comme New York relativement proche . Vous avez également accès en 15mn à Central-Park.
En résumé Sara fût une " excellente " hôte à notre égard. Son appartement est un mix de charme , de tranquillité et de vie purement New-yorkaise. C'est la location parfaite pour un premier séjour dans la ville qui ne dort jamais . Un très grand merci à elle , je n'hésiterai pas à repartir en cas de nouveau séjour à NYC .

Sara was very welcoming and friendly. She had a helpful welcome packet with restaurants and transportation options ready for us. She even provided a bottle of wine to celebrate our parents day out which was very thoughtful. She met us on a lunch break for the key drop off and offered to be available by text for assistance.

Her apartment was everything we needed, perfect for two people. It was very clean and comfortable. It's about 4 blocks to a metro station, a 10 min walk to central park, and has restaurants galore right outside the door. We were in and out throughout the day and evening and the neighborhood always felt perfectly safe. The 4 flights of stairs paled in comparison to the miles of walking we did in the city. This place is a great location if you're visiting museum mile.

Thanks Sara for hosting us.

Sara's place was just what we were looking for. Cozy, great A/C, quiet, comfortable, good, water pressure, nice TV, etc. A short walk to Central Park, some nice restaurants and brunch spots nearby. A bottle of wine and little toiletries was a nice touch. Recommended.

Sara was very flexible juggling work and life and fitting us in to check into her place. The description is accurate, nothing we thought the place needed. Some tips for other travelers, but mostly for people who are not used to walking. This is on the 4th floor and to get where most will be going is up a gradual hill. We had no problem with this but after a few days you start wondering if that one thing in your car is really worth it. Our friends we met up with were tired of walking everywhere, but that is what we do when we are in the city. The neighborhood is nice. Anything you really need is within a 10 minute walk if not right around the corner. We found a great french pizza place, Vietnamese, diner and papya king within a short distance. On a personal note, it is close enough to central park that if you are a runner, by the time you get to the park, your legs are loose and ready to go. I loved that the park had a dirt path around it. As a trail runner, this was the surprise of the trip. Liz's description of the area is that It's a nice neighborhood that you could get lost in for days and not experience it all. The only thing that will make us look elsewhere next time in the city would be if we are going to be centrally located in a different area. One more thing I forgot to mention was that this was my 1st experience driving into the city. Since her place is far enough away from downtown, you can go over the Washington bridge and sneak into the FDR highway and not have to deal with as much traffic.

Sara was a fantastic host! I was flying in late so she left the keys at a nearby deli for me to pick up. When I arrived at the apartment, she had left me a package of information listing nearby restaurants and subway stations and anything else I would need to know, along with a bottle of wine (so sweet!). The apartment was extremely neat and clean and plenty big enough for the time I spent there. The neighbourhood was lovely with lots of great restaurants and close to Central Park. Overall I had a wonderful experience and would definitely stay here again.

Sara was a great host! She was very easy to communicate with and she made great efforts to accommodate our needs, especially when we got stuck in terrible traffic on our way to the apartment. 

The apartment is lovely; it is clean and just as shown in the pictures. Sara left us useful tips and instructions along with a bottle of wine :). The location is great: Central Park, many restaurants and the train  station are all within walking distance.  

Loved our stay there and would not hesitate to go back.
Thank you Sara!

My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Sara’s studio apartment on the Upper East Side.   The apartment was attractive, clean,and comfortable.   It was equipped with quality furniture, bedding and kitchen utensils.  There was a large, high-def TV with many cable channels, and the capability of easy Net-Flix streaming.

The location was excellent, with many nearby restaurants.   It was an easy walk to Central Park and the Metropolitan Museum of Art.   It was within half a block of the 2nd Avenue bus line (M-15), which is an easy way to get downtown and to lower Manhattan.   Some of our most fun times were spent riding the bus.  It’s a great way to meet native New Yorkers.

Sara was accommodating, readily available, and easy to work with.  We liked her a lot.  Our long  weekend in New York was wonderful, and having Sara’s apartment as our base of operations really made it all possible.   We highly recommend it and hope to return again.

Richard and Nancy Krantz
Columbia, Maryland

The  experience was just as the listing described! The apartment was super cute and cozy, while spacious for a studio. The neighborhood was very safe and there's a cute coffee shop close by that we kept going back to! Sarah was very kind and let us check in early and out late, to accommodate our flights. She even left us a bottle of wine (which was very delicious). We were happy to stay out of the hustle and bustle of Times Square, and it was nice to be so close to Central Park.

Sara was great! Everything looked just like the pictures and description. The place is quaint but perfect for the person that wants to feel like they live there. The location is great. So many places to eat shop and very close to the train. Also she is more than readily available and accommodating to anything you need. She let me stay later since my flight was later so I didn't have to worry about lugging my luggage with me. Also she left a welcoming bottle of wine which was very nice and thoughtful. Would recommend to all my friends. Great place! Thanks again sara! Such a cute place!
The host canceled this reservation 58 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Staying at Sara's place is great! Super clean, Comfy bed, hot shower, great neighborhood. Sara is easy to communicate with and flexible with check-in/check-out.

Sara was an excellent host, making my second experience with Airbnb a success. She was easy to contact and flexible with check in/check out times. The studio was extremely clean, tidy, and had everything we  needed for an overnight stay. Sara also left a bottle of wine and information about access to local transit and recommendations for restaurants and bars. The location of the apartment was a close walk to central park and museum mile. The listing was just as described, and I would definitely come back if I was looking to stay on the upper east side.

Sara was a fantastic host, from the beginning everything was great. She provided a great packet of information with recommended restaurants in the area and other useful information. She left a bottle of wine for us to enjoy as well. Her apartment looked just like the pictures and had everything needed for a weekend getaway in the city. Sara was very easy to contact when needed in the lead up to the trip and flexible with arrival and departure times. Would recommend to anyone looking to stay in the city.

Exactly as described. Perfectly clean, wonderful space. GREAT location! Easy to get to public transport and right near the river with a terrific park. Ideal NYC visit- if you ask me! My 2 year old had fun climbing the stairs to the apartment and we both felt very safe and incredibly comfortable.

Sara was great.  She was very flexible with arrival and departing times.  The apartment was excellent; clean and exactly as listed.  The location allowed easy access to Central Park, the river and the subway.  Restaurants and stores were a few blocks away and the neighborhood was very quiet.

Our stay at Sara's appartment was awesome! She was very easy to communicate with right before the stay and when we arrived, she left the keys somewhere we could pick them up as she waited for us, but then had to leave. The appartment is very cosy, very clean and nicely decorated, there not a thing we missed, we really felt at home. She left a bottle of wine and a personalized guide for everything (travel tips, restaurant tips, TV, laundry etc) for us. We were offered to contact her any time we had a question.
The location of the appartment is pretty perfect, it's just some blocks to the Central Park, everything you need is just around the corner, but nevertheless it is very quiet at night, I was actually surprised.
So we looooved our stay, we loved the appartment and would definitely come back. Thanks for everything!

Without any hesitation, I can say that Sara made our 4-day trip to NY comfortable, enjoyable, and simple! Sara was more than accommodating and we really enjoyed the space she provided us with. She was also easy to get a hold of and her apartment was VERY clean. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and the location of this space was wonderful. We were able to walk to and through Central Park and we were also in walking distance of many bus routes and subway stations. We were also walking distance to the museum mile and were able to enjoy the Met and Guggenheim without using any PT. I highly recommend this space and this host to anyone looking to visit NYC.  It also doesn't hurt that she has an amazing book collection if you want to get off your feet for a bit. 10/10!

..We just loved staying at sara's place, she is a fantastic host and very easy to communicate. 

the apartment was awesome! super clean, comfy bed, nice shower, small kitchen with everything you need.

The neighborhood is great, close to central park, shops and restaurants.

we had a wonderful time and would love to stay there again if visiting New york.

Thank you sara.

Sara's place was perfect for a weekend trip to NYC. It had plenty of room for my wife and I to get ready, sleep, and relax comfortably. Sara provided ample closet space for clothes, food, etc. Upon arrival, we found a print out of extremely useful information (subway map and schedule, local restaurant recommendations, and directions to both local and tourist areas). In addition to the info, Sara provided a bottle of red wine for us. Her apartment is located in a great area with the subway only a few blocks away, but catching a cab was extremely easy as well. By far the best communication we've ever had with Airbnb. She was available at all times to answer any questions we had. The next time we go to NYC, we'll definitely try to book Sara's place again.
The experience of being in the city, on the upper east side was amazing. Sara was great, met us at the time we said we would arrive. The apartment was spectacular. Love this place and love this city.

Our host Sarah was extremely welcoming and incredibly helpful.  My friend and I absolutely adored the space, it was the perfect size.  Exceptionally clean and well appointment, I would recommend this spot to anyone looking for a clean, convenient, and quiet place on the upper east side.

Sara’s apartment exceeded our expectations!  Sara was an excellent host who went out of her way to make us comfortable for our stay. Sara provided recommendations for food and entertainment,  information about NYC transit system, as well as a welcome bottle of wine! What a nice touch!  The apartment was very clean, well furnished, comfortable bed, and in a great location. Thanks for a wonderful stay Sara!  We hope to be back soon!!
Very cute apartment! Clean & tidy, perfect size for two people looking to go to the city. Sara was super helpful and accommodating!

Sara was a very kind host. She gave us precice instructions how to reach the Apartment and also good recommenations for nice dining in the neighbourhood. We had a Great stay and can recommend Sara's as a host and her clean and cosy apartment for everybody. Thank you so much, Sara! Sonja&Juergen

We loved staying in Saras place! It was our first time in New York and the location to the subway, Central Park and the neighbourhood was the best! The apartment was a great refuge after a big day of exploring the city and Saras tips on getting around New York as well as places to eat in the area were appreciated. Will definitely be recommending to any friends travelling to New York from Australia!

We had a great experience at Sara's place. The location is ideal. It's conveniently located near many shops, restaurants, the subway and a very short walk to Central Park.
The apartment is just as you see in photos. It is very clean, comfortable and quiet which makes for a pleasant stay.
Sara is a super host. She is easy to communicate with and was always available if needed.
Overall, we had an outstanding experience in Sara's apartment and would definitely recommend her place .
Thanks Sara!

Wonderful place to stay, Sara was great in communicating and instructions were very clear. Apartment was very clean and all you would ever need for a vacation. Building was very quiet and well maintained, with great places to eat that are close by. Would recommend this place to anybody and when we come back to New York will immediately see if this apartment is available.
Sara's place was great! She was willing to accommodate us when our other Airbnb fell through, and the apartment itself was super clean and cute. We couldn't have asked for more.

Had a great stay at Sara's place - a wonderful apartment! Sara was so organized & helpful with arrival and departure details. The studio is impeccably clean, beautifully decorated and very comfortable!  Ideal location too. Sara has thought of every detail to make guests feel welcome and at home. Would absolutely stay here again!

Sara’s apartment is beautiful, clean and the perfect size for a couple. When we arrived, she had left a bottle of wine for us with a packet of information about the neighborhood. She was easy to communicate with and very flexible. We had a great stay.

Super cute place! I highly recommend staying here. Upon arrival Sara was flexible to meet us at her apartment after a late flight in. Her place is adorable and welcoming. The space was clean, well put together and very organized. She had a personalized welcome packet for us complete with all the details of the apartment itself, expectations, maps, and some great recommendations while in the city. She felt like an old friend when we met her which made us feel completely at home during our stay. Great neighborhood, too! Before, during and right before checking out she was very good at communicating with us.

Sara's studio apartment on the Upper East Side of Manhattan was the perfect location to enjoy all the BEST NYC has to offer this time of year! Close enough to the main streets leading downtown, yet just far enough that it was quite when retreating to rest. The studio was extremely comfortable w/an efficient use of space. My 21 yr old daughter and I stayed for the weekend to enjoy the Holiday Festivities.. albeit a bit too much the nite before we were scheduled to leave. We awoke late, missed our flight, and ended up having to make a mad dash out the door,  to catch our new flight - leaving the apt disorderly and not at all how we'd envisioned leaving our hostess' home! Sara, however, handled this as a true professional. She was polite and accepting of our plight and receiving of my apologies. Bless you, Sara! 

She left a thoughtful note offering recommendations of a nice variety of excellent nearby restaurants and instructions for use of the apt. (like her WiFi network/password!) She had fresh linens and EXCELLENT handsoaps set out for our use; compatible to a nice hotel, actually. Full service kitchen gave us the freedom to bring back bottled water and restaurant leftovers to eat the next day. The home is easily comfortable for two adults.. perhaps even 3 if there is a couple who doesn't mind sleeping together in the bed.. I think it was a full size mattress. My daughter said the couch was very comfy too! 

The only thing that caught me by surprise were the stairs.. this was my 1st trip to NYC .. so I guess I was assuming there'd be an elevator. So, if you bring heavy luggage, or you're not in the best health.. you may have some challenges getting up all the stairs = 4 flights @ 18 steps each flight. You certainly get your workout! The building was very quite and hallway passerbys were friendly. Her unit is top floor so nobody above you. 

Sara has a great design aesthetic; her home was very interesting... the only recommendation I'd have is to add to your 'welcome sheet' a short bio about you! My daughter and I found ourselves wondering .. what line of work is she in, what is her life like, where does she stay when she's renting out her home, what does she do for fun in this amazing city????? We may be more curious than most.. but when temporarily living in someone's home.. we couldn't help but wonder more about SARA! From her choice of books (including the way she color coordinated them-LOVE IT!!!!), perfumes, and organizational style.. she's definitely someone I'd likely be good friends with - and of course I LOVE her name, lol. 

You won't be sorry if you stay here.. it's a wise choice and perfect location.

Sara was an excellent host with a beautiful studio apartment that was perfect for my husband and me. The studio was spotless, and all the linens and instructions were laid out for us to find easily. One of the biggest blessings for us personally was Sara's flexibility for check-in and check-out. She worked around our flight arrival and departure so we didn't have to carry our luggage around the city. The subway was only about 5 blocks away, so we were able to get anywhere in the city very easily. If we ever return to the city, I will definitely plan to stay here again!
Very clean.  Sara goes out of her way to make sure your visit is nice. I would definitely recommend her studio for one to two people

Lovely, cozy, supertidy apartment, a few blocks from the Q. Also, walkable to the Met and local restaurants and bars. Sara was so easy to get in touch with, and it's a perfect little spot for a NYC weekend.
Sara's apartment is exactly as described. Its all you need, highly recommended. And Sara is very helpful. Thank you

The apartment is ideally located for most anything you want to do if you like walking around and exploring the city. Everything was as-described and the apartment was exceptionally clean and comfortable. Sara was incredibly helpful and communicative - could not have had a better experience.

Sara's place is at a great location, close to good food and the subway. Sara was a great host, very quick to respond. Her place was comfortable, clean, and just as the pictures showed. I would highly recommend her place!
Sara was a great host. She was prompt to respond to all messages and gave clear instructions where needed. Her place was clean and well maintained.
Loved our stay here! Very clean and amenable apartment in a great location.

Sara's place is really lovely - it is honestly one of the best airbnb apartments we've lived in! Great and super safe neighborhood on the UES steps away from 2 major subway stations (Q and 4/5/6) that take you to downtown Manhattan within 10-15 minutes. The apartment itself was spotless, cozy, quiet, and functional. Sara even left a bottle of wine for us. Thanks Sara for being so thoughtful and giving us a wonderful weekend.

logement propre et calme, proche de toutes commodités,matelas de bonne qualité, conforme à la description
a noter qu'il est situé au 4eme sans ascenseur et pas de volet ou double rideau
nous avons passé un excellent séjour en parti grace à la qualité du logement de sara

Sara was a terrific host, check in and out were a breeze at very flexible times, she was always available by text, responding within minutes. Her place is clean, comfortable (bed included) and quiet yet, a couple minutes walk away from terrific restos and grocery stores. We were delighted by the view of trees just outside the window and very much appreciated having everything we needed for our stay. We will definitely want to stay at Sara's place the next time we are visiting NYC and will highly recommend her place to our family and friends.

Sara's place was perfectly located, tons of restauraunts and caffes within minutes of walk and subway station about 10min away. Her apartment was very cozy, clean and well organized.  She also responed very quickly and was super helpful. It just couldn't be better for the price you pay !
Gorgeous place. Friendly host. 10/10

Sara was such a kind host! I'm so glad we got to meet her. She had a print out of where everything we might need was located, as well as train stops, places to eat, etc. She even provided a nice bottle of wine! The place was very clean, and the neighborhood is quiet. It was everything we were hoping for. 
Thank you Sara!!!!

Sara's place is really cozy for two people! I recently stayed there for five days with my girlfriend. Upon arrival everything went as we talked beforehand and we had no problems whatsoever during our stay, we recommend both her as a guest and her apartment!
The cleanest apartment in Manhattan. Good location (near from a subway station) and equipped with all that we need.
She made us feel really welcomed. Everything was easy. Place was gorgeous!

Sara was a great host and communicated with us throughout our stay to help accommodate any needs we had! Her place was in a great location with easy access to the subway, plenty of bars and restaurants around within walking distance, and an easy walk to Central Park. The place was very clean and was perfect for our stay!

El departamento de Sara es muy agradable, tal y como se ve en las fotos. Muy limpio, y bien situado, a unas 3 cuadras de una estación de metro (líneaQ), fue fácil llegar desde el aeropuerto JFK. La zona muy bonita y sobre todo tranquila, se siente seguridad. Sin duda, me  hospedaría nuevamente.

Sara was a great host! Her communication and flexibility made our trip convenient and easy.  Her apartment was exceptional and made us feel right at home.  Will always look to stay there in the future.

Communication with Sara was exceptional. She responded quickly and answered any & all of my questions. She was very detailed as to how to get keys & check in process was super easy. The building is nice and quiet and the stairs to the 4th floor were great cardio! lol! The apartment is a short walk to public transportation, a short walk to Central Park and the neighborhood is quiet & clean. The apartment was cozy, super clean and had all amenities needed. The shower temperature was hot & stayed that way for a while (a big plus) There are lots of food options in all price ranges within the local area and Sara’s recommendations were great hits! All in all it’s a great studio in a nice location close to everything you need. We can’t thank her enough for the awesome stay and the wine was an added bonus!
Hands down one of the best AirBnB host. She was attentive, thoughtful and catered to our every need. The apartment was beautiful and close to the metro and restaurants.

Sara was a great host, provided thoughtful and thorough instructions. The space is spotless, stylish and cozy;  building is in a great neighborhood, convenient to transportation, restaurants and shopping. We had a great weekend in NYC and would recommend her apartment wholeheartedly.
Sara's place was very convenient for our plans.  Lovely studio apartment.  Check in was easy and flexible.  Thanks Sara

This is a clean, cozy, stylish, and perfectly located place to stay in NY. It is a short walk to major subway lines and is in a safe area. The apartment is so nice that we almost wanted to spend more time in it than out of it. I highly recommend Sara’s place for its value and comfort!

Great little studio in the upper east side. Right off of 2nd ave so there were so many restaurants, delis, and bar options. Just 4 short blocks to the 86th street subway stations. 

The apartment itself was very clean and neat. I appreciated the minimalist style. I had everything I needed for my weekend stay: a comfy bed and sofa, clean bathroom with lots of hot water, and good heat for the cold winter nights. 

The only thing I think should be added to the post is that this is a 4th floor walk-up. Meaning that there is no elevator and 4 pretty steep flights of stairs. They were no problem for me but I could see how some guests would find this problematic. 

Try the Midnight Express for yummy NYC style diner food. Visit the Drunken Monkey for some great Indian food. If you’re in the mood for quick and cheap but extremely delicious breakfast sandwiches- go to the Deli on 2nd ave.

Sara's place was awesome (just like the pictures). She replied very quickly and was really helpful. Check-in and check-out were easy. I'd stay there again, for sure. The apartment got kinda hot. I couldn't find where to turn down the heat and I should've just asked. There are lots of places to grab food and coffee nearby. Subway/train wasn't far. It's an all around great place to stay!

Sara's studio met our expectations, it was comfortable, clean and very well located. Walking distance  to metro stations, restaurants, central park, museums, etc. You name it...

Getting there from La Guardia airport  was easy  taking into account that  we arrived on a weekday during morning. 

If this is the case for your trip please note that you may have to pick up the keys from a Cafe somo blocks away. So if you're coming heavy on luggage (not our case) plan the logistics accordingly.

Another thing to bear in mind is that if you have difficulties going up the stairs,  note that it's located on a 4th floor and there's no elevator.

To sum up I 100% recommend this place

Lovely place!  It was close to many delicious restaurants and great places to drink. It was easy to find and easy to get transport anywhere we were going. Sara was very quick to respond to any questions I had (there were a lot!).
Sara was very thoughtful and thorough.  The apartment was stylish and clean.  Thanks

Sara’s space is cute, clean, and simple. My fiancé and I were quite comfortable as 2 guests.

The apartment is on the 4th floor with no elevator - manageable for us, but may be something to consider for other guests. We picked up keys in a safe location just a few blocks over. The neighborhood is vibrant, and not overcrowded or loud, like other parts of the city can be. Easy walk to the subway or corner to catch a cab or uber to wherever we wanted to go. 

Sara was quick to respond if we had a question, and she even left us a bottle of wine! 10/10 would stay again. Thanks Sara for being an awesome host!

We enjoyed our stay at Sara's place. Its super clean and there are many thoughtful touches that makes for a nice stay.  She is also quick to respond via txt & airbnb message, we loved it.  Just fyi there is no elevator so you may have to carry your luggage to fourth floor,  however we enjoyed the work out :) The location is awesome,  just a short 10 min walk to central park and other attractions.  We will definitely be back.  Thank you Sara!

My girlfriend and I spent four nights at Sara's place. It was spacious, clean and tastefully furnished, and was the basis for a great trip. We were initially slightly skeptical of the location, as many of our friends live below 20th, but the Q line made Manhattan (and even Brooklyn) only one transfer-less subway ride away. Sara also gave us a late check out, let us extend an extra night and was readily available via Airbnb messenger.  I would happily stay here again, and Sara's place offered great bang for our buck.
Sara is a great host and very communicative, would recommend to anyone.
Wonderful place! Would stay again.

This was my family’s first experience staying at an Air Bnb. We were thrilled with Sara’s hospitality and quick responses. The location was fantastic - very safe, close to Central Park (where we attended a wedding), great restaurants and the subway. The apartment worked well for us and our infant son. It is on the fourth floor, which was hard with the baby and all his stuff, but Sara checked with us beforehand to make sure that would be doable. It’s easy to get to and from LGA and all the big city attractions. We’d highly recommend it!
Sara is a great host and her place was clean and comfortable. Thank you, Sara!
Wonderful host. Very informative and easy to communicate. I had a great stay.
Great location, short walk to several subway stations. Cute space with ample amenities. Easy key pickup. Great spot to stay at while you're in Manhattan. One of my favorite AirBnB's.
Exactly as advertised. Wonderful book selection

I loved my stay at Sara's apartment. Sara is a fabulous host, she is always quick to respond to messages, and make you feel welcome with personal touches. The space is quiet, charming, and totally spotless. 
It's also an incredible value. I was only in town for a couple days, but could make the most of my time since the apartment is so centrally located. 
I would absolutely stay again!
This was an amazing place. It was fantastic- don't hesitate.

It is close to the subway station and easy to travel to tourist attractions. Inside the home is a very clean and comfortable. But the house is on the fourth floor, so I think you should consider that.
Amazing location. Great value. Responsive host. Very clean.

Great location, clean and well decorated. Lots of drawers available to make yourself at home. My Dad throughly enjoyed the place and was surprised how quiet NYC apts can be. I'll be booking for friends and family again in the near future.
Great Host; perfect for a quick weekend getaway in the city. Close to subway and ferry.

My stay at Sara’s was excellent. I just needed a quiet place to sleep at night while I was at a conference. The place was nicely decorated and very clean. The temperature was great at night, and it was not at all noisy for what you’d expect in NYC. The location was also excellent, with plenty of restaurants and fun bars open late within walking distance. Sara was available for check-in even though it was late at night, and left me a bottle of very good wine with some good tips about the neighborhood and building. The TV had both Hulu and Netflix, which was a nice bonus, and wifi worked well. This will definitely be at the top of my list when I come back to NYC.

Sara’s place was fantastic! Great location, especially for the price. Very clean, great amenities, and great tips on good things to do around the neighborhood. She was also great with communication, making sure everything went smoothly. I’ll definitely want to stay again!

name: Quiet Comfy home near Sydney with carspace + wifi
summary: My bright & convenient dual level apartment is just outside Sydney's CBD. It's an easy 4 min (400m) walk to Redfern Station. It has a car space and wifi, and sleeps 4 guests (2 on a Queen bed and 2 on   spacious and modern sofa bed). Note that the apartment requires guests to ascend a flight of stairs. It's pretty quiet for its location, which is very convenient.
space: "This was our first experience with an AirBNB booking and we were very impressed with how easy Linda made the whole experience from getting the key, the welcoming packet of biscuits, the offer to use all and sundry within the apartment. The location was perfect for us in that it was outside the CBD area yet walkable to it. The local restaurants, cafes were great and we have no hesitation in recommending the apartment to others" Chris and Bob, Canada  "It was an honor to have had Linda as my very first AirBnB host. It also has all the essential appliances that a home needs. Its location is very convenient as it is relatively near to the city, close to grocery store

It has a car space and wifi, and sleeps 4 guests (2 on a Queen bed and 2 on   spacious and modern sofa bed). Note that the apartment requires guests to ascend a flight of stairs.
