neighborhood_overview: This property is located where the suburbs of Redfern/Darlington/Chippendale meet. Its a very convenient neighbourhood, however its on a quiet street and close to cafés and restaurants.  The apartment is located an easy walk to the neighbourhoods of Newtown, Redfern and Chinatown and walkable (2.5km) to Darling Harbour. For groceries, I recommend going to the SPAR supermarket at Redfern station.  This old Sydney neighbourhood is predominately made up of lovely old terraces but there are also many green spaces nearby.  There is a cafe is located just across the street, and there is a quiet boutique pub just next to it. There's also an organic tea shop just down the street too. Guests should try: * Going to the Harbour, I can suggest going for a walk across the bridge! You can also walk up a Harbour Bridge pylon (The South east one) for $13, or for something really special, book a bridgeclimb. Make sure you see the Opera House, and the entry to the Botannical Gardens is just behind it. *
notes: You can use the space as you please however to comfortably accommodate 4 people, 2 would sleep upstairs and 2 downstairs in the living space on a convertible queen sized chaise sofa bed (Frieheiten Ikea sofa). The apartment is 64sqm in total including balconies. * The apartment has 2 toilets (one upstairs and one downstairs in the laundry), but just one shower (at the upstairs bedroom).  * I have a hairdryer, a rice cooker and even a baby cot! * Full kitchen use is included. Milk is provided and some sauces, butter etc. Note you are completely welcome to consume any food you find in the apartment. Tea and coffee is provided. * The complex has lots of fire extinguishers should you need them. * An early check in/late check out maybe available. Let me know in advance if you would like this option and I will check if it's possible for you. An extremely early checkin may attract an extra night's accommodation charge since it makes it difficult to rent the apartment out for the night before.
transit: For your convenience I provide Opal cards (transport cards) for your use while in Sydney. If you use them I just ask that you top the cards up again to a balance similar to how you found them before you depart from Sydney.  The best way to from the airport to the apartment is to take a taxi. You are likely to get change back from $30. It's also just a 4 minute walk to Redfern station (which is 1 stop from Central), and you can be almost anywhere in the Sydney region pretty quickly.  You need to change trains at Central though. It should only take ~15 minutes and cost just under $30 for a taxi. (To go back to the airport I suggest hailing a taxi from the other side of Cleveland St outside the convenience store, taxis come very regularly.) There is a car share (GoGet) car 20 metres down the street, a bicycle hire cafe across the street and (some) buses nearby on Cleveland St.  And... the apartment has a car space too. :) If you are very keen, you can walk the whole distance through the c
access: Easy check in procedure - if you want to arrive 11pm? No problem! :) You are free to access and use everything, except for spaces noted as "host only". Please let me know if you need the car space too. You are welcome to consume whatever food you find there or use any bathroom products in the apartment, it's provided for your benefit. :D
interaction: I live Sydney but I do not live in the apartment. Having said that I like to touch base during your stay via text and/or email to check that everything is ok. If there are any issues I am contactable via mobile or through Airbnb.
house_rules: Just a few items to take note of: * Please advise planned checkin and checkout times as soon as you are able. I need to know this so I can arrange cleaning and not have overlapping guest stays! * Please be considerate of neighbours at night, and keep noise to reasonable levels after 10pm. * No smoking and no pets please. Any trace of smoking or pets will result in loss of security deposit. * Please advise if you will have more people staying than you may have booked for as soon as you are aware - unauthorised guests will be subject to an extra $25 per person per night charge, or I may request you/them to seek other accommodation if their presence creates a scenario so my guest occupancy limit is exceeded. * Please keep the kitchen area as tidy as you found it, and if you happen to spill anything in the oven it would really assist me if you can clean it up. * Please turn off lights and empty the bins before you leave in case I don't have it cleaned immediately after your departure. I do

host.host_about:
I'm a volleyball player (and competition manager) who loves Australia!
Love Asian food.
I can ride a unicycle.... And can help you with that too :)
Have travelled to Europe, Turkey, Dubai, SE and Eastern Asia incl. China, Japan, Taiwan and San Francisco. I really enjoyed Siem Reap. I love New Zealand too!
I'm currently improving my Cantonese speaking.

Supporter of equality. :)

My motto: Be the change you want to see in the world.

reviews.comments: Linda was extremely responsive and attentive from the moment the booking request was made. She went the extra mile to make sure I would locate and enter the apartment easily, that I would have amenities ready for me before I even set foot in the country. She showed genuine care and concern, which is at times uncommon even among friends. Her apartment was spotless, thoughtfully designed and easy to get to from the airport (using airport-hotel shuttle buses, stop at Y Hotel Sydney South). It is minutes from cafes and the train station. It has a gorgeously open balcony and generous sunlight during the day. As it is very well insulated, I imagine stays during winter would be comfortable as well. The only guests who should reconsider this apartment are those who are unable to use staircase, as the bedroom is a stairway-up from the living area. Linda is an excellent host with an amazing apartment and if I were more selfish, I would not have spoken too highly of it, so that I can have it more to myself! :)

Had a great time at Linda's apartment. Linda was very welcoming, communicated extremely well and even left a fair amount of food for our use! The apartment was great, access easy and had three balconies for general excellence. The neighbourhood is great; King St is a ~1 km stroll from the door, but there lots of other things closer if you don't want that variety.

Linda was a great host.  Although we couldn't meet her, she did everything that we asked for and made sure we were comfortable.  The listing was accurate and the neighbouhood was quiet and calm even though the place was very close to the city.

She also provided us with milk, bread, yoghurt and cereal for breakfast.

I would recommend staying here to anyone who is going to Sydney.

It was great to stay at Linda's. Linda was kind enough to answer all of our request! We arrived at Sydney late night of Christmas eve so couldn't go for buying food or something. So Linda did shopping for us! We could have enjoyed great christmas dinner thanks for Linda ;) and House located near downtown, so we could walk to Darling Habour very easily. There was some trouble though. There was a black out for an hour, and we could'nt use Wifi. Linda was very sorry for those problem, so she give us USB for internet. She said she was waiting for Wifi installation and it will be available soon. I will stay at Linda's if I go Sydney again! ;)

Linda's apartment is a cozy place where you feel at home. It has a great location, near train station and close to the city. Unfortunately we were there for only two days, but we would like to stay much more. Linda is very careful, left all instructions and worried about all the details for our comfort. We even had food available in the kitchen, which was extremely important in the early days of adaptation. We can only thanks and recommend Linda's place eyes closed.

Located centrally, as described a very quick trip to Sydney CBD. The building itself is a bit old but the apartment was neat and tidy. Linda was a great host, easily contactable, very responsive (I got responses within 15 mins of my queries!!). I did not meet her personally but she provided clear instructions on how to enter the place. The kitchen was fully equipped and there was milk, bread, coffee & cereals left for our use. Our stay here was very comfortable and I would definately stay here again.
We had a lovely relaxing time here. Linda, was friendly and helpful. The apartment is well equipped and close to everything.
Linda's b&b is fantastic. She bought fruits and wine for me, I was so impressed. Exept it, there were so many things to eat. And everything is clean, closed to the city. Thank you, Linda!

Great. Linda was very helpful in the lead up to our guest arriving.
Our guest felt very welcome. There were some issues with the wifi at the beginning of our guests stay - but Linda quickly rectified it. Our guest was most happy with his accommodation.
Linda made me feel very welcome, with a few personal messages, and had left some food for me, which was well-received.  The apartment was a great size for me, and made me feel at home.
Linda very nice! Lovely bnb & good location. Walk 4mins to red fern station. Lovely bnb! Very recommend!

We had an awesome time at Linda's apartment. Great location, and the apartment had everything we needed. Would definitely stay again! Linda was the perfect host, and was always available when we needed her.
Great place, so close to everything. Enjoyed my stay thoroughly. Highly recommended for other guests for future bookings.

Linda was a lovely host and has a very lovely home. Which is close to restaurants, public transport and all other things you could need. It was very easy getting around the city and surrounding areas thanks to the comprehensive information provided to us upon arrival. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and would recommend staying at Linda's apartment to anyone looking for accommodation.

We stay in Linda's cosy house for 5 nights! Linda is very kind who prepare many food for our stay! The location of the house is close to Sydney's attractions and only 5 minutes walk to the train station! Linda is helpful to our problems in Wifi and TV! The only things need to concern is you may feel a little bit hot for the third people who sleep on the sofa at night, but you can turn on the fan or cooler if you want! Thanks Linda!

Hi linda, this is marie and thierry. We have just finish our trip in sydney and blue mountains. Back to work tomorrow ! We enjoy the city and you appartment in redfern. Everything was ok. Quiet area and not too far from the center of sydney. We rent bikes at town pikes.Thanks for your advices and all the rest. Sorry for my english we are not used to travel so much out of french countries and my lessons from school begins to be very far

There was a note  that made us welcome. There was milk in the fridge. 
The kitchen was well stocked. A great location. Highly recommended. 
Accessible to galleries and public transport.

Linda was an excellent host, very helpful and really easy to deal with. Everything in the apartment was really well explained and she included lots of extra details and helpful tips on Sydney so it felt like we had insider knowledge! The apartment is small but perfectly formed and had everything we needed in it. There's an excellent supply of guide books and we did a few do the self guided walking tours. There's not much in the way of restaurants nearby but pretty much every train in Sydeny seems to stop at Redfern which is only 4mins walk away so it was easy to get around. Bring your ear plugs as the road behind can be noisy with the windows open. As well as seeing the sights I'd recommend making time to experience Aussie brunch which is quite unlike anything I've eaten before. We went to the Three Williams Cafe which is 10-15min walk away. Haven Coffee near Central Station was also a regular stop.

Our host, Linda was extremely helpful and helped to sort little issues that we had on arrival.   We suggested a minor improvement to her and she was happy to take our feedback on board.  The area was a little off putting at first however, once we got to know it and also appreciate the proximity to the CBD and the train station and also a very good pub across the road, we were very happy.   The accommodation provided all that we needed but to be honest we felt it was a squeeze for 4 adults.   Much more comfortable for just two.  Ideally located for walkers and very secure.  Internet access was good.  Linda provided excellent information about Sydney with lots of tour information, sight-seeing blurb and also lots of maps.  Once a booking had been confirmed, Linda provided excellent information for us to read in advance of our stay and all very helpful to make our arrival problem free.

We had a great time staying at Linda's apartment. It certainly felt like a home and not just some hotel room. Also the location of the apartment is great. There are lots of nice cafés nearby to have breakfast at and it is really close to the CBD and also to central station from where it is easy to go anywhere you like in Sydney. 
Linda is a super nice host who tries to make your stay as comfortable as possible. We'd definitely stay there again.

Great place to stay! Very good location neat and tidy apartment. Secure parking for the car was a huge bonus. Linda was lovely to deal with and very helpful during all aspects of our stay. Would highly recommend and recommend Linda. Easy to contact before during and after our stay.  Thank u so much once again! If ever revisiting sydney will book again!
Linda was very welcoming, made us feel at home in her lovely home.  Great location, secure parking, will definately stay again.

Property was great. Linda most helpful. Didn't actually meet her but she was  always available on the phone if needed. Arrived to find a box of chocolates set aside for us and a freshly stocked fridge for breakfast. A very easy experience all round. Late checkout greatly appreciated.

My friends and I had a very pleasant stay! Linda was very helpful and easy to contact. She answered all our queries promptly. Great location, nice cosy apartment.. Couldn't recommend it more! Would definitely be back!

Linda is a very helpful and welcoming host. She alerted me to the Vivid event and a free  orchestra nearby way before my arrival. She is also very responsive in answering to my queries and replacing the heater which did not work well in warming us on our first night.
The location is superb as it is within walking distance to Chinatown.
The secured parking is very useful. 
The apartment is clean and bright. We felt very at home.

Staying in this apartment, hosted by Linda, was a wonderful experience for me and my wife. All kitchen amenities provided, hot water and good plumbing, quiet, near Redfern station and the University, plus a coffee shop and pub right across. The host bot a rice cooker for our use too.

Linda is really kind. She checked in on us on the day when we arrive and her apartment is 5 mins of walking to Redfern station and about 10 mins to Central station. Could not have ask for more and I really love the quietness of the apartment within the residential area.

Linda left us the keys in the letter box for us to checked ourselves in.  It is a lovely place and it's same as the pictures posted. Quiet area, only few minutes walk from the train station! There's also a garage for our rented car, which makes it so convenient for us. Linda's place have basically everything, from laundry liquid to heater. The lovely note and OZ's all time favorite TimTam was a great bonus! Clean and nice place to live in!

Linda is very kind and passionate, she reply to us via Airbnb ASAP if we have any problem. The house is very good, clean and viewing well. The location is very convenient for those who don't have a car. I think if I go to Sydney again, I will live here again!

Linda has been gracious and wonderful, catering to our every need including an early check in and a slightly later check out when hearing of our fight timings. Very helpful, helping us with figuring out navigation and how to get an opal card. 

House is exactly as shown in photos, and everything was very easy. Very near to Redfern station, and my friends and i enjoyed our stay there!

Although I didn't meet Linda she contacted me when I arrived and a couple of times during my stay to check that everything was OK. Linda's place was as described, neat and tidy and in a reasonably quiet and safe area, close to everything.

Linda's apartment is very cosy and is just right for 4 person. Her descriptions of the apartment are accurate and the location really made our stay in Sydney very much convenient. Though I didn't meet her in person, she actually prepared many things to welcome my stay and remained contactable throughout. I would definitely recommend this apartment to people who are looking for a trustworthy, affordable, and centrally located apartment in Sydney.

We really love Linda's apartment and it is really near to the city thus making everything feels convenient. We also enjoyed the facility given at Linda's house and thank you for the timtam! so good we love it!! Definitely a place you want to stay if you are going to sydney :P

Our stay at Linda's apartment was fantastic. The accommodation was clean and comfortable with all the necessary amenities. The neighbourhood has many cafes and was an accessible walk to the downtown. Linda was a good host checking in on our stay and leaving information about the city along with coupons and treats.

I had a great Stay at Linda's apartment. She left a tonne of handy information, was flexible about leaving my bags behind for a few hours on my last day, and went out of her way to check in and make sure I was doing ok. Much appreciated.

Linda's place is just lovely and very close to Redfern train station. The house is clean and neat. Superb value with garage parking. We rent a car for two days and that was very convenient with no trouble to find parking spot. Highly recommend and definitely will return in the future. Give mine appreciation for hosting a great place.

We had a wonderful stay in Sydney - Linda's home was perfect for us with everything we needed. Linda was a fantastic host - great to deal with. The apartment was in a quiet block but close to everything - great cafe just across the road and close to the station.

Linda's apartment is tidy and located near CBD and transportation to everywhere. Linda is nice and ready to provide help anytime. The apartment provide anything you need during the stay. I will recommend to friends definitely.
This was a wonderful place to stay while on our trip to Australia! Quick walk to everything as promised, and comfy place to sleep after a long day exploring.

Just like home!
Linda's apartment is perfect in every sense. Is close to train station, markets and coffee shops in a lovely neighborhood. Beside that, the house have everything we need, from laundry, kitchen, living to an amazing bed.

Loved Linda's apartment! Linda provided all the information before hand so checking in was a breeze, and she even let me in early after a long haul flight, infinitely appreciated! The location is amazing, there's some lovely cafes just across the road and the train station a small walk away. The apartment was really quiet at night and felt very safe. Would definitely recommend and would stay here again!

Linda was such a lovely host! The apartment was exactly as the description had mentioned.. It's in a great location, walking distance to everything you need! I had such a great stay here, could no recommend it more :)

Nice and clean house. Linda is a very responsible host and she responded quickly. 10 min walk from Redfern train station and you can go anywhere in the city. Only shortcoming is there are quite many ants in the house.

I had a great stay at Linda's place. The apartment was as described: neat, with full amenities, and well situated close to the Redfern train station. Linda herself was very well organized and communicative during the stay. I'd definitely recommend it. I especially liked the box of TimTams she left out before my arrival :)

Linda left a variety of foods for us at her apartment - breakfast things, and a variety of teas. Tim tams too! The wifi worked well as did the utility room's white goods that we used. The parking space was really useful. 

We were travelling with our 9 month old son. Linda provided us with a cot for him to use (for free) which was terrific. We had some queries and Linda got back to us immediately with answers to our questions. We liked the "manual" she left for the Redfern area which highlighted activities we might otherwise not have done like visiting the local weekend market.

The Redfern neighbourhood is a bit of a hipsters area. There's a good (bike) coffee shop opposite and we had a ridiculously good Sunday lunch at the pub next door. The very well connected underground station is a short walk away. The area felt very safe.

Linda's unit is a lovely warm place as is Linda herself.  The unit is well equipped and Linda has thought of everything, there was nothing we needed that was not supplied.  Terrific location and area, excellent value for money.

A cosy and quiet apartment within the city fringe, with cafes & convenience store nearby. Walking distance to Red fern train station and we even walk to Sydney Fish Market, although my kids were complaining about it.
The kitchen is stock up with all sort of food and seasoning. 
Thank you, Linda.

We loved our stay in Linda's place. We've stayed in nicer places in better locations but in Linda's apartment, you'll feel at home. I won't repeat the positive and accurate descriptions below, except to emphasize that it is accurately described, in a safe and interesting area, and close to all major tourist sites. Linda had stocked her place so well that we didn't need to dash to the store when we arrived. This generosity is a reflection of your host who loves travel and those who do. Thanks, Linda. Book it.
This apartment is clean and lovely and everything just like the description. Linda is so nice and all the foods and the welcome Timtam are so helpful when we arrived. We spend a great time there.

My Family and I stayed at Linda's apartment the last two weeks of December 2015.  From the time the booking was made Linda has been in contact with me, about the apartment the area and things to do in and around Sydney, thank you Linda!!
The apartment it self is as listed on Airbnb. It's comfortable cosy and everything a traveller or holiday makers requires. My family and I also loved the area it was a nice quiet and safe area. 

If ever I return to Sydney I would hope to return to Linda's apartment. Thank you Linda for everything!

Absolutely lovely stay here... Linda was so helpful and full of little tips on where we could visit and travel advice. She did everything she could to make our stay comfortable and feel like a home away from home. Great location, so close to the station and only minutes away from all tourist sites. We will definitely be back if we find ourselves over this side of the world again! Thanks so much for everything Linda :)

Our host Linda made us very welcome, provided more items  e.g. food/washing powder, umbrellas which we needed.  Other items beyond our expectations.  The apartment was exactly as shown on the website. Very clean, comfortable bed, bathroom perfect. She provided us with information with regard transport, local shopping and places to eat.  The off street parking was very accessible and secure. The instructions were well set out.  We liked the area. She was very interested to make sure we were comfortable. We would strongly  recommended to couples like us.

Linda has thought of everything that might be needed by a wide variety of guests The apartment is compact and decorated in a neutral modern style. It is very conveniently located for a visit to Sydney The house rules are reasonable and easy to follow. A no-fuss stay. Thank you.

This is a very convenient, cosy and perfect appartment in the center of a lot of action: Central station is 8 minutes to walk and then your are close to all attractions in Sydney. The neighbourhood us lovely, typical Sydney townhouses with a great pub on the other side of Abecrombie Street. It is 6 minutes walk to the train station Redfern.
The appartment has all you need and the shopping for these needs is at Redfern station.
Linda is a very helpful host, always available by sms if you need advice.
This unit is very recomendable for 2 or 4 people. Have fun! Thank you Linda!
Michael Wendt - Germany
Linda is very responsive and considerate. Easy access to CBD and Sydney university. We really enjoyed the stay at her place
The house is not far from the University of Sydney. It is very quiet around the house. The landlord is a very nice person. We have everything we need. Let us feel very comfortable and friendly!

Linda's house is clean and comfortable (makes me feel at home) though sometimes it can be hot cuz I visit Sydney during summer. Other than that, I love that it is near the MRT- took me only few minutes to walk and Central Park Mall and SPAR Redfern that are nearby are awesome- lots of food and fresh food to buy and great atmosphere.

Linda was great giving info to make our arrival smooth as it was our 1st time in Sydney. The apartment was as described in the lsiting and photos, there was bread and more for us to have breakfast which was very convenient to start with. Location is great too, only a few minutes from Redfern station, which links to Circular Quay in 10-15 minutes only. Overall, comfortable stay with a great host.

Linda's apartment is very well located, close to RedFern train station and in walking distance of the CBD. The breakfast items were much appreciated, with an array of cereals, bread and peanut butter and jam and honey. Several kinds of tea and instant coffee and milk also.
We also appreciated the washer/dryer and hanging lines on the balcony upstairs. We would definitely return if in Sydney again.

Linda did everything possible to make our stay perfect she even text us to see what bread we liked and left a packet of timtams on the table.The apartment is ideal for 2 people and is equipped with all you need the wifi was good it was great to have secure parking also to be so close to the station 3 stops to circular quey there is a good quiet pub over the road and also a little cafe, restaurant and shops within walking distance
Really excellent stay. Linda has provided well and very thoughtfully. Thank you   Location most convenient. Dora
Flat basic but comfortable. Good commute area and neighbourhood felt safe for two ladies. A good resting place if you are out exploring Sydney.
We couldn't have asked for more.  :)  Great host, location, and oh so comfortable!

Linda was a great host and regularly kept in contact to ensure we were having a great time and there were no issues.

Everything was as described and the location was great. The walk to the train station was not too far; even with a crying infant and suit cases being wheeled. Great restaurants were only a short walk away as well.

The information left in the house for nearby attractions and was great, as was the access to the Entertainment Book.

I would highly recommend staying here. 

The next time we are in Sydney, Linda's apartment will be the first place we will try and book :)

Linda's house is nice. It is plain and not large. However, it is quite and clean. You can find everything you need. The most important is that the location is very closed to stations and you also can easy walk to city. It is also a safe location too. Just good for 3 of us to stay in. We are enjoy the stay there. 
Lin Li

L'appartement de Linda est parfait, très bien situé et au calme dans un beau quartier de Sydney avec tout ce dont on peut avoir besoin à proximité : métro, restaurants, supermarchés, jardins. L'appartement lui-même est grand et agréable avec plusieurs balcons... Tout est comme sur les photos. Nous n'avons pas rencontré Linda mais elle a répondu rapidement à toutes nos questions et a fait de son mieux pour rendre notre séjour encore meilleur. 
Sydney est une grande et belle ville et ce lieu est un point de chute idéal pour la visiter.

Très bon séjour chez Linda. Appartement impeccable et très bien équipé. 15mn à pied de la gare centrale ou station de train à 5mn. 
Linda est très réactive pour répondre à nos questions et nous donne de bons conseils sur les événements à ne pas manquer. 
Je recommande sans hésitation !

Linda was excellent and more than helpful. It was very easy to communicate and keep in touch with her. She even accommodated for our late check in and late check out!
Apartment was excellent and couldn't have been better!

Thanks Linda!

Linda has been a warm and fantastic host! She gave us very good recommendation of the sight seeing places, sharing with us the nearby facilities/groceries markets etc. 

The house is really spacious for the two of us, with a living room/kitchen and a bedroom area on the second level. Very clean and neat, with all the daily necessities catered for! 

I will definitely be back should I be back to Sydney! Thank you Linda for the wonderful memory!

Nice place, close to Redfern station. Listing description is accurate, and guidance instruction is super clear.
Place is well supplied with basic needs (i.e. Towels, shampoo, soap, laundry detergent, extra beddings, teas, etc.).
Linda is very responsive and welcoming.

This was our first experience with an AirBNB booking and we were very impressed with how easy Linda made the whole experience from getting the key, the welcoming packet of biscuits, the offer to use all and sundry within the apartment. The location was perfect for us in that it was outside the CBD area yet walkable to it. The local restaurants, cafes were great and we have no hesitation in recommending the apartment to others.
Chris and Bob
Lovely place to live! Warm and comfy apartment with everything we need. Locating at the place close to station therefore easy travel everywhere. Highly recommended!

It was an honor to have had Linda as my very first AirBnB host. She was very accommodating and easy to talk with. She made sure we had everything we needed during our stay. She also provided directions to the best restaurants and tourist attractions.  As for her place, it's well-organized and has an ample amount of space. The space is very comfortable that we were easily able to settle in. It also has all the essential appliances that a home needs. Its location is very convenient as it is relatively near to the city, close to grocery stores and restaurants, and within reach of a train/bus station for those who want to go around. I would highly recommend staying at Linda's place to anyone planning to visit Sydney! We sure had a great and hassle-free time during our stay!
Linda is a really nice person, the cleaning is good and the living goods are sufficient. Very excellent experience!

With good communication from the start, Linda made the process easy. She gave clear instructions to pick up the key, use the wifi and left maps with advice on places to visit. The location was perfect for us; near family and the railway station.  We hired bikes from over the road ($20 for half day) and cycled to Balmain. Great cycling along the river but busy roads. You can walk to the city centre- we walked offroad through parks to Darling Harbour and the botanical gardens. Comfy big bed with good quality bedding and loads of hot water. Everything else was a bonus. Glad there was a heater as our first evenings were chilly and a television to watch the Olympics. The wifi was welcome. The Eveleigh Hotel opposite had good meals but we mainly shopped at Coles in Broadway and Spar opposite the station. We thought of hiring a car so the car parking space was a plus but actually travelled everywhere by the excellent public transport. The Opal app was really helpful; we already had Opal cards. It's a modern block that looks a little prison-like compared to the cute houses in the rest of the street but is big enough and well-equipped. 
There's a big sofa which converts into a big sofa bed. The upstairs bedroom has no door, it's a railing but a good size and watching tv on low downstairs was ok and didn't disturb the sleeper. I would stay there again.
Lina is a very nice host, and the apartment is comfortable, quiet to live in.
It was really good to stay in Linda's place, perfectly communicated, close to everything! Great experience there, hope to come back again :)

Excellent place to stay. Linda was always available and helpful with everything that we needed. We did a late check in and she arranged bread for us  and cookies for my daughter which was great. It was nice meeting her. The best part is the connectivity to the station, very convenient. Would definitely recommend her place. 
Himanshu

The whole experience had been amazing. Linda is very friendly, responsive, took time to check in with us during our stay to make sure we are good and accommodating. A pity we didn't meet her during our stay. But her attention to details and making sure her guests are well taken care of is remarkable. 

On the apartment, it was fantastic. Location was awesome and it has everything we need. Feels like home, would certainly come back again if we visit Sydney :)
Stayed with Linda's for 2 days. Location is brilliant and the house is equipped with all required amenities. Would recommend it for both short and long term stays.
Comfy mattress upstairs! Very useful Opal cards & tasty welcome bread, which was especially useful after a 29-hour trip and arriving in the middle of the night.

We had a great stay at Linda's lovely home. The apartment is located in a nice neighbourhood, close to public transport and perfect to explore the city. Linda was a great host and the communication was smooth. The apartment is clean, cozy and furnished with everything we needed. I would definitely stay here again!

This was my first Airbnb experience and I couldn't ask for a better one. First of all, the location is very convenient and the neighborhood is quiet and safe. The apartment is clean, has everything you need, and dare I say, more than you can ask for. Linda wants you to feel at home and she succeeds  : we really felt at home. 
I went to Sydney with my parents (60 and 70yo) and therefore I had some concerns regarding their comfort. As a matter of fact, they loved the place ! They were really happy about the whole experience and this is the most important for me. Linda is really helpful, attentive and  flexible. We were welcome by a lovely note and some Tim Tam and we loved this attention. 
No matter how much I think about it, I cannot fault the accommodation, nor the host. I am really glad to have had Linda for my first experience, but the downside is that she has raised the bar for the next one ! :-)

What a cute little apartment. Great views from the balconies. Clean tidy and spacious. red fern is a coll area there is food options nearby and coffee across the road. Train station is very close. Linda was easy to deal with friendly and answered all questions promptly. Thanks for having me stay.

Linda was a great host, and was very helpful and responsive with all our questions.  She provided us with Opal cards, which we recharged once done.  Checking was quick and painless.

Unit is near the Redfern train station, and 25 minute walk from Central station.  The route to/from the Redfern station is not well lit, so we didn't feel safe walking there late at night.

Accommodations are good for a couple.  Room is a bit chilly at night, but Linda provides heaters to warm up the rooms.

Very nice and large clothes washer/dryer, which made doing laundry a breeze.
Linda was a treat to communicate with, very responsive and warm. Her apartment was equipped with everything we needed for a week long stay. I highly recommend her place! Thank you very much Linda.

From the moment I have booked the apartment Linda has always replied to messages immediately. She answered quickly whatever question I had. The location of the apartment is great since it's only about 5min walk to the train station. Food shops are not far away either. The apartment has all you need and it is in particular nice that you can use everything in there (like tea, jam, butter, oil etc). I loved the one balcony with morning sun. One of the best things were the instructions and recommendations she put together and provided in the apartment. So you could go back to this document and read what sights you should visit, where the garbage room is, what you have to do when checking out etc. Thanks so much Linda, you are a great host!!! I can definitely recommend the apartment to others.

I had to work a few days at the University of Sydney, and this place was a short 5 minute walk to campus which was awesome. But it was also only 5 minutes to the nearest train station so when I started sightseeing, it was also super convenient. The apartment was clean and quiet and in a really pretty neighborhood.
Really central and close to everything. Great balconies and very clean. Well stocked and we had a great time there!

Linda is a lovely host...very accomodatiing in answering our queries. Nice and clean place. Near to train station, Redfern and shopping mall, Broadway. Also a wslking distance to Glebe Saturday Market. We had a great time.

Linda was a superb hostess, she was easily contacted via email throughout our stay. When we had a minor problem with one of the toilets she responded very quickly.   The directions on how to access the apartment were easy to follow, and we had no trouble on arrival or departure. We really enjoyed how close the property was to the train station and the downtown areas of Sydney, while at the same time the neighborhood was still very peaceful and quiet.  Providing Opal cards (for the city transportation) was a real plus.  And since we are runners, having a washer and dryer for laundry, and not needing to take stinky clothes back home was lovely.  Overall a wonderful stay in Sydney.

Pro: Linda is a great host. Communicates well. Amenities in the apartment are good, she provides everything one needs. Plenty of space, two couples could stay comfortably. 

Con: No air conditioning. Most of the year this should be fine but I was here during a heat wave and it made the stay unbearable. Most of the time I wore only shorts and was still sweating like crazy, even with fans on and windows open.
Linda was a very helpful hostess to us! She prepared everything we needed. We enjoyed cooking every morning.

We had a lovely stay at Linda's, the place was tidy and clean, beds were comfortable. It was in a convenient  location and communication and check-in with Linda was easy- she was very accommodating! Thank you for a lovely stay! It is a great place and I would recommend it!

This was our first AirBNB rental. Linda was an excellent host. The unit was very clean, and everything you can think of was provided (paper towels, laundry soap, shampoo, shower gel, dish soap, even sunscreen). The best thing was that the kitchen was FULLY stocked and the washer/dryer were super convenient. Having the OPAL cards ready to go made it really easy. Be sure to read up on how to use them and top them off as the least you could do online is $40 AU per adult card, and it took up to an hour to be available. Top-offs can also be done at the station in lesser denominations. Bed was comfy, plenty of clean sheets and towels were available. One ice tray was provided for ice, which was plenty for us. Fans were plenty to keep cool in summer as long as you leave doors and windows open. Suggest taking Uber to and from the airport as most economical method, but leave plenty of time to travel; though only 5 miles from the airport it took over 30 minutes to drive. The only drawback to us was that there was very little counter space in the bathroom, but we adapted to that easily. We loved staying there and will happily go back should we ever find ourselves in Sydney again.

I came here with my two American buds, and we had a great time. Linda was very prompt is any request/questions I had. The place was great, beautiful balconies, and location was perfect. Right next to the train station. Would highly recommend this place for travelers.

I stayed here for twelve days, as I had various business meetings in the city. It was a perfect location. A great little neighbourhood with good transport links to get around Sydney.  Linda was a great host and was very flexible with check-in and check-out times. The apartment was clean and comfortable and was equipped with basic equipment. It was perfect for me on my own and for putting up a friend overnight on the sofa bed. Good value for money.

The location is good, close to public transport and centrally located to visit Sydney, the car park is very convenient as well. We didn't meet Linda in person but the communication went great, she was very responsive. Cleaning to be improved.
I booked Linda's place for my Dad who was visiting Sydney. He really enjoyed his stay. It was walking distance to everything and Linda was very thoughtful in how she prepared the place for visitors.

Linda's place is perfect for a small family and friends stay. It is equipped with everything you need for a comfy stay, as the advertising quote says!! The location is perfect to catch up any place in and around city on foot... 
Very close by is Redfern station and Spar supermarket, which ease out routine stuff.

My 3 yr old son enjoyed the most... the apartment is absolutely child friendly. 

Linda is wonderful host! Very responsive and supportive. We would definitely come and stay here in future!!
Look forward to stay here again nd again.... 
cheers!!

Cannot recommend this place enough. About 4 minutes from Redfern station which will get you anywhere you need to go. The appartment was clean and welcoming. Linda was communicative throughout our stay. Could not ask for a better host or appartment!

This is a wonderful place to stay for a few days in Sydney.
Location is fantastic and the host Linda was wonderful - nothing was too much trouble. I'll definitely stay here again as it offered much more space than just a single room.
Linda was so fast to respond to messages and even come to rescue me when I locked myself out!

Linda is a great host and provided assistance to me on arrival and to her guests departing, to accomodate everyone s preferences. The property is very cool. Dont want to tell everyone incase its busy when I need it.. shhhh
Apartment is very tidy and complete. Well maintained and organized. Location is near to train station and city is well within reach. Great place if your visiting Sydney.

Linda's apartment is cosy but very comfortable. She really thought of everything. She is always reachable and helpful.
I can only recommend her.
Linda was such a great host, and her place was neat. All the necessities were included and the location was perfect. We had such a lovely stay in Linda's place!
A great location and all the amenities that you need in the apartment to have a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

Appartement charmant, calme et bien équipé. Les instructions de Linda ainsi que les informations et documentations sur le quartier, les moyens de transport, les endroits à  visiter etc parfaitement claires et utiles. Situation idéale pour visiter Sydney, tout près de la station de train/metro Redfern, ou même à pied à 15 mn de la gare centrale. ...Séjour parfait. J'y reviendrais sans hésitation. Thank you Linda.
Great stay, linda was very helpful!!!
Linda was extremely helpful with check in and available for other enquiries. The location is super close to great cafes and restaurants. Great place to stay if you plan on going out a lot.
Great location and nice unit for my wife and I. Host was super helpful and responsive.
Very good location and suitable accommodation
Linda is a great host very responsive in answering queries. Place looks tired and more scrubbing is required. Location is good but the neighbourhood is sketchy for family stay

The stay at Linda's house has been absolutely a success.
Well equipated, located in a quiet neighborhood and close to the center, clean and with all the commodities you can need to spend some days while you visit the city.
If i could come back again to Sydney, i would choose it without any kind of doubt.
She has been very helpful and available at all times.
If you have doubts...forget them; this is the best choice!
Thanks for all Linda!

Linda’s place was situated in the perfect location and the place was spacious, and provided more than you could ask for with a stay in Sydney!

Linda was a fantastic host who was more than accommodating during my stay. Thanks a bunch!

Comfortable, clean unit. Great base from which to travel and explore Sydney. OK size for family with kids (we are a family of 5). Probably better suited for older kids though given the staircase. (Our 19 month old had a fascination with the stairs which Kept us on our toes. :-) overall a good experience. Recommended.

Linda’s place is comfortable and convenient. It was nice that the bedroom area on the second floor was separated from the living area. Also, there was an extra bathroom downstairs with toilet and sink. The airbnb was close to plenty of restaurants and cafes as well as the Central Park and Broadway malls. You can go to the city center by train from the Redfern station, which is only 5 minutes away from the apartment. Check-in and check-out were easy. Although we didn’t get to meet Linda in person, she was always available on text and was a wonderful host :)

Linda's place is lovely and have all the items that we will need to make ourselves comfortable. Linda is very responsive and easy to contact even though we never get to meet her. The only slight problem is that we need to climb a flight of stairs to get to the apartment so will need to carry the luggage. But other than that l, it was a nice stay.
Great host, great location, great value. Highly recommend staying with Linda!
Definitely recommend a nice and clean place, best location.
If you use Uber check on (Hidden by Airbnb) maps that it has you on the right location for pickup.

Linda’s apartment in Redfern was excellent and we very much enjoyed our stay. The apartment was well furnished, very comfortable, and the kitchen had everything we needed to make some breakfast. Having an upstairs bedroom provided some nice separation between living and sleeping areas. Multiple balconies are a bonus! The location is excellent, from Redfern station it is a 10 minute train journey to Circular Quay and the trains are very regular. Alternatively, a walk to the Opera House is about 45 minutes through town. If we’re back in Sydney we will be staying at Linda’s apartment and we have recommended it to our friends in Redfern who need a reliable place nearby for family to stay when they are visiting. Thanks very much!

Linda's beautiful place is located in an amazing location and a short walk away from plenty of amenities (the supermarket, post office, plenty of eateries etc). Check in was a breeze and the place was spacious and clean as described. It even came with its own parking lot! We were really thankful that Linda was hospitable and kind enough to bring in another fan in the sweltering heat just so she could make sure we were comfortable. Would most definitely recommend to other travellers and will be sure to stay again if we happen to be in the area! A***

We enjoyed our stay at Linda's place. The apartment was clean and well equipped. Especially the kitchen included everything we needed and two bathrooms were a blessing for four people. The bed in the main bedroom was ok and two people slept on the sofa bed quite nicely.

The location of the apartment was good. The only downside is that there is no AC; the place (especially the upper floor) can get quite hot if it's very warm outside.

We can highly recommend Linda's place!

Fantastic host.  Very prompt responses and highly attentive to the incoming heatwave --- Linda went out of her way to get a misting fan to help our little one adjust to the hotter climate 

Would definitely stay again of back in Sydney

Linda was EXTREMELY! helpful. Check in was a breeze. Her home was very comfortable with all modern amenities, in a quiet street.
Walking distance to train stations, and shops. 
Will definitely stay here again.

We’re very satistied with Linda’s Apartment. It was clean, with the very complete kitchen tools, utensil, and assorted teas. Linda provide a good goods and services. The apartment is the same as the pictures, within walking distances to the Redfern station, and she is responding very quicky to our questions. Highly recommended for travellers coming to Sydney.

It was such a lovely stay. Stayed over New Years and Linda allowed us an early check on which helped us so much. The location is perfect close enough to the city and the little touches around the house made us feel so welcome. Thanks Linda!

Linda's place was wonderfully convenient to inner Sydney CBD yet remained quiet and peaceful.  Everything required for a comfortable stay was available & Linda was in contact & provided lots of tourist information in her unit. We had a car, so the undercover security parking was terrific, no need to search for on-street parking.  Public tranport was also easy to access from this location, only  a short stroll to the local train station. 
Wouln't hesitate to stay here again, as it was exactly what we were looking for and met all our requirements for a wonderful stay in Sydney.
Great Stay

What a great find, convenient location, quiet, close to public transport and walkable to many attractions. Secure space, secure parking, comfortable bed, plenty of towels,  a nice restaurant nearby, plenty of room and privacy.

Fantastic stay. Hospitality was great. Linda was very responsive and ensured that we were happy. Place is in a really nice neighbourhood,  close to the city and Redfern station (never waited more than 5 mins for a train).
回覆速度很快且清楚

It’s really a great place to stay as it’s near Redfern station, making it convenient to travel to either places.

The house is neat and equipped with all essential that you need.

Great place, super clean, perfect location and Linda was very responsive and nice (before, during and after our stay)
We enjoyed our stay and definitely recommend Linda's place.

well situated for railway station and in a safe up and coming area with a real sense of history, the flat is comfortable and has everything you would need for any length of stay, bed is comfortable and having two toilets is a bonus.
No problem with noise (except the stairs which do creak a bit) and plenty of fans to keep cool in both lounge and bedroom.
Linda responded very quickly to any questions and we would recommend the apartment.
Gut ausgestattet, tolle Lage, zentru (Hidden by Airbnb) ah. Super Kontakt mit Gastgeberin.

The apartment exceeds the description, perfectly located, clean, well equiped , Linda could not have been more helpful. Redfern is a cool place to stay lots of great and interesting places to eat at and very easy to travel round from. Highly recommend!!

L'appartement de Linda est confortable et très bien équipé. Tout est bien pensé et pratique pour un séjour agréable. L'emplacement est bien situé et calme. Linda est disponible pour répondre à nos questions. Nous avons passé un super séjour!
Great place, great host, convenient location, my family was very happy staying here!

Linda communicated well with prompt replys. The car space is great especially in the busy city. The place was clean and quiet with thoughtful additions such as opal cards and Timtams on our arrival.
There is a great little bar across the road from the apartment which was wonderful to sit and people watch in the afternoon.
Great host, fast respond. Place very near Redfern station. House very tidy and comfort.

Linda was super responsive and thoughtful. There were opal cards ready for us to use and suggestions for food and sightseeing. The place was clean and everything was prepared for us enough to experience a five star rating stay. The place has got a washing machine and a balcony for us to hang the clothes. We used all the spaces provided - did our morning exercises in the balcony, took photos at the other balcony and dad used the toilet downstairs. The night before we checked out, Linda texted us and said she could offer a late check out as there were no late requests. My parents loved staying at Linda’s and I bet they would stay here again next time.

This bring my first AirBnB experience, it was definitely better than most of my hotel stays. Place is situated at a very convenient location with easy access to public transport. Linda is very reaponsive and very genuine and accomodating to all the requests. Overall, a very positive experience. Thank you so much! Highly recommend this place for a pleasant and comfortable stay!! :)

Location was perfect as it's 5 mins walk away from Redfern Station which has trains to many lines. Lots of university students walking around so it's more lively, though the street it's on is peaceful. 5 mins walk another way brings you to lovely cafes (Cafe Ella was my fav for coffee and pastries). Inside the home, it's spacious and cosy with full amenities. Appreciated the electric heated bed during winter. Linda has also been very helpful and responsive when I've got questions on the fly. Thank you!

非常非常棒的房东,有事与她联系,都会悉心解答,因为都是年纪比较大的阿姨伯伯,又不会英文,遇到了很多问题,还好有Linda帮忙,都一一解决了｡非常赞\(≧▽≦)/!
房子也很整洁干净,可以说是一应俱全｡总的来说,住的非常舒服!谢谢!希望下次来澳洲还能住你的房子｡｡｡｡那个时候希望有空调就好了!
Very, very good landlord.
older aunts and uncles cannot speak English, they have many problems. Fortunately, Linda has helped them.Thank you so much.
This is a very comfortable house to live in.and very clean and tidy.I hope to live in your house next time I come to Australia...

This is my second time staying with Linda. Linda;s an amazing host, quick to respond with messages and very thoughtful. The place is similar to the pictures posted. 5 minutes walk to red fern station. Would definitely recommend this place.

Linda's place is truly amazing! It has all the stuff that you would expect from a real "home" and not just some guest-house. Cooking materials and utensils, cloth detergent, tea & coffee selections, toys for kids... you name it, she has it :) (the kids love the TimTam :) )
Communication is super-easy and she responded almost in real-time. The location of the place is also superb - 5 mins walk from nearest train station. And for those who rent car, the apartment comes with a dedicated parking slot in the basement!
I strongly recommend Linda's place to anyone coming to Sydney!!
This apartment is located near Redfern station, it is a very convenient  and quiet place. The host Linda is a very nice lady. My daughter and I had a wonderful time here. Love Sydney!
Linda is exceptional from booking to check-out. The property is conveniently located too. Will definitely come back to book again.
Really good place to live in!
Great place, great neighborhood, great host! We stayed for 10 days and felt right at home.

Thanks Linda. This apartment was pretty good for me to stay. The host: Linda was so kind and the response was very quick. Thanks to Linda, I really enjoyed the trip in Sydney. I definitely recommend everyone to chose this apartment.

We had a great stay at Linda's place. Loved the location, perfect too as we were there for an event at Carriagworks which is a five minute walk away. Close to the train, good cafes/restaurants in the area. You can easily work to Redfern and Chippendale to explore the wider neighbourhood. Easy check in and quick response from Linda, helpful info booklet on the apartment and area.  Clean apartment, balconies, all details thought through with everything you need for an enjoyable stay. Quiet at night, I slept so well! Recommended and would definitely stay again
Great location and easy to find. Car space is an added bonus
很高兴能入住Linda & Linh 的房子,早上飞机到达,很早就入住了｡位置很方便,离市区,唐人街20-25分钟慢悠悠步行可到｡主人关于入住提示很详细,很贴心并回复迅速｡居家用品很齐全｡床上用品很舒服｡很适合短期在悉尼居住｡

linda and linh were super accomodating and allowed an earlier check in as my flight landed early. overalk the place is comfortable and the shower has good pressure and hot water. the place was relatively close to the station and was easy to get around from.

My parents and I spent a very great time in Linda's home. The house was comfy and service was excellent. My family made a terrible mistake but Linda is so kind that she tried to solve this problem many times. We had a good communication with each other to look for a best way to cope with the problem. I am sooooo happy to chat with Linda ❤ Thanks Linda!
Btw, everyone may like the lovely house and the location is so convenient! It's the best choice to select in Sydney!!! I will live next time when I come to Sydney!
Linda’s place was great. Close to great coffee shop/pub, Redfern train station, city and many other amenities. The apartment has lots of convienences which made our stay very accommodating.
great unit. clean and tidy
Linda very nice, answer quicky, near to city and station.

It is our first trip to Sydney, with my family including our 1-year-old, and all thanks to Linda, this was an amazing trip. Especially, my 1-year-old enjoyed it a lot. The property is very very close to Redfern (5 min walk) which means going to anywhere in the CBD is very very easy. There are a good cafe and a pub just in front of the property, which means you are covered if you are too lazy :-).

We chose to cook most of the days, as Linda ensured all cooking amenities are readily available for the guests. I could reach out to her and ask her any question and always got a prompt response. Overall, I highly recommend this property to anyone, especially anyone with kid(s).

clean and cozy
close to station, city and the university of Sydney
Have three balconies
Convenient for cooking at the unit
The place is easy to everywhere,and the owner prepared everything for the guests
Nice host, quick respond, good location near to train station.
Overall nice place and good host
Linda is a Good host!
Pleasant apartment in a very convenient location.

name: "Grandpa's Cottage" 2 Story Studio
summary: Grandpa's Cottage has a high vaulted ceiling that towers above the living area below consisting of a remodeled kitchen & bathroom. Upstairs you have a very comfortable king size bed. A small private yard and outdoor shower is yours to enjoy. All the shops and restaurants in Kailua Town are right around the corner and Kailua Beach (Kalama Beach Park) takes less than 15 minutes to walk to. There's a dedicated parking stall for your vehicle or rent a bike to stay in and around Kailua Town.
space: Grandpa's Cottage is a unique two story loft that allows guests the feeling of open air and space. Dark wood accents the white walls. A newly remolded kitchen and bathroom make longer stays quite enjoyable. The bed sofa acts as a comfortable couch or extra sleeping space when needed. Walking up the wooden flight of stairs will take you to your king size Serta Beautyrest bed. After laying down for nap or a good nights sleep you will awaken to greenery out the pane glass windows. It is private, it is open, it is roomy, it is your very own space to enjoy your stay in Kailua! This is a residential community, and we can only have one booking during any 30 day period. So, depending on season and length of stay, rates are minimum $2,999/month. Typically we don't accept any requests that are shorter then two weeks. We are very flexible, so inquire with your dates and we'll see what we can work out. PRICE INCLUDES ALL GE & TAT TAXES!!! Full Kitchen, including: All utensils & cooking utensils, S

neighborhood_overview: Kailua is a vacation destination. President Obama makes his annual winter trip to stay here. There are white sand beaches and a blue ocean to swim in. Ocean activities range from kayaking, to surfing, to kitesurfing. The town is full of restaurants and shops that cater to both locals and tourists. Hiking is an activity that balances out all those beach days. The "Lanikai Pillbox Hike" and the "Maunawili Falls Hike" are to that can be (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)d and explored. Both are relatively easy as families take their 5 year-olds on them.
notes: TAT Tax License - W(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
transit: We are walking distance to the beach, to the restaurants, and to the shops in Kailua Town. Bikes are also available to rent at various places in Kailua and help get to the further destinations. We have excellent public transportation via TheBus is the public transportation that costs $5.00 for an all-day pass. It can get to almost anywhere on the island; Waikiki, North Shore, Ala Moana Shopping Center, etc. Renting a car is helpful too. You have your own private parking stall.
access: You have access to the parking stall, the small yard in front of the cottage, the cottage itself, and around back to the outdoor shower.
interaction: I'm always an email, text, or phone call away. Most days I'm either at work or out at the beach. Afternoon and evenings we may cross paths and you're welcome to say hi or ask a question.
house_rules: Please be respectful at all times. No pets are allowed and no smoking is allowed. Late night hours should be a time of rest as many of us (hopefully including you) are tired from a busy day full of adventures. Please keep noise to a minimum during the late night hours.

host.host_about: A father, a husband, a teacher, and a lover of the ocean.

reviews.comments: I really enjoyed staying in Grandpa’s Cottage.  This was my first time staying in an airbnb, but it was also my first trip to Hawaii.  I felt very welcomed by the host family.  They kept checking in on me to see if I was alright and that everything was well.  They managed just the right amount of assistance while allowing me all the privacy I wanted.  The location is great.  It’s a short walk to downtown, and the beach is close, too, but I preferred to drive there.  Clean with a comfy bed.  I even got used to the sound of “palm trees waving”.  I have already recommended this location to friends.

Christian was a wonderful host, accommodating to the slightest request. He kept to himself most of the time, but was readily available when we needed something. The place was clean and perfect for myself, my partner and our 5 month old daughter. It was a short drive to Kailua and Lanikai beaches, as well as the Pillbox hiking trail. Really really great breakfast places were within a couple blocks, Boots and Kimo (Macadamia Sauce Pancakes), and Cinnamon's (Carrot Pancakes and Fritata omelet).  The small kitchen was ample enough for us to cook a steak dinner with mashed potatoes our last night there. Wallgreens, Whole foods and a bunch of coffee shops were walking distance including a place called Chadlous that has the best ice cream cookie sandwiches (ube ice cream with the chocolate chip cookies was the right choice).  We loved the area, far away from tourists but close to everything you need.  highly recommend Grandpa's Cottage, it felt like home.
We loved our experience at Grandpa's Cottage.  It is a lovely charming cottage, very clean and super central to many activities in Kailua.  I would definitely stay here again.

Location, location, location!!  Absolutely perfect place.  Lots of things within walking distance, including one of the most beautiful beaches in the world.  Cozy and welcoming.  Comfy bed.  Christian was a great host, even though we didn't run into him at all, he was quick to respond to any inquiries we had.  The cottage had pretty much everything we needed.  The only thing I could think of that it could use was an iron (unless it was somewhere in there that I missed).  Highly recommend the spot.  The fact that it has a dedicated parking spot was definitely a bonus.  Would definitely come back, and seeing as my girlfriend is from Oahu, we're likely to come back!

This was our first trip to Hawaii and our first Airbnb experience. It was an ideal location for experiencing the Kailua area and base for exploring the rest of the island. Grandpas cottage is perfect for a couple looking for a quiet place to relax during their holiday. Christian was a great host, always available to provide us with the info we needed about the local amenities and island destinations. We will definitely book again if our travels bring us here.

Christian was a perfect host: attentive but not intrusive.  His "grandpa's cottage" is just 5 min by car from the wonderful Kailua Beach & equally close to Kailua center with its many shops, restaurants, etc

The cottage loft has windows with tree views that give one the delightful feeling of sleeping in a tree house.  New, attractive appliances, kitchen cabinets, shower, etc

Especially appreciated was the reserved parking area steps from the cottage door.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Christian's cottage & recommend it for anyone who wants to experience time in a Kailua neighborhood.

Grandpa's Cottage is an excellent place to stay for a quiet and relaxing getaway. The place is beautifully located in Kailua, walking distance to restaurants and shopping districts, five minute drive to Kailua beach. The cottage is very clean, modern and cozy, perfect place for a couple to stay at. I highly recommend staying here.

My boyfriend and I had an absolutely amazing time at "Grandpa's Cottage."  The cottage was in a perfect location (right by grocery stores, and the most beautiful beaches in the world), and was the perfect space to cook dinner, drink a glass of wine, and relax at the end of the day.  The cottage had all of the amenities we could have asked for and more, and Christian could not have been a more accommodating and kind host.  We definitely did not want to end our stay in Kailua!

Grandpas Cottage was a great place to stay. Great location in Kailua, a few minute drive to Kailua and Lanikai beach. Centrally located with great food all within walking distance. The cottage itself was very cozy and clean. Definitely coming back to stay here in the future.

Christian was a awesome host! The cottage was more than what we expected! The space felt nice and the neighborhood was just what we were looking for. It wasn't clustered with tourist and cars, but it was very mellow and homey. We felt like we were living with the locals and that was the exact experience we were looking for! I would recommend this place to anyone who is trying to have a nice and not so tourist like experience of Hawaii! We were walking distance from the beach! They also provided with boards and chairs to sit on the beach with! We couldn't ask for a better host for our first time in Hawaii!

Christian was a terrific host! Attentive but not intrusive was described in an earlier review - perfect description! It's a 5-8 minute walk to restaurants, shopping and the ever-indulgent Whole Foods Grocery! (There are less costly grocery stores also available). We walked to the beach (15 min) and the Farmer's Market (7 min), too. quiet neighborhood.
The bed is the most comfortable we've ever slept in! The posted pics are spot on. You'll have everything you need inside and outside for the perfect place to stay. Thanks, Christian!
Great location only 10 mins from the beach by foot. The cottage is private and spacious for 2. The bed was huge and comfortable.

Grandpa's Cottage was a wonderful cottage in Kailua to stay in. Christian had nicely ensured that everything was clean and welcoming. 

There was a note from him upon entering that provided the basic contact information as well as the wifi password which made settling in very easy. 

Kailua is a beautiful smaller city that was very pleasant, and I was fortunate enough to be there for their local street festival which was an amazing way to get a sense of the community. 

Driving around Oahu from Grandpas Cottage was very convenient as I wanted to see the whole Island, and the major roads are extremely accessible.

Christian was a lovely host who was very approachable and welcoming. I knew that if I needed anything then he would have been more than happy to help me out.

Overall a fantastic host and location for travellers that want to experience an 'off the beaten path' vacation.

I really felt like a local. The cottage looked just like how it did in the pictures. This place was clean, comfy, and had boogie boards! Christian is an awesome host who made sure I was taken care of. Thanks man!
Christian was a great host and my mom and I loved staying in his cottage. It's a great place for a beach vacation or if you're in the military looking for temporary housing in beautiful Kailua!

Perfect, private and spacious! Shops and restaurants are just around the corner. My husband and I enjoyed being able to walk to Kailua in the afternoon and evenings. It was also convenient to have a place to park each day and not stress about street parking. You'll love the cottage!
My father in low said it's a good place! And his response is really quick and responsible, thank you for letting my family staying!

Christian was a very pleasant gentleman with a very nice family. The cottage is located in a residential neighborhood, is close to the main house and neighbors, yet is private. It was clean and neat and perfect for a couple. The loft bed was great with tropical breezes at night. Kailua is a very nice town much more mellow than tourist driven Waikiki....close to both beach and town restaurants etc. In summary two thumbs up!

Christian was an amazing host! Super helpful when needed but also provided us space. The listing was exactly as described, such a beautiful and clean cottage with ample space. The neighbourhood is quiet and comfortable, easy walking distance to stores/restaurants/beaches without the hustle and bustle of Waikiki. Perfect in-between location with about a half hour drive to the North Shore or Honolulu! Will definitely be back and recommend this spot to all our friends.

Accommodations were clean and comfortable.  Christian was quick to help when we had a couple of small problems.  There were many stores and restaurants within walking distance.  The farmer's market was at the end of the street.  The beaches in the area were beautiful and were grateful for the use of the chairs and boogie boards.  Thank you, Christian.

My dad and I stayed at Christian's this past week and had a great time. Perfect location - close to beach, shops and restaurants. Kailua is such an awesome town. Christian really respects his guests' privacy but checks in to make sure everything is ok, which is great. Mahalo!
Place was great, clean comfortable safe location. Great local vibe. Host was chill and was very accommodating.
Wonderful, Clean, Welcoming home and host.
We had a wonderful time in Kailua.  The cottage was conveniently located close to town and the beach, easy walking distance to both.  The place was clean and Christian was very welcoming and helpful.

I stayed there for 3 weeks with my daughter and we loved the place so much! 
The place is very convenient and close to the Kailua central area, where you find Wholefoods, Target, Safeway, Longs, and other shops, yet the cottage is located off the main street, so very quiet and safe. 
The place is maintained very well and clean, equipped with everything you need. Our host Christian was just so nice! When we needed more kitchen items such as extra pans (they have most stuff ready but we just wanted to enjoy cooking more), he kindly added items immediately for us. There's no AC but you don't need it at all, as you always get nice breeze from windows. 
We really enjoyed our stay there just like living in Kailua as locals. We definitely recommend to consider staying at this cottage! Thank you very much Christian!!
Christian was kind, helpful and welcoming.  The location of the cottage is ideal - close to beach and right in Kailua, with most things within walking distance.
Thank-you for a fantastic stay, Christian. We loved Grandpa's Cottage and the Kailua area - would thoroughly recommend this to anyone.
The host canceled this reservation 33 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This has been the most amazing experience. This is the best place to stay in Hawaii. A walk away from the beach and downtown Kailua. Christian was friendly and hospitable. He ensured I had everything I needed and I had the utmost privacy to enjoy my stay. Highly recommend. Book asap. His place is amazing.
Walk to any restaurant in Kailua or to the beach. Ample parking, great connectivity, and a very friendly and responsive host.

We had a great time staying at Christian's, it was conveniently located with walking distance to restaurants and shops. 

The check - in was effortless and the studio was very cute & quaint. Would be perfect for a small family or a couple.
Great time in Kailua with Grandpa's Cottage.  It was nice to have a separate bed loft with a comfy, large bed.  Kitchen was totally adequate and appreciated.  Great to have our own space.

This place is perfect. There is a big bed in the loft, which helps create a separation between the living area and bed room. The kitchen has everything you will need, along with christians beach chairs and boogie boards. Its nice that you get your own parking spot as well, you dont have to worry about where you are going to park. It is very close to down town, so you can walk everywhere, it is also very close to the beach, I personally liked the beach more than Waikiki, only because you aren't towel to towel. This part of the island does get a little bit cloudier but hop in the car or bus and you can get to another beach that is clear and sunny in a couple of minutes. If you are lucky enough to book this place I would highly recommend it.
All around an excellent place. Great people and easy bike ride to the best beaches on the island. Very private and peaceful. Great breeze and super comfortable bed.

Christian was a great host, very friendly and very accommodating especially for our check-in/out times. 
We used the boogie boards and had a lot of fun using them at Kailua beach. We went to a few beaches and found that Kailua beach had the nicest sand and it wasn't packed with people. 
The town has a great rental shop where we rented paddle boards and was within walking distance (5 min) to the beach (they gave you karts to pull the boards).
Short drive to go grocery shopping and a short walk to restaurants. Even though there was no a/c it was comfortable at night. He rented us his car which helped us explore the island at a very reasonable rate. I Would definitely recommend this rental to anyone staying in Oahu.
Thanks Christian, we had a blast
Grandpa's Cottage was awesome, clean, quiet, everything you need for a perfect time in Kailua. Highly recommend and will certainly be back for another stay.
Christian was a great host. The accommodations were very efficient. Location is walking distance to beaches and town. I would definitely stay there again and recommend it to others.

The cottage was perfect for us, it had a full kitchen and plenty of room. We stayed early May and found it rained in the morning and the evening with quite a bit of wind at night. It is a warm rain. We really enjoyed the sound of many different birds singing in the morning. Windows on the second floor stayed open all the time for a nice breeze and a ceiling fan kept it cool. The only thing we missed was local television, there is a tv that you can watch movies on but not news or local channels. Many wonderful restaurants and Kailua Beach is beautiful. Bedroom is on the second floor which makes a small place roomy. It is a King sized bed and very comfortable.

I stayed at Christian's place for 6 weeks during the summer when I got a summer job in town. I could not have asked for a better place and a nicer host! It was a perfect location for a long stay in Oahu. It was super close to grocery stores, shopping, beaches, and access to highways to travel and explore the island. The bed was super comfy and the kitchen and bathroom were no-nonsense and perfectly functional. I highly reccommend staying here! We hope to return next summer!

I had a Great stay.  Nice safe neighborhood near beautiful Kalama beach parch and the main stores and bus stop.  Chris was always helpful.   The house is cozy and upstairs very breezy, I slept very well.

Christian is an amazing host - super friendly and really helpful. He provided us with everything we needed for a great stay in Kailua and was on hand to answer any questions we had or add to anything that was missing in the house that we needed.

The house feels much bigger than it seems in the ad - the bed upstairs is HUGE - my husband and I had the best sleep we've ever had while staying here! The kitchen is small but it does the job - we cooked at home almost every day during our 30 day stay and managed fine. 

The location is great - just a few minutes drive/bike ride from town where you can buy groceries or eat out etc. There's also a huge park nearby with free tennis courts and a swimming pool. There are 3 beaches just a 10 - 15min cycle away (our favourite was an access to Kailua beach just before the main beach park).

I would definitely stay here again!
Nice loft space. Good communication. Comfy bed.

The apartment is very nice and comfortable in a quiet neighborhood. The location was fantastic...we walked and rode our rented hybrid bikes to town and the beach every day.  Its a few minutes to town and 10 to 15 minutes bike ride to kailua beach.
Excellent space, host is very accommodating. Great location with private parking and a comfortable, clean interior.

It is a quiet area. You have your privacy since you have the whole cottage to yourself.  Close to everything! You can walk to a gas station, Whole Foods and pretty much any store in Kailua.  We had a car so we were able to go everywhere in the island.

Easy transaction and check in.  Christian is flexible. You have everything that you need in the cottage for cooking, eating, cleaning etc.  There are beach chairs and an umbrella you can use for the beach.  There is also a shower outside the cottage to rinse yourself before coming in, surprisingly water is warm!

The place is very clean.  The bed is huge in the upstairs.  Plenty of space in the closet.  Ceiling fan helps and there are other 2 fans you can use if feeling hot; also you can open windows and close them before you leave the cottage in case it might rain.

Christian is easily available if you have questions.  I didn't need much since I've been in Kailua several times.  I recommend this place!

Third time staying at grandpas cottage and it is always amazing. Will continue to go back! Great location, wonderful loft space, and very private. Having a kitchen is a plus on nights you don't want to go out and there is everything that you need including towels, bikes, outdoor as well and inside shower, beach umbrellas and chairs etc. Hearing the birds in the morning is the best! Read the book Hawaii that is there! See ya next year! Thanks for another wonderful stay!
