We loved staying here, it was a perfect size for two adults. The bed was super comfortable and with the upstairs windows open an amazing breeze blows through the room. The central location was perfect for getting out and exploring the island, with down town Kailua just minutes away. The beaches in town were absolutely beautiful and had a ton of water activities available. Communication with Christian was smooth and accurate. I would highly recommend this place to anyone wanting to visit and not feel like they are staying in a touristy spot.
The best apartment we had in Kailua so far- clean, close to shops, spacious. It is around 15min walking distance to the beach, but very close to wholefoods and walgreens.
Pretty much in central Kailua close to everything
We enjoyed our stay in Christian's flat and particularly liked the location, far from the traffic. The place is full of light, quiet, surrounded by lovely gardens and close to the beaches

This was our first Air B&B experience & it was wonderful! Communication with Christian was extremely fluid. He responded promptly with answers to all of our questions. 

Photos of Grandpa’s Cottage are very accurate! Upon our arrival, instructions regarding parking & check in were extremely easy to follow. The place was stocked with all the necessities to accommodate our stay. For example, lots of toiletries including shampoo, conditioner, soap, toilet paper, clean beach & bath towels & linen. There were also extra pillows, sheets & bedding available for use. The kitchen included a small fridge, stove, all the dishes/cooking utensils & silverware. Also had paper towels, paper bags, trash bags, sandwich bags, etc. We found everything we needed & more! 

Christian also provided beach chairs with an umbrella & a cute newly purchased patio set that made outside sitting very enjoyable. We also used it to hang our bathing suits for drying. Additionally, he has an outdoor shower & a spigot to ensure you wash all the sand off before entering the cottage. 

We had a huge king size bed upstairs with closet space, hangers & a nice little nook area. There were books to enjoy as well. Our favorite part of upstairs was opening the windows at night to enjoy the natural cool breeze & the ceiling fan was a huge plus during the day as it got a bit warmer! 

Grandpa’s Cottage was a bit tight considering we’re from Texas (& everything is bigger in Texas lol) but it was perfect for the 2 of us & we thoroughly enjoyed our 11 day stay.

Several times during our stay at 6am, we walked from the cottage to Kalama Beach which was about a 10-15 min walk. It was beautiful to know we were that close to a great beach! We also had plenty of eatery & shopping options in walking distance. There is a very clean laundry mat nearby that’s open 24/7 which was very useful. 

Christian was sure to respect our privacy & we were extremely happy to meet him a few days into our stay. He also made certain to visit with us upon checkout. He checked on us several times during our stay via Air B&B messaging to ensure we were doing well & had everything we needed. Super great hospitality! 

We will absolutely consider staying here again & strongly recommend you try it out.

This is a great place to stay, especially if you do not want to be bothered with a car.  It is within walking distance to many interesting shops, restaurants and beaches and it is on the bus line if you want to explore other parts of the island.  The cottage is very comfortable and has it's own private outdoor space.  I would definitely stay there again!!!!!

Grandpa's cottage is clean, bright and full of the amenities you'd expect to have on hand for a good beach vacation.  I didn't rent a car while I was in Kailua.  There is a bike for guests to use, but I chose to walk everywhere - fantastic beach, 20 minutes away; stores and restaurants, 2 to 10 minutes away.  And the stop to get on a bus to Honolulu is about a 3-minute walk.  The location is so central and Christian is a genial, helpful host.  I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.
It has such a cozy and at home feeling, the location is perfect from places to shop and get food as well as near the beach. I fully recommend it it was a great stay and surpassed my expectations!
A cozy studio with walking distance to town and beaches . I can highly recommend Grandpa's cottage .

Christian's place is cozy and has everything you'd need for a nice stay in the area. Central location. Nice walk to the beach, town and really anywhere! The neighborhood is super quiet. And Christian is very hospitable and kind.

Nous avons beaucoup apprécié  notre séjour au cottage.
Lieu très propre, tous les équipements nécessaires et les produits disponibles en cuisine et dans la salle de bain.
Nous avons particulièrement apprécié la literie et le calme. 
Un seul petit bémol pour nous: l'absence de climatisation mais c'est parce que nous ne sommes pas habitués au combo humidité/ température des îles . Cela ne nous a pas empêché de bien dormir car le cottage est entouré  de fenêtres qui permettent mes courants d'air.
Christian est un hôte attentionné: il est réactif et prends des nouvelles sans être du tout intrusif.
Je conseille ce lieu pour un séjour sur Oahu
Great location and private oasis.  Was exactly what I needed and quick response from the host.
Great cozy cottage! It has everything you need.
The host was very accommodating. The space was in a great location, clean, and exactly what we were looking for during our time in Hawaii.
Nice little apartment. Kailua is a great home base

This is a cozy cottage that have everything you need for a vacation! First time in Oahu and we stayed here for 2 weeks (2 adults) . It’s clean, we felt safe and the bed is very comfy. Christian is a great host that quickly respond whenever we had any questions and gave us a lot of tip to get the best of the island. Kailua beach is about 15 min walk. Restaurants, boutiques and super markets nearby. We would recommend to rent a car (we used Turo, which was great) to see the rest of the island. Thank you again Christian!

We are a couple that enjoyed our stay for 8 nights. The cottage is as advertised. Cute, very clean and airy and bright even on the days when we got rain. The kitchen had all we needed with a stove that was good and we could use the broiler for toasting bagels. It has a great coffee maker and some various condiments available for use. Appreciated the bag of raw cane sugar and coffee. The fridge is small but sufficient and the freezer works just for the ice tray. The bathroom and shower were very nice and numerous good towels etc were provided. The sitting area has a comfy couch and although no cable, we had access to Netflix for the rainy evenings. The loft area is bright and so nice to sit looking out from the REALLY comfortable king bed. There's a closet to hang clothes and a set of drawers and a place to put folded clothes. There were good boogie boards and chairs, beach mats and towels for our use. Christian is very pleasant and responded quickly to any communications and was quick to provide a needed beach umbrella as soon as he could. The location is off a lane on a neighborhood residential street and is very quiet and private. It's a short walk to Kailua town which has a great feel with lots of stores, including Whole Foods and places to eat. The beautiful beach is 3 long blocks away and takes 10-15 minutes to walk. We would definitely stay here on a return visit.
The space, location and hospitality was exactly what all the reviews rave about. Everything in town was close. It was exceptional.

name: Cuty Apartment MONTREAL-Le plateau
summary: Appartement à louer avec cachet. Calme et mignon. 49 mètres carrés (560 pieds carrés).  4 pièces avec un balcon avant et arrière.  Situé sur LE PLATEAU MONT-ROYAL. Près de tous les services et du métro. Grands parcs à proximité.
space: *************** Charming and quiet apartment.  4 pieces, all included. (560 feet square) To rent for a minimum of 3 months on LE PLATEAU MONT-ROYAL. From a walking distance from "métro Laurier", all services on commercials streets Laurier and Mont-Royal and parks Laurier and Lafontaine. In the front, a happy school yard and in the back, a green alley. Not much cars. This apartment is the only one on location in a 6 'bloc appartement'. It's on the second floor. The five owners likes calm and clean environment. Perfect for a single person or a couple.  Price: 1275$/month (no parking) All confortable fournitures included. Also the cable and internet wi-fi. Contact me, Eve Duranceau. I'll answer your questions with pleasure.
description: *************** Charming and quiet apartment.  4 pieces, all included. (560 feet square) To rent for a minimum of 3 months on LE PLATEAU MONT-ROYAL. From a walking distance from "métro Laurier", all services on commercials streets Laurier and Mont-Royal and parks Laurier and Lafontaine. In the front, a happy school yard and in the back, a green alley. Not much cars. This apartment is the only one on location in a 6 'bloc appartement'. It's on the second floor. The five owners likes calm and clean environment. Perfect for a single person or a couple.  Price: 1275$/month (no parking) All confortable fournitures included. Also the cable and internet wi-fi. Contact me, Eve Duranceau. I'll answer your questions with pleasure.
neighborhood_overview: Tous les services (épicerie, fruiterie, Société des alcools, pharmacie) et boutiques diverses de la rue Mont-Royal ainsi que ceux de la rue Laurier est sont à 2 minutes de marche. Les deux magnifiques parcs Lafontaine et Laurier sont à proximité. Le Mont-Royal est accessible en transport en commun ou à 20 minutes de marche.
transit: À pied à 5-10 minutes: Métro Laurier (ligne orange) et le ligne de bus 51 Autobus au coin de la rue: l'express 427 ou l'autobue 27 St-Joseph Autobus à 2 minutes de marche également sur la rue Mont-Royal
interaction: Je peux vous apporter conseil et aide tout au long de votre séjour.
house_rules: I want non-smocking people or people that smock outside. I don't accept animals and I need calm people so my neighbours do not get disturb. Thank you.

host.host_about: De Montréal

name: 2 grandes chambres queen, appartement lumineux
summary: - Une chambre double avec lit queen + Une chambre régulière avec lit queen = possibilité de loger 4 personnes - À 3 min du métro Beaubien et 4 min du métro Rosemont - Place de parking disponible  - Au dernier étage d'un triplex (escaliers extérieurs puis intérieurs, adresse affichée à l'étage) - Station de vélos publics Bixi à proximité - Tous commerces, bars et restaurants, marché Jean Talon, Petite Italie à 15 min à pieds.  - Endroit idéal pour goûter pleinement au style de vie montréalais.
space: - C'est un grand appartement lumineux et aéré, on aime ouvrir pour l'aérer en été ! - Au dernier étage d'un triplex, dans un style typiquement montréalais avec une distribution des pièces toute en longueur.  - Grand balcon dégagé donnant sur une cour dans une ruelle calme et verte, un grand bonheur en été ! - Tout équipé : laveuse, sécheuse, lave-vaisselle, climatisation dans une des deux chambres et ventilateur dans l'autre. - Une seule salle de bain - toilette commune dans l'appartement. - Les deux chambres sont pourvues de penderies pour ranger le linge et d'un bureau de travail. - La chambre double est très lumineuse et donne sur une rue avec circulation, mais l'isolation sonore est bonne. - La chambre régulière est coté cour, particulièrement calme, un peu moins lumineuse que la chambre double. - La décoration - principalement constituée de plantes - est globalement moderne, sobre mais vivante. C'est zen ! - L'appartement a été rafraichi en 2016 (parquet, cloisons, peintures, élec
description: - Une chambre double avec lit queen + Une chambre régulière avec lit queen = possibilité de loger 4 personnes - À 3 min du métro Beaubien et 4 min du métro Rosemont - Place de parking disponible  - Au dernier étage d'un triplex (escaliers extérieurs puis intérieurs, adresse affichée à l'étage) - Station de vélos publics Bixi à proximité - Tous commerces, bars et restaurants, marché Jean Talon, Petite Italie à 15 min à pieds.  - Endroit idéal pour goûter pleinement au style de vie montréalais. - C'est un grand appartement lumineux et aéré, on aime ouvrir pour l'aérer en été ! - Au dernier étage d'un triplex, dans un style typiquement montréalais avec une distribution des pièces toute en longueur.  - Grand balcon dégagé donnant sur une cour dans une ruelle calme et verte, un grand bonheur en été ! - Tout équipé : laveuse, sécheuse, lave-vaisselle, climatisation dans une des deux chambres et ventilateur dans l'autre. - Une seule salle de bain - toilette commune dans l'appartement. - Les d
neighborhood_overview: L'appartement est au cœur du quartier Beaubien avec tous les commerces bars et restaurants qu'il faut, et notamment une zone commerçante appelée "Plaza Saint-Hubert". L'appartement est situé au croisement de 4 grandes zones : Plateau Mont Royal (quartier très français), Mile End (quartier Bohème style hipster plein de designers, commerces alternatifs), Petite Italie / Mile Ex (ancien quartier industriel en développement) et Rosemont / Petite Patrie (un peu plus résidentiel). Le marché Jean Talon qui est réputé est à 15 minutes à pieds (Fruits, légumes, boucherie, fromagerie, poissonnerie et plantes dans le marché même, et tout autour on trouve une SAQ - magasin d'alcool - des boulangeries, restaurants, terrasses, épiceries, magasins asiatiques, orientaux, africains, latinos…). À 10 minutes à pieds de l'autre coté se trouve le Parc Laurier, un parc emblématique du Plateau.  L'immeuble donne d'un coté sur la rue Saint-Denis, une artère majeure de Montréal, et de l'autre coté sur une cour
notes: Nous gardons des chats de temps en temps. Ne louez pas cet appartement si vous êtes allergiques aux chats !
transit: - Place de parking disponible dans la cour arrière (Eventuellement deux places de parking, demander confirmation). - Parking gratuit dans la rue devant l'appartement (excepté du lundi au vendredi de 16h à 18h30) - Station de métro Beaubien (ligne orange) à 3 minutes à pieds. - Station de métro Rosemont (ligne orange) à 4 minutes à pieds. - Bus 18 (Beaubien) à 3 minutes à pieds - Station de Vélos Public BIXI à 2 minutes (croisement des rues Bellechasse et Saint-Vallier)
access: Vous aurez accès à une chambre régulière, une chambre double et à toutes les parties communes : cuisine, salon, salle de bain, buanderie (laveuse et sécheuse), balcon sur rue, balcon sur cour. Vous pourrez également bénéficier d'une place de parking dans la cour (Merci d'indiquer si vous pensez l'occuper).
interaction: - L'appartement est une colocation, il y a une troisième chambre occupée à temps partiel. - Le locataire viendra arroser les plantes, et passera une ou deux nuits par semaine sur place. - N'hésitez pas à demander si vous voulez l'appartement pour vous seulement.

host.host_about: Je suis rédacteur, graphiste et photographe d'art. Français et canadien, je suis installé à Montréal depuis 2011.

reviews.comments: Très bel appartement! Spacieux, lumineux, extrêmement bien situé dans Montréal. Nous avons également reçu un excellent accueil!

Place was huge! You get a whole flat to yourself, warm lighting, everything is clean, spacious bathroom, adorable cat to be your roommate. Aside from minor hiccups like the cat vomiting everything was perfect.

Lovely space - bright, clean, spacious and lots of interesting and beautiful plants. Good area that is very accessible to transit and good local hang-outs. Great value for money. Yaan was a very good communicator and made check in and check out easy for us.

We had a lovely stay at Yann’s place. The apartment is very large and bright with lots of house plants. Gizmo the cat is very friendly and a nice addition to the apartment. Yann was very helpful and explained everything thoroughly. Very comfortable bed and ample amenities. Short walk to metro station, Mile End and Little Italy. Would stay again!
Great place
Very clean and comfortable place.  Great location.
Appartement simple et complet , Yann est quelqu’un de très sympathique et gysmo le chat est adorable ! L’endroit est calme et proche du métro , parfait pour visiter montreal . Je recommande

A beautiful apartment in vibrant neighbourhood. The host Yann was extremely welcoming and helpful. Rooms were spacious, clean and comfortable. Would highly recommend & definitely return in future. Ps Gismo the cat is the best housemate ever!
Great location, good value and very comfortable place to stay in Montreal. Host was also very easy to communicate with. Would not hesitate to go back.
Nice and Cozy place, great host and a good location.
Staying at Yann's place was like being in cozy cottage in the country. - spacious, quiet and charming with a very welcoming and friendly host~!!!
Yann’s place was well stocked and easy to find. We used the back entrance for parking, which was convenient, and he communicated well from the start to the finish. Recommended!
Yang’s place is awesome. It’s very clean and the location is good. He’s the best host I’ve ever had. Also, the cat Gizmo is sooooo cute!
Good

name: Gorgeous View! Newly Remodeled!!
summary: This updated condo is located in one of the best spots at Turtle Bay Resort. Its view over looks the golf course and extends to the horse stables and continues on to a peek of an ocean view. The condo has colorful style and great paintings of Hawaii.
space: Gorgeous newly remodeled kitchen with view of Turtle Bay golf course and Ocean. King bed just put in master (not pictured yet)
description: This updated condo is located in one of the best spots at Turtle Bay Resort. Its view over looks the golf course and extends to the horse stables and continues on to a peek of an ocean view. The condo has colorful style and great paintings of Hawaii. Gorgeous newly remodeled kitchen with view of Turtle Bay golf course and Ocean. King bed just put in master (not pictured yet) Guests have access to turtle bay resort restaurants and bars. They also have access to the condo Pools, tennis courts, and BBQ. Property Manager available via phone to assist with any questions. It's ideal to rent a car when staying at our unit, but there is a bus stop just outside the condo gates to make it easy to get to and from most local stops. It's recommended to view The Bus rules and schedules. Unit has beach chairs, snorkel gear, and beach towels that you can take to the beach with you.
notes: Unit has beach chairs, snorkel gear, and beach towels that you can take to the beach with you.
transit: It's ideal to rent a car when staying at our unit, but there is a bus stop just outside the condo gates to make it easy to get to and from most local stops. It's recommended to view The Bus rules and schedules.
access: Guests have access to turtle bay resort restaurants and bars. They also have access to the condo Pools, tennis courts, and BBQ.
interaction: Property Manager available via phone to assist with any questions.

reviews.comments: Awesome apartment just blocks from Turtle Bay Hilton on Oahu's north shore. Even with our booking time so close to our stay everything was in order.  Easy check in process. Had a great time here and would recommend this place to anyone.

It was a little confusing getting in and finding the unit. Met a very helpful Domino's pizza delivery guy.  He showed us where to go. Location of the unit was good. Kitchen needs updated and the unit had a musty smell, especially when you open the drawers.  Overall enjoyed our stay.

from the second we landed on the island Maisa, our host , took care of us. We loved the condo and will defentitly be coming back and staying again. Super fun waves right out front, walk to the restaurant at turtle bay, and all the ammenties of being at home. I would reccomend this to anyone wanting to stay on the north shore, and having the peace of mind of being in a gated community..Much Aloha from Maisa. Mahalo, Ryan

Condo was perfect for a lon weekend.  Kitchen has just been remodeled and looks great.  Everything was very clean.  Would definitely stay again.  Host was great about getting back regarding availability and directions, etc.
We had a fabulous stay, very happy with the facilities and the size of the place compared with what was on offer at the resort itself. Would recommend to all.

The property was very nice and comfortable to stay at.  It has everything required and all of it is practically brand new.  The back door faces the golf course but the property is still very quiet.  Most of the sounds come from the adjacent properties (door slamming, walking, etc)

It is a short, flat and leisurely walk (10mins) to Turtle Bay resort and some beaches.

Chrystal who managed the correspondence, was very responsive, caring and made sure everything was in order and checked in with me throughout the process.  

It was definitely a pleasure staying here.
everything was amazing. Quiet , comfortable and i can't wait to get back. Aloha !!

The condo was beautiful, the area was great and the price was perfect. Last year we stayed at Turtle Bay and planned to do the same this year, when I saw the cost of the condo we decided to take a chance and rent the condo. This not only allowed us to extend our vacation but also gave us more freedom then staying in the hotel. I would definitly recommend to anyone that wants to visit Oahu. We plan on renting again next year.

This place is fantastic! Everything is remodeled and clean. Extra towels, blankets, amenities were a thoughtful plus. She even gives a brand new sponge and bar of soap. All these little things and more show that Chrystal, the property manager was a great hire! We even forgot all our clothes in the dryer like dodos and she was quick to get it on the next shipment out. Amazing place,  great communication and service. Would recommend.

Despite my last minute booking, Chrystal was very helpful and flexible with the all process. She send very detailed information and checked that everything worked out fine. 

The apartment is very nice, clean and almost new. There are clean bath and beach towels, that are very helpful. The neighborhood is very quiet, perfect location to rest and relax.
I stayed here for an event at Turtle Bay. This place was perfect with it's location in the north shore and was super easy for a check in and out. I would highly recommend staying here

We really enjoyed staying at this home-away-from-home! The kids loved the pool, the many flowering plants, and the creatures everywhere (the lizards, frogs, and neighborhood cat were favorites). The location can't be beat - excellent snorkeling at the cove to the right of the Turtle Bay resort, about a 10 min walk. Chrystal was very friendly in our e-mail exchanges and everything was as advertised. Mahalo!

The listing was very accurate. The apartment was very clean. The check in instructions were very detailed and it went without a hitch. We really liked our location. Neighborhood was quite. We had a great time. If we rent in this area again, we will rent from Maisa. Good communicator. You NEED to have a car to get around.

Ótima experiência. O Apartamento é ótimo, com cozinha completa, com todos os utensílios necessários. Ambiente agradável e limpo. O condominio é bem localizado em north shore, conta com piscina, vaga de garagem e próximo da praia. A anfitriã é muito atenciosa, respondendo sempre com agilidade os questionamentos. Recomendo!!

We had a lovely stay and enjoyed the area. It was a great position for access to Turtle Bay beach and other surrounding beaches without the expense of the hotel. There was snorkelling gear, beach chairs, boogie boards and beach mats available for us to use. The towels were plentiful and we had pretty much everything that we needed for the kitchen. It was generally clean with a very modern kitchen and great big fridge.The bathroom and bedroom were a little dated but fine. Check in time was 4 pm and unfortunately there didn't appear to be any flexibility with that. The traffic was pretty heavy driving up the coast road from Wikiki and of course we wanted to take advantage of stopping along the way as well as buying food supplies for our stay. Therefore we arrived at 6pm. There is security gate and when we called the number, no one answered. We called our host, but we were not able to contact anyone. We were worried as to how to get in for quite sometime. Eventually we worked out another way. Our host was very apologetic. But it was cause for concern. The accommodation was clean. Although not a huge problem, we did run out of hot water as the tanks are quite small. So be mindful of using the dishwasher when you need a shower. The beds were not as comfortable as I would have liked, but everyone has different requirements. Thanks for having us.

We spent 11 days at this apt and had a very good time.  It was just as described on the website.  We were conveniently located right on the first hole of the golf course.  We were not only able to walk to the golf shop but also watched the golfers every day from our patio.  

This apt had all the amenities needed.  We cooked some of our meals and enjoy ourselves.  It's very conveniently located in walking distance to the Turtle Bay resort.  

We thoroughly enjoyed ourselves.
Host was fabulous sweet and considerate. The condo is great. All the amenities you need and I am a former resident of Hawaii

We had a wonderful experience. We enjoyed the freedom of staying at a condo over a hotel as we were able to cook breakfast and not have to eat out every meal. Instructions were great and Maisa was wonderful to rent from. If we went back we would choose this place again.
Maisa was very quick to accommodate us with our last minute hotel change. We were very happy with our decision to switch from a hotel to staying at her condo. Wish we could have stayed longer.

目の前がｺﾞﾙﾌ場で非常に良い眺めだった｡ｺﾞﾙﾌをする人には最適な環境です｡周辺の設備､管理も行き渡っており､安心で気持ちの良い毎日を送れた｡
また来たい｡ありがとうございました｡

The condo was updated, clean, and in a good location. We had friends staying at a few of the other condos, and we definitely had one of the nicest and most modern ones. There is also AC in the living room and bedroom, which many of the other condos did not have and was very appreciated. While Turtle Bay Resort is only a 10 minute walk away, it is pretty confusing to walk through the complex and figure out which way to walk.
condo above was being remodeled and there was a lot of noise during the daytime.

My husband and I had an amazing time on the island of Oahu. Maisa's condo is nestled in between the golf course of Turtle Bay and the Resort. We had access the pools and bbqs near by. It was a short walk to some great local resturants, spa, horseback riding and the beach! Our days were full and the condo had everything we needed to enjoy our stay. We are looking forward to our next trip to Hawaii.

This is a great place to stay for experiencing the beauty of the Oahu North Shore. The patio is relaxing for morning coffee overlooking the golf course and ocean beyond. We loved the location as it is an easy drive to so many activities along the north and eastern shores of Oahu such as snorkeling, horseback riding, and surfing. 
The condo has everything you need to make your stay comfortable with all the normal kitchen amenities, cable TV, and internet. 
Maisa was very responsive throughout our stay by answer our questions within a few hours and provided some great suggestions for our vacation.
Everything was as described. A very good  experience in general.

Excellent location to see all the North Shore has to offer!  Not the easiest to go back and forth from the Turtle Bay pool/beach since it's a decent walk, however, with that comes the peacefulness of not being near the hotel and the shenanigans happening around there.  Bring a tote bag to pack all your day stuff and get out of the resort!  There's so much more to see/do/eat in the surrounding towns!!

The welcome instructions were easy to follow.  The condo units are inside Turtle Bay Resort and on the golf course.  Very, very nice. We had stayed at the hotel before and were happy to have a kitchen etc.

The condo was nice and described as noted on the website.  Quiet safe gated area on the golf course.  Relaxing clean rooms.  The TV and internet were good.  The bed was comfortable.  All appliances were nice.  Did use the pools in the condo area since we spent so much time at the beaches in the area.  They are dynamite.   Great place to have a good getaway.  North shore is beautiful and you can be as busy as you want.
The condo was everything I was hoping for and more. I will definitely be returning on future trips out to the north shore.

Kuilima Estates West is a safe quiet area and the condo is updated and clean. The arrival instructions are lengthy and could use an update as certain things are not made very clear. For example, it says there are designated smoking areas, yet all around the property it says no smoking. Also, the BBQs require charcoal and that should be made known. We also were led to believe that while staying at Kuilima Estates you had access to Turtle Bay Resort pools. That is absolutely not true, if you want access to a hot tub don't rent this condo. The ad states the condo sleeps 4, however when we arrived there was only one fitted sheet, no pillowcases or top sheets for the pull out bed or for the futon. Communication with Maisa was quick and easy so we did receive sheets but unfortunately it was 3 days into our stay. The condo above and next door are being renovated so we were woken up to construction sounds multiple mornings. The lady that lives next door is rude and disregards the quiet time hours and asked us to shut our door at 8pm on a Friday night (don't even bother staying if you have loud kids). There were some annoying things about this place, but overall it was a nice condo and our issues were independent of the condo itself.
Well kept condo. Great location, away from all the tourism. Close to north shore.
Beautiful location very clean and everything you would need for a relaxing holiday.Thanks again Maisa just perfect
Fun filled few day while staying close to the turtle bay resort. Nice golf course view
Great location. Very close to Turtlebay. Took the kids to the beach every day. Also went fishing off the shore line at Turtlebay.

Thanks for a wonderful stay! We had a great time. The condo was perfect and had everything we needed. It was in a quiet area with a short drive to the resort. The bed was super comfy! I highly recommend.
Bring your own beach chairs
Cozy condo on golf course.  Great kitchen.  Walking distance to ocean and Turtle Bay resort.  Relaxing.
Maisa's condo is a great location for the visiting Oahu's north shore.  and was recently very nicely remodeled and was comfortable to stay in. Very good value ...

Great spot located a short distance from Turtle Bay Resort. Nice kitchen to cook if you get tired of eating out every meal. Comfortable and cozy. It's whatever you want it to be... romantic to family friendly. Can't wait to come back!!

This was perfect vacation getaway for our young family. The place has been kept up well, and had a nicely stocked kitchen. Also, the two AC units made us comfortable when the ceiling fans couldn't keep up with the heat. We would definitely return here.
Great place to stay by turtle bay, fruit stand across the street and nice beaches to walk to.
Great place to stay, close to everything on the north shore, clean and secure. Would recommend to friends. Maisa was very helpful and provided great advice. We had a great time

Maisa's place is in a great location with close proximity to the beach and good food. Maisa was very accommodating and it was a nice touch to have complimentary boogie boards and snorkel equipment. The kitchen is well appointed and the bed is comfortable. I would recommend staying here!
Everything was great and there were no issues!!!
Great spot, walkable to turtle Bay, extremely well equipped kitchen, clean and quite place, I loved the birds and flowers

Great location right next to turtle bay resort. Had a few issues when arriving at Maisa's condo. The condo was a bit dirty, and the second AC was broken. This made it really hot the first couple of days, but she was responsive and came by a few days later to fix it. The kitchen was recently redone which made making dinners great! Pools at the condos were family friendly and easy to get to. Fun area to stay in, with a little TLC of Maisa's condo and it would be a fabulous place to stay again.

This was a great place for my family (my wife, 10 month old child and me). The location was great being close to the best beaches on the island, restaurants and touristic locations such as the Polynesian Culture Center. My family enjoyed the security of the gated community feel which also included 3 close private pools within walking distance. The washer and drier, fridge, oven, etc. were all very helpful to save on going out to eat for every meal and save on going out to do laundry. Maisa was very responsive and had clear instructions with some great recommendations on places to visit. Overall I would highly recommend this location and plan to return on my next visit to Oahu.

If you're looking for a nice condo on the North Shore at Turtle Bay on Oahu, I would recommend Maisa's place.  The instructions for getting there, and getting in were very accurate and the location was ideal for the wonderful beaches and towns on the North Shore.  We took advantage of the restaurant Lei Lei's at the Turtle Bay Resort, as recommended by our host, and we were very pleased with the food and the service.  There was a Foodland supermarket close to the condo, so you can take advantage of the beautiful kitchen and not have to always eat out.  It's easy to get to the shrimp trucks on the North Shore, but beware the traffic on the weekend, since it's only a 2 lane highway in and out of the North Shore.

A very tidy, spacious condo just 10 minutes' walk from the beach and bars/restaurants at Turtle Bay, with pleasant views from the rear patio out over the golf course, ideal for a couple or a single traveller. The kitchen is thoroughly equipped with quality appliances. Neighbouring condos were almost entirely quiet during my stay. The north shore location is ideal for beaches and snorkelling/diving during summer months, being a 15 minute drive to Shark's Cove, Three Tables, etc., to the west, or a similar distance to any number of vast, uncrowded beaches along the east coast.

Tip 1: Be sure to hang the provided parking permit on your rear view mirror - I missed this one evening and got an angry notice from estate security warning that my vehicle would soon be towed.

Tip 2: If you're driving to/from Honolulu, consider taking Kamehameha Highway (aka Route 83) up the *east* coast instead of the slightly shorter direct route across the centre of the island. Kamehameha Highway is absolutely stunning on a sunny day, with towering green mountains to one side, and the sparkling ocean so close on the other side that breaking waves will splash against your car tyres.

We had a wonderful trip. The location was excellent as we were able to get quickly to a couple of communities for food, entertainment, shopping. It was a relaxed vacation for sure. The sunsets and surfer-watching at Turtle Bay were amazing.
Great location to explore all that the North Shore has to offer!
Great rental. Plenty of space for 2-4 people. Clean. Really close to the beach and the amenities of Turtle Bay.

This condo is beautiful! The kitchen really is fantastic with everything you need, not that we cooked... Lei Leis is so close! Go there, get Mai Tais, you won't be disappointed. This is a wonderful alternative to the huge costs of staying at the actual resort at Turtle Bay and it's an easy drive to all the delicious food trucks. We had a great time!
Great location and comfortable and clean.  Would stay here again.  Thanks, Maisa
Second stay at the condo. It's perfect!

Maisa’s place is spectacular! Everything was as described and we absolutely loved our time at her amazing condo. She was very accommodating and the best part of the whole equation was the value she provided in comparison to the Turtle Bay Resort, which is a half mile up the road and 2-4x more expensive. Great place, we’d definitely stay again!
Maisa and her Mom are wonderful... the place is great
房源在海龟湾度假村的旁边,紧贴高尔夫球场,景色非常棒｡小区门口进门有点小问题,需要跟房东事先沟通好｡其他地方都很好,厨房很赞,我们做了几顿饭｡旁边的Leilei餐厅不错,可以尝试｡
Nice location and had everything we needed for the beach. We would definitely go back!

Very cute and comfortable condo! great location on the north shore. The multiple pools were very well kept and it was very quiet. Well stocked so it had everything we needed to cook and be comfortable.

The unit is clean and well set out. The kitchen is great with all you need to cook which I made use of. The kettle was so tiny though and took some time to boil so no cup of tea for me. But a good coffee machine was enjoyed daily by hubby. 
The shower was good and bed cosy. 
The views of golf course very nice. The beach Is a bit of a walk we just drove there’s parks in resort for beach goers, also used the Turle Bay Resort pool for a swim and shop and a lovely sunset  was viewed. Check in was tricky couldn’t reach host she was in a meeting. We got let in by security so if you cannot get host call security they let us in. The host was nice and apologised and at checkout I sent pics and was sent a nice reply of how tidy I left the unit which was nice. Didn’t use any gear but saw it outside for family to use. I think it was a good price to be in this area for 3 nights.
Emplacement parfait sur la North Shore!  Sur le site du fameux Turtle Bay Resort
Place was perfect. Located centrally to everything. Maisa is an amazing host.
Nice, clean and spacious condo. Not far from amenities and beach. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Walking distance to the beach

I was visiting the north shore for a wedding and thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Maisa's home. It's a wonderful property, accurately described, and in a great location. I would definitely stay here again.
Very Nice and Clean Space, Quiet, and in a very nice location...Would definitely return again!
Cute, quiet, and overlooking the golf course. It's an easy walk to the Turtle Bay Resort.
Great location to stay at, if you have a car, to check out all the sights on the North Shore-very good having access to the restaurants at turtle bay resort.
Awesome location on the north shore. The condo was clean and perfect for our little family. We will stay here again the next time we visit!
Excellent condo in a great location! Would definitely stay again!

The condo is located in a great area.   We love the North Shore.  Unable to contact manager upon arrival .  Condo decor is outdated.  Nice kitchen however.  Bedroom is horrible very uncomfortable  bed and the air conditioner did not cool. Bedroom TV did not work properly. We were charged a  $110.00 cleaning fee and then asked to clean up before we checked out. That was a huge turn off.
Lovely condo. Clean comfortable and beautiful location.  My family and I enjoyed it.

We really enjoyed our stay here. The location is perfect, right on turtle bay resort so you can easily access everything there and the north shore is beautiful. The condo was clean and had everything we needed, all kitchen appliances, extra towels, beach chairs, snorkel gear and boogie boards. The check in process was very simple and the host made sure we had all instructions ahead of time and were able to get into the condo easily. Definitely would recommend.

Our host and was absolutely phenomenal. I came with my parents for a wedding and it was our first time in Hawaii. We landed pretty late so it was dark and we were hungry. Christa was ready for us to land and stayed on the phone with us while we looked for a place to eat and sent us the menu and she stayed on the phone while we found the condo, our parking space, and directed us to her home. I’ve never felt more welcome. The condo itself has everything you need. Washer and dryer, dishes, kitchen, soaps, towels, beach chairs etc.  literally everything you need. My friends warned me of bugs while in Hawaii, since they were staying at a condo in the same estate, but inside the condo was so clean I didn’t see any cockroaches or bugs or anything I expected the whole stay. I highly recommend staying here. Restaurants and nice beach access are within a 15 minute walk and Turtle Bay is a safe area. If you’re in the north shore, you’re gonna wanna stay here.

The location is amazing. Very quiet and private. Beautiful pool facilities. Complete with snorkel and fibs for the beach. Very caring host. Helped us prepare for the hurricane and checked on us to make sure we were safe and comfortable.
Great stay, Beautiful area, great communication and easy access, aircon and fans worked well, perfect location!
The condo was fantastic. Easy walking distance to Turtle Bay Resort restaurants, beach, and other activities. Very clean and functional.

We had a great experience staying this condo.  It was a 10 min walk to Turtle Bay Beach.  The condo was very clean and looked just like the pictures.  Maisa provided everything you could think of from beach towels to a full kitchen so we could cook our own meals.  Check in was easy and we had no complications.  We would definitely stay at this condo again.
cool place
Y

Maisa place is great,
The perfect location and views fully completes any plans you may have for your trip! We were so happy with our stay and enjoyed all the cleanliness and comfort of the place. It is very close to Turtle bay and other great beaches in the North Shore, we fully recommend it!

眼の前がｺﾞﾙﾌ場で､それを突っ切ると海岸がありました｡近所のLei Lei's Bar & Grillのﾃﾞｻﾞｰﾄｻｰﾋﾞｽ券をもらいました｡ｱｲｽｸﾘｰﾑがたくさん出てきて美味しかったです｡
部屋に一番近いﾌﾟｰﾙは工事中で入れませんでした｡

The condo was perfect for our stay! Communication with the host was always easy and helpful. Check in was a breeze. The home was super clean and had everything you would need, from the fully stocked and updated kitchen to extra bedding to beach accessories. Would highly recommend!
Great location, super comfy bed! The only complaint I have is that it got pretty warm in the bedroom in the mornings. Other then that it was a great space :)
This place was way better than expected! Comfortable, clean and it felt like home.
Another great stay. Looking forward to returning next year to the condo.

Perfect location as we love to golf. Our favorite was the Palmer Course. Also close to all the beaches. The remodel is nicely done.  The condo was very clean and the original artwork is beautiful and perfectly Hawaiian! Chrystal was awesome and responded so quickly to any questions. We really enjoyed our vacation!

We really enjoyed our stay.  The extra touches like beach chairs and beach towels were a nice touch.  The place was sparkling clean and looked just like the pictures.  Love the communication Maisa provided.  The location couldn't be better!
Good place to explore the north shore . directions clear and easy to follow. crystal the property manager was super helpful and nice!
Highly recommended, she’s a great host and the place is clean and comfortable.
Sehr schöne und saubere Wohnung mit einem tollen Blick über den Golfplatz. Sehr ruhig und auch gemütlich. Zu Fuß ist der Strand sehr gut erreichbar.
Great condo. Pool very close. Clean condo.  No bugs. We didn’t want to leave.

name: MIDTOWN APARTMENT WITH SPECTACULAR VIEW
summary: This fully equipped apartment is located on the top floor (38th) of a high-rise building in the middle of Manhattan with a beautiful view.  24/7 security, concierge in the building. Convenient midtown location is walking distance from Times Square, Central Park, Hells Kitchen, Hudson River Park, and the Intrepid Museum. Apartment is two blocks from NYC subway system and just minutes away from hundreds of restaurants.
space: Stunning panoramic view of the city that rivals the city's most exclusive hotels.
description: This fully equipped apartment is located on the top floor (38th) of a high-rise building in the middle of Manhattan with a beautiful view.  24/7 security, concierge in the building. Convenient midtown location is walking distance from Times Square, Central Park, Hells Kitchen, Hudson River Park, and the Intrepid Museum. Apartment is two blocks from NYC subway system and just minutes away from hundreds of restaurants. Stunning panoramic view of the city that rivals the city's most exclusive hotels. Entire apartment. I am more than happy to be of any help should you have any questions or concerns. Apartment is located in the heart of Manhattan. The apartment is not suitable for children under the age of 10.
neighborhood_overview: Apartment is located in the heart of Manhattan.
notes: The apartment is not suitable for children under the age of 10.
access: Entire apartment.
interaction: I am more than happy to be of any help should you have any questions or concerns.
house_rules: Please refer to welcome sheet.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I enjoy hosting people from all over the world..

reviews.comments: This was a great place to stay for 5 nights in NYC. The apartment was exactly as advertised. Dealing with Peter and his son was very easy. We had our 1yo son with us and the main bedroom has enough space to set up a portable cot. Clean and functional apartment with an excellent view.

Peters apartment was very well kept and clean, the location on 10th Avenue was excellent being away from the hustle and bustle yet well within walking distance to all the popular sites. We would not hesitate to stay there again, thanks Peter for being an excellent host!
Great view of Manhattan, quite and convenient place, very kind and easy to communicate with host

Peter's son welcomed us into the flat and showed us around. The place was great and had everything we needed. 
Location is fantastic, within  walking distance of everything we wanted, and the area felt really safe even at night. Views from the flat are spectacular!
Peter himself is super friendly and extremely helpful for any questions or for hints around the city. Would recommend!

Peter was an amazing host.  He was so accommodating to work with on our check in and check out time.  The apartment was awesome.  It was a great location, had a fabulous view and was within walking distance of both the plays we attended, Times Square and lots of shopping.  Thank you Peter for making our stay in New York one to remember.

Peter was traveling, so I didn't get to meet him. Travis, Peter's son, met me and showed me the place. Peter's place is even nicer than described and has everything you need. It's clean, the bed and sofa bed are both comfy, and the wonderful view from both rooms adds to the New York experience. My son and I were there visiting family and also going to the symphony, so being close to Lincoln Center was a big plus, too. Thank you, Peter, for hosting us!

Mr. Peter have an amazing team as a family, they made us feel like home. The experience with them was way better than we were expecting, not only for the apartment which it’s exactly as you see in the pictures but also because of it’s convenient location. These people are really concerned about you having a confortable stay. Nothing bad to say at all, we are absolutely happy.

My husband stayed at Peter’s apartment for 9 days for NYC marathon.
The apartment is a great space in a very convenient location (it is about 1km to Central Park and 2 blocks to the nearest station).
It had everything he needs and also a wonderful view from the room.
Peter was always available for questions, unfortunately my husband couldn’t meet Peter in person, but his son was waiting for him in front of the building and showed him around.
We really appreciate their kind support.
We hope that we will go beck to the apartment, if we have a chance!!!
Ademas de ser todas ciertas las fotos y de la hospitalidad de Peter es extraordinaria la vista de Manhattan desde el piso 38
Great place in a great location views were fsntastic

As peter was not there, we were met by his son Travis, who showed us the appartment and gave us good tips (thank you!). The appartment is very well located, warm and have one of the best view of Manhattan ! We would definitely recommand this place. +++

We loved staying in Peter's apartment. We were two adults and a 13 year old. It was very comfortable, warm and an elegant space and the view constantly enthralling! The sofa bed was very comfortable and the kitchen very well equipped-easy to prepare breakfast, meals, coffee etc. We enjoyed the neighbourhood feel plus close proximity to the action of the theatre district. Peter was a very responsive host and his son met us on arrival kindly waiting in spite of our delayed flight. We wouldn't hesitate in recommending Peter's place.
one word .... excellent

This place was exactly as Peter described it.  The views were phenomenal and we enjoyed the different color schemes on the Empire State Building at night. There was plenty of room and the ability to use a kitchen was an added bonus. My wife and I enjoyed our stay and the location was close enough to Time Square that you could walk there easily.  Peter’s place exceeded our expectations for a place to stay while seeing the sights and attending the plays on Broadway.

El piso es tal y como se muestran las fotos.
Las vistas se superan en la realidad, las fotos son bonitas pero allí son inmejorables, el amanecer es genial y las cenas con times square de decorado son insuperables.
El apartamento tiene todo lo necesario, Peter y su hijo son atentos y nos han ayudado en nuestra estancia.
Recomiendo altamente este alojamiento.
Gracias Peter.

Bedste sted i New York. Sikke en udsigt over et plateau af 4-6 etagers bygninger indtil øjet møder et bjerg af skyskrabere, fantastisk! Vi nød opholdet i lejligheden, som indeholdt alt det vi havde brug for.

Peter’s place is just the perfect Airbnb experience. Quick answers pre booking and pre-stating, great hospitality, exceptional tips, wonderful spotless accommodation and convenient location... not to mention the stunning views! I definitely recommend Peter’s place, and look forward to staying there again soon!

great location - due to the following reasons: 
-absolutely reliable support (for check in, for check out, during our stay)
-everything you need is there, beside the basic equipment: coffee, some sweets, fruits
-location: as the pictures show - breathtaking from dawn till dusk; sights in Manhattan within easy reach (next subway station a short walk away)
Excelente departamento, la ubicación perfecta. La vista es increíble  y Peter es super atento. Altamebte recomendable, no se pierdan de ir.

You will absolutely love this beautiful apartment! And it really does have spectacular views! You will feel very comfortable and at home. Peter was out of town (but was still in touch), and  his son Travis met us and was always available to answer questions we had. You won’t be disappointed!!
Excellent location and incredible view. The bed was very comfortable. The air conditioning was a life saver. Interesting art and books to peruse. Tastefully decorated and organized.
Excelent!

Perfect location between Central Park and Times Square with amazing view!  We had never been to New York and Peter made us feel very comfortable by answering all our questions and showing us around. The accommodations are just as noted in the listing. We have already recommended his place to friends!

Peter's apartment is very beautiful, the view of Manhattan from the 38th floor  is amazing. The area of the apartment is very good and quiet and it is close to alot of atractions.  It is very well equipped, we had everything we needed to spend an extraordinary week at New York. Thank you  Peter and your son  for being excellent hosts.

The apartment is located in Hell’s Kitchen, a really Perfect place because it is next to Times Square, Central Park, Empire State Building and so on, but there is less traffic and noise than in other places.

From the windows you can see a wonderful view.

The host is really helpful and available to solve any problem!

I really suggest this apartment.
Jaw dropping views, well equipped apartment.  We had a great stay and would go back in a heartbeat.

Peter and his son were amazing at making sure the check-in process was as easy as possibly, they were thorough in explaining all the "need-to-knows" about the apartment and the area, and were overall very friendly. The pictures of the view do not do it justice as they're spectacular! The bed and couch were comfy, the kitchen was fully stocked with utensils, and everything was spotless on our arrival.

Travis nos recibió de forma agradable y servicial, en cuanto a la casa, deja que desear la limpieza, está llena de alfombras sucias y los conductos de ventilación atorados de suciedad, así como las plantas etc... , yo soy asmatico e incluso tuve una crisis por ello. 
La zona no nos gustó, había mucho ruido, continuamente se oían sirenas porque debe haber un parque de bomberos cerca, incluso Travis a la llegada nos dijo que el prefería vivir al otro lado de la isla por eso mismo.
La zona nos parecío bastante degradada, más insegura que otras, junto a la puerta se colocaban vagabundos bebiendo alcohol y en varias salidas y entradas nos increparon por no darles dinero. Está es la tercera vez que vamos a NY y nunca nos había pasado nada parecido.
Lo PEOR SIN DUDA son los ascensores. No funcionaron durante dos días y tuvimos que subir y bajar ANDANDO a un piso 38!!!. Hablando con una vecina nos dijo que era habitual que se averiasen, que ella se planteaba cambiarse de casa por eso mismo ya que con 55 años y con problemas de salud no podía subir andando a una planta veintidós cada dos por tres.
En fin, la peor de nuestras experiencias en alojamientos en Manhattan.
Stylish and comfortable appointment in a heart of NY.

Peter is an absolute testament to the Airbnb community. 

Upon arrival, Peter greeted us and was actually outside waiting for our arrival. He kindly helped us with our bags and was very communicative, warm and inviting from the outset. When we entered the apartment, we were blown away. It's much bigger in person and, whilst I'll simply be repeating other reviews, the views are just breathtaking. We actually opted to sit and sip drinks looking out over going to rooftop bars as the views were far, far better. Peter was also kind enough to point us in the direction of main attractions, many of which were within walking distance. We also loved the thoughtful touches (slippers and soaps) which added some luxury.

During the stay, the water was shut off in the building for repairs which was completely out of Peter's control. He quickly responded when we inform him and the issue was swiftly resolved after his advice to talk to reception. It was no issue at all and it shows Peter's level of professionalism. 

It's clear that not only does Peter take great pride in his home, he cares about his guests and goes above and beyond to make sure they're comfortable. He is a true super host and we very much hope that we can stay at his place in the not so distance future. Peter - thank you so much for your amazing hospitality. You're wonderful!
great Apartment in any prespective. strongly recommend to anyone WHO would like to have a short stay in New York

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour chez Peter. L'appartement est conforme à l'annonce, en plus ensoleillé, la vue est réellement spectaculaire, le lit extrêmement confortable et l'accueil de Peter et Travis parfait.

name: July in Fab East Harlem Apartment!
summary: Cat lovers wanted!   I am offering my lovely, 4 room nicely appointed apartment at a great price as the apartment includes two well behaved and affectionate cats (need to feed).  Queen sized bed, full size couch. 12 min walk to subway. 7/5 - 7/26
space: If you like your stay with a cozy cat creature, this is the place for you!
description: Cat lovers wanted!   I am offering my lovely, 4 room nicely appointed apartment at a great price as the apartment includes two well behaved and affectionate cats (need to feed).  Queen sized bed, full size couch. 12 min walk to subway. 7/5 - 7/26 If you like your stay with a cozy cat creature, this is the place for you! Full one bedroom (4 rooms) on the first floor of a well maintained building, half a block from the East River, and 5 blocks from Jefferson Park (has a rubber running track) Not much!  Can call me with any questions but you have the place to yourself -- I leave you the key and pick it up from you again. My neck of East Harlem is quiet, diverse, and near  Pleasant Avenue which is very pleasant indeed!  And there is the East River Mall within a few blocks which has Costco, Target, Marshall's, etc. etc. Yes - M116 bus leaves you right on the block; the 4/5 trains are about a 15 minute walk; the 6 train is about 12 minutes. Must love cats, and not mind feeding them/litter bo
neighborhood_overview: My neck of East Harlem is quiet, diverse, and near  Pleasant Avenue which is very pleasant indeed!  And there is the East River Mall within a few blocks which has Costco, Target, Marshall's, etc. etc.
notes: Must love cats, and not mind feeding them/litter box duty.
transit: Yes - M116 bus leaves you right on the block; the 4/5 trains are about a 15 minute walk; the 6 train is about 12 minutes.
access: Full one bedroom (4 rooms) on the first floor of a well maintained building, half a block from the East River, and 5 blocks from Jefferson Park (has a rubber running track)
interaction: Not much!  Can call me with any questions but you have the place to yourself -- I leave you the key and pick it up from you again.
house_rules: Like it is there own place!  No smoking, no parties, and be nice to the kitties!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I live in New York City but love to escape to my cottage in the beautiful upstate area of Sullivan County, near Barryville New York.  It's a little bit of paradise to be up there, it's quite undiscovered, and it is the perfect escape for me, and keeps me balanced and sane in New York City!

name: Apart(5)-5 minutes walk from Taksim
summary: The room is cozy. it has heating system for the winter and will have air condition for summer.. The flat is on the first floor. The bed and everything in the room is new.
space: The most unique part for this room is that it has a queen size bed; it has a window facing the bosphorus canal... It also have a cupboard; All furniture are new. It has mirror from Ikea and 2 chairs for sitting. It also has romantic lights and nice wall picture that can be lighted.
description: The room is cozy. it has heating system for the winter and will have air condition for summer.. The flat is on the first floor. The bed and everything in the room is new.  The most unique part for this room is that it has a queen size bed; it has a window facing the bosphorus canal... It also have a cupboard; All furniture are new. It has mirror from Ikea and 2 chairs for sitting. It also has romantic lights and nice wall picture that can be lighted. Guests will have access to the kitchen, the toilet. In the kitchen, there is all kind of equipment: fridge, gas for cooking, cooking equipment, and washing machine. They also have access to high speed internet, hot water in toilet, and heating and cooling system. We also give guests fresh and clean towels Ahmed my cousin shows the guests around the house and give them keys to the building door, roof top, house door and their room door. He gives them the password and username for the internet. He guides them to some touristic areas if neede
neighborhood_overview: Cihangir is an amazing neighborhood. It is extra safe and very clean. There are a lot of restaurants and everything you might need. You can find people walking in the streets till 4AM
transit: it is less than 5 minutes walk from Taksim and 5 minutes walk to Findikli tram station. You can walk to Istiklal Cadesi and to Galata Tower or you can go down to the tram and head to Sultan Ahmed Area (blue mosque, topkapi)
access: Guests will have access to the kitchen, the toilet. In the kitchen, there is all kind of equipment: fridge, gas for cooking, cooking equipment, and washing machine. They also have access to high speed internet, hot water in toilet, and heating and cooling system. We also give guests fresh and clean towels
interaction: Ahmed my cousin shows the guests around the house and give them keys to the building door, roof top, house door and their room door. He gives them the password and username for the internet. He guides them to some touristic areas if needed. he keeps checking on them every morning in case they need anything
house_rules: Keep common areas like kitchen and toilet clean, do not disturb the neighbors. be extra quiet if you are coming back after midnight to the building.

reviews.comments: Nice place. Close to Taksim and the ferry Kabataş. The host is a nice and helpful person.

Faisal et son cousin sont super accueillant la chambre est propre de plus l endroit est idéal tout prêt de taksim a 5 min à pied. Vraiment un séjour parfait rien a signaler la chambre était chauffé. Allez y les yeux fermer
Chambre propre, bon rapport qualité prix.

Faisal's apt is great. Very central. However it is on a very steep hill so be aware if you have mobility issue or a lot of luggage.
Kitchen is a small but i did not need to cook. There are 3bdrms in this apt and they are often all rented out to different people.
His cousin who was my local contact was hospitable and helped me with questionsw. This specific bedroom does not have view of the Bosphorous

We had a wonderful stay.  Two blocks away from Taksim Square.  The other people staying there were nice and helpful, even going out of their way to help us carry luggage and show us where to purchase train tickets.  Overall, I would recommend it.
All good!!
We just stayed one night in Faisal's house. Even though Faisal was not at home his cousin received us very early in the morning. We could not share much but everything was ok.

This was our firs Airbnb experience and for sure we will use Airbnb again. The room was as on he picture and clean, the apartment is located 5 min away from Taksim square and  5 min to tram line which goes to old town. Faisal was a great host, whatever we asked him, he helped us and recommend us good places to visit. 
  Thanks again and maybe we visit you again in summer when there will be no snow :)

was nice! the place is wonderfully located! Our host was too kind ... was really helpful and his tours was the best!!!! Is a very confortable stay, and private. I really was amazed about the location because we were able to walk all over and find everything.

Positive side: The apartment is in a very good location, but it has a steep hill back to the square (normal for Turkey). Very near taksim and the busy streets with shops and restaurants. Faisals cousin was very friendly and when we arrived he was waiting for us in taksim square and helped us with our luggage to the apartment. The apartment is quite big and our room was clean. Overall a good choice for a short stay and that price. 

Negative side: The building has a funny cat smell. The bathroom could be a bit cleaner but for the two nights it was ok. Sometimes at night you can hear some noise (airconditioning or something) from the outside, but it didn't bother us that much.

Exelente departameneto , ubicación ( barrio muy seguro ) , y atención de Faisal , ya que él mismo se ofreció para hacernos conocer Estambul ( logró llevarnos a Todos los lugares relevantes de la ciudad en un día !! ya que sólo permanecimos dia y medio allí ) No tenemos palabras para agradecer su exelente disposición para con nosotros.
It was a nice stay. :-)

Faisal's friend greated us very well with a delicious tipical lunch in a restaurant near Taxim, a central and well-served neighborhood in Istanbul. The room was nice but smaller than what we expected, and general house's cleanliness could be better. Faisal and his roommates are friendly and easygoing fellows! 
We were a bit disappointed with Faisal's cousin who helped us finding another room for our last night, asking us 25 € for a disgusting and dirty room, saying that "we paid for his service".
Great room with good host. Quiet place althlough it is located in the center. Would recomend :)

This place is ideal for those who wants to live in the heart of Istanbul! The apartment is clean and perfectly located, the hosts are supporting and understanding and can suggest you some ways to see the city in the best way! I'll definitely recommend everyone this place)
Great :)

It was my first time using airbnb and I was very skeptical. We arrived late and Faisals Cousin, who was handling the flat, was already waiting for us. The room looks exactly like in that picture, fresh towels included. There were keys to our room and we could go out and come back whenever we wanted. The host was very friendly, sympathetic and the place was clean and comfortable. I loved staying there and will definitely try to book this place again when visiting Taksim again. I can recommend this place and say Thank you for having us again.
perfect ınformatıon and easy to fınd
Good communication on finding the apartment and getting there from the airport.

The rooms is very central and the apartment is reasonably clean. It is exactly as it looks like. I was welcomed by the host and a friend of his, who was my contact person for the following days. They were both friendly. Overall a nice experience, I recommend this room for people planning a short stay in Istanbul, especially if they want to be near Taksim.
The only minor problem was that the light in the room was broken and they did not fix it during the week I was there. Also, the curtains are almost transparent, so the light woke me up early every morning (this may be only my problem, I admit).

탁심에 위치한 숙소라 위치 좋고 가격 저렴하고 좋았어요
길을 모르면 처음에 찾아가기는 좀 어려울수도 있는데
주소를 정확히 알고 지도 보면 쉬워요
공항가는 버스 타기도 좋고 밤늦게도 북적이는 동네라 좋았어요
집은 작지만 편하게 쓸 수 있게 해주었고 별다른 불편함없이 잘 지냈어요
저렴하게 탁심에서 묵고 싶은 분들에게 추천해요!

C'est une chambre bien située, à proximité de la place taksim.
Propre, calme et agréable.
Faisal était absent mais son ami m'accueilli très amicalement.

Faisal and Ghassan were fantastic hosts. Ghassan greeted us at check-in and assured we were always comfortable. He responded immediately to our texts when he was away and gave us great recommendations of places to go. Faisal arrived later on and we loved our short chats with him in the mornings.
The location is perfect - easy, 5 minute walking distance to both Taxim and Findikli-MSU stations as well as the Bosphorus. 
The bed is comfortable and the room looks even better than it does in the pictures - there is a large window behind the curtain. Cozy and convenient, it was just right for us!
A note to light sleepers: an entourage of pidgeons, mourning doves and other avian creatures will sound first thing in the morning because of proximity to the sea.
Thanks to all may be see you another time..

nous avons été reçu par son ami car faisal était parti. L'appartement est agréable malgré l fait que les toilettes sont dans la salle de bain. Il y'a 3 chambres donc il faut attendre son tour.

l'appartement es situé dans le quartier de taksim à 5 minute à pied comme précisé dans l'annonce
The home was warm, clean and very good. the owner was very kind and nice.. such a great room.

The room and the apartment were comfortable and clean. The room was small but perfectly suited for a couple of travelers looking simply for a place to sleep. The location was perfect, close to the transit hub of Taksim but away from the noisiness. All told, it was an incredible value.

Good place, excellent location. Taksim square and Istiklal street are a 5 minute walk away, and you can reach the tram that brings you to the other side of the Galata brigde in about 7 minutes. The room itself is clean and nice, and actually has a window with Bosphorus view :). It can become a bit warm and noisy during the night, but this wasn't too much of a problem imo. Overall, an excellent 'value for money' choice.

Останавливались на 6 дней, очень приветливый хозяин, хотя видели его очень редко, общение было легким, быстрым и приятным. Комната полностью соответствует фото и описанию, все чисто, аккуратно, вайфай работал хорошо. Расположение посередине между Таксим и Кабаташ, что в принципе удобно. В комнате очень тихо ночью, улица спокойная. Мы остались полностью довольны!

we didnt meet Faisal on our 4 night stay in istanbul but his friend was there waiting to greet us when we arrived. He gave us some good suggestions on the local spots around taksim as well as where the supermarkets, tram stops were etc.  The apartment is in a great location, close to transport and the havatas airport transfer bus stop (about a 10min walk depending on your luggage). those who get the havatas transfer bus, when you get off you have to walk up alongside the park until you reach the top of the hill/taksim square, thats where you will find starbucks and the street you need to walk down. 

we would recommend this place if your looking for cheap accommodation in the centre of town!

We stayed at this three bedroom apartment for five nights while in Istanbul. We never met Faisal but were welcomed by a friend who took care of us during our stay. He showed us where various things were on the map and gave us some good tips- places to eat and to suggested we spend a day out at princes island which we loved. He worked a fair amount so wasn't always home but we did manage to have some good chats and get to know him also. The place itself was clean with a comfortable bed and decent sized room and bathroom. We were able to make use of the washing machine and kitchen (small). It was also rented out to other airbnb guests which wasn't an issue for us. 
The location was PERFECT! Right near Taksim square and an easy walk down hill to Kabatas (you can get the metro back up to Taksim). Would stay again and would definitely recommend to anyone looking for accommodation in Istanbul.
Posizione molto comoda. Appartamento tranquillo e pulito. Padrone disponibile per ogni tipo di richiesta, la camera non è tanto grande, ma pulitA e accogliente!

The booking was prompt, but we had a minor difficulty with obtaining the keys from Faisal's friend who manages the apartment as there wasn't a clear communication to him about our arrival time. We managed to get the keys eventually with a 40 min delay, but in the end it worked out just fine. The apartment is excellent, close to Taksim  square and we loved staying there.

Great location and very clean apartment. About 15 min walk from the bus that goes to the airport and a 5-10 min walk to taksim square. Faisal's friend was very flexible regarding our check out time and plans. Thanks!

We didn't meet Faisal but had an enjoyable short stay in his apartment. We met Ghassen his friend living there who was friendly and welcoming. We arrived early in the morning from an overnight bus and were able to leave our things inside whilst the room was getting ready and we went exploring. 
We apartment was very clean, the room just like the pictures portray and it's in a great location close to Taksim square where the metro is and shuttle buses are. 
Worth a stay here when visiting Istanbul.

We booked a room for a week at Faisal's apartement. Didn't meet him, but his friend Ghassan welcomed us kindly. The flat is exactly like on the pictures, clean, comfortable and close to Taksim. Highly recommended place for acceptable price.

We were welcomed at 8pm by one of the resident of the flat who was sleeping on the living room's couch.
Little room, sheets not changed since the night before us.
Faisal was unable to propose us (by mail) an other solution except to check under the couch to find clean ones and change them ourself.

Cheap, central, but not clean.
Faisal definitively doesn't live here, don't expect to meet him!
Nice  房间和位置还不错,房东不在伊斯坦布尔,联络不太方便,别的还行

PRO/S:
- Good location (5-10 minutes walk from the Taksim area; (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) minutes walk from the ferry that can bring you to the Asian side)
- Faisal can easily be reached via (Hidden by Airbnb) 
- The house is very clean
- The room has a big bed
- The bathroom has a hot shower and they provided towels and hairdryer
- There is a mini electric fan inside the room

CON/S:
-I hope the host provided us a detailed direction on how to reach the house. For example: From taksim square, once you see cajun restaurant/bar, turn left, then afterwards turn right, then go straight. The host just told us to go to taksim and look for the street of the house. It took us 1-2 hours before we found the house.
- Though there was a fan in the room, it was still hot probably because of the summer weather.

Room was clean. Clean everything you need.
In a good position
Nice room in a great location, Faisal's friend who runs the place was very nice and helpful. We had to nag Faisal a little bit to get the exact adress prior to our arrival though.
Friendly, accommodating, accurate listing, and very clean. Would recommend to anyone in the area. Location is also excellent

We spend one night at the apartment and everything was perfect. Fisals friend Ghassan was welcoming us very friendly and we enyed to talk with Ghassan even when has been in a rush. The atmosphere is really like beeing at home together with friends.

The apartment is very calm and clean without any exception. Even if the way to Taxim is a little bit uphill the location is almost perfect. Right between Cihangir, Taxim, Istiklal and Kabataş.

I can highly recommend this place! Thank you for the hospitality!

Had a great week at Faisals appartment. 5 mins to taksim which was great. There were also alot of small local restaurants in the neighborhood! Communication was a bit tricky when we first Got to taksim, but it all worked out.
Muy agradable la habitación; y muy amables las personas que nos recibieron... muy recomendable

We had an amazing time at faisal place!
We were there just for a night but our host was very welcoming and pleasant. The room was very clean and the bed was jing size :)
Everything perfect. If we come back to istanbul we sure will stay there!!! Thanks again

탁심에서 걸어서 5분 거리는 맞구요 시설도 나쁘지 않았습니다. 다만 에어비앤비에서 연락받는 사람과 실제로 방을 소개해주고 관리해주는 사람이 달라서 연락이 잘 닿지 않아서 매우 불편했네요. 방 소개해주시는 분은 친절했는데 에어비앤비로 연락하시는 분은 연락을 씹거나 매우 늦게 단답으로 답장하셨어요. 그리고 에어비앤비는 보통 호스트와 함께 생활하면서 교류하는 게 장점인데 호스트 얼굴은 체크인 때밖에 못봤어요. 교류 기대하시는 분은 비추입니다.
I stayed at Faisal's apartment for one night. It was clean and comfortable, a lot of privacy and includes everything that is needed.
Комната полностью соответствует описанию, удобная огромная кровать, чистота и порядок. Очень гостеприимный хозяин, отличное расположение. Спасибо за приятное пребывание!

The location was great.
everything was almost as expected. our host was not there to welcome us when we got there, but that was not a huge problem (luckily someone else was there to open the door for us). the next morning we met our host which was very kind and helpful.
the only issue we had- the place was advertised as an entire apartment. but in reality- it is not. it is a "private room" with shared facilities (the 2 other rooms were rented to other airbnb guests).
Fantastic location within the centre of the new town. Clean and comfortable. Good value for the price paid

The place was nice and clean and Ghassan was very friendly. Unfortunately it was difficult to communicate with Faisal. I couldnt get his address until 1 hour after my arrival. He didn’t answer several messages I sent him prior to my departure. That made the check in process complicated, time consuming and very stressful. Luckily good guy Ghassan picked me up from Taksim square.

Faisal nous a bien expliqué comment arriver chez lui depuis l'aéroport en bus (nous avons ainsi pu économiser le taxi, ce qui est non négligeable) mais malheureusement il n'était pas sur place durant notre séjour. C'est son ami Ghassan qui nous a accueilli et montré comment nous déplacer dans la ville. Il a été incroyablement disponible et amical (ainsi qu'un autre ami à eux qui vivait dans la chambre à côté) et le contact a donc été très facile. Nous avons passé de super soirées en leur compagnie, il nous ont même invité et fait à manger, nous avons fumé la shisha ensemble, et je recommande donc vivement ce logement à toute personne intéressée par un accueil chaleureux et de nouvelles connaissances. Le quartier est très calme et remplis de bonnes adresse où aller manger, littéralement à 5 min a pied de la place Taksim et du métro et la chambre est comme sur les photos.
Habitació i pis molt correctes. Lavabo ok i wifi tambe. Molt centric, recomanable 100%
it was a good experience. if you wanna stay this house you should know english, french and arabic :)

The listing was accurate in all the details (except for the view to the Bosphorus Canal, which we did not see). It is a nice room in an appartment with two other rooms for rent with which the bathroom is shared. The address is not public - I found it through some (Hidden by Airbnb) -fu - but once we got near the entrance to the flat, a short call to Faisal solved the "check-in" problem - he sent his brother to open for us and show us the room.

The temperature of the hot water from the shower tap fluctuates continuously (from hyper-hot to mildly warm in 1 minute), so you must always turn the cold water knob higher or lower - however, at any moment there is a setting which makes the water tolerable.

The bathroom had a full set of 10 toilet paper rolls so I did not panic that we were going to run out of it even though I used very little. The toilet itself flushes thoroughly and has a bidet included.

My mother, who stayed with me, said that the room was sometimes too cold because of the window above and the heating which was irregularly on (we went in late November). I note that this did not bother me. Also, there is a large supply of blankets and towels available.

The other inhabitants of the apartment did not bother us in the slightest (we had the key to our room).
Faisal is a great host. Everything as described. Location is so good also place was clean and tidy. If you're looking place in Istanbul you should try Faisal's house. Highly recommended!
Es war alles so wie beschrieben. Perfekte Lage, freundlicher Gastgeber. Sauberes Zimmer und dazu noch ein Wohnzimmer mit einer bequemen Couch. Wir waren sehr zufrieden!

The location is perfect. The apartment is very comfortable and clean. The kitchen is small, but that's OK, because we ate out.

My only complaint is with the communication. We arrived at Taksim around 6 PM, and we were unable to access the apartment until 7:30 PM. Faisal was not good at communicating the fact that his friend Ghassal would be giving us access to the apartment and that he works until 7:30 PM. Luckily, another guest in the apartment let us in, but obviously, we could not leave until Ghassal arrived around 8 PM to give us keys.

I recommend coordinating with Faisal and Ghassal in advance to avoid this trouble. Otherwise, we were very satisfied. Excellent location.
