Didn't manage to meet Faisal, but his mate was there to greet us. The unit was convenient towards Taksim and for the price paid, it matched up but one lacks personal space as the toilet is shared between 3 rooms.

It is really near to modern center of Istanbul which is great advantage. The host Ghassan, Faisal's friend is a good and friendly guy.  The toilet is shared between three rooms, but despite that the accommodations is clean and neat.
Faisal's apartment is extremely close to Taksim square. Though i never got to meet Faisal in my 1 day stay, his friend was very friendly describing the area. + recommended :)

A very welcoming friend of Faisal showed us our room. It had everything as shown on the pictures. It was comfortable and clean and the WLAN was good. We were in general very surprised that the whole flat was very clean (we had worse experiences in Turkey).
In total i can absolutely recommend staying there and i will definitively do it when i come back to Istanbul!

Thanks again, it was a cool time! :)

I stayed with my friend at Faisal apartment. We didnt see him, there was his friend, who always was ready to help us via (Hidden by Airbnb) or face to face. The room look exactly same as on the picture. It is cozy, not so small but it was cleaned good. there was some dust overthere. But we got fresh sheets and towels.
Well Causal was never in the place but Obaieda his cousin take us in... He was great with us. The place is also great, very close to taksim square and close to Galata tower....

Faisal is a really nice host who can give you advice to visit the city.
The flat was nice and clean.

The room is in a shared apartment really close to Taksim square. The location is really good, but they don't give you the exact address and they didn't give to us even when we asked by message, so to find it was not easy and I spent a lot of money talking at the phone to find the place. Linens were not cleaned, but the guy changed them immediately when we asked. In general a good place, located close to Taksim metro station and Taksim square which is really good for hanging out in the weekend, but the host should be more caring  of coming guests.

I stayed at Faisal place for 3 nights and I really enjoyed it !! I met his Ghasin (sorry if i misspell your name ! ) who also stays there, he is very friendly and welcoming. The flat is clean and well-located, close to Taksim but in small and quiet street. I had  a pleasant time !!
We had a great time--great location near Taksim square, clean, quiet room.
The room was really clean, and everything was great. We just stayed for one night but the location was really good. Totally recommended
Very good host, would recommend
Todo muy bien

Good value and location for the money. Half way up a hill though so be prepared to walk to public transport. Nice host who was helpful. Getting keys was a bit of a challenge and was more difficult to coordinate than it could have been but otherwise all good.
Everything was great the location was good and everything clean we really enjoyed our stay!

L accueil a ete très chaleureux... mais nous avons rencontres des difficultes pour le localiser. We stayed at Faisal's for 3 nights and it was such an excellent experience. You'll have about 5mins walk from Taksim Sq. There is quite an uphill on your way to the square thought. Although we were late for getting the keys, Ghassan arranged us in the apartment and gave us the keys after. He was so friendly, kind and gentle.
There is one thing: smoking is not allowed in the room but Ghassan himself was smoking shisha (hookah) in the hall every night :))
Everything was ok, we didnt meet Faisal but his friend took care of everything. Perfect location 5 minutes from Taksim Square. We would stay there again.

I could not have chosen a better place to stay. Really very close to the famous Taksim square. Many options of restaurants and for those who like to go out at night can also find many options. Easy access to metro, bus and tramway. The host is very attentive and kindly helped me in everything I needed. When I arrived I was promptly answered to receive the keys of the apartment. I really recommend the place. I will be back in August and will stay here again
I simply loved the space, the neighborhood, and the great location
Great location just 5 minutes walk from the Metro Station in Taksim. A quiet area and most restaurants and shops are within a short walk from the apartment.
We enjoyed our stay in Istanbul. The location of the flat is perfect :)
Nice flat. Very central.
Faisal is friendly and helpful person .

Faisal, his brother Ghassan is a great host! I  recommend to stay 
at his appartment!

We never got to meet Faisal but his friend, Ghassan, was lovely, helpful, accommodating and warm. He made the logistics of arriving very easy and which took a lot of weight off of my shoulder when i missed my flight and my partner arrived in istanbul first. The room was exactly as described in the page, very close to taksim. Thanks to both of you guys!!!
Un sitio muy acogedor, limpio, centrico... Gassan una persona increible
Faisal nous a très bien accueilli ! La chambre était sympathique et conforme à nos attentes. L'appartement est près de Taksim, bien situé. Le partage des parties communes se fait sans soucis.

Faisal has an excellent apartment in a quiet, safe street just a few blocks away from Taksim/Beyoglu. Communication was easy, the apartment is very clean and comfortable. Queen sized bed. Overall would definitely stay again!
it was a great stay in faisals home! his friend hassan managed our stay friendly and warmhearted. perfect!
Amasinghome with nice hose hold

El lugar está muy bien ubicado a sólo 5 minutos de la estación de metro de Taksim, hay supermercados cerca, es un barrio tranquilo pero si quieres buscar diversión solo debes caminar unos cuantos minutos. La casa es limpia, la habitación es grande, Faisal te ayuda en lo que necesites y también tienes mucha privacidad. Nos encantó!!!
The place was very clean and hospitable, the neighbourhood was great. I would come back next time.
清洁度不错,位置还行,如果你不介意爬坡的话｡吐槽一下房东(其实是他朋友),夜里有新房客入住,于是在客厅里大声聊天,把我半夜吵起来…
Muy lindo lugar, perfectamente ubicado.
Faisal's place was great! Very reasonably priced and in a central location in Istanbul.

I would recommend to stay at this place. It has a good price and the location is marvellous (close to public transportation and centre of the city). The host Ghassan was very nice and helpful, he took very good care of us.
Месторасположение шикарное! Довольно быстро списались, договорились, заселились! Все чисто и аккуратно, описание соответствует действительности.

Great location right next to Taksim Square, transportation convenient, also pretty close to blue mosque and grand bazaar. Unfortunately I couldn't stay more than a day because there was no ac as mentioned in info only a tiny desk fan that wasn't working but host is very nice and communicative. He was also helpful and fixed the fan for us late at night sacrificing his own rest time. Host was very nice when we shortened our stay by returning us the money with no confrontations at all.

Apartment is located 5 minutes from Taksim. Internet is provided. Faisal's friend  was very nice and explained everything to us. Super. Not everything was great though. At one moment there were six people in the apartment. That's a lot for one shower and a toilet (in the same room also). 
But that's not my biggest concern. There was NO air-conditioning in the room. We arrived on August and were provided with a fan.  The fan was helpful but we were expecting something better when there's air-conditioning mentioned in the desribtion.
Ghassan is so nice, our flight was delayed to 3 o'clock in the morning, we met a lot of problems,but he show the greatest patience to help us,really thank him!
Faisal didn't answer us on phone and (Hidden by Airbnb) when we came to apartment. We didn't stay in his apartment in result.

We had a good stay with here in Istanbul, only regret was not staying longer! 

Nicely presented and clean apartment close to a metro station and lively district. 

Good communication and friendly host!

Clean and quiet place, very close to Taksim Square and public transport. Faisal's friend, Ghassan, was a great host. He waited for us very early in the morning and gave me all the info I needed about the city.
Très pratique pour juste une nuit à Istanbul. Parfait vraiment. Je le conseille.
Местоположение отличное, хозяину большое спасибо за помощь и подробные инструкции!!!

There are 3 rooms in the flat. All of them are for guests. It makes it like a hostel. But for the price it is Ok. I did not see Faisal as we were received by his friend Hasap. 
Though we wrote Faisal through airbnb about the time of our arrival and he answered Ok, nobody was waiting for us. Only after we sent a text on the phone, Hasap came.
Every night he slept in the living room. And the worst thing was that he smoked his water pipe just in the room. Only after I asked him not to do that. he stopped.
Our bedroom was clean and comfortable.
Жильё находится очень удачно. Рядом и метро, и трамвай. Хозяин очень доброжелателен и готов помочь во всем. При адекватном восприятии цена-качества, этот вариант размещения - очень хорош.
The place is nice and clean in a great location, a few steps away from Taksim Square. Great host too!

Thx for the host's help.his advice is very useful.with his help , I seems to be my home,thank you!the room is very closed to the metro and you can take the metro to anywhere you want. It is very convenient . If I have enough time , I would stay here two more days.see u again istanbul

The apartment is in the narrow steps street. And overall area looks a bit spooky. but it was quite close to Taksim, so can easily get to anywhere in the city and quite close to the city center. A bit shabby and dirty, due to high volume of guests. more like student apartment , not for family stay.

Ghassan es un excelente anfitrión. La habitación está bien y la ubicación es muy buena. Pero se deben comunicar directamente al teléfono que figura publicado que es de Ghassan. Faisal solo atiende el perfil de la plataforma.

Faisal and his friend that looks after the Air bnb are lovely people! However, for check in I couldn’t add them on (Hidden by Airbnb) like they asked so he told me to just message him on the Air bnb app and I was waiting about half an hour to get checked in. The place isn’t very clean and the kitchen isn’t well stocked. Would only recommend a short stay that you don’t plan to cook anything during. The location is close to transit and the hosts are very friendly and more than willing to help you out with any questions you may have.
Todo bien en general, la ubicación es buena sobre todo por el precio. Todo limpio y ordenado. Buena comunicación vía (Hidden by Airbnb) .

We had a wonderful stay at Faisal’s place. He was very accommodating despite my last minute messages and the room is exactly as described. He also let us check out very late on our last day by leaving our bags in the flat. Great place from which to explore Istanbul, and excellent value.
Lugar bien ubicado, y tal como aparece en las fotos.

I had already stayed here before, and was glad to be able to book again
This time I was in a different room, but as always, the flat is clean and cozy. Ghassam (Faisal's friend which was in the apartment as a host) is kind and ready to help.
The location is good, close to Taksim but also to Kabatas, which I think is very convenient.

Good host with good English. My stay got extended on short notice so I needed somewhere to stay. It was pretty much an emergency and Faisal helped me out. The place was clean and quiet, plus the great communication made the situation a lot easier.

We had some problem. Today we left apartments we booked three days earlier that we planned. And we’d like to have our money back for the 3 cancelled days.

Unluckily, we also were not satisfied with the service at all and our host didn’t help us. 

First, the host Faisal who is registered on Airbnb, told in the profile he lives in USA and his cousin Ahmet would meet the guests. That was okay, but the person we communicate with was nor Faisal nor Ahmet, it was Ghassan, which as Faisal said was his friend.

When we got in and spent a night in the apartment, we realized Ghasan was living here, and not only visiting house at mornings and evenings, as it was said in the description of the room. 

He also used to invite friends in the apartment who supposedly were not guests (because they were sitting in the guestroom for hours and chatting with Ghasan and then disappeared). So we didn’t feel completely safe.

We also did not know that smoking of hookah is allowed in the house. We both are non-smokers, so it’s essential for us. We were surprised this essential information wasn’t mentioned in the description of the apartment.

And today we found someone’s dirty socks on the vacuum cleaner in the kitchen. This was the final issue, and also the absence of water in the area, which for sure was not the responsibility of our host. But he was not helpful enough and was already gone so we couldn’t even talk to him about the mess. He left us alone.

When we wrote about all those problems to our host Faisal, he just said he see no problem in it. He also wrote that Ghassan told him about our fight with another guests  - that was totally not truth and a little bit shocking. We were very sad to hear that. He also did’t commented the smoking issue at all.
The apartment is well located. Bakery, supermarket and coffee shops all within short walking distance. All communications with Faisal were excellent. Recommend.
Central apartment and clean
Great location. Very close to istiklal street. Quiet place.
Exelente ubicacion

Excellent value for money.
Easy to communicate with. Great location for Galata.

Walking distance to Taksim metro and the famous shopping belt/street.

Thanks and Blessings!

Шума с улиц и призывов на намаз из мечетей не слышно совсем. Можно готовить, магазинов рядом много. Если пройтись, есть Carrefour мини и Migros jet. Мне очень понравилось. Рекомендую!!!
Nice location and good take care of hose
Great place

name: Large, sunny apartment. Perfect location.
summary: I'm renting my two bedroom apartment. You will have the entire place all for yourselves. It is located in the East Village the best neighborhood in Manhattan but it's extremely quiet once you are inside!
space: We are located in an absolutely wonderful area with tons of more coffee shops, bars and restaurants than you’ll have a chance to try. It is also incredibly quiet inside the apartment... I tend to sleep with the window open and don't hear much more than birds chirping in the morning. But as soon as you step out of the building you feel that you are right in the center of new york city :)
description: I'm renting my two bedroom apartment. You will have the entire place all for yourselves. It is located in the East Village the best neighborhood in Manhattan but it's extremely quiet once you are inside! We are located in an absolutely wonderful area with tons of more coffee shops, bars and restaurants than you’ll have a chance to try. It is also incredibly quiet inside the apartment... I tend to sleep with the window open and don't hear much more than birds chirping in the morning. But as soon as you step out of the building you feel that you are right in the center of new york city :) I have a lockbox so that you can pick up the keys whenever you arrive to the city. You can always reach me tru cell/email. I'm more than happy to give you tips and show you around (I've had a great time with past guests). Of course, I'll also let you have all the space and privacy you may desire.  The East Village (EV) is known for its cool bars and nightlife, great restaurants, and music venues. It is
neighborhood_overview: The East Village (EV) is known for its cool bars and nightlife, great restaurants, and music venues. It is very hipster, artsy and unique. My block, specifically, is a living reminder of the East Village's punk-rock past. Significant moments in counterculture history happened all along the street: Abbie Hoffman invented the Yippies at No. 30 in 1967; Andy Warhol, the Velvet Underground, and Jimi Hendrix performed at now-gone experimental nightclub Electric Circus, before it closed in 1971; and gallery 51X backed eighties-era graffiti artists like Keith Haring and Basquiat. Today, the street's grasp on culture lies mostly within its diverse restaurants (frankfurters at Crif Dogs, Israeli cuisine at Hummus Place) and storefronts. And though these aren’t quite as anti-establishment as they once were—there’s nothing too rebellious about sidewalk vendors hawking plastic sunglasses—some glam stalwarts still remain, like Trash & Vaudeville and Andy's Chee-Pees, where you can still sift throug
notes: Good to know: the apartment is on the 4th floor of a walk-up building. The stairs will provide you with a bit of a work-out!
transit: There is extremely convenient public transportation. We are just 1-2 blocks from the 6, N, Q and R subway lines.  Public transportation is extremely convenient: we are just 1 block from the F and J lines. And 5 minute walk from B,D lines. So you are 20 mins away from MoMa, Central Park, Midtown, Empire State Building, Times Square and other tourist attractions.  We are walking distance to SoHo, East Village, West Village, Nolita, and Alphabet City. And have very easy access to most of Brooklyn. East Village, Manhattan, New York City, NYC, Manhattan, Lower East Side, EV, The Big Apple.
access: I have a lockbox so that you can pick up the keys whenever you arrive to the city.
interaction: You can always reach me tru cell/email. I'm more than happy to give you tips and show you around (I've had a great time with past guests). Of course, I'll also let you have all the space and privacy you may desire.
house_rules: 1. Remember to return your house keys before you check out. If the keys are not returned before check out, or if they are damaged, we will charge a $50.00 administrative fee through airbnb. 2. You can check in as early as 15:00. Check out is at 11:00. 3. If you need early check in or late check out, I can put you in touch with a luggage storage service that also does pick up and drop off at my apartment. They are local, they are great, and they will give you a discounted rate that I've negotiated with them. 4. Please make sure to smoke outside of our house. 5. Please make sure to ask us before bringing extra guests into our home. ABOUT PAYMENT:  Many ask about the price and extra fees and how to pay. When you put in the dates and number of people you will get our total cost. There are no taxes on top of this, but AirBnB adds their fee. It varies between 6-12% on top of our price. All the payments are safely made with credit card to AirBnB when booking. They hold the money until the day

host.host_about:
Hi I'm originally from Mexico City, I've jumped around the world and lived in Singapore, Philadelphia, Miami, and now in New York City.

Love meeting people and showing you why I love this city!

reviews.comments: Beautiful apartment, hidden gem near the East village area. Great location with loads of fantastic restaurants in walking distance. The apartment itself is very light and airy, great little balcony area with big sash windows. Mayra has decorated the apartment really nicely- simple and uncluttered, and laid fresh bedding and towels out for us. The double bunk bed is fun, and makes the room more spacious. Kitchen area is useful with everything you need. She was also really helpful, left us a map and useful suggestions, and was on-hand for any questions we had. The two of us had a great stay in the apartment and would definitely stay with Mayra again!! :D

appartement tres bien place dans quartier sympa
ideal pour etudiants pour decouvrir la ville
