neighborhood_overview: Tara Cottage is located 4 miles south of the town of Captain Cook in the heart of Kona coffee country. This farming community is also known throughout the islands for its organic fruits and vegetables that are prized by fine restaurants throughout the state. The South Kona location of Tara is a relaxed 'kick-back' area populated by friendly people who frequent nearby coffee shops, as well as favorite spots to enter the water for excellent swimming, snorkeling and scuba diving.
transit: A rental car is a necessity to drive to Tara Cottage (a 35 minutes south of Kailua- Kona); to reach area beaches that are a 10-15 minute drive from the cottage; and to access favorite spots for entry into the water to swim, snorkel and scuba dive.
access: Tara Cottage is for the private use of its guests.  It provides free wifi; a landline with free calls to the other islands, the US mainland and Canada; HD wide screen TV, a full kitchen and its own Bosch washer and dryer.
interaction: I greet guests when possible within an hour of their arrival and no later than the next day.  Usually within an hour of their arrival (no later than the next day for late arrivals) I provide guests with a tour of the cottage, pointing out the Guest Bookwith useful information about the cottage, including the Cottage Rules; the Activities book full of things to see and do in the South Kona location of the cottage; and the Restaurant Guide with menus of many restaurants nearby and in Kailua-Kona. Further interaction with guests is at their discretion. However as I live in a 2nd cottage lateral to Tara Cottage (and out of its sightline),  I can easily be reached by phone to provide suggestions/recommendations and to promptly address any concerns or problems that might arise.
house_rules: Guests are provided with a page of Cottage Rules prior to their arrival, also to be found in the guestbook in the cottage. They are asked to respect my privacy  and the privacy of my cottage and its grounds, as I will  theirs. Pets are not allowed and smoking is permitted only on the grounds surrounding the cottage. The amenities of the cottage (washer/dryer, outdoor shower, wifi, etc.) are only for the use of registered guests. Also none of the fine books, CDs and DVDs within the cottage may leave the cottage.  Arrival is after 3 PM with departure no later than 11 AM unless other arrangements have been made well in advance.

host.host_about:
I have been living above Kealakekua Bay on the Kona Coast of Hawaii's Big Island since 1994. I live on Iand I developed and named Tara Farm, where I grow Kona coffee, ulu (breadfruit) and white pineapple among other fruits. 
This property is also the site of beautiful Tara Cottage. 
 I was born and raised in the Washington, D.C. area, moving to San Francisco  in 1978 to take the job of Audiologist for Alameda County; and later Director of Audiology for the Hearing Society in San Francisco. After 13 years in the SF Bay Area I moved to Kauai in 1991 and hosted a  B&B there for 3 years. The move to the Big Island followed in 1994 where I managed another beautiful B&B near Kealakekua Bay while developing my property and building Tara Cottage upslope at its  950 ft elevation. I moved onto the property full-time in 1998 and have been privileged to live here ever since.
My interests include swimming and snorkeling, playing the piano, cinema, reading and traveling.

reviews.comments: Michael's home was so lovely!! The pictures don't do it justice, it's even more magical. I thought the location was so perfect for all outdoor activities & Michael was incredibly helpful with providing advice! I'll 100% stay in this beautiful cottage again!!

We had a fantastic experience at Tara Cottage — it exceeded all of our expectations! What more could we have wanted? There were beautiful flowers, macadamia nuts, and local Kona coffee that was grown literally right outside our window. The cottage itself was absolutely beautiful. Michael gave us a nice tour of the property when we arrived, and he did everything possible to make us feel welcome. He was unobtrusive but always available to answer questions or just say hello. This was a fabulous place to stay, and I'm happy that we chose to stay here. Wouldn't change a single thing.

This place was amazing! The grounds were spectacular and so peaceful. The cottage is located on a small coffee farm with a STUNNING view of the Kona coastline. Michael greeted us after we arrived and showed us around the cottage. Otherwise, he left us to enjoy the peaceful privacy of the cottage. The cottage itself is beautifully decorated and cozy. The beds were SO comfortable (seriously, Michael, where did you get those mattresses?), and Michael truly thought of every detail to make our stay comfortable. There was extra sunscreen, mosquito spray, shampoo and conditioner, anything you would need in the kitchen, playing cards, beach chairs and umbrellas, and towels. A nice touch was the fruit basket, zucchini bread, and macadamia nuts waiting for us when we arrived. This place is truly wonderful and the perfect getaway for a relaxing vacation. We would definitely stay again! Also, if you are looking for a nice place for breakfast/brunch, check out the Coffee Shack a few miles down the road. The breakfast was great and the views were AMAZING!

I'm not sure where to even begin. Words can't describe the beauty and magic of Michael's Tara Cottage. It is obvious that he put a lot of thought and care into crafting this exquisite place! The books. The music. The linens. The decor. The dishes. The coffee. The wonderful arrival treats. THE SHOWER! That comfy bed! All glorious. The view is to die for. Pictures truly do not do it justice. The frogs. The birds. I did not want to leave! I will definitely, definitely, most definitely be back! We travel to Hawaii most years, staying on different islands.......and Tara was our favorite. Ever. Thank you, Michael for a magical stay!

Tara Cottage is a beautiful place to retreat into the the lushness of Honaunau, South Kona country side.  Michael our host has enhanced the already beautiful surroundings of  large mango trees, and papaya trees with Ti plants and bamboo. The view of Captain Cook Monument and the sunset every night make this a very special place.  The outdoor shower, privacy, and beautiful cottage interior made this a perfect get away.  We are looking forward to returning to this Hawaiian treasure.

Every time I entered the driveway to Tara Cottage I felt very happy to be back. It just starts with the well maintained property and you park your car with an impressive view. After spending a few minutes looking at the bay, you enter the beautiful furnished cottage, maybe looking already forward to another "waterfall" outdoor shower which you enjoyed 2-3 times per day...you might want to finish your day with having a BBQ on the Weber grill or just watching the impressive (Website hidden by Airbnb) soon as you relax on the bed you will fall easily asleep like you would not have (Website hidden by Airbnb) far about the cottage. Now the most important words about the host: Michael is a charming, kind and very professional host taking care of any detail you can imagine. I also enjoyed so much meeting his (now) two dogs. 
Finally: If you get the chance: reserve for a memory of your life (which I will have).

Well - it is not easy to describe all the things I enjoyed so much. Perhaps as an intro: I first booked for one week and was then very lucky that I could extend my stay for another week until the next guests would arrive. If you get the chance on airbnb that Michaels Tara cottage is free for your dates (or even for a shorter period): book it as fast as you can...
I travel (really) a lot for work and leisure around the world and this is one of the best places where I stayed so far. Thank you very much Michael for your hospitality and kindness! I hope I get the chance to come back one day!

Tara Cottage is a paradise-like place; a cozy, charming home on a gorgeous piece of land. If you are looking for a place to unwind and pamper your soul, I truly hope Tara Cottage is available on your requested dates. Michael is very kind and helpful, which made our stay even more enjoyable. We will definitely come back as soon as we can!

We stayed at Tara cottage on the last leg of our honeymoon and it was the perfect end to our trip.  The cottage and property were beautiful!  Michael was a great host and was easy to contact and talk to if we had questions.  The photos don't do it justice, we loved the outdoor shower!  We would absolutely stay again if we make it back to the island.

Tara Cottage is the ideal location if you're in the Captain Cook area. Maybe one of the most beautiful places on the whole island! It's very close to great local restaurants and stores, as well as  swimming areas like (one of my favorite snorkeling spots of the trip) Two-Step Beach. It's also just very comfortable and relaxing. You can literally stay at the house all day and be happy. Michael was always quick to respond to any questions I had, and his on-site assistant Chuck was funny, kind, and wonderfully generous with his time and knowledge of the island. My wife and I had an amazing stay here and we'd definitely come back a million more times if we could.

Tara Cottage is a gem!  Michael the host, is very friendly and welcoming.
We loved the stunning, peaceful location (about 30 minutes drive from Kona airport) with a view of the ocean and the beautiful, well kept gardens.  Everything is thought of, including some complimentary local produce, flower arrangement, books, cds, beach towels & chairs, cool box, snorkelling equipment etc.  The kitchen has a selection of condiments, cleaning and washing products and is very well equipped.  Two of the best snorkelling areas are very close by and each morning the dolphins come into the bay, which added to a very special experience.  It was wonderful to sit in the garden drinking fresh coffee which had been grown in the garden!  Great solar powered outdoor shower too! This place is so good, we didn't want to leave!   Thank you Michael

This is truly a bit of Hawaiian paradise. From the cottage you look across lawns above the coffe plantation  down the hill and out across the bay to the captain cook monument without seeing any signs of habitation -very quiet except for the occasional wild turkey or rooster. Set at about 1000 foot elevation the temperature is perfect and great to come home to when the beaches get too hot or humid. The grounds are immaculate as is the decoration of the cottage. We feel we were very lucky to find such a place for a quiet and peaceful vacation. Well done Michael!

Tara Cottage was everything Michael promised and more. He was very welcoming, always available to answer questions and knowledgable about local happenings and history. We stayed for two weeks and could not have been happier. Each day we left to explore the island hiking, swimming, snorkeling, coffee tasting, sightseeing, and returning to Tara was like coming home. Quiet and relaxing, surrounded by a beautiful garden filled with birds and a gorgeous ocean view from the lanai, we wanted for nothing! The cottage was well equipped from kitchen to laundry to water toys and a wonderful outdoor shower. Tara is close to the some of the islands best snorkeling, a great local beach and grocery store. An idyllic place to stay for couples. Michaels listing of Tara was completely accurate and the neighborhood was ideal. If we return to the Big Island we will stay here again!

This property is perfect for a couple looking to unwind. The serene setting and lovely amenities could not be better. Plan to spend time there rather than run around sight seeing. You will not want to leave.

My husband and I spent 5 nights at Tara Cottage in early June and we absolutely loved it. As so many have said, it's a beautifully-appointed cottage with many nice touches, located on a breathtakingly gorgeous property! It had everything we needed and was very comfortable and welcoming. The outdoor shower was a treat and made it feel like a spa. The fresh fruit and baked goodies we received upon arrival were most welcome and we adored the Tara Coffee. We only wish we had brought more home with us! The view of the ocean and bay in the distance was nice to gaze out on from the kitchen table and lanai. And we really appreciated how quiet Tara Cottage was! It felt private, which we really liked. The coqui frog-song at night was a real highlight for us as was the birdsong in the morning. All in all, it was the perfect location for exploring South Kona and for enjoying amazing snorkeling at Two Step (we went every day, sometimes twice) and getting to know the area. Five nights is simply not enough! We regret not taking the time to rent a kayak at Kealakelua Bay, so we need to come back for that! Michael was very gracious as was Gloria, the housekeeper. We lacked for nothing (except for ripe mangoes and white pineapples, because they weren't in season yet!). I don't think we could've found a more perfect place.

What an oasis! This property is truly a tropical retreat, surrounded by lush greenery and with an amazing ocean view. As an experienced B&B owner, Michael has stocked the house with supplies for everything you might want, from an elaborate meal to a day at the beach. He even provided us with fruit and coffee from the property to enjoy during our stay. We would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a quiet home-away-from-home.

The Tara Cottage was great! Pictures do a great job representing the place. Beautiful view and well taken care of. Outdoor shower is pretty awesome! It was very nice to have beach towels and snorkeling gear accessible at the cottage, eliminating hassle of rentals or purchasing. We had a great time and would come back! Fresh fruit from the farm was delicious!

Tara Cottage is an amazing Place with a stunning view to the Ocean. It is Nice and quiet and the perfect Place for relaxation. We were so in Love with The outdoor shower. We can highly recommend Michaels Place. He is very kind and has Great advice for you.

Such a wonderful place of the world. So beautiful and calming. The view was amazing especially at sunset. Outdoor shower was funny experience but I liked liberating feeling. I'll definitely come back.
Excellent vacation spot!

This is an exquisite cottage.  We loved our stay.  The design, setting, interior details, artifacts, artwork, views, ambience, wonderfully warm outdoor shower, privacy, and comfort.  We have stayed in many Captain Cook Airbnb's over the years, and this one is especially memorable in its elegance.

All I can say is WOW. Nestled in the hilltops among lush greenery with a sweeping, expansive view of the coastline, Michael's little home was everything we wanted it to be and more. There were so many thoughtful touches--from providing us with a gift basket filled with local goodies like banana bread, macadamia nuts, fresh fruit, and coffee grown right on the property to providing essential gear for snorkeling along with beach towels and an onsite laundry, this house has everything you need. The outdoor shower was a rustic luxury as well. Everything was stocked and so comfortable during our stay. I would absolutely come and stay again, I'm already homesick!

Where do I start? My husband and I just spent a week at Tara Cottage celebrating our 25th anniversary. It could not have been a more perfect environment for relaxing and taking in the beauty of Hawaii. Michael has put so much thought and love into every square inch of the cottage and surrounding acreage. This was our first time visiting the Big Island, but we spent just as much time lounging in the cottage, relaxing on the deck, taking in the spectacular views and going for walks in the surrounding neighborhood as we did sightseeing. It was definitely home away from home. Being upnin the mountains away from busy downtown Kona was perfect! Far enough away, yet a 15 minutes drive to downtown Kona. We will definitely be back! Thank you Michael! And thank you my friend Karen, for telling me about this little piece of Heaven!

Michael's cottage is a great space and an ideal island vacation home. Its very well stocked with anything you might need, including beach gear (chairs, towels, snorkeling equipment, etc). The views are fantastic and the location is great for exploring the Kona area. A big bonus for us was all of the birds and other wildlife (geckos!) just outside your door.

If you want to stay in a secluded place, surrounded by lush greens and incredible views- Tara Cottage is for you! This vacation getaway is dreamy! So private, beautiful, clean; with all the amenities you can think of from dishes, to blenders, to candles, to fans, to soap and shampoo, beach towels and chairs,  etc... the list goes on. We absolutely loved the outdoor shower - there is nothing like it that makes you feel more free and refreshed. The friendly geckos are the cutest and the chickens and birds that come and go are lovely to watch. The grounds of Tara are gorgeous!!! If you prefer to vacation away from everyone else and feel a sense of tranquillity and peace, stay here. Thanks again to Michael and Gloria!!

What an amazing stay we had at Tara Cottage.  Michael was an amazing host with lots of helpful tips on places to see and great dining options.  Great coffee grown right on the farm as well.  There was the fully stocked kitchen and bbq which we used to prepare our sunset dinners.  Lots of snorkeling equipment to check out Captain Cook and Two step a few minutes away.  And the amazing outdoor shower!  Book it!

Paradise found!  Tara Cottage is just as described and every bit as beautiful as shown.  If you are looking for peace and serenity close to some of the best snorkeling on the Big Island, look no further.   We fully enjoyed our stay and hope it was the first of many visits to Tara.

I just came home from spending two beautiful weeks at Michael's place and I already miss it! I decided to go to Hawaii to do a personal retreat. I arrived exhausted and burnt out and I feel very rejuvenated upon return. It's a lovely space full of thoughtful touches and located on a majestic piece of property. I loved everything about Michael, the property and the good energy surrounding the land. I had a magical time and I highly recommend it for all those seeking a quiet refuge.

Michael's place had an absolutely spectacular ocean view set on a private lushly landscaped property.  The Tara cottage was unique, charming and extremely comfortable.  This is an ideal place to relax, prepare food and enjoy the lovely Hawaiian climate.  Thank you Michael for sharing your slice of heaven with us.
The host canceled this reservation 92 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: LOVELY AND CENTRAL ROOM
summary: Located around Plaza Real. The apartment is very well located, bright and cozy. You can use the kitchen, there is wireless internet and we will provide you with towels and of course bed linen. You will love it !! :-) 下面中国警告
space: The center of Barcelona will be yours to enjoy when staying in this room in our shared apartment, located just a few steps away from Plaza Real and the historical center of Barcelona.  Most of the city’s major tourist attractions are located in the surroundings, such as the Gothic cathedral, Ramblas street and Picasso museum. What’s more, you can easily reach places such as la Pedrera, Casa Batlló or Sagrada Familia in just 10 minutes by public transportation. L3 subway station is very close to the apartment and many connexions to buses and trains. The communal areas include the bathroom, kitchen (the burners cannot be used though) and living room. Important info: -THERE IS NO ELEVATOR  -DOUBLE ROOM (two 80 cm beds)  -BEDDING, towels and hairdryer provided  -KITCHEN (the burners cannot be used though), LOUNGE - DINING ROOM, to share  -1 BATHROOM (to share)  - SUPERCENTRAL, around Plaza Real and 4 minutes to Boqueria´s Market.  -DIRECT LINKS TO AIRPORT via metro-train-aerobus  -WIFI INT
description: Located around Plaza Real. The apartment is very well located, bright and cozy. You can use the kitchen, there is wireless internet and we will provide you with towels and of course bed linen. You will love it !! :-) 下面中国警告 The center of Barcelona will be yours to enjoy when staying in this room in our shared apartment, located just a few steps away from Plaza Real and the historical center of Barcelona.  Most of the city’s major tourist attractions are located in the surroundings, such as the Gothic cathedral, Ramblas street and Picasso museum. What’s more, you can easily reach places such as la Pedrera, Casa Batlló or Sagrada Familia in just 10 minutes by public transportation. notes: Regarding the check-in, it will be helpful to receive from you a contact phone number and flight number to check whether your plane has landed or not. Additionally we would really appreciate if you call when you arrive at the airport. Subject to our availability we will normally be available to welcome you at the apartment at the following times:   a)    9:00 am (only for baggage drop off as normally the room will not be ready yet);   b)    13:00 pm;   c)    17:00 pm;   d)    21:00 pm and onwards.

host.host_about: I am from Catalunya and I have experience already in hosting, will love to list my rooms.

reviews.comments: Great Location, comfy and clean apartment. fairly small, but it has everything you need. I would definitely stay here again. I recommend if you don't have a lot of time and want to be really central.

Staying in Fran’s apartment was ideal. The apartment is very cozy and nice. The location is very convenient as it is right in Las Ramblas so you can visit the Gothic quarter and many nice places in the center on foot (including the beach!!). Gothic quarter is also lovely to go to have dinner and to have a drink, so I was just in the middle of everything. That was just perfect for me to come and go easily during the day as many times as I wanted.

The room and the rest of the apartment were very clean and tidy. You can tell that they pay attention to this, and I was very happy with it as I am quite picky with cleanliness.

Suraj and Fran are very cool guys, they were very friendly and helpful. I owe you one guys!! You’ll see me here again for sure!!
It was such a great place to stay and is recommendable for everyone. Very nice and friendly. Thank you!
Fueron muy amables y el apartamento es una monada con su balcón a las mismas Ramblas y el precio estupendo.

Very nice and clean place to stay... The apt is exactly like the photos, new and well equipped. The most important thing to me was the location, just in the center near of EVERYTHING... The tolleit is actually better than mine... ;) I would fully recommend.

The location for Fran's place is impeccable, most of the things are close by, and the metro is right outside (well almost)...the room was nice and the balcony view was amazing. Fran is very (Website hidden by Airbnb) was a wonderful and very memorable stay!

Fran was very helpful upon our arrival, providing us with tips as to where to eat and drink. The room and the flat in general is clean, and the location is fantastic - literally on La Rambla and close to the metro. Great place to be for a short stay in Barcelona!
Tres bon week end excellent positionnement sur las ramblas. On a été tres bien accueilli et le propriétaire est très gentil .

Listing description is accurate. The room is lovely and what you see on the picture is what it actually is.  The host is welcoming and very helpful. The apartment is situated in the old part of Barcelona which gives your stay a more genuine experience of the city.  The area is great. You are close to the underground and to the beach and there are numerous small streets around, full of all kinds of different restaurants, shops and interesting places. The only drawback of the place is that the street below is noisy at it is popular both during the day and during the night. If you don't mind that you are going to have a great time.

A great stay in Barcelona! The bnb was easy to find and suraj helped us upstairs. The room and apartment were exactly as shown, clean and spacious. There was a beautiful balcony looking right out onto la rambla. I definitely recommend this for a stay in Barcelona.
Great

Un petit appartement très sympathique  sur les ramblas à côté de la plaza réal .
L'accueil a été agréable , il est très discret .
J'y retournerai à mon prochain voyage ..

I never got a chance to meet Tony. Instead, his friend Suraj was waiting for me. He was warm and welcoming.
Last night in Barcelona, he took me a restuarant, which was nice, and unforgettable, even though it was short time.
The room was not that big as I could see in the pictures, but very cozy. The location was perfect!
Thank you Suraj. Hope to see you again.

We've had a great experience in Barcelona.

The appartment near the Ramblas was beautiful with a nice host! We could use everything in appartment and our view at the Ramblas was really nice.

Thanks for everything!

This was my first Airbnb experience, and I must say i was very well pleased!!!
The flat is very nice and clean, the host is very friendly and forthcoming, it was no struggle at all....
the proximity has many benefits, if you like it lively, only the noise of the metro can be a bummer....all in all a very pleasing stay, will come back in fall!!

Quartier central, on ne peut mieux pour visiter. 
Rambla très bruyante car c'est juste à côté de la place Real qui accueille les fêtards. Il n'y pas de double vitrage et donc on entend tous les bruits de la rue (fenêtre de la chambre ne se ferme pas correctement).
La cuisine et la salle de bain sont vétustes.
Accueil de Suraj (colocataire) très gentil et disponible, merci.
Well located and very convenient.

Tony's house is the perfect location for central Barcelona with everything at your doorstep literally. Had a smooth checkin and checkout and tony is very understanding. Thanks a lot and will recommend his place to others
Perfecte plek in hartje Barcelona! Kamer is schoon en uitzicht de op de rambla. Snachts alleen wat gehorig.

We hebben een geweldige tijd gehad in Barcelona,we werden opgehaald door onze gastheer op centraal punt en naar onze kamer/woning gebracht het was een eenvoudige maar goede kamer
pal aan de ramblas het huis was schoon en de gastheer erg vriendelijk,zeker voor herhaling vatbaar.

My friend and I had a great stay in Barcelona over the weekend. Tony and his friend were very accommodating and let us into the apartment at a time that was convenient for us.  The apartment was super clean and cozy and the view from our balcony looked over the main street!  Also, we were allowed to leave our bags in the living room past check out time because our flight was later in the day.  Would love to stay here again!

We had such a great stay in Barcelona, all thanks to Suraj (Tony's friend) and the amazing location of the app! Suraj was a really nice host, who made us feel like we were at home. Everything was superclean, the location was amazing and I think this trip wouldn't have been as much fun as it was if it wasn't for this! The room was very clean, the balcony made it supercosy and we literally felt like we were in paradise! Thank you so much for your great hospitality, hope to see you soon someday!!!!

Description de l'appartement tout à fait conforme à la description.
Barcelone se visite complètement à pied depuis ce logement ultra central, propre et proches de toutes les commodités.
A 35' en bus de l'aéroport.
Suraj est un hôte très discret, très sympathique. 
A recommander!

Het contakt met Tony was erg leuk en er werd snel op mails gereageerd. We hebben Tony jammergenoeg niet gezien maar Suraj is een jonge man die in het appartement woont en bij vragen altijd bereid is om je te helpen.  
De kamer is aan de Ramblas waardoor je lekker centraal zit. Je mag naast de slaapkamer bijna alles gebruiken, keuken, woonkamertje, badkamer, toilet. Jammergenoeg de wasmachine niet. 
Oorpluggen zijn wel een must in deze kamer (deze worden verstrekt door de verhuurder maar mijn eigen herriestoppers waren beter), vooral in de weekeinden. en het enige wat we echt jammer vonden was dat je de balkondeuren niet open kan doen want de uitlaatgassen komen dan je kamer binnen ipv frisse lucht. Voor de rest een aanrader!

Apartment is lovely, extremely clean including crisp clean bedding and soft big towels. Kitchen clean and well equipped, likewise bathroom with plenty of hot water for showers. Our bedroom was great for a weekend stay, comfortable bed, wardrobe with lots of hanging space for clothes.  The icing on the cake was our balcony and the view of La Rambla - just sitting on our two little chairs after an evening out watching the world below - absolutely awesome!!!
Didnt meet Tony but communications prior to our stay were excellent.  Suraj was a  lovely guy, helped us with directions and anything else we needed.  Location - what can I say - excellent, excellent, excellent OK a little noisy at times but so vibrant !!  Love Barcelona and will definitely use Tony's again in the future.  Highly recommended.
Beliggenheden er fantastisk, men lydniveauet øredøvende døgnet rundt. Med 2 par + værten i lejligheden er eet badeværelse og eet toilet (i køkkenet) lidt en udfordring.

비행기 시간을 잘못 공유해서 원하는 시간에 만나지 못했습니다. 그래도 생각보다 빨리 일을 끝내고 돌아와서 저와 제 친구를 맞이해주었습니다만, 청소를 하느라 좀 기다려야했어요.
우리가 원하면 새 타올은 원계속 주었고, 욕실에 뜨거운 물도 잘 나왔습니다. 화장실도 깨끗해서 마음에 들었습니다.
 위치는 람블람 거리, 루세아 역 바로 앞이라서 좋았지만~ 시내라서 밤에 너무 시끄러웟어요. 조용한 잠자리를 원하시는 분이라면 참고하시길!
La ubicación es perfecta si lo que quieres es conocer la ciudad turística. Suraj fue un gran host así que 100 por cien recomendado

Die zentrale Lage der Wohnung war perfekt um die Stadt zu Fuß sich zu erschließen. Die Zimmer waren wie auf den Bildern dargestellt. Wir haben uns sehr gut begleitet gefühlt beim Ankommen und bei der Abreise. Die Kommunikation hat dank der neuen Medien einwandfrei geklappt. Danke Tony das Du uns bei Dir hast wohnen lassen. :-)

Genau die richtige Lage für kurzen Aufenthalt! Oder wenn man gern sehr zentral wohnt! Ohrstöpsel jedoch nicht vergessen! Suraj hat alles bestens organisiert! Er wohnt hier und ist sehr nett! Die Wohnung ist sauber. Mein Bericht richtet sich für das Zimmer zur Rambla raus aus. Es gibt 2 Zimmern zur Vermietung.
We felt very welcome, the appartment has everything you need. Very good location to visit things. The room is a bit noisy, but it didn't bother me.

While we did not meet Tony his friend Sanjay was very helpful and Tony was great with communication on line.  The apartment was very central and light and bright, however, given the bedroom overlooks the Ramblas it was extremely noisy particularly through the night.  Given that they're several rooms in the apartment, it was more like a back packers and as people were also sleeping on the lounge you had to creep about coming and going and it left me with nowhere to go to make a few calls home etc while my travel companion was sleeping etc.

Had a great stay in Barcelona. The apartment is super central, overlooking La Rambla. Suraj is a kind and accommodating guy. He came to find us on the street, helped us to the apartment and then showed us around the town. Word of caution that La Rambla is quite a busy street especially at night so light sleepers may need to think twice... or indulge in some sangria before bed... or just bring earplugs... or don't sleep.
Great stay, 100 % recommend!!!

Tony was a great host. He showed us around and went out of his way to help us regain an item we left behind. You could not have asked for a better location off of Las Ramblas. It was not more that a ten minute walk to the beach and a five minute  cab ride to the train station. I would absolutely stay there again.
Very nice! Great location, awesome host. Thank you!
It was nice home facing very happening street in Catlunya... Very nice and private apartment. Suraj was very nice to give us tips and to pick up us.

I am extremely grateful and totally overwhelmed at how great the room & the host Suraj was. I couldn't have honestly wished for anything better. The room was bigger than expected, the balcony was a lovely addition too! 
The whole place was very clean and tidy. 
I would reconnect this air bnb apartment (room) to anyone wishing to visit the lovely city of Barcelona! Thank you tony & thank you Suraj!!!! X
A great place to stay if you value a central location. Very nice and helpful host!

Nice clean room, perfect location for a weekend or so. Air Conditioning is a plus !!
Would stay again

Good location, easy walking to attractions. Tony communicated well online. Suraj was a friendly host. As expected its on La Rambla so prepare for noise at night! As stated it has 3 rooms in total all sharing one toilet and bathroom. Has a bit of a backpacker feel to it. Basically your paying for location.
Great place right on the main street of Barcelona.  Tony's friend Suraj was nice and helpful. Id recommend this place.

The room is perfectly located looking out onto La Rambla. Many sites within walking distance. Even the beach, although about a 25 min walk. Communicating with Suraj and Tony was great, they were always prompt to reply and help however they could.
Superbe séjour. Lieu conforme aux descriptions et proche des places stratégiques

Suraj is really kind and polite host. He helped us with our luggage (it was really heavy suitcase, so thanks again) and told about the most important things. 
Location is perfect. We didn't need using metro or bus and could visiting by walk. The  best thing in this flat is balcony with view on La Rambla - it was pleasure to sit on this balcony and drink sangria. 
Room was simple and tidy (like on the  photo). We had a lot privacy, because Suraj spent much time outside  and the room is next to living room - we hadn't any  problems with other (Hidden by Airbnb) .
I  recommended this room  and visit in beautiful Barcelona :)
Had a great stay. The room was good, a bit loud due to people on the street but was provided with earplugs which was excellent. Suraj was lovely and very accommodating. Great central location!

We had a little miscommunication with Suraj for the time of our arrival, so we had to wait for about 30 minutes before we were able to go inside the appt, but otherwise, this place is great for short visits. Like mentionned before, the room faces Las Ramblas, which makes the noise level really loud, but we were kindly provided with ear plugs. Litterally in the middle of everything and is walking distance to all the "touristic Barcelona". We were happy with this rental, as it matched everything in its description.

There was a miscommunication between our host Tony and Suraj who was responsible of letting us in the appartement which resulted in him meeting us a little over 30 mins after the previously agreed upon time. Suraj was obviously very sorry about the delay and helped us carry our luggages. They were very accomodating, letting us keep our luggages at the apartement before and after check in / check out. The room is modest but functional, the apartement was clean and the instructions very clear. The room faces Las Ramblas so like any room in El Raval, it will be quite noisy at night. Our host provided ear plugs which was a nice touch. The location is very central and the apt building is very safe. Would recommand for a short stay in Barcelona.
This room is clean and the location is great.
Its a pretty nice, clean room and the hosts are kind ! Love it!
Wonderful experience. Tony and Suraj were more than accommodating. Thanks a lot!

Location is perfect, on the Main Street and easy to get anywhere.
Room is very clean, suraj is very kind.

Tony was a great host, he took us on very short notice (couple hours before we checked in) provided us with all the necessary information beforehand. The apartment is also very, very nice. Perfectly located next to la rambla with a very nice balcony. Can totally recommend the apartment!!!

This place is in a great location. Central to everything it is noisey but this was no surprise. The room is clean but there is a bad smell throughout the kitchen and living room areas. This place was fine
Tony and Suraj are very nice and welcoming! The house is located on a popular street, so at weekends there are a little noisy. We have a lot of privacy in the apartment.

It's a very good flat and with great location. It's located in the commercial center and close to the beach. We're able to get to everywhere very fast. And Tony and Suraj are great host, they are very nice offer a great place. We will come back again.
Suraj fue muy amable en todo lo que necesitamos. Casi no nos vimos una vez que  nos instalamos ya que paseamos todo el tiempo. Limpio, ordenado y acogedor. Todo perfecto. Muy buena ubicación!!

Tony & Saruj were both great in making me feel welcome as well as being very helpful with anything I asked about. Room and appartment were clean despite the bathrom sink having a problem but this didnt bother me.
The apartment was great. Location/room/amenities were amazing.  would reccomend to anyone looking for a small cozy place in the heart of la rambla.
Perfect location. Clean bathroom/room. Plenty of space. Couldn't ask for a better place to stay in Barcelona.

Suraj who lives in the apartment was there to meet and greet us. The apartment is in the middle of Las Ramblas which was absolutely a perfect location for us. 

The description of the room was accurate. Apartment was tidy. As the location is very central Suraj was well aware and prepared us for the potential noise from the busy street. He provided ear plugs which were put to use. We did have a good stay there and felt very safe. 

I would recommend this place as it is a key location and you can go anywhere from here.
Una experiencia genial! Con vistas a Las Ramblas y una conexión con el metro inmejorable. Suraj es una persona amable y educada, un 10!
All good. Arrived in the middle of the night but handover of Keys was great.

Le logement était en tout point conforme , j'ai aimé la localisation en plein centre. L'inconvénient de la chambre ou nous etions était le bruit de l'extérieur (donne sur les ramblas) mais j'ai tellement apprécier le coté central. Et puis il y avait des boules kies sur la table de nuit et fatiguée par la marche j'ai très bien dormi les 2 nuits. Enfin il n'y avait aucun bruit venant de l'appartement ou de l'immeuble . Notre hôte était très discret tout en étant présent si on en avait besoin. Du coup on avait l'impression d'avoir tout l’appartement pour nous. J'étais rassurée aussi par l'échange de mails ( 1ere fois que je loue avec airbnb) . Très bonne expérience donc
Merci Tony et Suraj

Él es un buen dueño, un hombre muy majo,pasamos 5 días alegres en su casa. Y la localización de la casa también es súper buena!!! En el centro de la ciudad y muy cerca de la estación del metro y cerca del mar. Me encanta la duración en Barcelona. Gracias!!!

Great location in Barcelona. The apartment is very comfortable and Suraj is a very kind host. The room is just like described and house rules are focused on having a quiet and comfortable place to land.

Todo salió perfecto! La descripción, leyéndola después de haber ido, es 100% fiel a la realidad. Nos hospedamos en la habitación que da a la calle, y puede resultar un poco ruidosa por las noches, pero nada que no se pueda tolerar, la ubicación lo justifica si es lo que se quiere priorizar. Suraj es muy amable y tolerante, nos dejó quedarnos incluso tiempo para terminar de cerrar los equipajes.
Small apartment right on the lower Ramblas. Perfect location for exploring the Gothic quarter and the historical parts of town. Is right on the Ramblas, so a bit noisy at night.

Why'd you even think about hotels. Really the best location that you can think about in Barcelona + balcony faces an important street + Suraj who was like a friend of us, he gave us enough info about Barcelona, even more, we were asking him about places while we were out by (Hidden by Airbnb) . The appointment itself is like what in the picture, the kitchen is full equipped. And the whole place is clean
Great Room - Used before ..... and would use again !!  Would also recommend.  Clean, tidy, great location all you would need for a couple of days stay in this great city !!

Un tres bon séjour chez Tony pour ce petit week-end ensoleillé ! L'appartement est petit mais très fonctionnel et surtout extrêmement bien situé en plein coeur de la rambla. Rien de mieux pour découvrir Barcelone et sa vie animée. l peut être un peu bruyant à cause de la vie nocturne trépidante mais une paire de bouchon d'oreille règle le souci.J'y retournerai sans problème.

Incredible location, right in the thick of it. Would recommend based on location itself. Perfect for a couple of nights in Barcelona. We came down with food poisoning during our stay and Tony and Surjac were wonderful about it.

Host was super nice, space was comfortable and in a GREAT location. Can't really go wrong, except that it might be a little loud at night if that bothers you, but just bring earplugs and you should be good to go.

The apartment was a bit smaller than it looks in the photos. And very noisy, but to be expected! It is on La Rambla so of course :) I would recommend this if you want to be in the thick of it. If so it is perfect location! Our host who lives there Suraj was very kind and friendly :)
We felt very comfortable here :)
Thank you!
Very centrally located - with the private balcony right on La Rambla. Loved it!
Tony was great in getting us settles - he was out of town, but made sure his friend was there to handle everything and he was very nice!

Todo estuvo perfecto! Es muy parecido a las fotos. Es importante leer que es un departamento compartido con otras personas. Nos atendió Suraj y fue super amable con nosotras. La ubicación es muy buena y volvería a ir!

Muy amables con el servicio. Lamentablemente eramos 2 con una sola llave asi que tuvimos que molestar aveces a Suraj para que nos abra si nos desencontrabamos, y siempee se mostro muy bien predispuesto. El piso esta super bien ubicado, y si bien esta sobre la rambla que es una calle muy ruidosa, no se escuchaba nada x las noches (buenas ventanas). Volveria a ir sin duda!
Out stay at Tony's appartment was great. He wasn't there himself but he made sure that his friend helped us with everything that we might need.

It was an amazing stay :) the location is great and the room is very clean. The common space like living room, shower room and living room is in good condition. Definitely the best airbnb inside Barcelona !
Good experience. Convenient location and great feeling to be like a local living in the famous La Rambla!
Tony is an incredible host. The location was phenomenal and I felt very welcomed there. I highly recommend!

The location could simply not be better! The apartment is in the sweat spot between the beach and placa catalunya. It's directly at the rambla, very close to a subway station and a corner store is 1' away. If you are going to barcelona to really experience the city, this is the place to stay!
Although be aware that this is a shared flat and we've stayed there with two other guests and a friend of the host.

Location location location. This place is bang smack in the middle of everything going on. The view from the balcony looks right out over the rambles, and I loved the hussle and bussle. The beds were clean and really comfy, I slept really well. 
You do need to walk up several stairs so if you struggle with steps this may not be for you, and the noise from the street below is constant all night. I loved it, but my friend didn't but she used the earplugs left for us and slept deeply.
For exploring the city. This place was the best. We were so close to everything. Walkability was amazing.
Small space, unbelievably good location. If you don't need much room, you can't ask for a better place to stay.

Bon séjour à Barcelone dans cet appartement extrêmement bien situé. Le bruit de la Rambla ne nous a pas dérangé du tout. Les indications et conseils de Tony nous ont été très utiles. La salle de bain et les serviettes étaient néanmoins un peu vétustes.

The room is clean and convenient, a short walk between metro station. It's easy to access main attractions on foot. It's a little bit loud outside at night, earplugs are provided for free. We can't express how much we love Tony's place by few words, this room is highly recommended.
Paublo met us as expected and made us feel very welcome.
We had a fantastic stay in Barcelona at Tony's place. it s an ideal location and Tony made sure we had everything we needed, he made us feel very welcome. Highly recommend

This is a shared apt right on Las Ramblas, a perfect location to explore the city or enjoy the active night life around. Lots of good restaurants, metro station and plaza Catalunya are walking distance. 

Paolo the concierge, does a wonderful job keeping the apt clean and safe and it's a great source of information as well. 

Highly recommended.
Great place, location and host! Would return, without a doubt. Thanks!

Great location just off Placa Reial makes it very easy to explore the city, especially the Gothic Quarter. The room is simple - 2 twin beds and a closet - but totally adequate if you're out exploring. Perfect place for two travelers!

We didn't get to meet Tony, but Paolo who checked us in was great. Met us in the Plaza Reial so it was easy to find, very helpful! He was able to answer all our questions or look things up for us! Apartment is right on La Rambla so perfect location for everything and everywhere! Metro stop just a 2 minute walk away. 
Room was clean and as expected from picture. 
Overall great weekend!

Had a great stay at Tony's apartment, which location is more than awesome. The apartment is pretty sweet, clean and the wifi work's fine. Tony's mate Paolo who was staying with us was very helpful and quite chilled. 
Totally loved it, coming back for sure :D

If you're looking for a chill stay in the most central area of Barcelona, I really recommend this place. There are a couple of must knows: 1- you will need earplugs! 2- you'll have to be comfortable sharing the house and bathroom with multiple people.

I met Paolo (not Tony), who's managing the house and he was really fantastic, he helped me figure out the surroundings and had some great tips for my stay!

Tony's place was a definitely a good option in Barcelona. Check-in was convenient and flexible, and the place was clean and well-equipped. The apartment is perfectly located, but this also means that it's quite loud at night.

Loved staying at Tony's place. The location is perfect. It's minutes away from everything you would want to see in Barcelona. The apartment is in a very lively and exciting neighbourhood. The room is exactly as in the picture and was great. Would definitely stay again.

Paolo jest bardzo miły i pomocny jednak mieszkanie ma swoje nalepsze lata dawno za sobą, okno jest bardzo nieszczelne przez co wspominany w opisie hałas z ulicy. 
Następnym razem poszukam jednak innego lokum.

I was traveling to Barcelona together with my sister to do a little city trip for a few days. And what can I say? It was great! Being located near to Plaza Catalunya and La Rambla, the apartment is very central and perfect to go everythere you want to - by feet and metro. If you want to visit Parc Güell for example, you can jump directly on the metro line L3 which leads there. 

Together with us were two other people in the apartment, but that wasn't a problem at all. The room was a two-bed room with a small balcony facing the street side with a nice view on the wild La Rambla. 

We only got to know Paolo who did the check-in and check-out, always having an open ear for all the questions coming to your mind. Because our flight home was not before the evening, he offered to leave the luggage in the apartment even after the check-out and come back later to get it. So as you can see, a very kind and attentive guy. Thanks again Paolo :-))

Like mentioned also in other reviews before: Being located on La Rambla with a lot of bars, it can get a little noisy outside during the night. So I definitly recommend to bring some earplugs with you - just in case you can't fall asleep. Now in winter it was ok, but I don't know how it will be in summer. Coming to warmth and cold: The room also contains a heating and a ventilator thus you will be prepared for summer and winter.

All in all: There's everything you need for a small, but comfortable stay.

We only ended up meeting Tony's roommate Paolo, but everything was great! The room and the bathroom were clean, wifi worked well, and the location is amazing. It's very central, which means that it can get loud at times, but Tony was kind enough to provide earplugs for us, and it was never an issue. The place is super close to the metro, and getting around was super easy. Would definitely recommend and stay here again!

We really enjoyed the days we spent in the apartment! It was close to everywhere we wanted to go so we didn't even need public transport as there was no long walking distance! Paolo was a super nice and helpful guy and we can just recommend this place! Also Tony was really kind and helped us with organisation :-))

A localização do apartamento é a melhor de Barcelona. Próxima de comércio, metrô, bares e vida noturna. O barulho durante a noite realmente é muito alto, mas já sabíamos que assim seria, e Paolo nos deu tapa-ouvidos! Estranho é ver 2 banheiros: 1 somente com vaso sanitário e outro com chuveiro e pia... talvez seja assim na Espanha, no Brasil não é. 
Paolo é fluente em inglês, se comunicou perfeitamente com minha filha de 16 anos e comigo ele se esforçou para dar informações em espanhol, e foi boa a nossa comunicação.
Recomendo a hospedagem para qualquer cidadão do mundo!

이 집은 Paolo가 상주하고 있어요. 그래서 Tony는 보지 못했지만 Paolo덕분에 불편함없이 지낼 수 있었어요. Paolo는 매우 친절해요.
숙소는 람브라거리에 있어서 위치는 나쁘지 않아요. 까탈루냐 광장, 해변, 피카소미술관 등등 걸어서 갈 수 있고, 메트로역도 바로 앞이라 매우 편해요. 
밤에 조금 시끄럽지만 준비해준 귀마개하고 자면 나쁘지 않을거에요. 저희는 너무 피곤해서 귀마개 없이도 너무 잘 잤어요.
방은 사진과 같고 사진에 안보이는 창가쪽 공간이 넓어서 캐리어 놓기 좋았고, 옷장도 넓어요. 침대는 조금 삐걱삐걱 소리가 나지만 자는데 지장은 없어요.
화장실과 샤워실은 분리되어있고 따뜻한 물도 잘 나오며 방에 히터도 크고 따뜻했어요. 
발코니에서 람브라 기리를 볼 수 있다는 것도 마음에 들었습니다.
Tony의 가이드북에 나온 음식점 중에서 숙소 근처에 있는 곳으로 두군데 갔는데 매우 좋았어요. 참고하면 좋을것 같아요.
참 엘리베이터가 없는 2층 (우리나라로치면 3층)이라서 캐리어 들고 올라가는게 살짝 힘들긴했지만 Paolo가 친절하게 도와주었어요. 엘리베이터 없는것은 참고하세요.
또한 숙소 입구가 조금 색다릅니다. 요건 직접보시면 아실거에요.

Tony was very helpful in giving recommendations and information about transportation from the airport. Paolo, his roommate, was also very helpful and welcoming. The apartment is in a perfect location.
Host was nice and helpful. This apartment is close to many places in walking distance. There's a metro stop within 200 meters. It could get noisy at night. Highly recommended!
It was a nice -- but spartan -- room and Paolo was a delight. The downside was the beds weren't very comfortable and it was quite noisy. Still, a pretty damn good value.

Thanks a lot for great accomodation! Lovely room and apartment, Paolo was really nice and helpful. Even apartment is located in noisy street, earplugs are provided, so no problem. :) Highly recommend!
Well placed in the heart of the city. The perfect place for those who like to go out and backpack travellers!
Piso muy bien situado. Trato agradable. Para volver a repetir

This stay was perfect for a long weekend in Barcelona! On the main Street, super easy to walk around or take public transportation back. The communication with both Tony and Paolo was great, and Paolo gave excellent suggestions on what to see, where to go. He was super friendly and always available if there was anything. Thank you for a great stay! It was the cherry on top of the cheesecake. 

PS. As it is on the main Street, there is some noise, but don't worry, Paolo got you covered and provides earplugs as well. Awesome. :)

Had an excellent stay at Tony's place! Loved the location of the apartment, it was very central and made getting to different parts of the city a breeze. We had the pleasure of meeting Tony's friend Paolo, who was an excellent source of information and help. I would definitely recommend this home if you are looking for a great place to stay in Barcelona.

El departamento está perfectamente ubicado en zona centrica, a muy pocas cuadras de la plaza cataluña en la que podes tomar todos los transportes que quieras. Los anfitriones dejaron todo listo para nuestra llegada y nos dieron toda la información necesaria para movernos por la ciudad. Lo recomiendo fuertemente. Muchas gracias!
Шумно, но беруши спасли! Отличное расположение и прекрасный хозяин! Спасибо!

Great first AirBNB experience on clean A+ location in Barcelona (View form small balcony on the Rambla). Excellent communication, welcome and service. Free wifi. Possibility to the luggage in the livingroom until leaving form the airport. Bit noisy at night, but with excellent solution, earplugs provided by host.
I've bookmarked this room for future visits to Barcelona.

Best Regards, 
Bjorn en Andre
Prima apartement op een toplocatie. Hygiene en geluidsoverlast waren kleine minpuntjes maar al met al een prima uitvalsbasis om alles in Barca te verkennen!
Fantastic location! Very central and easy to get too! They go above and beyond to give you easy to understand directions to and from the airport.
Great location and awesome hosting.

A nice place!
Thanks for all!

Tony's place is slap bang on in the middle of the Ramblas so if you are looking to stay in the thick if the action, this place is for you. Even with the closeness to the Ramblas the room offers a peaceful and quiet environment. 
The apartment feels very secure and it has a very friendly feel. A great place to stay!
Great location right on La Rambla.  Comfortable bed.  Loud at night but there was a fan which helped block out some noise.  Check in and out was easy.  Paolo was always available when needed.
Vielen lieben dank, es war mega toll und wir hatten einen sehr schönen aufenthalt. Danke an paolo er war super freundlich und hilfsbereit. Die lage ist perfekt.
Great location, central to many walking destinations and easy to get around. Apartment was clean and host was very helpful. Would recommend
Tony is a very resourceful host. The location is perfect, very central to most of Barcelona's best spots.

Great accommodation right in the middle of Barcelona on La Rambla. Lots going on around and a nice view from the balcony overlooking La Rambla. Paulo was very nice and helpful and made us feel welcome. Would recommend!

The room was small and simple but looked exactly as it did in pictures. Great location right on La Rambla, lots of nightlife and restaurants easily within walking distance. Paolo was super friendly and very accommodating, he let us check in early and gave us tips on places to check out when we went out at night. Can be a little loud at night, but earplugs were provided and we never had a problem. Definitely recommend.
Awesome location, very helpful host, easy to access, clear info, room super quiet even if located directly on la Rambla, clean apartment, 5/5, awesome trip

The apartment was perfectly located and also not as noisy as we expected it to be. Paulo who was staying in the apartment, helping guests etc was extremely helpful and gave us lots of great tips on things to do in the city. We had a lovely and relxing stay and we would thoroughly reccommend this apartment to others!

The room and the apartment were great. It gave us a good cozy, relaxing and ofcourse an Barcelona vibe. The location is perfect, for us it was the centre for everywhere we wanted te go. The metro is a few meters away from the stay, so its easy to go to lots of well know places in Barcelona. It was also nice to meet Paolo. He was very friendly and gave us alot of tips, advices about the city.
Fantastic location right in the centre of Las Ramblas. Check in was easy and Paolo was extremely helpful throughout the stay. Would highly recommend this place for the location and price.

Tony's place was a great location to stay in with being right in Las Ramblas with the view of the strip on the terrace. He was very nice and there was easy communication with him being there. Please note: there was a second private room where people also were staying. There wasn't an issue, but would of liked the heads up knowing additional persons were sharing the space. Thank you for letting us stay there :)
Siamo Stati molto bene il letto era comodo  ambiente fresco con aria condizionata ci ha accolto Paolo che ci ha subito accolto e messo a nostro agio molto gentile lo consiglio a tutti

Tolle Lage mitten auf der La Rambla!! Metrostation ist keine 3min entfernt. Perfekte Kommunikation mit Paolo-er war super nett! Beschreibung der Wohnung/ des Zimmers trifft eindeutig zu. Für einen Kurztrip in BCN einfach perfekt! Würde ich nochmal buchen! :)

Great location right on the Las Ramblas strip close to all the shops, restaurants and attractions. Plenty of nightlife on your doorstep also which was in no way a problem for me. The host is very friendly and helpful has great tips on getting around, attractions and places to eat etc.  Overall a great stay and would definitely stay again.
The apartment was really clean and nice and I was really happy about the location. Paolo was nice and helpful. Wifi was good. I really recommend to stay there.
Great location in Barcelona and great communication!  Would definitely stay again!
Nice host, great location, only con is it can get a little loud cause it's on a Main Street overall good though

Had the most amazing time staying right on La Rambla with my Mum for a girly holiday. Location was amazing and Paolo was so helpful. We made use of Tony's Tapas recommendations and were blown away - following the advice of someone who knows the city is such a fantastic and authentic way to explore. Thank you so much!
Sehr zentral gelegen, unkompliziert und sehr freundlich. Es lohnt sich hier zu bleiben.
Nice and clean. Great location
Lokalizacja w centrum starówki. Gospodarz bardzo pomocny. Jeżeli kiedyś jeszcze wrócę do  Barcelony z pewnością skorzystam z gościnności Tony’ego
Great location for anyone looking to the get the best of Barca and Tony is a great host.

Die Wohnung ist sehr zentral gelegen, wodurch man das Zentrum in wenigen Minuten zu Fuß erreichen kann. Allerdings bringt die Lage natürlich auch einen gewissen Geräuschpegel mit sich und ist daher für sensible Ohren evtl. etwas ungeeignet. Das Zimmer ist genau wie der Rest der Wohnung sehr schlicht gehalten, war für unseren 3-tägigen Kurztrip aber völlig ausreichend, da wir sowieso die meiste Zeit unterwegs waren. In Sachen Sauberkeit gibt es womöglich kleine Abzüge...mein Bruder und ich sind da zwar nicht allzu penibel und haben uns für den kurzen Zeitraum nicht sonderlich daran gestört, allerdings könnten sich Leute mit starkem Bedürfnis nach Sauberkeit etwas unwohl fühlen. 
Die Kommunikation war ausgezeichnet, wir haben stets rasche, zuverlässige Antworten bekommen und der Gastgeber war super nett! 
Insgesamt können wir die Wohunung für einen kurzen Städtetrip, während dem man sich sowieso fast ausschließlich zum Schlafen in der Wohnung aufhält durchaus empfehlen :-).

Reviews were pretty close to what it’s like. It’s nothing fancy and it is a little bit loud, but the noise is more like background noise so was easy for me to sleep through. Place was clean and in a great location. Palo was there and was so helpful with everything we needed. Definitely would recommend
This was a great place to stay. The location was central to everything we wanted to see.

Thanks for the great accomodation! As the appartement is directly situated on the Rambla it can be noisy, but clever Tony provides earplugs  so you'll have a good sleep in fresh, clean sheets. Paolo,  a guys living permanently in the appartement, is very kind, helpful and always willing to chat. Both Tony and Paolo were always immediately available by (Hidden by Airbnb) . I can definitely recommand that appartement .

Tony and Paolo were great hosts! Their communication was precise and timely and I felt more than comfortable staying at the apartment. Tony left some great tips for restaurants which we took advantage of. The place is what you would expect from a shared Airbnb. Great if you plan to be out seeing the sites all day but not a place you'd come home to relax in. Las Ramblas is more noisy than expected even in the winter time. You definitely get a feel for what it'd be like to live in Barcelona by staying here. Make sure to check out the Federal Cafe for breakfast.

La camera in cui ho soggiornato con una mia amica è in un appartamento davvero carino, in una posizione fantastica per visitare la città. Ottimo anche per la sera, il quartiere gotico dietro l'angolo regala localini favolosi. Il nostro host è stato davvero disponibile, preciso e cordiale, suggerendoci anche posti da vedere e in cui mangiare fuori dalle rotte turistiche. Davvero consigliato, Barcellona mi ha sorpreso e se dovessi ricapitare, sceglierei di nuovo questa soluzione!
Not the first time I come, not either the last
Excelente ubicación para actividades turísticas. Un poco de ruido en la noche, pero su ubicación lo vale todo. Lugar lindo y cómodo...Excelente recibimiento.
The place is very close to public transportations and touristic places in Barcelona. Shops and restaurants are within walking distance. It is clean and fully equipped with all the necessary things.
Perfect location! Literally in La Rambla. Paulo was so accommodating and nice! Highly recommended!!
Great position on Rambla street, Paolo was very friendly and was a pleasure to know him!

We had a fantastic stay at Paolo's apartment! The apartment was very comfortable and centrally located. Paolo is a great host. Everything was as described. We got everything we need. I would definitely recommend it. 5 Stars. Muchas gracias Paolo!
Tony's  house has perfect location, it's in heart of Barcelona,it Very clear with good balcony.

It was a great experience staying at a flat in the heart of Barcelona. everything was as they should be. There were no noticeable difference between the shared photos in the website and reality. It was a cozy and clean apartment located in best part of the city. Although you maybe experience  uncomfortable sleep during the night since there are a lot of noise at this part of the city.

위치는 정말 좋음 뜨거운물도 잘 나와서 좋았음
대신 엘리베이터가 없는 3층이라 캐리어들고  올라가는데 정말 힘들었음 그리고 거실에 항상 관리하는 친구가 앉아있어서 약간 불편했음 
그리고 숙소 들어오기까지 문을 3개 열어야해서 불편했음
세탁기도 사용하면 안됨
새벽에 밖에 술취한 사람들이 가끔 소리지름
그래도 가격대비 위치도 정말 괜찮고 좋은 것 같음
Todo resulto muy bien, gracias.

Perfect location, literally on la Rambla. Definitely gets noisy at night but if you’re a deep sleeper it’s totally fine plus, you are provided with ear plugs! Very easy to get to from the airport because a bus drops you off right on La Rambla (basically). His place is completely walkable to all attractions in Barcelona!
A recommander. Tony m a tres bien accueilli. Emplacement parfait

Very good place, well located in the center of the city. Because of a window on the Ramblas, the night is a bit loudy. Anyway, earplugs were provided for free. :) The host is very kind, helpful and fast.
Good place also easy to access to restaurant and bar!!!!

Paolo was an extraordinarily great host. Communication was spot on and the appartment is situated perfectly in the middle of Barcelona. Due to its close proximity to the city center, the noise level is also corrispondingly high. However, free earplugs are offered to all guests, which cancel the noise. All in all a great stay and a friendly and charismatic host!
位置非常非常非常好,但也因此有点吵｡

La pieza ofertada por Tony/Paolo es exactamente la misma que se expone en la foto. No hay cobros extraordinarios adicionales ni nada raro. Paolo es un gran host y se agradecen los consejos entregados para visitar la ciudad. En general, una muy buena estadía.
Great location and great assistance provided. Host is excellent and very helpful. will definitely come back again.
Super séjour. L'apparetement est vraiment bien situé (au coeur de La Rambla). Très bon accueil ! :)
Great location to stay. Near to metro, city center, supermarkets, restaurants. I want to recommend for everyone who’s need to stay in Barca for couple of days.
Great place, perfect location! ✌
Great room in central location, we really enjoyed our stay!
Nice room with awesome location.

Amazing value! Very centrally located and easily within walking distance of a lot of main attractions. The room was clean, spacious and had plenty of storage place. There is a small balcony as well which looks out on Las Ramblas - super fun to people watch and soak in the city’s vibe. It does get noisy at night but it didn’t bother us, the host was nice enough to supply ear plugs in case you need them. :) Bathroom and the rest of the home were clean and what we expected for a couple nights.
Great location, friendly host, I would stay there again.

とても立地が良い部屋でした｡
おもてなしも最高!
位置还可以 离波盖利亚市场很近 出门走几步就有地铁 房间也还可以 很干净整洁 唯一一点不足就是通往住家的楼梯有点狭窄
Affordable place to stay in Barcelona, excellent view to La Rambla.
Pefekte Zentrumlage, mit Balkon zur Haupstraße La Ramblas

Excellent séjour chez Tony. On a été bien accueilli, la chambre était propre et surtout très bien placée, en plein centre ville (c'est  un peu bruyant donc il ne faut pas avoir le sommeil trop léger). Je recommande vraiment.

This airbnb is exactly what you need, nothing more and nothing less. This place is definitely for the adventurous. And by that I mean people that love to experience the sounds of Barcelona. It is located in the Rambla which is the busiest and most touristy street in Barcelona so it is well located to go out to bars and dinner. Also, the people outside can get loud so if you have trouble with sleeping with noice, you might want to look elsewhere or bring noise canceling equipment :)

Great location!  Easy access to best areas of Barcelona. Place was clean and hostess very kind and helpful. Communication was accurate and prompt.  Room was small,  and because its location at Las Ramblas which is a very busy part of town because of the large amount restaurants and stores, noise  level was high. It did not bothered me, but if you cannot sleep with noise, you need to consider this factor when booking this place.
Great location, we had an awesome stay!
Location, location, location. Beautiful spot in a beautiful place. Highly recommend.
Perfect location!!!
Great appartment at La Rambla
Tony’s place couldn’t be in a more ideal location. Sitting out on the balcony and looking out over Las Ramblas at night was the perfect way to end every day. I highly recommend!!!

Buena ubicacion si se quiere hospedar en las Ramblas, ruidosa, mucho calor por no disponer de aire acondicionado, sucia, no se podia hacer uso del baño y sobretodo, engaño absoluto en la ubicación. Se supone que esta en una perpendicular a las Ramblas y esta en la misma avenida.  Para nosotros un desastre absoluto. Se nos insistio en decir que eramos amigos del dueño del piso si alguien preguntaba pero , ¿ qué da a cambio el propietario para exigir este favor? Engaño

This location was in the center of everything. You are right on one of the main strips and right next to Placa Reial which has some really great restaurants. We walked everywhere! Would definitely stay again.

Very nice room over the Rambla ! The location is perfect to visit BCN. It's a bit noisy because of the street, but earplug are gaven if needed (but you fall quickly asleep after visiting all day). Besides Paolo is very discret and helpfull. The little balcony is a real +. Oh and there was a brand new fan, the temperature in the room is good ! I recomand !
Very central and nice room! There were no problems and Paolo was a kind host, who always helped us.

Квартира в самом центре , на рамбле
Хозяин отличный встретил и разметил
Comfortable room, friendly host, and fantastic location!
Tony's place is right in the middle of all the action. It will perfectly cater to all your needs .
Tony nice man , recommend to stay here
Super location, but a little noizy rom, helpful host.

everything worked out so good. the communication was very fast and the check in as easy as possible. the location is perfect for everyone who wants to visit the center of barcelona. we wound definitely stay there again:) he´s such a great host.
Easy access to main street and metro. Nice goth area to shop and eat
Great apartment in a central location.

The host is very friendly and warm. They gave me a lot of suggestion about Barcelona. I really recommended this place. The position is in the center of the city and only 2 minutes walk to the metro station, which is easy to go every where. During the stay, we forget to bring the key and the host rode the bike and come from far away to open the door for me. We are really sorry and thank to the host. We lost some important thing in the house and left, but the host is kindly help to send it to me.
Extraordinarily nice location,can conveniently go everywhere.Jokin and Tony is so helpful ,quick respond on Airbnb and he gave us all info that we needed.Such a awsome experience stayed at his place.

Thanks to Paolo for his warm hospitality and Tony for the good conversation before my arrival! I felt home right from the beginning.
The room is located central at La Rambla and a great starting point for excursions. The room was clean & sufficiently equipped - I used it only for sleeping - earplugs are a must have because it’s of course noisy outside.
Thanks a lot & all the best for you 2!
Fantastic place, highly recommend for the location, value and friendly/thoughtful host. Thanks for a great time!
Great location! Awesome host! Would definitely stay here again.
It is in the perfect location, prime area to stay and see all the main attractions
We enjoyed a great weekend in Barcelona staying at Tony’s excellently located apartment. It is right on La Rambla and offers easy access to all the main attractions.
Very good location and nice place !

Such a great place!! Excellent location. Check in was quick and easy, beds were comfortable, shower was clean, and the host was so nice. His friend Paolo lives in the apartment and helped us check in and get situated. He even allowed us to leave our bags there as we departed from Barcelona much later than check out. Overall such a great trip! The apartment is located on las ramblas so the noise was very loud but we were provided free earplugs! Small price to pay for such a great stay!
Vraiment tres bon rapport qualité prix et en plus très bien placé dans Barcelone je recommande
Great location on the rambla. Near everything you want and good value for money
Excellent! Great location. I loved it. Highly recommended.
Nice flat with cozy rooms in great location.  And very friendly and talkative owner.
Tony’s place is wonderfully located and beautiful, and he and Constanza were wonderful hosts!

The host was very nice! The apartment is clean and comfortable. It has excellent location, from which it is easy to reach any point of the city. There is also a very cozy balcony overlooking the la rambla. Constanza sent us detailed instructions on how to get to her and we did not have any problems with the meeting. Thanks for a great time!

Nice and clean place.
Location is perfect to go everywhere in the city.
Close to a lot of bars, restaurants, ...
Very guest friendly and helpful.
Everything was perfect! Nice, tidy appartement. Very friendly and welcoming host. Thank you very much :)
Super
Very nice place. Incredible central, right in the heart of Barcelona. Very nice host. Would recommend.

Tony was very prompt with his responses right after booking. The host (Constanza) is lovely and was very accommodating. We got along with Constanza very well and loved her food and wine suggestions. The location was amazing and we particularly enjoyed the bustling street below for people watching. Everything was within walking distance. The room and toilet were clean and comfortable. Would definitely rebook upon next visit! Thank you Constanza!
The host is lovely. Perfect location, walking distance to everything you need. Would recommend it.
Nice flat with a perfect location, very friendly hosts!
Tony is an amazing host!  The apartment is clean and in a great location.  All questions and inquiries were responded to with promptness.  I would love to visit again!
Eccellente appartamento dove passare un fine settimana.

The host is really friendly and helpful! The location is great and convenient, but it’s also why it’s a little bit noisy. Thankfully the host prepared earplug for us. The place is a little old, but really clean. I didn’t expect the narrow staircase, which made it a little difficult to carry my luggage. 
But I will still recommend the place! Cost effective!

The flat you stay in is as described on the website. Location fantastic. Didn't need the ear plugs provided as we were so tired after days out in this wonderful city. Beds really comfortable. Constanza was the perfect host, able to answer any questions we had. I would definately use Tony's flat again next time I'm in Barcelona.

Highly recommend.
Everything was perfect in this room especially for the location. Cuz every tourist spots are close to this room and you can walk to everywhere like Boqueria market or the beautiful ocean!
Tony and his friend were so kind and did everything we needed.
What is more we were allowed to leave our luggages after the check out time.
Even though we were told that the outside might be noisy at night, we could not realize any sounds at night.
If I have chance to revisit Barcelona someday, I’ll definitely stay this room again.
Great local good stay and was very helpful and friendly!!!!!
주소랑 조금 달라서 헷갈렸는데 호스트분이랑 연락도 엄청 빨리 됬고 길을 잘 못찾아서 주변에서 헤맸는데 호스트분이 마중나오셔서 잘 찾을수있었어요 가격대비 가성비 굿입니다 콘스탄자 정말 친절해요~

Emplacement parfait ! En plein sur la Rambla.

Juste un manque d’équipements dans la cuisine .. mais sinon à recommander !

Die Wohnung von Tony ist perfekt für Menschen die eine Quartier für die Nacht suchen und sonst Unterwegs sind. Das Apartment ist super zentral gelegen, dadurch aber auch etwas laut. Das Zimmer ist sehr klein aber zum Schlafen reicht es alle mal.
Das Zimmer selbst war sauber und auch separat verschließbar. 
Das Apartment ist aber nichts für Menschen die penibel auf Sauberkeit haben oder Probleme mit Treppen haben. Es liegt im 3. Stock in einem Altbau (sehr enge Treppen).

name: BONDI BEACH RETREAT
summary: Bondi Beach Retreat offers resort style accomodation in the heart of Bondi Beach. We offer a queen size bedroom with private bathroom and Air Conditioning, don’t be cramped in a small apartment, try our resort style home. Bondi Beach Retreat is located 5 min level walk to Bondi Beach, seconds to cafés, bars, restaurants and public transport to Sydney City! Short or long term available.
space: Queen size bedroom with built ins, Air Conditioning, private bathroom, work station, TV / Stan, Netflix, cable TV also in lounge area. The House is located in a quite street, yet seconds to EVERYTHING!
description: Bondi Beach Retreat offers resort style accomodation in the heart of Bondi Beach. We offer a queen size bedroom with private bathroom and Air Conditioning, don’t be cramped in a small apartment, try our resort style home. Bondi Beach Retreat is located 5 min level walk to Bondi Beach, seconds to cafés, bars, restaurants and public transport to Sydney City! Short or long term available. Queen size bedroom with built ins, Air Conditioning, private bathroom, work station, TV / Stan, Netflix, cable TV also in lounge area. The House is located in a quite street, yet seconds to EVERYTHING! Kitchen, 2x lounge/ dining rooms, wireless internet, tropical Bali style private garden/entertaining Bbq area with hot tub and daybed. Always happy to interact or house is big enough for guests to have there own space. House is seconds from everything though quiet! Rear yard is set in a tropical, Bali theme setting, take a quick outdoor shower, then relax in the hot tub after a day at the beach! Public bus
neighborhood_overview: House is seconds from everything though quiet! Rear yard is set in a tropical, Bali theme setting, take a quick outdoor shower, then relax in the hot tub after a day at the beach!
notes: Sorry, no extra guests Note, as Bondi Beach is very busy and parking is limited, stick to public transport or uber for transportation
transit: Public bus transport 379 to Bondi Junction or Sydney city seconds away! Ferry service from Rose Bay to circular quay best and most scenic option!
access: Kitchen, 2x lounge/ dining rooms, wireless internet, tropical Bali style private garden/entertaining Bbq area with hot tub and daybed.
interaction: Always happy to interact or house is big enough for guests to have there own space.
house_rules: Bondi Beach Retreat is not a party house! Sit back and relax in paradise!

host.host_location: Bondi Beach, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about: Leonie and myself are lovers of the Australian beach culture, Bali is our second home and travel to at least once a year. Our rear yard is Bali/ tropical influenced, making it a great oasis to relax after a day at the beach. We’d love to share this with you

reviews.comments: Staying at Craige's and Leonie's place was a great experience. The description was accurate and the rooms were clean and tidy. The appartment is very nice and just a five minute walk from the beach with heaps of nice restaurants just around the corner. Craige and Leonie are very friendly and nice people that provided excellent advise and support. I hope that I will have the chance to stay at their place  when I visit Sydney again.

Beautiful home in a great location. 5 minute walk to tons of cafes and restaurants and 5 minute walk to the beach. Family is very nice. They leave the front door totally open a lot of the time so if you are paranoid or untrusting with your things just be aware! But seems like a great neighborhood and we were not worried about our things. Some bugs like cockroaches but apparently this is normal for the area. Room was big and spacious with a tv and lots of closet space! Access to beach chairs was nice. Very good experience with lovely people.

We. Were so happy to spend a week there...very close to the beach, and with very nice people...Craig and Leonie are very welcoming personnel
Thank you so much
It was a beautiful stay, 5 min to the beach and really nice people!

Craige and Leonie are very easy going!! Me and my boyfriend felt very confortable in the house and for use all the areas. The house is on a very good location... near to the beach, shops, cafes and public transport.
it was just great, the location and the house are perfect and the hosts are very friendly

If you are looking for something comfortable, great, near the beach, with tranquility, with excellent hosts, a nice house, private bathroom, large kitchen and also with yard where you can rest and even a barbecue, no doubt this is the best where can you be !!!

CRAIG&LEONIE are two amazing host! They pefectly welcome us and made us feeling really confortable for our stay. 
The home is exactly as expected, beautiful, clean and warm ! The room is also cosy and quiet, everything to have a lovely life.
