Really easy to communicate with them and they don't hesitate to share their australian experience which is really enjoyable :) 
As many things which made our travel unforgettable !
We had a great few days in Bondi. The house is gorgeous. Everyone was lovely and the location was fantastic.

My stay in Bondi Beach with Leonie and Craige was perfect! The house is as described, very spacious and in a great location. Only a few meters to cafés, restaurants and supermarkets. You can use the kitchen and the beautiful garden. 
Having my own bathroom was fantastic, it's pretty new, with a bathtub. 
Very good WiFi in the entire house. 

Leonie and Craige are wonderful hosts. Prompt communication, easygoing, helpful and also very open! I'm happy I got to know them. 

Thank you very much!
We enjoyed staying with Craige and Leonie, it was great
Very convenient stay with relaxed friendly family.

Craige and Lee made us most welcome.  The room and house was as described.  
We stayed with Craige and Lee for almost 2 weeks as I recuperated from surgery at St Vincents Private Hospital 

Needless to say the location was fantastic, as it was a 30m walk to the bus stop, the cafes and shops.  The range of cafes was overwhelming so deciding on where to eat was a delightful problem to overcome.

With a sizable Jewish population living in the area, it was a cultural experience to spend time browsing through Golds World of Judaica shop. 

We ate out most nights and made our breakfast and lunches back at the Craige and Lee's where all the facilities were available.

It was an easy stroll to Bondi Beach and again down on the waterfront there were even more shops and cafes.

The bus which ran like every 10 minutes took us to the massive Bondi Junction shopping centre and also to St Vincents Hospital. 

What a great location and great hosts.

It is my first time to use Airbnb, finally I figure how to handle, craige & leonie they are super friendly, we had a good experience, the house is located at a very good location, just walk few minutes then you are at the beach and also close to restaurant and cafe, clean and privacy, the garden is nice. Generally everything is nice
This was our first airBNB booking, so we weren't really sure what to expect. We were very pleased. The room was good. Craige made us very welcome and explained the setup very well.

Very nice people are Craige and Leonne.
Most helpful and friendly.  Made us feel welcome and  'at home' during our brief stay.  Great location in the heart of Bondi, very close o everything needed on holiday.
Friendly Relaxed family. Very convenient location.

Received by Lea at the house. Guided us well. Very Friendly Host.
Made us fell at home during entire stay. Craige has excellent sense of humour.  Very considerate as well. Could not have been better

Craige was accommodating from the moment we arrived late and he stayed up to give us the tour to the very end of our stay. Super helpful with advice for us regarding local attractions and the easiest way to get from A to B. The actual property itself was stunning and brilliantly placed, literally a few mins from Bondi Beach. Couldn't recommend this highly enough.

Craige and Leonie were great hosts. We had nice talks and they gave us a lot of good recommendations about where to eat and what to do in Bondi/ Sydney. Moreover the other residents of the house are great as well. 
The house itself is also quite nice and the location is fantastic! Next to the beach and with great restaurants nearby. We loved our stay!

All perfect! This is a great house within easy walking distance of everything at Bondi and a forty minute bus ride to Sydney CBD. A friendly reception, and Craig is well organised with the arrival, stay and departure. Everything was as it should have been!
Great spot, with great amenities!

I can't thank Craige enough for making us feel so welcome. It was my first time using AirBnb but I didn't at all feel uncomfortable and he was so accomodating! The location couldn't have been better! Thanks so much for everything, I would defiantly stay there again.
We had s great stay! Craige was so friendly and lovely. Would stay again! Highly recommend- awesome location

Graige & Leonie gave us a friendly reception and accommodated our early arrival. They are excellent hosts and make you feel welcome and relaxed.  The place is in a superb location being only few minutes walk to Bondi Beach which is well serviced with transport to Sydney every 10 minutes. 
We loved having breakfast in their peaceful backyard listening to the bird-life in the mornings. The area is nice and quiet considering its handy locality to everything Bondi offers. Overall an excellent stay with a good sized bedroom and own bathroom. Highly recommend ! Judy & Lawrie (NZ)

This was my first Airbnb and after my wonderful experience with Craig, Leoni and family it will not be my last. Friendly interacting hosts, beautiful patio area with wild parrots flying around (great place to relax after a hectic day), large kitchen, dining area and sitting room,bedroom with private (Website hidden by Airbnb) were always made feel at home. Great quiet area close to Bondi Beach and shops and restaurants very close by.Why pay over twice as much for a small hotel room.

We had a great stay in Bondi. We were in easy walking distance of the beach, restaurants and shops and it was any easy trip to the city.  We were made to feel welcome right away, and Craige and Lee were wonderful hosts! Thank you!
Beautiful and great house ! Craige and Leonie are perfect ! It's the best housing of Bondi Beach !
It's centrally located for all the action in Bondi Beach area.  Heaps of great restaurants, cafes, shops.  Very close to beach. The parking space was GOLD.

Great place to stay close to the beach.
Lots of choices for dining and a local market is only a short walk away.
Bottle shop( liquor store) is close as well.

Craige and Lee are awesome!
Invited me to join them for a barbecue.

It was so good.
Host was so kind, and very good place

Our stay was really nice! Craige and Leonie are friendly and really helpful. Great location with the beach bars and breakfast/dinner options in walking distance!
Nice ferry trip to downtown and other locations.

I had a super enjoyable stay!! The location is absolutely great, short walking distance to the beach, cafes/restaurants, shops.. Craige and Leone are lovely and definitely make you feel very comfortable and welcome at their place! Great experience overall.

Very good hosts, room matched indications. 5 min walk to the beach, very convenient. Room was a bit too hot but mainly because I preferred to shut down the window to avoid any bugs at night. There is also a fan system if required.

Mistakenly booked this private room in a person's shared house; we've always had private rooms in the past. Turned out great, though!

Location was excellent, hosts were incredibly helpful and kind - especially with getting around and other recommendations. 

The room we had was upstairs with our own, non-shared bathroom next door. The bed was comfortable and the room temperature was good. 

House had all the amenities you might want, laundry, cookery, etc. 

Only downsides I can think of are 1. during the hot summer days there is no air conditioner, but there is a powerful ceiling fan that kept the room at a pleasing temp. And 2. There was a big cockroach that flew in through the open window one night, but that's on us for leaving the window open. 

Highly recommended place - easy walking distance to any Bondi area, or a smooth bus ride anywhere else. Also, pretty close to the Rose Bay ferry for a super quick ride to downtown (rather than the slower bus).
Nice hosts, great location,

We had a brilliant time here at Jan 2017. Craige could not be any more helpful for giving us information on the best places for local dining, drinks and sites to see. Both were super friendly and made us feel very relaxed. Our only downside was that we did not stay longer. I would definitely recommend here.

This place is a must. So close to Bondi Beach and many fantastic restaurants. A 1/2 hour walk to the Rose Bay Ferry which is the way to travel to Sydney and the other water side communities. The outdoor space was a haven after a full day of touring!

The location is perfect as well as quiet, mere minutes from the beach and all of Bondi's bar and restaurants. Perfect for single or couples traveling that want all Bondi has to offer but also a good nights sleep. All of the shared amenities offered give it that 'at home' feeling and the availability laundry in the house is a life saver after beach days. The back garden and hot tub is a added luscious luxury and I always felt I could partake if I wanted.
Craig and Lee are very friendly and extremely helpful and the fellow travelers that share the house are ideal house mates. 
One of the best Air BnB's I've stayed in. Will 100% book again.

We spent 6 days in Bondie Beach with my husband and 1 year old daughter. We strongly recommend this place - Craige & Leonie are fantastic hosts - they were answering all our questions and recommended great place to see in Sydney. Location of the place is very good - just next to Bondie Beach - very close to all restaurants and shops, but it is quiet at the same time. We really enjoyed our time there and we will recommend it to all our friends!
Great hosts, very cosy, but not very private. We did not expect a house share with family and lodgers. It meant we could not cook and enjoy the lovely garden. Great location.
We loved staying at craige and Leonies! Lovely place, great location and very welcoming hosts!
Incredible house and top guests, 5 minutes from the beach and from great cafés. Their garden is lovely and the room is very comfy. Thanks a lot!
Everything was lovely & we had a great stay
Great Location. Lovely place and superb hosts.
What an amazing place! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here and we hope to be back soon!

This is the perfect place to stay to see both Bondi and Sydney. It is very easy to get to and from on public transport and is close to some great cafes, restaurants and ice cream parlours. Craig and Leonie were so welcoming, thoughtful and kind and made our stay so enjoyable with wonderful recommendations and assistance. The bed is very comfortable and the private bathroom was immediately next to the room and immaculately clean. The area whilst close to shops and restaurants was really quiet at night and only a few minutes walk to Bondi beach.This was a wonderful place to stay and I would highly recommend to anyone. We had a truly amazing holiday here. Thank you so much.

Just wanna say thank you for Craige & Leonie for this amazing few days we could spend in their home. There is nothing to complain about, everything was clean and georgous. The place is very close to the beach, there is many restaurants, coffees around, and the neighbourhood is quiet. They are the most welcoming, friendly people I have ever met, gave us all the information we needed to know, and helped with everything they could. 
Highly recommended!
Great place- awesome location - walked everywhere in heart of bondi! Quiet street with such a convenient location! Will be back for sure!

Great location and home. You're walking distance to everything in Bondi and near the bus. They have a huge backyard and a large kitchen, giving you plenty of space to cook what you want. One night Lee and Craige brought us bowling which was really fun!! Highly recommend
Beautiful modern clean house with friendly helpful hosts. Location could not be more central in Bondi. Had an amazing stay - highly recommend.

When I go back to Sydney, I will definitely stay at 41 Roscoe Street, Bondi again. It is an inviting and warm environment, and my hosts, Craige & Leonie were absolutely respectful of my privacy but on hand for anything I needed. It was a really a beautiful experience to be so far from home (Italy), and yet to feel so safely contained in this quiet, convenient, and beautiful house. The amenities in both room and kitchen were outstanding.  There’s an overall feeling of soft and peaceful accommodation. Just around the corner there are plenty of great places to eat or have a coffee. Bondi Beach is less than 5 minutes walk away and the scenery is hard to beat.
I can’t really find any flaws at all!  Adriano, Italy

Couldn't recommend Craige and Leonie's place highly enough! The house is lovely, everyone was very welcoming and fun to be around. Bondi was everything we had hoped for! The area is great for food with lots of very reasonably priced places which would cater to everyone. Craige recommended a fantastic Thai restaurant called Bangkok Bites which we ended up visiting twice in our five days there. Would also highly recommend the coastal walk from Bondi to Coogee as a must-do activity. Getting into Sydney town centre was super easy, there are multiple ways to do it but we enjoyed catching a ferry which gives you views of the opera house and harbour bridge.
Craige and Leonie are great hosts!  The location is excellent!  Walking distance to the beach, restaurants, bus stop!

Craige and Leonie's place is great, nice room, great spa and secluded backyard, also sooooo close to all the action in Bondi.
Around great experience, and hosts that make you feel welcome.
Check it out !!!!!!!
Beautiful place with nice vibes! Very close to the beach and great cafes and restaurants. Friendly welcoming family, thanks!

We have appreciated calm and serenity during our stay  the cosiness of our room and the total comfort we were expecting . B sure we keep an excellent souvenir of this pleasant stay and that we will be good ambassadors .You can rely on us for good publicity of your hospitality among all our relations and contacts.

Craige and Leonie are great hosts and have a fantastic house in one of the best parts of Bondi. A few minutes from the bars, cafes and beach, their house is an oasis of calm. 

Our hosts kindly shared the public areas with their guests, including the fab Bali inspired garden with hot tub, BBQ and sun chairs. 

I highly recommend this as a great base to explore Sydney.
Craige & leonie have a lovely home which is located great at bondi beach.

Craige & Leonies place was great - super close to shops and bars and of course the beach! They were great at responding and check in and out was so easy! We had booked thinking we had a whole apartment rather than just one room in a house - but we still had plenty of privacy. Thanks again!
Our stay at Craig & Leonie’s place was lovely, perfect for experience the Bondi’s lifestyle, 5min to the beach, 1 min to the restaurants and cafes. The garden is really nice. Thank you
Location was perfect! Craige and Leoine are great hosts!
Hôtes très sympathiques et discrets maison bien pratique

Craige & Leonie's home is very spacious and they are a very relaxed couple.
The bed was very comfy.
The location is ideal for visiting Bondi and surrounding area.
The local bus stop is 2 mins away and there is a big choice of eateries in the area.

Craige and Lee are wonderful hosts and have a beautiful house in Bondi - just a hop, skip and jump from the beach but far enough back to not be immersed in all the front strip hustle and bustle. Real local vibe to the surrounding streets and phenomenal food options close by for any foodie... or they welcome you to spark up the barbie in their beautiful garden whenever you like. Thank you both!

What can I say about the hosts Lee & Craige. What a lovely genuine couple and nothing was too much for them. They let us check in early as our flight got in st 7am and usually check in is at 2pm. They left some hints and suggestions of what to do in the room with contact details and everything we needed to know about the area, where to get public transport, eat and go out. They even lent us beach towels. Lee lent me her straightener. WiFi too. Bathroom was super clean with a great shower. They got us a cab when an uber let us down. It was like being at home abroad. Very casual down to earth couple. In an ideal location near Bondi Beach. Just a 5 min walk but yet away from the hustle & bustle of the parade opposite beach. First time booking an Airbnb and so glad it was such a happy experience.

Couldn't recommend this place enough. From the moment we arrived Craige and Leonie were so kind and made us feel at home by showing us around and giving us guidance on where to visit and things to do. The house is amazing, clean and the garden is beautiful. It's a perfect spot as restaurants and bars are literally round the corner and bondi beach is only 5 mins walk. Even though it is so close to the nightlife it's on a quiet road so getting a good nights sleep was easy. We had Xmas dinner with their family which was incredible generous. You have to do the walk from bondi beach along the coast to Coogee as it's stunning!! 

Overall couldn't fault anything about our stay and if we ever need somewhere to stay near bondi in future I will be coming straight back here. 

Thanks again for an amazing few days. 

Patrick and Elle x

Room and bathroom were nice the common areas outside looked tired compared to photos could of been due to the weather as there was some rain when we arrived. Location is good for access to Bondi beach and the surrounding cafes.

Perfect location, beautiful house. Highly recommend this place! Very close to the beach and main streets and the house has everything you would need and more. The garden is beautiful and it even has a BBQ. We enjoyed it very much.
De locatie is perfect, op loopafstand van het strand. Je krijgt veel lokale tips en je kunt in het huis overal gebruik van maken. Zelfs kaartjes voor openbaar vervoer liggen klaar.

Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt bei leonie und craige. Die beiden waren extrem hilfsbereit und sehr freundlich. Die Lage des Hauses kann nicht besser sein, sehr ruhig und entspannt, gleichzeitig war die Hallstreet mit ihren Restaurants und Shops direkt um die Ecke. Zum Strand waren es keine 5 Minuten. Wir hätten es nicht besser treffen können!
Great spot, amazing location. Craig and Leonie are very nice and very accommodating, make great recommendations.
Hosts are very welcoming and location is perfect to maximize your experience in Bondi Beach.
Location was brilliant, bed very comfortable, we felt very much at home.
Very nice hosts, fantastic garden, convenient location

Wir haben die letzten Tage unserer Australienreise bei Craige und Leonie verbracht und hatten eine sehr schöne Zeit in Sydney. Die Unterkunft ist super gelegen und ein guter Ausgangspunkt, um Sydney zu erkunden. Man kann den tollen Bondi to bronte walk machen oder von Rose bay aus mit der Fähre nach Central Sydney. Craige und Leonie waren super gastfreundlich und haben viele wertvolle Tipps gegeben. Wir haben uns sehr wohl in ihrem großen schönen Haus gefühlt und wären viel zu gerne länger geblieben! Vielen Dank nochmal!

Deze airb&b is zeker een aanrader. Goede locatie vlak bij Bondi beach, gezellige woning en goede kamer met eigen badkamer. Voldoende privé met daarbij gezellig contact met de overige gasten en verhuurders. Graige en Leonie zijn spontane mensen en zeer behulpzaam met geven van tips en je comfortabel voelen. Wij hebben een top tijd gehad.
Great location. Walking distance to bondi beach, shops and transport.

This was my best Airbnb stay (I tried many) as Craige & Leonie are wonderful host. They are very helpful, very friendly, easy going, they try their best to make you feel that you are at home. They are very social and talkative. The room and bathroom are very clean, very big. I loved their garden, it feels like you are in 5 star hotel garden:)... The location is super, very close to beach, the best cafes and restaurants in Bondi. My overall all stay was wonderful in that house. Thank you for being such a nice host
Craig y Lee facilitaron mi estancia en Bondi.
We booked several Air Bnb's throughout our trip, this was the best one!
Can recommend this beautifull and warm home in Bondi to everyone! ❤

I enjoyed the stay in Bondi! The location was perfect and super close to the beach and all the restaurants in the area. The tips and information provided was super helpful! The conversations were lovely as well! He only things I was surprised by was that It wasn’t as clean as I thought it would be based on reviews and ratings. I also wasn’t expecting to have additional Craig and Leonie which I would have appreciated being disclosed ahead of time or in the description. Otherwise if you’re looking for a low key, relaxed time then this is a great option!
Very hospitable and great location. They gave us a list of where is good to go in Syndey and  information on how to get to places, making our first time in Sydney  very easy :)
I had a lovely stay at the Bondi Beach  Retreat at Craige and Leonie’s place.  Steps from everything and still only heard the birds chirping in the morning.  Very easy going and comfortable.

Great location, near to the beach and restaurants. Craige & Leonie are friendly and relaxed. After checkout we may use facilities., very kindful. Spitefully the house wasn’t clean, a lot of dust in the sleepingroom,  and the bathroom was’t clean either.
Everything was as it should have been! Craige & Leonie was lovely,  helpfull and witty. Very relaxing and Good experiense for the first airbnb! Thanks!
Great location, convenient short walk to beach, and cafes. Fantastic outdoor facilities, great to sit back and relax in the hot tub with the Balinese like surrounds.

name: Rio Parque Condominio Clube
summary: Condomínio completo, com piscina, sauna, parque infantil, campo de futebol, academia, salão de jogos. Muita área de lazer. Localizado a 300 metros do metrô e do shopping Nova América. Fácil acesso a toda a cidade. Apenas 20 minutos do Centro e Copacabana. Apartamento completo.

Apenas 20 minutos do Centro e Copacabana. Apartamento completo com ar condicionado, cozinha completa, utensilios, pratos, copos, etc.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Hello, I'm Gustavo, I work and live part time in Rio (Brazil) and part time in Lisbon (Portugal). I'm a company administrator and computer analyst, graduated in PUC-Rio in 2006. 

I manage some apartments that belong to my family, and I love to receive groups and families from all around the world.

Hobbies: cooking barbecue and hamburgers, listening to rock and roll, tasting new brands of beers worldwide and going to the beach whenever possible.

Whenever I travel, I like being hosted confortably in spacious places and confortable beds. That's what I try to bring to my guests!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 399 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

A estadia foi excelente! O Gustavo e o Fabrizio foram muito prestativos, nós ajudaram em tudo com extrema boa vontade! O apartamento é bem localizado e muitíssimo seguro...o condomínio é lindo tbm. Fica bem localizado e perto do metrô. O apartamento tem tudo que é preciso e muito mais...tem máquina de lavar e secar e uma cozinha bem equipada! A experiência foi maravilhosa! Agradeço muito toda a paciência que tiveram conosco. Eu voltaria a ficar no apartamento com certeza!
Excelente estadia
Espaço bem eficaz, necessidades foram.supridas sem problemas.

name: MK MTR:Family Hotel for 1~4 ppl Rm.55
summary: The guest house is located in the middle of Mongkok shopping area and few minutes walk away from the Huge shopping Mall Langham Place and 2 minutes walk to Mongkok MTR. The "Ladies market" and "Sneaker Street" are right opposite to my building.
space: Our guest house is located on Argyle Street in Mong Kong. 1 min walk from McDonald's,  "Seven-Eleven Convenience Store is next to my building away! 3mins walk for local big seafood market (hawker style) 5mins walk for aquashops  The guest house is newly furnished and renovated. We offer good quality furniture & bed: - bunk bed and 1 folding bed for 4 adults or 3 adults and 2 small kids aged under 7 yrs old. "The upper is 3' x 6' and the lower is 4' x 6')  - private bathroom - Free wireless internet - Electric Kettle  - Air-Con - Hair Dryer - 32" Panasonic LCD TV For staying in the most convenient location in Hong Kong, it costs you only HK$ 200 per person per night.  Mong Kok is simply the most-go place for your Hong Kong trip. It is just so accessible to live here. There are a wide variety of shops: computer, sports, electronics...  Several new and huge malls are built recently with worldwide famous brands. Restaurants serving cuisines all over the world. More than 1500 restaurants wi

neighborhood_overview: 位於旺角中心地帶, 衣食住行樣樣齊備! 購物及娛樂盡在只尺!
transit: 旺角地铁D2及旺角東鐵站與大廈相隔兩路口, 机場巴士A21站設在附近之彌敦道"銀行中心站", 步行只需3至4分鐘, 方面各方旅行到來!
access: 1) 無限wifi上網 2) 可便用房間內所提供之家電,但請保持原好! 3) 房間密碼咭, 入住時需付按金HKD200, 退房時交收後退回此按金
house_rules: Smoking is not allowed inside the building & guest house.  Not to provide personal items: towels, toothbrush, toothpaste Please keep clean and tidy. Please tell you are my friend if somebody and the security guard asking you. Because my guest house is located in the private residence, it is not allow the strangers for coming in and staying. Tie up the rubbish and dispose into the rubbish bin outside of the staircase.请尽量保持干净｡谢谢!  大厦大堂及电梯､公寓不允许吸烟  “在您入住期间,以防保安或其他任何人在大厦大堂或公寓内要求时查詢時‧,就说你是我的朋友,因为他们不喜欢陌生人进入 大楼｡谢谢!”  不提供个人物品:毛巾､牙刷､牙膏  請保持乾淨和整潔｡

host.host_about:
Hi! I'm Cathy. 
I can provide the comfortable accommodations to the Airbnb's friend during you stay in Hong Kong.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong, Mong Kok, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: 房东很好人,房间很干净,地理位置也很好｡

The place was clean, neat and well maintained. Just nice for 3 person to sleep in. The location of the place was excellent. Located just 2 minutes away from MTR with popular food store below the building. Host was very prompt in reply and gave good suggestion to our trip. Communication was clear as she can speak English Chinese or Cantonese. She always wears a smile on her face which brought joy to us. Always willing to help us with our request during our stay.
Cathy非常亲切,在地铁口接我们,还告诉我回去时坐机场快线的地方,很周到｡房间大小当然不能和大陆的比,但很干净,楼下好像就是女人街,逛街很方便,有很多sasa和卓悦｡
真的真的非常的滿意,不地理位置方便,剛來的時候正好碰到老闆娘在樓下,接我們上去後告訴我們什麼東西在哪,還備了垃圾袋,紙巾,衣架,充電器轉換器之類的,而且還告訴我們什麼路線,去哪裡怎麼走比較方便,真是太貼心了,100分!!!
best

民宿位于地铁站附近,距离波鞋街,朗豪坊真的很近很近,房间在在香港同价位的房间里真的相当不错!空间比较足,一个26寸行李箱加一个二十四寸行李箱打开完全放得下,房间下来正门隔壁就是文记小吃,往右走有茶餐厅很方便,出门对面就是711,房间也超干净,很温馨,房间里衣架什么的都有!有窗户,站在房间就能看到花园街~房东人也超级棒的,到达第一天很细心的跟我们说了路线以及垃圾桶的位置,房东太太很漂亮哎,人超好超nice,总之在这里住你绝对不会后悔的!

房间位于旺角地铁D2出口附近的先施大厦,离波鞋街､朗豪坊等非常近,附近有翠华､大家乐､花园饭店等香港老牌的饭店,用餐购物非常方便｡房间设施齐全,一张双层床分别是1米2和1米,加床也有1米,被褥高档､整洁,一家四口住刚好,当然在香港这个寸土寸金的地方,你不要期待有多大的空间｡房间带卫生间,有窗､空调､电视､吹风机,提供品牌洗发沐浴露(非一次性酒店用品),拖鞋､烧水壶､还贴心提供转化插2个｡房间非常整洁,退房时看见是郭小姐在亲自打扫｡房东郭小姐是个非常漂亮有亲和力的人,对我们的咨询都能给予耐心指点和解答,全家对这次住宿非常满意,下次去香港还会选择她家｡

房东cathy真的非常好!来香港最开心的就是选择了这家房子!cathy不但非常贴心的帮我们选择房间,给了我们超级优惠的价格,并且一直和我们联系为我们提供帮助,真的非常好!而且她是唯一一个能够等我们的房东真的超感动!而且房间非常干净,所有物品齐全,床铺超级舒服啊啊啊真的太超值了｡房间位置也很好,在旺角中心地带,去哪里都很方便,而且旁边就可以买买吃吃喝喝!非常好!大家选择这个不会有错的!下次来还会选这家!

The guesthouse is located in the middle of mong kok, which gives you great travel possibilities all over HK. Kathy is very helpful with giving you the information you need. Place is clean and affordable.
房间好干净,唔算细住得非常舒服｡地理位置又超好一出去就系旺角噶D2,附近系西洋菜街,买野食野交通都好方便｡晚上瞓觉好安静,床瞓得都好舒服｡原本我地订噶房间比较细,Cathy超好人,帮我地update咗间大小小噶房｡好nice好sweet,以后过来hk仲会稳Cathy噶｡(55号房可以住到4个人完全无问题,以后同d friends过来都可以住｡)

Location is good. There are many shops all you want. It's very near MTR and bus stop. The room is very clean and tidy as photo shows you. And host, Cathy, is very nice. She met me up when I arrived. She replied message quickly and solved whole problems the best. Good for my 1st time in HK!
装修格局很好,干净,整洁,在香港,空间小是很正常的,出门逛街很方便,地铁口也近｡

Cathy  is very enthusiastic,thoughtful,beautiful 
房子物超所值
Cathy非常热心 有生活上的问题随时就能问到 会很细心的给我们帮助 房间环境也很好 是性价比很高的一次住宿! 谢谢Cathy!
非常好!

Cathy is easy to talk with. She's very responsive and will give you complete instructions as to how to get to her hotel. Her place is situated perfectly to Hong Kong's tourist spots as well as public transportation that's why we never had a problem going around HK. Would definitely recommend her place if you're gonna visit HK! :)
非常好,很干净,整洁｡离公交与地铁非常近,附近就是朗豪坊购物中心,但完全不吵｡吃东西购物都很方便｡

☞第一天,出发去香港,房东再次联系我确认到深圳时间｡谢谢房东用心的联系｡并询问进港口岸,询问路线时,很详细的指示给我们｡当我们到了地方,跟房东联系,她在电梯口等我们,很意外,之后教我们使用门锁,房间的设施,虽然普通话不是很流利,但是基本表达都能清楚,很好,谢谢房东这么细心｡我们询问买药买化妆品的地方,她也详细告知｡
☞第四天,我们的房间已经被人预定｡我只预定到第四天,但是我第五天才离港,她就帮我联系她认识的其他房东,那天我们要出门,她也帮助我们运行李到另一个宾馆｡
☞第五天,我退了房,但是东西没地方放,还是联系了房东,她接用她的地方给我们存放东西｡
总之,这一次旅程让我遇到了您,让我们都睡的安心,住的开心｡还有您的暖心｡
房间虽小,却干净｡麻雀虽小五脏俱全!

PS:我们四个人住,所以空的部分多放了一张床,我们的房间变得真的很小,行李要放床底下｡但是很喜欢四个人挤着生活,很温馨｡还有枕头很舒服!
房间蛮干净的  交通方便 房主很热情 厕所比较小

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Going on year number five living in NYC, USA. Originally from Chapel Hill, North Carolina.

reviews.comments: With no room in my place, I put my parents up in Josh's rental.  Josh was very helpful and got my parents into the unit.  It was exactly what they expected.  The apartment has nice appliances/fixtures and a decent entry and hallway.  Note that this unit is on the 5th floor of a walk-up, so if you have lots of heavy luggage it could be an issue.  But it is in a great location, run by a very nice host, and on the back (quiet) side of the building.

I really enjoyed my stay at Josh's apartment. He was extremely helpful; providing me with great directions from the airport to his place (I had concerns about getting lost and found the place pretty easily), and arranging a friend to meet me at the apartment to hand over the keys as Josh was already out of town upon my arrival. The apartment is within walking distance to many great restaurants/stores/trains, and basically anything you could need while staying in NYC. The building was pretty quiet which was very nice, and overall everything about the apartment/building was as described. I would definitely stay here again!

host.host_about:
Sou  Assistente Social, trabalho numa Câmara Municipal nos arredores próximos do Porto.
Atenta aos problemas sociais, fundei e sou sócia n.o1 de uma Associação de Solidariedade sem fins lucrativos, de apoio a grávidas, mães adolescentes e seus bebés, tendo uma Casa de Acolhimento onde recebemos essas mães com os seus bebés e lhes ensinamos as competências necessárias para que possam criar estrutura emocional e pessoal para saberem cuidar dos seus filhos, trabalhando-as para a autonomia de vida futura. Temos ainda uma Creche, um Centro de Estudos e um Gabinete de Apoio à Integração de imigrantes. Para mais informações ver (Website hidden by Airbnb) ou no (Hidden by Airbnb) - Socialis Ipss.
Gosto de viajar para conhecer a cultura e tradições do país, para além das curiosidades e gastronomia. Sou sociável,de confiança e gosto de ambientes tranquilos, limpos e acolhedores. Gosto pelo conhecimento; àvida em apreender novas culturas, absorver as características inatas da região que visito, pois tento aproveitar o tempo, de forma a tirar o melhor proveito e conhecer o máximo de locais; até porque sempre penso que posso não voltar ao mesmo local! Gosto de viver com qualidade e respeitar o outro.

name: Sunny quiet apt. with backyard in Plateau
summary: Enjoy Plateau living at its best! Pleasant cozy and bright space with back deck and shared backyard, in the middle of all the action yet on a very quiet residential street, just 2 minutes from Mont-Royal, boutiques on St-Laurent and St-Denis, restos and more. Although I love travelling, I very much enjoy being in my home. I have tried to make it a comfortable, quiet and cheery space. I hope you will enjoy it as well!
space: Enjoy your stay in a quiet, cozy and bright top-floor apartment with back deck and shared backyard.  Located on the top floor of a century-old two-floor house, with a spacious back deck which overlooks our own private backyard. Lovely home, bright and sunny thanks to its patio door at the back and a skylight in the living room area. Not huge (650 sq. ft.), and the entrance and staircase are amongst the narrowest in town, but it has a very spacious open concept living room and kitchen. There is one small closed bedroom at the back of the house (away from street) and a small bathroom, complete with a bathtub.  My house is comprised of two separate independent apartments. I usually live upstairs, but have recently moved to the ground floor, as one of my dogs now has trouble with the stairs. I work from home. I consider myself a lively person, but I need my peace and quiet at home. My work requires a great amount of concentration, and I´m a light sleeper, so I am looking to host guests who

There is one small closed bedroom at the back of the house (away from street) and a small
neighborhood_overview: The Plateau... where else in Montreal would you want to be! The area is brimming with restaurants, boutiques, health food stores, a beautiful blend of old-style and trendy architecture, and my personal favorite... the Mont-Royal, our own beautiful little mountain, where you can pretend you are lost in a lush forest, and enjoy incredible views of the city.
transit: The house is an easy 10-minute walk from the subway station (Mont-Royal), and there are different bus lines just around the corner. I personally walk or bike everywhere, as everything is within walking distance, and there are plenty of Bixi stations very close by, but if you want to show off your sports car, parking is easy on my street, even without a resident´s permit (Hey... do not share this with anyone!). I can also provide you with a temporary resident sticker for $10 a day (please tell me in advance). If you prefer, there is a parking lot nearby at a rate of $10/day, and a neighbour on my block offers my guests a covered garage for $18/day.
access: The apartment and back deck are yours to enjoy. Backyard will be shared with the apartment downstairs, that is, with me, or with another guest if it´s occupied as well. There are two bikes you can borrow, too! (shared with the apartment downstairs, so please ask me first).
interaction: If I am not in town when you arrive, I will be reachable by phone or e-mail. I will send you an e-mail before you arrive with instructions on how to get the keys, and the basic house tips and tricks :) And if I´m in town, I´ll be happy to welcome you myself. Don´t hesitate to ask me if you are not sure of something, you will not be bothering me at all, and I´d rather you ask me than assume something!
house_rules: I am blessed with quiet neighbors on both sides and I live downstairs, or may have guests downstairs, so I request that you behave quietly as well.  No outdoor shoes in the house. I offer a bunch of Crocs to my guests in different sizes. They are disinfected upon check-out. Please wear the Crocs provided (or bring your own) so as not to disturb whoever is downstairs: no barefoot walking -with or without socks- as it makes noise (most people don´t realize this until I explain it :)  Feel free to listen to my CD´s or read my books but please do not go through closets or cabinets (other than in the kitchen), as they contain my personal belongings. If you need something specific, just ask me! You must provide your own food, and personal care products (soap and toilet paper are of course provided). My pantry and beauty cabinet are off-limits!  Residents of this neighbourhood compost and recycle ---by law. Please separate organic waste, recyclable materials and garbage and dispose of them in

host.host_about:
Hello! 

I´m a very active AirBnB user, both as a hostess and a guest, so that allows me to (try to) be a good guest and a good hostess.  

My job has the advantage that some days I work from home, and some days I travel for work. Even though I enjoy my home greatly, I really like the idea of spending time in other places, particularly if they are warmer! 

I have two dogs I love very much. Sadly for you, they are not included with the apartment... :) I take them with me everywhere I can so you may get to meet them if you host us. They behave even better than me, but they´re hairier. But then again, I clean after them constantly, so we´re the perfect team. You must know, I´m particularly clean. OK, fine, I´m a clean freak. But I suppose it´s a good quality for a hostess, let alone for a guest! 

I spend most of my time outdoors, whether it´s exploring new and old territories, or in my backyard, which I enjoy immensely. I try to make my home a comfortable, warm and cheery place, where I can concentrate on my work during the day and a good book in the evenings. And when I feel like people-watching, giving my stove a break or enjoying the hustle and bustle of the city, I just have to turn around the corner and voilà! Everything is within walking distance. 

I consider myself a lively person, but I need my peace and quiet at home. And I´m a light sleeper so I am looking to host guests who look for a quiet spot to recover after exploring the city. And as a guest, I look for quiet spots as well, as I usually travel for work and I need to sleep well before and after a long day. 

Airbnb is made up of very different individuals and places, therefore communication, consideration and courtesy are key, and I hope you will find that in me.

Happy travels, everyone.

reviews.comments: Maria's apartment in Plateau was perfect for our stay in Montreal! The apartment is very spacious, well decorated, and stocked with everything you could need during your stay. Maria met us on time and showed us everything we needed to know about the place. It also features a beautiful balcony and backyard. The location is perfect for exploring Montreal and close to grocery stores, trendy restaurants, bars and shopping. I would recommend this apartment to anyone.
L'appartement est très agréable et il y'a une superbe terrasse ! Maria a été très accueillante et aux petits soins !
I had a very good time staying at Maria's place. The area was very convenient and her recommendations on cafes and restaurants were excellent.
Très bon rapport avec Maria. Beaucoup de flexibilité. Très bien situé. Merci !
Lovely place in a wonderful location!

L'appartement de Marìa est situé à proximité des meilleures boutiques et restaurants sur le plateau. Il est donc facile de se déplacer à pied. La communication avec Marìa est claire et rapide. Elle fournit des instructions détaillées. Elle a aussi accommodé notre chien durant notre séjour. La cours arrière est une belle addition. De plus, il y a une petit parc gazonné à proximité.
All good . Thanks Maria
Beautiful place. Very clean. Easy to communicate with Maria. I loved that stay and was so sorry to leave. No doubt I will try this place again when I come back to Montreal. Maria is a fabulous host.
Lovely, light flat in a perfect part of town - enjoy!

What a great place to stay. Lovely outdoor space, clean, spacious. Maria very easy to communicate with and was such a lovely host. Area is brilliant. Full of interesting cafes and lovely shops. Very near tube but lovely walk into town too.

Appartement très soignée et hôtesse très accueillante. Bien placé et au calme il permet de visiter Montréal sans problème. C'est formidable de trouver un logement comme cela sur Mont Royal. Je recommande !
Great location!   Maria was so helpful with any questions we had.  The apartment was comfortable and well equipped.  We had a great time.
Great location! The apartment was clean and comfortable. Maria was very helpful!
Loved this place. Super cute and convenient from the hip spots! Maria was very communicative, too.

A clean, comfortable apartment on a quiet street in the heart of things.
When I arrived Maria was there saving me a parking space directly in front of my door! Maria is great, full of life and enthusiasm.

I didn’t meet Maria but she was quick to communicate by text. Overall the place was clean but lacked some comforts such as extra pillows and blankets. A small table and chairs would have been nice on the balcony for outside dining. I would suggest bringing tea/coffee to get your day started. A list of local cafes in the neighbourhood would have been helpful as well as the nearest SAQ, grocery store and Metro station. 
I discovered a fabulous cafe a block away called Neve’s. A wonderful way to start your day. As a rule, Montrealers are super friendly and helpful. The Plateau is a great place to discover. Maria’s Place is well-situated.

Je suis resté un mois et demi dans l’appartement de Maria pour une mission à Montréal. 

Très bien placé tout proche de l’angle hôtel de ville et Rachel, dans une rue calme mais quartier animé, à 7/8 minutes à pied du métro, 10 min à pied du Mont-Royal, 5 min à pied des commerces, boulangeries etc.  

Le quartier est très chouette avec de jolis cafés à 2 min à pied (Névé, Santropol, Réplika), de supers restaurants (l’Express, le Pied de Cochon, le Filet, etc.), il y a même un loueur de smokings à 15 min à pied en cas de soirée habillée pour les visiteurs (maison Waxman), je n’aurais pas voulu vivre ailleurs.

L’appartement ensuite : totalement authentique, en rapport avec Maria, une hôte pleine de vie, très réactive et soucieuse du bien être de ses locataires. Photos fidèles.
Aucun problème relevé durant le séjour, Maria a même instantanément augmenté le débit Internet à ma demande. L’appartement est traversant, ce qui le rend très agréable. Étant présent en hiver je n’ai pas profité de la terrasse mais un point extérieur reste précieux ! 

Je recommanderais les yeux fermés si vous restez un long moment à Montréal.
perfect location

Maria’s place was lovely. It is in an old building as she states, so stairs are steep and narrow and not a lot of room when you open the door but when you get to the top it is worth it! We where there for the Grand Prix, so easy access to metro to get to the track. A bit further away from all the other action going on in Old Montréal. We managed to get tickets for the Aura at the Basilica and can highly recommend it!

Un adorable appartement deux pièces et cuisine avec une petite terrasse, beaucoup de charme, le tout aménagé avec soin et goût, dans une propreté sans faute et un sens parfait de l’accueil (y compris dans la présence de Maria pour  nous aider à l’arrivée). En plus, l’appartement est situé dans un quartier TRÈS vivant et agréable ( Le Plateau, près du métro, à quelques minutes du centre historique , intéressant, mais très surpeuplé). Beaucoup de petits restos et bars vraiment agréables. BREF : VRAIMENT TRÈS RECOMMANDé à Montréal.
.

Maria is a wonderful host. She pays attention to every single detail. She is one of the friendliest and more honest host I have met. The place has a wonderful vibe. I slept so peacefully. The neighborhood is wonderful. I love walking to the cafes and restaurants and to Parc La Fontaine. I recommend Maria's place in the strongest terms. Thank you, Maria, for being such an attentive host.

This is the most interesting part of Montreal, and Maria’s place is the perfect base. It’s comfortable, light, private, has all you need - including organic toiletries - and is ideal especially if you’re traveling solo. Maria’s plants are all thriving too; you can tell this is someone’s home and even though she’s not there, she treats you like a real guest. This year she added ceiling fans, so even as a repeat guest, it exceeded my expectations! Great communication and would stay every time I return to Mtl.

My stay in Maria's place was absolutely fantastic. Check-in was easy and Maria was always available to answer any questions. I could not have asked for a better host. The apartment is spacious, incredibly clean, very well decorated, and has all the amenities you could want. The neighborhood is full of cafes, restaurants, shops. Thank you, Maria!

Good Sized Apartment. Older building - like most of Montreal.  Simple, but complete kitchen.  Steep stairs entering,  but we didn't mind.  Wonderful location in the middle of Plateau Mont-Royal neighborhood.  Lots of great stuff within walking distance.   Communication with Maria was excellent.

name: Alugo suíte individual

host.host_about: Amiga, alegre, tranquila e apaixonada por literatura, música e arte. Adoro animais.

name: Pipeline Studio   (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
summary: PIPELINE,Private entrance,Hot outdoor shower,Garage studio, Wifi, Beachfront,Off st.parking,BBQ,Minifrdge/frzr,Flat screen w/DVD,Hot plate,Microwave,Toaster oven,Rice cooker,Coffee maker,Queen wallbed,Table for 2,You want LOCATION this delivers.
space: As you can see from our photos the location of our property is one of a kind and our cozy garage room is the perfect place to rest ones head after hours of outdoor activities. Please note that the square footage is 150 sq ft, and yes the toilet is inside separated with a discreet curtain, as you can see in the pictures.  The outdoor hot shower is blast after a day in the sun. It's all about location and you have found it . The Banzai Pipeline, front and center, your own little slice among high priced rental homes. The beach, surf,  private yard, The North Shore at your fingertips. It's all right here, Foodland,  Food Trucks, Surfboard and Ocean Sports equipment rental all within 1 mile. Island wide bus service right out front. Designed for millennials, experience seekers.  Historic Haleiwa Town and the Turtle Bay resort are only 10 minutes away.  w(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)

neighborhood_overview: It's the Country, quite in the Summer and buzzing in the Winter.
notes: Do some research before you come.  as far as time of year and size of waves, as the beach can be dangerous during winter swells, experts only.  Size of beach changes through out the year, secondary to sand migration. (website hidden) things to do on the North Shore/Island of Oahu.  It is highly recommended you have a rental car, as public transport will not allow you to take surfboards, body boards, golf clubs etc.
transit: Island wide bus service right out front, however limited with what you may bring on the bus, no surfboards etc..
access: The beach, side yard, (sun deck is for owner use only)  hiking, skatepark, famous bike path along 7 mile miracle.
interaction: As little or as much as the guest desires, we respect your privacy.
house_rules: We do have some rules and information that will make your stay more welcome. Cell phone reception is not the best; you might have to walk around yard to find a good spot. Beach access rock stairs are left hand corner of the yard at the end of the fence or cement stairs far right of property. Park in front on private road, please be careful on driveway it can be slippery when wet. Please make sure the back garage door is locked at night for security reasons. Please only use AC if absolutely necessary, electricity is expensive, so use sparingly and switch off when leaving the unit, also close windows when in use. Please return wall bed to upright position when not in use, this preserves the springs. Please do not dispose of feminine products or other items other than toilet paper down the toilet. Place recyclables in blue bin outside, daily trash in round can by washer, if full put in grey bin outside You are welcome to use the washer and dryer if needed, or use line outside to hang item

host.host_about: The ocean is where we find enjoyment the Lord gives us Peace.

reviews.comments: Fantastic place fantastic host. Craig was friendly while giving me plenty of privacy. The studio is right on the beach and right on pipeline. Absolutely wonderful location. Perfect for 1 or 2 people with bed,couch,tv,fridge and stove. Could not recommend this place higher.
One of the best locations I've am stayed at.  Room was average, nothing fancy, but the beachfront view trumps it all.

This studio is in a spectacular location! Incredible beach just steps away, with breathtaking sunsets every night + + outstanding views of the Pipeline breaks. The studio was comfortable, quiet and had everything I needed during my stay. Craig was a great host, and always very helpful if needed (ie; when the coffee maker broke, he promptly had a new one for me , same with a can opener). Just outside your door you have a putting green, and one of the best manicured lawns you can imagine…….great for walking barefoot to the beach. Falling asleep at night (very comfortable murphy bed) to the sound of the ocean was incredible. Perfect for the traveler who wants to experience the true North Shore.   
Thanks Craig for a great week!!!

It's a great location. Just imagine you can have breakfast right at the beachfront and watch the surfers! A priviledged location, very friendly hosts. The room isn't luxurious but contains everything you need and guarantees a lot of privacy.

My dad stayed here for almost 3 weeks - Craig and his wife were VERY accommodating.  There yard is absolutely beautiful and anything you need they will quickly get it to you.  You can't beat the location, either!  Best on the North Shore!
Making sure I could get in and out easily, good parking space, wifi details left there.

Amazing location right on Pipeline. Everything you need included. Craig is a great host and is happy to help with anything you need and ensure you enjoy your stay. Couldn't recommend a better location to base your stay on the North Shore. Perfect for a couple or solo traveller.

Staying right on the North shore was my favorite part of our Hawaii trip. You seriously can NOT beat this location!!! Just steps from the ocean. No busy roads or sidewalks to cross. The listing was very accurate. There were no surprises. The place is small, which I knew, but was clean and comfortable. My husband and I enjoyed three nights there. I loved falling asleep to the waves. Craig responded to all my questions quickly and was very helpful. Mahalo!!!

The Studio was everything I needed for my short trip to the North Shore.  The Location was amazing. The studio was clean and comfortable with everything you need.  The ocean breeze funnels right thru the room and the sound of the waves will put you to sleep.  Privacy was perfect and the parking was safe and at the house.   Highly recommended for 1-2 people.   Thanks!
Craig's place was simply awesome.  Epic location and perfect room for the north shore--- Craig was super helpful and a great host!!!!

TL;DR :   Single ? Need a place to just sleep the night over ? Absolutely need to be in front of Banzai Pipeline - this place is a good deal ! 

Longer version : 
I would recommend this place to anyone who needs to walk down to the beach and hit the Banzai pipeline on a surfboard - specially if you are a single person. Craig is a great host and offered us enough privacy. The lawn outside is pretty and offers great view of the beach.  Very close to grocery stores and only miles from Shark Cove, Haleiwa etc. 

Having said that, I wouldn't recommend this place for couples. They have basically converted the 3rd part of a 3 car garage space to make this studio which seemed less than 200 sq ft. and the toilet is inside the studio with no separate door. Me and my wife had to take turns to hang outside anytime either of us needed to use the toilet. Also, this studio could use a better cooktop (even frying eggs took ages on the small portable heater).
Fantastic location. Smaller but perfect living space. Highly recommend it! Craig is very accommodating!

The place was exactly how it appears in the photos, being large enough for a single person or a couple, looking to spend their time exploring or at the beach.  We had a great time And the location was perfect.

Room description is very accurate and Craig is very friendly and helpful. Other highlights: well equipped room (pan, glasses, fridge, etc.), bed is very comfortable. Actually the most important is the location! Ocean front,  2 people table in the yard, available grill to use, near supermarket and other stores... outstanding!
The good be better things: shower is outside the room/house, there is only a curtain between toilette and the room (no door).

We had an awesome week staying at Craig's. Nice, cozy spot right on pipeline-if you're here to surf and enjoy the island, this is your spot. Just big enough for two. Had everything we needed for a week stay. Thanks so much! Can't wait to visit again.

Description of the place was accurate!  Small, but you are not going to  Hawaii to stay inside.  Location was amazing--could not have been better.  Quick walk down to the beach for sunsets, breakfasts outside.  It was so nice and easy to get around the area.  Thanks Craig for lending us your snorkel gear and offering up your paddleboard!  We had a great stay and hope to be able to come back soon.

We had a great few days staying at Craig's. Craig is very welcoming and happy to help if you have any questions. The location is fantastic, right on the beach just next to Banzai Pipeline. The room provided has good privacy with all the facilties we needed.

Thank you Craig!

Craig and Family was very cool 
Great spot to park
Everything you need in kitchen (including wine opener)
killer outside shower that is hot
awesome jet lag middle of the night views of stars and beach 
food carts across the street (Acai & Thai ) sometimes the pizza guy 
killer place
"the 50 yard line of surf"

Localizacion muy buena, justo encima de la playa. Ducha al aire libre al estilo hawaiano, por la noche a la luz de las velas. Poca ventilacion en la habitacion, un poco de calor para dormir. La entrada se realiza a traves del parking de la casa. El baño justo al lado de la cama separado por una cortina. Zona reservada para aparcar el coche. Se dispone de un mesa y dos sillas en el jardin.
Recomendable para surfistas que quieran visitar la north shore.
Very nice location and people

Had a great stay at the Pipeline Studio!  The space was perfect for two people and Craig was a fantastic host.  It was wonderful to wake up and see the ocean!  The outdoor shower was lovely and gave the whole experience an authentic North Shore feel.  We even had a pair of endangered monk seals park themselves right in front of the house on the beach for our entire stay!  So cool!  Will definitely return and recommend to friends!

We loved staying at Pipeline Studio! Amazing location and close to everything. Extremely convenient to access the bus stop as it is right outside the front door! Craig and his family were friendly and accommodating. We were even lucky enough to have two Hawaiian Monk seals rest on the beach for a couple of days while we were there. Thank you! We definitely recommend it!

Beautiful location, just steps to the sand !! Waking up every morning to walk out onto the beautiful beach and watch pipeline from the front steps and then watching the sunsets from the same spot is a massive treat! Was spoilt with this location on the north shore (as long as you have a car). Such a chilled out location, would recommend to anyone wanting some time away from the hustle and bustle and planning to spend most of their time outside ! Cosy self contained unit and has everything available for cooking meals. Great property !

The host left coconut water in the fridge and candies on the counter, along with a guide to the house. He greeted us at the door - and, showed us around the room. Really accommodating and responsive. The property description was accurate - but, it's tough to convey how beautiful to beach looks. Like a private beach with surfers riding the waves, groomed lawn, grill and kitchen. I expected the murphy bed, toilet separated by a curtain, and outdoor shower - but, these good things to note to set expectations. Upscale neighborhood. Great parking.

Great location! Cant beat the view! Spent every moment, when we were at the accommodation, admiring the view and the beach. The apartment is exactly as described - small but functional and equipped with everything one might need.

Craig was a great host and we have a wonderful stay. The room was the best for our Hawaii trip. Craig left some coconut water and an organic drink in the fridge and when we arrived he was extending a welcome to us. Once our flight had been delayed he help us uncomplicated. Furthermore Craig and his family informed us quickly when a seal was sleeping on the beach. We had our own private area and could use Craig's washer and dryer.

If you would plan an experience trip zu Hawaii it's really nice place for sleep. If we wake up it was a short step to the beautiful beach and every time you could have a awesome view during the breakfast and you could see the sunset in the evening.

You should know that's the room is a little bit smaller that it seems on the fotos. It was really warm in the room and the AC was to loud for us. If you would sleep with open window you could hear the Highway. The hot outdoor shower is really nice and cozy. The neighbors from the vacation house on the right could see you from the balcony.

For us that facts didn't matter, we only need a bed after sunset and we enjoyed the awesome view and the greatful and helpful host family. 

Thank you, Craig!

Amazing location - Pipeline is a few steps from the studio door. Craig's place has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Recommended for those who want to explore the island by day, and need somewhere to rest their heads after seeing the sights. If you plan on spending a lot of time indoors this may not be for you as it is quite a small space!

Craig was a great host.  Property was beautiful.  Studio was small (as described) but all you need, perfect for two people. Location, directly on the beach, was amazing.  Overall great experience.  Loved the outdoor shower.

You can't go wrong with this space. It's perfect for the North Shore, being right on the water and so close to all the action. The space come with everything that you need and we were obsessed with the outdoor shower. It's like your own Hawaiian spa in there. The bed is very comfortable and the kitchenette has everything you need. Craig was a wonderful host, always available and communicative. It really is a magical place that can help with any healing. The view is serene and right out your door step. We are definately coming back and I recommend anyone to stay here. We had a blast.

Amazing location. Craig and his family were so welcoming. We had use of the washing machine, dryer, fresh towels, wifi and the bed was so comfortable. We woke up to watch the waves roll in at Pipeline every morning. Thankyou!

The Pipeline studio was just what I was looking for, and more. The location is unbeatable, right on the beach amongst all the surf houses gives it a great vibe. The sunsets are sensational. If you know anything about the surf world, you will appreciate and respect this area and wish you could never leave. Some say it is small, yes but it is as described and in the pics too, and if you're lucky enough to stay here you should be outside enjoying the north shore from sunrise to sunset anyway. Mahalo.
This place is awesome the better backyards in the World, studio is small but have everything all you need!! You can take a shower with a moon light. The better view of the  pipeline Waves.

Craig was always available to help or answer any questions about the area. The location is as good as it gets, especially for a surfer. The backyard is on the beach in front of Off the Wall and has a perfect view of Pipe and Backdoor. Craig gives you plenty of privacy and you have the use of a large portion of the year and use of the grill. The out door shower was great plenty of hot water. This location made my trip one of the beast ever. There's no way any other location would have been anywhere as good. The kitchen is small but has everything needed. The bed is very comfortable. It's great. I hope to return again!

Craig was a kind host, he had two bottles of coconut water in the fridge when we arrived. He also let us use his bikes to ride around the area which was great. Would recommend biking up to Ted's Bakery- great little local spot. The description of the studio is accurate, it is a small studio with a drop-down bed and small kitchen that was completely private to ourselves. The shower outside was a fun experience as well. It is on a beautiful beach where you can walk right down to the water on a stone path. Would recommend having a car but can also take a bus to the town. Haleiwa had a decent amount of restaurants to choose from.  Overall a great experience! Peaceful getaway on the northshore!

Craig was an awesome host! Always available if we had a question or needed anything at all - very accommodating. The location is AMAZING - better than we could have even imagined. Studio apartment is everything we needed and the bed is super comfy. Outdoor shower was also a great addition. Will def be staying here again when we come back. I can't imagine there being another place this perfect on the north shore.

My husband and I had an amazing time while staying at Craig's place. Great location, beautiful views. Safe, clean and loved the outside shower- taking in the night stars while listening to the sound of the ocean. We caught the Eddie while we were staying here which was incredible! Right on the bike path so no need to drive anywhere while staying here. Cooked up steaks on the grill and caught a few majestic sunsets. We will be back! Thanks again Craig!
Este lugar é especial, está bem localizado e o quarto tem acesso para o jardim de frente para o mar. Muito bom.

The location of this Airbnb is prime. The space is a lot smaller than I anticipated but honestly amazing for the price. The private entrance is great, you can come and go as if you have the entire space. Amazing views!
Great location on the beach , perfect spot to check the surf . Apartment exactly as described, would stay again

what to say :-) dreamy location for all surfing fans, amazing hosts and very cozy studio - we absolutely loved the outdoor shower.craig and francie are such lovely people.they gave us privacy but chat with us when we met in the yard, and we really enjoyed getting know more about the live in the north shore and oahu. we really hope that we will able to come again one day!
Great little studio right on the beach. Incredible surfing and magnificent sunsets right on your doorstep. A fab little food truck called Crispy Grindz is just across the road for a great breakfast!
Perfect location, right on the beach. The studio is small but has everything needed (as described). The outside shower was a funny "adventure". We had a great time on the North Shore. Mahalo Craig!

Such an amazing little studio right off the water. Prior to booking and arriving I read the reviews so I knew that it was going to be a small space but honestly who needs a mansion when you're in Hawaii (you should be out and about exploring). It was the perfect amount of space to sleep and wind down after a long day of adventures. I got to meet Craig and ran into him only a few times in passing but he is very respectful of your space and is there when you have questions. There's a mini fridge in the studio along with a hot plate, microwave and just about everything you need. I wouldn't suggest sharing the space with someone you're not "super comfortable" with as there's only a curtain separating the toilet inside the studio so you can hear if someone is taking care of business, haha. The outdoor shower was so relaxing with plenty of hot water. Can't wait to come back & book this little gem again! Mahalo Craig for a wonderful stay! :)

AMAZING LOCATION!! COULD NOT ASK FOR ANYTHING MORE ON THE NORTH SHORE-RIGHT ON THE PIPELINE-also right on the bike path which was beautiful! unit is as shown, very small but perfect for sleeping! great outdoor shower, gas grill available- exactly as described!! hosts were very responsive and helpful- we had an incredible time and would come back frequently if we could

This is a prime location, highly recommend, my partner and I loved it. right on the beach infront of pipe, comfy beds, we had been travelling for a couple of weeks so we cooked so home cooked meals the kitchenette had everything you need which was great, loved the outdoor shower.. Could stay here forever, will definitely be missed!

Pipeline studio is absolutely epic.  This studio has everything you could need/want e.i a bed to sleep in within crashing distance of waves, an efficient cookstove, and a fridge.  The room is small but really it is all you need.  Be sure to spend the majority of your time outdoors taking in some of the best waves in the world. Thanks Craig!
Definitely made to feel welcome. Description of the room is accurate and I felt completely safe
Awesome location right in front of off the wall with a short paddle or walk to backdoor and pipeline. Value for money being right on the beach at north shore, cant wait to return. Cheers
Incredible!!!!

My partner Peter and I enjoyed a lovely stay at Craig's place. He was there to meet us and give us the low down on the apartment but we had a lot of privacy with the separate side access. It is right on beautiful pipeline beach, the sunsets are gorgeous! It is also really close to excellent snorkelling spots and a group of great food trucks to eat at. It is a small room but has everything you need. You also really need a car to get around. Thanks Craig for a great stay!

If you are looking for a peaceful, relaxing, beautiful, incredible airbnb, look no further! This is truly all we could ever ask for; my sister and I stayed here for what we wish was the rest of our lives. We were completely blown away with the natural beauty just steps outside the door. You really can't beat the location with this one. Showering in the outdoor shower and looking left to the Pacific felt like a dream come true! Craig was helpful, communicative, and kind. I can't think of anything constructive to say, this was truly the best airbnb I've ever stayed at. If you're an outdoorsy person with an adventurous heart I highly recommend this location. North Shore food carts, off-shore snorkeling, and beautiful white sandy beaches are at your fingertips! If I ever come back to the North Shore I would only do so if I could enjoy this luxury location once again. Craig and his family were extremely personable and friendly. Still wondering how we got so lucky to stay at this place. You really cannot beat the location, it will change your life!
Everything was as described and Craig and Francie were great. The location is perfect. absolutely amazing beach just steps away. Would definitely recommend this place.

Location is amazing with the beach literally on your doorstep! If you are planning on an outdoor getaway this is an ideal place. Host is friendly and willing to help in any way possible.

However if you are after a good nights sleep and a spacious room, this small and compact room with a fold out bed may not be for you. Also keep in mind that the toilet is right next to the bed and does not have a door so maybe do your business elsewhere. 

Overall, perfect for us as we spent all hours of the day outdoors, and only used it as a place of rest. If you're looking for luxury keep looking.

We spend one week In this WONDERFULL place ! We had to work every morning but enjoyed everything around in the afternoon. Wifi works well. Craig and Francis are very nice. The garden is lovely and the beach in front is like a private beach always empty and very enjoyable. The space has everything to live in. Small but super convenient. The shower is AMAZING. Definitively a very good value for price. We recommend to anyone ! Probably one of the best way to experience north shore! Thanks.

The location and space is great!! Right on the beach, the place is small (a converted garage) but is definitely enough for 2 people. Outdoor shower was awesome!! Tess the dog is very cute and friendly :) we loved our stay!
Clean room

I honestly cannot rave enough about Craig's pipeline studio. It had everything we needed, and the location was out of this world. Craig and Francie were helpful and communicative. 

It is the perfect size for two people, it's just steps from the beach, and is totally out of the tourist-y environment of the southern part of the island.

The available washer and dryer was a great amenity, and the outdoor shower was absolutely one of the best parts of the whole stay. 

We could not be happier, nor recommend it more highly.
Best place in the north shore with amazing view. You are next to the ripcurl house. The sunset is wonderful.
Didn't feel listing detail was accurate.
Perfect located: Beautiful view and next to the beach, where there were only a few people. Enjoyed the outdoor shower :).

Craig's place was a dream.
The location was perfect - so amazing to wake up each morning and see the waves of pipeline from your door step. 
The room was great for my boyfriend and I. We were able to feel right at home instantly. 
Craig was very accomodating and always Availble if needed :)

This place is all about location.  As long as you plan on being outside most of the time, you will love this place.  If you are expecting to spend any time inside the guest quarters except to sleep and get ready in the morning, look elsewhere.  That being said, you are going to be in Hawaii, where the purpose of your visit should be about being outside.  When we were there, the first winter swell of the year came and we were able to sit outside with the table and chairs and eat papaya and watch pipeline go off.  So, for the money spent, we we very happy with our accommodations.

amazing location especially for my husband who loves surfing and being so close to pipeline was a dream. Accommodation is small but had everything we needed. Having a washer and dryer was also awesome. The outdoor shower was a very cool touch aswell. Tess was such a beautiful dog too and always coming to say hello. Thankyou craig and Francene we had the best time.

We had a wonderful stay at pipeline studio! Such a beautiful spot with easy access to the beach and great location to explore the north shore. You will not be disappointed with your stay. Craig and his wife were nice and made the stay very easy. Would definitely recommend and plan on staying there again when on Oahu.

Mahalo, Craig.  The Pipeline Studio had everything we needed for our visit to the North Shore.  The location could not have been any better.  We loved having out morning coffee on the beach and the outdoor shower was a real bonus!  Thanks for welcoming us to your personal slice of paradise.  We would love to stay here again if we are fortunate enough to return to the North Shore.
Beautiful view and great privacy.
Being right on the beach with spectacular views!

By far the best place to stay if you want to be right in the action on Sunset Beach and surrounding surf breaks. Comfortable place in an awesome location, not far from really good food and even better surf.
Cheers for a great week!!

Craig's place is the perfect spot for anyone but especially if you are a surfer. Right on the beach at Off the Wall and Backdoor. This is my second trip here and won't be my last. If you want a hotel room with all the comforts this is not going to be that. But if you want a place to sleep and be on the beach this is it.

Craigs place was just as advertised. Great little studio right on pipeline. The outdoor shower was perfect. You can see the surf right from the shower. Parking was right I front of the house. Craig was there to greet us when we arrived. I lived on the north shore prior and can't stress enough, this is a dream location.  I would highly recommend staying if you are looking for the authentic North Shore lifestyle.
Great place to stay for easy access to backdoor & off the wall.
All worked perfect. Location is the best if you want to be on pipeline. Great days in the beach

Pretty easy choice.
Great location, book your stay!

It is a beautiful place to stay, the location is just incredible and you never get sick of the view! There is a beautiful bikepath all the way from sunset beach to Waimea bay just infront of the house really great and some nice foodtrucks are also nearby!
This home is a slice of heaven. If you have a chance to stay here you will be doing yourself a favor

Great Host! 
Amazing spot, right on pipeline. 
Had a lovely 4 nights on North shore. 
This is a location dream. 
Thanks Again to Craig.

Craig was a perfect host and his communication was just the right amount.  The pictures and description are exactly what you get and you aren't going to have any surprises when you show up.  The location of the house is as good as it gets if you are looking to stay at the beach and the neighborhood is very quiet.  The room is small but it has everything you need and Craig even provides some beach equipment and a few little extras that will make your stay even more enjoyable.  I would definitely recommend staying here and I plan on going back asap.  Thank you for your hospitality Craig and Go Hawk!!!
The host canceled this reservation 47 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great location and views of off the wall and pipe

If you are looking for an efficient, clean and affordable launching pad for your North Shore adventure, this is it.  This isn't the type of room for those who want to lounge around all day.  But if you want a well priced room on one of the great beaches on Oahu then this is your spot.  The house is ocean front (the beach is twenty steps out your door) and is with in walking distance of Sharks Cove and the Foodland grocery store.  It is less than 20 minutes from historic Haleiwa and the Turtle Bay Resort.  If you're an adventurer and want to explore the North Shore, I don't think you'll find a better deal!

Perfect location! If you're planning to be outdoors most of the time then this is your spot! The studio was clean and convenient. Craig and Francie were great hosts. They gave you plenty of privacy, but were around if you needed  anything. The views from this spot were stunning.
If you want to stay at the most iconic surf break in the world this is the best place you could ask for...slow down you life and just enjoy the moment at Craig's amazing location!!
Sick little studio, couldn't be closer to pipe
Un emplacement excellent. Juste se qu il faut pour passer un merveilleux séjour. Je conseille fortement. J'y reviendrai très probablement. Il n'y a qu un mots: PARADIS
We really loved staying at Craig's studio. It's really all about the location - right in front of Pipeline.

Location, Location, Location! We loved falling asleep and waking up to the sound of the surf pounding just outside the door.
EPIC

This studio is wonderful and exactly as Craig describes with an unbeatable pipeline location. The place is compact with a pleasantly surprising amount of amenities, including a fully functional kitchen with access to a large fridge and freezer, beach chairs, and two bicycles that you can take on the bike trail right outside the studio to food land, food trucks, etc. So happy we found this place and will definitely stay again in the future. Mahalo Craig!!

A simple little priceless gem, it doesn't get any better ! Craig and Francie were so hospitable and incredibly helpful . The Room was perfect and we loved looking out over the beach whilst having a shower . The local information and small touches of little welcome treats were fabulous . The place was very clean with excellent instructions on how everything worked . Such a special place where magical memories can be made . We have already booked again!!!

Location is as good as it gets!!! Pipeline is literally on your doorstep, which is amazing,sadly that is the only positive. The space is a lot smaller than photos make out, the wifi was unreliable and the host who lives on the premises was unapproachable.
If location is what you are after this place on the North Shore is for you!

ﾉｰｽに滞在するなら､ここのﾛｹｰｼｮﾝ以上のところはまずないでしょう｡
庭から直結するPipelineのﾋﾞｰﾁはｻｰﾌﾎﾟｲﾝﾄとしても撮影ﾎﾟｲﾝﾄとしても大変人気が高いです｡
庭からその様子を眺めているだけでも絶景です｡
ｻﾝｾｯﾄﾋﾞｰﾁやﾌﾟﾌﾟｹｱﾋﾞｰﾁにも近いですし､Foodlandやﾌｰﾄﾞﾄﾗｯｸも近くにあるので何不自由なく過ごせます｡
部屋はかなり簡易的ですので､寝るだけと考えればｺｽﾊﾟ◎です!
Wer an der Northshore wohnen will, ist das ein Perfekter Ort! Was für eine Aussicht! Immer wieder gerne!!!!!
Loved my stay at the pipeline studio. Great location right on the beach. Everything you need to enjoy the beautiful north shore. Highly recommend and will definitely be back.

This place is great, and all about the location. It’s a great value, and it’s right on the beach. If you’re looking for a place to simply rest your head at the end of the night, this is the spot! If you’re someone who plans on spending most of their time outside enjoying the surroundings, this is your place! The studio is small, but has everything you need to have a fun and enjoyable time on the North Shore. Myself and a buddy stayed here for 6 days during Volcom Pipe Pro, and we had a blast!

Absolutely perfect location. Steps away from the beach and right next to Pipeline. For the location and price you cannot ask for anything better. The place is small but it is clean and comfortable. Thanks again Craig!

Anyone who surfs, this is the best location you could ask for. Check pipe/backdoor/offthewall just footsteps away.  Riding the free bikes down to food trucks, or snorkelling at Sharks cove is a must. Using the provided bbq, cooking some steaks while watching pipeline is amazing.  Definitly will come back. Thanks Craig! Matt & Anna(oz)
Craig’s house is at wonderful location with private beach. Strong recommend if want to enjoy the beautiful north shore area.

Perfect space with everything you need to enjoy the beach which is literally steps away. Loved enjoying our coffee overlooking the shore in the AM. So easy to get to food trucks & to drive in town. Enjoyed the nice touches like the fancy standing fan (there was air conditioning but we didn’t need it) & the scented candle in the bathroom. Thanks Craig!
Craig was very accomadating! He answered quickly and met us right when we got there to show us the space. The location is unbelievable. Would love to go back.
Great place with awesome view!
Great location for surf! And accommodation is fine if you plan on spending your days out and about.

Die Lage der Unterkunft ist genial, direkt am Strand! Die Unterkunft selbst ist ein Nebenraum in der Garage. Dunkel und kaum zu lüften. Es gibt ein Gerät für Aircondition, welches jedoch sehr laut ist und daher nachts nicht in frage kommt. 
Wenn man den ganzen Tag unterwegs ist, dann ist es ok. Für Reisende mit Kind so wie mich war die Unterkunft suboptimal. Und die Sauberkeit der Küchenzeile ließ sehr zu wünschen übrig. Aber vielleicht ist das auch meinem deutschen Naturell geschuldet....
Wir haben uns nach drei Tagen zum Wechsel in ein anderes Quartier entschlossen, da uns schlafen durch die klimatischen Bedingungen kaum möglich war. Schade.
Great spot. Would recommend!

I can’t thank Craig enough for opening up his beautiful home to us. The beach access is incredible and the hospitality was top notch. This should be on anyone’s ‘to-do list’ for staying in Oahu because you get the full experience of beach, hikes, and local food all close by. I can’t wait to go back!
Amazing spot.  Couldn’t ask for a better location!  The studio had everything we needed and Craig was friendly and super helpful.

The little studio was everything we expected from the listing. Perfect location for us to explore the north shore. The room had everything we needed and we used the BBQ outside a few times to cook our dinner. 
Craig let us have use of the bikes too so it was so handy to just cycle along to the beaches, food trucks or sharks cove for a snorkel.
