Will miss the outside shower :)

Location is wonderful! We enjoyed staying on the beach and hearing the waves constantly! The bed is a wall bed and the outdoor shower was refreshing! We loved our stay and would definitely stay again!!!

Lovely stay right on pipeline, close to everything you will need. The complementary bikes were great to ride around to beaches and local eating and surfing spots. Would recommend for anyone who is looking for a relaxed stay.

This is a great location. Amazing view for morning and night strolls on the beach. This is spot is perfect for 1 or 2 people. Having cruiser bikes was awesome to ride around on to get to local spots. Will definitely book again.
Craig was very friendly and the location is amazing!

This place is amazing! It is literally right on the beach and the street is very peaceful and quiet. Craig is a great host and showed us around when we arrived. There were beach chairs, snorkel gear, and bikes we were able to use! The Murphy bed is very comfortable :) the outdoor shower is fun! The location really cannot be beat. Just a few stairs and you’re on one of the most amazing beaches on Oahu!

The location of Craig’s pipeline studio is truly unbeatable.  Have your coffee six feet from Pipeline Beach.  Wander the beach at night looking at the stars.  Close to everything on North Shore but not in a congested area.  Bike path access too.  The listing is honest up front about the unique aspects of the studio; if it sounds like what you want, it’s a great spot for a great value.

Thank you guys for an amazing time!
Best landlord in Oahu! Easy to talk to, they gave us local tips. If We needed any thing Craig fixed it. The location is unbeatable.
Your house are great. The apartment was exactly what we looked for.
Do not hesitate to rent this apartment. You are In great hands.
Thanks a million guys!
Fantastic location and cosy little room.. Very clean and had everything we needed. Craig’s hospitality was great.

A basic sort of place but its got everything you need. It is in such an awesome location right on the beach in front of off the wall and pipeline. Couldnt get a better location for the surfers. Bus stops easy walk in either direction. Nice and quiet and Craig leaves you in privacy.

If your looking for a place on the north shore Craig’s place is a easy choice.
It’s location on the beach at pipeline is fantastic, would highly recommend.
This is the best Location a surfer can stay on Oahu. The space is clean and has everything you need. I would definitely recommend to any friend and would personally love to stay again. 5 stars.

Aloha, Craig’s place was perfect! It had everything we needed plus extra. We cooked breakfast every morning and BBQed dinner almost every night. We could hear the waves crashing from our room. My husband loved being able to wake up and walk outside and check out the waves! Hospitality was above and beyond. There were bikes, snorkel gear, beach chairs, towels...everything that you would need was available.we highly recommend this place and can’t wait to come back! 
Mahalo
Craig’s place was even better a 2nd time. Great privacy and no better location for a surfer looking for good waves. Also very clean with extra amenities.
Amazing location, very relaxing, and private.
Great location and beach access. Craig was nice and had some bikes, and snorkelling gear for us to use. Would definitely recommend to people looking to be at the beach on the North Shore.
If you want a location in the heart of the action this is the place !

Craig’s pipe studio was a fully equipped studio right on the beach at Pipeline with a hot private outdoor shower, internet, cable TV, bathroom, kitchenette with coffeemaker and toaster oven, mini fridge, hot plate, comfortable bed, futon, and dining areas indoor and outdoor overlooking the ocean. It was affordable and included beachcruisers, beach chairs, beach towels, snorkels, and a cooler bag as well as access to washer/dryer and large fridge. Craig gave us local tips for the area and was accessible without being intrusive at all. We had a perfect stay: surfing, biking, hiking, eating fresh poke everyday, and found some great nightlife in Honolulu and at Turtle Bay. Will definitely stay here again if we return.
The best location on the beach at pipeline. Hawaii is incredible

Craig was extremely hospitable and provided us with everything we needed. The location was wonderful and we were just steps away from the beach. The studio itself has all your basic necessities and you can hear the ocean waves from inside. The outdoor shower can be a little chilly in the winter if it is raining or windy, but was overall a pleasant experience.

The location of this place is absolutely insane. Pipeline is in the backyard. It can’t get any better than this. The room is exactly as described, and we didn’t find ourselves needing anything else. Craig was a fantastic host. Would definitely recommend.

Craig and his family were great hosts to my daughter and her friend. The location is amazing. They didn’t have a car and it was close to a bus stop. They also took advantage of borrowing their bikes. Would definitely go back. Thanks again for making them feel safe and welcome.

The house is prime location on the north shore! The studio was perfect for my boyfriend and I. Craig was always quickly responding if we needed anything, and his wife made sure candles were readily available before the storm hit! They provided us with bikes which was super nice since there are so many places nearby to ride your bike to! Would deff. book this place again!
Great spot, nice room, we'll be back!

name: Single Room Cihangir in Taksim
summary: The flat is located in Beyoglu - Cihangir district, touristic attractions, cafe&resturants and also the exciting night life in Beyoglu. (Taksim Square, İstiklal Street, Galata, Karakoy are all very close walking distance away)
description: The flat is located in Beyoglu - Cihangir district, touristic attractions, cafe&resturants and also the exciting night life in Beyoglu. (Taksim Square, İstiklal Street, Galata, Karakoy are all very close walking distance away) 24 hours open restaurant and cafes can be found around the flat but mostly they are for wine and dine. Cihangir also has historical places and most of the buildings are helenistic and coloured. Sometimes just walking in these small streets can be a better activity for the day. it s possible to find lots of art galleries, ancient shops, domestic and international restaurants, fast foods, cafes and night life. The special side of the Cihangir is that most of these places are hidden in apartments back sides. They do not attract theirself for tourists by flickering lihgts or and ather kind of advertisements. They are cozy and aimed to best service for their guest. Perfect location for public transportation.5 mins to bus, metro, airport shuttle and tram stations. ATM
neighborhood_overview: 24 hours open restaurant and cafes can be found around the flat but mostly they are for wine and dine. Cihangir also has historical places and most of the buildings are helenistic and coloured. Sometimes just walking in these small streets can be a better activity for the day. it s possible to find lots of art galleries, ancient shops, domestic and international restaurants, fast foods, cafes and night life. The special side of the Cihangir is that most of these places are hidden in apartments back sides. They do not attract theirself for tourists by flickering lihgts or and ather kind of advertisements. They are cozy and aimed to best service for their guest.
notes: l have a cat, so if you don't like pets or have some allergy this might not be a good location for you! I smoking at home :(
transit: Perfect location for public transportation.5 mins to bus, metro, airport shuttle and tram stations. ATM and taxi station just 1 min away.2 min.Walk to Fındıklı Tram Station, 5 min walk to Kabataş Ferry and 15 min walk(2 stops) to Karaköy Ferry. Sultanahmet is just 5 stops away. Very easy to go to Kadıköy&Üsküdar on the Asian side or to Princess Islands. Fındıklı is the starting point for the Bus Lines also.
interaction: -A double bed -Free WiFi internet access -Led TV -Cable TV (living room) -Updated kitchen with pots, dishes and glasses -Refrigerator -Bathroom with a shower -Kitchen -Play Station -Dvd Player -Film Archive
house_rules: no rules :))

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: FULLY FURNISHED STUDIO B IN TSIM SHA TSUI 尖沙咀6B
summary: The apartment was completely renovated and refurnished. . It is at Austin Ave. just next to Best Western Grand Hotel Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
space: The apartment is located in a quiet residential area, yet only 5 minute walk away from a busy shopping area with famous shopping malls such as the Miramar, the One, the Park Lane etc.  It is also at walking distance away from many tourist attractions such as the Temple Street, the Jade Market, the heritage museum, the star walk and the clock tower, to name a few.  It is right in the middle of a traffic network: 5 minute walk from TST/ Jordon MTR stations, numerous bus routes nearby and China-Hung Hom train terminus is only 10 minutes walking distant away. Many restaurants and eateries nearby with the famous Korean street just round the corner.  There are 2 supermarkets nearby and 2 convenience stores just opposite the street.  There are also laundry and dry cleaning shops 1 minute away.  The apartment is in such a convenient location that you literally have everything within a 10 minute radius.
description: The apartment was completely renovated and refurnished. . It is at Austin Ave. just next to Best Western Grand Hotel Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong The apartment is located in a quiet residential area, yet only 5 minute walk away from a busy shopping area with famous shopping malls such as the Miramar, the One, the Park Lane etc.  It is also at walking distance away from many tourist attractions such as the Temple Street, the Jade Market, the heritage museum, the star walk and the clock tower, to name a few.  It is right in the middle of a traffic network: 5 minute walk from TST/ Jordon MTR stations, numerous bus routes nearby and China-Hung Hom train terminus is only 10 minutes walking distant away. Many restaurants and eateries nearby with the famous Korean street just round the corner.  There are 2 supermarkets nearby and 2 convenience stores just opposite the street.  There are also laundry and dry cleaning shops 1 minute away.  The apartment is in such a convenient location that you lit
access: -Room with built in wardrobes with hangers - Build in  desk with chair - 1.4 x 1.90 M size Bed with new mattresses - 1 split type air conditioner - Open kitchen with a heating stove, cooking pots, all cutlery,. - A fridge, a microwave and a toaster - A rice cooker and a electric kettle - 32”LG Smart TV  - Free high speed broadband wifi -Clean and modern toilet  with towels - Hair dryer - Water Heater - Washing machine and Dryer (Don’t supply detergent ) - International adapter is available 房間沒有提供- 牙刷,牙膏及拖鞋 請勿在房內抽煙,謝謝 This place is a service apartment style with house -keeping service will be every 2 weeks.
house_rules: . Keep clean as it were your own home.  . Turn off the shower water heater after use and always turn electricity off when out of apt.  . No smoking  ‧ 保持清潔,把它當成自己的家｡  ‧ 當你離開公寓請關掉熱水爐､冷氣及燈｡  ‧ 嚴禁吸煙

host.host_about: I like to travel and i understand what people expect when they move into to a hotel room or an apartment when they are away from home.  That is why I tried to make my apartment suites as comfortable as they possibly can.

reviews.comments: Daisy and her husband were great hosts.  Very easy communication, excellent service, and everything in the apartment is as described.  Great location and amenities.  Perfect for a solo traveler or for a couple.  I will be happy to return to one of Daisy's properties.

The place was supposingly one apartment, but it was divided into 5 separate rooms creatively. So you can hear absolutely everything what is going on in other rooms and everybody can hear you as well.

      The room is super small and what even worse is that in the middle of this small room there is one big column, so you actually do not have any space at all.

       In the first week of our stay flush of the toilet was broken, we contacted the owner and she said the she fixed it in a week and while that time we have to use the bucket to flush the toilet! She fixed it in 2 weeks eventually, half of the month we were using the bucket!

      Wifi was very slow, not suprisingly.

       I would definitely NOT recommend this place to anyone!

I enjoyed my stay here. Daisy was easy to contact and Cora (her assistant) was readily available to answer questions or swing by as well. The room was just like it was in the pictures and it was thoroughly cleaned each week. I especially appreciated the cleanliness that Daisy upheld. It is Hong Kong so the rooms are small, but it has everything you need. I did not have trouble with the wifi as a previous guest mentioned. The walls can be a little thin but the other residents are fairly quiet and Daisy will take care of any loud neighbors immediately (only happened once). 
In the end, I liked my stay at Daisy's place so much that I decided to book a much longer term stay at another one of her locations.
Daisy and her assistants were fantastic. I highly recommend their rooms. Very convenient location. Rooms are clean, modern and functional. Basically everything is provided for. Highly recommended.

I stayed for a month in one of the TST studio apartments. It was very clean and well-equipped, with an extremely comfortable hotel-like bed! Indoors was surprisingly quiet considering its bustling location. As a solo female guest, I felt safe and relaxed there. Daisy and her assistants are also really friendly and helpful. Recommended!

Daisy is very friendly. She contact to me actively and give a check-in guide in detail. The location of the house is near MRT, resturant, and market. The house is clear and equipments are maintained well. I recommend Daisy's house for everyone who want to visit Hong Kong

It was a great stay at the apartment, everything was good only wifi had problem several times, we couldn't connect to wifi the last night there. Location is very convenient and closed to a lot of tourist attractions, restaurants, and shopping malls.
Très bon appartement en plein centre de Hong Kong, proche des transports et très bien équipé
非常方便的地点,房间随小区,需要的设备都有,很温馨,适合情侣和年轻夫妇｡
房间非常干净,在香港这个价格绝对实惠,Daisy非常好,房间设施齐全,下次还会再来住
Nice location and very clean appartement. I'll come back definitely!
The room is very good

Расположение отличное. Маленькая квартира, но уютная. Только одно испортило впечатление. Грязное полотенце нам выдали(немного ржавчины было, не придали этому значение), а после того как уехали, с нас хотят взять компенсацию за испорченное полотенце. Уборку за 9 дней ни кто не делал
The place is nice and complete amenities. However, its a little bit far from the mtr, around 10mins walk. I also suggest that there should be room cleaning everyday.
The place is very cosy and (Website hidden by Airbnb) close to MTR with amazing location. Will recommend for anyone wanting to stay in TST.

name: Large eclectic studio East Village
summary: Modern and open studio right in the heart of Alphabet City/East Village.  Location is in the midst of the energy of NYC with a downtown soul.
space: Tranquil relaxing oasis from the busy city energy of New York City.  Newly renovated, sun filled space with fully equipped kitchen, high ceilings, full spacious bathroom, brand new queen sized bed, central heat and air conditioner, closet space, wifi, extensive DVD collection, library, laundry and elevator in the building and outdoor garden.
description: Modern and open studio right in the heart of Alphabet City/East Village.  Location is in the midst of the energy of NYC with a downtown soul. Tranquil relaxing oasis from the busy city energy of New York City.  Newly renovated, sun filled space with fully equipped kitchen, high ceilings, full spacious bathroom, brand new queen sized bed, central heat and air conditioner, closet space, wifi, extensive DVD collection, library, laundry and elevator in the building and outdoor garden. - Entire Apartment - Garden - Laundry East Village is the quintessential spirit of a true local New York experience.  Here in the heart of the melting pot you have art, culture, bars, award winning restaurants, unpretentious nightlife, family owned bodegas and cafes, mom and pop coffee shops and friendly people.  The East Village has the most community gardens out of all the other boroughs.  The apartment is a half a block away from the famous Tompkins Square Park. You truly are staying in a beautiful artsy v
neighborhood_overview: East Village is the quintessential spirit of a true local New York experience.  Here in the heart of the melting pot you have art, culture, bars, award winning restaurants, unpretentious nightlife, family owned bodegas and cafes, mom and pop coffee shops and friendly people.  The East Village has the most community gardens out of all the other boroughs.  The apartment is a half a block away from the famous Tompkins Square Park. You truly are staying in a beautiful artsy village within the bustling city while enjoying the best the city has to offer by food, culture, art and nightlife.
transit: - Nearby the L train (14th and 1st) - Easy to hail a cab a few steps away from apartment - Citibike is one block away (bicycle sharing program) - M14D is a few steps from the apartment (travels to any subway station) - Uber (car service) can be used at any time from anywhere in the Great New York area
access: - Entire Apartment - Garden - Laundry

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
Oksana and I did not have a chance to meet in person, but she was still a great host.  She made easy key arrangements, left us a list of her favorite places in her neighborhood, and communicated quickly to book her place.  

The studio is a good size for one guest or a couple.  It is newly renovated.  Great shower in the bathroom.

The room is a bit chilly, but she kindly left a space heater.  If you like a chilly room, this is a great place for you.

The kitchen was really handy.

We absolutely loved Oksana's place! It was cozy and well appointed, we unfortunately didn't get to meet her but she made arrangements to make sure everything went very smoothly for us. We would definitely stay here again, the location was perfect with so much to do close by.

Good location and nice apartment. 
Communication with Oksana was very good, got fast replies. The apartment was nice and clean, comfortable bed and nice bathroom.
She had left us very good recommendations to neighbourhood bars/restaurants and also a nice bottle of red wine.
The neighbourhood is quiet but walking distance to lots of restaurants. The metro station is a 5 minute walk.
This was a perfect location for our stay in NYC.

We had an amazing time in New York staying at Oksana's place.  The ad was spot on.  All kitchen facilities were there though we didn't use them as we were out.  The bathroom is nice, with a good shower.  The bed was very comfortable.  Great vibe to the place, quiet and relaxing.  The area was perfect.  Full of amazing places to eat and drink and a short walk to the subway which made getting to the rest of manhattan very easy.  Only one stop over to Brooklyn also.  Oksana had left a bottle of wine and some chocolates for our arrival which was very nice.  She met us at the apartment  and talked us through a few things.  She also left a list of her recommendations for food and drinks for the area.  She was super flexible with moving in and out times and always available to answer questions.  In short, great host, great apartment, great area.  Would recommend!  Thanks Oksana!

Oksana's studio is fantastic. It's in a great location (half a block from the park), spotless, and beautifully decorated. Oksana was flexible with check-in and check-out times, which was really helpful because our flights in and out were both in the morning. 

Thanks so much, Oksana!

Oksana was a great host that made everything very easy during my stay. Although we did not meet in person I had no issues settling in or having any of my questions answered! 

The apartment was exactly how it appears in the images and was presented immaculately. The location of the apartment is perfect as it is surrounded by bars, cafes and restaurants to suit all taste buds. Would definitely want to stay here again when I visit NYC.

A wonderful experience! Great location - try Thompkins Square Bagels! Oksana is very accommodating; we had an early flight to and from NYC, but she was willing to let us check in and out early. Plus, she left us a list of her recommendations and made us feel very welcome! I highly recommend staying here, I would again in a heartbeat.

Oksana's apt was lovely, just as advertised.  The apt is clean and seems new renovated, its a small space but all a traveler would need. Then neighborhood is amazing with many restaurants and bars in the area.
Our accommodations were exactly as pictured.  Oksana has a very cute little place.  The bed was incredibly comfortable.  The apartment was very clean and you could not beat the location.

The apartment description and photos were accurate. Comfortable bed, lots of pillows, clean. Shower had decent pressure and temperature. My only complaint was that sometimes the toilet would run. Aside from that, locks & entry to apartment were easy to figure out. Lots of restaurants, coffee shops, and parks surround the area. Felt safe walking at night. I missed my flight coming in and Oksana was flexible and communicative as we worked together to find a way to get me the keys at a new time. Would stay again in the future. Thanks Oksana!
Oksanas place was perfect for my MY stay! So many great bars and restaurants around so it's a great location. Oksana was a great host and replied to all messages and made things very easy for me!

I had a great stay at Oksana's place. The Eastern-inspired decor made it a peaceful outpost in the city. The neighborhood still shows a lot of vibrancy and community with its coffee shops, bars, restaurants, gardens, and Tompkins Square Park down the road. Oksana has a great list of places in the neighborhood to try. She was very responsive and check-in/check-out was extremely easy.

Oksana's place was great - It was clean, the bed was comfortable and it was close to everything we needed and every place we wanted to go.  The space had a great vibe and was great to come back to relax in after a long day. I was glad to see one of the places I wanted to eat at was on her list of places to check out and it was only a couple blocks away. We never met her, but checking in and out was super easy and she was very responsive. Recommended!

Oksana's place is great. Very clean and organized. It is the perfect location for exploring. I loved being right on a crosstown bus line. It was super easy to communicate with Oksana. I loved my week in NYC.
Oksana's place is great! Very comfortable and clean and the area is really fun. I would definitely recommend staying here

Lovely bohemian space, amazing location. We even got to watch 4th of July fireworks from the rooftop. Oksana was delightful to deal with and talk to, and though she wasn't in town, communication was very easy. I second her restaurant recommendations; they're all really good. In all, the experience was delightful and we'd stay again in a heartbeat.

The pictures and description are accurate.  The apartment is on the first floor, so rarely used the elevator.  The location is great!  A lot of places to get food, as well as Tompkins Square Park are close by, great vibe in the neighbourhood.  The M14D bus was close by and useful to get to places, including subway stations.  We didn't meet Oksana in person, but she was always available to answer any questions.

Oksana was a great host - very understanding when I flight was delayed as I was arriving. The apartment was clean and tidy and I had everything that I needed. Excellent location as well. Would definitely recommend. The only thing I would add is that I could have done with a place to hang my work clothes but I worked something out.

Accurate instructions to get into the apartment, and great recommendations for bars and restaurants. Very prompt response for all my e-mails/messages.
Only complain: Closet space is almost non-existent.

My host was very attentive and considerate.  She made everything perfect and comfortable. Her home was perfect. It had everything I needed to make my stay in the city perfect. The neighbor is right there in the fun of everything.  I felt very safe there.

Oksana was super communicative and made me feel very welcome to her charming studio in East Village. What a great location! So close to so many awesome places! Even tho I was there for only one day I got to have breakfast at C&B, lunch at Café Morgador and beers at Proletariat. 

She also had great tips for some awesome cocktail joints nearby, including my favorite New York City drinking establishment: Pouring Rainbows.

Thank you, Oksana!
Please was nice, clean and cozy. In a great area with plenty of bars and restaurants. Perfect if you plan to be out and about exploring the city most of the time.
Staying at Oksana's place was cozy and fun as always. Oksana is a fabulous host.

Oksana is a very warm, cooperative & communicable host. She will try & help you out with your needs / queries immediately. Her warm & cozy place  feels just like home. It has few restaurants around, nice & safe neighbourhood & is walkable (15-20 minutes) to Union Square.

Oksana has check-in/out down to a science and her place is eclectic and cozy, just as described.  It's clean and decorated with plenty of personal charm, the shower is great, the bed is comfy, there's AC if needed, and during my few nights stay during the week I never heard any noise from neighbors so I got plenty of sleep.  Definitely a good spot and great value for a single traveler or a couple used to intimate spaces (it is a studio after all).

The neighborhood has plenty of night life to check out as well as lots of little green spaces for quieter meditation if that's more your thing.  Tompkins Square Park is probably the nicest it's been in about twenty years and a great place to lie on the grass with a book if you don't feel like schlepping to Central Park.  Of course if you do want to get out of the neighborhood, the L train is close, plus there's a crosstown bus at the end of the block if an 8 minute walk to the subway seems just too much (but then I'd have to ask what you're doing in New York any way?) so there's no excuse not to get out there and see whatever you want.
Excellent host, place, location, value. We've stayed a few times in the E.Village and was at the top of our list. Thanks much Oksana!
Oksana's place is excellent, very clean and comfortable. It really does have an exotic/eclectic feel and it's in a fantastic location close to Tompkins Square Park. Really glad I stayed here!
Great studio apartment on a very quiet street. Oksana's place was really unique, and such an inviting space. Easy to get around the city as well

What an amazing experience I had at Oksana place. I felt as if I was at my sister place. Her bed and her shower are out of this world and her decoration. It was all I needed after a stressful day. It was hard leaving! However, nothing tops Oksana vibe. She is so sweet, caring and friendly, I’ve felt like she was family every time we talked. It was an honor! Hope to be back soon!

The stay at Oksana’s was awesome. She gave me some great tips on where to eat or drink. The space is exactly what I expected, very quiet neighborhood at night but lively during the day. Would definitely recommend.
Great location and cozy apartment, wonderful host with excellent recommendations!

We had a great stay in Oksana's lovely place. It's very central, walking distance to great restaurants, bars, and other places for going out like e.g. the (old and new) nublu just around the corner. The place has its very own charm, which i liked, it's very clean, quite quiet and Oksana is a wonderful host, very responsive and very friendly, making you feel welcome - and she has helpful recommendations for the neighborhood. :) I recommend the place for renting. Thank you Oksana.
This apartment does what is "says on the tin".
Cool place in a cool neighborhood.  We enjoyed our time here.

We really enjoyed staying at Oksana's place. The apartment is ideally situated in the east village, there are two bus stops a few steps away, it is a short walk to the subway,  plus the neighbourhood is full of restaurants. The studio had everything we needed during our stay. Oksana was quick to respond to any questions/problems we had and was always very helpful and friendly! We would absolutely choose her place, if we had the opportunity to visit New York again!
I had a great stay at Oksana's place. The neighborhood has a lot to do, and Oksana was helpful and made it easy to communicate. Thank you!

East Village is my fave part of Manhattan, the street of Oksana’s apt is quiet but near everything you’d need, very walkable and near trains/buses/citibikes etc. 

Oksana was super quick in responding and communicating, booking and checking in was a breeze. 

Her place isn’t big but perfect for single or couple and it gives you great value for money. It’s a cute little space. There is a lot of stuff, perhaps a little too much, but it didn’t bother me. The only tiny thing that bugged me a little was that it is quite dark, I would’ve loved an extra clip-light or two.

Super stylish and artsy studio apartment in a fantastic location. Very close to a high-energy neighbourhood with lots of bars and restaurants (including many veggo/vegan if you're so inclined), but the apartment itself and street are quite quiet. Oksana is a great host and provided clear check-in instructions and a raft of great local recommendations.
The location is strategic and perfect for light or heavy travelers. Definitely will pick this place again if one day I back to NYC.

The last AirBnB I stayed in, I thought to myself this is the most hotel-like AirBnB I've ever had. Oksana's was the opposite - in the best possible way. The charm and character of her place are undeniable - it was like staying in a friend's perfectly appointed and perfectly maintained home, which is half the charm of the AirBnB experience. She was ridiculously easy to communicate with (and understanding of little wrinkles along the way like a late check in), the neighborhood is quintessential East Village/Alphabet City, and I can't overstate how charming the unit is. Would highly recommend it to anyone.

This is an amazing gem in NYC! Loved the personal touches, the location and the home away from home. Oksana is lovely, easy to talk to and very helpful with local tips. Highly recommend this funky fabulous space!
Great quick and responsive communication. Host is a warm and generous person. Location is amazing. Appartment is well decorated and cozy. I would recommend this place.
Great place and the host was gracious and accommodating,

Oksana was very helpful and fast getting us set up for our visit. We were new to Airbnb and she helped us through the process. Our check in was super easy her home is very colorful and whimsical and the location was great. Oksana gave us great tips for local restaurants and fun spots to visit which were exactly as she described. We had a great time. She was a great host!
Oksana’s place was wonderful! Great location & she was easy to communicate with.

name: Charming MtlHomestay Accommodation!
space: Hello All!!:) Our homestay offers 4  spacious and lovely rooms in our Charming stone brick, 3 floor triplex. Our Montreal Homestay Residence are equipped to accommodate students, professionals and vacationers in a warm, quiet but friendly non-smoking in-door Home Away from Home environment. .   Our homestay offers our guest(s) a bit of independence as the rooms are exclusively on the top floor of our sunny and spacious triplex and myself as the host resides exclusively on the main floor and are available to offer assistance to our guest(s) should the need occur. Our accommodation offers complete access to a fully equipped shared kitchen and bathroom and are used exclusively for our guest(s) Our Room Rental Accommodation are with hardwood floor, high ceiling and large windows in each of our rooms. Our rooms are also private and has keys to each room and all outside doors. Our homestay has a front balcony with a clear view of streets, school, houses and major intersections. Our back balc
description: Hello All!!:) Our homestay offers 4  spacious and lovely rooms in our Charming stone brick, 3 floor triplex. Our Montreal Homestay Residence are equipped to accommodate students, professionals and vacationers in a warm, quiet but friendly non-smoking in-door Home Away from Home environment. .   Our homestay offers our guest(s) a bit of independence as the rooms are exclusively on the top floor of our sunny and spacious triplex and myself as the host resides exclusively on the main floor and are available to offer assistance to our guest(s) should the need occur. Our accommodation offers complete access to a fully equipped shared kitchen and bathroom and are used exclusively for our guest(s) Our Room Rental Accommodation are with hardwood floor, high ceiling and large windows in each of our rooms. Our rooms are also private and has keys to each room and all outside doors. Our homestay has a front balcony with a clear view of streets, school, houses and major intersections. Our back balc
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is very  friendly and has lots of outdoor activities in nearby parks and community center.
transit: Yes, we are within five minutes walking distance to Metro station. We are also just 3 minutes to buses which can also take you directly to metro station or downtown.
access: Our homestay has a front balcony with a clear view of streets, school, houses and major intersections. Our back balcony offers a clear and breathtaking view of St Joseph's Oratory and surrounding areas.
interaction: In order for our guests to enjoy their stay, we interact with our guests as much as they wish to, or as little as they want to. Our object is for our guests to feel welcome, warm safe and secure during their stay .
house_rules: We kindly ask that there be no smoking inside the home. No pets allowed. No loud noise or music. Guest are to be respectful at all times to host and guests alike. They are to be responsible for keeping their rooms and all common area clean. Last but not lest guests are to be mindful and respectful at all times to the laws of both Quebec and Canada!! Enjoy Your Stay!!!.

host.host_about:
Hi, I am a semi retired childcare educator of 25 years. I am now offering room rental accommodation in my home to guest who are looking for a "Home Away from Home" type of accommodation. My home is a quiet beautiful sunny and spacious stone brick triples building. My homestay residence is located within 10 minutes walking distance to the new MUHC Hospital and Vendome Metro Station.

I have hosted international students through schools and universities, as well as vacationers/backpackers, professionals and interns who comes to our lovely city to attend busines seminars and completing of their internships.

I am also vibrant outgoing person with a great sence of humor. I thorougly enjoy travelling and meeting people who are open minded, and respectful. I also enjoy learning and experienceing other culture, such as the food...hmmmmmlol! history, sightseeing, dancing, cooking, shopping and going to the movies and attending cultural events.. I have travelled  extensively throughout Europe and the Caribbean and the USA and thoroughly enjoy doing so. I also enjoy sharing my Caribbean culture as well.
My Homestay offers guest a bit of independence as the rooms are all located on the top floor and has a separate entrance leading to the 2 top floor, and Myself as the host resides exclusively on the main floor and are available to offer assistance should the need occur.

As for things that I can't live without hmm, I have to admit I have not given this much though. All I can say is that I can adapt easily to changes. How did our ancestors survived? We are here aren't we?:)

My life motto is: Cry a little! Laugh a lot! Live life the best way you can always!!  Come and visit with us! You too will enjoy your stay!

Cheers!!!:)

reviews.comments:
I had a month-long stay at Maureen's in June/July 2010. She made sure I had directions to get in well, took me to the grocery store to make sure I knew where it was, and was generally a friendly, happy host. One thing not mentioned in the listing is that this is a triplex - Maureen lives on the first floor, I stayed in one of the four bedrooms on the third floor, and she was remodeling the second floor to create four more bedrooms. Guests have great privacy if they want it.

I have to mention that there were ants in the kitchen - Maureen knows and is working to eradicate them, but anyone who's really bothered by bugs might be put off.

I had a great time here. The place was just as described, the neighborhood was calm and safe, and Montreal was lovely. Thanks for having me.

I stayed with Maureen for a week at the end of July 2011 and couldn't have had a more pleasant time. Maureen was a gracious host who went above and beyond to ensure that I had a wonderful stay. Thanks for all you did to welcome me to the beautiful city of Montreal! :)

If you are looking for a serene and peaceful place devoid of city noise and commotion,then Maureen place is the best place.If you want to do reseach,and avoid the prying eyes,then Maureen place is the best for.It is not like the conventional hotel,where you can be disturb by the house keeper,you have everything to your self.I would always choose Maureen place anytime I come to Montreal.
Excellent.  Would highly recommend it.

I stayed at Maureen's for one week. The area is really quiet compared to the center of town. Nice place to have a rest after a long day of walking. Maureen was really nice to me, she even drove me to the supermarket as I arrived late and had nothing to eat. I recommend this place and this host.

It was an excelent place to stay, very clean, quiet, confortable and spacious. Its's very near to subway and just one hour walking downtown. 
Maureen is a very nice hostess, she's always available if you need something. I really recomend this place. I spent 25 nights there and I didn't have any problem.

I had a great stay at Charming MtlHomestay Accomodation. Maureen was very welcoming, friendly and helpful. A quiet, calm and relaxed atmosphere and interesting neighborhood, with Rue Sherbrooke close by.
I really dislike reviews, and hate being badgered to write one. My stay was fine and had no problems, got what I paid for and moved on.

Maureen was a very friendly host and was there to meet me upon arrival. The room itself, bathroom and common area (there were 4 bedrooms in all) were all very clean and quite pleasant, if somewhat plain. The kitchen (which I did not need to use) could have used a bit of cleaning. 
The neighborhood is nice; very quiet and close to buses, the metro and great strips of activity on Sherbrooke (5 min. walk) and Monkland (15 min. walk). Available street parking is a nice bonus for those that are driving.
If you're looking for a clean, quiet and simple place to sleep that's relatively near to downtown, this is a good spot. Perhaps not for those that have more of a chic B+B environment in mind.

Our stay was fine. Guests should know it's very basic: bring your own soap, paper towels, and extra toilet paper. If you plan to use the kitchen, bring a sharp knife, a fresh sponge, and some pots with handles.

Maureen was a very nice host. On the first day of my arrival she even took me grocery shopping and pointed out where I can do my shopping. The place overall is nice and the bed is big.
The shared kitchen is big however counter space limited. The knife is a bit dull as well but overall it was fine - there are pots, pans, plates, utensils and even wine glasses at your disposal.

Maureen is a wonderful host! I stayed in her apartment for 2 months and had a great time! 
The apartment truly exceeded my expectations: spacious room, fully equipped kitchen and bathroom in a quite, safe and very centrally located area in Montreal. 
Maureen was always friendly and kind and I enjoyed our occasional little chats on her doorway. 
She was always reachable and whenever there was a problem, she immediately took care of it.

Definitely my best Airbnb experience so far! I can only recommend staying with Maureen!
Staying at Maureen's was wonderful.

This is an entirely separate penthouse 3 bedroom. We had 4 guys stay here for a long weekend and were very comfortable. The back balcony is great for hanging out and it's very quiet at night for sleeping.

Thanks for a very comfortable stay. Parking was very easy & everything was what we expected. I liked how all windows slightly opened gave such a nice, cool & fresh air thru the entire home day & night.
We would love to stay at your place again next time we visit Montreal.
Twee
Endroit tres propre et on est tres bien recu.Tres satisfaite de ma semaine.Merci Maureen

Fantastic hospitality!
I felt at home as soon as I was welcomed by Maureen.
very close to public transport making it very easy to see the city.
Maureen was very helpful with introducing me to Montreal.
Communication with Maureen was excellent.

name: W'burg 2 bedroom w/ yard & laundry, 5 mins to L
summary: Well located true 2 bedroom apt in Williamsburg with a private yard, washer/dryer, dishwasher + on a quiet street. New kitchen & bedrooms. Eco friendly. Near bars, restaurants and transportation. 5 minutes to the subway. 15 minutes to Union Sq. Live the Brooklyn life.  Kids toys, pack and play & stroller available. Long term welcome. Please verify your ID and social media before booking.
space: Renovated two-bedroom apartment with private garden for rent in  a quiet corner of Williamsburg Brooklyn (L-train, Lorimer stop. G-train, Metropolitan stop).  Great for adults and adults with kids.  This is a completely private and separate two bedroom unit with three beds (2 Queen beds and 1 twin bed). Brand new kitchen/living room installed in October 2015.  New LED lights in the bathrooms and updated bedrooms as well.  Fun space with charm and lots of eco-friendly materials including reclaimed wood floors and non-VOC paints and insulation.   You will enter the apartment from the street level and descend three steps to a hallway with a coat closet and storage.  The ground floor has a kitchen/living room as well as a door to the yard. The living room has an L shaped couch for relaxing in front of a flat screen TV with attached chromecast.  There is a guitar to play if you know how.  The kitchen has a farm style table and is fully equipped with dishwasher, stove/oven, full size refrige
description: Well located true 2 bedroom apt in Williamsburg with a private yard, washer/dryer, dishwasher + on a quiet street. New kitchen & bedrooms. Eco friendly. Near bars, restaurants and transportation. 5 minutes to the subway. 15 minutes to Union Sq. Live the Brooklyn life.  Kids toys, pack and play & stroller available. Long term welcome. Please verify your ID and social media before booking. Renovated two-bedroom apartment with private garden for rent in  a quiet corner of Williamsburg Brooklyn (L-train, Lorimer stop. G-train, Metropolitan stop).  Great for adults and adults with kids.  This is a completely private and separate two bedroom unit with three beds (2 Queen beds and 1 twin bed). Brand new kitchen/living room installed in October 2015.  New LED lights in the bathrooms and updated bedrooms as well.  Fun space with charm and lots of eco-friendly materials including reclaimed wood floors and non-VOC paints and insulation.   You will enter the apartment from the street level and des
neighborhood_overview: Our street is very nice, quiet and residential but within 2 blocks to many wonderful restaurants and bars: Gimme Coffee, Bagel Smith, Barcade, Forcella Pizza, Le Barricou, Huckleberry Bar, Gwynnett Street and many, many more! 15 minute walk to Bedford Avenue, or 5 minutes on the subway.  Bedford Ave. is the hippest of hip.  10 minute walk to McCarren Park, which has a free large outdoor swimming pool, running track and soccer field.
notes: We travel a lot and stay in many, very different houses and apartments around the world.  We love the variety and experiencing local life.  This is not a new and empty (sterile condo).  Come and enjoy living in our house and hanging out in our neighborhood.  If you rent this apartment, you agree to let the cleaner come into the apartment to wash the sheets of the upstairs apartment if she needs to clean that apartment while you are staying at the house.  There is only one washing machine in the house, which is for your private use except if the cleaner needs access.  Also, please abide by the garbage rules and bring the garbage out on the correct days. There are in wall AC units in the livingroom/kitchen and the 2nd bedroom (kid's room).  A wall unit is available for the main bedroom, if desired.   Please make sure you have, at least, a verified ID and social media with airbnb. If you want to use the place after check out, please book an extra day.  Same goes if you come in really earl
transit: 4 blocks to the L-train at Lorimer Street (2 stops to Manhattan). Get to Union Square in Manhattan in 10 minutes! Lorimer Street is also the G-train stop at Metropolitan Avenue, which goes to Greenpoint, Carroll Gardens, and Queens.  JMZ train is a 15 minute walk.
access: The whole place is yours to enjoy but be aware that we have some things in the place.   Feel free to play the guitar, use our daughters toys/books, cook to your heart's content or hang out in the yard.  There are neighbors upstairs.  They are quiet for you and we expect the same of you for them.  Please note that the cleaner will need access to the washer/dryer for our other apt if she is cleaning that space.
interaction: We are always available on the phone or email, sometimes in person.  Happy to suggest places to go and things to do!
house_rules: By booking you agree to the following -  No smoking.  Any smoking will result in a forfeit of the entire security deposit. Cancellation - There is no cancellation after booking for any reason.  Be sure you want to book before you reserve.  This is not a hotel, once you book, I am committed to you and you are committed to me.  Please buy travel insurance if you are worried about not being able to stay.  Once you sleep in the apt, you cannot file for a refund if you are unhappy. I will work to fix all problems but if you use the space and sleep there, I will see that as a sign you are happy with it.   These rules are were written because of bad experiences with the 1% of people here with bad intentions, I am very happy to host the other 99% and have done so for years.  Airbnb is a bad platform and mediator for problems.  We will both be upset if they get involved so let's treat each other with respect and understanding.   We live here and like our neighbors so be respectful.  No parties

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I travel a lot, hate hotels, love something different.  Currently splitting time between NYC & LA.  Yes. I am that bi-coastal guy I never wanted to be.

reviews.comments:
Ryan was really helpful and the place is in a good spot. It's really close to the L train which goes into Manhattan and also one stop from the really good eating area in williamsburg.

there were renovations going (which Ryan told us about before we arrived) but it was a little daunting on the stairs on our first couple of nights with a child.  However, once we got used to it it was excellent.  

Everything is comfortable and relaxed.  Felt a lot like home but also like a different country (for us, we are Australian). the perfect brooklyn pad.

This was like home away from home. We had everything we needed and more. The bed was super comfy, the bathroom big (especially for NY), washer/dryer and we had access to a full kitchen but who could stay home to cook when there were a bunch of great restaurants all within blocks. The subway was just around the corner and only 1 stop into Manhattan. 
 5 stars for the house and the host!

We spent 3 weeks at Ryan's while on an extended visit in NYC. 

The positives: Ryan responded quickly to emails and was generally easy to communicate with. The building is in a convenient location - close to the subway, restaurants & grocery stores, neighborhood is quiet for Brooklyn. We were travelling with two kids, and Ryan made sure there was adequate sleeping arrangements (crib & kids mattress) even offering an AC unit for their bedroom during the heatwave. A leak from the upstairs tenants' bathroom created a decent-sized hole over the shower; Ryan arranged to have a plumber come out and correct the problem, although the hole itself wasn't covered while we were there, at least there wasn't more water leaking down.

The downside: AC in the listing means AC in the living room. (and in our second week a floor-standing one for the kids' room) The bedroom has a fan; ideally we would have slept with the door open for cross-ventilation, but the shared stairwell made that a little awkward..

Until I saw the layout of the building I didn't fully comprehend the "shared stairwell" -  the doors of both bedrooms, the bathroom, and the kitchen/living room open into this stairwell. Going from bedroom to bathroom means going through the shared hallway. Not sure how many people live on the upper floors, but at least 6 different people were around while I was there. You're definitely aware of being in a shared house; it's not a self-contained apartment. 

The neighbors were generally quiet - the noisiest one in the building was our youngest, who was teething at the time. Sorry to the folks upstairs - he doesn't normally yell like that! 

As Ryan mentions in the ad, the building is in the process of being renovated, so there are tools in the hallway upstairs, a stack of flooring in the bedroom, and other signs of work. 

Overall, I think this place is a good fit for folks who are looking for no-frills accommodation and don't mind a slightly-less private arrangement than your average apartment.

I stayed at Ryan & Leda’s place with three friends for a long weekend. We had a great time, the place is very well located and the neighbourhood has lots of cafés, restaurants and boutiques. There is a nice backyard where we had coffee and breakfast in the morning. Ryan was very accommodating and the communication was efficient. I would recommend the place.

The host: 
Ryan was very forthcoming for any special needs, he offered a crib for our baby, he was flexible when our arrival time got pushed and we didn't arrive until midnight and he was extremely helpful and promptly replied to any additional questions/help we needed during our stay and after (we forgot some items which he returned to us after our stay) All in all Ryan went above and beyond what we expected of a host from a private rental, he answered all enquiries promptly and made us feel very welcome. Thank you!

The house:
The advertised photo's are very true to how the apartment looks. It is a very cozy home in two levels with lots of personal items to make it feel like home. If your travelling with a child there are a lot of toys in the house and the kids room is very cute (my personal favourite spot inside the house). The house is still being renovated so don't expect everything to look perfect and there are building materials stored behind the bed, but it is clean and tidy.
We arrived the day that the temperature dropped to freezing for the first time this winter. There seemed to be an issue with the central heating, but with individual heaters in both the living room on the ground floor, and the kids room on the first floor, the house stayed toasty warm as long as the doors to the rooms were kept open.
Because of the freezing temperatures we did not utilise the outdoor back area at all, which means that the place is a little pricy for what you get, but if we ever come back during the summer we will definitely think about staying here again.

Area:
The area is exactly as advertised. The place is situated in a quiet street in close walking distances to most things you may need on a holiday such as a grocery store, cafe with good coffee, bagel shop and the metro line going in to Manhattan. A bit further away, but still an easy walk, is the cool Bedford st area, with parks, cafe's, restaurants, shops and bars.

Ryan and Leda's place is great, especially if you're traveling with kids. They left info about the neighborhood to make it easier to navigate. Plenty of toys for our kiddos to play with. Place was near and clean. Would definitely use again!

Ryan did a great job making sure we had all the information we needed for our stay and communicated promptly.  The location of his home could not have been more perfect for us, just a block and a half down the street from our son, as well as very close proximity to the subway, ensuring easy access to Manhattan.  The flat is just down the street from an incredible cheese and sandwich shop, Campbell's, and near to several good restaurants and bagel shops.  The neighborhood feels safe and we were comfortable walking around and to and fro the subway, day or night.  We were pleased to see that our young adult son has settled into such a nice, fun area.  The apartment was clean - and is spacious, for Williamsburg.  We did not cook, but all the amenities to do so were there.  It is not a hotel, it is a home.  Clean bedding and towels were provided and we enjoyed our stay.  Thanks, Ryan and Leda for working with us.
Rtan and Keda made us feel very welcome. The apartment was well prepared for our stay. The location was also great.

The location was great and the hosts were very professional and easy to work with. The rooms were comfortable and the street is extraordinarily quiet. Great alternative to the limited hotels in Williamsburg.

Nous avons passé une super semaine à Williamsburg.
L'appartement est très agréable et bien placé.
Il vient d'être rénové et tout est en très bon état.
La rue est calme et le métro pas très loin. Il y a aussi des bus juste à côté.
Nous n'avons pas croisé Ryan, mais la communication par courriel et par téléphone a été efficace et rapide, parfait !
On se sent bien dans cet appartement qui ne fait pas vide ou impersonnel, mais au contraire chaleureux et habité !
Ryan nous a même conseillé une babysitter, qui a été parfaite !
Nous recommandons donc cet appartement et y retournerons avec plaisir si nous revenons à Brooklyn !
Merci !

Ryan and Leda have a lovely, comfortable home that is just steps away from everything Brooklyn has to offer. The neighborhood is a quieter section of Williamsburg, but has a respectable amount of bars, shops, and restaurants (Northern Bell, Alligator Lounge, Harefield Road) and several late-night green grocers. It's minutes from the L, which takes you into Manhattan in less than 10 minutes. 

The flat is pretty spacious, and the four of us were comfortable in 2 bedrooms, with clean linens and fresh towels. The downstairs has a great kitchen and living room for lounging after exploring all day. We did experience some issues with the key to the front door sticking but Ryan was very responsive and helped us out. Otherwise, great value for the money and would stay here again.

If I could describe this experience with one word, it would be: amazing!!! Ryan and Leda's place was absolutely perfect for our needs and Ryan was extremely responsive to my inquiries via text. There were a lot of details that I would not have considered that they had already taken care of without me asking: (e.g. soap for the dishwasher, clean towels available, and trash bags, etc.). And after someone had apparently stolen their lightbulbs, Ryan so graciously stopped by with more even though we had a convenient work around or could have bought them ourselves.  This was my first Airbnb experience, but I would definitely do it again if they were all like this. When we return to NY, we are checking for Ryan and Leda's availability first, for sure!

Thanks Ryan & Leda. your home is so sweet. my parents was so happy can stay in your home. we got everything, full function kitchen, washing machine, dryer... etc. especially it's very close to subway station. ^^ we had wonderful and great christmas in NYC.

Ha sido una experiencia increíble. La casa era igual que en las fotos. Luminosa, las camas muy cómodas y un salón y cocina muy acogedor. Yo conocí a Ryan y fue super simpático y dispuesto a ayudar. Nos sentimos agusto durante toda la estancia. El barrio tiene la localización perfecta, a una parada de williamsburg y a dos de manhattan. Y si prefieres quedarte por la zona está lleno de buenos restaurantes donde comer.
Recomiendo mucho la estancia!

Perfect family stay for discovering NYC, well equipped, clean, good atmosphere and surrounding in Wiiliamsburg, very near ro Manhattan via L Train. Communicative and helpful hosts. We enjoyed it very much, many thanks.

Nous avons passé 10 jours très agréables chez Ryan et Leda. Leur maison est très chaleureuse et bien équipée: on s'y sent comme chez soi et le quartier de Williamsburg est très sympa et la rue est très calme. Il y a tous les magasins, restos, bars, salles de concert etc. à quelques minutes de marche. Le métro est à 5 mn et la ligne L vous amène directement à Manhattan en 10/15 mn. Ryan a toujours répondu très vite à nos demandes et a été très arrangeant: il nous a notamment permis de laisser nos valises chez lui (notre avion était en fin de journée). Il nous avait même laissé en cadeau un crédit de $25 dans un wine bar très chouette! Une expérience très positive. Je recommande cette adresse sans aucune hésitation.

We had a fantastic stay at Ryan and Leda's apartment in Brooklyn. Ryan was very helpful and gave us lots of information leading up to our trip, and met us at the apartment and suggested some local places to try. The apartment was great- exactly how it looks in the photos, clean and bright with a lovely new kitchen- a good shower too which is a must! The bottle of wine on arrival was a nice touch too. We will be back for sure!

We spent a very nice week in Ryan and Leda's charming w:burg house.
Nicely located with ample opportunities both for transport as well as dining and just hanging out.
Ryan was the perfect host supplying every information needed

The house is exactly as in pictures. A very comfortable and pleasant place, and even though we were three it can comfortably accommodate 5 people. The kitchen is well equipped for cooking which I enjoyed. The host is responsive and available to help with queries. Good internet.

Ryan is so helpful and  always had quick responses. 
The property is in a beautiful area and is close to everything. Only 2 stops on the subway to Manhattan. 
Glad we were able to call it home for 5 days. 
Thanks Ryan & Leda

Had a great holiday staying at ryan&leda's place with our group of four. The apartment is spacious and clean, and the private backyard is a nice bonus. Location is great for exploring williamsburg by foot and subway station to manhattan is just five min walk away. We can warmly recommend this lovely home away from home - thank you!

Great location. Very clean and organised place to stay. Great wifi and helpful hosts. Easy communication to help with some problems- even with the host in another country. Great to have a backyard and a place to chill out of Manhattan . Worth the time spent on the subway.

Our stay in Ryan and Leda's apartment was great. The place is perfect for a family with kids, lots of space, nice kitchen and bedrooms, very good air conditionner. 
The neighbourhood is lively, full of good restaurants, groceries. 
We particularly appreciated being so close to the subway : only 5 minutes away from L and G lines.
We highly recommend this apartment.

This was a terrific way to explore Williamsburg and New York. Ryan sent us a document full of tips and recomendations. The house was perfect for our family. The kitchen was a special treat as it has everything you need (and more). We felt confortable and had a great time. Thanks Ryan!!!

Apartment was everything we were looking for and matched the description provided. An info sheet prior to arrival was useful, and the communication with Ryan was uncomplicated. I would recommend the appartment if you choose Williamsburg as your destination of choice when in NYC.

Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit und alles war so wie wir es erwartet hatten! Großartige Unterkunft, perfekte Kommunikation mit Ryan, ideale Entfernung zu öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln, sehr nette Nachbarschaft mit guten Restaurants und Kneipen... Ryan, danke nochmal für deine tollen Tipps! Absolut weiter zu empfehlen!

I had a great time with my friends at Ryan and Leda's place. Everything was well-organized, clean, and comfortable. 
It was easy to get in touch with the host. He was helpful and gave us quick answers we needed. 
Most of all, the location is perfect! Nice cafes, restaurants, and a supermarket are just around the corner. Just 15-20 minutes from the door to Mahattan.
I highly recommend this cozy place.
Thanks Ryan!
My family enjoyed our stay.  The apartment is clean and well stocked.  It's also an easy walk to the subway and a quick ride to Manhattan.  Ryan was very easy to communicate with.
Die Unterkunft war so wie angegeben und sehr angenehm. Die Lage war tip top. Die U Bahn Station um die Ecke bringt einem in wenigen Minuten nach Manhattan.

Lovely and spacious apartment, great location, we had a fantastic time! Ryan provided us with all information we needed, everything went smoothly. We'll definitely come back next time we're in New York.

Unser Aufenthalt bei Ryan & Leda war sehr familiär. Wir waren zu viert im Appartement. Die Unterkunft ist für mehrere Personen super geeignet. Mit Ryan standen wir permanent in Kontakt und er hat uns sehr wertvolle Tipps zu unserem Standort Williamsburg gegeben. Die Nachbarschaft war sehr ruhig und ich kann jedem, der einen längeren Aufenthalt in New York plant, nur empfehlen in Brooklyn / Williamsburg zu wohnen. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.

Notre séjour chez Ryan et Leda s'est très bien passé ! L'appartement est très chaleureux et agréable et suffisamment spacieux pour s'y sentir bien à 5. Le salon et la cuisine sont très fonctionnels, il y a tous les équipements nécessaires. La literie est très confortable.  Il est assez proche de NYC (seulement 10 minutes en metro avec la ligne L), et le quartier a beaucoup de charme et de commerces à disposition. Ryan est très disponible et répond très rapidement aux questions. Nous avons vraiment passé une très belle semaine à Brooklyn

La casa de Ryan & Leda está muy bien situada en el este de Williamsburg, muy cerca de la estación de Lorimer St y de Metropólitan Av, y a un corto paseo una de las zonas más cool de New York.  Es un duplex muy espacioso, en el piso bajo cocina, comedor y salón en una sola habitación y dos dormitorios y baño en la de arriba, quizás el único inconveniente es que la escalera para el apartamento superior atravesaba nuestro hueco de escalera y podía resultar algo ruidoso. La calle es muy tranquila, sin ruidos, pero muy cerca de supermercados, restaurantes y zona de ocio. La cocina está equipada con todo tipo de utensilios y electrodomésticos. Y se puede conectar el ipad a la televisión para ver lo que tú desees, nosotros por ejemplo veíamos Netflix por ella. Tiene un jardín trasero que aunque nosotros no usamos por el clima imaginamos que deber ser muy agradable en verano.  Aunque no vimos a Ryan la comunicación con él fue siempre fluida y eficaz.
Great place in Brooklyn, eat access to the whole city.  Great for families!
Nice place
Amazing place!! Location and space was.
Great kitchen for cooking.

Our stay at Ryan's was just perfect. He was incredibly helpful answering all of our questions about things to do in NYC, esp. with a 6-years old. He then was totally reactive during our stay about technical questions.
The apartment was really pleasant: very bright, with 2 bedrooms upstairs for the 5 of us and a large living room downstairs. It is located just 15 minutes walk+subway from Union Square - so absolutely convenient for all sorts of things. And the tips that Ryan gave about the local area (small shops or places to eat) were much appreciated. Just perfect !

Great space with fun toys for our infant son.  Convenient location walk-able to great shops and restaurants.  Apartment was very clean and comfortable for multi-day stay.  Hosts were easily accessible and have great tastes in movies.

This apartment could not have been more perfect for our family. It was on a quiet street just two train stops from Manhattan. The beds were more than comfortable with warm comforters and soft but sturdy pillows. The two story layout gave us plenty of room to spread out. The kitchen had everything we needed to have meals in when we didn't eat out. But was close to restaurants, bakeries, grocery stores and coffee shops. I would stay here again if we come to NY again with our family.

This place was perfect.  It was clean, user-friendly and very comfortable.  Our host, Ryan, was incredibly accessible and accommodating.  The place had everything we needed.  My two kids and I were in a pinch and needed a place fast - Ryan went out of his way to make it work for us.  Really exceptional service.  Sincerely, Ray M

Ryan's place is great! It was clean, had everything we needed and was close walking distance to great coffee and the train station. The beds were really comfortable too and the kitchen is well equipped for cooking. The apartment feels very secure and Ryan is very easy to communicate with. I didn't want to leave, it felt like home! Would definitely recommend this place.
Great place, a home from home, excellent location and neighbourhood.
Great location and good size bedrooms!

Ryan's apartment was perfect for us. Near the L train, groceries and lots of nice places in the neighbourhood. Comunication with Ryan, check in and check out were fast and easy. If you have kids, the place is perfect for you! Many toys and books, the kids enjoyed it a lot. Beds were confortable and kitchen is full equipped if you want to cook. We would stay there again for sure!
Buena ubicación a un buen precio.

15 minutes from this apartment's living room to Manhattan on the L train (including walking).

2 bedrooms with AC and good sound insulation from the other parts of the apartment. Great if you have small children or light sleepers. 

Toys and books for toddlers, fantastic main room/kitchen. 

The stairs to the bathroom and bedroom are steep, so if you have trouble with stairs might not be the best choice (Our 3 year old had no issues). Multiple large grocery stores and countless restaurants within a couple of blocks.

Overall an ideal place unless you have a problem with stairs.

We stayed at Ryan's place for a week and really enjoyed our time. The house is in a great location near the L train, a short Subway trip into Manhattan while also having lots to do locally. As first time visitors to New York it made things very easy to get around. 

Ryan also gave us plenty of helpful local tips and was very friendly to deal with. Thanks for having us, we had a great time.

L'appartement de Ryan est très bien situé, dans un quartier calme, très bien équipé, il permet de se sentir comme chez soi. Ryan est disponible si vous avez un souci, il répond rapidement. A recommander.

Appartement très bien situé dans Brooklin, proche du métro, de Manhattan, de commerces et restau sympas. Calme et agréable avec terrasse, et pour l'option cosy, une salle de séjour pour diner à la maison et passer une  soirée films sur NYC, après une grande journée de marche dans la ville.

Estuvimos en casa de Ryan del 6 al 13 de Noviembre. La casa está bien es espaciosa para 4 personas que estuvimos, la cocina y comedor completamente nuevos. La ubicación es perfecta es una zona tranquila pero muy cerca de todo y muy bien comunicada por la línea L que te lleva a Manhattan en 15 minutos. Nuestra valoración es bunea.

I would highly recommend Ryan's place, especially for anyone travelling with small children. I stayed there for the weekend with my 15 month old daughter. It was perfect, not only to have toys and books to keep her engaged and entertained, but the layout is such that I could close off access to hallways and stairs, keeping her safe when I was occupied with things like cooking. Ryan went out of his way to arrange for portable crib for us and was easy to get a hold of with any questions. It was my first time staying in Brooklyn, versus the city and I'm glad I chose this Airbnb. It's located on a quiet, friendly street, where I could sleep soundly without the sound of noisy traffic (and on a comfy memory foam mattress), but still close to shops and restaurant. This place is charming and cozy and it was very easy to feel at home. Also, as other reviews mentioned, the water pressure in the shower is sublime.
Great place great line of communication with Ryan would defiantly stay again
Quartier très calme à proximité du métro et des commerces. Logement impeccable pour 4 personnes et un enfant. Ryan présent à l'arrivée et joignable si nécessaire. À recommander

Perfect location and perfect airbnb experience. Ryan is very quick to respond with any needs- the place is immaculate- I would come back in a heartbeat. If you have any hesitation throw em away! Rent this spot!
Nice place! Beds are comfortable. Shower is good. Location is perfect.
Clean house
Très bon rapport qualité prix
Ryan's apartment was a comfortable place to stay while visiting NYC. It's in a quiet neighborhood that's within walking distance of local amenities and train stations.

The first thing to mention about Ryan's place would be location. It's perfect for jumping on the L train in either direction. The nearest station Lorimar st is less than a 10 min walk away which is much needed with 2 kids in tow.   The local area is great with a nice pizza joint (sals) and a well stocked supermarket to pick up the essentials. The apartment was very clean and the large washing machine and dryer came in very handy. Checking in and out was flawless and Ryan responded instantly with any queries. Would definitely stay at Ryan's place again, perfect for a family of 4

Maison typique, familiale, dans un quartier calme et agréable, proches des commerces, des restau et du métro. Son emplacement est idéal pour s'éloigner un peu de Manhattan, tout en restant à proximité grâce au métro (15 min d'Union Square). 
Tout est mis à disposition pour passer un séjour "comme à la maison", avec également une grande disponibilité de Ryan.
Nice place.
We all loved this home. Nice and clean and close to everything. I can highly recommend this to anyone looking for a place in Brooklyn.

Nach einer Woche Aufenthalt können wir Ryans Unterkunft sehr empfehlen. Sie ist ruhig und sauber, für 4 Personen wirklich geräumig, die Küche sehr gut ausgestattet. Die Lage ist außerordentlich günstig, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sind nah, auch ist man in kurzer Zeit in Manhattan.

Ryan's place worked out perfectly for our family of four; the space is very clean and the layout (beds/bath upstairs, kitchen/living area downstairs) is great.  We made a few meals as grocery stores are nearby and the kitchen is well stocked with cooking supplies.  The location in Williamsburg is good for walking to the many restaurants and coffee shops  nearby and also a short walk to the L train (subway).  I'd highly recommend staying at Ryan's!
Thank You
Very spacious, great for a small family with large rooms and split living sleeping areas! A new kitchen also which is very nice
Ryan's wohnung ist super, wir waren zu 4 und haben alles gefunden was nötig war. Ryan antwortet sehr schnell auf anfragen, ich kann seine Wohnung nur weiterempfehlen.
Great host, good location and fair price

Good space, layout and amenities in a great location. Our family of four stayed at Ryan's place the week of July 4th to see sights (Statue of Liberty, Ellis Island, Empire State Building, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Brooklyn Museum, American Natural History Museum) and hang out with friends near Union Square in Manhattan. We'd definitely recommend it for travelers with similar destinations in mind. Being just a few blocks from the L and G subway lines was perfect for zipping into Manhattan or getting elsewhere in Brooklyn.

The apartment feels quiet, private and secure; we heard barely a peep from the guests in the top-floor unit or the rest of neighborhood, with the exception of a few fireworks on the 4th. The layout -- with bedrooms upstairs and kitchen and living areas downstairs -- worked well to let our kids sleep while we got our morning caffeine fix or enjoyed TV or music to wind down at night. The bedrooms and bathroom were just as large as those in our suburban single-family home, and the whole place was thoughtfully furnished. Street parking seemed plentiful, and Ryan provided all the tips we needed for nearby grocery stores, restaurants and parks. His communications were friendly, prompt and clear.

If traveling with very young children or people who could have trouble with stairs, bear in mind that the two floors are connected by a narrow and somewhat uneven staircase.

My wife and I stayed here with her sister and niece for a few days of NYC tourism. The two bedrooms were comfortable. Nice colorful and safe neighborhood. Yes it is crowded street parking only but I didn't have much trouble finding a spot. For us, the 4 minute walk to the subway station was great. just another few minutes on the L train and we were in Manhattan. You can easily go deeper downtown by transferring at the Union Square station. The apt is just skip away from a grocery store, coffee shops, and pizza places.  Great all around would stay again.
Ryan was very hospitable and his home was lovely to stay in. In an excellent location close to some amazing restaurants and shops. His backyard was a treat and the bed was very comfortable.
Great location, comfortable and easy place to stay with our six month old. Thanks Ryan!
Great place. Fully equipped house. Better than any other Arbnb I’ve been. The only thing a bit noisy our neighbours upstairs.

It was our first AirBNB experience and Ryan’s place was just fabulous. The beds are very comfy, the air con very much appreciated, the washing machine and dryer invaluable with children! Ryan answered questions quickly, has great tips and has a lovely stylish home. The pool at McCarren Park is great (check the strict rules) and you’re just a few minutes from the L train. We’d go back without a doubt.

Ryan's place is so perfectly positioned- easy walk to amazing bars and places to eat, but on a quiet, friendly street.  The house is spacious, huge bedrooms and the added bonus of kids things like toys and a portable crib is a lifesaver for those with kids.  Ryan is an absolute pleasure to deal with and very responsive, would absolutely stay at his fantastic house again!

El alojamiento de Ryan no es de lujo pero tiene todo lo necesario para pasar unos días muy agradables en Nueva York. Está cerca de la línea L del metro que en pocos minutos te lleva a Unión Square desde donde puedes planificar cualquier ruta en Manhatan. A Ryan no lo conocí pero al llegar tuvimos un problema con el lock de abertura y lo solucionó inmediatamente. Destacaria sobre todo que no hay trampa y es  es tal y como sale en Airbnb.

We had a good stay here at Ryan's. We were able to commute to the L train and bus stop B48 within 5 to 7 minutes. Sometimes its better to take the buses than to take the subways. The subways are super packed and it's hot, plus a lot of stairs u p.k and down.  Be sure to buy a metro card for a week, its worth it. When we first got there it was tricky because we had to go through one door to get to the true entrance door. I loved that there was a washer and dryer. There was dish soap and plenty of toilet paper for us for a week. I also loved that there were plenty of towels. We couldn't figure out how to work the coffee machine,  it would be nice to have a note near the coffee maker on how to work it or it didn't work.  The coffee shop on main st called Porto Rico was good there was also tea. We liked that there was a TV with chromecast. However, we would have liked to watch the local news. Cable would have been nice. We had our 2 year old daughter with us and they had a full size stroller which was helpful but it was dirty and crumbs everywhere. There was a playpen that they had and it was nice. In the second room in the bottom drawers there were clothes in there. It would be nice to not have personal items at an airbnb.  There were personal items in the bathroom too. In the bathroom the heater has a cover that kept falling. Keep in mind there are stairs that go to the 2 bedrooms and to the bathroom. It does state in the posting that there are stairs so we knew this coming in. The bathroom was dirty with dust and hair.  Downstairs is a 1/4 bathroom that has a sink and mirror only.  Other than the few things we mentioned that we didnt like, my family and I would stay again.  Thank you Ryan for letting us stay at your place.

This was a great place to stay.   It’s a well appointed home with all the amenities you need.  Wonderful beds in high ceiling rooms.  Great location with nearby subway, really good cafe, restaurants.  
The neighborhood feels save and is quiet.  The host is very responsive.  We would stay again.

Ryan’s place is great to see Manhattan and Brooklyn even for a longer stay. We were traveling as a party of 4, the apartment was very spacious and is even bigger than it looks in the photos. The kitchen is well equipped to cook at home but there are also plenty of places in walking distance if you enjoy eating out. Downtown Manhattan is just a short subway ride away. We would definitely recommend the place to everyone, also families, and would love to come again. Thanks!

We had a lovely stay at Ryan’s home in Williamsburg. Ryan was excellent to communicate with and allowed us to drop our bags off before check-in when I requested it with rather short notice. The weather was chilly and his home was worm and comfortable. We were thankful to have the use of the stroller at the bnb for our 6 month old. The beds were comfortable and the whole apt has a pleasant  aesthetic that makes you feel like you are in a home and not a hotel. The maps and the info pack provided were extremely helpful. The plumbing is a bit old and delicate but wife was fast. 
Thanks Ryan!
