Tout le confort est là pour passer un très bon séjour chez Ryan. Le quartier est très calme et la literie est très bonne ce qui permet de se reposer après les longues journées à marcher dans cette ville incroyable! Il est très facile de se déplacer car le métro est très proche.

Ryan was a great host . His place in  Williamsburg was  A lot of fun and perfectly located within walking distance of fun wine shops , coffee shops, and the subway !  His place had a lot of space & a really great common area and had everything you needed for your stay .  His communication was quick and thorough. We would definitely suggest it to a friend !!

L'appartement est parfait pour un séjour à New York : proximité des transports (20 min de Manhattan) et des commerces, très bien équipé et très bien chauffé et situé dans un endroit calme.
Un vrai plus : la literie est d'excellente  qualité ce qui permet de bien se reposer pour profiter pleinement des journées intenses de visite de New York. Allez-y les yeux fermés !

Great apartment (kitchen + living room downstairs and 2 bedrooms + toilet upstairs) and location! Quiet and safe neighborhood. Lots of places to eat and drink nearby. Only few minutes to subway station and few minutes ride to Manhattan. Ryan is easy to contact and answers quickly.

Especially we liked that the sheets hasn't been washed using odored washing liquid. And the bed at the smaller bedroom was so good! I want that same mattress to our home! :)
Great location and perfect for our family of four.
Very Nice stay and very Nice host who  responds  very quickly. Very convenient location un Brooklyn/Williamsburg.
Lovely house and super comfy beds. Very easy to get around & the neighborhood is really nice too! Thanks Ryan (-:
Apartment was comfortable and in perfect location. Streets were blissfully quiet at night and the beds very soft and comfortable. I got really restive sleep each night I stayed. Would stay again
We had a great time staying at Ryan's. The house was very clean and calm. We also appreciated the location of the apt with convenient shops and the metro line nearby.

It's kinda a shame that 5 is the standard for good, because it takes away from the truly excellent 5 stars like Ryan! 

The place was great, the neighborhood was great, the host was extremely attentive and quick to respond.  I would stay at one of their places again without question.

name: Nice place to stay
summary: A nice place to stay while your are visiting Rio de Janeiro. Very well located, where you can find the best restaurants, good place to visit in the South Zone of the city.
space: Is very near the beach, four blocks. Clean, wide, silence, very ventilated and very well located.
description: A nice place to stay while your are visiting Rio de Janeiro. Very well located, where you can find the best restaurants, good place to visit in the South Zone of the city. Is very near the beach, four blocks. name: LARGE GREAT STUDIO HELLS KITCHEN
space: The apartment is bright with 2 big windows for natural sun light, lots of space, and is very private and quiet. The apartment features a beautiful white exposed brick wall and mid-century modern furniture, including a work desk with office chair, 2 sofas, and a huge Queen-sized bed. You will have access to the entire apartment:  an extremely comfortable Queen-sized bed and closet space, living space with 2 comfy couches and a 42-inch TV with an hdmi cable for laptops and streaming services, full kitchen and bathroom, and free WIFI. The apartment is on the 4th floor of a walk-up building and you'll have access to the coin-operated laundry in the basement as well. I will be present at check-in/-out and you can call if you need anything. I've lived in Hell's Kitchen (also called Clinton) ever since I moved to NYC 4 years ago, I love it! Its always changing with new restaurants and bars to check out, the environment is very fun and lively. This apartment is my favorite I've had, you can't

host.host_about:
Hi, 
I'm a young professional living in New York city.  5 things I can't do without are smoothies, air conditioning, traveling, friends and family. Some of my favorite travel spots are Chicago, LA, and Tokyo.  

 I keep my studio clean and tidy, its right in the heart of Hell's Kitchen, and is a 10 minute walk to the Times Square area.  Having me as a guest is great as I'm clean and like to keep things organized, since I'm architect.  Let me know if you have any additional questions!

reviews.comments: We had an amazing stay with Valmik. The studio was spacious and clean. Valmik was so kind to leave us a NYE care package. He also left us bathroom necessities as well. The check in and out process was fast and easy. He accommodated all of our needs. We will definitely be staying there again if we are back in NY. It was even better than staying in a hotel, as we did the first three days because we had so much more room!
The host canceled this reservation 57 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Host was fantastic. Everything was clean and orderly. He was extremely flexible when it came to collecting and returning the keys. He exceeded our expectations on all levels. The area has a TON of great bars and restaurants.

name: welcom home
summary: That spotless and bright apartment is located on the second floor of a Duplex in Villeray, one of the most pleasant districts in Montreal. Villeray is a multifaceted charming district.
space: It is composed of two bedrooms with a double bed in each; a bathroom with all necessary amenities like a washing machine and a dryer; and a well-equipped kitchen with a cooker and microwave included. Last but not least, a large balcony opens up the view at the back of the apartment. Up to six persons can take place in the apartment providing the addition of a very comfortable air mattress which can be supplied (additional charge). Barbecue and washing line are also available.

It is composed of two bedrooms with a double bed in each; a bathroom with all necessary amenities like a washing machine and a dryer; and a well-equipped kitchen with a cooker and microwave included. Last but not least, a large balcony opens up the view at the back of the apartment. Up to six persons can take place in the apartment providing the addition of a very comfortable air mattress which can be supplied (additional charge). Barbecue and washing line are also available. neighborhood_overview: Tout est à  proximité : restaurant, café, tapas , marché jean-talon, parc jarry, cartier italien bref tout  pour passer un bon séjour.
notes: I speak French, English and Spanish For any additional information, do not hesitate to contact me. I will be delighted to make you share my love for my town.

access: Near at hand, you can take a walk in its green parks, especially the one in Jarry. Shopping is easy in Jean-talon market with its variegated stalls of fruit, vegetables, maple syrup, its bustling activity and its typical atmosphere. You can pay a visit to Little Italy to sip a cup of real Italian coffee! As to eating out, there is plenty of choice between numerous restaurants, microbreweries, pastry shops and bakeries. For those who love shopping or new discoveries, there is Saint-Hubert Plaza two minutes away from Villeray. Going home from downtown in a few minutes by bus is quite easy by day and by night. To give you some information: -Castelnau tube: 10 mn walk -Jean-Talon tube: 5 mn walk  -Bus 30 (day/night: 1 mn walk -Airport: 20 mn by car -In front of Bixi
house_rules: -It goes without saying that respect is a must -Pets are unfortunately not allowed -Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the apartment.

host.host_about: Je suis une maman qui vit dans Villeray depuis 2007, je suis tombée en amour avec le cartier, j'ai autour de moi la possibilité d'exercer avec mes enfants toutes sortes d'activités, marche exercice, patinage, natation et tant d'autres. Cela ne m’empêche pas de découvrir une multitude de restaurants et je suis toujours surprie

reviews.comments: Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans l'appartement. Tout était parfait, merci à Ichraf pour son accueil et sa disponibilité!
Was very accommodating, she met us late at night. We were late. No problems with anything . Very clean and nicely decorated. Washer and drier was handy as well as great balcony and location

Ichraf was very friendly and welcoming.  The apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures.  It was comfortable and we really loved the balcony and BBQ.  Our only concern was that the parking was on the street.  We really appreciated the small things Ichraf thought of like milk and cereal, coffee, spices, etc.

Ichraf is a wonderful host. The apartment was clean and had all the amenities you could need. It's a perfect sample of Montreal living in a great part of town with easy access to food and transit.
Couldn't recommend it it more. Great value. Great place.

[Le français ci-dessous]

Ichraf's apartment is very comfortable and well-maintained. It has two good-sized bedrooms in addition to a long common space, so it was a good place for our family with two young children. She was able to accommodate our late arrival, and even came to check everything was OK once she heard that I'd arrived. She was very friendly, and (in contrast to some other Montreal hosts) quickly responded to messages. We had a very good experience. One thing to note -- parking is street parking as opposed to located on the property.

---

L'appartement d'Ichraf est très confortable et en bonne forme. Il y a deux chambres d'une bonne taille ainsi qu'une espace partagée assez longue, donc c'était un bon choix pour ma famille et moi avec nos deux jeunes enfants.  Elle était capable d'accommoder notre arrivée tardive, et elle est même venue me voir pour vérifier que tout allait bien dès qu'elle a entendu que j'étais arrivé. Elle était très gentille, et (contrairement à plusieurs hôtes à Montréal) elle a répondu vite aux messages. Notre expérience était très bonne. Une chose a constater -- le stationnement est dans la rue, plutôt que sur la propriété.

Great welcome by Ichraf who greeted us on our more than late arrival. The location although not central is about 10 yards from a Bixi (Montreal bicycle rental) station. We bicycled back from downtown Montreal to the apartment and felt very safe. Overall, a great experience.
Ichraf nous a très bien accueillis ! Elle est restée disponible durant notre séjour pour répondre à nos questions. Ce fut un très beau début de séjour en Amérique pour toute la famille.

One of my first times using Airbnb and I was very happy with the stay. The apartment was just as described and my friends and I loved it!! Ichraf greated us on arrival and left the place stocked with everything we needed. I highly recommend it! :)
Ichraf was very welcoming.  She left us some juice and fruit in the frig.  The place was very clean and the location was very easy to get to.  It was a quiet neighborhood.

J’ai loué cet appartement pour des amis qui venaient d’outremer. Ils ont été accueillis chaleureusement par Ichraf, une femme très agréable et serviable. Son appartement est très propre, organisé et bien équipé. Elle a répondu très rapidement à mes courriels et elle est resté disponible pour répondre aux questions de ses invités. Ichraf a mis du Lait, du beurre, du Jus d’orange, de la confiture et du pain dans son frigo pour les invités. J’ai trouvé ca très gentil de ça part. Je n’ai aucune hésitation de vous recommander l’appartement d’Ichraf.

I have rented this big apartment for some friends who came from overseas. They had a smooth arrival and everything was well prepared by Icharf a sweet host. Her apartment is very clean, organized and very well equipped. Ichraf responded quickly to my emails and she provided my guests with milk, bread, juice, and jam when they arrived, which is very nice from a host.  I definitely recommend Ichraf’s apartment.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We stayed here for 3 nights and had great fun. Apartment is very clean and is in a safe neighbourhood. Ichraf responds to questions very quickly and has shared good information on local area attractions. Will surely consider staying here for our next trip.
The host canceled this reservation 143 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Place is just nice and clean. Great communication. Will stay again if needed.
Lchraf's place was perfect for us and exactly as described! Good central location. Very clean. Nice porch. Fast internet. All in all great stay. Hope to come again!
Très bon accueil. Accès facile et bel appartement pas loin du métro Jean Talon.
It was a nice place to stay. I would recommend it!

The place is very good located close to the market Jean Talo and little Italy! It is a little bit far from the center but it was definitely a good option if you like the area and it is definitily something to experience!!:)
Great

Great location. Me and a few buddies stayed here for the weekend. Great location. Nearby food spots. Parking wasn't hard to find. We did find a broken light fixture in the kitchen as it had come off its hinges. Nothing major. Balcony was great for a cool down. Listing was as described. I would recommend. Great house, great location. Ichraf was a little behind on responding to messages, but we figured everything out.
Nice clean and cozy

I stayed here with my husband and his mom for 5 days, and we felt very comfortable from the moment of arrival. The place is just as advertised, nothing fancy but very clean, well equipped and cozy. Ichraf is a friendly and helpful hostess, living right next door. Location is good, with only 10-15 min. walks to metro, stadium, and Jean-Talon market. Not much choice for restaurants in the immediate vicinity, but that was not an issue for us. Would definitely stay here again! Perfect for either families or friends.
Lovely home, photos were accurate, checking in and out was easy and at our convenience.

Very clean and well kept.  Great location and easy access to a number of places.  Would not suggest staying during the summer months - it was very uncomfortable, especially in the bedrooms, at night with no air circulation. Would definitely stay again - just during a cooler time of the year.
Despite a minor issues we had a good stay overall.  The location is great and host is responsive.
Great location in a fun neighborhood.

Ichraf a été souriante tout le long du séjour! J'avais loué pour de la famille et ils ont été ravis. L'appartement est proche d'une station de métro principale ainsi que du marché Jean-Talon, un incontournable!

The place was perfect for a group and located in a cool area with lots of unique places near by. Ichraf was very responsive and easy to coordinate with. We loved our stay and would certainly recommend this place to other travelers.

Logement bien situé, propre et bien équipé, idéal pour un séjour en (Website hidden by Airbnb) faut aussi souligner l accueil chaleureux et la disponibilité d Ichraf ! Je recommande ce logement avec plaisir !!
Nice place! Lovely back patio.
Beautiful little place! Clean, good neighborhood, and many options within walking distance. Our favorite moment was relaxing on the back porch, drinking beers and playing board games.

name: Grand appartement pour un séjour idéal, 3 chambres
summary: Grand appartement meublé tout inclus, 3 chambres, très propre et très lumineux dans le quartier de Verdun à Montréal. Secteur très calme à quelques minutes de tous les services. Proche des stations de métro De l'Église ou Lasalle sur la ligne verte. Accès rapide par transport en commun au centre-ville et au vieux Montréal. Situé également près de plusieurs écoles et universités, idéal pour des étudiants qui souhaiteraient partager l'appartement.
space: Grand logement de 90 m2 environ au premier étage d'un triplex. Calme et chaleureux, très bien entretenu, pouvant accueillir confortablement  5 personnes. Chaque chambre est équipée d'un lit de qualité et de meubles de rangement. Salle de bain rénovée. La cuisine est lumineuse, très fonctionnelle et bien équipée. Grand salon double avec coin repas pour 6 personne, télévision avec lecteur DVD seulement (pas de câble), choix d'une centaine de films (sur demande) et accès internet illimité par wifi.  4 électroménagers récents, incluant lave-linge et sécheuse dans l'appartement. Tout est fourni, vaisselle, linge de maison etc.. Il y a un beau balcon en arrière du logement avec vue paisible sur les jardins. Vous n'avez pas accès au jardin. Le ménage de l'appartement est fait à fond entre chaque location.

neighborhood_overview: C'est la campagne en ville !! Secteur très calme avec la rue commerçante Wellington à quelques minutes de marche. Tous les services sont à proximité, petits commerces ''style européen'', épicerie, salon de thé, fromagerie, boulangerie, SAQ (vins et alcools), fruiterie, pharmacie, beaucoup de restaurants etc.... et même une micro-brasserie très populaire, le BENELUX. Également à proximité (25 minutes de marche), le marché Atwater et le canal Lachine.  Le fleuve est tout proche pour faire une belle promenade ou une partie de pêche. Ne pas manquer les rapides de Lachine... Les stations de métro Lasalle ou De l'Église sur la ligne verte, sont à 7 minutes de marche, accès facile à la ligne orange par correspondance à la station Lionel-Groulx. Par ces 2 lignes vous avez accès rapidement à toutes les activités culturelles et artistiques du centre ville et du vieux Montréal. Le quartier comporte beaucoup d’espaces verts et le fleuve est à 15 minutes de marche.  De nombreuses activités de plein
notes: J'ai de la difficulté à parler anglais alors si c'est possible, correspondez avec moi en français. Merci!
transit: Accès facile au métro et aux autobus. Le stationnement d'une voiture se fait sans difficulté sur la rue en avant de l'appartement mais il est réglementé, prenez connaissance des panneaux de réglementation pour éviter une amende. Il y a une station de vélos BIXI à côté de l'appartement.
access: Vous disposerez du logement au complet. Par contre, vous n'avez PAS accès au jardin du rez-de-chaussée.
interaction: Je suis sociable et toujours prêt à rendre service. J'habite le logement du dessous alors si vous avez besoin de quelque chose qui pourrait simplifier ou agrémenter votre séjour n'hésitez pas à me le demander. Je suis discret et respectueux de votre vie privée, vous êtes chez vous.
house_rules: Par respect pour le voisinage, je recherche des locataires calmes, sérieux, et responsables. Aucune fête ou soirée ne sera tolérée. Non fumeurs et pas d’animaux. Les locataires n'ont pas accès au jardin.

reviews.comments: Cet appartement était parfait pour nous. Toutes les choses étaient comme vous voyez dans les photos. Les chambres étaient grandes et propre and bien meublé.  Notre host, François, qui habite sous l'appartement, était très amical et utile.  Il a assisté à plusieurs petites choses toute suite.  A Montréal, la location est superbe: près du métro, près du Atwater Marche,  et près des fromageries, boulangeries et épiceries excellentes dans la rue Wellington.  Aussi, le quartier est très calme à nuit. Aussi, le quartier est très calme à nuit.  En bref, il ne pourrait pas meilleur.

Nous avons passé 10 jours très agreables dans ce logement tres propre et très convivial. L'appartement est equipe de tout ce qu'il faut, rien ne manque. Le quartier est très calme et très vert. Le métro est tout proche et vous trouvez tous les commerces nécessaires sur la rue Wellington a deux pas de l'appartement. L'hôte est très aimable et agréable. Très bonne expérience, nous recommandons chaudement.
Enchantés de notre séjour chez François qui est une personne très sympathique. Appartement et quartier très agréable, on était "comme à la maison".

Francois's apartment is perfect place to stay for a bit.  I stayed for a month, and loved my time there.  The apartment itself is very clean, and has a lot of character.  

I also really liked the location.  Its a quick walk to get back into Montreal across the Lachine Canal, or an even quicker 10 min. subway ride to get downtown.  

And don't overlook the Verdun neighborhood.  There are lots of great restaurants, shops and parks.  I really loved the area. 

Overall, I highly recommend.

François est un gentil hôte 
Très disponible et souriant 
On se sent comme chez nous dans son appartement 
L'appartement est très très propre, avec toutes les commodités. Près du centre ville à 8 minutes à pied du métro. 
A très bientôt

François est très accueillant et chaleureux. Il a été toujours disponible pour nous tout au long du séjour. Le logement est très bien situé, fonctionnel, calme,  proche de toutes commodités. Nous avons passé plus de 4 mois dans celui-ci et ce fut un plaisir sur toute la ligne. Vraiment rien à redire, j'y retournerai avec grand plaisir. :)
Logement agréable, fonctionnel, très propre, 10mn du métro - hôte très sympa, excellent accueil.

Appartement très agréable, bien conçus et tout équipé pour un séjour prolongé. Nous y avons passer 5 semaines, à 5 personnes. Il est situé dans un quartier calme et proche des transports en commun. 
François notre hôte, s'est toujours montré disponible pour nous. Rien à dire, très bon accueil.

Nous avons passé 1 mois avec 2 amis dans l'appartement. L'espace est plus que suffisant et peut aisément loger plus de 3 personnes. Parfait pour être tranquille après une journée dans le centre. A proximité du métro lasalle, 8min à pied. Situé à environ 20min de la ville, c'est le top! Supermarché Metro à quelques minutes à pied. Les photos ne font pas justice à la réalité, nous avons adoré l'appartement. Propre, fonctionnel et dans un quartier calme. Nous aurions prolongé le sejour si c'était possible. Merci pour l'accueil François et au plaisir de se revoir.
Laura
The host canceled this reservation 82 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

François a été un hôte réceptif à mes différents messages, ses réponses étaient rapides et précises. 
Le logement est très agréable, aménagé avec goût, il offre tout le confort nécessaire. Il se situe dans un quartier calme, la plus proche station de métro est à moins de 10min à pied, les commerces à 5min.
Si nous revenons à Montréal, nous n'hésiterons pas à reprendre contact avec François.
François est très agréable et très disponible. Notre séjour s'est très bien passer, l'espace est calme et reposant, à proximité de tout. Je le recommande vivement!

Nous avons passé 3 semaines en famille dans ce logement. Tout était absolument parfait, l'appartement était extrêmement propre, décoré avec goût et très fonctionnel. De plus l'emplacement est très calme, mais pour autant à quelques pas de toutes commodités. François est un hôte absolument charmant et soucieux du confort de ses locataires. Si nous revenons sur Montréal, nous retournerons chez lui sans hésiter! Merci François !
Quand on loge chez François, on n'est jamais déçu. C'est une personne vraiment très agréable et serviable et le logement est parfait.
It was just perfect!! Thanks Francois!!!
Super séjour chez François, c’est un super hôte très arrangeant et à l’écoute de ses locataires. L appartement est spacieux et très agréable tout à été nickel du début à la fin.

Nous avons séjourné chez François tout le mois d’Octobre. Nous avons aimé notre séjour dans ce grand appartement typique de Montréal. La première impression à l’arrivée est que l’appartement est très propre. Beaucoup d’espace ainsi qu’une belle décoration dans chaque pièce. Un appartement tranquille dans un quartier vraiment agréable. Tous les services à pied, pharmacie, boutiques, SAQ, épicerie, boucherie Viandal, deux bars et plusieurs bons restaurants . On recommande les Street Monkeys, restaurant asiatique à l’ambiance branchée, Chez Boss et fils, ainsi que Piquillo. Nous avons aussi pris une belle grande marche au bord du fleuve, qui est tout près. 
François est vraiment sympathique. Il habite en bas mais ce n’est aucunement un souci. Nous aimerions y retourner, c’est sur. Nous le recommandons.
superbe appartement, très agréable à vivre et François est adorable. Je recommande à 100%

name: Near the bosphorus
summary: A fully furnished and comfortable apartment with two bedrooms in a peacefull area of city and just two minutes walk to the seaside with cafes, restaurants and bars.
space: I live alone, so you will be sharing the apartment with me. This is one of the most popular regions in the city, 5 minutes away from Bebek and 15 minutes from the heart of the city (Taksim Square). The apartment is near the bosphorus where the summer nights are full of joy and peace. Within 2 min on foot you can reach the seaside. There are public transports from both airports which take you to the city center. From there you can take the bus to get to my place.  For detailed information please send me a message. Cheers.

interaction: As soon as i work in the university as a lecturer and an actor, sometimes i have plenty of time and i love to show my guests the city and having little parties if everybody wish.

host.host_about:
I live alone, so you will be sharing the apartment with me. This is one of the most popular regions in the city, 5 minutes away from Bebek and 15 minutes from the heart of the city (Taksim Square). The apartment is near the bosphorus where the summer nights are full of joy and peace. Within 2 min on foot you can reach the seaside.

I have two bedrooms for the guests. Each has a double bed and enough space to store your luggage. Fresh towels and bed sheets will be provided. My guests are welcome to use the kitchen and relax on the sofa in the living room. This is a comfortable place to stay and rest in Istanbul.

There are public transports from both airports which take you to the city center. From there you can take the bus to get to my place.

For detailed information please send me a message.

Cheers.

reviews.comments: Nice seaside neighborhood with easy access to center. Good value for the money. Omer is a great host.

My stay in Istanbul with Ömer was perfect! Ömer is the most friendly and open host! He gave me helpful tips how to travel around the area. The location of his appartment couldnt be better to explore the beatiful Bosporus waterside. I had an amazing time and highly recommend this place to stay!

Very comfortable and simple place. The area around the apartment is nice for sitting by the water or taking a stroll, and the apartment itself is great a place to not just sleep, but sit around and relax with a cup of coffee. Omer is a great and knowledgeable host. Very private room.

How to describe a wonderful memory of a great person and a charming house!  Omer is a remarkable man, kind-hearted, talented, very cultured and always positive and smiling :). The house is an ideally situated nest. Above all, it was a human experience that made my soul grow. Thanks airbnb and thank you Omer :)))
Konaklamanızla ilgili deneyiminizi Airbnb topluluğuyla paylaşın.

My friend's stayed at Omer's place for couple of days and they were so pleased with everything. The place was cozy, the host welcomed them so nicely and the location is just perfect. I visited them during their stay and I enjoyed it a lot as well.
The place is highly recommended!
Pozdrav!
Emina

Omer was a great host, and I found that the apartment was the perfect place for me to stay. The apartment is spacious and clean. It has a cozy atmosphere with the feeling of being at one's home. It's location is ideal for tourists like me who do not want to be right next to major touristic attractions, yet not too far from them either. Its proximity to the Bosphorus also makes it a great place to go for walks.
Omer was a really welcoming host and also helpful during my visit. My airline lost my bag during my flight in, and he pointed out to me where I can get new clothes. He is also an incredibly interesting person to talk to. 
I'd definitely try to stay here again if I make it back to Istanbul.

I stayed at Omar's place for 20 days. His apartment is absolutely cool, just like Omar himself. The place is Located at Bosphorus, you can walk to the coast just 1 min! His hospitality is warm, friendly, makes me feel like a family. Room is spacious as well! Restaurant, small shops , convenient neighborhood, walk-distance bus stop. No complaint at all, just perfect!

What a great place to stay and see Istanbul, felt welcome from the first minute and the area is filled with beautiful old wooden buildings and some nice bars and restaurants.  A great find by the Bosphorus

Omer was excellent host and I felt very much at home .Nice room , beautiful neighborhood , perfect location. it was the perfect place to relax after busy days in istanbul. I highly recommend Omer place. thank you Omer for letting me stay at your apt and being such wonderful host :):).

I was staying during 5 days, and it was a wonderful time.
Apartment was clean, nice and perfect for me.
Also it's located near Bosfor and bus station, just 1-2 min of walk.
Near were a lot of different shops, restaurants, pubs etc.
People around were very kindly and intelligently.
Omer was very friendly and  he helped me a lot,  Omer is the amazing person)
I'm happy that stayed in Omer's house, and hope will come back :)
Omer thank you a lot! Hope see you again :)

This is an amazing place to stay. It's in Arnavutköy, which is a very pretty (and quite posh) neighbourhood next to the Bosphorus. There are a lot of nice bars and restaurants here, and it's a great place to go out for a walk or a run alongside the Bosphorus. Also convenient, the place is close to a bus stop, which will get you to Besiktas/Kabatas in about 15 mins and to Taksim in +/- 20 mins (buses 40T and 42T, leaving in front of the Park Bosphorus Hotel near Taksim).

It was really nice to stay with Omer and to talk about his work and passion, acting. Omer really made me feel at home and it was great to share some meals with him. His living room is great for watching movies as well. Can highly recommend this place!

This is my second time booking with Omer , and it  wouldn't be the last. nice apartment, great location, close to bosphour, and the bus station . Omer was great host as always , definitely I'll stay in Omer place if I'm  heading again to istanbul. thank you Omer for everything,

Omer m'a attendue à mon arrivée en dépit d'un retard de l'avion et s'est montré extrêmement arrangeant et sympathique pendant toute la durée du séjour. Il m'a aidée les premiers jours et nous avons pu échanger sur un pays que je ne connais pas. L'appartement est très agréable et idéalement situé. Je recommanderais à tous mes amis séjournant à Istanbul cet appartement !
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Excelente ubicación para conocer la zona de Bebek. Cerca de restaurantes, bares, parques y lugares turísticos como el castillo y el palacio del lado asiático. Omer fue muy amable en atender nuestra entrada a su casa a las 2:00 a.m. a la llegada de nuestro vuelo. Muchas gracias Omer.
Omer is very friendly his houses clean and cozy location is very good , I can say if you are in Istanbul you should definitely go to his house :) thank you Omer
Omer was great host as always, this is my third time staying in this beautiful apartment, and it won’t be the last ,I felt like I’m staying in my own place . Thank you Omer for hosting me again .

It was wonderfull to stay in this appartments! Omer was very kind and 
helping! if i will come again i would stay here one more time.
Ömer çok iyi bir ev sahibi. Evin yeri muhteşem. Verilen tüm bilgiler doğru. Kesinlikle tavsiye ederim.
Omer was great! He was super accommodating, helpful, and easy to reach! The apartment is in a really cute neighborhood and close to the water! i would definitely recommend this place!
Great location, very close to the pasfore. A lot of coffeshopes & restaurants around. The host Mr. Omer was so kind & helpful
Thanks for warm welcome. The appartment is in good location and has all the amenities to feel comfortable.

name: Cosy room in Brooklyn!2min to Sbwy

name: Luxury 2BR/2BTH on The Highline - sleeps 4
summary: Stay in NYC overlooking the Highline. This newly renovated, sunny 2 bedroom apartment is located by West Chelsea's art galleries and only 5 min away from Chelsea Market and the popular Meatpacking district.
space: A sundrenched home in the city. Recently renovated, this beautiful space by the Highline is your ideal pied à terre while in the city. It is quiet, by the highline and the hudson river. Restuarants and the chelsea market at your doorstep.
description: Stay in NYC overlooking the Highline. This newly renovated, sunny 2 bedroom apartment is located by West Chelsea's art galleries and only 5 min away from Chelsea Market and the popular Meatpacking district. A sundrenched home in the city. Recently renovated, this beautiful space by the Highline is your ideal pied à terre while in the city. It is quiet, by the highline and the hudson river. Restuarants and the chelsea market at your doorstep. Please use my home freely but avoid drinking what is in the apartment. I am not going to be at home while you are there so I will only be available if you need me, and that is always a phone call away. I love West Chelsea. Galleries, the Highline, Chelsea Market, Hudson River...  That is why I chose it to live in NYC. I am often asked for restaurant recommendations and I always find it hard as it is so personal but here are some: The Red Cat: One of NYC's first farm to table restaurants is a fabulous option. It is small, dishes are carefully prepar
neighborhood_overview: I love West Chelsea. Galleries, the Highline, Chelsea Market, Hudson River...  That is why I chose it to live in NYC. I am often asked for restaurant recommendations and I always find it hard as it is so personal but here are some: The Red Cat: One of NYC's first farm to table restaurants is a fabulous option. It is small, dishes are carefully prepared and one can taste the freshness in the ingredients The Cookshop: making a name for itself amongst the trendy gang. It is also a Farm to Table and booking is recommended at brunch Oysters at the Cult and Pistol in the Chelsea Market are unbeatable in NYC Don Giovani is a great pizzeria if you want to eat in or take away And the unmissable NYC cocktails can be found at: The Standard Hotel (go there early for incredible views, overpriced drinks and an unforgettable experience); the Americano Hotel (recently opened and has cocktails with a twist of Mexican in a decent rooftop), The McKittrick Hotel (the rooftop is gorgeous for brunch, or go
notes: It is my first apartment so I would really love for you to look after my house as if it were yours.
transit: By Public Transport: M10: is the bus that goes up north and you find on 10th and 23rd, and to come back to the apartment it follows 9th avenue Subway: There are multiple subway stops on 23rd street (blue- on8th, yellow- on 6th, and red lines - on 7th ).  Highline: I love walking on the highline to get to Chelsea Market, Meatpacking and the Whitney Museum (south); and to the Mckittrick Hotel, Hudson Yards and the Javits Convention Centre (North) Taxis: VIA: carsharing black car app; 5 USD/ride; one of my favorites as it picks you up and drops you close at the corner of wherever you might be. You can add additional passengers to every request. Drivers are great, service is fabulous and I believe it is a decent way for drivers to make a living as they get paid by the hour rather than on what the app decides. They also pick you up and drop you at all airports Lyft: an alternative to über; winning ground in NYC due to Uber's bad press backlash Uber: everyone knows it. Be careful with surge
access: Please use my home freely but avoid drinking what is in the apartment.
interaction: I am not going to be at home while you are there so I will only be available if you need me, and that is always a phone call away.
house_rules: It is non-smoking but there is a balcony where you can enjoy a little cigarette as long as you avoid using my plants as ashtrays. As in your own home, I would ask to be respectful of the neighbors. For stays over 7 days an additional cleaning fee of 100 USD will be payable in cash to the cleaner as she will come to maintain the apartment.

host.host_about: Originally from Barcelona, I have spent my last 5 years in NYC. This is my first apartment and I would love to share it with you while I am taking some time off the  Big Apple. I am mostly in Spain so if you need to reach me expect me on a European TimeZone.

reviews.comments: Amazing apartment in a perfect location, with wonderful views from the balcony. Be sure to check out the High Line!

Great place to stay in NYC!  We spent three days with our family.  Right on top of the Highline and close to the subway.   Exceptionally clean and user friendly home.  We would stay again in a second!

Meritxell is a great host! She was very responsive and made sure our stay was seamless. Her place is beautiful, perfectly located to restaurants, nightlife, and shopping. There's a million dollar view of the highline and surrounding buildings. 

The two bedroom/2 full bath layout gives both rooms plenty of privacy. The master bath has a very nice stone shower with water fall shower head. 

I would recommend her place to any group of 2-4 who wants to be walking distance from restaurants, shopping, and nightlife (
and chelsea market)

Had a lovely stay in this Chelsea apartment! Meritxell's modern apartment was great. It was clean and perfect for a stay when spending time in Hell's Kitchen and Chelsea. Meritxell was responsive and answered all my questions promptly. Definitely recommend this apartment!

My business partner and I visited NYC and choice to stay at this lovely home.  The building is conveniently located near the heart of Chelsea with a very welcoming lobby and doormen.  We found the home and host graciously accommodating.  The views from balcony were amazing.  We look forward to returning soon!  Thanks.
This was a great apartment in a nice neighborhood. The host is a great communicator and very accommodating. I'd definitely return for another stay!

I loved this apartment, it was clean and bright and well furnished. The access to the High Line was steps away and made walking around the city a wonderful, fun experience. It was close to the Chelsea Market and walking distance to the Whitney. I would come back. Our host was attentive and answered questioned immediately. Our stay was perfect. Thank you.

Meritxell was a very helpful and attentive host.
Our group consisted of two couples and the apartment was perfectly appointed and situated in a very convenient part of the city.  We were there over the Forth of July and the roof terrace was a wonderful added feature. The doorman were very pleasant and helpful as well.
We give high marks and would strongly recommend her property.
Everything about the unit was perfect...host, location, check in, unit finishes.  Just a fantastic condo right above the High Line with outdoor space as a bonus.  I HIGHLY recommend it!!!

Meritxells apartment is very nice and spacious. We were a family of four, our girls are five and eight and this apartment was a great starting point for exploring the city. And when the children fell asleep at night, exhausted from all the walking, the grown ups had a nice living room to stay in. Meritxell responds very quickly to any email, often within minutes. Everything was organized and easy, we picked up the key at the front desk in the entrance. We arrived late at night but that was not a problem. We did not use the balcony as it was just too hot outside, but the view was nice. I can recommend Meritxells apartment!
Everything was accurate, including the pictures.  We had a wonderful time.  Thank you Meritxell!
meritxell's place was sooo beautiful. exactly like the pictures. Finishes in the bathroom was amazing. high end furniture and really clean apartment. would definitely stay here again.

Our host Meritxell made us feel very welcomed... She had kindly left breakfast (bread, OJ & milk) for us in the fridge and chocolates! She responded very quickly to any questions we had but everything was really easy and straightforward! The flat was totally matching the description with a big King size bed in the master bedroom & a double bed in the other bedroom - all very comfortable, well-equipped, stylish & clean. The flat was extremely quiet for NY - all windows opened at the back of the building with a very open view! The view from the rooftop of the building was great and the rooftop itself very nice (sun loungers and garden table & chairs!). The location is fantastic - all the subway lines are within a few blocks walk AND the High Line is literally 10 steps away so you can walk up & down town out of the noisy traffic. This was a last minute booking as our previous airbnb was cancelled by the host 72hrs before our arrival! We were truly very happy with our last minute find & will definitely try to stay again in Meritxell's flat for our next trip to NY.

Everything was fantastic!  Meritxell's home is beautiful, very clean, modern and comfortable.  

The space was perfect for two couples.  The bedrooms have some separation, beds are comfortable and the bathrooms are quite elegant.  Functional kitchen is open to the living room with seating to socialize and relax.  The bonus is the balcony, which has nice city views and is great for enjoying the weather (when it cooperates).

The area is nice.  While neighborhoods are pretty subjective, Chelsea is a good one.  We never felt unsafe, access to the Highline is right outside the door, and there are plenty of drinking and dining options within walking distance.  The A, C and E trains are a couple of blocks away and other transit options are convenient as well.

Meritxell went above and beyond to make our stay a good one; she happily obliged our check-in and check-out requests and touched base to make sure everything went smoothly. We would absolutely stay here again and highly recommend to others.
The host was responsive, accommodating and very hospitable.  The home was beautiful and exactly as portrayed on the site.  I would absolutely stay there again and recommend it.

The location of Meritxell's apartment in the Chelsea neighborhood was excellent. We had fun walking around the area and catching subway or Uber was easy outside of her building. Meritxell was responsive to our email questions and her place was clean and comfortable.

We had a great time at Meritxell's spacious, beautiful apartment! It was comfortable and well-furnished, and in a great location - literally next door to the Highline. Everything you need is a short walk or subway ride. Check in and check out were easy, and Meritxell kept in touch via text. All in all a great experience.

We are just back from an amazing 4 days in New York. A huge contributing factor in making this trip so special was staying at Meritexell's apartment. The location is spot on, with the subway a block away making it easy to get anywhere in the city. Chelsea is such a gorgeous neighbourhood. There is a great bar opposite the apartment and fantastic restaurant just around the corner that we used all the time. There are many other restaurants locally to. Chelsea Market is a short walk away and full of great foods. The apartment is fantastic and was big enough for 3 of us to hangout comfortably. The main bedroom having an amazingly comfortable bed. The balcony is an added bonus and has awesome views of the city. Meritxell was on the end of the phone if we needed any questions answered which was great to. I would highly recommend staying here. When we come back to NYC I hope to stay here again.

What a delight!  Located steps from the High Line, this is a fantastic place to stay.  The 2 bedroom apartment was spacious with a wonderful view.  We found everything impeccably clean.  

Easy walking distance to The Whitney, Chelsea Market, many galleries.  Eataly is not far.  That was a fabulous eating experience too!  

Thank you Meritxell for your hospitality!
We had a great experience at Meritxell's unit.  It was exactly as advertised.  It was well-appointed, neat, clean, and loaded with everything we needed for 4 adults.

The location in Chelsea and the apartment itself was simply amazing! Meritxell is a great host and responded quickly to all queries. We really felt at home in this beautiful and newly renovated apartment. Organisation with Meritxell worked flawlessly. Thank you for an amazing New York experience.

The location of this apartment is fantastic, close to the highline and Chelsea is a lovely area!  Meritxell was a great host and easy to deal with the whole way, quickly responding to all queries etc. 
We really felt at home in her amazing apartment which was spacious enough for 4 adults, very handy having 2 bathrooms. 
Thank you Meritxell for a great experience!

Meritxell was a fantastic host! I would strongly recommend a stay at her lovely luxurious apartment at Chelsea. She was very responsive and got us answers even on Xmas day! The apartment is very clean and stylish, and have all the mod cons required for a chic stay in Manhattan. Not to mention is not overlooked by any other apartment blocks. Thanks for everything Meritxell! I will definitely be staying there again if I want to stay around the Chelsea and Meatpacking District area. You can see the High-Line from her balcony!
Excellent host. Very responsive.  Clean apartment and amazing location, which is steps away from high line access.

Io e mio marito siamo stati nell'appartamento di Merixtell dal 2 al 7 Marzo. 
L'esperienza è stata positiva da tutti i punti di vista.
Merixtell è stata una host perfetta, sempre veloce e precisa nelle risposte.
L'appartamento è molto carino e attrezzato: è al 12esimo piano ed ha quindi una bella vista panoramica ed un bel terrazzino esposto a sud; è un appartamento elegante e le foto pubblicate sul sito delle stanze e del mobilio sono fedeli alla realtà; è molto confortevole perchè ha 2 bagni completi e una cucina molto attrezzata e con molti utensili.
Noi siamo andati per l'Armory Show e per le mostre d'arte, quindi la location è perfetta, essendo l'appartamento al centro della zona artistica e delle gallerie d'arte di Chelsea; nelle vicinanze ci sono anche parecchi negozi e il Chelsea Market. Apprezzabile anche il servizio di portierato 24 ore al giorno.
Piacevolissime passeggiate si possono fare sull'High Line e sull'Hudson River Greenway, che passano proprio sotto il palazzo. 
La posizione centrale tra Mid Town da un lato e il Village e Soho dall'altro permette di raggiungere velocemente tutti i punti di maggiore attrazione.
Insomma, lo raccomanderei fortemente a chiunque.

Meritxells place was perfect. The location could not be better, the neighborhood is a nice slice of new york but not too noisy. People were really friendly. The apartment itself is beautifully decorated and super comfortable. It has an abundance of sunlight. My young children and my wife felt right at home.

Our stay at Meritxell's apartment was wonderful. The apartment was beautiful - even better than it looked in the pictures. It's a perfect location - right on the High Line. Meritxell was very flexible with our check-in/check-out times, and very easy to contact. We will definitely come back to stay at Meritxell's!!!!

Apartment was beautifully designed, very clean and welcoming. The location was perfect just next to the High Line, great for morning walks/runs and afternoon strolls. Although very central and close to restaurants, bars, etc. - it was very quite. We enjoyed our stay a lot, and would definitely stay again next time !

This apartment is beautiful.  It is decorated with class and taste without sacrificing comfort.  This part of Chelsea is perfect; so close to popular hotspots yet not right in the middle of NY's chaos.  Meritxell is a very responsive and thoughtful host...she even replied back to some last minute questions while she was out of the country!  Four of us fit very comfortably in the apartment and enjoyed all the critter comforts that are often missing from NY apartments - patio space, 2 bathrooms, washer/dryer, etc.  we all loved our time in Meritxell's apartment and would rent it again in a heartbeat.

I spent 5 days at Meritxell's apartment with my family and we felt like at home. Her place is really cozy and quite, and everything works properly. Location can't be better to move along Manhattan, close to the High line and two blocks far from subway. There is a full assorted supermarket one block away (9th Av between 23rd and 24th St) where you'll find all you could need. Meritxell is a very nice host, answered quickly all our questions and was flexible with our needs. I truly recommend you to stay at her place.

Me he alojado 5 días con mi familia en el apartamento de Meritxell y nos hemos sentido como en casa. Su apartemento es realmente acogedor y tranquilo y todo funciona perfectamente. La ubicación es inmejorable para visitar Manhattan, la 'High line' pasa justo por debajo y hay una estación de metro a dos avenidas. Ademas hay un supermercado muy completo a una avenida (9na av. entre las calles 23 y 24) donde encontraréis cualquier cosa que podáis necesitar. Meritxell es muy buena anfitriona, respondió muy rápido todas nuestras preguntas y fue flexible con nuestras necesidades. Recomiendo sinceramente su casa como opción de alojamiento.

He passat 5 dies amb la meva familia a l'apartament de la Meritxell i ens hem sentit com a casa. L'apartament és realment acollidor i tranquil i tot funciona correctament. La ubicació és immillorable per visitar Manhattan, la 'High Line' passa just pel costat i hi ha una estació de metro a dues avingudes. A més a més hi ha un supermercat ben assortit a un bloc (9na av. entre els carrers 23 i 24) ón trobareu tot el que us pugui fer falta. La Meritxell es molt bona anfitriona, va contestar immediatament tots els dubtes i va ser flexible amb les nostres necessitats. Recomano de tot cor la seva casa com a opció d'allotjament.
Great apartment in great location. Exactly as expected.

Unsere Tage in New York bei Meritxell waren ganz wunderbar. 
Das Appartement war fast noch schöner als auf den Bilder, sehr schön hell und sonnig, geschmackvoll hochwertig eingerichtet, übersichtlich, sauber mit einer guten Lage. Meritxell haben wir nicht persönlich getroffen, aber sie war jederzeit erreichbar, total nett und hilfreich und check in und check out war ganz easy, weil es im Haus einen "Concierge" gibt, was wir herrlich fanden. Der einzig kleine Nachteil war, dass es keine Möglichkeit gibt eigene Sachen zu verstauen.

As a first time Airbnb user, I was nervous. But Merixtell eased my worries by responding quickly to my messages. The apartment was just as described. Great location just steps from the Highljne, lots of restaurants, easy key pick up, very clean, great decor. The four of us fit very easily and the two full bathrooms were very helpful in allowing all of us to get ready for a special occasion. Perfect.

We loved our stay at Meritxell's place.  The apartment is in a great location and is really cute, clean and spacious.  Getting the key was easy as was communication with our host.  We would definitely recommend it.

We had a wonderful stay at Meritxell's place. Great location and she was very responsive to all of our questions as we were first time Airbnbers. Really like the area and we will defiantly stay there again!!!

Perfect location right in the highline. Apartment is modern, clean and well appointed. Having laundry in the unit was perfect and the deck overlooks a beautiful New York Chelsea scene. Great experience!!

L'appartement de Meritxell est d'une grande qualité. Spacieux, bien décoré et très bien équipé. Grand confort des lits et cuisine super. La situation en bordure de la high line est très agréable et le métro à 7 ou 8 min à pied. Les communications avec Meritxell ont été très faciles et notre séjour de 3 nuits a été finalement très agréable. De plus il y a un grand nombre de galeries d'art à quelques minutes à pied.
Enfin la présence d'un concierge dans l'iummeuble est un vrai plus
We had a great stay at Meritxell's place. An ideal Air BnB experience!

Meritxell's home is a lovely apartment, very well located and caters to all needs of the guests. Meritxell was very helpful and easy to reach. Meatpacking district is a buzzy end of town but less touristy than the Times Square area, So anyone looking to experience the more authentic New York life, will find this a great place to stay.

Merixtells place is in a great spot right by the Highline. Lovely comfortable - massive bed and excellent bathroom in the main bedroom. I travelled alone in the end but the apartment would easily accommodate another person or couple.
Meritxell was a great communicator and always responded very quickly.

I have to say that Meritxell Apt. is great. Is well located and you can find everything you need nearby. The place is clean and comfortable. Definitely I recommend this place if you want to stay out of the crowdly middle of manhattan. The doormans were nice and always willing to help you. 
Finally, I have to say that Meritxell is a great host, always was attention to any quetions I had.

Meritxell was extremely responsive.  Her apartment was exactly as described in photos and was perfect for our group of 4 friends having a gal weekend adventure.  The location of her place was excellent, within walking distance to subway and the Highline was great to explore, which we could see from her wonderful balcony.
Meritxell was very nice and her place was exactly as it was promised The location was great, we loved the high line and the many restaurants close by!

This apartment was fabulous! My family of four loved it. A stand out Airbnb experience for us. It was larger than I was expecting, spotlessly clean and with great views. We would love to stay again.  Thanks to Meritxell for being a wonderful host.

The place was well decorated, clean and comfortable for our group. We had a group of 4 so really appreciated the 2 full bathrooms for getting ready. Great balcony as well and we loved being so close to the highline!

Everything with the unit was as described, great facilities,excellent location and great communication with Merixtell,could not have asked for a better apartment or location.Thank you Merxtell for opening your apartment to us.
The host canceled this reservation 20 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Place was as nice as depicted by the pictures. Location terrific. Extremely clean.  Meritxell could not have been more helpful or responsive. We were traveling with a couple who are regular visitors to Chelsea who said they will be booking this location again.

Très bel appartement bien situé sur la high Line 
2 belles chambres et 2 salles de bain avec wc
Conforme au descriptif et aux photos
Doormen sympathiques et à l'écoute
Terrasse agréable pour fumer éventuellement mais manque de sièges
À recommander

Several emails were exchanged before the visit and the hostess provided information for our arrival and access to the apartment. The apartment was available from early on the day of arrival- great if your arrival is early in the morning, bu plane or ship.
Any problems were quickly resolved. Meritxell was quick to provide  information, even though she herself was (Website hidden by Airbnb) concierge made the apartment a very safe place to stay and were helpful.

Location fantastic. No problems with access at all. Added bonus a doorman. The apartment was clean, tidy and very comfortable. After a month of travel it was nice to have such a wonderful place to stay to end our trip. 

Meritxell has stocked the apartment with lots of extra bits and pieces. We did a bit of cooking and there were loads of ingredients to make this easier. It is an honor system if you use something you replace it and if you buy something extra you just add it to the collection. It works really well. Having a 24 hour chemist in the corner that sells everything made this very easy to restock. 

Communication with meritxell was great. I certainly would recommend this apartment to anyone. We were 2 adult couples traveling together. One bedroom had an ensuite and the other bedroom had the bathroom next door. We were not cramped at all and had our privacy when needed.

Meritxell was extremely accommodating and quick to respond to communication.  We were fortunate to meet her and found her gracious, charming and very welcoming.  The space was fabulous and a perfect layout for two couples.  Additionally, the apartment is surprisingly quiet.
Very quiet and clean place.  Good value for New York. subway a few long blocks away.
My mother and her friend loved the apartment , found it very cosy and had everything they needed.

The host was very communicative and extremely accommodating. The apartment is really nice and having two full bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms is a definite plus. The location is right next to the High Line which is great too. The doormen and women are so nice and will give recommendations on things too. Would definitely stay there again.

Place is spacious.  Well equipped kitchen if you care about such things.  Just about every style and budget restaurant in easy walking distance.  Good public transportation close by.  Right at the High Line for a delightful walking experience.  Taxis were always available at the door when we wanted them.

We loved every minute of our stay at Meritxell's apartment! Could not have been easier to pull up and check in with the doorman and park on 22nd. The apartment is bright and super clean and quiet and spacious and comfy.  Big bathrooms and super comfortable beds. Kitchen was really well appointed. Location was perfect for us as we walked the Highline and easily got cabs right in front.  Had a very nice lunch at Le Pif right up the block. Loved this place. Will definitely be back!!!

Meritxell was a perfect host. She always replied right away to any questions we had prior to arriving, and emailed me the day we were scheduled to arrive giving me a direct # to contact her. Her apartment was clean and exactly as depicted online. There was a doorman that we checked in with who was helpful and polite. The apartment is literally right off the highline, in a perfect spot to access the subway, chelsea market, cute cafe's, etc. Every room has an awesome view of the city which was really nice, because we went with another couple and so we each wanted a nice view.  We would ABSOLUTELY stay here again and I would definitely recommend this apartment!

The perfect location for a NYC stay as it is close to everything.  The stairs to the Highline are just out the front door and makes for beautiful walks.  The flat has everything you need to relax and cook some meals should you choose to do so.  Having a bathroom for each bedroom was extra nice. Meritxell ' communication  was outstanding and she was so helpful with information and suggestions.  I highly recommend Meritxell 's flat for your next NYC stay.

Wow, what a great spot in NYC. Amazing location, great building and perfect host at a great price. This is the perfect spot for up to 4 people. We were visiting with another married couple and the setup with the two bedroom and the common living room and kitchen was perfect. Way better than getting and paying for two hotel rooms without the amenities. 

Meritxell's communication and check in and out process was simple and easy. Great doormen at this building who were super helpful. There was demolition scheduled at the building during our stay and she gave us a heads up so we could plan our day around it (they ended up cancelling due to weather but the heads up was nice). 

The apartment was clean, wifi was perfect, nice TV and couch. Having in room laundry was nice as well. 

My best stay in NYC yet and we will definitely be back.
Highly recommend!

Highly recommended. We had a great stay at Meritxell's apartment. The apartment is very spacious, quiet and well equipped even for longer stays. Late night check-in was seamless with the building concierge. The best Airbnb experience in NYC so far! Would stay again without hesitation.

We loved staying in this beautiful apartment. Many two bedrooms in NYC only have one bathroom. Meritxell's is a  2 bedroom 2 bath which was person for us 4 women enjoying a girls trip. 
The location is perfect. Very central to see all of the sights by either train or cab. The neighborhood is also wonderful to walk around and see tons of art or to enjoy the High Line Park. 
Meritxell is also a wonderful host. The beds, kitchen, showers, everything was high end. I definitely recommend Meritxell and her beautiful apt.

There IS an elevator, and a doorman! This place is a "no brainer". It was clean, sunny, comfortable with nice views and amenities like gas range, washer/dryer, dishwasher and comfy beds with very dark shades if you need extra sleep. Meritxell left many open spaces for us to "move in" with our things like empty closets and drawers. Also empty drawers in the bathrooms, which I really appreciate! This location is very central with so much available mere steps away. My husband had to commute to Westchester for work so we had a rental car and no trouble with parking it at night in this hood. She was very courteous and checked in halfway to be sure we didn't need anything. We will stay again! Great trip.
Dejlig lejlighed med super beliggenhed. Desværre var altanen lukket grundet renovering.

Vi var 4 damer som sjekket inn i leiligheten.
Den er helt topp, veldig rent og pent og virket større enn på bildene.
Veldig gode senger, og to flotte bad.
Fullt utstyrt kjøkken, vi lagde oss litt frokost og det var ikke langt til butikk.
Koselig nærområde, med Highline og Meatpacking District.
Nøler ikke med å anbefale dette stedet, og vil definitivt bo der ved en annen anledning .
Cet appartement très bien meublé  est situé dans un quartier exceptionnel.
Wir waren mit Meritxells Apartment sehr zufrieden.  Die Lage ist als touristischer Ausgangspunkt für Manhatten sehr gut.

This apartment is ideally located.  It's an easy walk from Penn Station and literally feet from the Highline.  I was here with 3 women friends and the apartment worked great.  2 bathrooms not a must, but pretty nice when there are 4 of you.  King bed in master with it's own bath was comfortable and spacious.  2nd bedroom with queen also comfortable.  The fold out in the living room could use a new mattress and there is no way to darken the windows if someone is sleeping there (which we did).  However, it was not a problem for us.  The living room is spacious and allowed comfortable lounging to hang out, talk, and recover from exploring the city. Meritxell is  great in communicating, responding quickly and helpful.  Apartment is very clean and comfortable.  Also, with windows closed, it VERY quiet.  Kitchen is well equipped and although we didn't cook meals we did have breakfast and drinks and appetizers several times.  Plenty of knives, glasses, etc. to make this easy.  The kitchen  is also stocked with basic food items (sugar, coffee filters, napkins, spices, etc.) which is also nice.
If you are a walker this is ideal location.  We walked down and back to Battery Park one day and up and back to Central Park then next.  The Highline is outside your door, so super accessible. An inexpensive Uber or cab ride  up to theater (Times Square).  LOTS of good restaurants, grocery store, liquor store, etc. within easy walk (this is NYC so not unusual, but still good to know). 
Felt very safe coming and going to this apartment.  24 hour door man was a plus as was having an elevator, not lugging luggage up stairs is nice.
Was a perfect apartment for our needs.  Would highly recommend.

Meritxell's place is great close to most of what we wanted the highline is a short 5 minuet stroll, times square is around 20min walk, central park 25 - 30mins walk or 15 mins by car uber is very good we used uber most of the time. Meritxell was a great host and responeded very quickly to any questions we had i would definitely recommend this property.
Great Chelsea location, many restaurants nearby, easy access to the highline and the Chelsea piers. Comfortable home with all amenities we needed.  Great responsive host.
Great central location.  The apartment is small but comfortable.  Good to be away from the constant hustle of Manhattan but means catching taxis.

Meritxell is the perfect host, she was really quick in answering all questions. We had a great time in her home. Very convinient were the two bedrooms and the bathrooms as we travelled with another couple. We had a great time!

The apartment is fantastic! 2 nice rooms and 2 bathrooms so perfect as we were two couples traveling. Right on the Highline which was great to walk to Chelsea Market. Subway just a couple blocks away, if you stay for a few days make sure you get the 7 day subway pass it's so worth it.

The aircon is a real benefit right during the heatwave, Wifi is hassle free, and so convenient to have your own washer & dryer.  The CVS on the corner is again perfectly situated to easily get a top up coke for your bourbon, or to get some more beers.  Across the road from there is a good burger place too.

Would definitely recommend Meritxell's apartment, she is great with her communication too, thank you so much!
Lovely apartment, great location, very quiet. We really enjoyed our stay. Doorman building so safe and secure. Across the street from entrance to the Highline. Meritxell is a wonderful host.

A fantastic apartment in a superb location. We had a fabulous time in New York and I would definitely recommend staying at this apartment. It was much bigger than the pictures look too. Thanks so much Meritxell for your excellent communication and for the fab apartment.
We loved the location , bright airy spaces and having 2 bathrooms is just such a treat!

Our family enjoyed our stay at Meritxell's apartment.  As most have commented on the location next to the Highline is wonderful.  It is less easy to get crosstown if this is a requirement for you.  We used the subway once to get to Brooklyn which was easy.  Other times we walked and took Uber or Lyft if a bit further.  If you are not rushed for time the location is convenient to most places in Manhattan.  The apartment is well stocked with household supplies which makes cooking meals convenient and two full baths a bonus for NY. It is evident she lives in the apartment as we prefer to rent from home owners and not businesses that are all over Airbnb.  The communication with Meritxell was quick and transparent.  Meritxell is a lovely host as is her apartment. We would love to stay here the next time we are in NY.  One of our best stays on Airbnb.

A lovely apartment in a GREAT location. We loved being just steps from the High Line. The apartment was in a good building with excellent front desk staff. Very safe and secure. The apartment itself was very comfortable. We especially appreciated the beautiful shower in the master bathroom. The balcony was being renovated during our visit, which was the only negative. We hope to enjoy it on a future trip!
Lovely, comfortable apartment in a great doorman building in the heart of Chelsea.

The apartment was great for my family of four - nice updated fixtures and decor, comfortable beds, the a/c units made the bedrooms nice and cool.  The neighborhood location was just what we were looking for and it was nice having a doorman and an elevator.  We would definitely stay there again.

This was the best airbnb apartment I've stayed at so far in NYC.  One thing I greatly appreciate is that it is obviously a legal airbnb so I don't have to pretend I'm a friend visiting so and so if asked.  The two bedrooms and bathrooms are on opposite ends of the apartment so there is a lot of privacy.  The location is perfect.  Having a doorman is a huge plus!  The apartment is well appointed, clean and comfortable.  I already booked my next stay in NY at this apartment before I even checked out!  Highly recommended.

We would highly recommend this rental!  A safe, fun location with convenient transit locations.   We had 16 people from our tennis club in NYC for U. S. Open staying at four locations.  The others used AirBNB and did not have nearly as nice a place to stay as we did.  We boasted a bit.  I thought the apartment was larger than it appeared on photos (which is unusual.)  The doormen were very nice.

 We literally walked a few steps out the front door and up onto The High Line, which is fabulous, and it ends at the wonderful Chelsea Market! 
Don Giovanni around corner on 10th was great Italian and we found a great breakfast two blocks down at Chelsea Square (open 24 hr for those wee hours.)

Don't forget (newcomers to NYC) that if you get the weekly subway pass that you can also ride the bus, too.

Tracy - Chattanooga, TN

Meritxell's apartment is located Right next to the Highline in the popular area of Chelsea.  
Meritxell was always very prompt at responding to any questions we had and the doormen were extremely helpful and friendly giving advice on best routes etc 
The apartment was a fantastic base for our week long stay in NY with the added bonus of a balcony. Meritxell also gave a tremendous amount of information on a variety of restaurants, transport, supermarkets which made everything run very smoothly. 
We would definitely recommend this apartment and hope to return again to enjoy NY as there is still so much for us to explore. 
Thank you
Great apartment. Great location. Very clean and well stocked. Great view!!
Meritxell‘s Appartement is klasse! Für unseren girlstrip genau richtig gewesen! Es is sauber, groß genug und hat eine klasse Lage!

Meritxell's place is fantastic. Great location, spotless, large and comfortable, with a beautiful view. Meritxell also quickly answered all our questions. Oerall it was a pleasure staying at her home.

We absolutely loved staying at Meritxell’s apartment. Everything was so perfect! The apartment was so clean and there was a lot more space than we thought. It was also great having 2 bathrooms. The apartment is in such a great location and had everything we needed. Meritxell’s communication was excellent. Thanks so much Meritxell!
We had an amazing stay at Meritxell’s place. Great space, clean and centrally located, everything we needed was right at our doorstep. Would gladly stay here again the next time we’re in NYC.
We enjoyed this wonderful house while staying in New York for the New York marathon,  The owner is fantastic and was very helpful and prompt with any quarries. We hope to come back soon.

We absolutely loved our stay here. The apartment was amazing, a great location, and Meritxell was a great host. We would definitely recommend it to others, and will hopefully get the chance to stay again when we next visit NYC.

The apartment is stylishly furnished and very comfortable.  The location couldn't be better, with an entrance to the Highline on the block, terrific restaurants nearby, and easy access to anywhere in Manhattan. We really appreciated the stocked cupboards. I will definitely return on my next trip to NYC.
Everything about this place is great! Meritxell is a wonderful host.

Meritxell’s place is in the heart of Chelsea. A quick walk to coffee passes you by several world class art exhibits and the High line is directly under your nose for a more relaxing stroll. Spacious 2 bdrm with a full kitchen and quiet neighbors, which comfortably slept 4. Apartment management and door man were on site and quite helpful. Overall, would stay again.

Meritxell, and her place, were both amazing! My husband and I stayed here along with our 16 month old and were so comfortable during our stay. Meritxell was so accommodating, very responsive, and even allowed us to check out late. The next time we come to NYC, Meritxell's place is first on our list!

If I could give six stars for location I would - Just steps away from the highline. Great communication with the owner and quick response time. Apartment is lovely and clean. Doormen were super helpful and friendly. Looking forward to staying again.
Great location and a wonderful host!
Great apartment in a wonderful location, and so quiet! Meritxell is the perfect host with speedy responses to any queries.

What an amazing space! Located literally steps from the High Line and really close to Chealsea Market. Spacious 2Br / 2Ba apartment in Chealsea. We stayed with our 2 children so having 2 full bathrooms a huge bonus! Apartment looks newly remodeled with great amenities Meritxell was super responsive and easy to communicate with! Apartment is super quite at night too!

Amazing place. Very clean, stylish, and practical. Incredible location on the Highline and with good access to all areas of NYC. 

Host is very nice and easy to deal with and check-in is very straightforward. 

Highly recommend!

Abbiamo soggiornato nell'appartamento di Meritxell dal 26 dicembre al primo gennaio. La posizione è ottima. L'appartamento si trova a chelsea, relativamente vicino a tutto (20minuti a piedi da time square e dalla lower manhattan) ma senza essere nel pieno del caos di time square. Meritxell è un host eccellente. Risponde cortesemente e velocemente ad ogni messaggio. L'appartamento è esattamente come nelle foto. Assolutamemte consigliato.
This is a great apt.  What a way to stay in NYC !

Lovely place--you can see the High-Line from the balcony.  Good space and privacy.  Having a doorman 24/7 is a great amenity.  The four of us had a lovely stay and we would definitely stay again.  Good value and location.  Communication and information was perfect.   Thanks Meritxell!
This place is fantastic and perfect for business travel.  Merxitell is a wonderful host and very easy to communicate with.

Meritxell's apartment was absolutely amazing and perfect for what we wanted. We certainly appreciated it being spotless clean and very organized, exactly as shown in the pictures. Having all the amenities only contributed to a wonderful stay. She's also such an outstanding host, always prompting responding to our questions. I would not hesitate to have my parents stay there again next time they visit in NY.

This unit is exactly as it appears in the pictures. I stayed with my two daughters and 8-month old granddaughter. Loved that the living room separates the two bedrooms. Never heard the baby at night. Great location. Walked on the High Line every day. It was perfect for us!

This is my second time in this apartment.  I work at the Javits for conventions and I can walk there on the Highline in 10-15 minutes.  I also travel with a coworker and this apartment is laid out so that we both have our own privacy, bathroom ect.  I love this apartment!

This apartment was the best we ever had during our stays in NY. As space itself in NY already is luxury here is pure luxury by having an apartment with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, and the vicinity is unbeatable. Walk out of the house, cross the street and take up the stairs to the highline. Correspondance with Meritxell was supereasy and really fast. Everything was as shown in the pictures and even better. A 5 star experience. Highly recommendable.
Apartment was just as described and Meritxell was great about communication. We’d happily stay at her place again!
Séjour formidable, appartement très propre, très bien situé très au calme. Hôte très réactive et agréable. Je recommande ce logement!

Beautiful apartment in a great location! Everything was exactly as advertised in the description/photos, and Meritxell was very accomodating when we had some minor changes to our travel plans. Would not hesitate to stay here again!
Meritxell's place was exactly what we needed.  Clean, stylish and very comfortable.  Location was excellent and check in was very easy.  Meritxell was always very responsive with any questions I had.
Great location and perfect size for 2 couples, or a family of 4-5. Would definitely stay here again if I had the chance.
Fantastic place I a beautiful area. Very spacious for New York standards!

Wonderful apartment with great location. Fabulous restaurants & bars nearby - The Red Cat, The Meatball shop, Cookshop. Close to subway. Bright and airy apartment & spotlessly clean. Great spot to explore the mid and lower parts of Manhattan. Highly recommend staying here.

What a great stay we had at Meritxell's place! The apartment's location is fantastic -- steps to the Highline right out the front door. The neighborhood is great for all, from families to younger folks, it has everything. The size of the apartment is great for NY and two bedrooms and two full baths was a nice treat when traveling with my teen daughters. It is a sunny place, and very stylish and comfortable. We very much enjoyed everything about it, including having a friendly doorman to greet us each day and evening. We highly recommend this place to anyone!

The apartment is absolutely stunning and the pictures although accurate don't do the apartment justice! There were three of us and the size is great and with the two separate bathroom, it felt spacious! The apartment is beautifully decorated and spotless and fully equipped for your stay. Close to the highly line, subways and fabulous eateries nearby - we went to The Red Cat twice - delicious! Meritxell was a wonderful host - always quick to respond to any queries, friendly and accommodating ! We had a great stay!

El departamento es realmente muy agradable. El hecho que tenga 2 baños es inmejorable para 3 personas. Está ubicado en una zona bastante agradable además que queda cerca de todo para recorrer Manhattan. Justo en la esquina hay una Duane Reade que tiene todo lo necesario para comprar el desayuno y tener en el departamento. Las camas son muy cómodas. Lo único que podria observar si me pongo exigente es que Netflix está solo en Ingles, sin subtitulos.. y cuando estabamos muy cansados quisimos ver una pelicula y no pudimos.. pero en fin, no es una necesidad logicamente!
Fabulous location near most sights lovely walking along the Highline and into Chelsea. Nice spacious and stylish apartment highly recommended

Fantastic location, short walk to the subway and easy access to the HIghline.  The apartment is amazing, bright and spacious.   It was a great relaxing space to come into after the hustle and bustle of the city.  The kitchen has everything you need.  We felt so fortunate to have such a  lovely home for the few short days we were in New York.  Thank you Meritxell!
Sehr schönes Appartment in bester Lage. Geschmackvoll eingerichtet

A lovely apartment to stay in, clean, comfortable and spacious.
Nice quiet area next to the High Line and Chelsea Market. The Red Cat Restaurant which is just around the corner serves wonderful food.

We stayed in this apartment for a month. Having 2 bathrooms and an extra bed was a real bonus for a long stay. The view from the balcony creates a sense of openness and space. The apartment was quiet and comfortable. Meritxell was always available available at short notice to answer any questions we had. We got our departure date wrong and she was expedient and helpful in resolving this issue. We would definitely stay again.
