Meritxell’s place is very inviting,  comfortable and conveniently located.  You can expect a quick response, which is great!  We also really enjoyed the proximity to the Highline.  It was a wonderful vacation!

Great appartement, great location, great experience !
Close to the Highline this clean apartment have a nice view on Chelsea.
Das Apartment war perfekt in Ausstattung , Einrichtung und Lage! Wir haben uns rundum wohlgefühlt!

A clean and cute spacious place in a great neighbourhood for art galleries and access to the west Hudson path. 

Good light, which is sometimes hRd to get in NY.

Nice to sit on the balcony and watch the highline.

The host was responsive and we enjoyed our time here.
Piso muy bien situado, agradable, con todo lo necesario para estar como en casa.

Realized after checked-in at the apartment that 2 out of 3 air-conditioning were not working as the apartment was not cooling down after a while. Tried to call and sent message to Meritxell but without response. I contacted AirBnB which was very helpful in reaching out to the host and solving the issue. Meritxell finally responded and admitted that she was aware about airco broen downand would send a technician to look at it. The technician came and could not fix it so we had no choice but to looked for a new accommodation as it was not possible to stay without airco during hot August in NYC. Managed to get a full refund back from AirBnB but had to pay almost double to 2 hotel rooms due to last minute booking in high season. I understand this thing can happen but would appreciate if the host informed us upfront about the issue so we can already prepared for alternative solutions and not to find out ourselves after checking-in; having to spend hours looking for a solution and moving to another place.
Beautiful apartment in a fantastic location!
A wonderful apartment in a fantastic location. Meritxell is a lovely host and very responsive to any request.
This is a great apartment in a fun area of Manhattan. Meritxell was easy to communicate with and her suggestions for the area were perfect.
We loved the location and enjoyed all of Chelsea and the Highline.   The place was very convenient to multiple cool things to do.  Thank you very much!!
If you are looking for a 2 bed, 2 bathroom apartment in a great location in Manhattan you would hard pressed to find one better than Meritxell ‘s place. It’s a winner.
Great location in Chelsea! Very clean and safe neighborhood with really cute food and bars nearby Very convenient. Local travel guides provided and great tips left by host!
A perfect stay in a superb appartment. And what a view of the most pleasant park of New York.

Great place

Great location
Appartement très agréable bénéficiant d’un très bon emplacement.
Great apartment located near or close enough to most places lots of great food places nearby
Great host, great apartment  in a good location. Ideal location for a trip with my teenage son.
Everything about our stay was outstanding, would highly recommend.

We stayed (4 adults) for 6 nights in early November 2018 and had a great time in NYC! Great apartment with elevator, doorman, and it is completely stocked with everything even great NYC travel books. Amazing Chelsea location! Highly recommend it.
Great location!

We had a lovely week long stay this month in this beautiful apartment. It was so comfortable. The 2 bedrooms and two baths made it extra nice since we were traveling with our 28 year old son. Loved the balcony and view. We had snow while we were there and it was so cool watching the storm from the apartment. Its so close to great restaurants and galleries. We would definitely rent again. Thank you so much Meritxell! 
Mary Clare and Joe and Kevin

It was nicer than I expected staying right on the high line; more than a park it was a quicker prettier way to get around. Meritxell's is a nice unit, we found it very quiet. It was great that the doormen were so welcoming. It's very awkward to find out that a building you're staying in frowns on AirBnb; we didn't experience that here!
Excellent apartment.  Great location.
This place is clean, quiet and a great place to stay. Highly recommend.
Great location, very clean, all very much as described...would visit again

We had an Amazing Girls time in NYC.  The condo was perfect!  2 bedrooms and 2 baths.  There was a small balcony that looked over Chelsea and the Highline.   Chelsea is the cutest little area with great restaurants and shops.  We could not find a super close subway station so we mainly used Uber.  We also decided that using the subway for 4 and using an Uber were very close in price and found the Uber to be much more convenient.  The condo had the perfect amount of amenities.  It was super clean!  The showers were perfect with the right amount of water pressure.  
Meritxell was very responsive to several questions that arose while we were there. 
Edwin, the doorman was so kind and helpful!
We will definitely stay here again!
Amazing apartment in the Chelsea district of manhattan, well equipped stunning apartment and a fantastic host! Can’t ask for much more! Don’t hesitate to book! Thank you again for a lovely stay!
This is the second time I've stayed at Meritxell's place.  I'll always look to see if this place is open first on any trip I have in NYC.
Beautiful apartment in a great location.  Very clean, really comfy beds and a brilliant view from the balcony! Would highly recommend staying in this apartment.

Easy check in.  Great location next to the highline.  Good value if you like extra space and travel with a family of 4.  The extra bedroom and bath are fantastic luxury.   Lots of spices left in the kitchen makes it easy to make breakfast.  Would love to stay here with my family again any time.

If you're in NYC, you should definitely stay here!  The apartment is in the perfect Chelsea location.  It is close to the high line, subway and CVS.  Neighborhood is great.  The apartment itself is spacious and well-decorated.  It has everything you need for a comfortable, pleasant stay.
We greatly enjoyed the stay. It is a great location in NYC and has great setting.
Wunderschöne Wohnung in perfekter Lage

Wonder comfortable spacious apartment. Easy access to the high line and a few blocks from the E and 1 lines of the subway. Chelsea neighbourhood is fantastic with amazing restaurants in easy walking distance. We would stay again in a heartbeat. Meritxell was a great host and quick responses were received to all our questions before and during our stay and we were even granted a late checkout before a long flight home.
All great at this apartment. Lovely and clean with everything you need near by.
Parfait ! L’appartement est parfait. Très bien situé. Bien équipé et proche de tout. Meritxell est une réactive et attentive. Bref séjour parfait. Nous recommandons !

What an amazing place and location!  
We stayed for a long weekend while visiting the 9/11 memorial and museum (a must see), the Met, and taking in a couple of Broadway shows.  The condo was perfect for the three of us and would easily accommodate more.  We appreciated the decor, door men, views, neighborhood, and especially the quietness of the unit. 
It is a perfect place to take in all of the city while feeling a part of a neighborhood.  
We can't wait to return.

name: Cute apart with terrace Downtown !
summary: Super fast wifi. Charming apartment in Las Ramblas of Barcelona wiht private terrace on the second floor. Completely equipped with Internet, aircond, etc. Exceptional location next to the Gothic district, Barcelona's harbour, Barceloneta, Raval... perfect!
space: The open kitchen, living and dining room are  designed with Wood-beam ceilings and brick walls following the Catalan tradition. The living room has a double bed sofa. It has a TV and DVD player . Internet WIFI service available. The bedroom is small but cozy, has a double bed, a wardrobe and acces to a  balcony. The kitchen is fully equipped with coffee maker, toaster, oven, microwave and washing machine. The bathroom is complete with shower, toilet and sink. Towels and bed linen provided. The apartment has air conditioning and heating. The balcony overlooking the street Santa Monica. No elevator in the building :) But since we had a guest of 85 years old who climbed them super we know anyone can handle it just fine ;) Authenticity of the center is present!
description: Super fast wifi. Charming apartment in Las Ramblas of Barcelona wiht private terrace on the second floor. Completely equipped with Internet, aircond, etc. Exceptional location next to the Gothic district, Barcelona's harbour, Barceloneta, Raval... perfect! The open kitchen, living and dining room are  designed with Wood-beam ceilings and brick walls following the Catalan tradition. The living room has a double bed sofa. It has a TV and DVD player . Internet WIFI service available. The bedroom is small but cozy, has a double bed, a wardrobe and acces to a  balcony. The kitchen is fully equipped with coffee maker, toaster, oven, microwave and washing machine. The bathroom is complete with shower, toilet and sink. Towels and bed linen provided. The apartment has air conditioning and heating. The balcony overlooking the street Santa Monica. No elevator in the building :) But since we had a guest of 85 years old who climbed them super we know anyone can handle it just fine ;) Authenticity o
neighborhood_overview: This cozy resort apartment is situated in a prime location: Las Ramblas of Barcelona (certainly in its most beautiful side near the  seafront and the statue of Christopher Columbus).
notes: Tourist tax: the 7 first nights in Barcelona are charged with a touristic tax. Hosts over 16 years old will have to pay 2,48 euros per night. This amount has to be paid in cash.
transit: Well conected. Main sights walking distance three Metro stations nearby: Catalunya line 1 or 3 Drassanes line 3 Liceo line 3
access: Guests can access the entire property :)
interaction: We are always available to help. Inside or outside the apartment during your stay in Barcelona :) We love hosting visitors from all around the world in our great city. Meeting new people is always a surprise and very interesting. Respect to all cultures is our priority and principle. Welcome!
house_rules: Keep it clean and leave it in good conditions. Kitchen cleaned up and trash taken out. All it takes is common sense :) -Passports needed at the arrival of each guest to register with the police (as local law governs)  - Parties are not allowed. Neighbors must be respected at all times since you enter the building. (Infringement of these prior obligations authorizes the Host to request Guests to leave the department immediately without refund).  Late check in fee  Check in from 8:00 p.m to 10:00 p.m: 30€ Check in from 10:00 p.m to 00:00 a.m: 50€  Check in after 00am: 60€  Guests use the facilities at their own risk and the owner of the apartment is not responsible for any personal injuries that may occur to guests due to their use: such as accidental damage, theft or other risks. (Despite any situation we will always offer our support and help :) Baby crib and highchair under availability. Please request and will let you know along with the price.  The loss of keys will have a charge of

host.host_about:
Hello to everyone :) As owners we love being able to offer our apartments during your experience in the wonderful city of Barcelona. We welcome all cultures, religions and tastes. For us there is no discrimination but respect. Perfection does not exist but we strive to offer good conditions for your stay to be very positive. The only thing we like to ask is for our guests to be happy and positive. See you soon!

_

Hola a todo el mundo :) Nos encanta poder ofrecer nuestros apartamentos durante su experiencia en la maravillosa ciudad de Barcelona. Damos la bienvenida a todas las culturas, religiones y gustos. Para nosotros no existe la discriminación pero sí el respeto. La perfección no existe pero nosotros nos esforzamos por ofrecer unas buenas condiciones para que su estancia sea muy positiva. Lo único que nos gusta pedir es que nuestros huéspedes sean alegres y positivos. Hasta pronto!

reviews.comments:
Great location although the taxi driver got confused with a different address nearby.
Check in and out was very efficiently organized.
The apartment is on the 4th floor and not on the 2nd.
Shame we could not use the roof terrace much due to the weather.

Would love to stay again.

Thanks.
Stefan

Nous avons passé 6 jours fin mai dans cet appartement. Côté emplacement il est à 50m du bas de la Rambla donc idéalement situé pour visiter ou aller vers la plage. L'appartement correspond au descriptif de l'annonce. Il faut toutefois annoter que la terrasse est accessible en sortant de l'appartement et en montant d'un étage. Côté équipement c'était bien. Nous avons  eu des odeurs désagréables presque en permanence malgré la fenêtre ouverte en permanence dans la salle de bain. Les voisins de l'étage inférieurs (touristes français) ayant fait la fête toutes les nuits ont un peu perturbé mon sommeil et les 3 bars de la rue génèrent un peu de nuisance sonore mais c'est Barcelone avec sa vie nocturne.
Côté accueil ce fut parfait avec un accueil chaleureux.

L'appartement est vraiment bien, propre et bien situé ! 
arrivé en bas de l'immeuble on peut craindre un peu pour la suite car la porte est tagué et la cage d'escalier laisse un peu a desirer mais pas de panique, rien a redire vis a vis de la terasse ou de l'appartement. 
un peu de bruit avt minuit mais c'est barcelone et dans l'ensemble c'etait calme ! 
bref je le recommande ! c'etait un super sejour pr nous ! 
Merci !

Gemütliches Apartment mitten im Trubel der Stadt, nur 50m entfernt von La Ramblas und der nächsten Metro. In der Wohnung ist alles vorhanden, was man für einen Kurztrip benötigt. Die Dachterrasse kann sehr schön zum Frühstück oder für längere Abende genutzt werden. Optimaler Standort für Städtereisende.

Ce fut un séjour plutôt agréable, nous n'avons pas rencontré Martha, mais les personnes de la sous traitance qui nous ont ouvert la porte était OK, L'appartement est bien situé, métro, tout près de la mer, parfait, et si vous ne voulez pas vous embêter avec le petit dêjeuner l'hotel ""basic and chic" juste en bas propose de copieux petits dêj pas chers du tout.

Appartement bien situé (entre Ramblas, marchés et Barceloneta), très fonctionnel (lave-linge) et une belle terrasse rien que pour nous. A recommander!!!

Merci Marta :)
Bel appartement, équipement complet, très bien situé et personnes arrangeantes et sympatiques.

Our stay here was absolutely amazing! The apartment is in a great location making it very easy to either walk to Las Ramblas, jump on the metro or a short taxi ride to anywhere else within the city. Our flight arrived to Barcelona around 7AM and Daniel was kind enough to meet us early! The apartment was the perfect size for the two of us with plenty of bathroom space as well. Although it was cooler weather, the terrace is absolutely amazing and only you get access to it. I can guarantee the next time I'm in Barça, I would stay here again!

We felt very welcome and was greeted at the door when we arrived. only 15 min away form the airport in taxi and perfect location for visiting both sides of the Rambla. A bit of noise from the street during nights, but would live here again due to location. very satisfied.

The apartment was perfect! It placed right in the heart of the city, perfect walking distance to all places we wanted to visit. Metro station in few steps from the apartment, so if we needed to go somewhere far from the city center we used the metro. The apartment was the right size for us, comfortable, clean and great having a terrace on the roof! Yes, there is no lift in the attic and the building but it's good for burning calories! ) This was our first time using airbnb and we had the really good experience, would definitely come back here again. Thanks for being great hosts!

The landlord is very nice and always with a smile to welcome us on the first day. The house is the same as it is shown in the pictures and the balcony is so well to have a relax in the sunshine. The house position is so fantastic as it is near the La Rambla within one minute's walk to the main road. It is so convenient for us to have a breakfast  or lunch when we woke up in the morning as there has many restaurants.  Overall, the trip is like a dream with this apartment.

Had a great 7-night stay at Marta's Apt. Great location! A cozy 30 second walk from La Rambla and a 15 min walk to barceloneta (beach).
2 minute walk to the nearest metro. Plenty of nice restaurants, bars, museums in walking distance.
At night you will hear some noise (not much) from the nearby bars but that was nothing that bothered us.

Best thing about the place is definitely the private roof top terrace. We spent all our mornings there enjoying breakfast and the april sun. Overall the apt is in good shape and we have no complaints.

Didn't meet Marta but the guys from inoutapartments were nice and helpful and we had no problems with check-in/contract signing/check-out.
Would recommend.
Charming apartment with a great location. About 5 flights of steps but the rooftop deck is worth it!

Es war einfach perfekt. Die Lage ist ideal, um vieles in der Stadt zu unternehmen oder einfach nur zum Hafen oder Strand spazieren zu gehen. Die Betreuung vor Ort war sehr nett und hilfsbereit, die Wohnung entsprach voll und ganz der Erwartung und war mit Dachterrasse einfach wirklich schön. Im nahen Umfeld findet man alles, was einem so in den Kopf kommt, vom Supermarkt bis zum netten Café um die Ecke. Jederzeit eine gute Empfehlung. Für uns bestimmt die Unterkunft für den nächsten Besuch.

We had a wonderful time at Marta's apartment. It was clean and in a great location! Right next to the metro station and within walking distance to the beach and harbour.

We really enjoyed the terrace for breakfasts in the morning! 

Would recommend and stay here again :)

We were made to feel so welcome by David when we arrived. The flat is lovely, in a great location 1 min walk from La Ramblas and the flat had everything we needed including iron and hairdryer and comfy bed and air con etc. The terrace was a real sun trap and got the sun all day, it was great that it was our private space we could relax in. The only thing that wasn't ideal was 6 small flights of stairs with luggage but after all our tapas and sangria it was quite nice to have the extra exercise! We had a great time and would definitely stay here again. Thanks!

Host met us at the appartment late in the evening and was very helpful in giving us directions to the appartment. Perfect location for everything that you would need to do in Barcelona and the met is a 2 minute walk away if you wish to go further afield. The terrace provides brilliant sunset views of tibidabo

As we arrived in Santa Monica Street, we warmly greeted by David. 
He welcomed and warned us of the the 4th flour climb of 71 steps. 
Kindly he offered to carry our bags up the stairs , Whew! 
Accommodation was comfortable and tastefully decorated and very secure and safe. 
From that day forth we vowed we would venture up and down only once per day. 
The location of Marta's apartment was fantastic; so close to La Rumbla and Port Vell and situated in a little laneway. 
 Early in the evening could e a little noisey but with window closed, fine. After all we were in a vibrant exciting part of the city.  Thank you David for your warm greeting and fond farewell.

The whole experience with the apartment was good, the check in was punctual and all was as advertised in the ad. Being an Airbnb host myself I lacked the personal touch of the place. It's run more like a business, the up-side obviously being that everyting was very well kept and no surprises. The hosts were very nice and always helpful. This is a central and tidy place right in the middle of things!

We loved staying at Marta's apartment. The whole check-in process was great, our hosts were very communicative. The apartment was very clean everything was just as it was advertised. The terrace was a nice place to rest after a log day of touring. The location was great - central and walking distance to everything. Would be happy to stay again!

Das Apartment liegt genau bei der Ramblaz und hat daher eine perfekte Lage und man kann alles gut erreichen. Es war in der Nacht ruhig, auch wenn es direkt an der Ramblaz war. Das Apartment war sehr sauber und gut ausgestattet. Für 3 Personen ist es ein wenig eng aber es ist machbar. Was ich schad fand, dass die Wohnung nicht einer Privatperson gehört und man sich eher wie in einem Hotel gefühlt hatte und nicht das richtige "Airbnb-Feeling" hatte. Das Apartment kann ich jedem weiterempfehlen und das beste war die Dachterrasse mit einem tollen Blick über Barcelona.
Danke!

This was my very first Airbnb experience and it couldn't have been better. Location was amazing, walking distance to many of our scheduled points to visit. The flat itself feels very homelike and cosy, and let's not forget the terrace that provided us with a perfect space for lazy evenings with cheese, jamon and sangria. Everything went well and smoothly and I would easily stay again
Great welcome. Fantastic appartment with everything you need. Great to have aircon in the Barcelona heat. Amazing roof top deck to use. Really central and close to everything. Would recommend.
Great location! Great hosts! Rooftop terrace was so nice to relax and have a snack! Comfortable bed and nice living space!
David met us and was super helpful - he even carried our very heavy bags up 5 flights of stairs! He gave us great restaurants to try... And, he ordered an early morning taxi for us.
great appartement in the middle of la ramblas. very easy to reach the nightlife, the beach or restaurants.

My daughter and her grandmother stayed here and had a lovely time, a very clean, nice and central apartment.  Only a minute to La Rambla and the metro, also, the host was very helpfull and precise. Would definitly come back sometime!

We had a wonderful time in Marta and Paul's apartment. Paul is super friendly and was always available. He even carried my huge luggage up all the stairs, which was so nice. The apartment is exactly as shown in the photos and the the rooftop terrace is beautiful and offers an amazing view. It is located absolutely central and close to metro, beach and in a really interesting, diverse neighborhood, right by the lively rambles but on a small, quiet street. Kitchen is fully equipped with everything one could possibly need and even has a washing machine which was great for us as we were traveling over a longer period of time. Can definitely recommend Marta and Paul's apartment, thanks so much!

The place was very central to La Rambla. Check in instructions were sent only 30-40 min before check in but they sent someone to meet us at the place to inform us of check in/stay/check out details which was very helpful. Be prepared to pay a 30 euro initial check in fee and tourist tax (~2-3 euros per day) for each day each person is there at check in (not included in cost of place)... the place was very well stocked and had everything we needed. There was mold in the shower, a couple leaky/loose faucets, and guests are expected to buy their own toilet paper once the partial first roll provided was gone. Other than those few complaints everything was good! I would recommend the place!

The flat is as pictured - small, but cosy. The TV did not work as far as we tried, but that's not what we were in Barcelona for anyway : ) LOTS of stairs, more than anticipated, but as others have said - helped to work off sangria and tapas! The roof terrace was nice to have, though we didn't personally end up using it much after all due to rain. Was a bit noisy at night with the echo of people outside even with the windows closed. Overall, an amazing location for the price and cozy quarters to make you truly feel like you live in Barcelona for a few days. Kitchen is fully equipped if interested to make a meal. If you're not looking for something fancy, and want a great location with outdoor access for a good price, would recommend.

Everything what we need for a superb vacation was available in the apartment. We really enjoyed the terrace for breakfast and dinner. It was cozy and clean. Perfect for two people. The flat is ideally located in the city center. In the same street are a supermarket and some bars. It is not far from the metro Drassanes (L2). We met Paul for the check-in and the communication with the host was easy.
Very nice place off Las Ramblas.  Perfect location, clean apartment and cute terrace on the roof.  Lots of stairs so maybe not for the less mobile!  Would stay here again. Thank you!

Place is in an amazing location .. you can walk literally everywhere - Rambla 2min, gothic part 5 min, beach 20 min... basically no walk is more then 45 min - doesn’t matter what you want to see..
Place is 1 min walk from Subway/ Metro.. green line- gets you anywhere...
Taxi from airport was 25€- not bad ... 
hosts are super friendly and everything was better then I expected .
Strongly recommend!

A charming apartment in one of the older buildings in Barcelona with original style and features. A nice roof terrace for a cool evening drink. Close to great cafes and bars and easy location 5 mkins fm the Metro or Ramblas or the seafront. Always love Barcelona!
small but nice place, good location - terrace was perfect!

Apartament is located In the heart of Barcelona next to Main street LaRambla. Full furnitured, air condition and with extra linen and towels. Very nice terrace on the top of the roof. I can really recommend this place.
Fantastic apartment in a great area. 2 minutes from the metro, lots of bars and restaurants in walking distance.  Beach about 20 minute walk away. We had a brilliant time.

The check-in process was easy and quick. We didn't get to meet Marta or Paul but their friend Josep greeted us on time as scheduled. He was great to talk to! Beautiful small apartment that has everything you need. Roof top patio is special and the apartment's location is perfect - right off La Rambla. This is a fabulous Airbnb. Super clean too. Perfect for a couple. We would stay here again if we happen to find oursleves back in Barcelona on future travel.
lovely clean apartment located in perfect location and thankful for helping us find the apartment when we were lost. very good communication. would stay again
位置非常好,房东非常热情｡非常好的一次入住
Great place, great location, quick communication.
Great place for a couple. Rooftop is a nice getaway. Easy access to a lot of places in Barcelona.

The apartment was lovely and met all expectations. Location is amazing and close to everything. It was also amazingly quiet at night time considering the proximity to bars and La Rambla. I've stayed at other places in the same area over the years and could hear people partying all night long, so was pleasantly surprised that I could sleep through the nights (even on the weekend) uninterrupted. The host was gracious, friendly, and offered assistance should we need it (we didn't). The only other feedback I would give is that I was not able to confirm check in details until the day before my trip although I had been messaging for several days. When I finally connected with the host, he advised that he preferred me to either call or text upon arrival, which was difficult as I was not planning on bringing a cell phone with an international plan with me on the trip, which I ended up changing at the last minute so that I'd be able to connect with the host.
We loved Marta and Paul's place. Perfect location and very clean. Would highly recommend.
房东小哥很热情,接待很周到,房子不大,但很干净,有大件行李的旅客不太适合,楼层较高,但是露台很完美,总体来说还是不错的体验!

This place was just perfect. My friend and I enjoyed it a lot. Location was great. The apartment was super clean. We really liked the rooftop. Marta and Paul were gone while we stayed at their place but they had a friend of theirs checking us in. He was super nice, communication was great, everything worked out perfectly. I can highly recommend this air bnb for a getaway in Barcelona.
Nice, clean apartment within short walking distance La Rambla and El Raval area. Josep helped us check in a little early and was nice enough to give some recommendations.
Nice apartment, helpful and comunicative hosts, perfect location, unsuitable for a stroller (too many stairs).

Excellent situation, close to metro, big supermarkets, the major sights and downtown. 
We would warn anyone who is not good with steps that there are 71 steep steps on 5 floors to reach the apartment but once in, it has everything for an enjoyable stay.

We stayed at Marta + Paul's place for 9 nights during our stay in Barcelona. Very cute little apartment with a rustic feel with wood beams across the ceiling and brick accent walls. Perfect little place to recharge between adventures in Barcelona. Most important to us was the location of the apartment. You are just steps away from the nearest metro stop for the L3 line at Drassanes. Either way gets you to Plaza Espanya or Plaza Catalunya in just a couple minutes. You are just a 10-15 minute walk away from Barcenoleta and the beach. In general very centrally located.

Make sure you are okay with stairs. Walking up and down 5 flights is a good workout. You are very centrally located thus get some street noise at night especially during weekends. Didn't bother us one bit but if you are picky about that sort of thing you should probably look farther away from the city center.

Thanks again Marta and Paul!

Marta & Paul's place has a great location! Super central to everything. Everything was super smooth and the terrace on top is a great place to sit in the sun and have a drink or two :) 
Though it does test your fitness a little with the stairs but the listing is very honest about it and we were well prepared. 

Would love to stay here again :)

This apartment is very inespensive, and in a great location. However, it is 1) very small, I think even by European standards; and 2) it is 70 steps up a narrow and steep stairwell. If you have a lot of luggage or any difficulty climbing stairs, I would not recommend it. On the other hand, if you have one or two bags, and don’t mind the daily forced exercise, then you’ll enjoy the apartment! Also, it had a bit of a musty smell when I arrived, but this was quickly cleared with the several windows. If your priorities are location and budget, I recommend it.

name: Há 1 quadra da praia e 2 do metrô
summary: Quarto de casal com suite, ala, ar condicionado nos dois ambientes, tv na sala e qua, wifi, tv a cabo, uma cama de casal e duas de solteiros, cozinha completa, microondas, fogão,  geladeira, cafeteira, portaria com porteiros 24 h, arejado fresco.
space: O apartamento tem ótimo astral e totalmente arejado, há uma quadra da praia mais famosa do mundo, Copacabana. As festas de reveillon estão há duas quadras do apartamento podendo ir a pé, já que também em Copacabana não transita carro nesse dia após o meio dia. O apartamento tem todo o conforto e equipamentos desejados e necessários para uma estada de férias. Ao lado da Clínica Galdino Campos que faz medicina do viajante e tem atendimento especializado para turistas, com médicos e funcionários especializados. Embaixo do prédio te um restaurante que leva comida em casa. Está situado ha 300 metros do metrô. Tem portaria 24 horas.
description: Quarto de casal com suite, ala, ar condicionado nos dois ambientes, tv na sala e qua, wifi, tv a cabo, uma cama de casal e duas de solteiros, cozinha completa, microondas, fogão,  geladeira, cafeteira, portaria com porteiros 24 h, arejado fresco. O apartamento tem ótimo astral e totalmente arejado, há uma quadra da praia mais famosa do mundo, Copacabana. As festas de reveillon estão há duas quadras do apartamento podendo ir a pé, já que também em Copacabana não transita carro nesse dia após o meio dia. O apartamento tem todo o conforto e equipamentos desejados e necessários para uma estada de férias. Ao lado da Clínica Galdino Campos que faz medicina do viajante e tem atendimento especializado para turistas, com médicos e funcionários especializados. Embaixo do prédio te um restaurante que leva comida em casa. Está situado ha 300 metros do metrô. Tem portaria 24 horas.  Os hóspedes terão todo meu apoio durante a estadia no meu apartamento. Estarei acessível para qualquer informação, in
neighborhood_overview: Copacabana é um bairro conhecido no mundo todo. Tem as mais variadas diversões, como: teatro, shows, cinemas, compras, restaurantes, bares, boates, etc Tem 2 dos maiores hospitais particulares do Rio. Clinicas de atendimento a turista, farmácias e vários supermercados. Tem uma feira de artesanato que funciona todos os dias à noite e sábados e domingos o dia todo. Tem o mar, de Copacabana, mas dá para ir a pé para Ipanema e Leblon. Tem blocos de carnaval. Tem várias casas de câmbio. E bem pertinho do shopping Rio Sul que tem ônibus gratuito. Copacabana é necessariamente um roteiro para qualquer turista.  O apartamento fica a 100 m do famoso hotel Copacabana Palace.
notes: Há que se cuidar de pivetes, como toda cidade grande e turística, os turistas devem sair com poucos objetos para a rua, sem portar jóias e objetos valiosos expostos, como grandes câmeras e equipamentos eletrônicos. O povo carioca é hospitaleiro e agradável, mas peça informações em lojas e locais seguros.
transit: Tem um ponto de Bike para alugar a 100 m do apartamento. Tem ônibus e metrô para toda a cidade do Rio de Janeiro. Tem táxi a noite toda. Ônibus gratuito para Shopping Rio Sul.
access: Os hóspedes terão todo meu apoio durante a estadia no meu apartamento.
interaction: Estarei acessível para qualquer informação, independente de ser um problema da locação.  Qualquer informação de local para diversão, compras, cultura, poderão se informar comigo.
house_rules: A casa deve ser preservada como se fosse sua. O prédio é residencial e possui mutas famílias morando ali, inclusive a minha, portanto deve-se primar pelo respeito a essas famílias.  Deverá ser seguido rigorosamente o número de habitantes do contrato. O máximo será de 4 pessoas. O lixo deverá ser retirado diariamente, sem deixar acúmulo nas imediações. Devem ser seguidas as regras do condomínio.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Chambre en colocation
summary: 1 canadien, 1 française+ 1 australien. appart fournis ac laveuse+sécheuse.Grande chambre avec Balcon. situé au croisement Laurier et papineau, proche de tout les commerces ( metro, couche tard, jean coutu, ...). Parc Laurier, colocs très sympas!!

name: Deluxe Family Suites Two-Bedroom 6 Px With Kitchen
summary: Apartment a self-catering accommodation located in the Historic Peninsula. Sultanahmet area, which houses many historic landmarks such as Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia and Blue Mosque, is within a walking distance.
space: Situated 800 metres from the historic Sultanahmet area with Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque and Topkapi Palace, this property offers self-catering accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi.With parquet floors, the rooms at apartments feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a work desk. The private bathrooms come with a shower hairdryer and free toiletries.You can prepare your meals in the privacy of your own kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. Situated in a historic neighbourhood with cafés and restuarants you can also venture out and sense the local atmosphere.The staff will be more than happy to help you with car rentals, tour information and ironing services. Cemberlitas Tram Station is 350 metres away offering easy access to other sites in the city. Ataturk Airport is within 15 km and airport shuttle services are arranged at an additional fee.The apartment is 72 squaremeter and maximum 6 person stay. The apartment is on the ground floor.
description: Apartment a self-catering accommodation located in the Historic Peninsula. Sultanahmet area, which houses many historic landmarks such as Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia and Blue Mosque, is within a walking distance. Situated 800 metres from the historic Sultanahmet area with Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque and Topkapi Palace, this property offers self-catering accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi.With parquet floors, the rooms at apartments feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a work desk. The private bathrooms come with a shower hairdryer and free toiletries.You can prepare your meals in the privacy of your own kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. access: Internet: Free! WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge. Parking: Private parking is possible on site (reservation is not needed) and costs EUR 10 per day. Services: Car hire, Shuttle service (surcharge), Airport shuttle (surcharge), Tour desk, Ticket service, Luggage storage, Private check-in/check-out, Ironing service, General: Non-smoking rooms, Family rooms, Heating, Non-smoking throughout, Air conditioning Languages spoken: Turkish, English

host.host_about:
Merhaba.

Ben Emre'can 1995 Yılında İstanbul'da Doğdum Asıl Memleketim Samsun'dur Fakat Doğma Büyüme İstanbul Fatih İlçesinde Yaşıyorum. 3 Yıl Önce Yani 2015'de İstanbul Üniversitesi Turizm Otelcilik Bölümünden Mezun Oldum, ve 2013 Yılından Buyana Apart Hotel İşletmecisiyim. Bizim İçin Burada En Önemli Olan Şeylerden Birisi Misafirlerimizin Bizden Memnun Kalmasıdır Misafirlerimiz Bir Apart'da Değilde Evlerinde Kalıyorlarmış Gibi Hissettirmektir,

Kind Regards,
Emre CELIK
Alhambra Apart Hotel
Reservation & General Manager
Adress : Emin Sinan Mahallesi Okul Sokak No.2 Istanbul Sultanahmet

reviews.comments:
It is a small guest house with the several apartments. We had one with two bedrooms. Pretty nice flat, everything like wrote in description and shown on photos. We have been in Istanbul on New Year holidays and it was a good place in the center of the old city. 
Thanks for help Yaşarcan ))

I have been using Airbnb for a long time but I've never seen this kind of helpful service. Emre who was the owner is so kind and try to help you whatever problem you have. Rooms are clean and big. They have airport shuttle which is really affordable.  It was my best experience on Airbnb so I overly recommend it.

Emre and his cousin are great hosts. They were really friendly and assist us with whatever we needed. The room was bigger than expected. However, we had some issues with the room but he changed us to another one without any problem. 
I went with my husband, baby and parents, and we all have enjoyed our stayed there. We would stay with them again in the future.  Gracias, Emre and Ugur!

Emre, our host and his assistant made our trip memorable! They were incredibly accommodating and took excellent care of us, we felt like family. We would stay there again! Close to the Blue Mosque and the Grand Bazaar. Hope to go back !

Alhambra and its thoughtful team received us with arms wide open. From the moment we stepped into the residence we were flooded with welcoming amenities, careful guidance and a personal approach that made our short stay feel much more intimate. A truly unforgettable experience.

Много кроватей, красивый потолок!! Отличное место положение! Всегда в тонусе! Утром подъем, вечером спуск. Если будут проблемы хозяин их решит. Гостеприимство на уровне! Есть среди сотрудников  Русский персонал. Рядом с голубой мечетью, базаром и общественным транспортом!  Была проблема с водой, но ее быстро решили. Всем советую!
Ubicación inmejorable. Cumplieron con todo lo ofrecido y más. Una atención de amigos. Espectacular!!!

The room is very comfortable, and the location is very easy to find, the traffic is very convenient, the room is very clean, the hosts is very nice give us a lot of good local visit (Website hidden by Airbnb) is very worth to stay｡i am happy to be here :)
Nice place, nice people, artistic house. I will come back soon for sure.

Alhambra Residence fue una excelente elección en nuestra estadía en Estambul . Nos sentimos como en casa con las atenciones de Emre. El lugar es muy especial, está bien ubicado, justo lo que buscábamos .
Volveríamos felices en nuestros viajes futuros .

Great place 
Great Hospitality
Emre was superb in helping out with everything! He even let u pass the street when he is driving toward you :-) joke!
Overall good experience and very good stay! We do advise!

The host in this hotel is out of the ordinary. We believe he can do much more than just accommodating guests. We arrived at the hotel at 11 pm. After dropping us off, the driver asked if the host who was standing in front of the car can give a hand to lift our luggage. But the host seemed to so enjoy resting his hands in his warm and lovely pockets that he refused to help us. It is definitely the first time for us to receive a NO from a host of a hotel when we asked for help to handle the luggage. But luckily, it is also the last time - in following trips to Pamukkale, Ephesus, and Ankara, all hosts helped us without even asking. After we were inside the hotel and ready for checking in, the host suddenly claimed that our reservation has been altered. Another group of guests who lived in our reserved rooms and should check out this morning had their flight cancelled. So they quickly made a reservation again for the same room. Very coincidently, their reservation request was sent right before ours, the reservation system on hotel`s computer approved theirs and ignored ours, but somehow our reservation still got a confirmation though it should not. Hence, our reservation was actually failed in the system and now we had to move to another apartment. We found this explanation rather funny. Our reservation was confirmed in November, a month ago. Nevertheless, that reservation request sent today by other guests still managed to appear on the reservation system one second ahead of ours. It got approved, and therefore kicked us out. Hence, we made the assumption to explain such impossibility: 1. The reservation request by other guests can time travel, and it successfully went through a wormhole and arrived in the reservation system one month before it sent. 2. The internet connection between Germany and Turkey is inhumanly poor, such that our reservation request has delayed for a whole month and unfortunately conflicts with other guests` request. 3. The reservation system software is buggy. After we pointed out the illogic points in his explanation, the host`s shining face turned grey as his feeling was hurt. He decided not to defend for himself or find excuses anymore; he solidly told us, if we are not satisfied with the alternation, we could, of course, call Airbnb customer service for help, and we could, of course, go out and find another hotel for settling. I had to admit it was a brilliant fight back against us. He clearly understood that, on a December night, one is not stupid enough to give up an available apartment and risk spending all night on finding a new one. We have no choice but shut up. As a result, four people of us moved from an apartment with 6 beds to a smaller apartment with 2 beds, which is smelly and noisy. During the whole conversation, the host did not apologize for...

Muy buen lugar, limpio, la calefacción funciona bien, está cerca de la mezquita azul y es fácilmente accesible con el tranvía, las respuestas fueron rápidas y todo es según lo  mostrado, sin duda volveremos a repetir.
It is a great place to go. They are very good and very friendly and polite
The location is incredible, communication was quick and painless - the 2 larger beds could use a replacements at some point but in general everything was great. I'd go again

Unfortunately, the decaying state of the building, is not accurately conveyed by the pictures; for those with OCD, this might not be the best choice of accommodation. However, it's got a fantastic location, and the host did all that he could to make sure we were as comfortable as possible.
hôte aimable mais il parle seulement la Turquie.  c bien pour 2 personnes.  A côté de mosquée bleu.  Mais pas de transport comune

name: Casa de Vilela
summary: This is an extraordinary 18th century Manor house, located near Porto. Steeped in history and with many beautiful artefacts, this property was originally built in 1731. If you're seeking charm, comfort and tranquility then this is the place for you!
space: Located in the lovely region of Minho it has been thoroughly renovated and well furnished and provides accommodation for a large group or extended family wishing to holiday together. The meticulous restoration has been a true labour of love for the owners, who have lived there for generations. Amongst the many features, there is an exceptionally well-equipped kitchen with a bright and attractive breakfast room. The adjacent formal dining room conveys an air of splendor, with its high ceilings and Indo-Portuguese tapestries. Throughout, original features are tastefully combined with modern conveniences to create a comfortable and immaculate interior. Pretty armchairs sit on wooden and tiled floors, modern bathrooms display borders of attractive hand painted tiles, and beautiful furniture decorates the 9 spacious, ensuite bedrooms. On the ground level the original stone wine cellar has been converted into three, comfortable drawing rooms, one of them a games room with a snooker table and
description: This is an extraordinary 18th century Manor house, located near Porto. Steeped in history and with many beautiful artefacts, this property was originally built in 1731. If you're seeking charm, comfort and tranquility then this is the place for you! Located in the lovely region of Minho it has been thoroughly renovated and well furnished and provides accommodation for a large group or extended family wishing to holiday together. The meticulous restoration has been a true labour of love for the owners, who have lived there for generations. Throughout, original features are tastefully combined with modern conveniences to create a comfortable and immaculate interior. Pretty armchairs sit on wooden and tiled floors, modern bathrooms display borders of attract
neighborhood_overview: The property is well placed for visits to a number of historic centres, such as the ancient city of Guimarães with its castle which is a mere 15 minutes away, whilst the bustling city of Porto lies only 35km away. Here you can explore the twisting and narrow streets of the Ribeira quarter, famous for its life, character and numerous monuments, or visit one of the many port wine lodges on the bank of Douro river. Why not take a boat cruise? Or, you may prefer the beaches at Vila do Conde only 30km away, or Caldas da Saúde with its thermal waters only 10km away.
transit: Sim.
access: Ground floor: 2 living rooms. Dining room. 2 separate toilets. Games room with snooker and card table. First floor: 3 additional living rooms. Dining room.  Kitchen. 4 bedrooms: 3 double, 1 twin, all with en-suite bathroom with shower over bath and toilet, and access to the Chapel of St Anthony. 3 separate toilets.  Second floor: 5 bedrooms: 1 double, 3 twin, 1 single, all with en-suite bathroom with shower over bath and toilet. CH inc. Additional cleaning on request. Cook on request. Cot on request. Cable TV. Stereo. Wifi. M/wave. D/washer. W/machine. F/freezer. Garden. BBQ. Parking. Private swimming pool (12 x 5m, depth 1.1-2m) available May - Oct.
interaction: Estarei presente no dia da chegada e posso oferecer algumas refeições sob encomenda.

address.street: S. Tomé de Negrelos, Santo Tirso, Porto, Portugal

reviews.comments:
Casa de Vilela is a real gem - a perfect get-away for large groups or families. The pictures on the web do not do it sufficient justice: the reality is even better than the photos. A huge house, very nicely restored, that could easily fit 20 people (we were 11 and all had seperate bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms). 
The house is perfectly located, although slightly isolated, so on one hand you have to go everywhere by car, but the peace and quiet is perfect.
Definately recommended!

Pasamos un fin de semana en familia en casa Vilela. La experiencia maravillosa, la casa es incluso mejor que lo que muestran las fotos, el interior esta muy cuidado, con muebles antiguos espectaculares, comservando todo el estilo de siglos anteriores y con la comodidad de hoy. Los jardines son maravillosos,aunque si echamos en falta que la piscina tuviera unas hamacas cómodas y con colchonetas sobre las que tumbarse, las que había eran viejas y estaban mojadas siempre, así como muebles de jardín algo más dispuestos para usarlos, había muchas sillas desperdigadas. El guardes de la casa, Casimiro, era encantador, muy servicial. El pueblo no tiene mucho que visitar, pero tiene todo lo necesario para vivir y n restaurante donde comer baratísimo grandes cantidades de una comida buenísima y con un personal muy agradable. Por ultimo, como fallo principal, la señal del wifi. No llega a ninguna de las plantas superiores, donde están las habitaciones, si necesitas wifi hay que quedarse cerca de las zona de escaleras de la planta baja que es donde esta el router y eso, hoy en día, es francamente incomodo. Por lo demás, recomiendo totalmente reservar en esta casa.
Casa Vilela has a beautiful atmosphere. We enjoyed our stay with our family. The beautiful city of Porto is nearby.

We recently stayed at Casa de Vilela for a hen party - with 15 people in the group. The Villa is impressive, not only in size but in its traditional decoration, facilities and price. 
Each pair had a room with en-suite, as well as fantastic views of the local town. The pool was an amazing addition, which we utilised during the day to enjoy the beautiful weather and the kitchen was huge; the perfect space to cater for 15 people. 
The neighbour was also very kind, providing us with a lift to the local supermarket and giving us home-made wine, home-grown crops and friendly assistance to put us at ease throughout our stay. 
I would definitely recommend the Villa again. If anything, it was a little further out of the way from Porto town as we expected (About 1 hour train ride), but the train took us direct after a 25 minute walk to the nearby train station first. 

We had a very enjoyable stay and we are all very sad to leave. 

Thank You Clara and your helpful staff. 

Faye
Beautiful house for a luxurious stay.

Absolutely amazing place, highly recommended! The house is huge (privacy guaranteed even with a big group) and beautiful with country style old-fashioned decoration. However, kitchen and bathrooms are modern (note that each bedroom has own toilet and shower). Pool is really nice with plenty of sun beds. There's a supermarket and a restaurant close to the house. Helpful janitor Mr. Casimiro! Well-kept garden.

The villa was absolutely fabulous, a wonderfully place in a wonderful part of Portugal. We felt transported to another time, yet enjoyed all the modern conveniences of en-suite bathrooms, well equipped kitchen, TV, wifi, swimming pool, etc. The grounds are spectacular, full of fruit trees and a mountain path for walking. Casimir the caretaker was extremely welcoming and responsive to our needs, though we had want for little as the home was well equipped with dishes, towels, linens, etc. We were also so impressed with how immaculately clean the house and grounds were - no small feat for sure as the space seems endless! We enjoyed the lovely views and privacy, and appreciated the small bakery and restaurant within walking distance, Our expectations were exceeded in every way, and we hope to visit again soon!

This was by far the best AirBnb experience I have ever had. 

I rented Casa Vileta for 4 days for my 30th birthday and 12 friends joined me for the weekend. We had an absolutely amazing time. 

Clara was extremely responsive and her local manager of the property gave us a wonderful welcome and checked on us throughout our visit to make sure we were okay. 

The house and surrounding property are MASSIVE and absolutely STUNNING. The property is extremely well-located - rural enough to feel like you've gotten away from the hustle and bustle of the city, and central enough to be walking distance to a train station, bakery and grocery stores. There is a large Lidl about 10 minutes' drive away from the house. 

Most of the group shared rental cars to reach the property (35 minute drive from Porto) although some people travelled by taxi/ uber from Porto. Two people travelled back by train and walked from the property to the station without issue. 

The house is extremely well equipped. We cooked large meals for the group throughout the weekend without issue (there are multiple ovens and stoves, as well as a BBQ). 

The pool is perfect, as is the lounging area around it. 

There are fruit and chestnut trees on the property, and we picked fresh lemons for one of our dinners. 

There is a hiking trail on the property so you can climb up the mountain behind it. You get stunning views of the area as you climb. 

I have nothing negative to say about this AirBnb experience. It was absolutely perfect in every way, shape and form. I had a wonderful birthday weekend at Casa Vileta. A MASSIVE thank you to Clara and her team. I will be recommending this property to friends and family.

A Casa de Vilela é um espaço único, cujas salas emanam uma história passada nobre, rodeada de um ambiente natural único. Foi, sem dúvida, dos melhores espaços de Airbnb onde já estive e fica em mim a vontade de voltar. 
A propriedade tem imensos quartos, todos com casa de banho privativa, uma grande cozinha perfeitamente equipada e várias salas de estar e entretenimento. Tanto a Clara como o Sr. Casimiro foram impecáveis.
Recomendo a todos os que possam arrendar este espaço que o façam, certamente ficarão surpreendidos pela positiva como eu fiquei.
The host canceled this reservation 123 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Our extended family of 15 people spent a week at Casa de Vilela to celebrate the 80th birthday of the family matriarch. It is impossible to imagine a better venue for such an event or any gathering of 12-17 people with close ties who still need personal space from time to time.

très belle demeure, beaucoup de charme avec de très beaux objets. On peut y passer un moment agréable en famille, jeunes et moins jeunes y trouveront leur bonheur. Propre, spacieux, les lits sont un peu petits pour les grands gaillards approchant ou dépassant le 1m90. Le majordome, CASIMIRO est très sympa et prévenant. Les alentours de la maisons ne sont pas très jolis mais si on fait quelques KM, ça s'améliore. Il y a de jolies villes à coté.

Villa is amazing, perfect location if you want to spend time in rural without tourists, but it's only 30 minutes from Porto, so you can explore the city if you want.  Villa in reality much more beautiful and impressive  than on photos and I'm so grateful that Clara also provided a possibility to see villa in advance. Highly recommend to stay at least for week, because it's so wonderful. Clara's employee mr. Casimiro made us a compliment with some fresh vegetables and wine.  Surely will come here again with my friends

name: Beautiful & Bright, Fully Furnished Apartment
summary: This great, bright,freshly renovated apartment is located minutes away walking distance from a park, shopping centers, a various of multicultural restaurants. 25 Minutes from Downtown by bus. Its comes fully furnished, with 50"smart TV,with cable,  Netflix,and access to WIFI.
space: Beautiful Space, Freshly Renovated, with 2 Balconys ,and private Patio with BBQ. This is a Fully furnished,private apartment. Price is negotiable depending of the duration of the stay.
description: This great, bright,freshly renovated apartment is located minutes away walking distance from a park, shopping centers, a various of multicultural restaurants. 25 Minutes from Downtown by bus. Its comes fully furnished, with 50"smart TV,with cable,  Netflix,and access to WIFI. Beautiful Space, Freshly Renovated, with 2 Balconys ,and private Patio with BBQ. This is a Fully furnished,private apartment. Price is negotiable depending of the duration of the stay. 50 " smartTV ,Cable,  Netflix,WiFi, Washer, Dryer, Stove, Fridge, Microwave, coffeemaker.Gaming console if desired. This is a duplex, so if you need to talk to us, we will be always available to help you out! Great location, minutes away from restaurants, bars, parks, shopping center, basically all your needs are just minutes away! within a 2 minute walk you have a bus that brings you straight to downtown within 25 min drive,  you also have the nearest Plamondon metro station within 6 min walk Cable, WiFi, Washer, Dryer,iron,hairdry

reviews.comments:
Très bon contact avec Denis et Kosta, toujours disponibles pour aide, conseils sur la ville.
L'appartement est spacieux, bien fonctionnel, propre, calme, situé entre 2 stations de métro (Plamondon et Côte des Neiges), à 10min à pieds de tous commerces et restaurants, à 20min du centre de Montréal en métro.
Nous gardons un très bon souvenir de notre séjour chez Denis.

Denis is an excellent host always willing to go the extra mile and accomodating to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. The apartment is clean, spacious and extremely comfortable. It is situated in a peaceful neighbourhood. I would highly recommend anyone looking to stay in a "home away from home" and if you are on a stay long in Montreal, this is definitely better than staying in a hotel.  It is walking distance to Metro (subway), eatries and supermarkets.
Denis Kash's houese is a very nice place to stay in Montreal. Next time I will choice it again without any hesitate.

Host lives nearby and was eager to be helpful. Our son enjoyed playing in the back yard. Apartment had everything we needed for enjoying our stay. Plenty of linens, cookware and cable channels. Nice neighborhood, convenient to bus, Metro, and parks. Parking was on the street, but was never too crowded to find a convenient space. We heartily recommend this aparent and host.
Amazing host, looks out for you. Spacious clean apartment. Won't hesitate to book this place again.
Very clean place and excellent host. A bus that runs downtown is close by and subway is a few blocks away. Enjoy our stay. One queen bed, one single bed and 2 couches in the living room

Denis was out of town but his father-in-law Kostas made us feel very welcome, even offering to drive us downtown on our first night!  The apartment itself was comfortable and located in a nice, diverse neighborhood with easy access to buses (5 minute walk away) and the metro (10-15 minute walk away).  Street parking was easy, we usually found a spot right in front of the house.  Would stay with again, thanks!
Die Wohnung war genau wie beschrieben. Die Nachbarschaft ruhig, gute Verkehrsanbindungen und der Hausherr und seine Familie sehr nett und hilfsbereit. Wir haben uns sehr willkommen gefühlt !!!
We enjoyed our stay very much. The appartment is clean, very spacious and located in a nice and quite area with good connections to the metro. Also the host was very friendly and helpfull.

Apartment was clean and neighborhood was quiet.  Metro station was an easy walk and there are grocery stores nearby also.  Communication with Denis was prompt and smooth. Would definitely stay here again.
Very welcoming. Had a great time.

Had a wonderful time at Denis' location. Very clean, spacious, has everything for a hassle-free stay, great host and in a great location in the city. I would look to stay here again when I'm in the city again

The family was very accommodating to our arrival time and very generous with suggestions. We were pleased to find the property in a nice residential section and really liked that the apartment had a terrace. We had everything we needed!

My Family really enjoyed staying in Denis house! His father was Very friendly and showed all of the house and neighborhood, explaining all the things and giving tips about the city! All the neighborhood is Very kind, we made even dog friends there. 
Furthermore, the house was clean and cozy, Very close to wallmart and other stores! Greatly recomended!
We had a good time at Denis apartment, location is very good, beds are comfortable and kitchen has everything you need to prepare breakfast. Apartment was clean.

I had a good stay in Montreal.   I was by myself so the apartment felt very spacious.  Walking distance to many shops and restaurants.

Only downside for my trip was the bed was more firm then I like so I didn't sleep great but I know different people have different bed firmness preferences.

This was our first time in Canada, and instead of renting Denis's place for vacation we rented it to be our home for the 1st month as new residents in Canada. We enjoyed every minute in the appartment and the area is close to everything. The appartment has everything you need in order to be your house and the hosts are extraordinaire. Thank you so much for having us, and allowing us to call your appartment "Our Home". This space will not be sufficient to describe how me and my family felt during our stay.

This upstairs apartment is in an older, very quiet, and well-established part of Montreal. It is on a lovely tree-lined street, and is very close (within a few blocks) to grocery stores and restaurants. The apartment itself is spotlessly clean, very spacious, and well-lit by natural light. When you look out the living room and kitchen windows, you see lots of trees. There is a very nice back deck just off the kitchen if you want to have a barbecue. The TV is excellent (with over 1000 channels). The owner warmly welcomed us to the apartment and showed us all the amenities and supplies in the place, and I must say that they have gone to great lengths to anticipate every need we could possibly have. They were available in person, and by phone and email, every time we had a question. A very relaxing place to stay!

This home was very very pleasant to stay in. We were met by Kosta, Denis Dad who lives downstairs. VERY VERY friendly gentleman who made us feel so welcome and so at home. As soon as we arrived (we were very exhausted) but he showed us everything, and told us if we needed anything he is more than happy to be of help. 

The home is in a prime location right by a main boulevard - so really you are just a few steps away to access public transit or tons of restaurants, markets etc. Neighborhood was very quiet, lots of families so very very safe. 

The home was very comfortable, TV had plenty of options, kitchen and dining area were pleasant and beds were very comfortable. 

When we left Kosta even washed our car! So nice of him!

We had a short stay but would definitely come back.

Mes parents ont séjourné durant une semaine dans le logement de Denis et sa famille, ils y ont énormément apprécié leur séjour et ont particulièrement été touchés par la gentillesse de la famille. 
Même si Denis et sa famille traversaient un moment délicat, ces derniers se sont toujours montrés accessibles, chaleureux et attentifs aux besoins de mes parents. Denis et sa famille se sont également montrés très flexibles en terme d’accommodements avec mes parents. Le logement est très spacieux, propre, et à très bien situé (à proximité des transports et de plusieurs commodités sur Côte-des-Neiges). Je conseillerai sans hésiter ce logement à n'importe qui.

We were not typical visitors. I grew up in Montreal and I was returning in order to spend time with a sick elderly relative. We chose the location as it is within walking distance of the hospital. I was grateful that we were able to be close by.
Kosta met us at the door. He was most welcoming. He gave us a thorough tour of the apartment. It certainly fit all of our needs. We didn't  need a description of Montreal and all that is available there. I know he hoped to be more involved, however our situation was different and we were anxious to get to St. Mary's hospital.

Un grand merci à Kostas qui nous a accueillis à bras ouverts dans son très bel appartement ! Tout était parfaitement conforme à la présentation, très spacieux et très bien équipé. Nous avons passé un merveilleux séjour à Montréal et notre hôte a toujours été disponible pour nous prodiguer ses bons conseils et ses adresses ! Merci encore et peut-être à bientôt ! Sophie, Christophe & Christine

Comfortable, clean place near public transportation (the 165 bus comes very frequently, so it makes access to the city and to the nearest metro stop very easy). Great communication with the host, who was available and ready to help with whatever we needed.

The space is the upper floor of a duplex, on a quiet street in central Montreal. Kosta (the owner's father who lives on the lower floor) was very helpful, both for check-in and whenever we had a question. The apartment is very comfortable and well-equipped - feels like a real home. The main bed is quite good (a bit on the firm side) and there are lots of towels. Strong wifi. We were only there for a couple of days, but our stay was very pleasant.

Un accueil très  chaleureux. Kosta et sa femme sont  forts aimables . L'appartement est spacieux et le quartier très calme  . Nous avons passé un très bon séjour  et je recommanderai à tous cette bonne adresse.

Great place! This apartment located in a peaceful and beautiful block, and it's very close to the subway. The landlord was very friendly. 
The interior wasted same as the descriptions which is spacious and clean.

Loved staying here! Loved the privacy, space and cleanliness. Everything was spotless, the sheets and towels were so fresh, the neighborhood was lovely, safe and quiet. We were 20 minutes from downtown with plenty of transportation options, just had a fantastic time,  highly recommend this place, thank you Kosta!

Nous sommes ravis d'avoir fait connaissance de Denis et de sa famille, tous aussi accueillants et sympathiques. Leur dévouement au bien être de leurs visiteurs est agréable et rend le séjour confortable. L'appartement est bien proportionné et surtout bien localisé dans un quartier calme, ainsi que proche des commerces et principaux modes de transport. Nous avons particulièrement bien apprécié notre séjour et le recommandons vivement. Au plaisir d'une prochaine venue à Montréal.

The place was very clean and had easy access to public transit. Kostas was nice and helpful. The apartment is on the second floor and it has a flight of stairs, that was the only challenge we had since we travelled with a young child, but it's easy enough to block to prevent falls. Overall, a great stay.
Bel appartement, spacieux, equipée, calme, et propre. Je le conseil.

Loved the stay. Fit my whole family Comfortably. This apartment is in a vibrant local community part of Montreal full of shops, restaurants, parks and even a famous landmark. 

Public transport is close. 

We recommend it!

My family and I had a fantastic time staying here. It's an ideal location  with a lot of restaurants, pubs, shopping, public transit, etc. The host is a great guy and offered us suggestions for what to do around Montreal.
 The place was very clean, fully stocked kitchen, and has a large balcony with a nice view.
Great apartment, great area, great host. Highly recommended.

This place was amazing!
The pictures do not do justice to the actual size of the appartment. Very spacious with lots of ammenities. 5 minute walk to the subway (metro) which gives access to the whole city. Very quiet and very safe neighbourhood as well. Definitely coming back on a future visit to Montreal

We really loved Kosta and Denis' place! We were a family of 4 with a 4 and 7 year old and we felt right at home in the apartment. The apartment was clean and spacious. There were ceiling fans in most rooms which helped us not need the air conditioner at all during our stay. The terrace overlooks a beautifully landscaped (by Kosta) backyard.  Kosta and his wife were very friendly with us and helpful with any questions we had. 

The best features for us with the kids were the laundry, Netflix, Wi-Fi and its closeness to Parc Kent, which has a playground and a lovely splash pad. 

We would definitely return here!
The place was great and Kostas was a great host.  Will definitely visit again!  Thank you!

The space is large, immaculate, quiet and well suited for our family of four ( with 2 teenagers).  Communication was easy and prompt since we had to arrange for a late arrival. Greg greeted us at the door and kindly helped us unload our car which was very appreciated. We were shown everything in the apartment.  Street parking was easy to find. Thank you again for a pleasant stay.

Great for someone who still wants to feel at home but be close to the downtown area. Lots of public transport to get into the heart of the city but just removed enough to still have a residential vibe. Everything you need to be at home was there. Hosts were very accommodating about check in and check out. We had a great time and no complaints!

This house is really good, we enjoyed our stay here. Easily to walk to supermarket, to bus station and subway. Its our first time to visit Montreal and we never regret our stay here. Thank you Kosta and Denis.

This house is as described. The hosts were available to answer questions but left us to our own devices. Location was great, easily walkable to the metro and bus stops. I would highly recommend this place to other travelers.
Location is great, and host is very enthusiasm, everything is ideal!

Notre séjour à Montréal a été inoubliable et ce logement y a largement contribué : accueil à la fois sympathique, efficace et discret, un appartement spacieux, agréable et équipé de façon très complète. Nous espérons pouvoir renouveler l'expérience un jour et gardons précieusement cette adresse.

Kosta was an amazing host: responsive, thoughtful, accomodating, and friendly. If you are considering this airbnb, please note that the pictures do not do Kosta’s place justice — the second floor entire apartment is much more spacious than the pictures let on. Thank you for allowing us to have a great weekend in Montreal, Kosta!

We stayed for a long weekend and everything was really nice. The host was welcoming and helpful. Great location! The apartment was tidy and clean and the photos are real. We are definitely coming for a BBQ someday in summer.
Very nice host. Convenient location. Very good for family to stay. Surely back again
Kosta a été très accueillant, il habite en dessous donc tres pratique pour une arrivée plus tardive. L’appartement est impeccable et bien chauffé. Équipement parfait et fonctionnel. Merci !

Amazing place to stay here in montreal! Best location with thoughtful kindness from Kosta. It is must stay place in montreal and I would say if you ever see there is a vacancy in his dates just book it.
Clean and confortable house closed to downtown Montreal. Loved  having coffee on the balcony looking at the beautiful flowers. Our host was very nice and responsive. We had a great stay in Montreal.
Fantastic! And clean
Nice, convenient and furnished apartment! We had great time living here for 7 days! Very appreciate for your warm-hearted driving us to hospital. Strongly recommend to you.
Everything was awesome, Kosta is a great host
사진보다 넓고 깨끗해서 가족모두가 만족스러웠습니다. 호스트는 친절했으며 필요한 물품들이 모두 갖춰져 있었습니다. 다운타운과 거리가 조금 있지만 교통편이 좋고, 주변 마트도 가까이 있습니다. 우리 아이들은 주변에 놀이터를 굉장히 좋아했습니다. 가족이 머물기긴 정말 좋은 장소 입니다.

Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour chez Kostas. Nous étions comme à la maison. Le haut de duplex sur la rue Carlton est spacieux, confortable et fonctionnel avec une grande terrasse qui surplombe le jardin. Le quartier est calme. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié la gentillesse et toutes les attentions de Kostas et de sa famille. Nous avions dans l’appartement tout ce dont nous avions besoin : une grande cuisine toute équipée, un climatiseur (il fait chaud l’été à Montréal), une excellente télévision, le Wi-Fi, une grande chambre et une terrasse où nous prenions nos repas. Tous les commerces et services sont à proximité. Le métro (station Plamondon) est à huit minutes de marche. Une excellente adresse, au calme, au cœur du quartier Côte-des-Neiges. Nous reviendrons. Merci mille fois, Kostas!
Great place for a family, nice kitchen, quiet neighborhood, helpful host.

We loved it!! It was spacious and had tons of spices and kitchen tools available. They was plenty of balcony space with a grill. He was there waiting for us when we checked in to politely greet us. Kosta was great and we can’t wait to come back!

Kostas was a great host. His place is conveniently located to access the metro and explore Montreal l. Great for a family as local playground with water feature is great. Recommended to anyone looking to experience Montreal as a local.
Très bien passé, hôte super agréable et sympathique. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour.
The place is as described, clean and spacious. The hosts are really helpful and nice.

Nous étions 4 personnes pour des vacances à Montréal, et Kosta nous reçu avec une attention et une disponibilité remarquable. l'appartement est très bien équipé, grand, et proche de tous les transports en communs.
Encore merci Kosta.
¡El mejor anfitrión con el que nos hemos quedado! ¡Calidad en todos los aspectos! ¡Súper atención y excelente ubicación! ¡muy recomendado!

name: 3BR 2WR Apt (KS) 5 min wan chai MTR
summary: New Decoration 3-bedrooms apartment with cozy kitchen and 2-bathrooms in the very center of HK, you can experience the spirit and convenience that life in HK. It comfortably fit 4-8 people and 5 mins to Wanchai MTR.
space: We are on Hennessy Road we're just 5 minute walk from the closest subway stop (Wanchai MTR exit A4 ) and 1 minute from the airport bus stop literally at our doorstep. Convenience stores, Bars, Supermarket, grocery stores, pharmacy, massage salons, fruit shops, shopping mall, post office , tram/flight ticket agencies, cafe, bakeries, bus stops & tram stop....Easy access to everything you may need in the neighborhood.  The wide variety of restaurants nearby: Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Indian, Thai, western food and street food for late night hunger. Needless to say: you would also be well served by McDonalds, Pizza Huts, Subways, Deli-france, Marks & Spencers and other fast food chains. We provide towels, linens, hair dryers, shampoo, shower gel, tooth paste.  The size of the beds  4.5' x 6' double bed 4'x6'        double bed 6x 6"  king size sofa double bed  3" x 6" bunk bed (=2 signal beds) 4 beds in total This apartment comfortably fits for 8 people.
