neighborhood_overview: Made internationally famous by the 1960 film The World of Suzie Wong, historic Wan Chai is not just Hong Kong’s party district; by day it’s a pleasant neighbourhood for wandering and shopping. Dotted along Queen's Road East are a number of excellent rattan and Chinese furniture shops that will happily arrange to have your purchases sent home for you or, for competitively priced clothing, try Spring Garden Lane where stalls offload garments originally earmarked for export. Techies won’t complain about getting lost in the Wanchai Computer Centre on Hennessy Road; a building jam-packed with hardware, software, accessories and other gadgets. And both kids and ‘kidults’ might want to check out Tai Yuen Street; an entire strip of toys touting everything from the latest to the classics.
notes: When you call or SMS or (Hidden by Airbnb) to us, please mention the place of (KS) that you stay.  Please do not mention you've booked a room online with the doormen or neighbors of the building. If asked please just say you're staying with your friend Jenny (me). Please respect your surroundings, whether it is the materials that have been provided to make your stay as comfortable as possible or the people in the neighborhood. Most of all enjoy your stay!
transit: There is convenient public transit. From the apartment,  it takes 5 minutes to Wanchai MTR station by walk The ways for the guests getting to our apartment from the airport 1. by airport express, about 30 minutes, about HKD100 2. by A11 bus, about 45-60 minutes, about HKD40 3. by taxi, about 30-40 minutes, HKD250-400 Taxi could stop in front of the lobby of the apartment. No car park.
access: The place that listed have TV, refrigerator, water heater, air-conditioners, cooker, micro-wave, washing machine  & free WIFI internet
interaction: Please contact us through airbnb, (Hidden by Airbnb) , SMS or local call if you have any queries.
house_rules: 1. Please do not put towels on the floor as floor carpets. 2. Please turn off the water heater after finish to prevent to be over-heated. 3. For safety and energy saving concerns, please turn off the lights, water heater, and air conditioning after you leave. 4. Please open the door with the handle gentlely. 5. Please drop the toilet tissue or trash into the rubbish bin, NOT into the toilet. 6. NO smoking or pets allow. 7. Please check and leave the keys and re-mote controls on the table when you check-out.  Early check-in or late check-out can be arranged without charges. It will depend on the booking on that day availability and must alert me up-front. I will arrange a place for you to leave your luggage if requested. If you need to check-in late or check-out early, please inform me ahead of time.

host.host_about:
I lived and worked in Hong Kong.
I look forward to meeting you and sharing advice and recommendation about this wonderful city.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Great location, great service. Brand new declaration. Clean and safe. Well recommand

My colleagues and I were on business trip to Hong Kong on 23 - 30 December 2014. It was high season, and was difficult to get a place to stay. So then we kept moving to one hotel/apartment to another. On 23-25 December 2014 we stayed in this apartment. On 23th afternoon after landing at Hong Kong Airport, I texted Jenny to let her know that we arrived in Hong Kong and made appointment to meet in the apartment. We met her in the apartment, and she explained about general rules apply in the apartment, how to use the stove, washing machine, etc. The apartment was very nice, just as nice as showed on pictures in Airbnb. The room we stayed can accommodate guests from 6 to 10 person, and it is fully equipped. There are 3 bedroom and 2 bathroom (1 bath room is attached to the main bedroom). The facilities were great. There were water heater, stove, fridge, dining table (complete with dishes, spoons and tea sets), LED TV, sofa bed and spacious living room. And there was wifi connected to the internet. The apartment was superbly clean, and tidy. And the location? Oooh, I love it. Located on Hennesy Road, in between of Wanchai MTR Station and Causeway Bay MTR Station. There are also bus stops nearby but I never use them. Taxi are also very easy to get. Food are easy to find. There are Mc D restaurant and Yoshinoya restaurant located just 20-50 m from the apartment. My next visit, I will stay in this apartment again.

Everything is as great as it looks here. It is very new so you can smell a bit of the paint but that wasn't a big problem at all (really a bit). The bed was cozy. I had a deep sleep there. The location was in the middle of everything. I stayed here for 2 nights and stayed in Kowloon for another 2 nights. I wish I didnt move! A shopping mall is right at the MTR station. The bus stop to and from the airport is nearby. very convenient!

I preferred her apartment to the hotel since I got more space plus I can cook. So, if you are travelling in group, this apartment is definitely recommended.

Jenny is also a nice host.

All in all, it is value for the money.

房间特别棒!跟图片一样｡房子是新装修的,很新…房间也特别干净~房东jenny很好~飞机晚点等我们到晚上11点多,还特地来车站接我们｡房子在湾仔轩尼诗道,附近有很多好吃的餐厅｡走路到铜锣湾只需要10分钟左右｡到中环和湾仔码头也很近｡大厦的保安很负责,第一天出门不小心没有锁门专门打电话给房东,没有丢任何东西｡刷卡才能坐电梯上楼,很安全!
The room is great!
Just like pictures.
The house is new decorate, very new...
Room is particularly clean .Jenny is very nice~ ~ plane was delayed Jenny waiting for us until 11 PM and come to the bus station to meet us.
The house in the Hennessy road, wanchai, there are many good restaurants nearby.
walk to causeway bay only need 10 minutes.
To the central and wan chai pier is also very near.
Building security is responsible for, the first day we go out without locking the door the security make a phone call to the landlord, we did not lost anything.
Only use security card can take the lift upstairs, very safe! Highly recommended

it is nice apartment.I was booked it for my friend.They said it is awsome!cozy,clean,new,everything is prepared for you!and there are 2 supermarker (Website hidden by Airbnb) Causeway Bay is not far by foot.I think I will stay it next time by myself.

Very nice, newly remodeled unit, centrally located in WanChai district. My wife and I and two teenage daughters enjoyed the stay very much. We will not hesitate to stay in the same unit again next time we visit Hong Kong. Jenny was very accommodating, arranging an early check-in and a late checkout.
Everything was perfect except the initial shadiness of a guy coming to meet me and not jenny...

The place was very nice. The rooms, bathrooms, kitchen, etc. was perfect for our needs. The beds could use some improvement, though in terms of comfort.

Awesome location very close to many restaurants and bars. Overall a good experience.

the service is excellent.

all toiletories and kitchen facilities are well prepared to the guest.
Good location, great food in the area, nice apartment.

Jenny is a lovely host and this apartment made this trip very easy with its good location; close to Wanchai MTR just 5 mins walk. Great accommodation. Clean, tidy, nice and fully equipped. Highly recommended.

We stayed at the apartment for 8 nights. The apartment was great and looked as pictured. We were pleased to find extra toothbrushes and other necessities available. Having stayed in Hong Kong before, I was particularly pleased with the excellent air conditioning unit, the enclosed showers, and the automatic water heater. 

The location was great, taking only 5 mins to the Wanchai MTR station and 5 minutes to Times Square. 

Jenny was also excellent to deal with great response time to messages. She was on-time and waiting upon arriving to Hong Kong and gave us a thorough explanation of the unit. 

I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to friends. 

Thanks again Jenny!
the place is exactly same as photos, we really had good time there. Jenny is nice and helpful, we will definitely stay again.

Nice flat and warm welcome from Jenny.
Thanks!

I was met by a proxy for Jenny less than 5 minutes upon arrival. She showed me into the apartment and answered all my questions. The apartment was a beautiful modern design made with high quality materials. I used the washer twice and there were clear directions on how to use it and wifi. The electrical outlets are the upside down T kind. There is an electronics store downstairs to the right that sells a converter for 13hkd ( about 2 usd). Overall, we didn't spend much time inside the apartment besides sleeping.  The location is great, Michelin starred goose restaurant down the street, metro a five minute walk, ten minutes to Kowloon. We checked out late and she had no problem accommodating us. If you use public transportation it takes about 1.5 hours to schenzhen, mainland China.

Excellent place right in between Wan Chai and Causeway Bay MTR. Tram stop was just right opposite the building and there is the Wan Chai market, supermarkets and several eating places nearby. The apartment was well equipped, clean which looked just like the pictures. Not to mention Jenny was an awesome host, thank you Jenny and hope to see you again!

We just stayed at Jenny's Apartment for a week and it was really good.  We were 5 adults and 2 children and we could easily all fit in. Everything was as described and exactly like the pictures. Centre of Wanchai with easy access to Buses, Trams and the subway. 

Jenny was there to receive us and give us a tour of the apartment. She was always ready to help and would instantly respond to all our queries. Even quite late at night! 

Only thing that bothered us a little was the hardness of the mattress especially on the bunk beds! We are used to much softer ones. 

Otherwise it was perfect! Would stay here again if we come back to Hong Kong.

The only little criticism would

Of all the apartments I have stayed in with airbnb so far, this was the cleanest one!  It was spotless!  We felt so comfortable and had everything we needed.  It's about a 15 minute to the MTR and convenient stores along the streets.  We had no problems and the AC was amazing in the hot Hong Kong temperatures!!!

The apartment is as described and was very clean and comfortable. We were met about 2 minutes after arriving by Jenny's husband, Billy and he was very helpful in showing us how everything worked and how to get to the MTR etc. He was also kind enough to go and buy water for us, which was a nice touch and we were also allowed a late check out when leaving.
All in all, a pleasant stay and I would certainly recommend the place to friends visiting Hong Kong.
Clean flat. Very convenient to go to anywhere. Thanks!

Jenny is very friendly n thorough. This place is awesome, the apartment look exactly the same as the photos shown online. Definitely will come back to stay here again if I visit HK. The location is so convenient and is only 6 minutes walk to Wan Chai MTR.
Our stay at HK at Jenny's place was very good. We really had a fun time staying at the apartment.

房子的地理位置非常好,附近有时代广场､希慎广场､SOGO,便利店也是比比皆是,还有一兰拉面和翠华餐厅,离港铁湾仔站也很近,以上均在步行十分钟范围内｡
房屋的客厅很大,Wi-Fi很快,冷气很足,厨房设备应有尽有,卧室的床很舒服,卫生间干净整洁｡
总之这次的体验很好,想玩儿的､想去的､想买的,想吃的都得到了满足,还有就是Jenny回复信息的速度特别快,有了她你几乎可以不必为旅行的路线发愁,谢谢你Jenny!
Place was amazing, had a lot of food options around that area. Very cozy, my family and I enjoyed our vacation a lot. Only comment is that the bunk beds mattress were too hard. Thanks again!

Best location in the heart of Hong Kong, all the delicious restaurants are within walking distance.  This is a very nice, clean, and spacious (by Hong Kong standard) apartment.  We are a family from California but we did not have to compromise much of our lifestyle for this apartment.  I almost did not want others to find this place so it does not become too popular.  I would highly recommend to my friends and family.  I would also always try to stay here again.  Thank you Jenny for your hospitality.
地段很便捷 正巧在中港通大巴上车点对面 走到铜锣湾也很近 房间干净 各种电器都很好用 五个人住正好 就是上下铺的房间是没窗的 比较小基本什么都放不下了 整体感觉很好!
We loves our stay in Jenny's apartment. Jenny is a great host and super friendly and accommodating. We will definitely come back to her apartment next time we go to Hong Kong.
The place is tidy and clean, like staying at our own place.  We will certainly stay again if we are travelling through Hong Kong.

The apartment is clean and spacious (for Hong Kong standard) as the pictures shown. Check-In and check-out have been easy and fast. The location is very central and convenient to commute and close to supermarkets and restaurants.
We have a few mishaps in the apartment, Jenny has been very helpful and accommodating. Big thanks to her and her team. It has been a pleasant stay

Hübsche Wohnung, sehr sauber und fantastisch zentral gelegen an der Hennesy Road. 
Für westliche Verhältnisse sind die drei Schlafzimmer sehr klein, aber aber für HK Verhältnisse ist das ganz normal. Entsprechend empfehlen wir die Wohnung für max. 4 Personen zu belegen. 
Organisation mit Jenny war problemlos - easy accessable.

1,一家大小出行,住得还挺舒服的｡房间里设施齐全,wifi也快｡房东Jenny回站内信息也特别快｡
2,最赞的是位置,地处湾仔及铜锣湾中间,去哪都方便｡适合港岛游,逛街,买完先把东西拿回去都ok｡
3,周边食肆众多,有一家做烧鹅的米其林餐厅,但可惜没机会去尝试｡

Awesome was the word use to summarize the experience of my stay during the three days in Hong Kong at Jenny's apartment. Clean and nice environment exactly same as displayed in the photo.The apartment was quite spacious and comfortable. I give 5 stars for Jenny's apartment.

Jenny was very responsive and helpful with any questions we had about the apartment and Hong Kong in general. The apartment is very clean and well maintained, and we had a comfortable stay. 

The location is very convenient, we took the A11 bus from the airport ($40HKD) and after a beautiful drive through Hong Kong, made it to the apartment. Everything you need is around you, from supermarkets to restaurants.

Even the door staff were very friendly and sweet.

Would definitely stay again. Thank you Jenny!
公寓的地理位置优越,交通和饮食都非常方便!房东很热情仔细,屋内生活用品一应俱全!房间也够多,是一处值得推荐的公寓!
地理位置很棒 good location,Jenny人不错,设施齐全,适合家庭旅游居住
Jenny is very nice and helpful!Very good location!The place is close to shopping squares and there are lots of restaurants around!The best choice is to live in this place!
The apartment is very tidy as per advertised. Security guards were friendly and helpful. We had a wonderful time in Hong Kong and the apartment was perfect for what we needed at the time.
It's been a great stay at Jenny's apartment in HK. She is very friendly and nice. I would recommend her and her place to anyone who's travelling in the city! :)

Great place to stay, easy to access transport to anywhere in hk, if you are into computer parts there are shops right at the door steps. Traveled with two young boys and there was penalty of room. Would have been better if a toaster was provided.but all in all was a good place to stay and and base ourselves and in Hong Kong for one week.
The location is amazing! The house is great!!

Great place to stay! We stayed there with our 15 month old son and both sets of parents, and it suited us perfectly. Great location, very clean, everything as described, and Jenny was really helpful and quick to respond to all of our questions. Highly recommended!

Die Unterkunft entsprach etwa dem Angebot. Wir hatten sechs Personen angemeldet, leider war nur für 4 Personen Geschirr vorhanden. Trinkgläser gab es gar keine. Es waren auch nur 4 Stühle und ein Hocker verfügbar. Der Kühlschrank ist nur schlecht zu bedienen, da sich die Türe nur in den Raum öffnen lässt.
Die Lage ist zentral. Der Hauswachmann war immer freundlich und behilflich.
Die Funktion von Klimaanlage, Beleuchtung, Wasser etc. war stets gegeben.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Hong Kong and at Jenny's apartment.  It was exactly as she described it.  We were surprised at the amount of space there was for a Hong Kong apartment. The position was great with the tram right at our door and the MTR not far away. Our only criticism would be the difficulty we had in accessing the refrigerator which was a little frustrating. I would recommend this apartment to those wanting to stay in the Wan Chai area.
房子真是太棒了,首先是位置很好找,公寓里的管理人员也超级nice,每天出门都有打招呼,而且交通好方便,超市餐厅购物顶呱呱!没有身在异地的不适感｡其次房主Jenny 是个很有情调的人,房子布置的很有情调而且很干净,和照片上一样｡房间餐桌上有指南,说明的比较详细｡Jenny有推荐楼下的美味餐厅,果真不错｡总之总之,住到不想离开了哈哈
房间地段很好,地铁站和时代广场离得都非常近,房间干净整洁,房东也很热心,是一次非常棒的体验｡

Jenny was a fantastic host and we recommend her without hesitation. The property was beautifully located in the heart of the CBD, close to all amenities and perfect for young families. The décor was very modern and all our needs were met. Jenny was fantastic with her prompt responses and assistance before and during our stay.  A memorable holiday filled with amazing memories of Hong Kong!
Everything was as in the listing. They helped us with luggage check in. The room was adequate, clean and comfortable. Wifi worked well. Easy to find. Great place to stay for a weekend in HK.

Great location.  Very easy to find and get in touch with the host.  Jenny had the place ready and set up for us.  We had such a wonderful experience.  I will book again when I go back to HK.

Thanks again Jenny!

The apartment is big enough for our family of 5, it's clean and the security guards are very friendly. Location wise is ideal too, within walking distance from Wan Chai and Causeway Bay. There are also lots of cafes and restaurants around the area. A recommended place of stay in Hong Kong.

Overall, a good experience staying at Jenny's apartment. She was always prompt in responding to messages and even sent someone to meet us at the airport bus stop so we didn't waste any time searching for the right building. This was helpful as there were both young and elderly persons travelling in our group.

We found the location very convenient to shops and transport. The apartment was also clean and well stocked with toiletries. In my opinion it's better suited as accommodation for up to 5 people because it was a tight squeeze with 6 adults, a child and all the accompanying suitcases.

Something we found unsatisfactory was that one of the bath towels provided in the master bedroom appeared to be old and stained. Perhaps this was a mixup by the cleaners?

I'd also suggest improving fridge access by replacing it with one that has doors opening to the left.

Would stay again if there was a smaller group of us travelling.
The house is nice and well equipped.  The location is quite good and we have a good stay.

Jenny was always answered phone calls and emails promptly and arranged to meet us at the apartment when promised. We were able to leave our bags and were again met on time to retrieve them. The apartment is comfortable for 4 people, possibly more if you don't expect to spend a lot of time there. Certainly more than sufficient for the price and great location.
h
very nice apartment in Hong Kong island.
Have a great time with my friends in Jenny's place, have everything ready, and it's a really comfortable, clean, tidy and nice place.
很好的房间｡很干净,舒适｡房东人很nice~地点很好,离铜锣湾时代广场就7min的路程,门口就有叮叮车去金钟｡很方便~
很棒的住宿体验｡离地铁很近,楼下吃的､超市之类的超级方便!最重要是带着宝宝,可以给他做饭吃!房间干净舒适,房东人也超好的!
位置超方便,湾仔和铜锣湾中间,到本岛哪里都很方便｡装修很新,设施齐全｡值得推荐｡
一次非常愉快的入住经历,感谢Jenny!房屋地理位置优越,紧邻铜锣湾商业区,游购娱均很便捷｡房屋外部管理安全,内设温馨简洁,周到体贴,宾至如归｡下次再来香港,依然会选择这里｡

Jenny is a nice host. She is really helpful when you have problems. For the location, it is easy to reach and many restaurants are nearby. The living area is clean and comfortable. I would like to enjoy the moment in Jenny place again :)

We felt very welcome, Jenny was easy to work with and the apartment was as described. Very easy to find and in a great central location. Short walk to the metro, and the airport bus drops you very close to the doorstep.  Awesome shopping just outside the door. The apartment is nice, we had 5 women in town for a conference and the apartment was just want we needed.  The apartment is a local Chinese apartment. You will get a kick out of the fridge and the way it opens into the "kitchen".  The price was right for our budget.

Lovely central apartment of a decent size by HK standards. Beds are a bit on the firm side and the fridge wasn't working very well when we visited, however everything else was great and as described.

Jenny was very helpful with our early arrival despite being fully booked.

Our family had a pleasant stay at Jenny's apartment. Prior to our arrival I had a lot of questions but she was very helpful, and prompt in replying. The apartment was clean, a few minutes walk from MTR, a supermarket nearby, a lot of restaurants around the area.
Great experience, very nice flat
Clean and nice apartment
房东人超级nice~每个问题回答的很细致也很耐心｡房间位置很便利,离地铁站很近,周围有大型商场和便利店,购物和买东西都方便｡房间收拾得很干净很温馨,Jenny有为我们准备必需的生活用品,十分贴心｡因为行程很紧,只入住了一日,但是朋友们都十分喜欢,觉得住的房间很棒!谢谢Jenny的接待~希望下次去香港能再次入住~谢谢Jenny~
Très bien situé. Appartement assez confortable et très propre. Communication facile avec Jenny. Un bon choix.
房間乾淨舒適,地點便捷｡Jenny人也很好,願意讓我們寄放行李到下午｡實在沒什麼挑剔的~

第一次通过airbnb在香港找房子,体验很好｡很高兴能够入住Jenny的房子,房东人提早就把到达房子的详细交通信息告诉我们,我们从过关到入住房子过程都非常顺利｡晚上我们晾的衣服不慎掉到3楼平台,房东还专门过来帮我们解决,当时真的非常感动｡房子很新,很干净,生活用品很齐全,与房源的介绍一样｡细节方面考虑很周到,有转换插头､室内晾衣架等等｡舒适的住宿为这次香港旅行加分不少,希望下次还能再次入住Jenny的房子｡
Apartment was just as described- large for Hong Kong, central but quiet. Jenny responded quickly to any questions. We have already booked the apartment for our return journey through HK.

Stayed for a week with 3 adults and one child (21 months) - the appartment was ideal for us with plenty of room and very peaceful especially given the central location. The organisation and check-in/out were very straightforward and Jenny was very responsive with all queries.  A really good option if you are looking to base yourself right in the centre of Hong Kong.
She was great! Quick to respond and really accommodating. The place is clean and complete with the everything we could have needed. The location is close to everywhere.
房東Jenny非常主動聯繫我們, 提供詳細的入房須知. 房子空間舒適,是個適合親子旅遊的民宿. 附近生活機能便捷, 鄰近地鐵站和公車站, 非常推薦給前往香港旅遊的家庭.

The apartment is per the photos, clean, furnished and has everything we need for a comfortable stay. The master bedroom is small for 2 persons but this is expected in HK apartment. 
The Aircon and wifi are excellent . MTR station is 5 min walk away. Apartment is located conveniently near to small super markets, Pacific coffee joint and the most famous roast goose shop Kam's. 
Thank you Jenny .
地段很方便,交通和餐饮都很棒,住宿非常适合家庭旅行出行!

It was a good place, centrally located and with suitable amenities. Most of the other places listed had only 1 bathroom but this had 2 and for a large family group that we were it was really very convenient

Only downside was that the TV didn't have any choices on English channels
Very nice apartment in Wanchai.    Quite new and clean.  Jenny was quite helpful with early check-in and late check-out.    We were very satisfied with the rental.   Thank you.
方便,步行到铜锣湾､湾仔会展中心只需要几分钟时间,到处都是吃喝｡房间干净,设施齐全,没有想到在这闹市中间还有这么一个舒适的家｡
Great appartement, everything as described. Clean, easy communication and super located. Highly recommend
Her apartment was very clean and comfortable. wifi is really good. This apartment also has a very convenient transportation to the center of the city.
호스트 제니와는 만날수없었습니다. 메일로 연락만 주고 받았을뿐..생각보다 깨끗한 실내환경이 좋았고 편하게 잘 지내다 왔습니다. 다만 청소하시는분이 체크인시간을 잘못알고 전날 오셔서 조금 당황했습니다.조금의 아쉬움만 있을뿐 대체적으로 만족했습니다.
Property exactly as described and pictured, Jenny is communicative with fast response times. Very convenient for everything and a good living space for family of 4.
房源位置很好很方便;附近便利店 餐饮 地铁站 公车都很方便;房屋十分干净整洁;期待下次入住
Very close to a lot of local amenities. Unfortunately I didn't get to meet Jenny in person but she always responded promptly to any questions. A++++
Apartment was as described with easy access. Quiet building, which made it easy with a young child.

Jenny's place is centrally located and easy to find with clear directions from the host. The apartment was immaculate with two great bathrooms. I was only there for one night on a layover in HK and wanted to be in the Wan Chai neighbourhood, so the apartment was absolutely perfect and I slept like a baby. Jenny was extremely responsive in all her communications. 

Thanks so much!!
The apartment is well located and quiet big. Only 5 mins walk from the metro station. Jenny is very nice to let us check in earlier and definitely we will come again.
Apartment was exactly what we needed for our family stay in Hong Kong. Great location, security building and nice clean apartment.
地点非常好,在旺角非常的热闹,步行到中环或铜锣湾也很近,交通非常便利｡房间很大很新,有三间房间两个洗手间,多人入住也不会太过拥挤｡准备的设施很齐全,毛巾牙刷一应俱全,充电器也有转接口,非常棒的入住体验!
非常舒适的住宿环境,距离地铁湾仔站很近,房间很大很干净,住七八个人也没问题~非常感谢房主的款待,谢谢

the place is very close to tram and bus station. and there are several stores (seven eleven, welllcome supermarket, etc) so it was easy to buy groceries and other necessities. and the rooms and toilet were very clean.

but the beds and rooms were bit small for seven adults (3 men and 4 women). although i knew hk got small room, still it wasnt that comfy to sleep after long day of  walking and there wasnt enough place to put luggages. i think it would be the best place for 4-5ppl.
It's really comportable and warm house. very good location where closed Wanchai station. House is very clean and host is extremely kind.
Comfortable with the space and location in the city. Lots of foods around and easy to go around.

Jenny's apartment was exactly as advertised. It was lovely and clean and worked well for two adults and two children. The location was good and the flat was very quiet which was perfect. There's a good launderette just down the road and a great noodle place on the corner of the street! Would look to stay again when traveling to HK.

Jenny was an excellent host with good communication. The apartment location was Super convenient with 5 mins walking distance from WannCahi stations. The building inside smelt funny was it was okay in the apartment. Two bathrooms were a plus for us.

Jenny "S place is modern and the location is superb ! I don't think you can find a location so central in hk !
Jenny is always so easy to get hold of . She is responsive and also super helpful !
I would definitely come back here again !
Thanks Jenny for being a wonderful host !
Jenny is nice and easy to communicate. Her place is a nice choice for short stay.
房东非常好,有问题都是马上解决的｡房子位置很方便,下楼就有公交和电车,走10分钟能到地铁｡房子里面装修很精致,配置丰富,卫生做得很好,五星推荐吖!

My friend and I had a pleasant and convenient stay. The builing looked a  bit old, but place was clean, quite, and comfortable. Although we could not see her, the responsiveness via mobile or email was great.

Jenny's place is very clean, and convenient. Suitable for small travelling group of 4-5. Jenny provided a hassle-free procedure for us to check-in and even made arrangements for us to leave our luggage after checking-out.  
Responses from her were also prompt.  

Thank you, Jenny!
高低床的房间太小了,小的可怜,第一次见过这么小的房间,大家可以忽略了!睡在里面特别闷!网络那天用不了好像被改了,密码是不对的!感觉和上次我在铜锣湾住的相比略不方便,总体很棒!还是很好的!
Great plc. near Ammar Mosque  got canteen for Halal food - recommend for muslim -

Great location as it is in central area, nearby market, supermarket, Kam's Roast, Honolulu Café. Capital cafe and etc. Close to MTR, tram & bus stops  Host is easy to be contacted. We have found a great place to stay for our future Hong Kong trip! Thanks Jenny!
Very nice location and clean apartment! Jenny was always helpful to answer my questions. Thanks Jenny !
clean house,  responsive host and good location.
房子大,地段好,舒适性不错,会继续来｡
We enjoyed our stay in this conveniently located apartment.  It was also clean and comfortable (3 adults and 2 kids).  Will stay again for sure and would recommend to others.
Jenny's place is absolutely perfect, location, cleanliness, jenny is always support, this place is worth for your money!!!
很棒的房子,很棒的住宿感觉｡

We are a family of 5 and we settled comfortably in Jenny's flat. It is very clean and spacious by HK standard. Also it is very quiet considering the flat is on one of the busiest road in HK. We would definitely book this place again if we come to HK next time
位置很好湾仔站附近,附近就是时代广场,房子很干净在香港算是空间比较宽敞的了,如果小房间放一张床,高低床放在另外一个房间可能更合理,总之住宿是很满意朋友都挺中意的｡

We had a group of 5, 3 adults and 2 children. Staying here instead of a hotel gave us a very small taste of real life in HK. 
Pro: Central, convenient location, clean. Quiet when inside. Reasonable size lounge. Clean bathrooms. 
Con: Beds are on the firm side. Needs a slightly more complete set of cutlery and plates to match the number of occupants.
Nice apartment as described. Close to public transport with great places to eat nearby
迟来的评价｡对于5个人的旅行,房型完全满足｡交通也挺便利分｡
Good location, reasonably priced. Perhaps suggest to scent the place and corridor with some scent to be more pleasant for future patrons. Superb communication and prompt responses.
不错的环境,适合家庭或朋友一起同行,地理位置很好!
房子的位置非常方便,离湾仔地铁站走路8分钟左右,离铜锣湾商圈很近,交通方便,也很干净,适合家庭入住

We were a group of friends visiting another friend who has recently moved to HK. 
The apartment is small but lovely and exactly what we needed. 
It's very central and very easy to get around the city. 
Jenny was very helpful and got back to us very quickly. 
Highly recommend!!
Excellent location and the unit was quite spacious. Jenny was very responsive and helpful throughout our stay. Will definitely stay again.

Great little spot. Right in the heart of Wan Chai, lots to do, places to eat, great transport options. Snooker hall was great round the corner. Jenny was awesome to communicate with and is very accomodating. Building is surprisingly quiet given its vibrant location. Would definitely stay here again!

Great location as you are close to everything needed! Bus A11 would be the best and cheapest choice as the walking distance is really short and convenient even with big lugguage.
Everything works well and very clean.
Perfect for 5 adults (more would be a little squeezy because of the size of the beds.)
Jenny was very helpful.
Highly recommended!
Great location and very clean. Jenny is always quick and efficient in response.  A good place to stay for a family trip.
Excellent location, typical HK size apt, only consideration is that the mattresses are very very firm.
Jenny's place was adorable, clean, and in a fantastic location (seriously, amazingly walkable and close to everything, including the train station)--I would absolutely rent again!
Very convenient apartment, we will come again...
房屋位置就在路边,方便寻找,交通便捷,靠近地铁站｡房间卫生很好,就是空调声音巨大

Jenny's home is excellent . Strategic location .  After arriving Hong Kong ,
You can take airport bus A11 and stop at Stewart road and you only need to cross the road and look out for a KFC.  Jenny's house is a walking distance to Causeway bay as you turn right after exiting the entrance and  exit left to take mtr. The tram station is also nearby . You can also take a bus to airport , E11A from the bus stop just below the apartment. If you take E11A,  you need to allocate more time to airport . The bus journey is 
About one hour 15 minutes .
推荐

Greate location and easy accecss. But the facilities need managing more carefully.  
The rooms are smaller than picture see. If you want easilly access famous site, recommend it.
But should be check utilities work and cleaning condition.
房间离地铁数百米,十分方便｡里面设施齐全,干净整洁｡

Jenny's place is in the ideal location. It was central to everything we wanted to do in Hong Kong and so close to the metro it was perfect. Jenny was fantastic at communicating and promptly responded to all my messages. The apartment was spotlessly clean. A late check in was greatly appreciated. Highly recommend this place for travellers.
Jenny's place was perfect! Convenient location, clean and upgraded rooms. Everything as described. Jenny is a very thoughtful host too. Highly recommended!
靠近地铁湾仔站｡步行过去大概5到10分钟｡房子很干净,但是楼层好像有邻居养宠物,有点味道｡三个房间很舒服,还有一个婴儿床可以用｡老妈爱上了婴儿床,非让我买个回来在家用｡(¯∇¯) 厨房洗手间功能很全,楼下就是各种便利店超市等等｡房东人非常好,值得推荐哦!房间卫生如果再仔细点就更好了,整体非常棒,连挑剔的老妈否赞不绝口呢!
Great place and host
入住便利,位置很好,很方便｡很適合家族旅遊一起同住｡

The stay in Jenny's apartment was fantastic. Big enough for 6 persons (good western standard). With the possibility to sleep also on the couch, there is an additional sleeping possibility, if the double bed should be too small for one or the other. There is in each room its own air conditioning and everything is super clean. The two bathrooms including toilets are also big enough. We even cooked and used the washing machine. WLAN worked excellent.

We had asked Jenny before our arrival for washing powder, answer came within 15 minutes.
Unfortunately, we did not meet Jenny personally, since from check-in to the departure everything worked perfectly.

The location itself is perfect. I have no other comparison, but I think that there is no better location in Hong Kong. Wan Chai - MTR station within 8 minutes walking distance, some buses outside the door (we did not use). Supermarket 3 minutes away, KFC right in the basement of the building, McDonalds also close by. The building itself, as well as the entire city is very safe. You can not enter the building without code/card and there is a guard around the clock at the elevators

My family and I would definitely book the apartment again if we travel again to Hong Kong!

Kind regards!
Marco
Good location which is close to MTR station. Apartment is clean and spacious. Many restaurants nearby. Jenny is easy to commuicate with. Highly recommend this place.

Stayed in several places in Hong Kong before. This is our favorite so far. I read hundreds of reviews before choosing this place. It is difficult to find a budget friendly ,modern place for families in the heart of the city! My highest priority was that is was centrally located,  quiet at night, and had strong air -conditioning. Most places in China are smaller,  in size,so keep that in mind.This was perfect for us! To find a place with 2 full-size beds and a set of bunk beds ,and 2 baths with showers is rare! It is nicely remodeled. We did not need a view as being quiet downtown in the city was more important. The building had solid windows and flooring to filter noise.Many places in China are brand new but with inferior building materials and one can hear everything next door and outside. Owner was very helpful and responsive. Extra toiletries, hair dryer, adaptor  plugs, iron and making extra phone calls for us was very kind.Great places to eat nearby including terrific local dim sum, Gengki sushi or even Italian are restaurants.McDonalds and KFC are at the doorstep. Fresh market outside only a couple places away. So close to subway. Loved staying here and highly recommend for smaller families (The double beds are,smaller, than USA (Website hidden by Airbnb) keep) that in mind) It is a fair price for the terrific location and accomadations offered. Loved it Clean and modern.

It was our first time travelling to Hong Kong and my friends and I wanted a comfortable apartment that was central to the places we wanted to frequent. Jenny's place was perfect and the stay there was extremely comfortable. Anyone that is new to Hong Kong and wants a nice place to spend their time, should find Jennys place in Wan Chai. It's walking distance from every major form of transport.

숙소가 깨끗하고 좋았어요. 사진보다는 좁은 집이어서 사진과 조금 다르기는 했지만 에어컨도 잘나오고 화장실 2개이고 냉장고도 있어요. 냄비랑 그릇 젓가락 컵 같은것도 비치되어 있어서 간단한 요리해먹기도 좋은것같아요. 아 그리고 집에 변압어댑터가 있어서가져갈 필요 진짜 없어요. 호스트를 직접 만나본적은 없지만 영어로 소통이 가능해서 너무 편했고 식당예약도 도와주셨습니다. 정말 좋은 분이에요...ㅎㅎㅎ

房子地理位置非常好!逛街吃飯什麼都有!走路去也不遠｡私人樓要按密碼還要嘟卡進去,還有看更,蠻安全的｡
之前看到其他評論說走廊有狗味,確實是,估計是不通風吧,不過進去屋子就冇事啦｡蠻清潔衛生的,可以不用轉換插頭,房東準備的拖板是在是神器｡
房子所在的方向是靠街內,所以真的很安靜｡
總之,我和我的小夥伴都相當滿意!
Great place and location for what we needed. Tram line outside door perfect for trip and great communication and location to supermarket and shops outside apartment. Worked well and great value
一行五人入住,房子的地理位置还是挺好的,但是这次体验说实话不是很好｡首先房间外面的过道太臭了,臭味从门缝渗进房内｡住了五天,期间没有人来每天清理垃圾,客厅的空调严重漏水,我门拿了四条毛巾和水桶才能应付,漏了三天才修好｡只能说性价比真的不高｡

Jenny's apartment is large with three rooms and a big living room.  The location is great too where you can find a huge supermarket and McDonald's downstairs.  I had a great stay with my five friends.  Thank you Jenny!
Although the apartment was small (as most are in HK), it was very well equipped and convenient for all the attractions. Overall a great stay in a lively city.

We landed in HK from London at 7am with a 7 year old, a 9 year old, a 70 year old and my husband and myself. We walked around HK until just before check in time at 1.10pm. When we got there there were no keys in the letter box as arranged. I called Jenny and she asked if I was checking in today! Alarm bells ringing in my head. This question was asked after I had emailed her around four times a couple of days beforehand to finalise arrangements and dates. She told me to wait 5 minutes and her staff would be there. 50 minutes later her cleaner eventually arrived. You can imagine the state my family were in waiting in 34 degree heat. When the cleaner let us in, the flat was a mess as it hadn't been cleaned from the previous stayer. We all had to wait then while the cleaner cleaned the flat around us and changed the bed sheets while we sat on the sofa. Not a happy experience at all and definitely not what you need after a 12 hour flight and walking around HK for 6 hours.

편의 시설과 가까우며 교통이 편리함.
숙소는 겉모습과는 달리 안모습은 깔끔하고 아늑함.
친절하고 연락도 잘 되어 만족
Compact unit, right in the heart of Hong-Kong. No difficulty in checking in and out. Exactly what we wanted.
闹中取静,非常方便,可惜住的时间太短

A nice, compact and clean apartment in a good location to explore Hong Kong Island. There are some good places to explore within walking distance. Very good transport links nearby. We had a pleasant stay.
交通很便利 附近有很多超市 商场 吃的也很丰富
A great stay with all the amenities to make you feel at home. Jenny was very helpful and responsive. I'd definitely stay again.
真的很開心
第一次在香港选择民宿,是一次非常不错的体验!小伙伴超级喜欢,房间有3间,适合4.5个小伙伴,有厅有厨房还能用洗衣机洗衣服,两个卫生间,回到那里就像回到家,躺在沙发上一起聊天,出入也方便,到地铁站湾仔站走路大约6分钟吧,门口就是巴士站,非常满意,房主很客气热情,保持沟通,负责

완차이역에서 걸어서 10분 이내에 있습니다. 숙소바로 앞에 트램정류장과 버스정류장도 있어서 이용하기 좋았습니다. 숙소 근처가 번화가여서 모든 것이 가능했습니다. 주인과 에어비앤비 메세지를 통해 바로바로 연락이 가능했고, 집의 상태도 훌륭했습니다. 방이 세개있어서 5명 가족이 지내기에 몹시 적당했고, 부엌과 세탁기,전자렌지,냉장고 등 생활에 필요한 거의 모든것이 갖춰져있습니다. 다만 세면도구는 가지고가는게 좋겠습니다. 방마다 에어컨도 있고 여러가지로 매우 만족스러운 숙소였습니다.
交通方便､地點熱鬧餐廳多､住所乾淨､有廚房可利用很加分｡

Jenny's apartment was in a great location, full of life although no noise in the apartment.
Thanks for a great stay

We are a family of 3 from Australia with an 11 year old girl. We stopped over in HK for a few days after being in Europe for 4 weeks. The apartment was very well located for public transport and food. It felt clean, secure, spacious and comfortable. Jenny's communication was excellent. We would happily stay in this apartment again.
干净
Very nice stay.  Everything is good.  Sure will back again.  Clean modern convenient.
立地もよく､きれいで便利
非常好的选择!离各处都近,好吃的众多!
Central location with nice kitchen. Comfortable bed. Very fast and friendly communication.
너무 좋은 위치에 있어서 여러가지로 편했습니다. 숙소에 있는 멀티탭이 아주 유용했어요~~방은 좀 작은편이지만 5명이 생활이 부족하지 않았어요
좋은 위치와 깨끗한 인테리어가 장점입니다. 여자 여섯명이 묵기에 크게 불편함이 없고 바로 옆 건물 지하에 슈퍼마켓이 있어서 편리하게 이용할 수 있어요. 공항에서 A11 버스타면 한번에 갈 수 있는 것도 좋아요.
Jenny is super host! She is very helpful with very quick response. Jenny place is very clean and super comfy. Will definitely return for next visit!!!
Very small unit then what I thought coming from Australia we struggled to keep the place clean but besides that great location and lovely to deal with
Great location, very clean, responsive host. What’s not to love?
Nice and clean place to stay for a family with kids.

This is a nice and convenient place to stay at. Transportation is very convenient and there’re lots of dining places around. There are watchmen for the flat and you need a pass to enter the flat and access the lift, so security is great despite it’s in a very busy area with lots of people walking by the entrance. The flat itself is very quiet. It’s a decent size and is well-furnished. The only suggestion I have is the mattresses are too hard. Jenny is a great host and has been very responsive to all my questions.
Very convenient location with famous roast goose shop, supermarket and fast food nearby. It is also not far from Wan Chai mtr station.
房子很好,打算下次再入住
Homey and cosy
Good location, very clean, and match the photo.
Great location with multiple public transportations reachable within 5min walking distance.
Jenny’s place was very well located right in the heart of wan chai.   We only stayed a short time but overall was a good experience.
很干净的房子,香港寸金寸土的地方,真的很不错,住的很舒适｡

The apartment is a good size by Hong Kong standards. 4 of us, including 2 under 7s, stayed there for 9 nights over Chinese New Year. There was plenty of space and the kids loved the bunk beds. Wi-Fi is excellent and the showers are have plenty of pressure. Location in Wan Chai means you are right in the middle of the hustle and bustle as soon as you leave the apartment block. Loads of places to eat on your doorstep. It's a great base for exploring HK island - buses and trams stop right outside and the metro is just a 5 minute walk away.

bonjour 
un emplacement ideal pour decouvrir HK. Un appartement de bonne taille bien entretenu, pour accueillir une famille de 4. 
Jenny est tres reactive et accomodante pour l’arrivee et le depart. Nous reviendrons! Merci Jenny!
If you like to stay in a place that is middle of all the action. This is the place, love the area and the host was very helpful and flexable. Would stay here again next time I go back to Hong Kong.

This apartment was very clean and comfortable with cooking facilities plus a washing machine if required. Two bathrooms and three bedrooms made sharing easy for three women. It is a short walk to Wan Chai MTR and buses and trams stop outside, so the location is perfect. There is a lot of restaurants in the area to choose from and a supermarket a couple of doors away. Jenny was a very responsive host and access was very easy on arrival. I am happy to recommend this apartment which could accommodate two couples and two children easily.
Jenny’s place is great! Just what we were looking for ! Spacious and clean!

완차이 역에서 짐 갖고 걸어가기엔 살짝 멀어서 5~10분 정도 걸립니다. 트램이 바로 근처에 있어서 짐 없을 때는 편하게 다녔어요. 공항에서 오갈때는 근처에 Novotel Century에서 AEL 셔틀버스 타면 편하게 올 수 있습니다.  집은 사진이 실제보단 살짝 크게 나왔지만, 홍콩 치고 넓은 편이었습니다. 홍콩이 습해서 ㅂㅋ벌레는 어쩔수 없이 한두마리 봤구요. 침대는 생각보다 좁습니다. 수건은 숙박기간 당 1인1수건이니 여분수건 챙겨가는 게 좋을 것 같아요. 집주인 제니는 매우 친절하고 메신저도 빠르게 답장해줘서 좋았습니다.
By Hong Kong standards, I think Jenny’s apartment was quite spacious, fitting our family of four. Easy to access public transport as well.

Loved staying here. All as described and a fantastic base for exploring Hong Kong. Minutes away from Wan Chai MTR and also a very short walk to the Star Ferry terminal serving TST East. Good supermarkets very close by. Very easy to get too on the Airport Bus services.
整個房子很大,有三個房間各住兩個人,沙發可以躺一個人,還配有兩個浴室超級方便!離灣仔地鐵站大概要走8-10分鐘,但離銅鑼灣非常近,晚上適合安排銅鑼灣逛街的行程,附近店面都開到晚上11.多,門前就有巴士站,可以搭到碼頭､大嶼山等等,再往銅鑼灣方向走也可以搭巴士到旺角,我認為搭巴士會比搭地鐵方便許多!

Great location and plenty of space. We were travelling as a family with 3 kids under 6. The 3 bedrooms give plenty of space and being close to lots of transport made it easy to get around. Jenny was quick to respond to all emails and was a great host.
Great responsive host, great apartment, excellent space, recommend trying it

Jenny’s place was perfect for us. The apartment was spacey by hk standards with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. It’s had everything we needed. Very convient for the convention center. Very easy access to public transport, shops and restaurants.
숙소가 MTR 완차이 역에서 5 ~ 10분 정도 거리에 위치해 있고 주변에 24시간 편의점이나 마트가 있습니다- 수건 1일 1개 주는 거 말고는 다 괜찮았습니다!

Very good position, convenient. Close the subway and lots good food around. It’s clean and quiet house. Enough for 6 persons. Comfortable beds. 
這間房的位置很棒､距離地鐵近､樓下很多好吃的地方､房間非常乾淨､也很安靜｡夠6個人住,床也舒服､很推薦喔｡

It’s very good & sparkling clean apartment & very good location 
Jenny is very  nice host

Jenny’s place was awesome and perfect for our night it Hong Kong. Her home was exactly as described and featured in the pictures, and the location was the icing on the cake. I would definitely recommend her spot!
A nice apartment in a really good position. Jenny responds to requests very quickly. A great area for a short visit to Hong Kong. I would stay here again.

We stayed one night on a layover, I was with 3 other work colleagues 
The location is great with a short walk from MTR and lots of restaurants and bars
The apartment is small but great by Hong Kong standards the 2x main bedrooms have double beds the 3rd bedroom is small with a bunk bed which is not very big, there are 2x bathrooms and a full kitchen
The place was very clean and tidy

The location is perfect for our stay. Everything was as described. It is clean (no little pets like roaches) and enough for our 2 families to stay. It is hard to find a place in Hong Kong to accommodate 8 people. We might need 4 rooms if we stay in a hotel since the bed in HK hotel is really small. Be prepare for the security guard, they will question you for the first time and ask you to fill out some basic info. Overall experience is good. Jenny was very helpful although I never met her in person. She was very responsive.
Great location and apartment exactly as described, recommended

Nice apartment! We have 6 people which fit 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (if more than 6 people may feel a little bit crowned) ,comfortable living room and kitchen with air-conditioners in every room. Location is great, safe and near all the transportations, bus, MTR, tram, surrounded with many restaurants, cafe, Starbucks , supermarket.
位置挺好的 房间也不错 适合多人一起玩耍

A great place in HK for those looking to be right in the middle of the action! The apartment is only 7-8min walk from the MTR and there are numerous restaurants and shops nearby. While it is in a bustling area, the unit itself is very quiet and comfortable! We were a family of 4 and had plenty of room - the two bathrooms were also a great feature that was hard to find in a city with typically small units. Would recommend for families or groups traveling through HK!
Really clean and convenient.  We love it!  The beds are firm and good for my back.  Jenny is very helpful and quick in responding.

가격대비 굉장히 좋은 숙소였습니다. 4명이서 묵었고 침대는 네명이서 묵기에 충분했어요
일단 위치가 굉장히 좋은 메인스트리트에 있어서 외출이자유로워서 제일 좋았고, 청결도와 에어컨 작동등 기본적인 내용도 만족스러웠습니다.
Excellent location and spacious apartment for Hong Kong. Everything is clean. Will stay there again next time.
Clean and response in time.

房子地點靠近地鐵
乾淨舒適空間大
比想像中好
下次ㄧ定會再來
超級推薦給大家
Very compact  apartment but probably quite spacious for Hong Kong. Very clean, great aircon. Comfy firm beds.
租給親戚住

Jenny's place is in a great location - just minutes from the Wan Chai MTR station, bus/tram stations right outside, and walkable to Causeway Bay. Very convenient - lots of restaurants, stores and supermarkets nearby. 

The apartment itself is good - the kitchen was handy, as was the washing machine. It was a space for Hong Kong and enough to accommodate 5 adults for almost 2 weeks. Also, nice and clean. 

Jenny is a very responsive host. Would definitely stay again if visiting Hong Kong.

Great location! Smack in the middle of many local delights. The place is small by my standards- there isn’t much space to place your baggage unless you use the common area... but, for Hong Kong's standard I think it is fairly spacious. Jenny is easy to communicate with and is responsive.

整體上大致ok
地點方便,進出方便

Inmejorable localización en Wan Chai.
No preparado a mi entender para recibir a ocho personas, las literas de la habitación pequeña sin ventana es practicamente impracticable y sólo cuenta con cuatro sillas y menaje (vasos, platos, cubiertos, etc.) escaso.
Sin muchos ruidos, aunque tuvimos la mala suerte de que estaban realizando obras en el apartamento contiguo.
La anfitriona perfecta resolvió todas las dudas y nos permitió dejar el equipaje antes del check in.
Muy adecuado para una visita corta a Hong Kong.
Great place! Easy access and close to everything!
Fantastic location, near to all you need as a tourist in Hong Kong. lots of dining options within minutes and tram station right in front. Supermarket is nearby as well. Great for a family.

Amazing location!  15min walk to CWB. 10min walk to Wan Chai metro station. On a busy street, but the apt faces the back side of the building, so pretty quiet. AC in every room and it worked very well.  Many many good restaurants in the area. If you are tall, ie over 5’10”, the only bedroom you’ll fit in is the master bedroom because with the other bedrooms, the head and foot of the beds are against walls, so you won’t be able to stretch out your legs if you’re over that height. The other option is to sleep on the couch in the living room, which converted to a bed. That’s what one of us had to do. Other than that, we appreciated the two full bathrooms for 5 adults. The washing machine in the kitchen was also very helpful. Great stay!

Great apartment, great location, great value!  It  worked well for my partner and I, travelling with our young son and my parents. Jenny is very quick to respond to calls and messages.  It was our second time staying here, and would definitely stay here again in future.
Jenny's place was lovely and in a really great location. Jenny is a lovely host and responds to any questions ASAP, making you feel comfortable from the beginning.
Very clean place and near the Wan Chai MTR station. Plus factor is very near Kam’s roast goose. Will definitely come back here. Thank you Jenny!
Good location - near MTR (Wan Chai) and convenience stores. Good security. Rooms are clean and of decent size (bear in mind that houses in HK are small)
Jenny的房源位置很好,搭乘地铁公交都很方便,楼下各种小吃､超市一应俱全｡能容纳大概八人同时入住｡很适合一大家人在一起｡厨房碗盘锅灶齐全,想自己煮个饭也OK｡总之是性价比很高的选择!

Great location in the middle of the busy streets of Wanchai. 
You can walk to a couple really great Michelin rated restaurants on foot. We also walked with our two young kids to the star ferry pier as well. 
The rooms are tiny but it is great to have three separate rooms and it helped to have two separate bathrooms as well. 


The entrance is a little hard to spot and the street is gated off in front of the entrance so it’s a bit inconvenient if you are traveling with a lot of luggage. We were on our way back home from a several month long trip in Asia so we had several luggages and two sleepy kids so it was a bit difficult moving in and out of the apartment. 

Our major downside to the experience was that there was a renovation in the unit facing the Airbnb unit and it had no door or tarps to block off the dust and fumes so the dust was even accumulating inside the Airbnb unit. The noise was quite unbearable on one of the days. When the issue was brought up to Jenny, she was considerate enough to give us partial refund to compensate for our inconvenience. HK has a lot of renovations going on at most locations so I think it’s vital to check with host before booking. 

Everything in the Airbnb was very clean and working functionally. 

We would love to stay at Jenny’s aptmt again if we are traveling to HK again.
非常棒!房源位置离地铁站也很方便,五分钟不到就能走到~安保设施也非常齐全☺房间内的WiFi也很快,房东小姐姐人真的特别好,允许行李寄存!很方便很贴心❤以后来HK还会首选这里的~

Жили в квартире у Jenny неделю. Все абсолютно устроило. Квартира небольшая, как и большинство апартаментов в Гонконге, но в квартире есть все необходимое, включая два санузла. От станции MTR Ван Чай минут 10 неспешным шагом. В двух шагах довольно большой и удобный супермаркет. Заселение и выселение максимально упрощено, хозяина ждать не надо.

Jenny's place is in an excellent location. Wan Chai is very centrally located, and her apartment is steps to the Ding Ding and bus stop and about a seven minute walk to the subway. As she mentioned, the E11 airport bus stop is also quite near. It was convenient having a full service supermarket right downstairs to pick up snacks, fruit, and water. There are also plenty of local restaurants and some quick foreign places (i.e. McDonalds, Starbucks, and KFC) really close by. 
It was nice to have 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The room with the bunkbeds is very narrow (about the width of two twin beds), so you won't be able to store suitcases in that room if you want to have space to walk. The showers had excellent water pressure and the water was always nice and warm. We didn't need AC in February, but it would certainly be nice in the summer. 
Lastly, we were asked if we were staying in an Air BnB, so be prepared for this question. 
In sum, we enjoyed our stay and would recommend Jenny's place to others. Jenny always answered my questions quickly and was a considerate host.

name: Luxury ocean view Beach Villa 622
summary: Optional services offered upon request: Mid-stay housekeeping. Babysitting services provided by a First Aid and CPR certified family member. Please inquire for rates and availability.
space: Aloha and welcome to our ocean view beach villa!  This spacious luxury 3 bedroom villa has been beautifully furnished and offers all the comforts of home along with the luxury of a world-class tropical vacation.  The large lanai with comfortable armchairs and a large couch allows you to enjoy the indoor/outdoor lifestyle from sunrise to sunset.  You have the choice of keeping your lanai doors open and enjoying the fresh Hawaiian breeze or using the central air-conditioning.  The signature state-of-the-art kitchen is designed by renowned Master Chef Roy Yamaguchi with Sub-Zero and Wolf appliances.  The granite kitchen island has 4 bar stools for casual dining and socializing.  The large dining table comfortably seats 8 people.  The living room features a large, modular sofa that can be arranged to sleep two more people if needed.  We also have Netflix available on the 55” flat screen in the living room so you have endless options of movies, TV shows & entertainment.  The Master Bedroom

neighborhood_overview: The Beach Villas at Ko Olina is located on the West side of O'ahu along two miles of Oahu's most pristine beaches in the world-class, private Ko Olina Resort vacation community. This resort community is home to the Aulani Disney Resort, the JW Marriott Ihilani Resort and Spa, the Marriott Beach Club, Ko Olina Golf Course and the Ko Olina Marina. You are located just steps from the beach and within walking distance of all of the numerous amenities offered throughout this vacation community. The Ted Robinson designed Ko Olina Championship Golf Course is home to the LPGA Lotte Championship. There are three full service spas located in Aulani, the Ihilani and the Marriott Beach Club. There are numerous fine dining options located throughout the resort community. The world-class Ko Olina Marina offers a selection of sports fishing, coastline cruises and water activities, from seasonal whale watching and dolphin sails to snorkeling among Hawaiian sea turtles and dramatic sunset cruises. The
notes: a signed rental agreement is required to check in. It will be send to you per e-mail to review, sign and return prior your arrival.
transit: Car is recommended. The resort offers a shuttle within the gated resort.
access: As a Guest at the Beach Villas you will enjoy all the ammenities that the resort has to offer like the spa with sauna and steam room, Fitness center and more
interaction: The Beach Villa has a friendly staff at the front desk 24/7 but I am always available if you need any assistance.
house_rules: Maximum 8 people All guest must follow the Beach Villas house rules. A copy will be available upon check-in.

host.host_about: Me and my husband have been living in KoOlina for more than 5 years. The Beach Villas was our home residence before our family started growing and so we decided to move to have more space.  At that time we decided to share our beautiful beach villa with you. We absolutely love the KoOlina resort community and we can truly say that this resort is a 'place of joy'!

reviews.comments:
we are a group of 7,  two families with young kids. We lived in Beach Villa 622.
D is a very thoughtful host, she got everything we need,from kitchen stuff to beach gears, After check in we just realized we have overpacked. Even we didn't meet D in person, but she alway there to response us. Such as we prefer a bigger pan for big group , she just bought one for us, thanks so much. 
It was so easy to check in and out.
Great location, great facilities ,fitness room, two swimming pools,and lagoon.
Definitely recommend to every one, and we will come back for another stay .

Simon
Definitely will go back to villa 622 loved our stay very peaceful and clean.

We stayed in Unit 622 at the Ko Olina beach villas. The apartment is in the ocean tower which Is set back from the water a little, and has a sunny view south to the Marriott and it’s lagoon, and out west to the ocean. It’s really a five star property throughout - very well maintained,  beautiful pools and landscaping, and a real attention to detail. The apartment itself is great
with high end appliances and finishes. The layout works well for families with three bd/ba and the doors open wide onto the sunny deck. 
The lagoon outside was quieter than the crowded beaches at Aulani/4 Seasons to the North and the Marriott to the South. Surprisingly good snorkeling in the beautiful clear water - and Denice’s place has plenty of beach equipment to use.  Would recommend Ko Olina and this apartment for sure but ensure you check minimum # of rental days directly with Denice to avoid confusion.

The condo was located in an area with lots of neighborhood amenities and it was well maintained.  Andrea was very kind and helpful.  I would definitely recommend this place to anyone seeking a peaceful getaway in Oahu.

name: Studio no Leme - Quadra da Praia
summary: Apartamento Studio localizado no Leme. O apartamento dipõe de conforto e privacidade necessária para um casal.
space: O apartamento se encontra numa rua interna, a segunda, muito perto da praia de Leme. A ubicação é ótima: perto da praia, porém sem o incômodo do barulho e do sol batente.
description: Apartamento Studio localizado no Leme. O apartamento dipõe de conforto e privacidade necessária para um casal.   O apartamento se encontra numa rua interna, a segunda, muito perto da praia de Leme. A ubicação é ótima: perto da praia, porém sem o incômodo do barulho e do sol batente.    Os hóspedes terão acesso além dos serviços de Copacabana - se quiserem passear cinco minutos - as várias e numerosas lojas de Leme: restaurantes renomados como o Fiorentina, o Sherley (ótima a Paella), Dona Joaquina e o restaurante Degli Amici. Perto da praia está ativo um serviço pra alugar bicicletas.   Para qualquer problema ou dificuldade estamos a disposição. Vamos acolhê-los e explicar onde encontrar as coisas de casa: panelas, pratos, toalhas, etc.  Leme é um bairro muito acolhedor. Embora fique ao lado de Copacabana não tem os incômodos deste: barulho de ônibus e a multidão a qualquer hora do dia e da noite. Tem muitos táxis indo e vindo - sendo Leme um bairro turístico - e um serviço de ônibus:

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Fale mais sobre você:
Carioca de 26anos, formada em design de moda. Apaixonada por viagens e conhecer pessoas novas. Amo minha casa, é um refiguio do mundo que espero (Website hidden by Airbnb) afeto
Paloma

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
We couldn't have been happier during our stay at Palomas apartment!
The flat is just as described as in the ad and very well located foot steps from the beach, restaurants, bars, shopping facilities and public transportation. My boyfriend and I spent a wonderful time and will definitely come back whenever visiting Rio again in the future.
Thank you very much to you both :)

Paloma was a great host, the house is exactly as you can see in the pictures and the location is awesome. 
I definitely recommend this apartment you will be treated really good.

Super Unterkunft direkt an der Copacabana. 
Die Wohnung liegt toll für eine Strandurlaub und für die Erkundung von Rio de Janeiro. Wir waren für die olympischen Spiele dort und haben uns dort sehr wohl gefühlt. Gerne wieder.
Espectacular estadía en el departamento de Paloma. Muy cómodo y una excelente anfitriona. La ubicación es un 10. Muy agradecido por la amabilidad de Paloma.
O Studio fica muito bem localizado, e o local é limpo, aconchegante é funcional. Paloma é extremamente atenciosa, sempre disposta a ajudar e fornecer a melhor experiência de viagens.

The apartment is cozy and furnished with a lot of personal touch. It's only a 2 minute walk and you are at the beautiful beach of Leme, with a view along the Copabana and the Sugar Loaf and Morro de Leme on the other side. The neighbourhood is quiet for Rio standards and we felt pretty secure. It is a bit off track regarding the metro (15 minutes walking distance) but you can reach everything with buses passing Leme or the Avenida Princesa Isabel. We didn't meet our host Paloma but she was always available for questions and information and helped us a lot. We would definitely recommend Paloma's apartment!

Estuvimos alli hace unos dias,  en la semana de carnaval. Hermoso alojamiento, tal como figura en las fotos. La ubicacion excelente!! A una cuadra de la playa, con un mercado a media cuadra, seguridad las 24 horas, y la atencion y hospitalidad de Paloma es destacable! Lo volveriamos a elegir, y por supuesto lo recomendamos!
Muy buena ubicación

summary: Come stay on Historic Sugar Hill in Manhattan:  Spacious room in clean, quiet, apartment; landmark elevator building in safe, historic neighborhood. Centrally located to major attractions.  Metro is on the same block as the apartment, half a block away! Complimentary Breakfast. Only three train stops away from Times Square!!!
space: Private Room in spacious quiet apartment. Apartment overlooks a long stretch of gorgeous park, on a quaint, quiet and intimate street. Apartment is newly renovated. Spacious , 1.5 baths. Very clean, well maintained, quiet and peaceful. When I am home, I am sight unseen, as I am at the opposite end of the apartment however, I am always available to answer any questions, or concerns. neighborhood_overview: Neo-gothic architecture, Historic, Mecca of African American culture, inexpensive shopping and upscale boutiques on 125th Street, only one train stop away. Gospel Services within walking distance. Famous Apollo Theatre and Museum Mile are close by.  Environmentally Friendly: Parks, less traffic. Within walking distance to the Hudson River, and Gorgeous Riverside Drive.  Neighborhood is safe, well developed and close to an ever-developing restaurant district, nitelife, bars, cafes, arts & culture and museums.  The Cloisters and Museum Mile are nearby The north west entrance to Central Park, is within walking distance.
notes: *AMENITIES* *Elevator building.  *Help yourself to coffee, an assortment of teas and hot cocoa 'round the clock.  *Full use of well equipped kitchen, with some basic food staples included.  ***For those staying more than 7 nites, The NY Times at your door on Sunday. ***Laundry room in the basement, open from 8:00am to 8:00pm daily. LAUNDRY SERVICE INCLUDED in the nightly rate, for guests staying 7 nights, or more ***Room is equipped with lots of reading material.  *Toiletries: Toothbrush, mouthwash, toothpaste, body wash, shampoo, conditioner. body lotion, and hand sanitizer.  *Fresh bedding and towels every 2-3 days for a stay of four, or more nites.  *Four hundred thread count sheets.  Pillows are changed 4x yearly. All bedding is soaked in hospital grade sanitizer. Room is thoroughly cleaned, sanitized,and steam cleaned, after every and during guest stays. *Multi-function Center: Printer, Copier, Scanner and Fax, available for your use. *Two Hair Dryers.  *Ironing board and two iron
transit: Three metro stations, total of six train lines, and buses service the neighborhood. The main subway station, is around the corner from the apartment, less than a two minute walk away. The city never sleeps, transportation operates 24/7. Taxi service up the street.
access: The entire apartment. Well equipped kitchen:   Norwalk Cold Pressed Juicer, Blender, Breville Convection Oven, Electric Grill, Cuisinart Rice Cooker, Cuisinart Mini Food Processor, Stove Top Coffee Maker, Cooking supplies, Dishes, Flatware, Basic food staples. Laundry Room in Basement, but Laundry Service is often included for stays of 7 nights, or more. 1.5 Baths.
interaction: I am available everyday and very responsive to any questions, concerns and assistance with planning your itinerary.
house_rules: No drugs. Smoking outside, or out the window.  No pets in the apartment, but a cat or a small well trained dog is allowed. Please inquire about bringing a pet, prior to reserving.  Please make sure to lock the apartment door, upon entering and leaving the apartment. Pulling the door closed is not the same as locking it; the deadbolt must be engaged. Locking the door is about securing the home.  SHOELESS HOME: Street shoes are not to be worn in the apartment. House slippers are ok. Please make sure to wipe feet on the mat prior to entering the apartment. Please leave shoes at the door upon entering the apartment, on the mat in the corridor. The dirt trekked in on the soles of the shoes is abrasive, corrosive to the hardwood floor. The bacteria that’s dragged in is also corrosive, as well as unsanitary.  No roof access, please do not go up to the roof. There’s a boogie man up there.  Thank you and enjoy your stay!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Traveled extensively. 
Fluent in spanish. 
Understand Portuguese. 

I am friendly, engaging and charismatic. A service oriented host, I aim to help everyone, feel welcome and at home. I am your guide from point of contact, through to the end your stay. 

Love all music, but am a jazz aficionado. 

Music is a moral law. It gives soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination, and charm and gaiety to life and to everything -Plato

reviews.comments: Le séjour chez Agnès était parfait: la chambre, les petites attentions ( serviettes, draps, chocolats, bons plans....)  grâce aux bons plans d'Agnès nous avons même assisté à un concert rare à NYC ! Aussi les petits déjeuners d'Agnès sont les meilleurs de new york : frais, variés, copieux.... Un vrai délice !  La localisation est très bien, desservie par le bus et le métro ..... En conclusion un vrai bon plan et un accueil vraiment très chaleureux ..... N'hésitez pas !

For my trip to New York I used airbnb for the first time, and Agnes as a host was a perfect representative. I really enjoyed my stay in her flat. The room was quiet, private and clean, and Agnes was very helpful with everything else, even freshly prepared breakfast was included. Moreover, the flexible check-in and out times were great to enjoy the city without luggage on the day of departure. I highly recommend staying with Agnes, and if I am in New York again I would definitely stay with her again.

Conocimos NYC por primera vez y nuestra estadía con Agnes fue genial! No solo nos hizo sentir como en casa, sino que además disfrutamos de sus increibles desayunos. Nos fue de mucha ayuda cada consejo y guía que nos brindo para conocer mejor la ciudad y aprovechar nuestro viaje. Por sobre todas las cosas Agnes con su humildad y sencillez nos enseñó que hay un mundo nuevo afuera que necesita ser recorrido!

Dejamos NYC habrientos de futuro!!!!!

This was our first time using AirBnB and Agnes had the best reviews in NYC. Agnes deserves perfect scores across the board for hospitality and helpfulness. She was very knowledgeable about the area and goes above and beyond our initial expectations for any type of host. Dianne and I were in a tough situation looking for apartments, and Agnes was more than understanding. She even offered to hold our luggage for us while we searched for apartments for the weekend. Such a sweet, sweet person. I' d list all the extra things she's done for us, but I recommend you just visit yourself! =)

Pros: Everything! (Rooms are big, clean, cooled. Host is as accommodating as anyone. Location is perfect! Right by the subway and a few stops from Times Square.)

Cons: Nothing at all!

This was my cousin's first time coming to New York, she loved the location of the place... a couple of blocks from the subway entrance. When we arrived Agnes offered to upgrade us to her larger room which was really nice... we weren't in the room very much but it was a very nice room and she deserves the top rating!

Breakfast cooked by Agnes was great. The food was delicious and the fruits were fresh. The bed was very comfortable and the bed sheets were very clean. Agnes is extremely helpful. Whenever I needed help on how to get to places or advise on things to do at New York, she was always willing to explain to me and send me information about different places in New York through email. The subway is really nearby her house, making it really convenient for traveling downtown to the different attractions in Manhattan. Definitely a very good place to stay!:)

Staying at Agnes' place was just great. The appartment is clean, comfortable and very close to the subway station, which is just aroud the corner. We also enjoyed swimming in the -free - swimming pool in the park just accross the street. Agnes herself  is a fabulous host, always very friendly and ready to help. Every morning she served a delicious breakfast that kept us going all day, with bagels, pancakes, eggs, cooked meat, vegetables, cheese and fresh fruits. We would certainly recommend this place to others, and we will absolutely stay there again when we go back to New York.

This was our first time in the US and NYC. Agnes is a great host, she is very kind and helpful. Her apartment is very nice and clean. The subway is just a 2 minutes walk from the apartment, it was very good.
The breakfast was very delicious.

Agnes is a wonderful host, my sister and me spent a great time in her apartment!! 
We had our own private room and as soon as we arrive she provided us with clean towels. The room and the home are clean.
The location is perfect, it`s one block away from the subway, that will take you to anywhere in a few minutes.
Agnes is a kind person, and she provided you any information you need about the city. 
I definitely recommend Agnes to who plan to visit New York.
We had a great time at Agnes place, the apt was beautiful and at good location. Agnes was very nice and helpfull all the time we spent in New York.Thank you for making our NY trip better :)

grazie agnes,sei stata molto (Website hidden by Airbnb) tua casa e'tranquilla e in una posizione davvero (Website hidden by Airbnb) camera per 4 era un po' piccola ma quando tornero' magari me ne dai una un po'piu'grande.sei stata gentile,ci hai anche prenotato la navetta per il ritorno!a presto cara.Elisa

Agnes was awesome for giving me a place to stay on such short notice! Definitely an excellent host to have on my very first airbnb. It was quite convenient that her place is so close to the subway! Thanks again!

Agnes was extremely nice and helpful. She was very friendly and was easy to communicate with and flexible with our schedule. When the hurricane hit she was extremely helpful in making sure that we were ok. Thank you!

Great accomadation in an affordable price in Manhattan.
The place is super clean,quite, spacious and comfortable.
Full cable TV, Fast WIFI service and comfy bed\sheets.
The room is well seperated and you get a complete privacy. The location is perfect as around the corner you have an access to 4 subway lines 2 of them which are express and will take you to midtown in about 7 mins.
The neighberhood is safe -plus - starbucks and the supermarket half block away. 
Defiantly best value in Manhattan - beats any hotel and less than half the price.
Thank you Agnes :)
nice host, convenient transportation,clean room&bathroom!

Agnes is a great gal! Her place is clean & comfortable. I came & went as I pleased. She helped me navigate the city- she knows this place like the back of her hand. This was my 1st time using airbnb. I was nervous, but she made me feel at home. 

She's genuinely friendly & super accomidating. I had brought my dog with me, who's a total gentleman (normally). He was having anxiety because of the travel. The first time I went out he started crying after I left. Agnes comforted him & didn't give me a hard time about it or anything. Don't get me wrong, Marty's a charmer, but that was definitely above & beyond.

So, yeah, no bs- She's friendly, honest & screens her guests well (no creepers here hahaha). :)

My first time in this part of Manhattan and it was a truly rewarding experience.  Wonderful neighborhood, easy access to the subway which was less than a block away and an absolutely quiet couple of nights in the room.  The quiet was definitely a new experience for me in Manhattan.  Room was clean, the bed comfortable and a gallon of water with toothbrush was a nice touch to complete a great experience.  The internet was very slow but the overall experience more than made up for that small inconvenience.  I highly recommend.

I really enjoyed staying here with Agnes.  She was very nice and hospitable.  the room was clean and quiet.  The bathroom was clean and efficient.  she provided the necessary amenities.  Agnes was always available to answer questions though texts, calls, or in person.  Thanks for that.  The neighborhood had everything you needed -  coffee, food, the pizza shop at the end of the block was terrific!!!  The apartment was a short walk to the metro station and the trains ran express to Manhattan.  I loved that.  
I will definitely be contacting Agnes when I return to NYC.
I had  nice stay with Agnes. The room was clean, bed comfortable, wifi worked and the subway was less than a minute walk around the corner.
The reservation was canceled 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Agnes was a very nice host! She provided us with all the necessary information and some nice add ons we didn't expected. Everything was clean. The room is at the end of the floor so you also have your privacy. 
We had some problems with the internet but maybe it was just our laptops and in fact we didn't need it that much since we were in New York!
I really can recommend this room in Agnes' apartment!

We're happy we met Agnes - she was a wonderful and friendly host. The room and the whole house were very clean and quiet. The Subway station is even closer than it appears on the map. The WiFi worked okay.
We hope that next time we visit New York we'll be able to book again with Agnes.
Thank you VERY MUCH !

Agnes é uma excelente anfitriã. O apartamento é muito bem localizado e silencioso. Esta perto de supermercado, farmácia e o melhor uma quadra do metro! 
Além disso ela sempre surpresas gostosas no quarto como chocolate e bolachas! Adorei!

Agnes was most helpful in suggesting sites to visit in NYC. The location was near an express A Train Subway to mid town and down town. The rooms were quite small, big enough for the bed and our luggage, but not much more. There was no space to just sit and relax, so we did not spend much time in our room there.

The room is large with a spacious wardrobe, the bathroom has a perfect shower and there's also a kitchen available for the guests. This part of Harlem is quite and very nice, especially Convent  Avenue and the surrounding area, with pub, bars and the Metro, two minute walk from the apartment. Agnes is very nice and helpful, and she cleans the room every two or three days. Perfect staying. Thanks Agnes, arrivederci!

Agnes is an exceptional host: welcoming, friendly, communicative and attentive. Everything in the apartment is exactly as described and wonderfully maintained. The location is fantastic. You are literally around the corner from the subway and the express train means you can be downtown in less than 20 minutes -- and home after a night out in less than 20 minutes too! I very much enjoyed my stay and would welcome the opportunity to stay again in the future. Thanks Agnes!

I love Agnes' hospitality! Everything was set on the table, the area was great (Harlem), and no curfews! Such a wonderful host. Definitely recommend Agnes as your host if you're looking to stay somewhere in New York. Me and my friend enjoyed our stay here, and will be back in the future!
Very nice room, quiet and clean. You are the feeling to be in an hotel (better and cheaper)

I had a really nice stay with Agnes. Her appartment is superconvenient and close to te centre of manhattan. 
The neighbourhood was really safe.
I couldn't have wished for anything more. A super clean and nice room, inclusing bathroom.
I would stay definitly again with her. Thank you for making are trip so easy!

Je huurt bij Agnes echt een kamer in een groot appartement. Tijdens ons verblijf van een week was er nog een ander stel in een andere kamer en nog een ander persoon naast Agnes zelf. 
Kamer en douche voldoen op zich prima als je de hele dag op stap bent. Agnes verschoont handdoeken en kamer op tijd en overlaad je met chocola, mondwater en frisdrank.

Generally We had a good stay at Agnes place.
Pros : nice area, well connected, 15 minutes to go to time square, the room was kind of quiet. Many internation TV channels. Bathroom clean and convinient. Nice attention, she leaves water and candies in the room.
Cons : this place is more like an hostal, Agnes open the door gives you the keys and thats all. It is ok for the price but dont expect tips or  advices on the city. The bed quality was quite bad, the matress seems very warn out and old, the room was not very clean (stains on the floor and dust on the lamps) overall the place need more maintenance. We had no internet connection in the room but for the price it's fine.

Agnès est un hôte très agréable et serviable. L'appartement est vaste et très bien situé à proximité de la station de la 145th rue qui est desservie par tous les métros express et locaux. Le prix de la chambre est très correct en rapport des prestations proposées.
A recommander donc :) !
We had a very good time there and enjoyed the nice atmosphere. it´s a good location and near the subway which takes you easy to the center.

Agnes was a great host, who was very accommodating with her house. The kitchen was replenished on a regular basis for breakfast foods, she upgraded our room for free, and the location was quiet, cozy, and convenient to get anywhere in Manhattan on the subway.
Thanks Agnes!

I had a fantastic week staying at Agnes' apartment, she was very friendly and accomodating, she was always on call to answer any questions about the area.
The room was spacious, clean and quiet.
I would definitely recommend and would love to stay again when I return to the US.

We had a wonderful stay with Agnes! We initially booked the smaller room, and was offered to switch to the bigger room. There was a mix-up when we reached and we had to stay in the smaller room on our first night, but Agnes was really nice about everything and even helped us to shift our belongings to the other room on the second day!

After the online booking was done, Agnes sent us extremely detailed information, including directions. The apartment s literally round the corner from the subway! Super convenient!

Both rooms were really nice, and we were greeted with biscuits, chocolates, bottled water etc. The smaller room is really cosy, albeit a little cramp; the bigger room is extremely spacious and comfortable, however the wifi signal was weaker in the bigger room.
