The kitchen was literally brimming with stuff! There's yoghurt, bread, cereals, coffee, tea etc that you can help yourself to!

It was a really enjoyable stay and we would definitely recommend her apartment to our friends.

The house is in good location, close to subway station A, B, C and D. Room has enough space and amenities for two persons.
Agnes was very helpful in finding information about New York. 
She do efforts to satisfy the guests and successful. She was changing sheets, also providing soft-drink, biscuits and nuts.

I booked with Agnes to send my in-laws who were visiting from Germany for a few days. Agnes was excellent in communication and very open; she offered outstanding assistant in planning the trip in advance and there. Her place is conveniently located and easily accessible for arriving by car. Overall, my in-laws had a good experience at her place, all essentials were present as described. The bed was a little worn out and the room overall small, but it did it's duty. Thank you!

Nous avons passe 3 jours a Montréal dans le studio de Patrick au cœur du quartier du plateau. Le studio de Patrick est très fonctionnel et idéal pour visiter Montréal pour une courte durée. Je recommande vivement ce studio et remercie encore Patrick qui a été très arrangeant pour le Check in et Check out.

We had a pleasant stay at Agnes's place. The place was good for the price and met most of our expectations.Agnes is wonderful though - she was very detailed in her instructions and the  information about the places of interest I requested from her. She was very generous in providing us with breakfast items and snacks - more than we required or expected :-). She made sure the room was cleaned and bed sheet/towels changed. She is a very pleasant hostess and I would recommend her if you are looking for a reasonably priced place to stay. the location was in Harlem - not the best -  but we did not face any problems. The proximity to the subway was a great plus. It was great to get to know Agnes and the opportunity to stay at her place.

Agnes was very helpful and an interesting person to share living space with. She helped me locate places I wanted to visit and gave accurate info on how best to use New York's public transport in order to get there. Agnes took her role as a host with a sense of responsibility and tried hard to make my stay accomplish what I was wanting to achieve during my visit. The photos of the lounge and balcony area weren't quite what I saw when I got there, but Agnes was true to her word as far as the amount of organic yogurt, milk and cereal available. The aircon kept the room very cool during the hot New York summer. Perhaps a bit too cool seeing it was situated right above the bed head of where I slept. Although some people would think that great, if I stayed again with Agnes, I would ask that the bed be moved away to a different wall as it kept me awake through the night.
Agnes was relly nice and helpful. We had a perfect stay in NY

Agnes è molto gentile e disponibile, lascia sempre fuori dalla porta un gallone d'acqua.Dentro la stanza, spazzolini e dentifricio, saponetta, gel igienizzante, dolci a volontà, collutorio. In cucina vari tipi di cereali, latte e uova, frutta fresca e vari prodotti per la colazione oltre che caffè espresso con moka gigante. Unico difetto riguardante l'uso della cucina è l'orario, limitato dalle 9am in poi; Perciò noi la usavamo verso le 6am per non uscire tardi di casa. Ottime indicazioni per arrivare a casa dal JFK date da Agnes . Ottima posizione della casa: metro a un minuto a piedi (10 minuti per Rockfeller Center con metro express) oppure autobus per Central Park in 30 min. Bagno pulito, così come la cucina. Cambio delle lenzuola e degli asciugamani ogni tre giorni circa. Ci sono altri due coinquilini fissi, per cui bisogna stare attenti agli orari in cui si usa il bagno, anche se Agnes ti informa dei loro orari, quindi è facile regolarsi. La stanza è molto grande per due persone; Noi eravamo in tre perciò con il mega materasso gonfiabile aggiuntivo, le dimensioni della stanza si sono ridotte (le valigie stavano chiuse nell'armadio). Aria condizionata praticamente sempre azionata (siamo stati ad agosto) e la finestra non apribile: aperta sono in bagno e in cucina.

We stayed at Agnes' place for 3 nights and we were very satisfied with her place. It was clean, calm and Agnes is very friendly. She provided us additional information about transport and places in neighborhood. The subway station is very close, and gives a great connection to whole city.

Agnes è molto pulita, cambia lenzuola e asciugamani tutti i giorni (anche più del necessario), il bagno è lindo nonostante venga utilizzato da lei, il suo inquilino fisso e dagli inquilini delle due stanze che affitta su airbnb. Puoi utilizzare il frigo e i fornelli, ha il CAFFE' LAVAZZA E LA MOKA grande. Inoltre ti riempe la camera di schifezzine che personalmente non ho apprezzato ma lei credeva di farci un favore, quindi è solo una questione di gusti! :D
Difetti? Nelle regole della casa c'era scritto che si poteva fumare alla finestra e invece per fumare devi scendere le scale e attraversare le scale per andare alla panchina (maledetti USA).
Forse per colpa nostra ma avevamo comunicato l'orario dell'arrivo (due/tre di notte) e per diversi minuti NON CI HA APERTO NESSUNO!!! Stravolte da 28 ore di viaggio volevamo solo farci una doccia!! Poi si è svegliato l'inquilino che ci ha aperto e ci ha fatto accomodare in salotto, dato che Agnes dormiva e lui non aveva le chiavi di camera nostra. Dopo una mezzora, si è svegliata e tra mille scuse ci ha accompagnato in camera nostra!! 
Complessivamente l'arrivo è stato disastroso ma l'accoglienza è molto buona (tranne che per i fumatori!) e complessivamente la permanenza in casa di Agnes è stata un'esperienza molto positiva.

Si notre séjour à N.Y fut réussi, notre hébergement chez Agnès y a beaucoup contribué : Accueil parfait,  plein de petites attentions de la part d'Agnès (gâteaux, bonbons, boissons dans la chambre ainsi que les affaires de toilettes), toujours prête à donner des infos, des conseils (merci pour cette soirée au Blue Note à très bon prix !!) mais en sachant être discrète. Appartement très calme et très propre. Très bien situé avec une station de métro juste à côté avec une ligne Express qui nous emmenait dans le centre en moins d'une demi-heure ! Pleins de magasins, banques, restos dans le quartier. Merci pour votre rire, chère Agnès. Nous reviendrons, c'est sûr. Et nous conseillerons votre appartement à nos amis et connaissances. 
Jacqueline et Bruno

Great room, even if it's near the front door. You may hear people go in and out the appartment.
Agnes was very kind with us and made our stay as confortable as possible.

Agnes is a very friendly host. Very helpful and informative. As a traveller visiting New York for the first time it can be very daunting and confusing, but Agnes was a great help with her guidance  and knowledge of the city. Her apartment was perfectly positioned above an express subway station, so it was only 10 to 15 min into town. Had a great time in New York and will miss it dearly.
Great value, great location, great host.  I spent two nights there and would surely return. Agnes is kind, generous, and very interesting.

Notre 1ère expérience a eu lieu chez Agnes et c'est vraiment sans regret! L'accueil a été très sympathique, nous nous sommes sentis très à l'aise et très vite. Nous recommandons fortement ce logement pour plusieurs raisons: son hôte, son emplacement, sa propreté, son calme.....

Nous espérons y retourner

Appartement situé à deux minutes du métro qui dessert plusieurs lignes, quartier situé à 15 minutes du Midtown et à trois stations de Central Park, petit déj inclus, et Agnès, une hôte passionnée de jazz attentive et disponible. Parfait pour visiter NYC en quelques jours !

Agnes was very nice and forthcoming and replied to my messages almost immediately.

The appartment is less than 5 minutes walk from the 145th street subway station which is served by local and express trains so you can get downtown conveniently and speedily.

The room was clean and comfortable, the bathroom was also clean, and the shower was hot and had enough water coming out (so better than in most US hotel rooms I have stayed in).

Towels and toothbrush were provided as well as cookies, chocolates and some non-alcoholic drinks.

I left early in the morning and did not take breakfast. So I can't say anything about that.

The only thing that was not so great was the noise from the airconditioning. I turned off the one in my room (it is directly next to the bed), but I still heard a not very loud but constant humming from nearby fans. Most US hotels are much worse in that respect. Still, I would advise to bring ear plugs if you have a light sleep or are likely to suffer from jetlag.

Die Bewertungen, die ich zuvor über Agnes gelesen hatte, trafen genau zu. Sie ist sehr hilfsbereit (Tipps für NYC, für U-Bahn, Weg zum Flughafen, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten etc.)
Wohnung per U-Bahn sehr gut zu erreichen (um die Ecke). Sichere, ruhige Gegend.
Verwirrend: Wohnungsnummer 7 F ist im 6. Stock! (wenn man in den 7. Stock geht=Dachgeschoss, geht sofort die Alarmanlage an!!!)
Wohnung sehr sauber, viel Essensvorräte (Küche sehr klein)
I agree all feedbacks, which I have read before.
I would choose this room again!

Nice place, clean and comfortable. Good options for breakfast and free access to the items for shower.
Agnes is very kind and gave lots of information about good thing to do in the city.
Nice neighborhood, cheap options to eat.
I highly recommend staying in her apartment. I had a great first experience booking with Airbnb!

We stayed 2 nights with Agnes and it was perfect ! Agnes is a fantastic host, everything was here to be sure that our trip was good : towels, guides, juices, water, candy... 
If you have to go to NYC, go with Agnes !!! She's very considerate and you feel welcome with her !

My partner, my son and myself stayed with Agnes for a whole week and would thoroughly recommend Agnes as a gracious host. The space met our expectations and the transport was exceptional with the A express around the corner. The bathroom was clean and our beds were made every two days with fresh linen and towels. We even were able to have our laundry done and breakfast was available every day. Staying for an extended time allowed us to get to know Agnes and her love of Jazz music. I am sure we will meet again either socially or on another visit to New York where we would stay with her again in a heartbeat. 
The area was no problem even when returning back late at night. I found Agnes to be very friendly and prompt in answering all correspondence. 
The money we saved by not staying in hotels allowed us to treat our son to many more New York experiences. 
We love Agnes
Only one word: Perfect!!

Agnes has been a friendy host for us. Good location, very close to entrance of metro 145th street and an excellent fall out for exporing the wonderful city of New York. Breakfast was included as well as a nice amount of snacks. 

Location: 4/5
Friendlyness: 4/5
Hospitality: 4/5
Cleanliness: 3/5

Agnes was a wonderful hostess.  Our room was clean and light, with a big closet and all necessary furniture.  Agnes provided delicious snacks and breakfast ingredients.  We much appreciate that she had organic products (e.g. tea, oatmeal).  The apartment building is renovated and clean, with elevator.
Thank you.

Birgitte

I had the best time staying with Agnes in November. Agnes is a generous host with a wealth of "local" knowledge which she was happy to share with me. My room was perfectly clean & comfortable & was supplied with a huge array of snacks & drinks. Her assortment of breakfast food was more than adequate & I`ve been converted to some of her organic choices now that I`m home. I felt safe to walk in the area day & night & enjoyed many walks around the neighbourhood. The locals were polite & friendly. The underground station is an easy 10 minute stroll which makes mid town Manhattan only 20 minutes away. This was my 4th stay in N.Y. & normally I stay in top class international hotels but this time wanted something "different". I will be back in N.Y .next year & definitely looking forward to staying with Agnes again. I will be 70 next year! Sandra

Agnes was a very helpful host guiding us and supplying information on the area.  She is very knowledgeable and we ended up visiting the Abyssinian Gospel choir which was a highlight of our visit.  We walked about 20 blocks to a party and home again through a lovely neighborhood.  I would love to go back and stay with Agnes again and get to know more about the area.  There was lots of food supplied for breakfast and we were made to feel at home. Agnes knows the history of this part of Harlem and opens it up to visitors so you gain far more than just staying at a hotel.

Agnes is a sweetheart. She provided wonderful snacks in the room and was so kind to both my pups. She actually walked them for me and was always attentive. Always gave advice on getting anywhere and the NY subway is just around the corner from her building. I hope we can visit again.

We stayed at Agnes' for 3 nights. Place very well linked, with buses and subways. She was very nice and polite, the bathroom was clean, the room was cozy but not very clean. Little bit of dust and sleeping by the heater is not very comfortable, mostly because it caused lots of vibrations and noises. Perfect for few days.

Agnes is super sweet and the apartment was very easy to find! She provided us with an abundant amount of information on what to do in the city, since this was our first time, provided housekeeping, was very flexible with checking in and out, and even left us complimentary drinks and snacks. When we return to NYC we will definitely stay with Agnes again. Great host!

Agnes was a superb hostess! She really took care of us and was agreeable when we didn't show up quite on time (thank you, Agnes!).  We were pampered and it was great to be able to prepare meals as needed. In addition to the wonderful dining suggestions she made for the area. I recommend her as a hostess and her place as a b and b option. Great location close to the Metro, building elevator, security, and quiet inner courtyard facing room. Great space for 2 or 4 (with air mattress).
Agnes was a kind and generous host.  The apartment was clean, well stocked and convenient to public transportation.  I would recommend her to future guests.

La chambre (et l’ensemble de l’appartement) correspond bien aux photos, elle est spacieuse, meublée simplement avec tout le nécessaire, un grand placard avec des cintres et des tiroirs pour ranger vos affaires. Le lit est bien moelleux et le chauffage fonctionne très bien (mais nous vous recommandons de l’éteindre la nuit).
En ce moment le salon n'est plus disponible et il n’y a pas de table dans la cuisine. L’appartement perd de sa convivialité mais renseignez-vous c'est une situation temporaire.  Un bémol, la propreté est approximative, maniaques s’abstenir.

L’appartement est bien situé, à l’ouest de Harlem dans un quartier calme, populaire et sans danger. A proximité, il y a tous les commerces nécessaires (supermarché, starbuck, Dunkin’Donuts, pharmacie, cafétéria Jacob soul food) 
Le métro express (A et D) est à quelques pas de l’appartement, c’est vraiment appréciable, il faut compter 40mn pour rejoindre Manhattan Sud. L’idéal est de prendre une carte de métro 7 jours illimitées à 31$. A une station de métro, il y a de très bons restaurants (ne ratez pas Red Rooster) et des magasins à prix intéressants sur la 125ème rue.

L’ultime point fort c’est la gentillesse et la disponibilité d’Agnès qui vous donnera un maximum de renseignements, de bonnes adresses et qui s’assurera toujours que vous ne manquerez de rien.
Agnes was phenomenal. She is a wealth of information. I felt right at home. It was like staying with an old friend.

Agnes was a great host. She was Very friendly and helpful. I would recommend Agnes to future Airbnb guests. The room was exactly what I needed during my short stay in New York. only 2min from the subway, restaurants, and convenience stores. Clean room. Safe neighborhood.

We stayed with Agnes for three nights while we were having some work done on our apartment. Agnes is a fantastic host! She will make sure you have everything you need to be comfortable, including toiletries and towels, coffee, tea and breakfast items. The apartment is clean and big enough to give you a sense of personal space. We really felt at home, and you can't beat how close to the subway it is! You've got everything you need in the neighborhood, including a 24 hour grocery store just down the street. You will feel safe coming and going, even at night, just use common sense. I would recommend Agnes to any friends or family coming in from out of town!
Agnes was a gracious host. The space was very clean and welcoming. I highly recommend her space.

We had a great time in NYC at Agnes place. She is a very nice, helpful and kind person. The place was clean and comfortable. It close to a Supermarket and the public transit. We recommend this place:)

Staying at Agnes' place was a real pleasure. Not only because of the apartment itself but also and mostly because of Agnes. 
She is a very warm host. The room was prepared nicely and we felt very welcome there. Agnes prepared Snacks, chocolate, juice and small bottles of water (very useful for a day in the city) for us. Breakfast was also included. Agnes offered different cereals, bread, coffee, tea and everything you need.We really felt at home at Agnes' place.
Agnes gave a lot of information how to reach her place and was very open for all questions.
Furthermore, which is also very important for getting around in the city, the apartment is located only 5 minutes away from the next metro station.
I highly recommend this place!!

Agnes is an AMAZING host!!! The location is great, very convenient, very close to both bus and subway station. There are many stores around, and the neighborhood is nice, clean and safe. The room is cozy and clean, the bed is comfortable, and Agnes prepared water, juice, and so many snacks for us which we didn't expect. Thank you Agnes! Agnes offered almost all her kitchen for us to have breakfast. Also, the bathroom is clean and we were able to use the shampoos, body washes and even body lotion! Agnes is very friendly, nice and considerate. In addition, the price is very reasonable! I highly recommend Agnes and her apartment, and I will definitely choose her place again if I went to NYC in the future! 
Thank you for making our visit more joyful and hope to see you again!
Thank you for sending me music too!
Delightful host, clean, comfortable space, very close to public transit and a very interesting neighborhood.  Highly recommend it!

the apartment is a bit messy and there was a funky smell in the entrance and stairways. it was still being cleaned when we arrived due to the last tenants checking out late so we had to wait for like an hour in another room. location is right in harlem, a bit farther than i expected outside of manhattan though quite close to the metro lines which can take you into the city. there aren't very many common spaces available so you mostly have to stay in your room. 

on the plus side, agnes provides some nice touches like water and snacks and breakfast (though we only found out about it after we left) as well as some good music files.

Agnes was a WONDERFUL host! She was very detailed with her instructions on how to get to her place, and she was available for any questions we had while we were staying with her. The room was clean, organized, and cozy :)

She even had several amenities that were quite useful to have in the room, which made our stay even more special. We highly recommend anyone stay with her if they ever have the opportunity to do so!

Me and my boyfriend were traveling to NYC for business and a few days of having fun in city.  We stayed two nights with Agnes and it was a perfect choice.  The building is easy to find, right near the subway, has free street parking, is very clean and has an elevator. Agnes was there to meet us and is a very warm and welcoming host.  The room is clean and spacious.  The bed was comfortable.  The towels were nice and big and fluffy and the bathroom is very clean and all of the fixtures are modern.  Agnes kept us well stocked with refreshments in our room!  There was bottled water, sodas, juice, snacks, and chocolate!  The kitchen is stocked with cereal and beverages and fruits for breakfast. It is very clean and the selection of organic and even vegan options was extremely thoughtful!  Agnes also sent us a list of places to go and see music and eateries that she recommends.  The neighborhood is perfectly nice, with a walking park that goes up one side of the street where the building is located.  You'll need to travel a bit on the subway to get to your mid- and downtown destinations, but it is a super easy subway ride away.  We found the location to be very convenient and our stay enjoyable.  We hope to return soon!

Agnes is a very nice host, kind and helpfull. I got sick during the stay and she was conserned and helpfull. The room is great, the bed if very confortable and big enought for 2 friends to sleep in. Agnes gives you access to her full equiped kitchen and all sorts of food. It's very close from the 145th street subway (take the express train and you're in Manhattan quite quickly. Also a big supermarket and deli, chinese, restaurant around the building. The tv has more than 200 chanels and HBO on demand, I really apreciated that. Thanks Agnes for the great hospitality :-)

We had a really great stay with Agnes! The apartment is located very close to a subway stop, with several different lines, which take you downtown fast. Can totally recommend staying with her during a NYC trip.
Super appartement ! Très bonne localisation (juste a côté d'un métro) Agnès a été très accueillante et nous a beaucoup aidé c'est une femme très disponible. Tout s'est très bien passé :)

Agnes was an absolutely amazing host. She was flexible with check-in/check-out times and was cordial/friendly upon arrival. Agnes gave us far more than I ever have experienced from an airbnb experience. She provided all toiletries, snacks, wifi, cellphone chargers, kitchen & food items ton make breakfast at our disposal, etc. I was thoroughly blown away by her hospitality. She even sent my friend and I some great jazz music as well as tunes we wanted ourselves. The best part was that with fees, we only paid $82 for that single night stay (in MANHATTAN). I couldn't have asked for a better experience. Thank you Agnes!!

We had a lovely experience in New York with Agnes.  She is a friendly host, welcoming us with a smile and a desk full of juices, water bottles and snacks.  The room is exactly as expected, the apartment was very clean, and we shared the apartment also with a family from Germany.  Agness was quite gracious in allowing us to cook in her kitchen to accommodate my special dietary needs and helped us find our way around the city's public transit system.  The buses and the subway are only a block away, and the neighborhood is quiet.  We had a great time.
Thank you, Agnes, for hosting us so well.

L'accueil a été agréable. Agnès est disponible pour donner des infos : lieux à visiter, musique, shopping, restaurants...
L'appartement est très bien situé par rapport au métro (5 min à pieds) pour aller directement dans le centre de Manhattan (10-15 min) et pour accéder à Harlem.
Le quartier est calme, résidentiel et bénéficie de quelques commerces d'alimentation.

El piso esta en un zona accesible,  tranquila y bien comunicada. Puedes notar la vida en el barrio desde el primero momento. El piso es de fácil acceso desde el metro y a poca distancia. Agnes nos trato como más que huéspedes abriendo su casa y ofreciéndonos su abundante hospitalidad.  
La habitación y la casa disponen de todas comodidades descritas en la web, además de estar bien cuidada y  nosotros lo encontramos todo excelente. 
Volveremos a la gran manzana y nos quedáramos con Agnes Seguro !!
Great Stay!!!

Agnes puts me to shame as a hostess.  Her place was so clean that I knew that if there was any dirt, I had carried it in.  I slept very well in her home.  And everything was great: directions, amenities, neighborhood.  I really enjoyed my stay with Agnes and appreciated her love of New York.

Nous avons été très bien accueilli par Agnès dès notre arrivée.
Des petites choses a grignoter et à boire sont mis à disposition dans la chambre. 
Appartement calme.
Nous ne parlions pas beaucoup anglais ce qui a un peu compliqué les choses pour nous. 
Agnès héberge un ami à elle qui n'est pas forcément très agréable mais ce détail est vite oublié de par sa disponibilité et sa gentillesse.
Appartement à 15 minutes en métro de Times square
Si nous avions a revenir a NYC nous n hésiterions pas a revenir au même endroit.

Agnes apartment was very nice and spacious. Overall as a host she was extremely accommodating. She gave us everything we needed included towels and refreshments. The apartment is in a great location in uptown manhattan and the nearest train station is about a 2 min walk. The apartment was very clean and was easy to go in and out of. Would definitely recommend her.
We had a lovely stay, a brill end location. The room house was very clean. And we had a lovely supply in the room of water and snacks. Would highly recommend It to any one.

Agnes was a wonderful host for our one week trip to New York! She sent extensive emails and tips to get around in New York. The flat is situated in a nice area, very close to multiple subway routes, so it is very easy to reach other destinations in Manhattan.

Agnes was of great help and she made us feel very welcome, definitely would go back! Her hospitality made this experience even better!

We were visiting New York for one weekend, and very much enjoyed the city as well as the stay with Agnes. She was very kind, the room was clean, and: Everything (!) was provided. Linen, towels, toothbrushes, and even water, beverages, chips and chocolate. That was terrific! We were allowed to use Agnes' Kitchen and help ourself to coffee and cereals, which was perfect for a one-night-trip. The apartment was very close to the subway, and the area felt very safe, also at night. Consider that it will take about 20-30 minutes to get to Manhattan - if that doesn't bother you, we can recommend Agnes and her room.

Agnes was a very attentive host and the room was spacious and quiet. Agnes had provided lots of extra amenities such as various snacks and bottled water as well. The air conditioner worked well and the shared bathroom was clean. Agnes was also very kind and attentive about providing information about lots of things to see in New York City. Agnes also did not yell at us when we mistakenly went to the 7th floor (the roof) in trying to find her apartment and an enormously loud alarm sounded--at 2 am. I personally felt somewhat bad about having to wake Agnes up since we got in to NYC quite late, but she was gracious about it. As promised, the area was convenient to the subway and the express train made travel down to the main tourist areas quite quick.

This was my first time experience airbnb. Agnes was a great host for these three reasons. First, she gave us a special discount rate for 3 people. Secondly, it was midnight when we checked in, but Agnes gave us a warm welcome. She detailly showed us around the house. Lastly, the guest can have a full access to her kitchen, which is fully stock of food. We saved a couple bucks for a long trip by eating breakfast at her house. Also, there is a park with a pool outside the apartment, which played music every weekend in the summer. Very safe, exciting, and convenient area. You would love it.
Friendly and nice, she will overwhelm you with so many stuffs that will help your stay more comfort and also touring in NY.

Agnes was great! Provided everything we needed, and offered answers to our questions about sights to see in New York. Left us to ourselves, but was around if we needed something. And gave some nice goodies like water and snacks, along with lots of breakfast options! 
The area was nice, and the place was very conveniently right next to the subway.

My friend and I arrived around 1 PM, and we were greeted by Agnes who was simply lovely! She had already given us directions how to get to her apartment via private message as well as directions to popular attractions in town, and I was really reassured by her knowledge of the city. Her neighbourhood was really quiet and peaceful for NYC and we definitely felt safe when we returned late at night. Our bed was comfortable and we were provided all the amenities that was listed, and not to mention the apartment was clean and immaculate. In the morning it was lovely to have access to her kitchen to make a hot breakfast. Thank you so much Agnes for the wonderful experience!

We had a great night in NYC. The host was very accommodating and allowed us to keep our stuff in our room the next day while we ran around the city instead of having to check out first thing. Our room was very clean along with the bathroom as well. The food available in the kitchen is a nice touch to the overall amenities provided by the host.

I spent 4 days in Agnes' home and it was a great experience, she was lovely, lots of advice to give about NYC, her place is perfect and really close to the metro station ;-) I recommend her at 100% :)

We enjoyed our stay at Agnes' place very much. The location is very convenient & Agnes is very helpful & kind. She provides every information you ask for as well as a very large selection of breakfast utilities, snacks & drinks. Thank you very much, Agnes!

Our stay with Agnes was great. Her apartment  is located in a very convenient location. The only issue was that the elevator wasn't working that weekend so we got some good exercise walking up to sixth floor which we didn't mind. Also, after checking the public outdoor pool right across the street, we were sorry we didn't bring a towel and a bathing suit. That would be all you need to go swimming there for free! There were just a few people in the whole pool area (770 capacity) on Sunday morning. Maybe next  time. Thank you Agnes for your hospitality.

Great location and amenities, I would recommend a stay with Agnes in a heartbeat. We were blown away by the spaciousness and quiet of not just our room but the building in general. A bit outside the hustle and bustle of Lower Manhattan and Midtown, Agnes' Harlem refuge is a welcome oasis after a day in the city. While it's (literally) feet from a subway stop, we had a hard time finding places to go out for food/drink in the area so you may want to look elsewhere if you're planning on that sort of thing. Also if you're driving into the city, there's street parking on Edgecombe for free (watch the signs for when you can't park) but there's also a very reasonably priced garage two doors down.

The apartment was very clean, quiet and at a very good location - 1 min walk to the subway that can take you directly to main attractions! Agnes welcomed us with chocolates, snacks and beverages in our room. My friend and I stayed for 5 nights and after 2 nights, she gave us new towels, changed our sheets, and refilled our water supply. She also regularly cleaned the bathrooms and apartment. Agnes provided us with more than we needed or expected. This was my first Airbnb experience and Agnes definitely raised the bars high. I felt at home and enjoyed her large collection of teas! Thank you for the positive experience!

Agnes gave plenty of information prior to our stay and during our stay (communicated via email/airbnb) that was helpful--however, the number of emails and messages felt overpowering; there were at least 20! 
She was great about accommodating our check-in time, which was very much appreciated. But once we arrived, the welcome from her felt somewhat disingenuous. It felt like she treated our stay as purely a business transaction.
The parts of the apt. we stayed in were kept very clean and I liked that there were bottles of water and snacks in our room for us. But the rest of the apt. was not tidy and it was difficult navigating the kitchen space for breakfast. 
I think the best part about this air bnb was the location. Although it was about a 30 minute train ride to Midtown and all the tourist sites, Harlem is a cool area that I wouldn't normally explore, and the apt is super close to the train station.

I've arrived later than my girlfriend. was no problem she dropped her luggage and waited for me to arrive. Agnes was very helpful, she knows about everything of new York. had a really great time there, although it was short.

Das Apartment ist mit U-Bahn sehr gut erreichbar, die Gegend ist sehr sicher und gepflegt, das Haus ist absolut ruhig.Agnes ist eine umsichtige,hilfsbereite Gastgeberin.Das Zimmer war genau so wie beschrieben,alles hat wunderbar funktioniert.Agnes hatte liebevoll einen Willkommenstisch mit Getränken und Knabbereien vorbereitet. Die Küche stand zur Verfügung, Tee, div. Cerealien, sogar Obst und Eier waren inklusive. Für einen mehrtägigen New York Aufenthalt hervorragend geeignet.Wir kommen gerne wieder.
The apt.has a perfect connection to public Transportation, the environment is safe and nice (big park directly in front of the house), the house is clean and very quiet..Agnes is a great host, helpful and supporting.The room was exactly like described,all was perfect and clean. Agnes had even prepared a welcome table with softdrinks and sweets. The kitchen was available, tea, cereals, even fruits and eggs were included. This apt. is perfect for a few-day-stay in NYC...we are looking forward to come back again.

Agnes is well organised and seems to pay particular attention to keeping the appartment clean. It also has excellent transport links to downtown Manhattan and a supermarket within short walking distance.
Anges made me feel comfortable as soon as I walked in. She showed me all of the snacks, teas, and coffee that I had access to as her guest.
The room walking distance from the train station, which was very useful. It included water, snacks and breakfast foods. Everything as advertised.

Agnes' apartment was very well kept and extremely clean. I LOVE that she kept snacks and drinks in our room for us, was a nice touch! The location is in Harlem and walking the short distance from the apartment to the subway during the day was fine, but at night definitely scared me a bit. Agnes was very helpful! If it wasn't for location, I would stay here again forsure!

The room was exactly as pictured and described.  Agnes was pleasant and accommodating.  Bottled water, sodas, snacks, toiletries, magazines and tourist info was abundantly supplied in the room, and the kitchen contained many choices for breakfast and/or snacks.  The neighborhood is very nice, an the apartment is around the block from the subway.
It was hot while I was visiting, and Agnes doesn't like the air conditioner to run during the day.  I was able to get cool at night, though.

I felt like we had a real NYC experience staying in Agnes apartment!! She provided directions and suggestions of restaurants and places to visit. This was our first trip to the city. Loved how the apartment was close to the subway! Agnes offers organic fruits from local farmers for breakfast.

This was our first Airbnb experience and Agnes was a wonderful host. We loved our stay at the apartment (which is close to multiple Metro connections in all directions) and had a great time in New York.

Agnes was a wonderful host.  This was our first airbnb experience -and she set the bar quite high!  She was extremely helpful with directions and tips for subways etc.  The apartment was spotless and very comfortable.  We felt very safe in the building too.  Agnes went above and beyond by having water bottles and snacks in our room as well as offering us a most generous breakfast selection from her kitchen.  Subway stop is an easy walk around the corner from the apartment building.  I would happily return to stay with Agnes again!  Thank you so much for your hospitality!
Great place seconds from the subway....she even leaves treats an drinks more than enough.  Thanks! Highlt recommended

The room is spacious and she even provides us with complimentary snacks and bottled water. The place is really close to the subway station, which is a huge plus as we have several big luggages with us. The choices for breakfast is also incredible for us. Agnes is really kind and helpful host. Her direction is spot on, everything is outlined very clearly from beginning. Although we stayed with her only for one night, I will recommend it to anyone who is looking for a taste of New York with her.

Nuestra estadía donde Agnes fue maravillosa. 
Es una persona muy amable y dispuesta a colaborarte en lo que necesites. 
La habitación es cómoda y limpia al igual que el baño. 
El agua, gaseosas y cositas de comer que Agnes deja en tu habitación son todas deliciosas.
El apartamento queda realmente cerca a la estación del metro lo que es fabuloso. 
Nuestra temporada en la casa de Agnes fue súper!!! Definitivamente regresaríamos una vez más!!! 
Gracias por todo !!

I stayed for 4night.She gave us a lot of snucks and drinks.She gave us a lot of infomation too.Subway is very close with apartment and very useful.This was first time in NY for us but we had great one!!great hospitalty and location!!Thank you Agness!!

Место хорошее. Расположено возле станции метро! Экспресс так же там останавливается, что заметно сокращает время поездки до даунтауна! Агнес очень любезная девушка и следит чтоб Вам было комфортно! Так же в комнате нас ждал обильно накрытый стол со снеками и всевозможными напитками!

Agnès is a very kind and helpful person. Her flat is very well connected with downtown: metro right on the corner of the street. The area is safe in the flat quiet although we slept on a Saturday night. The breakfast is gorgeous.

The neighboorhood is call and super well connected with the express line A going downtown. Agnes was very welcoming, many little détails made us feel at home, such as little biscuits and nuts in the room, bottles of water

We stayed for 5 nights at Agnes's apartment.  It was good accommodation for an affordable price. The room is quite spacious and comfortable with TV, snacks, and water available. Agnes was great and available with directions and places to eat or visit. The room is well separated from the kitchen so it is fairly private and very quiet. It was conveniently located right near the metro, and the area felt safe.  This is a good value for NYC.

The room and apartment were a pleasure - very large for New York City.  The room as a table/desk, two chairs, television and comfortable bed.  Agnes is generous in stocking it with snacks, water and soft drinks, and provides coffee to be made at any time by the guest.  The building, apartment and room each have locking doors and the guest is give keys to use at any time.

I asked Agnes for recommendations of bars, restaurants and music venues in the neighborhood, and she provides recommendations that turned out to be very enjoyable places.

Agnes very much respects guests' privacy.

Agnes' place is really well located. We were able to hit all the tourist places in a quick 13-17 minutes subway trip (Central Park, Times Square, 9/11 Memorial, etc). The neighborhood had plenty restaurants and fast food places, lot's of them opened 24/7. The room was bigger than I thought and everything was clean. The stay was really good and Agnes is a wonderful person!

Pour une 1er fois à new york on ne regrette vraiment pas d'avoir choisi d'une part ce lieu et d'autre part la personne qui nous a reçu très gentille et très disponible... Quelques appréhension sur harlem avant d'y aller et bien pas du tout rien à signaler en plus le métro est juste en bas de chez elle et il y a tout d'accessible à tout heure, j'espère vite y retourner
The description is space is just as described and is very clean and close to the subway. Agnes is helpfull and keeps the space very private.

Agnes war sehr hilfsbereit und auskunftsfreudig. Die Wohnung liegt sehr zentral und ist ruhig gelegen. Es gab viele Snacks, Kaffee, Tee, Frühstück und noch mehr...
Wir haben uns sehr willkommen gefühlt!!!!

Agnes war sehr zuvorkommend, nicht nur was Info`s sondern auch Überraschungen anbelangt wie Knabbereien und Wasser für den kompletten Aufenthalt.  Die Nachbarschaft ist ruhig und wir fühlten uns immer sicher. Das Bild vom Wohnzimmer ist nicht mehr aktuell, wir konnten jederzeit die Küche benutzen. Die Heizung macht in regelmäßigen Abständen "Atem"-und Klopfgeräusche was sehr ungewohnt war. Gute Lage und super Verbindung mit Bus und U Bahn, waren viel unterwegs und fast ausschließlich zum Schlafen in dem Zimmer, an unserem letzten Tag wurde die Wohnung komplett gestrichen.

Agnes was very friendly and accommodating providing us with everything from breakfast to bathroom essentials. The room was exactly what we had expected with loads of space for our luggage and even our own TV. Location was also ideal as it was within walking distance to the Metro.

Agnes was a really nice and helpful host.
She gave us good recommendations about the nearby restaurants and helped us getting through the subway system. 
The room was really nice. Agnes even had some snacks and drinks for us. 
We felt really comfortable at Agnes's cozy apartment.
We would definitely come back!

Agnes was a really kind person, She recived us with snacks, water, amenities and other things in the bedroom of the apartement to feel confortable.

The room was just  as we saw it in the page, and she changed the bed colthes and the towels every 3 days.

She gave us a lot of information, and recommendation about restaurants, stores and shows in Manhattan.

The bathrooms and the kitchen were clean, and she offers a lot of things that you can used too for free.

We had wifii, heating in the room,  and laundry service included.

The apartment is very near to the subway, well located.

Agnes is a very nice, and friendly  person! and you can talk about everything!

Definitely we recomend the Agnes`s place!

Agnes was as flexible and inviting as a host can be. I would highly recommend this room that is souped up with all kinds of amenities and snacks that make this better than staying at a hotel, especially given the fact that she prices her home very fairly. 

Thanks Agnes for the home treatment!

This is the best place to stay in NY! You can reach Timesquare and Central Park within 20 Minutes.  Agnes is a lovely person. She is very friendly und provided a lot of food for us, we were allowed to use.
I would highly recommend this place. I felt very comfortable.

Stay in Agnes' apartment was very good.
Agnes made us fell as we're in our house by leaving ammenities (like water, candies, body cream) and keeping the room always clean.
Agnes is a very calm and nice person, always helping us to make our trip by sugesting bars, restaurants, places to visit.
I do recommend staying on Agnes' apartment.
Agnes was super nice and accommodating, great host.

The room is perfect, the flact is weel located in New York, and Agnes is very nice and prevenant. Than'ks again for all your effort with us !
If possible, we will come back !! =)

Je recommande vivement Agnes !

Agnes was absolutely fantastic. I cant even describe what a pleasure it was to stay with her. Firstly, she kept in contact with me from the moment I booked the place and answered all my questions. When we arrive she organised snacks waiting for us in our room and let us use her food coffee and teas in the kitchen, which was lovely and does not happen very often with other hosts.  On top of all of this, I had an Unfortunate accident on the first night I stayed there, and had to go the hospital to get some medicine. Agnes was really concerned and worried and kept asking how I feel. She even refunded some money to me to cover some of the expenses. Even tho it was just and accident and there was no one to blame. A lovely and kind gesture.  The location was fantastic as well metro station just around the corner which takes you anywhere you want and runs the whole night. It even takes you pretty much straight to the JFK airport. In general we had a fantastic time in New York and in this place. I would recommend it to everyone , and would love to be back.
Once again thanks Agnes for your hospitality and everything. Take care
Very open minded, great host with a huge apartment !!!!!  She was absolutely great, gave a lot of sightseeing tips and was really easy going. I would definetly recommend to stay with her!
Agnes is a wonderful host!  She thought of everything and was so generous with her time and energy.  She graciously hosted my kids too and was so kind to even provide special kid snacks for them!

Agnes is a really good host. If you are a jazz lover fell free to ask Anges, she's well informed about it and she can give you the best suggestions. Her place is in a practical spot for transportation and full of nyc history. Tnx Agnes.
Agnes is a very nice host. We had a wonderful experience in NYC. She is helpful and friendly. You won't regret to stay here.
Agnes was very nice and helpful host! The room is in great location and Agnes provide us complimentary things like water, snacks and everything you need for breakfast. Thank you! :)

What a wonderful experience! Agnes was an amazing host, even doing tons of extras like free water and breakfast that I never expected. The room was both large and comfortable, we fit 2 people in easily. The location is a true gem, an interesting neighborhood where I always felt safe and only steps away from the train to city center and anywhere else. Highly recommended.

Thank you for such a wonderful time. Both my daughter and myself had a great time. The area is very safe and very quite for New York.Everything we wanted for a great holiday was supplied , organic food was a bonus. Both our room and the bathroom was super clean. The subway it only a two minute walk and 3 stops on the express to Times Square . I would highly recommend
Agnes is a fantastic host. The apartment is spotless and well stocked with everything you would need, from food to toiletries. Great location. I'll be back for sure!

Agnes was very kind, sweet and caring host ever. She gave us a lot of helpful information, suggestions ( and especially Snacks ;))) ). Bedroom was clean and comfy and bathroom also. It was really nice to stay at her place. Thank you my sweetest host ;)

Very good place to stay, our host was really helpful in giving us some useful tips about the Harlem area which is really interesting! The metro line is just one minute away and the bedroom looks exactly like on the picture so it was perfect!

Agnes was so nice and very caring. She took care that we always had food and drinks, and had a helpful answer to everything. 

Agnes war eine hervorragende Gastgeberin, sie war stes offen für sämtliche Fragen und richtete sich gerne nach unseren Wünschen.  Wir hatten kompletten Zugang zum Appartement mit reichlich gefüllter Küche.  Die Lage des Zimmers war perfekt. Sehr saubere Umgebung mit vielen Geschäften und einer U-Bahn Station in unmittelbarer Nähe.
Wir kommen bestimmt wieder!

If I come back to New York, I will definitely try to stay with Agnes again! Our Communication was fast, reliable and friendly from beginning to end. 
She made me feel welcome, safe and supported. The room was quiet (!), spacious, the bed luxuriously large and comfortable, the two bathrooms cleaned to sparkling shine twice a day. The organic breakfast was generously provided with a wide variety of fresh food to choose from plus snacks and water to take with you. The place is transport-wise well connected with just a 2 minutes walk to the next subway. The area is nice and safe. And if you need anything apart from this, Agnes is helpful to help you along. Thank you, Agnes, for a wonderful time.

This was our first airbnb experience.  Agnes made us very welcome and sent to our email a lot of information about touring in New York and transport .Her instructions on how to get from JFK airport to her unit are perfect. The bed was comfortable, the room warm and very secure. the shower had plenty of hot water . The area where the unit is is very clean and safe . very close to the subway. yet very quiet at night. Agnes has provided in her kitchen anything you need to cook your own meals. Because the subway is on an express station as well as local the journey to downtown is very quick. there are plenty of shops  for drinks and snacks and restaurants close by

Agnes was responsive to my contacts. The room is clean and she left snacks which I thought was very generous. If you want to explore Harlem and don't mind not having your own place, this works.  Oh, and she also helped with directions and suggestions.

We were very pleased with our stay at agnes place. She made us feel very welcome and went out of her way to make our stay pleasant!
We can recomend staying at agnes place to anyone who are planning a visit to Nyc!

Agnes could not have been more helpful - she definitely went above and beyond. Her directions were spot on and she made herself available for any and all questions.  We teased her that she should be running a large hotel !!

Agnes was an amazing host! She was very helpful and is a great person to have all kinds of conversations with ( of course only if you want to, because you still have enough privacy ). The "service" was awesome because Agnes provides breakfast (all kinds of cereal etc) and you could use the kitchen whenever you wanted to. The bathroom and the flat were always clean, as well as the bedroom (including the sheets and towels). She also surprised us with snacks and water in our room. The room in general had enough space for both of us. Apart from that, the location is perfect, calm and secure but still not far away from downtown. In general we can say that we enjoyed our stay with Agnes in her home, which also felt like ours and only can recommend staying with her! Thank you for everything Agnes!!
Great hospitality at a reasonable price. A very friendly and prompt host.

Agnes is really very helpfull in providing all kinds of tips for your stay and also practical stuff like parking. The complimentary breakfast offers a very large choice and it is for a large part even organic or glutenfree.
Lovely host in a nice area of new york. Agnes made us feel at home with snacks, breakfast and information. Great value!

Agnes is warm and welcoming host. The home is so clean. Agnes prepared EVERYTHING you will need in home. Toiletries, food ingredients, water, biscuits, and all information you will need to visit New York. It's fantastic!! Agnes is a wonderful host that we highly recommend!!!
Agnes was a warm and receptive hostess, room was clean and comfortable.( bathroom was especially clean). We enjoyed our stay with her........John and Anne

Agnes was a kind and helpful host. She answered our questions and made our first visit to New York very enjoyable. The apartment was so convenient for the subway , plenty of reasonably priced eating nearby and local shops for odds and ends. The apartment was clean and the neighbourhood very quiet .

Agnes was a warm and delightful host!  She provided not only information, but food and hospitality as well.  The private room was very cleaned and stocked with essentials and little "extras."  The bathroom was conveniently located a few steps down the hallway, and the kitchen/dining area was always accessible.  The apartment is located in a nice neighborhood with many restaurant options.  The  nearby subway station makes this a very affordable and convenient alternative to staying in midtown Manhattan.

It is a clean and spacious room with ac (which u really need when u r there during summer time ;). agnes is a very nice person - she always helped when we asked for something and offers snacks, drinks and organic breakfast for everybody. The metro is very close to the flat (just around the corner) and we felt safe in the neighbourhood. Thx for everything! :)

Chambre située dans un quartier calme et sûr de Harlem Ouest, à 2 pas d'une station de métro et des arrêts de bus qui conduisent au centre ville.
Les plus sont : la propreté des locaux et de la literie, le petit déjeuner inclus, ainsi que tout le petit matériel de toilette (brosse à dents - savon-dentifrice etc.). La salle de bain est à partager mais comme il n'y a jamais beaucoup trop de monde, cela n'est pas gênant.

Agnes was just as her previous reviews stated - welcoming, helpful, receptive to all questions!  The neighborhood as great, too!  I felt very safe walking around by myself and with my friends.  EVERY person I encountered was friendly whether on the street or working in a business.  I thoroughly enjoyed being in the Sugar Hill community of Harlem!

Agnes is super friendly, and delightful to talk. She made every effort to make our stay comfortable. The house is really nice, clean and is in a happening neighborhood. Agnes knows a lot about this area, and suggested us restaurants, and coffee shops.  She also has a mountain of information on the cultural aspect of the city, and her neighborhood  in particular. The kitchen is stocked with organic food. Also our room had some snacks, water bottles, soda, etc. I had forgotten to bring my tooth-brush, and I was so delighted to see two packed brushes in my room. I strongly recommend this place.

Agnes es una muy buena persona. Nos ayudó mucho dandonos consejos de lugares que visitar y como llegar a ellos.
El lugar es muy limpio y (Website hidden by Airbnb) habitacion es grande y posee todo lo descrito en la pagina de Airbnb.com. pudimos utilizar su cocina y preparar nuestros desayunos en base a una amplia variedad de cosas que nos ofreció. Ademas Agnes habla espanol e ingles lo que nos facilitó todo. De todas maneras volveremos donde ella para nuestra proxima visita a NYC!!!
Agnes is a wonderful host! We had a great time! The apartment is huge and nice, great location, no issues. She made sure we got everything we need.

My stay with Agnes was short. Only two days with work in the mix indeed felt like a NY minute. For this reason, I am most grateful for finding Agnes, the perfect host with a deep passion for Harlem. Agnes graciously accommodated my early morning arrival and was on hand to send me off early AM on day 3…full of information until the last moment. Her detailed transportation info was a lifesaver – always take the Express Train!
 As other guests have mentioned, her home is immaculately clean, comfortable and looks exactly as advertised. I had full use the kitchen and living area. It was like having my private apartment in Manhattan. The snacks and healthy breakfast options are endless – it is over and beyond what was required. Agnes is full of energy; her passion for Harlem shines through in her deep knowledge of the history of the neighbourhood, making the streets come alive and encouraging guests to stroll through this very safe section of Harlem; join the locals for some take out at the Famous Fish Market, where countless jazz greats have passed through; enjoy your treat at the Jackie Robinson Park, steps from Agnes’ Place. Make the time, give the neighbourhood a chance and you won’t regret it. 
 Thank you Agnes. Muchas, muchas gracias from the bottom of my heart.

Agnes was an awesome host. She was so warm, welcoming and always friendly. We appreciated her insider information and her restaurants recommendations. It was always nice talking to her. 
The room was clean and we also enjoyed the little "snack bar" 
A metro station is right around the corner from the apartment - which is perfect (prime location!!!). 
Agnes, thank you for your hospitality! 
Hope we'll see us again, so you can tell us other spooky stories 
All the best, 
Laura & Dominik
Muy atenta! Y muy linda.. Todo perfecto! Y agradable.

Agnes welcomed us in and gave a wonderful intro to the place and the city. Prior to coming she shared greats links about NYC and places to see. The room and place were perfect. Clean and organised. Agnes was very hospitable. Whenever there was need she was quick to respond and find the solution. Thank you for everything from all four of us. :-)

This was my first stay at an Air BnB and Agnes has set the bar very high for future stays. As a host we could not have asked for more! She was knowledgable and informative about the location and the history of her neighborhood. There was an incredible amount of complimentary items in the room. It was very private and quiet so perfect spot to return to and recover after a day in the city.

Agnes was a great host! She gives you a lot of information about things to do. When we had some problems with delayed luggage she did everything she could to help us. The room is spacious and clean. The free snacks are a nice welcoming gift! The apartment is close to a subway express stop to downtown new York. The perfect place to stay in new York!
Accueil chaleureux, conforme aux critères publies

Agnes is a great host! She is very knowledgeable about New York, providing detailed information about transportation, attractions, and restaurant recommendations. Her apartment is clean, well-stocked, and close to amenities. We had a wonderful time. Thanks Agnes!

I arrived in NYC at the crack of dawn and Agnes let me deposit my suitcase at her flat, giving me her own keys until the current guest left.  Later, she texted me that I could formally check in, early. The room was clean and stocked with toiletries and snacks that kept me and my two teenaged travelling companions  munching for days!  I was provided with numerous tips, by email, text and in person, for enjoying New York. For someone looking for a place to sleep while out-and-about day and night, it was perfect. The common room with balcony was frequently occupied and screened off, and, as happens when sharing a living space with strangers, not everyone cleaned up after themselves nicely in the kitchen or the bath, but Agnes' flat is super convenient to the Metro, banks and shops.  The bi-weekly farmers's market was also very pleasant. Agnes is intelligent and thoughtful and I appreciate very much staying in her home!

Agnes was very kind. 
She has it set up like a hotel. 
There were glasses for the water and soda that's left in the room along with some chocolates and pretzels. 
The room was clean as was the bathroom.

Agnes was absolutely wonderful. Her home is lovely and she makes great effort to make sure it is completely clean and fresh.

She is very knowledgeable about the city and gives you advance information about things to do and the shops and places you might need to go to.

Her communication is great and always gets back to you very quickly. She also gives you lots of drinks and yummy treats in your room as well as fresh towels and a great TV and selection of channels.

The area was safe and the subway is so close.

I wish I could have given you a hug before I left. Thank you so much for everything :)

Agnes war einfach nur toll! Obwohl unser Flug Verspätung hatte und wir mitten in der Nacht ankamen, hat Agnes auf uns gewartet und uns empfangen. Wir hatten die 9 Tage lang nichts vermisst, Frühstück und Zutaten für Sandwiches o.ä. waren immer vorhanden und sie achtete auf eine gute Ernährung (Mandelmilch, organisches Obst, 3 verschiedene Brotarten und und und), was uns unglaublich zugesagt hatte. 
Kleine Gesten, die wir absolut nicht erwartet hatten, machten den Aufenthalt zu einem wundervollem ersten airbnb-Erlebnis! Es ist sauber bei Agnes, es wird regelmäßig geputzt und die Bettwäsche und die Handtücher werden bei längeren Aufenthalt gewechselt. Anzumerken ist vielleicht auch noch, dass Agnes so unglaublich hilfsbereit war, egal in welcher Hinsicht! Sie hatte immer gute Tips, ein offenes Ohr und zögerte nicht, bei Problemen oder Wünschen ihre Hilfe anzubieten. Ihre Geschichten über New York und ihre Arbeit waren einfach nur toll und wir liebten es, uns mit ihr und unseren anderen Mitbewohnern (ebenfalls aus der USA) zu unterhalten. Wichtig ist vielleicht auch noch anzumerken, dass die Gegend unglaublich sicher war. Gerade mir als Frau lag es am Herzen, keine Angst haben zu müssen und man merkt relativ schnell, dass die Horror-Märchen genau das sind, was sie sind: Märchen. Wir fühlten uns zu zweit nie gefährdet oder bedrängt. 
Alles in einem: ein wundervoller Aufenthalt und eins steht fest: unseren nächsten Aufenthalt in New York verbringen wir wieder bei Agnes!


Agnes was just great! Although our flight was delayed and we arrived in the middle of the night, Agnes was waiting for us and welcomed us. We had 9 days missed nothing, breakfast and other ingredients for sandwiches etc. were always available and she paid attention to good nutrition (Almond milk, organic fruit, 3 different types of bread).
Small gestures that we had absolutely not expected, made the stay a wonderful first Airbnb-experience.
The apartment was very clean, it was cleaned regularly and the bedding and towels were changed at longer stay. Agnes was so incredibly helpful! She always had good advice, a listening ear and did not hesitate to offer their assistance with problems or wishes. Her stories about New York and her work were just great and we loved the conversations with her and the other roommates. It is important also to say that the area, we stayed, was incredibly safe. We felt for two never threatened or harassed. 
It was wonderful! Our next stay in New York we will stay again at Agnes!

 Thank you so much, Agnes!

Staying at Agnes place is such a good location very accessible to all means of transportations. She is very accomodating and a very nice person if we will be given the opportunity to go back in NY we will  rather stay there again   .
The home is very great, clean. Its exactly as the pics. She leaved lot of nuts, sweets , water, soft drinks in the room.

Agnes was very efficient in providing us with information and we found the accommodation easily. She gave us a guided tour of the facilities and the extensive options available for breakfast. We found the location convenient, very close to the subway and with access to an express service that got us to Time Square quickly. The bed was fine and we could have had air conditioning if we wanted.

Agnes est une hôtesse très gentille et très attentionnée. L'accueil fut très sympathique et Agnes nous a bien informés sur les metros à prendre pour aller downtown. La description sur ke site correspond bien à la réalité. Seul regret : il manque un coin pour s'asseoir et prendre le petit-déjeuner.
Very good welcome and a lot of information at disposal to have a pleasant stay in NY - nice place very convenient to visit Manhattan with direct connections to Times Square, WTC...

Die Zeit in NY bei Agnes war sehr angenehm. Wir konnten schon sehr früh unsere Koffer bei ihr abstellen und auch am Tag unseres Abfluges die Koffer über Tag bei ihr lassen. Sie hat uns viele Tipps gegeben, wenn wir sie gefragt haben und auch sonst hat sie unseren Aufenthalt schön gestaltet. Wir hatten jeden Tag ein kostenloses Frühstück und auch super viele kleine Snacks zum mitnehmen. Vielen Dank für die schöne Zeit Agnes :-)

Agnes was so awesome! Definitely recommend her and her place! The apartment was big, clean and you had everything you needed! Really, it is a great Place to stay :) The Metro is just around the corner and you are in 15 minutes at the Time Square with the Express line! It's fantastic! 
Agnes is very warmhearted and welcoming! She is really a great host! Gave us really much information about food, bars, clubs, transportation etc. :) Thank you so much for everything! It was a Perfect stay in NYC :)

Agnes's place was exactly as described. It was clean, spacious and I felt very comfortable. She even provided necessities such as shampoos, toothbrushes, and tooth pastes. She also welcomed us with snack and refreshments in our room. Agnes was very helpful with instructions and communicated instantaneously. I would definitely stay here again.

Agnes' place was very convenient, comfortable, clean and we got everything we need from breakfast to toiletries, etc that she had provided. Agnes was an excellent host. We were glad we stayed with her during our time in NYC rather than staying in a hotel where we can't really take our money's worth. We brought our 9-month old baby with us and Agnes was very accomodating. She was really helpful especially in giving us tips regarding our tour. NYC has endless exciting things! Hopefully there will be a next time for us and if we ever come back, we definitely will stay again with Agnes. Thank you Agnes! God bless!

She actually did not really seem that thrilled to see us.  It felt awkward.  I am guessing this was partially due to the flexible time.  She was trying to be accommodating and we had a hard time estimating arrival as we drove in.  I think it was pretty accurate.
Agnes was a great host and a lovely person.  Thanks again for your hospitality.

Agnès est très accueillante, agréable, serviable.
La chambre est très confortable
Le métro est au coin de la rue,avec 4lignes de Métro en direction de Manathan.
Très bon séjour à NY!

Muy lindo lugar, excelente ubicación y mucha comodidad y limpieza tanto en los espacios comunes (cocina, living), como en el baño (1 completo siempre limpio y uno más pequeño) y el dormitorio impecable. Con cosas para picar y comer como chocolates y golosinas, aguas y distintos tipos de bebestibles. Incluso se preocupa del cambio de ropa de cama y de toallas.
Cerca de una estación de metro con buena conectividad, en tren express no más de 15-20 min de la entrada sur de Central Park y Times Square.
¡Agnes es muy preocupada de cada detalle y se agradece eso muchísimo! ¡Lo recomendaría a ojos cerrados y es más; volveremos!

Agnes was more than great starting from I booked the room weeks prior by proving great communication to the very end when we left our amazing trip in New York. Our flight came in around 6am and even though "full check-in" wasn't until later (other guests still occupied the place), Agnes let us drop off our bags, clean up and chat a little before we headed out to explore before our long day. 

The apartment complex has old-school charm in a great way as well as the apartment itself. Everything was very clean and I noticed the bathroom was spotless every time I went in the next day. The room we had was excellent with plenty of space including a comfortable bed (I like firm), television and Agnes even provided an array of snacks, water, juices, coffee, soap, toothbrushes, etc in the room which was awesome. My friend and I felt extremely comfortable in the apartment and used the kitchen everyday for breakfast. We talked to Agnes when she was around and she is an awesome person to conversate with. Very calm, but passionate and well rounded in many areas so you can talk about almost anything. If you need any tips on places to eat or how to get around she will have them for you too. Very responsive via messages/text too, which I'm a big fan. The main bathroom (with shower/bath) is shared, but we never had an issue or wait when we were leaving for the day. It literally felt like a home away from home. I've used airbnb multiple times and this was my best experience using a shared space. I'm usually against it to be honest, but if all hosts are like Agnes and her place I'm open to it again :)

We loved the location as well....literally one block away from the Train/Subway station (both express and local) to get you anywhere you want to go. One train can take you to many of the tourist sites, Central Park etc and we found this to be great. The airport was a simple Express train away as well as the AirTrain (must take this in and out of the airport) which was very convenient as well to save on taxi. Plenty of places to eat around (late too), groceries, and we came in late at night and had no feeling of being unsafe whatsoever anytime. The building is also locked and secured and to note has both stairs and an old style elevator (smoother than expected as I fear elevators).

Overall, more than Excellent experience and my friend and I would recommend Agnes and her place in a heartbeat for a stay in New York. If I go back, I would hope to stay again.

Our host Agens was amazing! She has welcomed us so nicely, explained and answered on each question we had. We have also received drinks and snacks in our room which was such a treat after a long travel. She has provided all and much more during our stay than what was listed on her page. The room as well as the whole appartment was very clean. We could use the kitchen and even the food that was there! She treated us every day with something. Also the neighborhood (Harlem) for which we were a bit incertained before coming there was totaly good. We were two single women and have felt safe walking on streets day or night, people were friendly, streets quite clean and metro station is just steps away from the house. 
Renting Agnes's room and coming to stay in Harlem was the best choice ever! Would strongly recommend to everyone coming to NYC!

Adoramos estar hospedados no apartamento de Agnes, ela é  super atenciosa, nos ajudou com endereços etc. O apartamento é  sempre bem limpo e muito silêncioso. Fica a 100 metros da estação de metrô que nos liga a todos o pontos turísticos. Eu super recomendo!

My sister and I stayed with Agnes for an overnight trip to the city. She was wonderful! Even before the trip, she sent me all kinds of information about things to do in the city (and how to do them on the cheap). She gave excellent directions to help us navigate the city. And to speak to her character, she was very warm and friendly-overall an excellent host. The apartment building itself was really cool (historic building with lots of character- loved it!) and overlooked a small park. The room and bathroom were both very clean and comfortable. Agnes let us drop off our bags early in the morning before our official check in so we could go explore without being loaded down with heavy backpacks. When we returned, our bags were stored neatly in the room. She even left a small table of snacks and beverages for us in case we got hungry. The neighborhood is quiet, and my sister and I had no reservations in walking from the apartment all the way to Central Park. Public transportation was also easily accessible. Overall it was a great trip made even better by such a hospitable host, and when we go back, we know where to stay without a doubt. I highly recommend it!

this was a five star place. Agnes went above and beyond to make us feel welcome. She could not have been more helpful, providing breakfast, snacks and lots of information about things to see and places to eat.  The bedroom was spacious,warm and comfortable.  We could also use the lounge and kitchen if we wanted.  The apartment was very well placed, only 2minutes walk from the subway station, and only 10 minutes into Times Square on the subway train.  The area was clean, safe and, most importantly, quiet.  There were lots of local eating places also.  This is my 3rd time in New York and this is by far the best place I have stayed. Agnes is a first class host and I will definitely stay here again

We had a great time with Agnes. She was flexible with our weird arrival time, and helped us get situated. The room was wonderful; our favorite part were all of the snacks and drinks left for us. The kitchen and pantry were stocked with everything you could want for breakfast. We loved the building the apt was in, and we loved the overall area. The subway is practically next door, so you can easily get wherever you want to go. Agnes is very knowledgeable about everything in the area, and gave us many suggestions for food and activities both near and far. Our flights back were late in the day, too, so she even let us keep our luggage in the apt after we checked out while we finished up in the city.

When traveling it is important to have a host that is an effective communicator, like Agnes. She has a lovely sense of humor and responds relatively quickly to messages. The room we stayed in and bathroom is no mess, no fuss. Clean, big enough to comfortably host two, quiet, peaceful. She's also welcomed us with snacks and beverages. Highly recommended for travelers who are on a budget and don't mind missing the frills.

We stayed at Agnes' place for a weekend getaway trip to NY. This was our first time traveling there alone, but Agnes made us feel very safe. We were given clear instructions on how to get around the city, and even when we forgot the directions she never hesitated to provide them again! She definitely helped us to master, what we feel, was a complicated subway system. She gave us a platform to really explore New York (not just Times Square). We really appreciated how clean the room was, and how quick she was to respond to our questions and concerns. The area is safe, and the building has an intriguing history, that Agnes won't hesitate to tell you about (she LOVES her city!). We recommend you stay with Agnes. She will make sure you have a good time, without imposing on your privacy.

I think it's rare to find a host as welcoming and as generous as Agnes was. She made sure that we felt at home right away, and was so hospitable with the food and drink options. She was also really engaging and we had really lovely conversations with her during the evening. The room was great and the apartment was located nearby a lot of great (Agnes provided an extensive list of recommendations for restaurants and cafes, which we were happy to take advantage of!).

Agnes is super friendly and provided a great space for us.  The bed is very big and comfortable. She let many things in the room so you can eat/use if you feel like. The confort of a hotel and the hospitality of a friend.

A Agnes sempre foi muito prestativa em tudo. Nos recebeu super bem, mesmo com nossa chegada de madrugada (às 2am). O quarto é bem amplo e tinha várias guloseimas, água, suco, cidra e vinho no quarto. A localização é perfeita e do lado do metrô que dá acesso aos principais pontas da cidade. O bairro é um local seguro, tem tudo perto, e nos sentimos em casa. Agnes compreende bem o português e fala fluente o espanhol, o que ajuda bastante.

Agnes is a wonderful host. She goes far and beyond what is expected of her. This was my first airbnb experience and Agnes really set the bar high. I arrived early and she let me leave my bag in the apartment while I walked around. She even gave me recommendations on coffee shops in the area. She knows NY like the back of her hand so she is extremely helpful when deciding where to go have a drink or dinner. When I arrived to the apartment she had put my bag in the room and had left a variety of snacks and beverages for me in the room. She is incredibly generous and accommodating.  The neighborhood was alright. There are many places you can eat within walking distance. And you have a train stop a block away, so easy access anywhere in NY. I definitely recommend Agnes without reservations.

An amazing host who went above & beyond to ensure my stay was amazing & then some. Directions, advice & some great conversation made my first trip to NY a memorable one. I would recommend this as a great place to stay with getting around simple & easy & all within a few hundred meters. Great area, very safe & a warm community feel

Agnes provided ample information from directions to her home as well as sightseeing & restaurants recommendations. It was pretty easy to get to her place from LGA. She welcomed us with lots of variety of snacks and beverages. We originally booked for 4 days but were only able to stay for 2 days due to Blizzard Jonas. Agnes has a non-refundable policy. We eventually comprised and worked something out. She's an outstanding and helpful host.

Agnes's place was such a treat to stay at. She was able to handle my short notice arrival and had the place perfectly prepared. Her recommendations for good food were spot on, and she had plenty of other recommendations too (but I really was mostly there for Broadway and the food :) I will definitely be booking with Agnes again in the near future!
This was everything i could hope for and more. Agnes & her partner go above and beyond whats called for in order to make your stay perfect. The attention to detail is like no other. Highly recommend.

Agnes was very attentive with messaging me instantly. She suggested many restaurants, bars and attractions to visit in the city. 
The apartment was large, clean and beautiful and the room was stocked with treats, water, fresh towels and a TV.

The location was great, however it took some time to get downtown. Therefore, make time for the commute.
Nous avions loué une chambre chez Agnès. Très bonne communication, de bonnes informations tout le long du séjour qui nous ont bien aidées.

Agnes was a warm and welcoming host, and the room was clean and comfortable. She was helpful with information about the area, generous with snacks and breakfast provided, and quick to respond to inquiries. We loved being so close to the subway, and felt safe in the neighborhood.
It was my first time using Airbnb and Agnes was great. She made us feel at home. Thank you!

Agnes is a super awesome human being, really cool, extremely knowledgeable of New York, and provides a really amazing experience. Also, located super conveniently to the subway line. So getting around New York could not be any easier. I promise you will not be disappointed. Also, great neighbourhood, and really delicious food nearby at really good prices.
房东人很好,很热情,房子离中央公园很近,走路20分钟左右,一路走过去的风景很好｡
Amazing place, great host. Agnes is a great host, the place is big, clean and comfortable. The neighborhood is amazing and everything is very close by.

Staying at Agnes' place was great! The neighborhood is very friendly and it has all the basic necessities nearby (restaurants, stores, supermarkets, Starbucks, etc). The subway station is 2 minutes walking from her apartment and it connects you everywhere in Manhattan. The room was really comfortable and spacious, with tv. Agnes was always available to help us, provided us with breakfast everyday and also with some history lessons about New York. The fire escape stairs also served as a balcony and has a great view of Harlem and a bit of downtown Manhattan. We also had the opportunity to meet a few Agnes friends who were really nice and warm full. Overall it was a great experience that we truly recommend. Thank you, Agnes! 
Maria and Miguel

아주 많은 음식과 물, 필요한 모든 것을 제공해주는 숙소였습니다. 보스톤 3일 여행하는 동안 짐을 둘 곳이 없을까 걱정했는데 돈을 받지 않고, 짐을 둘 수 있게 친히 허락해주셨습니다. 조금 지저분해 보이는 짐이었지만 거실 끝에 작은 공간을 마련해주었습니다. 할렘이라 많이 걱정했지만 너무 늦은 저녁에만 혼자 다니지 않으면 그렇게 위험한 거 같진 않네요.

호스트는 너무너무 깨끗한 스타일이라 항상 화장실이나 부엌 사용후엔 확인해서 꼭 정리를 바로바로 하는 스타일이었습니다.

하지만 안타깝게도 옆방 소음은 너무 잘 들려서 밤에 잠들기가 힘들었습니다. 그 외엔 만족할만할까한 숙소였습니다.

아주 고~~~~맙습니다. 아그네스님.

This was a perfect airbnb. I mean 100% perfect. The location was safe and accessible, a few steps to the subway and some restaurants.
