I did a 1 day tour of NY and agnes guided me extensively and she was dedicated to help me by guiding me around. I take that as a favor and I will stay there when I visit NY next.

We had a great stay here at Agnes place. It was clean and comfortable.  The proximity to the subway station was incredibly convenient. For our first Airbnb experience this was definitely a positive one. Thank you Agnes, for your hospitality!

We had a overall good stay in Agnes flat. Room is quiet as described,  clean as the whole apartment and shared spaces. Bed in our room was extremely comfortable! Bathrooms kept extremely clean even though the flat had often more than one guest (in other rooms). Only one shower (and sometimes 5+ guests to share)  but we never had to wait in our I guess lucky case. Host is extremely helpful and careful in keeping the flat very clean. We stayed 5 night and she also tidied up the room for us and even changed bed-sheets and towels which we really appreciated!  
Room can be very warm as the heating system is centralized and is ON for many hours also overnight. There is no possibility to open the windows which are sealed around the air conditioner system, as shown in the pictures and the radiators cannot be shut. Agnes however provides a fan which kind of helped. Still tropical temperature tho, which we nevertheless did not mind as it was a very cold week of March. Breakfast choice is wide, lots of teas and coffee, bread and all as described. I guess the quality of the stay will depend greatly on the politeness of other guests renting other rooms, we were lucky enough to be there when not so many people were around and they were all quiet. Thanks Agnes and see you next time.

Everything was as promised. We spent very little time actually in the house other than sleeping due to such a quick trip, but Agnes was very accommodating and friendly. Before my stay she sent an immense amount of info to help plan my activities there, and now I can say I've stayed in NY.

Nous avons très bien été reçues par Agnès! Elle est très conciliante et n'hésite pas à s'adapter aux heures d'arrivée et de départ! Nous sommes arrivées tôt le matin et Agnès est tout de suite arrivée après un appel pour nous accueillir.  Nous avons pu déposer nos bagages dans le couloir et profiter de notre première journée. Le soir à notre retour, Agnès avait nettoyé la chambre et rangé nos bagages dans celle-ci. Nous avons trouvé de quoi grignoter et boire, des serviettes de bain propres et quelques ustensiles bien utiles (sèche cheveux et fer à repasser), la chambre était semblable aux photos sauf  le lit qui a sûrement dû être remplacer par un nouveau lit. Le bâtiment est assez àncien mais propre et situé dans un quartier vivant et calme  à deux pas du métro. Nous avons pu utiliser la cuisine au moment du petit déjeuner. Agnès nous a beaucoup renseigné sur les incontournables de New York et nous a énormément conseillées ! J'ai vraiment apprécié mon séjour chez Agnès et je n'hésiterai pas à retourner chez elle très vite je l'espère ! :) jai beaucoup apprécié exercer mon anglais en discutant avec notre hôte !

Perfect! Exactly as described!

Actually- better! I wasn't expecting the snacks :)

Had an impromptu meeting in NY and only needed 1 night to rest my head. Not only is Agnes in a great location for a crazy, can't beat price, she is warm friendly, and beyond hospitable. What I noticed were that the bedrooms and bathrooms were cleaner than a typical hotel, you could clearly tell she takes great care of her home. She had food drink, toiletries really above and beyond... And great directions & suggestions. Qi Bangkok great little gem :) Agnes very easy to communicate with and just a great host, I would highly recommend her.

The place was more than I expected, thought it would be like a motel but was pleasantly surprised by all the amenities that were offered. Agnes was a great host who is very knowledgeable about the city and a joy to chat with.

Agnes made me feel very welcomed from the moment I got there.  She was a wonderful host and the accommodations were very easy to settle into.  She opened her kitchen to me with her unbelievable selection of teas and coffee.  Here introduction to the neighborhood gave me the confidence to venture out and about on my own without reservation.  She recommended several eating spots and I have to say one of my best parts of the trip was that I didn't have a bad meal the entire time.  If you are brave enough to jump on the subway, Agnes is like a walking map of the transportation system in New York and she will send very specific instructions how to navigate the routes.  Agnes is a great person to sit and talk with as she has some great life experiences to share.  She will be my first choice should I make another trip to New York.

Wir waren  mit der Unterkunft sehr zufrieden. Die Wohnung war sauber und ordentlich und alles was man zum Frühstück brauchte war vorhanden. Die Wohnung liegt kaum 100m von einer U-Bahn-Station und einer Bushaltestelle entfernt. Man kommt daher äußerst bequem zu allen Hauptattraktionen Manhattans. Diesen Punkt sollte man nicht unterschätzen! Die Straße ist hübsch und die Mitbewohner des Hauses machten ebenfalls einen sehr freundlichen Eindruck. Wir haben uns wohlgefühlt.

Agnès a été une super Hôte du début à la fin. La chambre etait spacieuse, encore mieux que la photo que nous avions vu lors de la réservation! Elle nous a envoyé beaucoup d'infos qui nous ont servi pour arriver facilement chez elle et pour découvrir NYC. Le métro est à environ 150m de l'appartement de quoi arriver facilement au logement sans se perdre. Le train A dessert directement la station de chez Agnès depuis l'aéroport. De nombreuses
Collations et biscuits avaient été laissés dans notre chambre ainsi que la possibilité de prendre tous les matins un bon petit déjeuner!
A 15 min de times square en metro dans un quartier très tranquille!
Je recommande fortement!

Sehr sichere, ziemlich ruhige und verkehrstechnisch prima Gegend, mit der Express Subway ist man zu jeder Zeit schnell zuhause. Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis perfekt.
Es gibt (mindestens) zwei zu vermietende Zimmer in der Wohnung, eines größer, das andere etwas kleiner. Wir hatten das erste, etwas größere Zimmer am Eingang, zum ruhigen Hinterhof. Das Foto stimmt nicht mehr bzgl des Bettes. Das jetzt dort stehende Bett hat keinen Nachttisch, es gibt auch keine Nachttischlampen, nur eine Deckenlampe. Fernseher war angeblich gerade kaputt gegangen. Fehlte uns aber nicht. Zimmer nüchtern, aber praktisch. Der lichte Charakter des Fotos etwas irreführend. Eher Zimmer zum unbelebten Hinterhof, es guckt aber keiner rein, Jalousie.
Heizung springt bei etwas kühleren Temperaturen automatisch an und lässt sich nicht regulieren, pfeift. Zum Abkühlen gibt es mobilen Ventilator und Klimaanlage im Fenster. Mmm. Nicht sehr umweltfreundlich, aber wohl standard.
Wohnung gepflegt und Badezimmer mit Dusch-Badewanne sehr sauber. Gute und reichlich Handtücher. Auf Wunsch haben wir auch zweites Laken und Decke fürs Doppelbett bekommen.
In kleiner Küche alles vorhanden, um sich selbst Frühstück zuzubereiten. Sehr praktisch. Im Wohnzimmer zwei abgesessene Couchs und kleine Klapptische, herrliche Aussicht über Harlem vom Podest der Feuerleiter aus, auf dem wir morgens unseren Kaffee getrunken haben.
Beim Ankommen statt eines "Hello" erstmal Hinweis, dass in der Wohnung keine Schuhe getragen werden dürfen. Also Hausschuhe oder dicke Strümpfe mitbringen. Schuhe draußen im Hausflur ausziehen. Begrüßung dadurch etwas kurios:-)
Für uns etwas undurchsichtig, wer uns eigentlich begrüßt hat. Agnes haben wir wohl nicht getroffen. Die uns Empfangende hat auch nicht klar gestellt, wer sie eigentlich ist... 
Insgesamt trotz ein paar marginaler Häkchen bzw. Fragezeichen prima Quartier, sauber, praktisch, preiswert und verkehrstechnisch super angebunden. Durchaus zu empfehlen:-)

Ho soggiornato in aprile da Agnes.
L'appartamento è pulito, semplice, confortevole, molto newyorkese, con tutto ciò che occorre.
La posizione è strategica perché ben servita dalla metro. Il quartiere è rinomato e sicuro.
Agnes è una ragazza spagnola di una gentilezza rara. Disponibile e competente ci ha accolti ed acuditi.
Il rapporto qualità/prezzo, per le cose che offre supera le aspettative. Avevamo inclusi nella tariffa persino le telefonate illimitate free per l'Europa, oltre che una ricca dispensa per la colazione a disposizione e in camera un Welcome mai (Website hidden by Airbnb) ha messo oltre a bevande e cibarie di ogni tipo, crema, saponi, spazzolini... persino il collutorio

We went to New York for a small vacation an my friend recommended to use Airbnb. I was extremely lucky when we came across Agnus, the location was perfect. She was so helpful when it came to any questions we had. Her apartment is so clean an big. I was beyond pleased with everything. Agnus is awesome, if anyone stays with her you won't be disappointed!

Due to flight delays, I arrived three hours later than expected. Agnes was able to accommodate. She was very thorough with providing detailed directions. The apartment has 4 bedrooms which multiple are used to host airbnb guests. Very quiet and peaceful, near subway station. Great neighborhood for being in Harlem. Towels were provided. Wifi speed was average. Plenty of food and beverages were available. Photos match the description. Location is safe.

This Airbnb experience was really good. Everything went perfect. Agnes sent us a lots of information before! We found the place easily because it is so close to metro station. Agnes was a great host. She was so kind and  she did for us as much as she could. Thank you!!!
I had a great time in New York thanks to Agnes. The room was very good, clean and confortable. Agnes really cares for her guests and gives tips what to do and where to go in New York.
I had a good time in New York and I found staying a Agnes's place in this historic neighbourhood very comfortable and handy to transport.

I had an amazing stay at Agnes' house. It was my first time in NYC and she made it really easy to navigate the subway system and was very hospitable.  She went above and beyond a normal host by providing numerous amenities. The breakfast spread in the morning was great and she was flexible with my arrival time after I had missed my train. I will definitely stay with Agnes again.

Two words, go there! Agnes is a wonderful host, very nice, helpful, serious and kind. We stayed in her apartment for one night and it was great. I did the reservation at the last minute and she answered me immediately. She also give us the direction to come to her place. She was very flexible to welcome us and to leave our bags there. 
The room is nice, enough for 3 people. She put in the room a lot of little attentions, like snacks, drinks and some others things for us. That was very nice. She also let us uses her kitchen and offer us all the necessary for breakfast. The building is secured, the location is good. Very close to the subway which bring you everywhere (few minutes walk). We were happy to find a dunkin donuts and a pizza place very close too. 
I recommend to stay with Agnes, you will have a great time in the city and I would be happy to stay there again!

Agnes was a great host, she was a kind and warm person. When we got there, she welcomed us with snacks in our room. The room was arranged for us to relax. We were tired by our travels and Agnes's room was good to get ready for the next day. We loved that she took time to make us feel comfortable. Her house is located very near to metro station which saved us a lot of time when we were leaving for the greyhound bus. She was accommodating and made us feel at home and even recommended good modes of travel and places to visit. We are glad that we were her guests.

exactly as described believe it or not.

loved the privacy of our own room
loved that there was another bathroom when the first was occupied
loved that you had a blender I could use
loved use of the fridge, though it was so packed it was hard to get more in there lol!
love the wealth of information you were. It was a good thing as well as an overwhelming thing.
loved the history of the neighbourhood...but it was so much I wish I wrote it down!
loved being able to come and go as we pleased
loved the flexible check in and out
loved the bathroom shower heads lol!
grateful for the air conditioner
like the quiet policy in the space.
loved having a local phone
loved having access to the food and amenities in the kitchen.
loved the quick access to bus and express train
loved the care with which you took care of everything.

will definitely stay here again and recommend this host to others!

LOVE LOVE LOVE
A nice stay and very accommodating - plenty of nice food for breakfast and close to the subway for exploring. Many thanks!

Agnes was the most perfect host! The room was exactly as pictured and perfect for three. She made snacks available in the room and had a ton of food for breakfast, too. She was also just lovely to talk to, with lots of information about the history of the neighborhood (it's amazing) and some great food recommendations (check out The Edge if you stay with her - just a few blocks away). It is also quite convenient to the subway, which made travel incredibly easy (easy ride down on the A to a lot of the big NYC spots). If you have the chance, definitely stay here.

My partner and I were attending a show in the city and wanted affordable, nearby accommodations for our one evening stay.  This space was true to its description - incredibly close to the train, easily accessible from the city itself, and very affordable!  Agnes and her co-host Rachel were very welcoming and incredibly responsive.  The amenities, including the complimentary snacks in the room were amazing and perfect for the type of travel we were doing.  The bed was rather firm, so if you are sensitive to the type of mattress you sleep on, take this into consideration (though the description has been updated to include an insert for this).   My partner slept great, sadly I did not (being a big baby and liking my plush bed at home) but the convenience and affordability, especially for NYC cannot be beat.  Great location and great host.

Agnes is by far the best host ever! Months prior to our visit, she has already sent tons of useful dining and transit info that we asked for. She made sure she was home to greet us on our arrival day, gave us a tour of her home and all the food that we can help ourselves with. My experience here is better than my friends' experience at 5-star-hotels in NYC! The room is spacious, very clean, and Agnes is always there to answer our questions and help us out. She even went out of her way to print something for me. Couldn't have asked for a better host, extremely lucky to have stayed with her.

Bien situé. Mais attention toutes les nuits des détonations des coups de feu. A l'intérieur une climatisation très bruyante. Pas de wifi dans les chambres il faut aller dans le salon.
Pas de double rideaux que des stores de bureau donc lumière du jour.

This was my first time using airbn, I honestly was afraid of what to expect but everything was beyond any expectation. If you're afraid of sharing bathroom, don't worry! Agnes keep it always clean and satinized. You won't have to be worried about breakfast, Agnes is ready with plenty of food of many flavors and needes. 

Room is also provided with everything you need for a comfortable resting.

Agnes and Rachel were amazing hosts and totally accommodated to our arrival time and had the room and the rest of the place clean and stocked with refreshments for us. The room was nice and cool with a personal air conditioner. I give my highest recommendation for a stay here!

My mother, sister and I were visiting New York for a couple days and stayed with Agnes. She was a great host and was very helpful giving us tons of useful information on how to get around, places to eat and activities to do. Very sweet and kind!

Had a great first Airbnb experience with Agnes. Agnes gives lots of information to help with you seeing attractions etc. and how to get there. The apartment is very close to the subway. And if you catch the express train you are not far from the attractions as well. The neighbourhood is safe.  The apartment/room is kept well clean. The room is very quiet in that I never heard other people talking anywhere. Nice free pool across the road, which I used on one occassion, sorry I didn't use it more often. I would happily stay here again.

Staying with Agnes was an absolute delight. The room was perfect and easy to get to, with the subway being on the same street. I was only in the actual building for a short time as I was there for a concert but the full amenities were provided and available had I needed them. Any information I could have needed was immediately available with Agnes available around the clock. She was kind enough to send me directions from my bus stop to her place before I was even in NYC which made getting around 100xs easier.s she is very friendly and easy to talk to and is very caring. I 100% recommend staying at her place and in the future would use again. Thank you so much for your hospitality and kindness!

Agnes was absolutely wonderful!! I arrived very early and she allowed me to drop off my bags while I wandered the city. She had complimentary beverages, and a great wealth of knowledge about the area (ask her about her building, very cool stuff folks). She was okay with my bright and bubbly morning personality. All around the best AirBnB spot I've stayed at yet. The next one I'm in the city I will be staying with her, she made what was starting off to be a bad trip end a beautiful one! You would be wrong to stay elsewhere. Thanks Agnes!

It was a great experience. The location was great and very close to the metro. The apartment was clean and comfortable. She really takes care of her guests.  The room had plenty of space for us and the bottle of water/snacks were a great touch.

My friend and I booked six days of a room through Airbnb, it's our first time using Airbnb, so we were a little bit concerned about it. At first there seemed to be a little misunderstanding, but that thought was quickly overturned. Agnes was very responsive, easygoing, and she provided us with a lot of useful touring info. about the city. She also told us stories about the neighborhood. We both were very lucky to have such a wonderful B&B living experience that she gave us. Thank you, Agnes!

A very quiet apartment and handy having the subway just around the corner - only about 30 mins express to the CBD and all the sites. Yankee Stadium was a short subway ride away and there is a grocery store just down the road as well. 

Agnes was very informative and had lots of information to offer us. The water and snacks were a nice addition as were the lovely soft sheets. 

We didn't realise there would be other guests in another room and we'd all be sharing a bathroom but while we did have to wait often it wasn't the end of the world either and they were very friendly.

We really enjoyed staying at Agnes' apartment, it's very roomy, the room was lovely with A/C and Agnes had left a ton of snacks and toiletries complimentary to our stay. The neighbourhood was lovely and it's a 1 min walk to the subway. Agnes is very knowledgeable and will give lots of ideas on where to eat. She is very friendly and welcoming, you really feel At home !

Superbe voyage a new york! La chambre nous a permis de nous deplacer facilement  et rapidement dans la ville! C'etait d'une grande propreté! Agnes était sympathique mais discrète, nous laissant toute l'intimité que nous avions besoin!

Agnes was the best host ever, although she wasn't even at home during our stay! (her friend Vanessa, who was our host for that time and always availabe, did an awesome job as well)

The flat is really big and Agnes offers you EVERYTHING you need! 
You can prepare breakfast every morning and eat whatever is available (cornflakes, crackers, bread, fruits etc.). 
Agnes surprised us with a really big table full with sweets, drinks and a lot of other cool stuff. 

She (and also Vanessa) gives you her "own version" of a guidebook through new york and you could really write a book for tourists full with her suggestions! 

All in all I have to say: This is the best AirBnB I have ever seen! 

Thank you Agnes and Vanessa !

One word to describe Agnes - generous. She's generous with food,  with our printing needs, generous with tips in going around New York, places to visit, toiletries, she even provided us with complementary laundry services! Wifi experienced a bit of a problem inside the bedroom but she's also generous enough to share with us her password for her mobile TWC wifi! 

Hope though we have a bigger mirror and TV inside the bedroom, but those are minor things as there is a mirror in the shared bathroom and TV in the living room. 

Overall, the experience was good and relaxing for our family.

Had the best experience at Agnes's place. Exactly how it describes but better! She was so helpful with everything, gave us so much information about New York before and during our stay. The food she bought was delicious, we had our own little goodie table in our room with heaps of sweets. 
The apartment was in the most convenient place you could imagine, the subway was literally a 2 minute walk. 
The room was nice and cozy, the AC was perfect. Agnes had so many toiletries in the shower, I wouldn't bother traveling with anything that you need in the shower because it was all there.
It was the best stay we could ask for!
We would highly recommend this to anyone. Thanks Agnes!

This was our first Airbnb experience and it was absolutely perfect! We arrived at midnight but checking-in was no problem for Agnes. The apartment is very near the subway so getting to the heart of the city was no problem.

Agnes was also very nice and knowledgeable about her city. I strongly recommend this place for your stay in New York. I for one will definitely stay here again when I visit New York in the future.
Agnes was the best host ever!!! She's really friendly and kind~And her place was neat and tidy ! we are so lucky to stay here:)

Agnes was very responsive, helpful, and knowledgable of NYC. It is like living with a guide. The apartment was stocked with so much food, snacks, and any kind of amenity one would need. The neighborhood seemed very safe and friendly. The apartment was very clean and had easy access to metro stations. I was dissapointed about parking however but this is not the hosts' fault. If you drive, getting a parking spot on the street may be very difficult or impossible depending when you arrive. I drove my car and was needing to leave it in a worry free place for 6 nights. Since I arrived on a Saturday night all spaces were taken so I parked in a bus stop area the first night, got lucky and didnt get a ticket. The next morning, I called local parking garages, the first two were full, some didnt offer overnight parking. I found one very close by, about a block. It cost me $170 dollars for 6 days, but my car was safe. I would stay with Agnes again but I will never drive to NYC again.

Our host was very accommodating to us throughout our stay, but also let us check in with her early in the morning to drop off our luggage and offered to let us leave our bags after check until our late departure. We had plenty of snacks in our room along with use of the kitchen and mostly had the bathroom to ourselves. Thanks again Agnes!

My daughter's review: Agnes is a lovely and professional host. She was very easy to communicate with and she gives extremely clear (and simple) instructions for check-in. I loved staying here even though it was for one day.  The home is extremely clean, my room was very large and comfortable. I appreciated the snacks when I arrived since I was starving. I appreciated the convenience of the A express train since I had to move around a lot and I had to take it to JFK after my stay. I would definitely stay here again! Thanks Agnes.

Very convenient location nearby the subway within easy access to Manhattan. Not many good places close by for dinner, so worry about it in advance. Agnes is very Hospitable and creates a home atmosphere.
Agnes is a fantastic hostess. We had a great stay!

Staying with Agnes is like staying with family. We were given the grand tour of her lovely, spacious apartment, and generously offered some goodies upon arrival. Once the basics were discussed, we were left to enjoy our room and explore Harlem with a wealth of information on the neighborhood. The building itself has an exciting history, as well as the street on which the apartment is located. If Agnes is around, allow her to enlighten you on some of those things.

Harlem is a dining mecca, and you will find no shortage of great places to eat within walking distance. We found some delicious Soul Food and live music, and even stopped to chat (and eat some more!) with a local who was barbecuing on the street. If you end up booking with Agnes, please be sure to read the Welcome Letter you receive in its entirety. There's a lot of good stuff in there. Also, make check-in arrangements ahead of time out of courtesy. Agnes schedules her day around your arrival...because that's what families do!
Agnes was very welcoming! The serta inflatable matress was perfect for my son.

Todo bien, habitación amplia y cómoda. Todo limpio y ordenado. 
El departamento está a pasos de la estación de metro, barrio muy tranquilo. Departamento ideal para dormir, tomar desayuno y salir a recorrer todo el día.
Agnes se preocupó de darnos información y atenta a cualquier solicitud nuestra.
Aire acondicionado. 
Todo super bien, recomendado.

The location was very convenient. Directions from the airport were clear. There were a lot of snacks available upon arrival. We recieved ample information on sightseeing and restaurants. The apartment was very clean. I would definitely recommend Agnes as a host!

Unfortunately Agnes wasn't the most polite person when we met. Didn't want to let us initially as I didn't respond to her text message which she sent when we were on the plane. 
Floor in our room, kitchen and bathroom was dirty and there was also a broken toilet .
Towels and bed were clean. Agnes provided us with food for breakfast.
Staying with Agnes was great! She is very friendly and her place is the best.
Agnes was very helpful and generous with her kitchen. Responsive about arrangements. She can be very particular about her house rules, however, and expects you to know all of them.
Agnes was a great host, very helpful and kind. We will definitely recommend her to others.
It was a good location and close to the subway.

Agnes was a fantastic host and really made our experience in New York a special one. The location is amazing for transit access and Agnes really works hard to run her space as professionally as possible. Highly recommended!
Great host! Very welcoming and responsive in a lovely apartment

Agnes was very welcoming and made the stay great. She provided water, snacks, and toiletry amenities that I thought was cool. The location is really close to a couple subway entrances so it was a convenient location. Would definitely recommend.
Agnes is a very good host. She provided useful information prior our stay and helped us have a good experience in New York. Thank you
Comfortable and very close to public transit

Agnes was a great and very well prepared host. Everything was well setup, with a well stocked kitchen and plenty of bathroom supplies. The bed and entire apartment were very clean. Newcomers to New York like me might not be used to the radiator heating and the noise it makes, but we adapted soon enough.
Very accommodating with toiletries and sightseeing advice.

Agnes was a really friendly and accommodating host! We were overwhelmed with all the stuff provided, especially all that food for breakfast! The room was easily accessible by the subway which was really convenient. Thank you for the amazing stay Agnes!

Agnes is an outstanding host going far beyond and behind regular expectations. The rooms were well equipped as described. Some changes that are not being reflected (eg slightly different bed) where exactly being described during personell communication. Agnes is caring a lot for her guests and equipped us not only with snacks and drinks, and also took care of laundry. She made sure the room got cleaned every couple of days during our 10 days stay.  Prior to our arrival we were staffed with information on how to use public transports and approximative charges for shuttle or taxi transfers. There is a subway station only a few footsteps away from the building, which made it easy to get Downton from Harlem to the City Center.  She was always accessible and answered any arising questions. So we were able to enjoy our time in New York to a maximum extend, well equipped with additional informations, sometimes even supplementary information about New York sights and activities. The house itself is nice and neighborhood very friendly. We felt literally at home abroad. There is a kitchen and living room that can be used during the time of the stay.

here are a few things that i liked and disliked about Agnes's.
- what i like
1. comfy beds
2. plenty of foods
3. warm heater
4. lots of info
- what i dislike
1. had to take off shoes but there were sand on the floor 
2. the host was staying in the living room all the time (day and night)

Agnes has been a great host, hope everybody who wants to go to Harlem can stay in her place.
The room was quite comfortable, there were all types of snacks for you to eat, there was water, sodas, everything you needed was there. It's been a real pleasure!

Our host was very abrasive and rude when we first met. Although she did lighten up later in the day. She ended up being friendly and offered her food, kitchen and common areas to us. The apartment was in a great location, close to public transit and restaurants. 

Cons: the bed was hard and uncomfortable. 
-the pictures advertised showed a TV in the room, there was no TV. 
-the restroom is within walking distance of the room, but used as a common restroom between other guests.

The place was great, and Agnes was very friendly. Would def contact her again if im in the area. The area was very accessible, close to public trans. Before arriving I was given so many directions to restraunts and cafes which helped out so much. Thank you Agnes!!
The room is really good as much as the price.
Quite place to stay for the night. The host was very nice and included a lot of free ammenities.

Agnes was very thoughtful, she gave us all the information about New York city history, transportation and restaurants. She provided snacks, water, juice, tea and some other treats and a great breakfast. She  was concerned if we were heaving a nice time. It was my first time using airbnb and I had the best first impression, because she received me and my boyfriends with a nice  early check in, the place was very clean, our bedroom was confortable, neiborhood was very save and calm, and has all these food options close to Agne's home, also is next to a subway station.
Modest accommodation with very good public transport.

Agnes is a very good host, she's kind, gentle, patient and comprensive! Her house is cleaned and with everything you need, she'll give you lot of informations, food and all the necessary for the toilette (toothpast included)! The major part of the morning we've find fresh bagel and muffin! 
She change our towel and bed 3 times in 9 days!!
Our journey has been amazing! We'll came back in this airbnb for sure!!

Thank you Agnes!!!

What can I say? Agnes is a gem. Her personal touches to the room are rare to find with most bookings. She has a plethora of information available to you. Apartment is very clean and the location is not too far from downtown Manhattan. Minutes away from the subway.

If you're looking for somewhere to stay in NYC, book with Agnes!  The room/apartment was very clean, and included complimentary snacks and breakfast (fresh bagels!).  Agnes offered good suggestions for restaurants and things to do in the area, and was very accessible by phone.
房主真的人非常好,我们晚上到达,还专门出去买了饮用水给我们｡房间很干净,准备了很多食物和日用品,很周到细致｡
Very gracious host

Wir haben eine Woche bei Agnes während unseres Nyaufenthaltes gewohnt und sind sehr, sehr zufrieden! Es war unsere erste Erfahrung mit Airbnb und es hätte unserer Meinung nach nicht besser sein können.  Agnes wohnt sehr nah an einer Ubahnstation ( ca
2 min zu Fuß) und vor allem Nachts ist es sehr ruhig und man fühlt sich Rund um die Uhr wirklich sicher, was uns persönlich auch sehr wichtig war.
Agnes ist eine sehr freundliche und offene Person, sie gibt viele Informationen (auch im Voraus schon) und hilft bei jedem Problem/Fragen; die Kommunikation via Medien verläuft sehr schnell und ohne Komplikationen. 
An den Essensvorräten aus der Küche kann man sich jederzeit bedienen und es ist auch immer genügend von allem da.
Agnes bemüht sich sehr alles sauber zu halten, was ihr auch gelingt!
Wir würden auf jeden Fall wieder zu Agnes kommen!
La cama super cómoda, baño muy limpio y desayuno super variado. Agnes ayuda mucho y nos informó de todo lo que hay alrededor.
Agnes was a great host who made sure her guests could have the chance to live like a local during their visit! The place was clean and comfy, and made us feel safe.

Agnes an amazing host. She made traveling alone in an unfamiliar place amazing easy. Was always helpful with suggestions and tips on how to get around. The room was stocked with complementary snacks and beverages which was an awesome touch. 

Place was very conveniently located, right off the A train which made it easy to get around town and easy to make it back. Will totally look to book this place if/when I travel to NY again. Easily the best host I've ever had
Mycket bra boende. Värden tillhandahöll snacks, drycker, frukost, handdukar, tandborstar etc. Väldigt trevlig värd. Bra kommunikation. Det enda som var negativt var att wi-fi inte riktigt fungerade.

logement bien situé dans un quartier sympa. Bouche de métro à tout juste deux minutes qui nous amène à Manhattan en 1/4 d'heure 20 minutes.
La chambre mise à disposition nous convenait parfaitement. Grande, propre et calme.

Conforme à la description et scrupuleusement propre,  la chambre est calme et tres bien située à moins de cent mètres du métro.   La propriétaire est très présente  et a beaucoup de suggestions sur les points d interet

The apartment is well connected by Subway. We feel fortunate to get this place at the last minute. Agnes had a wide range of breakfast food available which made the stay  easy with our 3 year old. 

Thanks again, Agnes!

The location of the appartement is great. Very close to the metro and very hygiënic and nice. The neigbourhood has good restaurants like The Grange and Farafina (with jazz on monday). A good appartment in wonderfull New York.
Agnes is a great host. The room is clean and the queen size bed is such comfortable
Fine place

Si eres nuevo en Airbnb no dudes en hospedarte con Agnes, ella tiene mucha experiencia y te sentirás como en casa. Su departamento es mejor que las fotos y  te regala desayuno, botana. Ella estuvo siempre disponible para todas nuestras dudas y mensajes. Adicional cuido de nuestras maletas porque el vuelo salía más tarde y siempre fue muy amable. Definitivamente la recomiendo. Un consejo es tomar shutter si llegan muy noche, nosotros nos aventuramos en irnos en metro y cuando es tu primera vez en New York el metro es muy complicado y de noche más. Feliz viaje!

Agnes is a wonderful host. She was communicative, provided exhaustive information about any query & extremely helpful. We had a personal thing & couldn't check in until late at night. Agnes was very cooperative & understanding about it and made our short stay comfortable. Thanks, Agnes!

Agnes is very nice, her plaice is clean and lovely. Location is great, subway satiation is only 2 mins walk from her apartment. We have everything we needed, and she even provided us with various kinds of beverages and snacks. The only thing is that we have three people, and there were 2 other guests next door during our stay, we sort of fought over the bathroom a bit, but it was manageable.

We have loved staying in Agnes' appartment. From the chocolates on arrival, to all the tips on where to go, what to do, we were very grateful. Agnes is very attentive to everyone's need and is very knowledgeable on the area and New York in general. The appartment is literally 2 min away from the subway, the area is very safe : we have loved walking the streets of Harlem on a Sunday morning!
Agnes was a great host. She was very helpful and answered all our questions with great accuracy.
Nice room, close to public transport and a very friendly host.

Agnes was a fantastic host and went above and beyond what most hosts would provide. The amenities and food provided were really great and Agnes was most helpful in answering our queries and meeting our needs. Definitely would stay with Agnes next time!

Agnes's place was very neat clean and very accessible to transportation and local eateries. The room itself was a good size and well-laid out, although just little sparse design-wise. Agnes  was the perfect host; she went out of her way to make me feel comfortable including providing lots of snacks and getting a couple of extra items for me to make my stay more pleasant. I felt genuinely safe. It was extremely easy to get around Manhattan by public transit and taxi from her place. I would stay there again in a heartbeat!

Agnes is super helpful! Our flight got delayed 4 times and we ended up showing up at 2am and she was very understanding about it. The room & the rest of the apartment is clean and she has snacks provided.

Definitivamente recomiendo a Agnes, la casa es muy limpia , con todas las comodidades , desayuno , lavandería , te deja cosas ricas para comer en el cuarto.. a 1 cuadra está el subte y es muy fácil moverse a todos lados .. ella es muy hospitalaria brindando información, entiende español .. nos hemos sentido como en casa .. esperamos volver pronto !

I'm happy the building has an elevator! The home is around the corner from a subway station, Duane Reade and several small shops. It's very likely you'll come across something of interest just by walking through the neighborhood.

Agnes put a lot of thought into what travelers may need. There's an assortment of snacks and beverages in the room. All linens are fresh or new. Toiletries are available as well. She provides detailed information about her neighborhood and the city prior to your arrival. She's approachable and friendly. Agnes is also fluent in at least three other languages. No matter where you're from or your reason for visiting NYC, I feel she's relatable to most people.

this is a great place with a wonderful host. the area is so cool and also very close to the subway which will take you anywhere you want to go. we  traveled with our 4 year old daughter and it was perfect. the place lived up to all our expectaions. thank you :)
初めてAirbnbを使っての宿泊で不安でしたが､Agnesさんから親切にいろいろと教えていただき助かりました｡部屋も想像以上に広くﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑもとても綺麗でした｡また地下鉄の駅からも近く空港やﾏﾝﾊｯﾀﾝ中心部にもｱｸｾｽがとても良いです｡
Agnes provided to us one of the best airbnb I've seen in months, clean, very quiet, she provided everything that we might need, I clearly recommend her! And Thank you again! Pierre

Agnes was an AMAZING host!!! She goes above and beyond her duties as a host. She is super friendly and extremely helpful. Her description of amenities and location are %100 accurate.  I'll definitely look her up for my next stay in NYC.

This has been, hands down, one of our BEST Airbnb stays. If you're headed to NYC, it doesn't get better than staying at Agnes's place. The apartment is located just a two-minute walk to the subway, and you're just three quick stops from Time Square! My family and I drove in from CT and I was particularly worried about having to pay for parking, especially since Agnes's place is in the city. Nope! Free street parking, which was so great for us! Also, Agnes is a wonderful host! Everything she described was exactly what we got, and then some. Want breakfast? The kitchen is completely available to you. Want information about the city? Agnes has it! She was even so sweet as to buy our 1.5 year-old son chocolate milk!

If you're headed to NYC, this is where you want to be. We will DEFINITELY stay here again.

Great location and very safe. Agnes is a great email communicator and will answer all your questions. Lots of complimentary items are provided as Agnes has thought well about hosts. Full use of kitchen is allowed. Thanks, Agnes

This was my first experience with staying at an AirBnB and I was a little nervous as to what to expect. First I will address the actual apartment. 

Very very clean! I can not stress this enough. Yes, you must take off your shoes before entering. House rules. I stayed in the first bedroom for 10 nights. I was provided 6 towels (3 per person) and our sheets were washed twice during our stay. On the table in the bedroom was a supply of beverages, snacks, and toothpaste/mouthwash/toothbrushes. Some of these drinks were very nice and definitely above what you will get anywhere else. Agnes also provided a gallon of water at the start, and actually kept replacing it as we used the water. 

Every day I noticed the bathroom being cleaned. By the way, Agnes provides a host of shampoos/body washes/bar soap. 

The kitchen has a supply of breakfast foods, some very very nice, for guests. This was such a treat to have some fruit and the option of bagels and eggs and organic foods there. 

I have seen some reviews mention that Agnes was not very friendly. I don't know how they could have gotten that impression at all, unless perhaps they were not used to the New York briskness that some people there have. She was an incredible host, very accommodating with check in Times. She constantly provided us with ideas and suggestions of places to see and restaurants to visit and even gave us some of the history/trivia of the areas around the city. I was genuinely welcomed and happy to stay in her home. 

For a neat freak like me, I was thrilled with how clean the apartment was. I was so happy to have a taste of the real 'New Yorker' experience. 

I would completely recommend this place to anyone wanting a safe place to stay. I was nervous about staying in Harlem but truly to neighborhood was incredible. I felt safe and completely comfortable, even as a small town gal from Alaska. 

Ten out of ten, would stay here again!! I highly recommend this place to everyone!!

Estuvimos hospedados en el departamento de Agnes y todo estuvo excelente. Muchas cosas ricas para disfrutar en la habitacion y para desayunar bien completo! Muy bien ubicado a la vuelta del metro que te lleva para todos lados. Si tenemos la suerte de volver iremos nuevamente a lo de Agnes! Gracias Totales
Appartement propre est trés bien situé. L'appartement est propre est conforme a la description. Agnes est une hôte agréable et trés arrangeante.
値段もお手頃できれいなお部屋でした!
Great location. The subway is around the corner from the apartment. The place is extremely clean and the hostess is all the time in the apartment taking care of everything.

Agnes' home was very pleasant to stay in. She left a lot of consumables in the room including soda and snacks which she very kindly provided for free. The actual room was spacious and served us well for a night.
Agnes herself is nice, but we found her communication poor as there was some issues regarding our check-in time. She was rather brisk in her messages which left us feeling slightly awkward but, after that slight mishap, it was otherwise a pleasant stay.
Nos ha encantado el trato de agnes,todo excelente,limpieza etc... sin duda voveriamos otra vez.

The room is quiet, private, and very clean. AC was awesome since it was very hot. Agnes also provides complementary snacks, beverages, breakfast, and toiletries. Subway stop is just around the corner making it easy to get around.
Agnes is a great host, she solved our questions whenever we need it and the room was perfect as well, the most helpful thing is that the Subway was super close to the place, I highly recommend her :)
No se puede ingresar al alojamiento con zapatos

Agnes goes above and beyond.  Place is ver simple, but perfect if you’re planning to be out doing NYC stuff all day and night.  Agnes is accommodating to arrival and departure challenges.  She provides lots of snacks and helpful stuff, along with exact directions for getting around.  Not a luxury stay, but great for the intrepid traveller looking for a place to sleep and clean up.

予約してから実際に泊まるまで､とても丁寧にやり取りしてくれました(空港から家までの行き方や､早めのﾁｪｯｸｲﾝ方法など)｡
部屋は綺麗で､ﾍﾞｯﾄﾞも大きくぐっすり眠れました｡
駅から部屋まで歩いてすぐ着いて､ﾏﾝﾊｯﾀﾝまで1本で行けたのも魅力的でした｡
また､空港に帰るまでも電車のｱﾄﾞﾊﾞｲｽをしてくれて､とても良かったです｡
英語に自信なくても､何度も説明してくれるので､安心して泊まれると思います｡

From reservation to actual staying, we interacted very carefully (directions from the airport to the house, early check - in method etc).
The room was beautiful and the bed was sound and sleepy.
It was attractive to be able to reach by foot to Manhattan just after walking from the station to the room.
Also, I advised the train till I got back to the airport, it was very good.
Even though I am not confident in English, I will explain it over and over so that I think I can stay with confidence.

It was ok. The room was dusty, but big and spaceous. Good connection to the subway. A short walk to the supermarket. Good breakfast included. We did not know there would be other people renting a room in the apartment at the same time, and would have appreciated a heads up. Overall it was ok for that price.
Agnes provided us with all the information we need to come and get around the city. Her house is spotlessly clean, and the free snack are awesome. Will stay here again next time coming to NYC.
Agnes was extremely detailed and efficient in her communication. She gave us all the information we needed to get around and be comfortable. The location was perfect for us.
Comfortable room, so many snacks, foods and drinks, clean bathroom, helpful suggestion.Agnes is very nice!

The room is very clean, comfortable and have so many snacks and drinks! Breakfast option is included and so many things to eat and to take! Agnes is so kind and helpful, she gave us a lot of recommendations! Subway is around the corner and it takes to central park 10min and to the times square 15min! I really recommend this place! :-)
Le logement est propre, les règles sont claires, et Agnes donne plusieurs informations sur les diverses activités.

Agnes was the best host we could expect. She provided absolutely everything we needed and a lot more. It was just a 1-day stay but she made sure we felt we were home. The bed is so comfy I can’t even describe.

Great location, easily accessible by subway. Very quiet and tidy. Agnes was very helpful with directions and letting us know about different attractions. 
Over all my mom and I had a great stay! I'd recommend this place to anyone:)
Todo muy limpio y gran hospitalidad por parte de Agnes. Barrio muy tranquilo y situación excepcional en relación al transporte público.

Recomendable!

Aunque tuvimos un contratiempo con el elevador; la habitación, la atención y la ubicación merecen la pena.

Gracias Agnes! :)

I️ stayed in NYC for about 8 nights. The room was very neat and tidy, Agnes cleaned the room after about 4 days & steam cleaned the blankets. There was complimentary coffee, tea, and breakfast. Also, plenty of snacks and soda/water in the room. Thank you Agnes for welcoming my best friends and I️ into your home, we had a pleasant stay.

Agnes was very accommodating and a thoughtful host. She made sure we knew all about the neighborhood, and put some snacks and our own jug of water in the room. It was very clean and quiet and the neighborhood was great and central to many shops and the subway

If you need a small but comfy place to stay with all the required amenities while on a short trip. I would highly recommend it. The neighborhood around is quiet, but you're 5 mins away from a (Website hidden by Airbnb) case you need the noise.

Durant la nostra estada a NY enshem allotjat a a casa l'Agnes. Les fotos no tenen res a veure amb la realitat. 

Primer de tot, erem 4 i ens va posar en una habitació per a dues persones. Dos de nosaltres van haver de dormir durant 5 nits en dos llits inflàbles súper incòmodes. 

La calefecció estava espatllada i a dins a l'habitació estavem a 26 graus. Amés, feia moltíssim soroll i costava molt poder dormir. 

El vidre de la finestra està petat i hi ha posat un cartró per tal de tapar-ho una mica. 

També cal remarcar que nosaltres ens pensavem que al pis hi estariem sols, i l'Agnes hi viu, amés també hi havia una altra habitació amb més gent. 

Tornarem a NY segur! Però no a casa de l'Agnès!!

La habitación es amplia y cómoda para llegar a dormir luego de un día de turismo. El baño es muy limpio, Agnes es muy clara y atenta, yo solo alojé mi última noche allá, es un poco lejos del turismo pero la línea de metro es buena para ir al aeropuerto JFK.
Its was a great stay with very nearby to subway .. exactly 3 mins walk

Agnes hosts a large apartment located in Harlam. It is less than a minute walk to the subway which was very convienient with subways that can quickly get into manhatten. The whole apartment was well cleaned and agnes provides breakfast foods and snacks in our room. Although these were very nice touches it didn’t quite make us feel at home. Agnes was so tense and is not the air bnb you want if you want a laid back host. However, because we were out most of the day and night it suited us just fine and would definitely recommend staying there to friends and family.

As much as I would like to keep this place and Agnes as the best kept secret on Airbnb, I can't and won't. Agnes as a host has gone above and beyond keeping me and another guest, well fed, well looked after and all while in a super clean and great environment. She came through for us when my friend got sick during the trip. Simply put, she's probably the best... Anyways, best I've ever had so far!

Agnes was the best!! Her place is in a very convenient location. Very accommodating. Knowledgeable! Taught me a few things!  I loved everything about my stay here! She’ll be my go to anytime I’m in New York.
Good place for exploring NY, only three stops to Manhattan with subway.
A lakás jó elhelyezésű, közel a metróhoz, biztonságos környéken. Tiszta házigazda, kissé barátságtalan szoba, nem elég barátságos légkör.

Agnes es una excelente anfitriona, su casa es de una limpieza increíble, inmejorable ubicación y los detalles de Agnes hacen de su casa un perfecto sitio para pasar algunos días en New York. La recomendos ampliamente .

Gracias Agnes .
La zona donde se localiza el departamento es tranquila.

Excelente lugar, excelente atención, Agnes es excelente anfitriona con la disposición siempre de ayudar. Es un lugar cómodo, limpio y con buena ubicación. El desayuno ofrecido es excelente para dar inicio a las actividades planeadas en NYC, sin duda me encanto y lo recomiendo ampliamente.
I can recommend her because the place is so clean, comfortable and she is a good helper, you don't need to bring nothing she give you the basic things.

Agnes is super nice. Her place is quiet, safe and very close to the subway. Her kitchen and bathroom  basically have everything we need. She provided detailed guide and local info for us. She is kind and helpful and super easy-going. I will suggest my friends staying here when travelling NYC.

For our first time using Air bnb, Agnes provided a great experience which we will look to use again in the future. Agnes was very friendly and always available to provide tips and recommendations for things to see and do. The apartment is located conveniently by the metro and just a short trip down to Times Square. Highly recommend!

Location is  perfect, really close to metro station and many lines going downtown. Agnes definitely makes the difference, she's nice and caring. The apartment is big enough so you don't feel uncomfortable, she manages the using of the bathroom with the other room that is for rent. I mean, if you usually have a shower in the morning she tells the other people to do it in the afternoon. I would definitely come back, and I recommend everyone to stay with Agnes!

Agnes es encantadora,super atenta y servicial,no le falta ninguna detalle a la casa,a la llegada teníamos nuestra habitación lista tal y como sale en las fotos y con nuestra botella de agua galletas chocolatinas patatas fritas etc puestas en nuestra mesilla,también con nuestros cepillos de dientes y su pasta dentifrica.los desayunos son de gran variedad,tiene de todo.La limpieza es increible... tiene todo super super limpio... se podria comer en el suelo!!!la ubicación de la casa es  buena pues tiene el metro a escasos 200metros del portal y es línea directa pasando por las zonas de más influencia en (Website hidden by Airbnb) volvemos a NY sin duda repetiremos en su casa si ella nos deja!!

Encontramos un lugar excelente, Agnes nos atendio de maravilla, ubicacion muy buena a 2 cuadras del metro, 20 minutos de Time Square, limpieza tanto en la habitacion como en el resto de la casa. Muy recomendable.

Es nuestra segunda estadía en el mismo lugar  y sin dudas seguiríamos yendo .Harlem es un barrio muy lindo para conocer . Cerca de transporte público. Sin dudas Volvería a la casa de Agnes. Gracias por todo !
The house is very well located and quiet. I stayed with my husband, my sister and my 1 year and 5 month old daughter and had no problems. I recommend to new guests

reasonable price 
good location 
fast response 
good kitchen by self cooked 
good enough information provided
Agnes is nice, very good location, close to subway, room is very clean.

El servicio es muy bueno, ya que cuenta con elementos suficientes para hacer desayuno, las habitaciones son limpias y el departamento está muy bien ubicado. 

Lo malo es que si por error no entiendes una de las reglas que te da, ella se molesta.
Agnes was a fantastic host! I definitely recommend her!

I’m sad to say that this was not a good experience for me nor my friend, and this was her very first experience with Air B&B and her First trip to New York City. To have a host that was not friendly or barely communicated was a little odd especially when she was home all day and right down the hall. We had to remove our shoes at all times yet the floors where so dirty we had to constantly wipe off our feet or pull off the debris before placing our shoes on. Our room did not look like the photos, a TV was shown and one was not there. Yes snacks where provided and appreciated but that does not make up for the fact that we felt ignored when I would call her and be sent to voicemail. We were also suppose to be given WiFi which was also never obtained the entire trip. Will I return..unlikely.
Great stay. Highly recommend!

my recommendation is that if you guys are going to new york or if you want to  stay  i think this is best place,best location. subway is pretty close . thanks for your service agnes . we will come back soon;

The place is great. Lot of food options for breakfast and nice spacious room and very clean bathroom. Wifi was not proper in some areas.But she very well coordinated with us and was flexible on check -in and check-out.
Super fast reply! Great room. Great host!
Perfect host. Quiet and safe neighborhood. Great breakfast. 20 min from city center by subway (very close subway stations, just around the corner). Thanks for everything!!!

Agnes loves her neighborhood and is generous with her knowledge about landmarks, history and restaurants. Likewise, she is very knowledgeable about various places of interest throughout New York and how to get to anywhere you need to go. She made us feel at home in her apartment. We would gladly stay there next time we are in New York. Thanks Agnes!

Agnes es una excelente anfitriona ; te ofrece opciones para un desayuno ligero en su departamento  ; lo cual no había visto con otros anfitriones . El lugar es muy cómodo y agradable. Además ella habla un español fluido que nos fue muy útil en la comunicación .
El departamento es muy cerca del Metro y sin duda me volvería a hospedar.

Agnes is such a gracious host! The home is very clean and she offers great amenities. It's such a close distance to the subway, so it's in a prime location! Definitely recommend this place if you're visiting NYC!

아이들과 머무를 곳이라 할렘의 치안이 걱정되었지만, 도착해보니 동네가 한국만큼  안전하며, 무엇보다도 지하철 역에서 2분 거리로 가까와 편리했습니다.  청결을 중요시하는 Agnes 덕분에 깨끗하게 소독된 침구에서 안락하게 지낼 수 있었습니다. 무릎을 다쳐 움직이기 어려웠음에도 불구하고, Agnes는 최선을 다해주어서 대단히 만족스러웠습니다. 지하철 노선도 좋아서 관광을 다니기 쉬웠습니다. 와이파이 신호음이 약하다는 것 말고는 흠 잡을 데 없이 완벽한 숙소였습니다. 친절한 호스트로 오래 기억될 것 같습니다. 다음에 뉴욕을 방문하게 된다면 또 머무르고 싶습니다.
Un parfait emplacement malgré qu'il semble éloigné car nombreux métros et bus à proximité qui vous emmènent rapidement aux sites de New York.
Great place, friendly & accommodating host!
This was my first Airbnb. Everything went great and my expectations were exceeded. Would definitely recommend Agnes and will use Airbnb in the future because of my first impression.
Agnes was very kind and excelentt person. The departament was clean and confortable. Excelente persona y el departamento tenia todo lo indispensable
Agnes is very nice and considerate. She offers snacks and drinks for us. Her apartment is very clean and only 3 minutes to subway. Great experience! Thank you so much!
Agnes was a great host and provided every thing possible to make my stay enjoyable

Agnes is an extraordinary host. She goes above and beyond to make sure you have everything you need, from complimentary things like toiletries to all the information you need about the city, transportation, restaurants, etc. She is very responsive with the questions we had. She also cleans everything really well. The room and bathroom are very clean and having breakfast provided was a great perk. She also is fun to talk to. She really made it a great experience for us. The location also felt safe—we were walking up and down the streets in the area. Great experience—highly recommend.

Agnes' location is wonderful. Extremely clean, wonderful location, and easy to access. Neighbourhood is safe and subway is easy to access. Agnes herself is friendly and knowledgeable. My only complaint is that the wifi signal in our room was unstable, but that's hardly the host's fault. Can't recommend this place enough!

Agnes is an excellent host! Once you've booked her place, she'll send you a rather long but very helpful list of details, reminders and tips about her apartment and the neighborhood. Location is also great as it is very close to multiple subway stations. The room is larger than most you'll see for the price you'll pay. The bathroom is very clean and is full of toiletries and toilet paper available for use. Plus, there is also FREE breakfast, huge bottled water, and chocolates!
everything was fine but only 2 things were not as I expected, the mattress is not comfortable and the bathroom is not private and in the publication dics something else. but everything is fine.

L'apartament a part de ser molt més lluny del centre del que es diu, el bany es compartit.
L'apartament no és gens comode en molt sentits.
Una mala experiència que desitjem no tinguin altres viatjers.
Excellent host and very very clean apartament.

Excelente lugar, en un barrio tranquilo pero seguro. Cuenta con muy buenas comodidades. 
Cómo todo NY, llegas en metro desde el Aeropuerto y de ahí hacia todos los lugares turísticos! 
La limpieza es adecuada, cuentas con servicio de agua, te, café y desayuno lo que hace que te ahorres unos dólares! 
Un detalle muy pequeño es que la señal de Wifi en la primera habitación no llega de manera adecuada, pero nada que no se solvente saliendo al pasillo 
Agnes es una muy buena anfitriona. 
Recomiendo ampliamente el lugar.

Muy bien ubicado, a pesar de que queda en la parte norte de la isla tienes acceso a varias estaciones que en cuestion de minutos uno puede llegar a la zona turistica o volver a casa facilmente. Muy limpio y muy acorde a lo que uno ve en fotos.
a good host,her room is very clean and comfortable

Amazing!!!! Agnes was so helpful, kind and accommodating. The place is super clean and peaceful. Everything I needed for a comfortable stay was there and more! The abundance of breakfast options were a plus. This was simply amazing. Thank you.
Agnes's place is in a great location and the apartment is very clean and nice.
This is a great place to stay a night

Agnes es muy atenta, servicial, clara con la información y no tiene problema en hablar de lo que sea. En cuanto a la habitación es lo que se ve en las imágenes. Tiene todo lo necesario para una estadía larga. Estuvimos 9 noches sin problemas. Comodos. El barrio es muy tranquilo. El metro esta a una cuadra y realmente a 15 minutos de toda la actividad de NY.  Viajamos a toda hora incluso a las 3 am y había mucha gente en el barrio. 100% recomendable. Volveríamos sin dudarlo.

Agnes's place was a perfect home base for my NYC adventures, and her hospitality made it even more so. Agnes wa a great communicator; with all the information she sent before my trip, I was prepared and knew exactly what to expect, particularly about location and transportation. The neighborhood was great - plenty of food and other necessities within a block or so, and the train station really is just around the corner! That part was really important to me, and I was not disappointed with the ease of navigating the neighborhood, nor with amount of time it took to get into midtown, Times Square, etc. Given the opportunity, I would definitely stay with Agnes again!

Tudo muito tranquilo , a Agnes eh muito prestativa , local muito perto do metro q liga toda cidade , prédio um pouco antigo mas nada demais tudo limpo , melhorar só um pouco o café mas eh costume deles eu acho só tinha ovo e bacon e torradas
it was more than I expected. she is really nice. it is also close to the subway station

La ubicación del apartamento es muy buena, a la vuelta de la esquina está el Subway y pasan varias estaciones del metro, que conecta con todo y funciona las 24 hras. El vecindario es muy seguro, así que no importa la hora a la que se llegue. Agnes es una excelente anfitriona y muy amable,  te proporciona toda la información que requieras, te sugiere restaurantes y te avisa si alguna línea del subway estará cerrada por mantenimiento. En el apartamento hay muchas cosas ricas para desayunar y además en la habitación hay snacks y diferentes bebidas para disfrutar. La calefacción y el agua caliente son excelentes (por si van en tiempo de frío ).
Agnes was a great host. Place is clean, safe and in a great location.
Lugar limpio, con acceso a metro en menos de 5 minutos caminando, barrio tranquilo, todas sus indicaciones muy precisas, el lugar tal cual está en las imágenes.

Todo es tal como lo anuncia, la ubicación es excelente, a unos cuantos pasos del metro. Es muy fácil llegar a todos los puntos importantes, es una zona muy segura y Agnes siempre está con una sonrisa.
Agnes foi super gentil desde que chegamos até a hora de ir embora. Enviou todas as informações via airbnb. O quarto era extremamente limpo, assim como o banheiro.
Good clean place with a great host sharing useful local tips of the area. Great decent place for a good stay ! Highly recommended !!
My two teenage kids and I had an ok stay with Agnes. The amenities are fine and the location is great it’s just the host can be a bit awkward to be around.
Agnes is a great host and the location is just a few steps always from getting the subway and in just minutes your visiting iconic New York spots

The place is located very near a subway, which takes you directly and easily pretty much anywhere you’d like to go. Agnes provides a lot of information and many unrequired amenities, and quickly responds to any message. We had an issue with the radiator in the bedroom, with it being extremely hot, steaming, and spitting, as well as very noisy, making it difficult to sleep. However, Agnes seems to have fixed this issue.

Agnes’s home was perfect for me and my friend. The room was clean and private. 
Kitchen was stocked to the brim with anything we could want. 
She gave us many information about the area and help with directions. 
Would recomend to everyone.

This was my very first Airbnb experience, so I have nothing to judge this against. However, the two big points are:  

1) that I stayed one night at the end of January and the room was sweltering hot and barely cooled down in the 12 hours I was there. The heating unit was a radiator, which I've never had experience with. The Airbnb app delayed my messages to the host or something because she didn't see them until much later, after which she did adjust the heating. 

And 2) The room is in an apartment building in Washington Heights. Having never been to New York, it was a personal lack of knowledge/experience that meant I didn't know distances between things or where all the action is or which are touristy places. But three Uber drivers and several personal friends made me feel really uncomfortable about having to stay there. 

However, neither of these things are really in the host's control. Its more of Airbnb's side on the location and app shortcomings. (And some people might appreciate an 85° room when it's 40 outside)

On the plus side, 1) everything seemed clean, freshly laundered, etc., 2) this host allows you to leave your luggage with her before check-in, which was great and 90% of the reason I chose her, 3) it sounded like she cleaned the bathroom between guests taking showers, 4) there were snacks and drinks available in the personal bedroom, and I believe? the kitchen was there for guests to use freely, 5) the bed is at a height easily accessible to children and the elderly, and 6) the host seemed friendly and ready to accommodate and answer questions.

La habitación que te provee es cómoda, la conexión a internet es mala desde la habitación por lo cual tienes que salir siempre al pasillo para tener una mejor recepción, los detalles que deja en la habitación son fenomenales como bebidas, dulces, snacks y elementos de aseo.


En general es una estadía cómoda a buen precio, el sector es alejado de los sitios turísticos de NY pero nada que el metro no pueda solucionar.

We have stayed in many airbnb spaces over the years, and this one has been truly outstanding. From the detailed historical information about the neighborhood and local transportation options, to a full range of food and beverage amenities, to clear and accurate communications, and a superb level of cleanliness, Agnes is truly a super-host! Great location, great value, great place to stay in NYC.

Apartment is really great and great location also. The owner is really kind, bedroom and bathroom is clean, she has 2 room for guest, has 1 bathroom with toilet and 1 toilet, so you have to share only bathroom with other guest. 

Agnes provide many kind of breakfast that I never seen from other airbnb host, eggs milk bread, many kind of sereal coffee and tea. Kitchen was clean and has many equipment. 

Metro is around the corner not far from apt. Agnes will give all direction information you needs to go to apt. 

I really recommend this place.

Agnes was  so kindness , she made me feel so special guest. My wife and I enjoyed a great time.  I highly recommended  Agnes  Place to stay. 
Thank you, 
Tomas
Agnes siempre se mostró muy atenta, cualquier duda que teníamos con gusto nos apoyaba. El departamento muy bien ubicado y en una zona muy tranquila.

I really enjoyed staying with Agnes. She is very sweet and was accommodating. It’s like going to a little hotel. She makes sure that you are comfortable and are taken care of. I will definitely be booking with Agnes when I come back!

name: Cidade Maravilhosa
summary: Nosso apartamento possui 2 quartos, 2 banheiros,  um terceiro quarto reversível. Acomoda confortavelmente 4 pessoas. Bairro central, próximo ao bondinho do corcovado a poucos minutos do centro, copacabana e do Jardim Botânico.
description: Nosso apartamento possui 2 quartos, 2 banheiros,  um terceiro quarto reversível. Acomoda confortavelmente 4 pessoas. Bairro central, próximo ao bondinho do corcovado a poucos minutos do centro, copacabana e do Jardim Botânico.

reviews.comments: Local ótimo! O Rudimar então nem se fala.... uma pessoa que todos merecem conhecer. O apartamento dispensa comentários. Obrigado e até a próxima. Grande abraço

Ap maravilhoso!  Organizado, funcional, roupa de cama e banho novinhos, decoração de bom gosto, bem
Localizado, piscininha relaxante e o anfitrião muito atencioso.
Super indico!

L'apprtement de Rudimar est très agréable dans un immeuble qui l'est tout autant. Le quartier de Laranjeiras est très sympa et facile d'accès aux autres quartiers de Rio avec un grand nombre de bus qui passent devant. Rudimar est un hôte charmant 
Une adresse à recommander.

We love this appartment because of its location (near Cristo/Corcovado) and how it's situated (2 bathrooms, 2 bedrooms and a pool). Although it lacked face-to-face contact we felt welkome and at home.

Well-located and safe flat. Friendly host that we met after our arrival. However, a few major disappointments related to the flat's features. 
The flat is stated to be for 6 people, however it is fit for no more than 4 people. There is one double bedroom with no mattress (and very hard bedspring). A second room can be made out of the living room by closing a metallic partition and consists of a couch which extends to two single mattresses on different levels. 2 additional people are supposed to sleep in a minuscule room the size of a closet, with barely enough space for two extremely unhealthy mattresses on the floor. This place is set apart from the rest of the apartment, accessible behind the kitchen, and more likely to be a laundry room than a bedroom.
We were 5, and one of us was obliged to sleep on the couch and to buy a fan for the nights (no AC in the living room once the partition is closed).

Moreover, as soon as it started raining, the open areas from the ACs began to leak inside the house

A localização do apartamento é muito boa. Muitos restaurantes, bares, bancos, supermercado. De fácil acesso para qualquer lugar do RJ. Na frente do condomínio tem ponto de taxis, ponto de ônibus. Metro próximo também, dá pra ir andando tranquilamente.
Ótima localização. Ideal para um casal.
A localização do apartamento é ótima e o bairro muito aconchegante. O apartamento é exatamente o que se vê nas fotos, bonito, limpo e organizado, muito funcional.

Rudimar was great since the first contact. Everything worked since communication untill staying at this apartment. The apartment is very cute, the pictures are very true. The building is "old fashion' but the apartment is all renewed. The neighborhood is nice too, the apartment is well located, very easy to go to the metro and take a bus. The experience was amazing, Rudimar is very nice, a easy person to talk and fast with the answers. I very highly recommend Rudimar apartment!!!
Ótima localização, apartamento ótimo
Boa localização, apartamento arejado, limpo e com um anfitrião sempre à disposição. Excelente opção e com ótimo custo-benefício. O único ponto a ser melhorado é disponibilidade de internet no imóvel.

Fuimos 4 personas, el departamento es hermoso, cómodo y muy bien ubicado. Esta a 8 cuadras del metro, que tiene varias paradas en las playas más concurridas de Río, y se puede ir caminando sin problemas. Tiene muchas tiendas y supermercados cerca. Pasamos unos muy lindos días y estuvimos muy cómodos.

Espaço excelente. Não só a localização ótima, acesso rápido para diversas localidades do rj pois o bairro ajuda, ponto de taxi praticamente 24h, farto comércio etc como o apartamento em si e nós ficamos boa parte do tempo ali.

Fica tb uma dica específica pra quem vai ter neném na PERINATAL de laranjeiras. Mais próximo que isso é instalar uma tirolesa ou dormir no saguão do hospital.

Estacionei na igreja. Valor de diária é levemente alto mas se fizer um pacote fica muito bom.

Rudimar um ótimo e simpático anfitrião.

Prédio alto e fica com pouco ruído, há tb uma linda vista para os padrôes de uma grande cidade.

Recomendo!!!

The apartment is very well located. My sisters and I felt quickly very safe in the  neighborhood. 

There are many stores and restaurants by the building. As well as a taxi station that we used every day. 

Rudimar was particularly helpful and gave great tips. I recommend this apartment!
Apartamento bem localizado, seguro, bem próximo de onde estávamos estudando, muito pratico.
O apartamento é super clean, arejado e com uma ótima energia! Super recomendo.
Sr Rudimar, sempre muito prestativo em responder prontamente nossas duvidas. Apartamento em uma localização muito bacana do Rio. Facilidade para poder acessar o apartamento.
O apartamento tem uma ótima localização e é muito confortável e agradável! Certamente me hospedaria de novo.

name: Charming Beach Cottage in Ewa Beach
summary: Newly renovated cottage in Ewa Beach, Oahu. If you seek a 'local scene' experience with private beach access, this cottage is for you! It is located in a closed community neighborhood, away from the hustle and bustle of the crowded touristy spots.
space: Charming Vintage 1947 Beach Cottage (Lepeka's Place)- recently remodeled with open floor plan.  This home away-from-home comes with 5 star amenities and ocean-beach "pocket-views" from within.  Located in a Private community, Ewa Oceanside, a lively neighborhood, seasoned with "locals" and an eclectic variety of families that is Hawaii - including active and retired military.   If you are seeking a "non-tourist" Hawaiian vacation experience, off-the-path; these amenities, in this setting, will truly provide our guests with the best opportunity to partake.
description: Newly renovated cottage in Ewa Beach, Oahu. If you seek a 'local scene' experience with private beach access, this cottage is for you! It is located in a closed community neighborhood, away from the hustle and bustle of the crowded touristy spots. Charming Vintage 1947 Beach Cottage (Lepeka's Place)- recently remodeled with open floor plan.  This home away-from-home comes with 5 star amenities and ocean-beach "pocket-views" from within.  Located in a Private community, Ewa Oceanside, a lively neighborhood, seasoned with "locals" and an eclectic variety of families that is Hawaii - including active and retired military.   If you are seeking a "non-tourist" Hawaiian vacation experience, off-the-path; these amenities, in this setting, will truly provide our guests with the best opportunity to partake. Exterior amenities include; gated  parking for two vehicles, a BBQ grill  patio with table, chairs and umbrellas, outdoor hot & cold shower. Beach items provided. Interior includes: 1 Queen
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very laid-back with a relaxed atmosphere and an Aloha feeling that is the Hawaiian tradition.  The neighbors are friendly, warm and helpful.  I know that having been my guest, you will leave Hawaii feeling that you have experienced the true meaning of "Aloha".
notes: This beach cottage was built in 1947. It has been restored and renovated.  The cottage has a vintage retro feel to it with all the modern touches.  Recent upgrades include: Samsung 55" UHD-TV (4k) w/Sony Sound Bar + sub-woofer, plus Sony Blue Ray DVD player, plus 23" HP All-in-One Touch Desktop CPU, plus MX472 Canon printer, plus 100MB/s Broadband Internet     Outdoor Shower (hot and cold water) Outdoor Patio with BBQ Grill Beach Chairs, lounge chairs, umbrella, beach towels, beach mats, cooler Shampoo, conditioner, body wash, toothpaste provided Loaded with everything you need. Welcome gift of Hawaii Coffee and Chocolate Mac Nut Candy
transit: Public transportation near by.  Supermarkets, Drug Stores, Restaurants minutes away. Centrally located.
access: Exterior amenities include; gated  parking for two vehicles, a BBQ grill  patio with table, chairs and umbrellas, outdoor hot & cold shower. Beach items provided. Interior includes: 1 Queen + 1 Full bed + sofa bed + couch, small dining table and seating for four, and a Living Rm w/seating for 6. Ewa Beach Park is one of our neighbors - just steps away with views of Diamond Head and Honolulu.  The cottage is on a private street with a exclusive beach access.
interaction: I will be in touch and available for questions.
house_rules: No smoking on the property. No pets allowed. No loud noise after 10pm weekdays- 12pm weekends Guests can entertain friends and family members but please follow the time frames for noise.

reviews.comments:
This being my first experience on airbnb, I never want to stay at a hotel when I travel. Rebecca was super fast at getting back to us with the reservation and getting back to us when we had an questions.

This cottage is neat and clean, and so close to the ocean. The neighbors made you feel welcome and a part of their family.

We had a really enjoyable stay at the beach cottage. It was charming, cozy and very comfortable. The neighbors were friendly and welcoming. With the cottage just steps from the beach, we enjoyed a beautiful Hawaiian sunrise every morning with Diamond head on the horizon and the occasional rainbow over our shoulders. Rebecca was very helpful and communicative. I would definitely stay here again.

Rebecca is an excellent host.  Her communication with me before and during my stay was incredible.  She followed up with me many times to make sure I was comfortable.  She made me feel very welcome and I felt like a priority.  

The cottage is very nice and very clean.  It has a front yard and a grill in case you want to enjoy dinner outside.  Inside is plenty large enough and decorated nicely.  

The neighbors are extremely friendly.  I had the priviledge to get to know them and spent many evenings hanging out and talking with them.  I was even invited to a BBQ.  If you stay here I would recommend you be open to talking to the neighbors because it really enhanced my stay.  I cannot think of anywhere I stayed where I was so welcomed into a community.

The cottage is wonderful! Just 20meters or less beside the sea. Across the road its a very good golf course. It's very easy to find also~unless u r very stupid : P! Very comfortable stay ~friendly neighborhood ~Rebacca is very thoughtful and caring ~thank u!

Our experience with Rebecca was wonderful. She maintained consistent contact with us throughout our journey and made us feel very comfortable. The house itself was very tidy and cute. Very close to the private beach  and the locals were very friendly.
The reservation was canceled 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This was my first Airbnb experience and I am so glad to say that everything was wonderful! 
The cottage looked ever better then in the pics and had everything I needed to make my stay comfortable including wifi and high def TV.  Rebecca embodied the Aloha spirit and made sure that I was comfortable had what I needed. The cottage is literally 1/2 block to the ocean.
