I had enjoyed my staying tremendously. Kristine was generous, kind, and a superb welcoming host.  She was responsive and attentive to my questions and needs, and allowed me to check out a bit later, which I appreciated very much. The apartment is spacious, cozy, stylish. The bed was so comfortable, and personally I love this area.  Highly recommended!

Kristine was an amazing host. She was always quick to respond to texts and was very flexible when it came to check in and check out times.

The space is incredible! It’s spacious and was very stylish. 

The location ended up being great for us. We felt close to everywhere we wanted to visit and getting to the subway was never an issue.

Thanks for everything, Kristine!
Thanks for being a great host Kristine and for the home brewed coffee too! My first with airbnb and you definitely made it a great one. Thank you again.
It was an awesome stay. The room is cozy and feels like home. Kristine is very nice and helpful. Thank you!
Great!

Kristine's place is very stylish and clean. It is very close to the subway, so you don't have to worry about the transportation. She's very helpful and even let me extend my checkout time. We also went out to see the World Cup finals. Also, she provided me with coffee, yoghurt and some on-the-go snacks.

Kristine's place is great! Getting affordable, decent accommodation in NYC is challenging and this fulfills that. The apartment has everything you need: comfy bed, loads of storage, good shower, coffee/tea facilities, TV, etc. The air-conditioning was a life-saver in the heat. Kristine is a very welcoming host and easy to communicate with. Recommended!

The apartment is in a very old building which has not been renovated for a long time - still the apartment is very nice and super clean. Neighborhood is not very clean and not really inviting - not very nice to walk through in the nighttime - but we were assured that it is safe. Kristine is very accommodating.
Kristine's home was a great place to stay in an interesting area. Very lovely the whole design of the flat. Kristine was very friendly, we had a great time and definitely enjoyed the aircondition.

Kristine has an really stylish place in a great location. Even if she was out most of the time, each time we saw her, she went out of her way to make sure that we did not miss anything and that we had a great stay. Definitely a place I'd recommend for a great experience in NYC!
Bon rapport qualité/prix, séjour déroulé comme prévu. Emplacement pratique car à côté du métro.

Our stay in Kristine’s beautiful apartment in the perfect location of Chinatown couldn’t have been better! Kristine made sure we were comfortable and on top of that she’s super sweet and extremely accommodating. I would recommend anyone looking for a place in the city to rent the room i Kristine’s flat! Couldn’t be better :)

We had a great stay at Kristine’s place. The location is great, and it’s a vibrant neighborhood. We visited a lot of things on foot, but there are metro-stops nearby. The apartment is nice and quiet. Kristine had done a great job decorating the place. I would go back any time, Thanks so much, our stay at Kristine’s place contributed to our experience in NYC!
Great location on the LES. Good access to MTA. Clean, safe.
It was great!
Nice spot in a great location. Would stay again.

description: Beautiful two-bedroom apartment, "provence" style in the most noble and charming of Rio de Janeiro, second block from the beach and next to the best commerce in the region with pizzerias, cinemas, markets and everything you need. Accommodates up to 4 people comfortably. Of course, airy, a place of great taste. The space offers comfort in an excellent street in low Leblon, being quiet and charming. It has apparent brick wall in the living room and tasteful decoration. The location also stands out for the originality of its details. All renovated and secure, with lovely neighbors, this apartment located on 2nd floor, has two big Led Net TVs with more than 100 channels (in the master bedroom and living room), air-conditioning in the whole apartment, among other facilities to be enjoyed with pleasure. Guests will have access to all items in the apartment which were purchased recently (all new). Has air-conditioning in the room as well as air-conditioning in both rooms, access to internet,
access: Guests will have access to all items in the apartment were purchased recently (all are new). Has air conditioning in the living room, air conditioning in the master bedroom and also in the back room, access to internet, net with several channels, all kitchen appliances, coffee maker, Toaster, microwave etc. In the first quarter (front) is the master bedroom with queen size bed and the second bedroom has a very comfortable bunk bed. There are two toilets being a principal and another service but in perfect condition for use of the guests.
interaction: Estou totalmente disponível para perguntas e dicas que podem fazer seu passeio e estadia ainda mais proveitosa. Basta chamar via Whats  ou telefone e será um prazer pra mim ser útil.
house_rules: Festas e animais domésticos não são permitidos. O prédio não permite som alto e barulhos exagerados para comodidade dos demais moradores. É necessario o envio antecipado da xerox da identidade dos hóspedes para maior seguranca de todos (tanto dos moradores como dos hóspedes). Esta é uma regra preventiva recente do condominio para garantir maior segurança para todos. Se houver crianças favor enviar documento ou xerox da certidão de nascimento. Os horarios de check in ou de check out vão de 12:00 as 19:00h. Qualquer chegada ou partida fora deste período favor combinar antecipadamente. Solicito atenção ao fechamento de portas e portões do prédio ao entrar e ao sair. Peço também atenção para que os ar condicionados, luzes e água sejam desligados ou fechados quando o hóspede sair do apartamento.Desejo que os hóspedes se divirtam e tenham uma ótima estadia.  No mais basta aproveitar e ser feliz !

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Sou uma pessoa alegre, de hábitos simples e gosto muito de me relacionar com pessoas honestas e que também tenham bom humor. Quero alugar meu charmoso apartamento para pessoas que saibam valorizar um belo local e que sendo bem recebidas também queiram voltar sempre !

reviews.comments:
A Beth é uma ótima anfitriã. Super simpática, acessível e preocupada.
O apartamento é muito bom. Está localizado na melhor região do Leblon (baixo Leblon) ao lado de restaurantes, bares famosos (Jobi, Veloso, Pizzaria Guanabara) e padaria (Talho Capixaba).
Fica a duas quadras da praia, na altura do Posto 12.
O apartamento é reformado, bem decorado e tem ar condicionado em todos os cômodos.
Uma experiência maravilhosa. Vale a pena escolher este (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei.
Imóvel muito bem localizado, ótimas instalações, confortável e anfitriã muito atenciosa. Ótima experiência, com certeza terá bis! Obrigado Beth.
Location, location, safe and close to all amenities.  Host was friendly and accommodating.  Unit was as shown in picture.

Recomendo mesmo se hospedar neste apto no Leblon. A localização não poderia ser melhor, pois esta entre os melhores restaurantes da zona sul e duas quadras do posto 12. Fizemos tudo a pé e foi super  tranquilo. Dentro do apto mais surpresas: reformado e muito charmoso! Camas, ar, tvs, geladeira, móveis, todos novos e confortáveis. Ótimo WiFi também. Sem falar dos mimos da Beth! Melhor que muito hotel. 
Voltaremos com toda certeza!

Beth was a fantastic host. We came from a very bad experience in a different apartament and she was able to accomodate our needs. The apartment is cozy, super clean and well decorated. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT
Fantastic host and great apartment. Highly recommended.

El mejor apartamento para parar en Rio. Es hermoso, comodo, muy bien situado. Y Beth una persona a amorosa, pendiente de nuestras necesidades y sobre todo nos hizo sentir como en casa. La mejor de las experiencias! Gracias
A Beth é uma excelente anfitriã, e o apartamento é excelente com uma localização incrível!

Apartamento de acordo com as fotos. Localização ótima, prédio tranquilo e Beth foi muito atenciosa.
Gostamos muito dos nossos dias no Leblon!
O apartamento é ótimo e muito bem localizado. Tudo funciona perfeitamente e as instalações são muito confortáveis. Nossa estadia não poderia ter sido melhor.

A Beth é extremamente atenciosa e cuida para que todos os detalhes do apartamento estejam impecáveis. 
Certamente retornarei.

Perfeita! Essa é a descrição para a casa da Beth. Além de a anfitriã ser muito simpática e querida, de o apartamento ser aconchegante, ele fica mega bem localizado. Não poderia ser melhor, a uma quadra da praia, do lado de uma lanchonete de produtos naturais, o apartamento super equipado e arrumado. Eu e minhas amigas adoramos passar o final de semana no apartamento da Beth.
Great place, very clean and well located. The place is tastefully decorated, and everything about our stay was smooth. Highly recommend to others!

A Beth realmente é uma excelente anfitriã.
Nos recebeu muito bem e foi muito atenciosa.
O apartamento é excelente, tudo novo, ar condicionado em todos os ambientes, todo equipado e muito bem localizado. Eu , meu marido e meus filhos sentimos como se estivessemos em (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza volto para me hospedar em uma proxima ocasiao.

O apartamento é um dois quartos muito bem cuidado, móveis novos, decoração de bom gosto, sofá novo, ar condicionado em três ambientes, colchão excelente para casal , cozinha bem aparelhada , piso frio em todo o imóvel e boa área de serviço.
 Comporta três pessoas com conforto e privacidade. A ducha do chuveiro é generosa e inesquecível depois de uma manhã quente de verão na praia .
O ponto alto da decoração foi a poltrona de leitura , estilo bem contemporâneo, quase uma peça de colecionador, colocada  rente a janela da sala , foco de luz bem direcionado e posição de leitura excelente , possibilitando ler até altas horas da noite sem incomodar a parceira.

Leblon sempre foi o nosso bairro predileto no RJ. A localização do apartamento é ótima, no coração do bairro aonde se tem de tudo: praia a 100 mts, bares, restaurantes, shopping, supermercados...O apartamento é muito bem decorado, de extremo bom gosto, cuidado em cada detalhe e com decoração de extremo bom gosto. Encontramos de tudo: conforto e tudo o que se precisa em uma casa disponível. A Beth, por sua vez, sempre atenciosa e pronta a nos atender no que fosse preciso. Recomendamos fortemente este imóvel, que tem uma ótima relação custo/benefício

O apartamento da Beth foi um achado, na melhor parte do Leblon. Exatamente como descrito um paraíso no Leblon. O apartamento é aconchegante, muito bem equipado, com decoração descontraída e de muito bom gosto e com uma energia muito agradável. A Beth foi  ótima, sempre atenciosa e prestativa. Me senti realmente em casa.

I stayed at Beth's place for a week - and I just loved it! The location is perfect, close to the beach and to lovely restaurants. The apartment is super pretty with everything you need and meetingmeetin

Foi a melhor escolha que fizemos. Tudo perfeito. Desde a recepção com um delicioso bolinho e com o carinho com que fomos recebidos pela Beth. 
O apartamento é super  aconchegante e equipado com tudo para que você possa se sentir em casa. 
Situado num lugar espetacular  do Leblon, numa rua tranquila com tudo por perto: praia, bares, super mercados e deliciosos restaurantes
Voltarei sempre e agora com a certeza que estarei mesmo no Paraíso do Leblon

Beth foi muito atenciosa. O apartamento estava cuidadosamente preparado para nós receber. O local é de fácil acesso a metrô, tem serviços e lojas de conveniência bem próximos, além de ótimos restaurantes e bares perto. Por conta disso, a noite pode não ser a mais silenciosa. Mas devo dizer que não atrapalhou nosso sono. Voltaríamos a nós hospedar lá, com certeza!

Beth nos respondeu prontamente e foi muito gentil e atenciosa. Nos surpreendeu muito ao deixar um delicioso bolo de chocolate por saber que seria o aniversario de nossa filha. " Obrigada Beth" 
O apto está localizado em um dos bairros mais prestigiados do Rio, a duas quadras da praia, possui um comercio local completo, cercado de rest, bares, e centro comercial. É um bairro muito seguro pois apesar de estar perto de todas as facilidades é um bairro residencial. O apto é tal qual as fotos e muito confortavel.
* Beth, com certeza voltaremos, beijo grande *

Beth,
Nós amamos. Super obrigada. Nós sentimos totalmente em casa.
Obrigada por tudo

Beth is the best host ever.  Place is perfect for those who whants  live as a "carioca". Close to the beach and you can do everything walking. Very good restaurants and stores around. The apartment is perfect to 4 people. Very cozy, confortable bed and with all you need to have fun. For sure I will come back! As she says, that is my house at Rio now!

A estadia foi perfeita! Nossa anfitriã Beth fez de tudo para que nos sentíssemos em casa. Quando chegamos havia uma cesta com vários quitutes e um cartão de boas vindas. O apartamento é muito confortável, arejado e decorado no capricho. A rouparia é de primeira qualidade e a cozinha completa, onde pude fazer as comidinhas do meu bebê. O vigia do prédio - Eliomar estava sempre à disposição e nos tratou como os reais moradores. A localização não poderia ser melhor: uma quadra da Praia e 50 metros do Jobi, Veloso, entre outros barzinhos e restaurantes do Leblon. Voltaremos com certeza! Obrigada Beth por toda atenção e por se preocupar com os mínimos detalhes da nossa estadia. Isso faz toda a diferença.
Excelente ubicación, hermoso y cómodo departamento, con todo lo necesario para una hermosa estadía en Rio!

Excelente! El apartamento es como se muestra en las fotos y en una ubicación inmejorable. Beth es amorosa, si bien no pudimos conocerla, siempre estuvo atenta por wapp por si necesitábamos algo. Muy recomendable lugar y anfitriona! Gracias Beth, pasamos divino esos días en Río!

Beth foi uma anfitriã perfeita, solícita e interessada. Desde os cuidados com a recepção, a preocupação com os detalhes durante a estadia e no check-out demonstrou sempre o cuidado para que tudo corresse bem, como de fato ocorreu. O apartamento foi perfeito para quatro pessoas, bem aparelhado, com ar condicionado na sala e nos quartos, duas tvs de ótima qualidade, TV a cabo com grande variedade de canais. A localização do imóvel é perfeita, no melhor lugar do Leblon, o melhor bairro do Rio de Janeiro para quem viaja com crianças, como foi o nosso caso. Se o imóvel continuar disponível, voltaremos em um futuro próximo certamente.
Localização privilegiada!,,,Apartamento muito bem decorado e funcional!!Pretendemos retornar em outra oportunidade,,,A Beth sempre esteve à disposição e solícita,,,realmente um paraíso no Leblon!

O apartamento é aconchegante, muito bem equipado e funcional. Roupas de cama e banho limpas e perfumadas. A localização é excelente, bem perto de ótimo comércio, restaurantes e bares tradicionais como Pizzaria Guanabara, Jobi e Diagonal. Muito perto de um trecho da praia que é tranquilo, limpo e seguro. 
Realmente foram dias especiais com minha família, e todos já falam em voltar em breve. 
Como carioca, que mora em outro estado, posso garantir que o apartamento e a localização são ideais para quem quer a experiência de viver o melhor do Rio. 
E a Beth é ótima, sempre disponível, solícita e simpática. Foi muito gentil em deixar uma cesta com coisas gostosas para o lanche e também um bolo delicioso, pois sabia que era aniversário da minha filha. Adoramos esta delicadeza. Uma pena que não podemos nos conhecer pessoalmente, mas isto em nada atrapalhou a comunicação e a estadia. Quando voltarmos, espero que possamos nos conhecer.

El departamento está muy bien ubicado, a dos cuadras del puesto 12 en la playa de Leblon y a menos de 50 mts de la calle principal (donde se encuentran los restaurantes y bares más lindos de la zona). 
Tiene una cocina muy bien equipada, con todo lo necesario para cocinar. Dos baños, un lavadero y dos habitaciones. Todo el departamento tiene aire acondicionado y wifi funcionando a la perfección. 
Cuando llegamos teníamos armado en el baño shampoo, jabón, cepillos de dientes y pasta dental y en La Cocina nos habían dejado snacks y cosas dulces.
Las camas son muy cómodas y está todo muy limpio y confortable. 
Nos recibió Eliomar, el portero del edificio, quien fue muy amable y estuvo a nuestra disposición todo el tiempo. 
Beth fue una excelente anfitriona, nos comunicamos mucho por (Hidden by Airbnb) y siempre estuvo dispuesta a ayudarnos en lo que necesitáramos. 
Sin duda volvería!
Só temos elogios para o apartamento e a anfitriã. Apartamento lindíssimo, super aconchegante, todo equipado, melhor localização no Rio de Janeiro! Quero voltar sempre! Recomendadíssimo!

El departamento es excepcional. Muy completo, decorado con buen gusto y con todos los detalles para el viajante. Ubicado a una cuadra y media de la playa y a media cuadra de la avenida con negocios y restaurantes. Muy importante también saber que está ubicado a cuatro cuadras del Metro con el cual se puede viajar por todo Río, desde Barra de Tijuca hasta el norte de la ciudad. Beth es una persona encantadora y nos dió mucha información de lugares donde comprar, salir a comer o visitar. Es una ventaja importante contar con esa información para quien no conoce Rio.

Antes que nada agradezco por aqui a Beth y le pido disculpa por hacer mi reporte en español, la atencion de Beth no puede ser mejor, tanto por la discreción como por su servicialidad. El departamento ..... perfecto no le falta absolutamente nada, si te gusta cocinar tiene todo y todo es todo jajaj. Lo demas todo perfecto los electrodomesticos todos nuevos los aire acondicionados perfectos el baño perfecto. El portero del edificio Eliomar muy servicial y atento. No tengo palabras para agradecer no tiene detalle que decir en contra. Tal cual la publicación, si eligen Rio y Leblon no duden ! Muito obrigado !

Beth es realmente un superhost con todas las letras. Tuvo detalles muy lindos y que simplifican la estadía muchísimo. Un departamento súper completo, bello, y cerca de todo, particularmente de la playa que era nuestro mayor interés. Nos sentimos en casa... ELiomar, siempre atento, nos ayudó en todo lo que necesitamos y más.un grande. Beth estuvo en constante comunicación. El depa es más bello que en las fotos... todas las comodidades. Cuando volvamos a leblon , allá vamos a estar Beth. Muchas gracias por hacer rio más lindo aún! Besos!!

Adoravel e confortavel apartamento no coracao do Leblon! excelente estadia, como verdadeiros cariocas- nao tivemos a chance de nos conhecer pessoalmente mas Beth esteve sempre disponivel para quaisquer duvidas ou necessidades (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaremos!
obrigada- Carol e familia
O apartamento fica em uma rua muito gostosa, iluminada e de fácil acesso a tudo que é necessário, principalmente porque eu estava com criança.
Adoramos! Apartamento super bem localizado, decorado, equipado e a Beth foi muito atenciosa. Iremos voltar e recomendamos!

What a great experience we had from booking to chekout. Beth, the host, was very caring, professional and a pleasure to deal with. The apartment was fantastic. Very well equipped and decorated. Just what we wanted. Best feature though is the location - AMAZING! - walking distance from everything you need and from all the hottest spots in Leblon (by far our favourite suburb in Rio). 
We highly recommend this apartment and are certainly coming back!
Beth is a perfect host. Location is perfect an the experience is amazing!

O apartamento é excelente! Ótima localização, perto de muitos bares e restaurantes, perto da praia e do metrô também. Muito aconchegante, linda a decoracao com  camas confortáveis, chuveiro bom... Roupas de cama de boa qualidade e cheirosas... gostamos de tudo mesmo! Beth é uma anfitria nota 10!!!! Deixou um monte de quitutes gostosos que meu filhote adorou! Super fofa e atenciosa! Recomendamos muito!!! Voltaremos com certeza. beijo grande! Ja com saudades das férias.

O apartamento é maravilhoso. Muito bem localizado, próximo da dias Ferreira, vários restaurantes e do metrô. O apartamento é confortável e muito bem decorado. A Beth é uma anfitriã perfeita, muito atenciosa e cuidadosa com os mínimos detalhes. A cozinha é completa e está equipada com eletrodomésticos e utensílios de qualidade. Nos sentimos em casa.  Foi uma estadia maravilhosa, esperamos voltar em breve.

A Beth é sensacional, desde o primeiro momento super educada e simpática. Sua casa é linda, aconchegante, igual a foto, bem decorada. Para nossa supresa, ao entrar na casa, havia um bilhete de ''Bem vindos ao RJ'' com uma cesta de mimos, como chocolates, cookies e salgadinhos. Ficamos surpresos e muito felizes. Obrigado por tudo, voltaremos em breve ao RJ para ficar em sua casa novamente!

O apartamento é super bem cuidado e confortável. Tem a melhor localização do Leblon. A Beth é um amor, responde rapidamente no (Hidden by Airbnb) e realmente mostra que se importa com seus hóspedes. Ainda deixou uma cesta com chocolate e cookies no apartamento!! Super recomendo!

Raramente um anuncio é tão adequado como neste caso. O apartamento da Beth é realmente um pedacinho de Paraiso no Leblon. Primeiro porque atende totalmente ao que foi descrito, alem disso moveis, utensilios, cama, roupas de cama e banho, tudo enfim é da melhor qualidade. Realmente é como se propõe o Airbnb, voce hospeda onde voce mora. Alem disso, a Beth é uma excelente anfitriã, sempre disponível, preocupada com o minimos detalhes, e com isso sua casa tem um astral muito alto, então vale muito a pena. Infelizmente não tem estacionamento no local, mas ela mesmo me indicou um bastante proximo, que atendeu muito bem. A localização é excelente, perto de tudo, inclusive do metro, rua tranquila, enfim , foi uma excelente escolha.
Everything is perfect at the appartment !! Beth provides shampoo, toothpaste , and more than you can ask for. We love our stay!!
A localização é privilegiada, apartamento lindo, cozinha  completa, super comodidades  (wifi, net e smartv). Anfitriã Beth super atenciosa antes, durante e depois da nossa estadia.
Very nice place. Super clean. Great location. Just a few blocks to the beach. Satisfied

A Beth é uma excelente anfitriã e o apartamento é um charme.
Bem localizado: bares, restaurantes, farmácia, praia, ciclo via, shopping, tudo a pé.
Excelente para solteiros e família. 
Recomendo muito. Todas as estrelas.

Do yourself a favor and stay here, honestly. Here's why:

1) The location of this apartment is one of the best in Rio. It is close to fabulous restaurants, bars, and one of the most beautiful beaches in the city. It is also very safe, walkable, and family-friendly. On top of all of this, it is only a short (~7min) walk to the metro. I cannot imagine staying in a better location!

2) The apartment is beautiful, spacious, and has everything you need! Beth went above and beyond to make sure we had additional amenities like snacks, toiletries, linens, and towels. We were incredibly comfortable and were even able to do laundry during our stay.

3) Beth is an extremely attentive host and does everything she can to make her guests feel comfortable and prepared. She always responded immediately to my messages and accommodated our request for a late check-out. The building manager met us upon our arrival and helped us carry our bags to the apartment. He also gave us a tour and told us what we needed to know to fully utilize the space. 

In summary, it was a five-star hotel experience!

I truly cannot recommend staying here enough. I've stayed at Air BnB's all over the place and this was my best experience yet! I have family and friends in Brazil and will be recommending staying at Beth's place to everyone from now on.

Stay like you are a local. Great flat for 3-4 people. Location cannot be beaten in Leblon close to the beach and in the corner of great bars, restaurants and juice houses. Clean, well maintained and well  equipped (all kitchen appliances, hair dryer, etc). Beth is a great host and provided good support all the times.

Graças a Beth
Muito boa estadia
emplacement top : à côté des restos, de la plage, rue très calme

Estadia excelente, apto perfeito!
Localização, limpeza, comodidades e bairro nota 10!
Super recomendo!
E a Beth é mto atenciosa e gentil!
Adoramos o apartamento da Beth! Muito bem localizado, confortável e ela sempre respondeu muito rápido as nossas dúvidas!
Todo 10!

Localização perfeita, apartamento muito confortável e muito (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei mais vezes!
Recomendo muito o apartamento!

Beth's place is in the best location in Rio. Close by restaurants, bars, grocery stores and the beach. 
Communication with the host was more than perfect! The apartment description is true to what is offered. No regrets! Will be back for sure.
Beth's house is great. We love it there!

O lugar é aconchegante e muito bem localizado. Correu tudo conforme o planejado e só tenho a agradecer a Beth por uma estadia tranquila, inclusive com duas crianças pequenas. O prédio é um charme e perto de tudo. Super indico!
apartamento charmoso, limpíssimo, localização excelente. vou voltar sem dúvida
Apartamento delicioso! A decoração é super charmosa. O apartamento é arejado, confortável e a localização perfeita. Destaque para os mimos e carinho das Beth conosco. Voltaremos com certeza
Anfitriã Muito Atenciosa e localização melhor impossível!

Uma localizaçao excelente: a duas quadras do mar mas silenciosa . No sentido oposto , na direçao da Dias Ferreira vai ficando  mais movimentada.Nesta  há locais ótimos para curtiçao, bons vinhos , o Celeiro, a sorveteria quase ao lado, o clåssico La Mole, restaurantes japoneses, o supermercado, a livraria, etc. Muito bom mesmo

Great apartment in the best location in Leblon, two blocks from the beach and near the best restaurants, bars, supermarkets and a major mall.  Beth is a wonderful host, great communicator and the doorman at the building is very helpful and nice. The apartment is just lke the pictures, airy and comfortable and Beth went to great lengths to make us feel at home with welcoming treats. I am looking forward to staying here again.
Beth é extremamente atenciosa e carinhosa! Adoramos os mimos! O apartamento é excelente, muito fiel ao anúncio e a localização nem se fala! Melhor impossível! Voltaremos sempre!

O apartamento da Beth é excelente. A melhor localização, perto de tudo. 
O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos, tamanho ideal para 4 pessoas, confortável , limpo e com todas as coisas necessárias para a estadia. A comunicação com a Beth tb fluiu super bem, rápida e atenciosa!
O apartamento tem tudo o que se precisa para poder estar confortáveis e despreocupado em suas férias

Departamento para 4 personas a 2 cuadras de la parada 12 de leblon , muy bien equipado con todo lo necesario para una estadía inmejorable.
Cerca de todo metro restaurantes , bares ,
Supermercado .

name: Room in Brooklyn, 20 min from Manh
summary: A private sunny & cosy room in a one bedroom apartment. Located right by Brooklyn's Prospect Park. One block away from the subway, Parkside Ave stop on the Q line. 20-30 min to Manhattan (Union Square). The room features a futon bed, good enough for two people, coffee table and a clothing rack. Feel free to use my fully equipped kitchen as well. I have a very lovely friendly cat. If you don't wish to interact, you can always keep the door to your room closed and she won't come in.
space: A private sunny & cosy room in a one bedroom apartment. Located right by Brooklyn's Prospect Park. One block away from the subway, Parkside Ave stop on the Q line. 20-30 min to Manhattan (Union Square). The room features a futon bed, good enough for two people, coffee table and a clothing rack. Feel free to use my fully equipped kitchen as well. I have a very lovely friendly cat. If you don't wish to interact, you can always keep the door to your room closed and she won't come in. The room is facing the street and has plenty of natural light. There are coffee shops, grocery shops and restaurants in the neighborhood.
description: A private sunny & cosy room in a one bedroom apartment. Located right by Brooklyn's Prospect Park. One block away from the subway, Parkside Ave stop on the Q line. 20-30 min to Manhattan (Union Square). The room features a futon bed, good enough for two people, coffee table and a clothing rack. Feel free to use my fully equipped kitchen as well. I have a very lovely friendly cat. If you don't wish to interact, you can always keep the door to your room closed and she won't come in. A private sunny & cosy room in a one bedroom apartment. Located right by Brooklyn's Prospect Park. One block away from the subway, Parkside Ave stop on the Q line. 20-30 min to Manhattan (Union Square). The room features a futon bed, good enough for two people, coffee table and a clothing rack. Feel free to use my fully equipped kitchen as well. I have a very lovely friendly cat. If you don't wish to interact, you can always keep the door to your room closed and she won't come in. The room is facing the stree
neighborhood_overview: Family style Caribbean neighborhood. Right by the beautiful historic Prospect Park. 15-25 minutes to Manhattan. Subway is one block away.
transit: Subway is one block away. Parkside Ave stop on the Q line.
access: Room, kitchen, bathroom (shared with me)
interaction: You will share the apartment with me and I have a separate room of my own. I'm a woman in my thirties, I'm a small business owner and a big traveler, so I know how to host people. If I'm not too busy with work I would be very happy to help you with recommendations and directions about the city.
house_rules: No smoking. No outside shoes.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
- the neighborhood is quiet and safe. Beautiful park is within 5 minute walk. 
- the subway is very close, so it is easy to get around the city
- Katya was really good giving me directions and recommendations about the city
- the apartment is war, cozy and has a lot of light.

Katya was really nice and flexible. The apartment was really clean and pretty. The room was big and cozy and the futon was extremely confortable! The apartment is located literally 3 minutes from the metro station.

Katya is the best roommate/ host that I ever have. The apt is clean very organize she respects  your privacy she is very welcoming friendly and willing to help you. She even let me stay with my dog and she played with him walk him out sometimes she is the best I just good things to say about her ;)

The apt is literally two blocks from prospect park the market is right in the corner. I love it! 

Katya is amazing you won't regret it stayin at her place will make your experience in NYC better.

We spent 8 nights in July at Katya's place.
The room was bigger than it looks on the pictures and definitely big enough for two people. The bed was comfortable. Overall the room was really clean, AC was working great which was a blessing with the humid heat of NYC. Everything you would need like a table or clothing rack was included. The bathroom was also absolutely satisfying. We were also allowed to use the kitchen as long as we cleaned up after ourselves which turned out to be super convenient.
Katya was a lovely host. She helped us whenever she could and gave us tips on what to do and how to get around the city. We had our privacy but when we needed her she was there. The whole atmosphere was comfortable and safe. We also got two pairs of keys which can be quiet useful depending on what you're planning to do if you travel as a pair. 
The apartment is a 3 minute walk to the next subway station from where you can get around the city quite easily. A supermarket and a drug store are also really close. The park next to the subway was lovely and a good possibility for a chilled evening. A movie theatre is one subway stop away.
We enjoyed our stay, coming back to the apartment felt like coming home (the most home you'll get in a foreign country) and we would definitely stay there again.
Kathinka & Lilja from Hamburg

Katya did a great job of making me feel welcome, helping me find the place and always making me feel like I could ask her about anything.  Her place was well situated, had all the amenities mentioned and was the perfect place for easy access and close to lots of places and things to see and do.  Great price, too!

Katya is a great host, very welcoming, ready to answer any questions and providing directions for local places and events throughout the city. Room is small and simple, cozy and, in my opinion, fulfilling it's task as a place to stay for a tourists.
Subway really just 5 minustes by walk, plenty of nearby shops, providing everything you might need. Some coffee shops, bars and restaurants too. Neighbourhood is ok.
Spent almost two weeks there and definitely looking up to book there again!
Added bonus for any Russian-speeking tourists: Katya speeks Russian perfectly, so even if your English is limited, you will have no problems communicating with her.

we spent a great time at Katia´s. She was so nice and welcoming. also, the room was very clean, and the bed comfortable. The room has AC, what was very important, as we went in summer. You only need to connect the AC a while, and the room get cool in a moment, so you can turn it of to sleep. The neighborhood is very safe, and it takes you around 30 min to get to Times Square for example. We recommend this place if you want to visit NY and save money!

The stay at Katya's place was totally fine. The apartment was good and we had everything we needed. Also the sub and small shops are near by. Katya was a great host. Although we never met, she was always approachable and responded quickly. All in all it is a good place to stay in New York.

Katya is really nice! The apartment is exactly as described. Everything is clean and well organized. You will get enought privacy as well as any advice you need Katya. I reccomend this to anyone:) btw.great bakery\cafe just behind the corner.

Calificar la estancia en casa de Katya de estupenda, te hace sentir como en casa, se preocupa por tu llegada y te facilita mapas y guias para usar en Nueva york, barrio muy tranquilo y seguro a solo 15 min en metro para manhattan, totalmente recomendable.

Excellent,Katya makes you feel at home, take cares about your arrival and provides you maps and guides for use in New york, the neighborhood is very quiet and safe just 15 minutes by subway to Manhattan, totally recommended.
Kaya is really really nice host, leave me a fantastic memory.❤️❤️❤️

Katya reached out to me in advance, so I had no problems to get into the apartment when I was arriving even though she wasn't there. The apartment is nice, clean and the room is very spacious. The Caribbean neighbourhood has a special flair, which I liked a lot. The next metro station is just down the street, so you can be in Manhattan in 15 minutes. There are a lot of restaurants, cafés as well as a supermarket in 5 minutes walking distance. The only downside of the room is, that it is quite noisy at night/ in the morning because it is very close to the street.
Katya was taking of everything very well and I felt welcome at anytime. If you're looking for a 'real New York' experience for your stay, I highly recommend staying with Katya!

Katya's place is easy to find, well located, stylish and quiet. Katya is a great host - she's busy but flexible and found time to chat and give us tips, but also gave us lots of privacy and space. She really made us feel at home and we loved living at Katya's place for a few days. Definitely would recommend.

I really enjoyed staying with katya. Not only was it super affordable, but katya was very helpful and low maintenance. She offered a little listing of places to eat, taxi companies and some local things to check out. She was really chill about us coming in and out, even if it was at a little bit of strange hours. Also, her apartment is in a cute little neighborhood and a blink away from the metro station. Overall, it was a really good experience.

It was a great experience. Katya is a warm person. The place is the same as described. Good neighborhood. The place is just two blocks away from the metro that takes straight to the Times Square. Highly recommend this place.

Katya was a very good host. Her place is very nice and tidy, and is a peaceful retreat from the city. The room was spacious and bed comfortable. The neighbourhood felt very safe and and was only 30 min from Lower Manhattan - 1 train. I would recommend Katya's place!

Katya's place is exactly as advertised. Although it is a little spartan however the short commute to Manhattan makes it  ideal. Thank you for giving us all the privacy and making us feel welcome. I would highly recommend this place for anyone who is looking for a simple , inexpensive stay near Manhattan.

Katya's place is great. I stayed with her for over a week and everything was fantastic. Katya is very friendly and easy going. The room was clean and spacious, and the apartment is conveniently located just a couple of minutes from the Q train, which takes you to midtown Manhattan in about 25 minutes. Will definitely stay again!

I just got back from my first trip to New York City and my stay at Katya's apartment. She was fantastic! Very very friendly and accommodating! Was always offering me advice and help. I was nervous because it was my first time to the city and I didn't know anyone. However the proximity to the subway was perfect! Literally one block away on a straight street. Manhattan was very close. Honestly it felt that as soon as I got on I got back off. The line is the local Brooklyn Q which takes you directly into Manhattan and all the touristy spots too. The room was clean and cozy and bigger than the pictures. Kitchen was always available even though I didn't use it. The apartment is on the first floor so you have to be okay with the noise from outside. I don't have a problem with it so it was great for me. I recommend staying with Katya! She is super nice and the apartment is in a good location. Thanks Katya for all your help!
Very cool !

I would recommend Katya's flat while if you're planning on spending some time in NYC. Very well located in Brooklyn , and very close to Manhattan thanks to the many subway lines. The flat was clean, so was our bedroom and we had everything we needed for our stay. Katya was a really good host, and took some time to give us tips on what to see/where to go, etc..Thanks for everything Katya :)
Katya's place was great. Very convenient location, just 2mins walk from subway. Katya is very nice and friendly, we had a great time to stay with her.

First off, even prior to arrival Katya was wonderful communicating directions on how to locate the apartment. This was most appreciated!

Katya's place was in a lovely neighbourhood, which made my first NYC experience most enjoyable. The room is larger than it looks in pictures, clean and comfortable. Katya is very kind and approachable, and provided me with a list of nearby restaurants, coffee shops and taxi services. The close proximity to the subway makes it very easy to get to the main tourist attractions, and to other Brooklyn neghbourhoods.  I was very pleased with my stay and would recommend this accommodation to other travelers!
The apartment was good to stay and Katya was a nice host. Thank you for your accomodation.

My boyfriend and I travelled in NY and we stayed at Katya's apartment for a week. We had such a good time.. Exactly what we expected !
Katya is a really good host. She's very friendly and respectful. We enjoyed talking with her even if we didn't have enough time because of her schedule and our outings.

I'd definitely recommend Katya's appartement. Easy to find and the location is just perfect. One block away from the subway station, 10-15min to Brooklyn bridge, 15-20 min to Manhattan, 25-30min to Times Square. You can even enjoy the beach in downtown Brooklyn which is called Coney Island. Only 20min... So many places to go in a few minutes ! 
As described, the Caribbean style neighborhood is nice as well. A vibrant area you can enjoy with plenty of supermarkets, restaurants and shops. 
The appartement is nice, cozy and clean. Just what we wanted. The room has enough space to put our stuff, fortunately there's an AC (by the time we were here, it was so hot in NY !). Nice bathroom and kitchen. But no microwave. However you can use the hot plate or just grab some food outside !

To conclud, a very nice stay ! Thank you Katya :)

The room is spacious, cosy and clean. There are many good eatries in the neighbourhood and it's only a 2-3 min walk to the metro, which makes travelling to Manhattan convenient. Would definitely recommend staying with Katya if you're ever in New York! :)

We had a great stay here! Close to the subway and laundromat made it very easy!! Katya was extremely helpful on where to visit and gave us some great ideas for places to eat. If you don't mind sleeping in a futon, this is a great place to stay. Highly recommended!

Katya was a great host, and her apartment was the perfect place to come back and relax after a day in the city.  Being so close to the train station, grocery stores, and coffee shops was a huge bonus.  I would definitely stay here again, given the opportunity.

Katya has a wonderful home and I immediately felt welcome. She made sure I knew how to get to her place and was there to receive me- staying in close contact beforehand. 
The place was clean, cozy, and Katya was wonderful to speak to. Her recommendations of where to eat and drink in her neighborhood were spot on! Very close to the Q which takes you right to the city. Right next to Prospect Park for walks. Awesome location, place, and host! Would absolutely recommend and hope to stay there again!

Staying with Katya is great. She's kind and thoughtful, and had everything prepared in advance. The room is spacious and clean, and it was a little bigger than I thought it'd be. She lives on a great block, and being close to the subway station made it easy to get around.
Katya was a great host - convenient place, easy to get around, and a fun, lively neighborhood to get start in NY. Would stay again!

Da Katya auf Reisen war, hat uns ihre Freundin empfangen, die in dieser Zeit auch in Katyas Zimmer wohnte. Wir haben uns sofort sehr wohl gefühlt, Handtücher, Bettwäsche, ein Wasserfilter in der Küche, Klimaanlage funktionierte wunderbar. Die Lage ist wirklich nah an der Metro und man kommt ohne Umsteigen gut nach Manhattan. Wir bekamen eine Liste mit allen Infos über das Haus und den umliegenden Einkaufs- und Essenmöglichkeiten, von denen besonders Blessings Coffee  ein niedliches Café mit gutem Kaffee war. Bei Problemen bekamen wir sofort Hilfe, sie lieh uns einen Steckdosen-Adapter. Hervorragende Erfahrung, schönes Plätzchen, empfehlen wir weiter!

Overall, this place was a great choice for my 5days trip. Katya was an excellent host and her place was just as described. The room is enough space and comfortable. The area is very cool and accessible by subway.

This place is the perfect one. You are really close from several subway stations and you have different options to go to Manhattan or downtown Brooklyn or even Coney Island, and really close to Prospect Park which is a nice one for walks, and in the heart of a very interesting Caribbean neighborhood ! Katya's room is exactly as described, you have space to put your luggage and the bathrooms and kitchen are convenient. Plus Katya's hospitality is really to mention, we had some issues before I arrived but she always tried to help me the best she could, which I really appreciated knowing nobody here in the USA.

The place is wonderful and spacious. Katya was very welcoming and kind, as well as helpful in providing information on where to eat in the neighbourhood. And what a nice and lively neighbourhood. I would love to stay here again.

Katya is a good host. She keeps the house clean and gives you all the privacy you need. The room is comfortable and very well organized and looks bigger than the pictures. The house is located in a quiet street just two minutes walk from Prospect Park and the Q train that takes you in Manhattan in about twenty minutes. Overall it was a great stay and hope to come back soon..
The host canceled this reservation 34 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It was my first experience on Airbnb. Katya is a great host and very friendly. The unit is in a great location which is close to all major shops and especially the public transport including bus and train station. 
The room was clean and spacious which can easily accommodate 2 persons. The neighborhood is quiet and friendly too. Good place for a sound sleep with ease of access to various things outside. I wish Katya good luck and hope that i will stay here again in my next visit.

Katya was an excellent host! Her apartment is very clean and welcoming. The location is only a 1-2 minute walk to the subway going to Manhattan which was very convenient. It was also very close to Prospect Park which was great to walk through. There is a pharmacy and grocery store within a couple blocks. I highly recommend Kayla's apartment!

Katya was a fantastic host.  Very responsive to questions and emails.  Her place is very clean and cozy.  Great access to Prospect Park and subway station very close by.  Highly recommend staying in her beautiful, bright and airy suite!

My relatives stayed at Katya's place and absolutely loved it! The host was very friendly and accommodating. The place itself is clean and equipped with everything you'll need for your stay in New York. Highly recommend!

This was my first experience with airbnb so wasn't sure what to expect, but Katya made sure it was a very smooth first experience. Very nice and clean place in an excellent location. Katya was very cordial, helpful, and quiet. Almost felt like I had my own place in Brooklyn for the weekend. Would definitely recommend this to anyone planning on spending some time exploring Brooklyn and Manhattan while in town. Location is near a few subway lines so it was easy getting around both boroughs while here.

Der Aufenthalt bei Katya war sehr schön! Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Der Check-In und Check-out lief problemlos ab. Katya ist eine sehr gute Gastgeberien. Sie ist freundlich, hilfsbereit und hat uns bei Fragen schnell geholfen. Zur nächstgelegenen Bahnhaltestelle war es ein Fußweg von 5 min. Innerhalb von 20 min erreicht die Bahn den Times Square. In der Nähe der Wohnung gibt es viele Läden und Cafés. Ich kann einen Aufenthalt bei Katya empfehlen.

Хозяйка очень доброжелательная и гостеприимная, в доме очень уютно, есть все необходимое. Расположение квартиры отличное - добраться до центра на метро занимает 20 минут.
Отдельное спасибо за ценные советы, которые помогли нам быстрее освоиться в Нью Йорке, побывать в интересных местах, о которых мы не знали, увидеть излюбленные места жителей города :)

Katya has a beautiful place, ideally located close to Prospect Park and the Q train which - surprisingly for a subway - was quite often on-time when I used it. Katya was a great host, very friendly and easily reachable via message. The apartment itself is beautifully decorated, very clean and easy to find. The room had everything I needed: space (larger than expected from the pictures), a comfortable bed; and a really large couch table with enough space to easily store all the small items (laptop, camera, phone, books, a lot of chargers and cables for all those...) I carry around.

Katya was the BEST! Her hospitality is unmatched, her place is in an awesome location and the list of local resources was the best! She makes me want to come back to NYC pronto! I need to check out more of those places!
Katya’s place is wonderful! Clean, cozy. Great location to the park and King’s Theater, and local cafes. Lovely spot!!

Katya is a lovely person and her flat is in a wonderful location, very close to the subway station and Prospect Park, as well as near loads of food shops, etc. The room was spacious and clean, and the bed very comfortable.  And the four-footed host was most gracious as well. :-) A happy stay!

name: GORGEOUS 1 BEDROOM WEST-ISLAND
summary: This gorgeous, contemporary 1-bedroom West Island apartment for rent features 1 bath, hardwood floors, and a balcony. This apartment also features: 1 queen size bed, a fully equipped kitchen, and can accommodate up to 2 people comfortably.
description: This gorgeous, contemporary 1-bedroom West Island apartment for rent features 1 bath, hardwood floors, and a balcony. This apartment also features: 1 queen size bed, a fully equipped kitchen, and can accommodate up to 2 people comfortably.

host.host_about: From Montreal and managing over 60 furnished apartments.

name: Triple Room@Austin,Jordan,Tsim Sha Tsui
summary: 'La Famille' with 1 super queen-size bed & 1 super single bed, is perfect for a family of 3-4 members or a group of friends for long stay. Separated bathroom and toilet are considerately designed for multi-users at the same time.
space: PLEASE READ THROUGH THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE BEFORE MAKING ANY INQUIRY OR RESERVATION: La Boutique de Austin, opened in late November 2014, is a boutique hotel situated at a residential building, located at the center of Kowloon West. The building is just right at the exit of MTR Austin station, and a bridge across Elements, where the Airport Express Kowloon station locates. There are in total of 9 rooms of different type at the same unit. Room size varies from 90sqf to 150sqf. All the rooms have private washroom and bathroom, double-layer glass windows and ventilation system. Toiletries we provide include: Shampoo, shower gel, soap, comb, shower cap, toothbrush and toothpaste. We also provide towels, slippers, hair dryer, kettle and complimentary bottle water. Free Wifi is provided with no speed limitation. Iron and iron board are provided upon request. There are no fridge and safe in the room. You get what you see from the pictures. CHECK-IN POLICY: Our regular check-in time is 3pm to 1
description: 'La Famille' with 1 super queen-size bed & 1 super single bed, is perfect for a family of 3-4 members or a group of friends for long stay. Separated bathroom and toilet are considerately designed for multi-users at the same time. PLEASE READ THROUGH THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE BEFORE MAKING ANY INQUIRY OR RESERVATION: La Boutique de Austin, opened in late November 2014, is a boutique hotel situated at a residential building, located at the center of Kowloon West. The building is just right at the exit of MTR Austin station, and a bridge across Elements, where the Airport Express Kowloon station locates. There are in total of 9 rooms of different type at the same unit. Room size varies from 90sqf to 150sqf. All the rooms have private washroom and bathroom, double-layer glass windows and ventilation system. Toiletries we provide include: Shampoo, shower gel, soap, comb, shower cap, toothbrush and toothpaste. We also provide towels, slippers, hair dryer, kettle and complimentary bottle water. F
neighborhood_overview: The area is well known as Gourmet corner for Hong Kong locals. You can have a taste of a variety of local and exotic cuisines just downstairs of the guesthouse.
notes: All the rooms have private washroom and bathroom, double-layer glass window and ventilation system, and are equipped with full set of toiletries: Shampoo, shower gel, soap, comb, shower cap, toothbrush and toothpaste. We also provide towels, slippers, hair dryer, kettle and complimentary bottle water. Free Wifi is provided with no speed limitation. Locker is not available at the moment however luggage can be kept at our reception before check-in or after check-out, free of charge. Regular check-in time is 3pm-12am. Early check-in is flexible only if the previous guest checks out early and the room is cleaned up by then. In case the room is not ready yet by the time of your arrival, you could leave the luggage at the reception. We will arrange in first priority to have your room cleaned up. Any late check-in after 1:30am must be agreed in advance and administration fee of $150HKD will be charged upon arrival. Regular check-out time is 12pm, special request for late check-out will be con
transit: 5 minutes of walk to Temple street & Jade Market;  10 minutes of walk to China Ferry Terminal to Macau;  15 minutes of walk to Harbour City (or one station on West Rail Line);   20 minutes of walk to Star Ferry Pier, Avenue of Stars, Space Museum, Museum of Art, Museum of History & Science Museum (or one station on West Rail Line);  10 minutes of walk to Elements & Kowloon Station for Airport Express & Tung Chung Line;  22 minutes to Airport by the Express from Kowloon station;  25 minutes to AsiaWorld Expo by the Express from Kowloon station;  27 minutes to Ngong Ping 360 from Kowloon station;  3 minutes of walk to Austin station for West Rail Line;  30 minutes to Disneyland from Austin station;  10 minutes of walk to MTR Jordan station for Tsuen Wan Line;  5 minutes to Hong Kong station from Kowloon station, Exit J2 to Tram Terminus to the Peak; Exit D2 to SOHO & Lan Kwai Fongl;  10 minutes to Wan Chai station from Jordan station, walk to HKCEC;  20 minutes to Wan Chai by bus #914, w
access: 1, Printing and Fax service for free (within 10 pages); 2, Iron and iron board can be provided upon request; 3, Mini fridge and microwave are available at the reception; 4, Scale for weighing luggage can be provided upon request;
interaction: You are more than welcome to ask for assistance or travel tips in Hong Kong with our staff who speaks English, Mandarin and Thai.
house_rules: There is no additional charge after full payment on Airbnb, except under following conditions: 1, $150HKD per night for each extra guest aged over 12, to be charged upon check-in; 2, $150HKD to be charged for late check-in after 01:30a.m.; 3, $300HKD to be charged for smoking in the room; 4, $100HKD to be charged for losing the room card;

host.host_location: Yau Tsim Mong District, Kowloon, Hong Kong
host.host_about:
Hello everyone on Airbnb! My goal is to have my footprints in all the countries in the world. (How big a goal it is!) I have been to Australia, the UK, Italy, France, Monaco, Holland, Hungary and Korea for travelling, and to the US, China, Taiwan, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand and Cambodia mainly for work. I lived in China, Thailand and Mexico for years and now living in my hometown Hong Kong. I enjoy every single moment travelling from one place to another. It's the best time for me to overlook the world and to empty my mind. It is said that the world is becoming smaller and smaller. We are on the southern hemisphere in the morning and appear on the northern in just some hours. The best way for me to feel home anywhere is to meet local people! I listen to their stories and learn their cultures, respect their traditions and share mine with them. This is what travelling means to me.

Thanks to Airbnb, it provides a platform for people to meet friends and look for accommodation at reasonable price. Star-rated hotels are great, but local hosts can give you warm welcome and make you feel home.

I have years of experience hosting foreign guests through couhcsrufnig (CS), but stopped hosting since 2 years ago. After I returned from Mexico to Hong Kong in 2014 to start this hotel business, I found that airbnb is one of the best platforms which combines couhcsrufnig and business into one. Look forward to seeing you, my new friend!

address.street: Kowloon, Jordan, Yau Ma Tei, Tsim Sha Tsui, Austin, Kowloon, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: 和房东描述的一样,位置很好,也很好找,到海港城､尖沙嘴､庙街､圆方等步行即可;紧邻多条地铁,去哪都很方便;房间虽有些小,但设施齐全,干净舒适;房东人很好,热心介绍周边好吃的东西,帮助打印电子门票,还帮了很多小忙｡下次如果需要,还会住在这里｡

This was our second trip to Hong Kong in two months - we were so happy with our first visit to La Boutique we were glad to know that there was one room left for us. The three of us shared the family room and it was a little tight for three adults but for parents with a younger child this room would be perfect for over night accommodations.  Our trip to Hong Kong was last minute and we wanted to book two rooms at La Boutique for two nights but when only the family room was found available we decided it was more important to stay where we were comfortable, where we knew the property was very well looked after and we had an established and friendly relationship with our host Vincent. The glass enclosures for both the shower and the WC in close quarters was a little inhibiting but we are family!! We'll be back and hopefully we'll be able to book further in advance and find two rooms available for our next sojourn in Hong Kong☆☆ La Boutique is a new property and it is becoming a popular place to stay and with good reason☆☆
地理位置很好,而且楼下有好多吃的地方;房间干净舒适,而且老板和其他工作人员也非常的友善｡如果下次再来香港,还会选择这家旅舍｡
Good experience,very comfortable and safety,where you can feel at home. Vincent is a nice and warm-hearted person. Highly recommend!
帮朋友订的房间,因为朋友家人出游,有老人和孩子,又赶上香港的特殊时期,所以一直很担心,但从前期订房到最后的入住,Vincent都给予了很大的帮助,预定后给出了详细的通关抵达酒店路线,之后还会确认客人的抵达时间安排接待,朋友到店后也有温馨提示注意事项,让原本在外的人十分安心,而且酒店位置超级好哦,朋友说,除了去迪士尼,其他的地方都是步行去逛的,希望你家生意越来越好哦!
Vincent非常貼心會提供許多玩樂資訊或是行程安排建議,房間乾淨整潔,下次訪港還是會想去住,謝謝Vincent!

It was a pleasure staying at Vincent's. We basically got what we saw and I was even thrilled by how accommodating the host was. He gave us a few places to check out and told us where to go and eat. The neighbourhood itself is great for eating and essentially somewhere you won't stay hungry.
房东人很好,还去地铁站接了搞不清方向的我,又推荐了好吃的餐厅｡房间如图示一样干净､舒适,电视还能收到很多内地的台｡重点是位置非常好,就在地铁站上边,离海港城､庙街都是走几步路的距离｡楼下就是香港本地人常来的美食街,随便进一家餐厅都非常好吃,点点味的早茶更是丰盛美味又价廉｡下次来香港还会选这家｡

房间很设施,各项设施都很齐全,楼下有很多茶餐厅｡
房东人很好,还准备了地图,在周围逛的很方便｡

Vincent and co. (sorry didn't catch the other 2 guys names) were really warm and friendly. 

They gladly gave us directions and suggestions on food & shopping. Plus they ensured that my transport to the airport was arranged (i left at an ungoldy hour) Thanks guys sooo much. 

The convenient location of La Boutique de Austin made it easy to reach from the airport just by following Vincent's simple instructions and its conveniently located near other stations. And there's lots of good food within minutes away by foot. 

The room was cosy and comfortable. The seperate toilets meant that there was no need to fight for it in the mornings and there was a constant supply of clean towels & bottled water.

I would definitely return to La Boutique de Austin on my next visit to HK.

Our stay at Vincent's hotel was absolutely great. They did everything possible to make us feel welcome in the dynamic city as Hong Kong can be. They helped us out with pretty much everything and we could always reach them for any questions. Truly recommend this place, as its luxurious and has an incredible quality/value ratio. Thanks for our stay!
I was happy to stay here!

This was a great place to stay, truly convenient and close to every destination you need to reach for. Vincent and his crew are very welcoming and care for your needs. I enjoyed having all the luxury equipment you'd expect from a hotel but not a BnB like complementary water, shower gels, towels etc. it's also nicely quiet in the night which I really appreciated. Directions are so accurate you can't get lost. I'll be back for sure and would recommend this place to all my friends, it's a great bargain for a stay in Hong Kong. Thank you Vincent and crew for this pleasant stay!

Highly recommend!It's the very first time I use airbnb for reservation.The room is tidy n the location is perfect.U can walk to Tsim sha Tsui or Mong kok in a few minutes.The reception is very hospitable n patient.The price is pretty (Website hidden by Airbnb) I can accommodate in ur place next time.

Value-for-money accommodation in strategic location Hong Kong. Everything was flawless from the room amenities to the friendliness and helpfulness of Vincent and his friends/colleagues who recommended us what to eat/see in HK. I felt really happy throughout my stay here and am completely satisfied with my choice. Laboutique Austin is top notch- you'd be hard pressed to find something this good at such pricing anywhere else!
房间非常整洁并且干净,床也很大很软｡由于临时决定要在香港多呆一天,房间订得很急,凌晨vincent也帮助我预定了房间,非常感谢XDD很实惠的住处,期待下次见面哟

Vincent and Leo are excellent hosts. They provided advices on where to eat, where to go etc. They also accommodated our early check in and late check out request with no extra charge. Note that this is based on the availability of the room. They also got a taxi service for us on our way to the airport at a discounted rate. The location of the hotel is a bit shady at first, the building is old. But once you get inside the little lobby, it is quite homey. The room itself is a bit cramped with not much place to put in your luggages which may also be the case for other hotels in HK. The bed is comfortable and nice to sleep in after a tiring day. Location is good as it is a short walk to Austin station and a bit of a walk to Jordan station which is near the night market. We will be back and will choose to stay here again. :)

Good location, with plenty of local food choices downstairs and nearby neighbourhoods. If local foodfare is not your cup of tea, Elements Mall is just around the corner, with international cuisine. Unfortunately, the weather wasn't that ideal with the rainy evenings. Booked a triple room which is fit for purpose. Room is a little on the small side, but then again, hey its Hong Kong after all. Overall a pleasant experience.  =)

The staying here made our HK trip very pleasant and enjoyable one. Vincent is a very kind and friendly guy and he gave us tips to reach our interested attractions in a easy and shortcut way. The place is surprisingly clean and facilities are well maintained (aircon, shower, towels and wifi etc all great)! They clean the place and change towels daily. Location was perfect which is nearby Jordan MTR. When we about to off to Macau with our luggage for 1 day,  Vincent kindly agreed to keep our luggage without any cost which was extremely helpful! 

Highly recommended this place!
Great place to stay! It was very clean, had a great location and very friendly people that gave great help and recommendations. I would definitely come back again if I had a chance to!
I enjoyed my stay at vincent's accommodation. 3 pax can be too crowded but good for single or couple stay. Its located near bus stop, mtr, ael and hk harbour.
根据房东的指南很顺利找到,这也得益于香港发达无所不在的道路指南｡房间虽小,五脏俱全｡very nice的房东,意外的小狗
非常满意,希望有机会再来,还有狗狗超级可爱~~

Great location for backpackers and tourists on a small budget, very close to the night market, easily to grab some very tasty cantonese dishes in the deep night! A place to enjoy the local atmosphere. Vincent is truely helpful and friendly as previous comments said.  The room is a little bit samll for 3 ppl (stay o1-2 nights is fine) but very well-equipped and clean.
距离庙街步行10分钟,晚上夜个宵非常爽,总之是非常local的感觉而不是游客区所以很不错｡房间虽小五脏俱全重点是很干净｡Vincent很nice很帮忙,一切很顺利｡

The hotel itself is newly done and very clean even though is compact, the price is reasonable and i bet you will not able to get a room like this in hong kong with this price range.Bed is comfortable and shower pressure is stable,wi-fi is fast and stable.
The location itself is really strategy, easy to go to anyway by train and footstep.There is a subway tunnel just opposite the hotel,just a couple minutes of walking distance then lead you to jordan station and austion station,you can take train to any station you wish to, or you can just easily walk to harbour city area, temple street area and so on through the tunnel. 
There are so many restaurant and good food just one street behind the hotel,I suggest you to eat here if you're looking for some good local food with reasonable price and variety of choices.
The communication with Vincent is excellent, the direction he guided us from airport express to hotel is accurate and easy to understand. He is a very responsibility,humorous and helpful guy, he is very knowledgeable with this area and keen to help. If you need any help about where to eat,what to do, how to go, just do not hesitate to ask him. His management crews are great as well.
I will definitely recommend you to stay here whenever you travel to hong kong.
乾淨､價格､位置都不錯的出租旅館!
The room is a little bit small, but the location is great, and the staff is very helpful! Would recommend to stay there!
房东为人很亲切,酒店位置很好,离地铁非常近,方便购物和玩耍,唯一一个毛病就是隔音不太好,其他都很棒!下次去的话还会选择这家!
地方好找,位于地铁站旁边,出行方便｡几位房东都很nice,提供地图､ (Hidden by Airbnb) 指导等｡房间简易整洁,很适合背包客｡
房間似酒店式,乾淨,性價比係香港黎講已超出期待
因为是从澳门去到香港,过去的时候都比较晚｡房东担心我们找不到地方｡提供了相当详细的地址,跟着地址走,绝对没问题,很快就可以找到｡住的地方离地铁站相当近,交通十分方便~房东人相当不错,提供一些有用的信息给我们,也让我们的香港行变得不一样｡总之,有事找房东,一切问题都能妥妥解决!住的地方也是赞的!棒呆!
地方很好找,出门就有地铁站,周围也有很多不错的吃饭的店子…老板人也很nice!房间很干净,就是有一点小,不过在香港算是正常的了…

Vincent was efficient and messaged us detailed direction to the hotel. He and his partners/staff were friendly, approachable and helpful. The room was affordable, clean, cosy and amenities are provided. The location is also central and is a walking distance to the MTR.

The staff even helped us book a cab to the airport and personally carried our luggages down and sent us off. It was overall a much pleasant stay.

Great location, clean, cosy and welcoming. Hosts ensured I knew my way to the apartment before arrival via (Hidden by Airbnb) . 15 min walk from Kowloon Harbor if you are arriving from Macau. 5 min walk from Austin which hooks you up to everything else. 10 min walk to bus A22 which takes you to the international airport. Not to mention the nice cafes/restaurants within the vicinity for breakfast, dim sum and supper at temple street. I will definitely consider this listing again during my next visit.
The hosts are very efficient for reply my enquiries. I love the triple room too because it's very cosy. Thank u for hosting us this bunch of girls!
It was a great stay throughout the 4 nights here. Vincent and his partners are really friendly and willing to assist us anytime. The room was although small but really cozy and comfortable.

I stayed in La Botique de Austin with my siblings on our last night to HK. We stayed in triple room. The instruction/ direction how to get into the property is very helpful and easy to follow. It was a pleasant stay. The beds are very comfortable. It was the first time to have 2 pillows per person. Room and toilet is clean.

I will love to stay  again in this property.
房东人很好,房间跟照片一样很干净,很舒服~

A perfect place to stay in HK. It is near Kowloon, Austin and Jordan Stations. There are restaurants, 7eleven, small bars around the building! The description and the photos here are accurate! I'll definitely stay here again!

Very good take care and room,
If chancewe will come back again
Thanks you for gideline for travel and direction
非常好的住宿环境,机场快线到九龙站,园方过了天桥就可以到酒店｡柯士甸站就在马路对面,走到海港城也很方便,还有去海洋公园的巴士车｡有干净的卫生间和舒服的床,房东和他的伙伴们都非常热情友善,帮助我和宝宝很多,非常适合家庭来居住,十分推荐!
Friendly staff. Quite spacious and well maintained accomodation. Very clear information given by the host. Highly recommend.
位置很好,去哪里都很方便.周边很多小吃｡如点点心.房间也很干净.舒适.房主服务热情周到!

Vincent's apartment is located in downtown area which is really convinient.The apartment is cozy,charming and neat.Vincent and his friend Leo are really helpful and generous.
As a frequent traveller,i strongly recommend Vincent and his LaBoutique.The experience there is fantastic.
위치도 좋고 숙소도 매우 만족스러웠습니다~
开始提交订单弄错了想取消重新订的时候,联系房东回得比较慢｡第二次确认订单后,房东非常热心为我们解答问题,去的当天还主动联系我们~服务好｡房间干净和图片一样,位置好
房間設施完善,空間對於香港這種寸金尺土的城市也是非常不錯的｡距離佐敦和柯士甸地鐵站不遠,離海港城等商場也是步行沒有壓力｡老闆人非常nice!!下次來如果在附近活動還會繼續選擇這裡!
很棒的房東及住宿,地點離地鐵站很近,附近樓下很多當地居民的餐廳､小吃,味道很不錯｡離機場大巴站也很近,很棒的體驗,期待下次相聚....
按照房东的路线提示,很容易就找到了位置｡房东很热情和耐心,还非常nice地让我们提前CI,有问必答(服务应该是本次旅程遇到的最好了)｡房间虽小,但也干净整齐,wifi也很好,对于赶时间住一晚过度的我们,也挺合适和满意!好评!

Thank you Vincent & Friend to give a very warm welcome. Small Space but convenience and clean, near the subway. Vincent can speak Thai 

เป็นที่พักที่ดีมาก ถึงแม้พื้นที่จะเล็กแต่สะอาด เตียงนุ่ม มีwifi  ใกล้รถไฟฟ้า แถวๆโรงแรมมีร้านอาหารเยอะมาก วินเซนต์สามารถพูดไทย และให้คำแนะนำได้ดีมากๆค่ะ

Highly recommend!It's the very first time I use airbnb for reservation.Good experience,and safety (Security guards at ground floor),where you can feel at home. The room was very clean and comfortable. Thank you Vincent and Leo,They gave us a few places to check out and told us where to go and eat. And there's lots of good food within minutes away by foot. Truly convenient and close to every destination you need to reach.
灰常棒!这间地理位置很好,麻雀虽小五脏俱全!床铺大也很干净卫生,最开心每晚逛街回来冲个大水量的热水澡,非常解乏!附近就是地铁站,而且就如房东介绍的楼下就有很多被点名好吃的,比如点点心,随便麻辣鸡这些有名的点就在楼下附近,非常方便｡五星推荐!
very warm welcome and good service
We had a great experience during our stay. The location is good as it's very close to Kowloon station. We can just walk there for the in town check in. The room is clean. Vincent is a very good host.
非常nice!床很大很舒服!老板很好,还提供地图｡这次去香港觉得香港人都特别热心,必须给赞!

We really liked this accommodation! The staff is extremely kind and go the extra mile to meet your needs. The room is quite comfortable and the building is well located, very central. We will go back for sure!
非常好的体验!酒店距柯士甸和佐敦站都很近,步行到尖沙咀差不多十几分钟的时间｡楼下有好吃的早茶还有点点心,房东人超nice,还免费帮我打印迪斯尼的门票｡想找性价比高的住处就千万不要错过这里!
根据老板的提示,酒店很容易就找到了,出了地铁就是｡周边很方便,海港城弥敦道都步行到达｡周边的糖水不错｡

Is a great stay in La boutique. Host Vincent & partners are very friendly & helpful. Vincent is very caring, called us to find out how come we not yet reached hostel after 2 hours of flight arrival. Leo & James are very helpful too, give very clear direction to few places we want to visit, & recommend few places for dining. Is a pleasure to met them & stay at this hostel. Highly recommended.
房间很干净,离地铁站很近,附件走几步路就是庙街,还有澳洲牛奶公司和义顺牛奶公司｡老板很热心,出发前发了线路,跟着指引走很容易找到｡香港的房间都很小,三个人的行李箱打开就不能走路了,不过床垫很舒服｡
房子很好找 位置很好 据海港城 尖沙咀 都不远 可以步行 因为香港本身就是寸土寸金 所以这个价格这种位置和房间 很不错 房东人很nice   就是像旅馆一样 有人打扫卫生   楼下也有很多吃的 所以晚上想吃宵夜也很方便 每天逛到脚不是自己的 回去 软软的床 很舒服 很不错的一次住房 下次还会去
住的地方离Austin和Jordan地铁站都很近,交通超级方便｡房间也很整洁,Vincent和他的partner都超级nice的｡总之,值得推荐!

离红磡火车站只有两站地铁,紧邻柯士甸地铁口,走十分钟可到佐敦地铁站,走二十分钟可到海港城和天星小轮的码头,四通八达,非常方便｡酒店空气清新,非常卫生干净,配套齐全,装修比较新,一大一小两个床最适合一家三口,大床有点高,但是好大｡最赞的是盥洗､淋浴､卫生间三个区独立,设计科学实用｡订单一提交就和房东联系上了,全程沟通顺利,服务和指引都很周到,帮助解决了找地址､行李寄存等多个实际问题｡楼下吃饭喝茶都很方便｡值得推荐｡
很感谢bnb提供的房源,房东很热情,还会帮助我们找到目的地,服务态度非常好,环境非常卫生,那天去到刚好有吉房,房东马上帮我办理入住手续,非常简单方便!
还好,比之前的时间晚了点到｡地方很好找,环境不错!

Although the room is not big, price for this housing is quite reasonable since it is in HK. I really appreciate the tidiness of the room, the nice decoration, and most importantly, the hospitality of the owner Vincent. Vincent gave us clear instruction to find the place, provided us with good travel plan, and arranged a taxi at 5am for us to catch the early flight. Awesome experience!

Very clean and well located from Kowloon station. 
It was also close to other stations like Jordan.  Overall, pretty good experience!
The host was also very kind and helpful too.
I can easy to find any of three stars hotel in Honk King with $120 us per night. I never lived in this small space in my life.
相對其他小酒店,這裡的房間舒適也乾淨,房東人很好,所有問題他都會耐心解答~酒店位置便利,去哪都很方便!!以後去香港會再來住:)
房间和房东的描述一样,所在的位置出行便利,楼下吃的也不少,房东推荐的都很好吃,是一次不错的体验!
This place is value for your money!!!! the host is very kind and give good advice for travelling. There are convenience store and grocery down the building and Good Dimsum restaurant around here.
不后悔选择了这间,房间舒服,房东也好好人,地铁站很靠近,wifi也很强,附近的食物也很好吃,下次肯定还会选择这间入住｡一个字-赞!
Our hosts were nice and welcoming especially Leo. Our triple room wasn't what i expected in terms of size but beds were very comfortable. smell of sewage in the toilet was annoying.

Our Hosts were nice and friendly. We were received by Leo, who was very gracious to accommodate my daughter to stay for free in our triple room.  Despite the limited size of the area, they got really comfy beds. Coffee, snacks and drinking water were all for free. The only setback was the smell of sewage in the toilet which oddly became intense when the exhaust fan is turned on; but they are sure to address the problem swiftly. Thanks :)
这次是带老又带小,先是我妈水土不服,再是宝宝发烧,几位房东帅哥人很好,还借了温度计,
交通方便､房東親切､淋浴水量夠大可以洗去一天的疲勞
บรรยากาศดีมาก พนักงานเอาใจใส่ ห้องสะอาด ใกล้สถานีออสติน ใกล้สถานีเกาลูน เดินได้ไม่ยาก ข้างที่พักมีร้านอาหารติ่มซำอร่อยด้วย
非常棒的入住体验,爸妈也觉得满意,房间布置合理,与房东的交流愉快,推荐了很棒的饮食去处,房源的交通位置总的来讲挺便利,步行可以去佐敦,有很多路线可以到达,推荐!

Good location and the rooms are cleaned up well daily. Aircon works well too. Convenient that the rooms were ready when we arrived earlier than check-in time, and that we just had to leave our key cards upon check-out.
Nice place and good location, Vincent and Thomas very friendly and helpfull, recommended us the fast and easy direction go sightseeing. Next time will stay here again !
小伙伴这次对我选择的房非常满意,交通便利,楼下又有小吃｡走路地铁都很方便,老板人也很友好,还会再来住的

My family and I had the most wonderful stay at La Boutique De Austin for a night. Vincent the host is very friendly and helpful, he helped us to store our baggage for a night as we went to Disneyland overnight. He also provided us some useful information like public transport and local food to eat around the neighbourhood. We are very thankful to have him as our host.

The room is described exactly the same as the photos and description. The room is very spacious for Hong Kong standard, and it is very clean and quiet with everything being close to perfect. The location of this room is reasonably near to MTR and it is easy to carry our baggage from the MTR to the accomodation as there is a slope to carry around so no physical lifting baggage is required. The accommodation is also equipped with modern lift and the security of the accommodation is very well too.

I think this accommodation is one of my most well spent accommodation. Its a shame that we only managed to stay for a night. Will definitely come back again when I revisit HK anytime later, and will stay for a longer period too. Strongly recommend to those who wants to spend little bucks (for HK standard) for a comfy accommodation in HK!
我们一家三口住的(孩子6岁)｡非常方便,推荐带孩子的家庭入住｡房间里牙具､沐浴露､洗发水､梳子､拖鞋､纯净水一应俱全｡公共区域还有茶包､微波炉､咖啡机｡Wi-Fi超级快,房间非常干净,本人是有一些洁癖的人｡楼下的吃的非常多,海鲜､韩国美食､烧烤､糖水､茶点一应俱全!房东很贴心,沟通全无障碍,是帅哥!强烈推荐这家酒店!以后还来住｡
便利的
房间很温馨,地理位置出行也很方便,老板人超热情,有问题都很好的解决了 ,还给我们推荐当地的小吃和游玩路线｡赞
房东超级热情的!还给我们提供了很多帮助 感谢~下次来还是会选择这家噢:)
非常感谢这间酒店的老板､大厦的保安大叔房间的清洁阿姨｡感谢他们认真敬业的工作精神以及服务态度非常的热情好客,有任何问题都积极主动的解决｡我知道,在HK住宿不算便宜,很多人都会选择“凑合”一两晚的态度去订酒店住宿｡去过HK很多次,之前都会选择便宜的旅店,一般在尖沙咀旺角一带｡但是这次带父母一起订了这间酒店的家庭房｡我不得不说,多花点钱住好点还是非常值得的｡
住宿的位置很好,交通方便,可以搭地铁去尖沙咀附近的很多景点｡房东很nice,住宿环境设备都挺ok的,除了房间有点点窄,其他都ok的了｡下次来香港还会考虑在这里住｡
非常好的房东 沟通非常顺利 房间很小 但是在香港这个寸土寸金的地方能够理解 房间比较赶紧 地理位置也很好
좋습니다 근데 주변은 좀 시끄럽고 방이 3명이 생활하기엔 좁은거 빼고는 모두 좋습니다!
地理位置非常好的地方 走去尖沙咀十五分钟 走去九龙捷运站五分钟 晚上很安静 距离庙街夜市也就十分钟 附近就是地铁站 房间干净整洁 不过适合家庭入住 三个成年人就有点太小了
房东真的很热心!
楼下很热闹,附近吃的很多,离佐墩要走一会儿,不过公交地铁都很方便,房间稍微小了些,三个人入住,箱子要一个一个人开,哈哈｡ 老板很热心,态度很好,还是挺不错的~

Vincent and Leo are the most friendly host that I met. And there were pretty helpful too! This place is really nearby the Austin station MTR and walk around 10 mins will reached Jordan street, Yau Ma Tei and Mong kok! The room is very neat and clean.
坐落在安静的大楼二楼,从楼下看更伯伯,到房间清理的阿姨,再到热情好客的主人Vincent,都给到来的客人一种青年民宿的感觉｡位置离柯士甸站或佐敦站很近,如果你像我一样喜欢步行感受一个城市,可以步行至高档的圆方mall,或者最具香港特色的庙街或旺角社区｡again,多谢热情好客的Vincent~
很不错啊 离买买买的各个地方都很近
Good location. Vincent was very helpful and responsive. Room was on the smaller side, but it was manageable.
Leo was our host and he was really attentive and kind. The hotel is really clean and is located right next to jordan station. We had a great stay in HK. Thanks Leo!
很棒很棒的一次体验哈哈,洗手间能跳舞哈哈哈,离佐敦很近,很方便就对了,也很安全,反正就是去了这么多次香港算是最棒的一次啦,之前去青旅也是很不错,但是价格是这个的double｡所以下次过去还会来的!!
a
總體來說不錯,地理位置優越,離地鐵站很近,方便去紅磡坐火車,去尖沙嘴逛街可以步行到佐敦站

Location: easy to connect MTR
Room: small but comfortable and clean
Host: nice, always connect, well communicated
床很大,卫生不错,店家很热心很有礼貌

初抵香港那天正好在刮八号风球,朋友来接我,我们俩直至晚上十一点才到饭店｡屋主一直在耐心等候,并且时时关心我所处的位置,很温暖｡
每天晚上回到酒店,很亲切地问我玩得如何,并以朋友般称呼我媛媛,感到备受照顾｡打扫卫生的阿姨,很细致,帮忙规制一些物品｡位置也不错,靠近尖沙咀,一般走路就能抵达,如坐地铁一站就能到｡总之是一次很棒的入住,比之前住的香港酒店要好｡
地点超好 走几步就是地铁站 房间每天都有人打扫换水 很满意~下次来还会住

中国有句古话: 麻雀虽小五脏俱全,在香港这个寸土寸金的地方,这个房虽然很小,但是真的很好很干净｡
衣服都叠好了,三个人住所有的东西都是三人份,离旺角,海港城都很近,出门就是地铁站,超级方便｡很安全,有门卫,有密码｡另外房东大大很爱玩,总是喜欢跑出去玩,不过有什么都可以问他, (Hidden by Airbnb) 随时可以联系,路线提供超级详细,做事情也很周到｡这次旅行很开心,thanks~
Convenient checkin since i arrive late in the night. Room is clean andlarge enough for one person.
位置离地铁站很近,交通方便,房东推荐的餐厅点点心好吃到飞起来~~
老板人超级好,告诉的路线特别详细,家人在那住的非常好,房间虽然小但很干净,性价比很高
这次入住此地,非常的开心!Vincent非常nice,对于我们何时到达都问的很仔细,也给予了详细的地图指引,所以一路上都没有堵车｡中间入住的一天出现了一些小问题,但是Vincent都很快帮我们解决了,也给了我们很多条路线推荐,特别赞,要是下次再来香港一定会再来这里的
可以说是超出预期了,其实没有期待在寸土寸金的HK可以住到这么舒适,觉得蛮值了｡房间完全就是图片里的样子,虽然整体不算宽敞,但床足够大也很舒服,浴室和厕所做了隔间,整体装修也比较温馨,清洁很好｡交通也很方便,前台小哥很nice给了超详细的路线,港铁柯士甸站出来三分钟就到了｡嗯,两位前台小哥有点小帅哟^_^
非常棒的一次体验 楼下糖水雄的糖水超好喝
住的很舒服,如果还有下次就来
住宿的位置很好找,按房东帅哥的指引,分分钟找到,地方小了点,但五脏俱全毕竟是寸土寸金的香港,两张床适合家庭游,但就是行李箱没法儿摊开,每次拿东西没那么方便,房子楼下有餐厅711和超市,出门过地道往东走800米是佐敦地铁站､往西直接就是柯士甸站,往南走过九龙佐治公园700米就是海港城
位置很棒沟通很愉快!非常感谢

房间出乎我的意料
老板即帅又热心
房间干净又人性化设计
楼下餐馆药店一应聚全
门口就是柯士甸站
佐顿站不远  庙街也很近
很好的一次入住体验
一点不比星级的差

去的时候,楼的正面在装修,绕了圈才找到进去的门｡打扫卫生的阿姨给开的门,进去后刚好有个空房间,把行李箱放好了,就出去玩了｡到晚上,店里的人就发 (Hidden by Airbnb) 问候我,然后也很关心我们什么时候回去｡回去有点晚,一进门店主就问你们到了,那能安心吃饭了｡感觉很温馨｡最后一天,他们也很热情指明去机场坐大巴更快｡房间虽然小,但空间利用的很好｡最好的是洗澡和厕所隔开｡香港很多酒店,其实房间也不大｡到底是寸土寸金的地方｡希望下次还有机会入住｡
房东小哥哥很帅!!!
Overall seems pretty good, but due to construction issue kinda noise inside the room.
前面在装修,要绕到后门去
订上房间后,房东就联系我们指引我们怎样找到地方,小酒店位置很好,靠近地铁站出入方便,房间内卫生干净,一大早就见阿姨在收拾房间换床单｡周边吃得地方选择性多,购物也方便｡香港寸土尺金就是房间小了点,性价比还可以,下次过去还会选择｡
The room was very clean and new, stocked with all the necessities like water soap and towels. Definitely would recommend for people on short getaways!
지하철 역과 가깝고 주위에 식당 및 편의점이 많아서 좋았습니다.
非常好 虽然只是短暂停留 但是体验很好 贴心哦 需要的东西都有噢 很不错
房东人很nice,问他一些问题他都会很耐心很详细地回答!也能提供很多东西,感觉很全面服务也很周到!这次入住非常开心嘻嘻｡
좋아
位置还是可以的 也很私密完全不怕隐私暴露什么的

We stayed at Vincent's place for our last night in Hong Kong. It was very easy to find and Vincent made sure to provide us with everything we needed during our quick stay. The room was very cosy and clean - perfect for a short stay! The location was great too - easy to get to the airport. Would definitely recommend staying here!
Nice place just next to Austin MTR. Great value for money.

후기가 너무 좋아 방문 했었는데 너무 만족했습니다 우선 생각한대로 좁았지만 청결하였고 빈센트가 너무나도 친절하였습니다 다만 아쉬웠던것은 좁아서 그런지 습기가 차고 방안이 내내 습하고 햇빛이 안들어왔다는것이 너무 아쉬웠습니다 3명이서 침대2개인 방을 사용해서 그런거 같네요 다음에는 2명이서 와서 햇빛드는 방을 이용해보고 싶습니다 감사합니다 재방문 의사 100%입니다
喜欢这次旅行 很舒服 以后还会来住 房东很细心很热情 位置位于市中心 很方便
位置不错,空间设计很好,在香港性价比很高
房东很热情 离旺角和海港城都很方便 楼下的点点心超级好吃
位置很棒,地铁柯士甸A出口,出了地铁三五分钟就可以到达,楼下有便利店和餐厅,这次出行带着孩子,房间里两张床真的太实用了,我和孩子睡一张,也不影响我妈的睡眠,卫生间干湿两分,麻雀虽小 五脏俱全,下次去hk还会预定,谢谢房东有问必答的照顾｡
The pleace was great, very clean and close by to the MTR, lots of shops and restaurants. Vincent was very polite, friendly and quick at responding and was very accommoding. Thanks Vincent!
和照片描述的一样｡性价比高,就是空气清新剂的味道不喜欢,不过开了抽风一下就没有了｡就是最近的地铁站没有到旺角那些地方｡要去八百多米远的左墩站｡楼下的吃的找了一圈,看起来不是我想吃的｡
总体来说还是非常好,房间适合三个人住
嗯,老板很好,早早的联系我教我,进酒店的线路｡环境也很好｡晚上也不吵｡房间设计很合理,床垫很软｡在这个寸土寸金的香港,这样的价位能住到这样的酒店,非常不错了｡我下次还来的话,还会住这家酒店的｡猴say雷｡
房间很干净!房东很好,提前告诉我们如何到达
房东很nice,出行前提供了交通建议｡位置也不错,楼下就有不少餐厅,吃宵夜什么都很方便｡地理位置也不错,打车去旺角尖沙咀shopping也不心疼｡房间干净整洁,也提供了洗漱用品,有酒店的feel,浴室和洗手间分开来,对于我们亲子游来说真的很便利｡隔音效果不错,走廊特别安静,倒是我们一家七口有些吵闹,非常抱歉｡半自助入住&自助退房,也很方便｡三人房特别适合亲子游,极力推荐

建物自体は少し物騒な感じですが､お部屋自体はとてもきれいで､快適に過ごせました｡ｴﾘｱとしても駅から近く､Centralに出るにもとても便利です｡

場所がややわかりづらかったので､現地のひとに聞いて探し出すことが難しい方は事前にしっかり周囲の写真や位置を確認されることをすすめます｡

とても快適なﾘｽﾃｨﾝｸﾞでした｡非常におすすめです!
很适合家庭入住 房间很干净 住得挺舒服的 就是隔音不太好
非常好,每次都会入住,很干净
A great and safe place to stay in Hongkong
下次还会去住!
麻雀虽小 五脏俱全
