The apartment was located across the Austin metro station, which was super convenient for taking the sub or finding restaurants and shops. It was clean, and just spacious enough for a short stay for 2 to 3 people. The necessities such as towels, water and toothbrush etc were provided each day. The only thing was that the first two morning there were constructions going on above us, which could be well heard in our room.

Leo很nice的解答我的疑问,提供优质的服务及推荐路线给我,让我和家人有了一个很好的体验,在香港首次体验了一把当地人的感觉,住宿的地方周边环境很好,吃的逛的便利,给的导航说明非常人性化及准确,让我这个路痴也可以找到,嘿嘿, (Hidden by Airbnb) 上一般有疑问,都会很快回复哦,基本是你想知道的都不吝赐教,当然房间真心不大,三个人住的话勉强可以,因为一家人,所以都是一个个的洗澡或者整理,BTW,干湿分区很合理｡
离开的时候本想打个招呼,可是前台临时有事外出没人,于是把房卡归还在了盒子里,不过我觉得这是对房客的信任,很好!会推荐给朋友哦!

订的三人精品间,房间不算大但是相比去年订的空间还是有富余点,房间就在前台旁边,开始还担心会被吵到,后来证明房间的隔音效果还是相当不错的｡洗漱拖鞋毛巾吹风机这些用品都备有,房东小哥很好说话,回去的时候可以先寄存行李在前台｡
附近步行10分钟左右的龙堡酒店一侧有24小时过境大巴日间38港币一人,来的时候不清楚花了挺多钱包商务车过境的｡坐地铁前往的话在柯士甸站A出口上文汇路也很好找,附近步行到朗豪坊周边商区只要15分钟左右,坐巴士的话也很方便不远就有巴士站｡到登打士街找网红鸡蛋仔肥姐小食店的话就稍微有点远建议坐巴士,这条街还是蛮多吃的,都很好吃｡
这次去主要活动范围都在九龙这边,基本靠走都能到,对了去九龙大药房名城大药房也非常近,步行15分钟内能到｡总之是很愉快的住宿体验,下次有需要的话还会选择这家｡
很开心入住这家精品酒店,房间不多,可是服务很好,从checkin到入住再到离店都特别好,屋内很干净卫生,淋浴特别好~洗的很舒服,地点也很棒,公交地铁都在附近,去哪都方便,以后再来香港也会住在这边
超棒的房子,对于三个人同行是非常好的选择,一个双人床1.7m在香港算是很少见了,爸爸妈妈住的很开心｡房间设施一应俱全,干湿分离做的很好｡地理位置很好,刚出地铁站就到了,在来之前,房东也给了非常详细的关于怎么找到房子的介绍,好细心~~楼下也有不少好吃的东西哦~性价比真的很高,下次还会选择这里!!
房源最大的好处就是性价比高呀!非常棒的三人房｡干湿分离可以提高大家洗漱的效率｡位置也很不错,地铁站出来2分钟就走到了,唯一可能就是说离大的地铁站还是要走个10分钟这样｡不过考虑到综合性价比真的很棒!
在香港不是第一次住了,但这次入住感觉很不错,干净整洁舒适,房东也很周到,刚开始担心找不到地方,房东很早就把路线发过来了,真的很nice~楼下就有餐厅和小吃街,非常方便｡去尖沙咀步行20分钟左右,下次来香港还会住这里~点赞
非常感谢房东的热心指导,让我们感觉到宾至如归｡
位置方便,房东给的提示也很清晰,虽然比较晚入住但是凭借房东给的信息就能很快找到｡

干净,卫生,舒适,安静,交通方便,实惠~
除了这些最基本的,暖心的小哥哥在 (Hidden by Airbnb) 里面指路和酒店提供各类插头数据线,以及小米充电宝和自拍杆的免费借用,都给我们超赞的体验~
最后敲重点,双人床1米7,在香港同档酒店里面真的太难找到啦~
于是决定这就是之后在香港过夜的根据地啦~下回见~
Place is clean and modern, though very small. As shown in the photo the bathroom isn't a separate room.
楼层有点小低,当时入住时阿姨还忘记打扫了 好在房东大哥联系及时,我们等了个半小时就好｡其他方面都很满意,交通方便,闹中取静,晚上下去散散步还能吹到海风,总体上来 这个价位很可以了,床铺也挺大很舒适
房東都好貼心會隨時應答 位置唔錯 其實比起佐敦地鐵站更靠近Austin地鐵站 但係如果第一次來  仲係遵從房東嘅指示 因為由旺角站到Austin要轉線 總體都相當之唔錯 性價比高 床都足夠舒服  下次到港一定會再次選擇裡都 多謝賽
房子离地铁口超级近,坐地铁出门真的很方便,房间整洁度还是蛮不错的,环境也挺好,还有房东先生还主动帮我们预约吃饭定位,真的很感激,下次来香港,一定会再来这里住的

Small room but that was to be expected. Had some issues with check in. Wasn’t given the full instructions on how to get into the main area and no one was there to help. Room was clean and beds were very comfortable. Bathroom is a little weird because it’s just glass walls that are frosted over which makes showering a little awkward. Otherwise it was a fine place to spend our one night in Hong Kong.
great staying ,definitely will come again
位置很方便,交通便利,周围也有很多营业到很晚的店铺和餐馆,设施ye he也很齐全,非常方便,希望下次zai ji再见嘻嘻
房东很奶思 热情友好 有问题都及时解决 民宿位置房东给的指示很好找到 去海港城很方便 房间的味道很清新也很干净 是不错的选择
房东人很好的 前一天就告诉了交通路线 提前去了给我们提前办了入住 房间很干净设施齐全
位置真是超级便利,出了门就是地铁,离庙街很近,附近的茶餐厅很棒｡三人间的床算比较大,适合三口之家,床也很舒适,休息的很好｡卫生间干湿分离,也比较宽敞｡就是活动区间比较小,箱子多了只能竖着放｡老板回复也很快｡总体来说,值得再次入住｡

房东很贴心,在 (Hidden by Airbnb) 上就跟我规划好了去酒店的路程,还是图文并茂的,很细心哦!
位置比预期的要好一些,非常便捷,离地铁口也就5分钟左右,楼下有些地道的香港小店,走去尖沙咀也就二十分钟｡
房间不算大,但是东西很全,床垫很舒服,总之很满意的,就是没见到房东本人,哈哈
因为想要一次好的旅行体验,选择了评价好的房东｡房间不大,但是该有的都有,卫生间干湿分离,插头也很方便,不用配备转换插头｡交通便利,地铁巴士站很近｡做清洁的阿姨也很好,还可以免费寄存行李｡总之很满意,如果再来香港,会再次选择入住｡
非常开心的旅程呀!床蛮大的,三个人住很合适而且地理位置非常方便,到尖沙咀和旺角都很近｡下次来香港也会考虑住这里呀
环境服务各方面都很好,房东很热情,人很好,提供很多自助服务｡下次还会来住的!
出了地铁就能找到,非常方便,期间因为房间太抢手,预定了两间房,涉及到要换房间,房东很贴心的把我们收拾好的行李放到了我们的第二间房,服务很贴心,打扫阿姨也很友好,入住第一天正好遇到,母上大人和阿姨聊的很开心,哈哈

我们算是幸运的,房东本人迎接了我们,热情幽默,但是照面太过短暂以至于我都忘了他长什么样了,哈哈｡酒店很不错,楼下就是地铁站,离维港尖沙咀铜锣湾迪士尼都很近｡地理位置也因为高铁的开通显得更加棒,预订之前完全没有想过会这么近,还可以直接走过去｡｡以至于最后我在留言板留言了,期望房东不要因为这个优势涨价或者涨价太多,科科｡房间的床品比较干净,枕头被子都很舒服,床垫也舒服,很厚,以至于要爬上去,哈哈｡按照人数提供的矿泉水很棒,省下了在香港买水的钱(香港一瓶水都很贵)｡缺点就是空调机会偶尔一阵阵地吵,睡眠深的人就没有影响;阿姨的清洁力度,我都不敢多说她,但是忘记换小毛巾防滑毛巾､补洗漱用品和不铺好床是事实啊(尽管洗漱用品可以自取),一回来看到床还是乱的有些不太欣慰｡一点个人的小建议:镜子那里可以安个单独照明灯,方便女生化妆看清楚些｡给其他想预订的房客:楼下的点点心很好吃,10点开门可以提前一点点去排队｡房东个人是很好沟通的以及回复消息及时的,总而言之是不错的香港民宿,会再来的｡
非常贴心
Vincent’s place is always charming and cozy.
位置挺好的,哪里都相对来讲比较近不远,房东人很好,回复也很及时,比较舒适的两天住宿体验~
超级好超级便宜前台超级热情超级划算

位置很好找｡
房东人也很热情! 
地理位置也超好!
位置很好,也很方便,房间里插头有一个是我们的插头不用转换插头,就是比较松,就是房间比较小,不过香港酒店都比较小,这家民宿还是性价比很高的了!
房间很干净~床超级舒服,干湿分离好评!地理位置好找性价比甲~~~~~
蛮好的
地理位置优越,就在西九龙火车站旁边｡房东给的建议去楼下的店吃饭非常惊喜好吃!房间干净整洁,在居民楼里也非常安全｡出行便利,走几步就是地铁｡闹中取静,完美!
這是一間乾淨又交通方便的地方,附近有好吃的美食,下次有機會再入住
你们说的很帅的,态度很好的真的是,可能我遇到的不是同一个人把｡位置很不错,可以选择去哪里都近｡自己谷歌就可以了｡你们旅途愉快｡加油

The location pretty strategic,  but the place quite small and dark for 3 of us even we booked for 3 person room.. and its inconvenient for us because the door lock is broken and we need to bring the key all the time,, if u plan to go with your parents, i am not recommended, but if u go there with group of friend i think still ok... but overall everything still good.. and the host quite fast response and really friendly..
3인실 이용했는데 좁은거 빼고는 만족스러운 숙소였습니다
交通方便,与房东沟通很好,回复很及时,周边吃饭也挺多选择的!
炒鸡nice
A nice enclosed space. The place was in a convenient location, very close to the MRT, markets, convenience stores and restaurants.
地理位置很好,房间和图片一模一样
很棒哦
Excellent location. Great bed! Helpful host.
位置方便,去高铁站和地铁站方便,吃饭选择多,老板提前详细解释入住方法和路线,就是房间有点小
地理位置很棒,我们海港城买完东西想打的的士司机都不载你就知道多近了哈哈哈,最后小巴车回去的也很方便,离地铁口也很近,地下通道就在边上,楼下有很多好吃的,点点心真的很好吃价格也不贵,谢谢老板的推荐,有什么问题老板都会很好的回答,下次来一定住这里,图文完全符合性价比很高了｡我觉得越别适合闺蜜行家庭游｡另外推荐一家烧鹅店,棋哥烧鹅店真的好吃不贵,在崇光百货希慎广场那边有2家
친절한 서비스에 감사합니다. 욕실이 불투명이라 동행끼리 조심스럽기는 했습니다만 늦은 시간 도착에도 불편함이 없도록 상세히 안내해주시고 교통편이 좋은 위치여서 홍콩 구석구석 다니기 좋았답니다.
交通便利,近西九龙地铁站中港城海港城,房间虽然小了点,但是该有的设施都有了,挺nice的,下次来香港还会订的
干净清爽位置好
超级棒的体验,绝对好评,下次去还会选择这里
位置很棒,非常方便｡

숙소가 좁긴하지만 홍콩이라는 나라 특성상 감안했던 부분이라 크게 문제가 되지는 않았어요~! 후기에 습기 얘기가 많아 걱정했는데 창문열고 환기시킬 수 있으니 너무 걱정마세요ㅎㅎㅎ 매일매일 청소도 해주시고 어매니티 굿굿!!! 에어비앤비로 오래 묵으면 수건이 진짜 불편한데 매일 청소해주시면서 교체해주셔서 넘 좋았어요ㅎㅎㅎ  문의시 답도 정말 빠르시고 프린트도 도와주셔서 감사했습니당~~ 오스틴역 코 앞이고 교통도 편리했어용. 아! 해는 잘 안드는 편이니 참고하세요. 친구들하고 여행하시는 분들께 완전 추천드랴요!!!
很棒的地理位置
位置非常好,步行可到达的打卡地很多,利用公共交通也很方便｡房间面积不大,但布局合理､设施齐全,安心住下没有问题,性价比还是不错的｡房东帮忙解决了不少问题,可靠,感谢｡总的来说是值得推荐的房源,以上｡(☆´3`)
离高铁站非常近,不论作为中转住宿还是游玩住宿都是不错的选择｡房东人很nice,送我们地图并在上面标注路线为我们指路,美中不足的是房间的部分插座有些问题,晚上睡觉的时候风机的声音有点大｡
房间小小的,很温馨,定的是三人房,感觉特别不错｡
位置极佳,房间也算干净,而且房东对交通的指点也很热心｡只是这个房间不太利于睡眠,外面风机声太吵了｡
床稍微有点高,矮一点就好了,其他都很好,感谢
交通超级超级便利､出了高铁站也就几分钟就走到､房东真的很热心!!!中间我们带给房东了一些小烦恼､房东也是很温柔的对待､真的超级贴心~所以大家放心预定吧~楼下餐饮也超丰富~ (Hidden by Airbnb) 都方便~很开心订到性价比这么高的酒店~以后再有朋友去hk､我首推他家啦~
位置很好 方便 房东热情回复迅速

房间位置非常好,距离圆方很近,楼下吃的东西很多,走路2分钟还有大公园,走路10分钟之内就到庙街了｡
房东给的指路非常清楚,通过指路很容易就找到酒店了
房间是非常小,香港的酒店一般都非常小｡难得在这么小的空间里放了2张床,三口个人可以睡的舒服
酒店在的位置非常好,去哪里都很方便,而且楼下就有很多吃的,很方便很方便

第一次和两位长辈一起住民宿,个人对西九的房子是挺满意哒｡房间虽小,但五脏俱全,也有备全的生活物品的提供,公共区域还可按需自取,周围交通设施齐全便利,房东本人也十分周到好客｡最重要的是我对房间的床垫适应得也很好,睡眠比较好哈哈哈｡房东先生还热情地向我们推荐了楼下周围的餐厅,确实十分美味!唯一美中不足的便是,房间外墙机箱的声音太大了,两位长辈不习惯戴耳塞所以没有睡好(对长期佩戴耳塞睡觉的我来说倒不打紧)｡下次和小伙伴一起来香港的话,有条件仍然会选择西九!

name: Chambre 2 lits, 15mn praia, terraço. Fran/Port/Ing
summary: Apartamento simpático e tranquilo habitado por um casal franco brasileiro. Ele, consultor e musico e ela, coach. Temos 2 cachorros amigos. A varanda tem muito sol e vemos o Cristo. Este quarto tem 2 camas de solteiro. Alugamos 2 quartos confortáveis e arejados que compartilham um mesmo banheiro. Você pode  treinar seu francês conosco. Nossos hóspedes vão adorar este bairro residencial a 5min a pé da Lagoa, 10min do Jardim Botânico e 15min de carro, da praia de Ipanema e Copa, Vá de bike ou a pé.
space: Nosso apartamento é grande, agradável e tranquilo e gostamos muito de receber pessoas de todas as partes do mundo que amem a música indiana e cachorros. Aqui é possível, estudar ou trabalhar tranquilamente, mesmo se estamos próximos dos principais pontos turísticos do Rio, sob um dos braços do Cristo.
description: Apartamento simpático e tranquilo habitado por um casal franco brasileiro. Ele, consultor e musico e ela, coach. Temos 2 cachorros amigos. A varanda tem muito sol e vemos o Cristo. Nossos hóspedes vão adorar este bairro residencial a 5min a pé da Lagoa, 10min do Jardim Botânico e 15min de carro, da praia de Ipanema e Copa, Vá de bike ou a pé. Nosso apartamento é grande, agradável e tranquilo e gostamos muito de receber pessoas de todas as partes do mundo que amem a música indiana e cachorros. Aqui é possível, estudar ou trabalhar tranquilamente, mesmo se estamos próximos dos principais pontos turísticos do Rio, sob um dos braços do Cristo. Os hospedes poderão, se quiserem, utilizar a geladeira da casa para guardar alimentos do seu cafe da manhã e a mesa principal para esta refeição ou um lanche.  Na varanda é possível pegar sol. Do
neighborhood_overview: Humaita fica entre os bairros do Jardim Botânico e Botafogo. É um bairro principalmente de moradia com muitas áreas verdes de lazer. Perto dos principais pontos turísticos e de praias. Próximo ao point gourmet Cobal de Botafogo. Visto para os Estados Unidos (USA) aqui ao lado.
notes: Moramos quase ao lado do Consulado Americano onde as pessoas precisam tirar os vistos para os EUA.
transit: Muitos ônibus e taxis na porta para o Cristo Redentor, Pão de Açúcar, praias e Centro da cidade: nenhum a mais de 30 min. O aeroporto internacional esta a 30 min. A melhor opção é o UBER e, se não for possível, taxi pré-pago no aeroporto.
access: Os hospedes poderão, se quiserem, utilizar a geladeira da casa para guardar alimentos do seu cafe da manhã e a mesa principal para esta refeição ou um lanche.  Na varanda é possível pegar sol. Do outro lado da rua existe uma academia de ginástica barata e moderna. Muito próximo existem padaria, farmácia e supermercado.
interaction: Durante a manhã, antes de sairem para o trabalho, os proprietários poderão sugerir pontos turísticos e dar dicas da cidade. À noite também poderá haver alguma interação com os hospedes. Nestes horários será possível ouvir Jean Christophe tocar flauta indiana.
house_rules: Não é permitido trazer convidados para o apartamento. Não é permitido fazer festas. Possível fumar na varanda.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Sou consultor, engenheiro de informática e músico nas horas vagas. Atualmente,  prefiro a música indiana e toco flauta bansuri e tabla. Sou francês apaixonado pela minha mulher brasileira, Bárbara, e também pelo Brasil. Temos duas lindas cadelinhas mansas. Gostamos de viajar e temos um sítio onde plantamos de tudo. Na nossa casa todos vão sentir-se bem e os franceses vão se sentir em casa. Mas você também pode aproveitar para treinar seu francês com o casal. Eu falo inglês com os que preferirem. Teremos muito prazer em receber você e dar as melhores informações sobre a cidade.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Comfortable and great location. Hosts very welcoming. Will stay again. Highly recommended.

Un grand merci à Barbara et Jean-Christophe pour leur accueil, leurs conseils, leur aide tout au long de notre séjour au sein de leur magnifique appartement. Tout était parfait. La chambre et la salle de bains très fonctionnelles et propres, l'appartement idéalement situé avec tout à proximité (banques, poste, supermarchés, arrêt de bus...) ont permis de se sentir bien.
Nous avons pu écouter les talents musicaux de Jean-Christophe et goûter aux bons plats de Barbara.
Notre séjour à Rio a été merveilleux grâce à eux, des gens adorables qui vont nous manquer. Nous espérons pouvoir revenir très vite à Rio et sans aucun doute chez Jean-Christophe et Barbara.
Sabrina et Mélissa

Un énorme merci à jean-christophe et barbara! Vous nous avez merveilleusement bien accueilli, votre aide et vos précieux conseils nous ont permis de passer un séjour mémorable. L'appartement est très bien situé, tout est à proximité (restaurants, bus, taxi, supermarchés, banques...), une belle terrasse pour déjeuner dehors. merci Barbara de nous avoir concocter de bons petits plats brésiliens, durant tout notre séjour on se sentait comme chez nous, merci jean-christophe de nous avoir permis de profiter de vos talents de musicien.
Le prochain séjour à rio, j'espère qu'il pourra se faire chez vous afin de pouvoir vous revoir.
Encore merci pour tout et pour votre confiance.
Sabrina et Mélissa

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Nosso anfitrião que no caso foi a Roberta e sua mãe, foram ótimas e atenciosas, nos recepcionaram super bem.
o apartamento era ótimo, melhor do que nas fotos .
No geral tudo perfeito.

O apartamento é amplo e arejado. Trabalho home office e o ar condicionado e WIFI, que eram muito importantes, funcionaram bem. Para um período mais longo a geladeira é pequena mas para curtas temporadas atende sem problemas. Sempre que precisamos os anfitriões foram bastante atenciosos para resolver quaisquer problemas. Não tivemos contato com a anfitriã Roberta, mas sua mãe foi bastante prestativa e no geral ocorreu tudo bem.
A estadia foi excelente. Local super tranquilo e estadia agradável. O atendimento da Roberta e sua mãe foi ótimo. Perto do metrô (550m). Perto do Centro do Rio e da Zona Sul. Recomendo.

Um excelente custo-benefício!
Roberta sempre foi extremamente solícita e pronta, tentando resolver quaisquer problemas rapidamente, e bastante flexível. Consegui em larga medida fazer check-in e check-out exatamente nos horários que queria.
O apto realmente fica a 500m do metrô, o que é uma localização privilegiada para quem estuda ou trabalha e precisa ir e voltar todos os dias, mas parte do trajeto é em aclive, o que pode ser um pouco cansativo sobretudo quando se volta para casa carregando compras, por exemplo.
Os móveis e eletrodomésticos funcionam todos bem, algumas coisas mudaram um pouco em relação às fotos (de Dezembro): o armário do closet não existe mais, há um suporte que permite pendurar uma quantidade razoável de roupas, mas pode faltar espaço para alguém que traga roupas para passar várias semanas ou meses; o fogão foi substituído por um modelo levemente inferior porém que funciona bem; a TV do quarto não existe mais, porém a TV de tubo da sala vista nas fotos foi substituída por uma muito melhor e maior de LED; a escrivaninha do quarto não inclui computador nem cadeira; e a disposição dos móveis na sala melhorou bastante em relação às fotos, a sala agora está muito mais organizada.
O apto é subterrâneo (subsolo 2), mas surpreendentemente apesar disso é um dos mais bem iluminados que já visitei, o único porém é a incidência aumentada de insetos. O espaço de modo geral é simpático e organizado, faltam apenas cortinas mais grossas, a da sala é muito transparente e a do quarto não permite que se veja através dela mas não barra a luz matinal.
De um modo geral, é um bom apto com alguns problemas, com uma anfitriã responsável e um preço altamente competitivo.

Ótima comunicação com a Roberta e seus pais, que nao mediram esforços em ajudar prontamente com qualquer problema. O apto é no subsolo de um prédio muito tranquilo entre Glória e Santa Teresa, excelente localização. Apto espaçoso e confortável, otimo banheiro/chuveiro, cama, quarto com ar, TV plana e grande, wifi excelente e máquina de lavar. Obrigado Roberta pela hospitalidade!
Ótimo lugar para ficar com segurança e tranquilidade. Espaço muito bom e um local de fácil acesso.

name: Chambre douillette & accueillante
summary: Chambre avec lit double ultra confo dans un appartement vraiment bien situé dans la Petite-Italie, quartier magnifique, à deux pas du métro Beaubien ou Jean-Talon, marché Jean-Talon et Mile End. Près de tout: restos, bars, épiceries, bus de jour et nuit.
space: La chambre est grande, le lit très confortable et la couverture de plumes d'une chaleur réconfortante, dans un appart stylisé, tranquille et très accueillant ! Vous avez bien sûr accès à tout l'appartement et à la cour à votre guise ! À noter qu'il y a 2 adorables chats pour une cure de love zoothérapeutique à laquelle vous ne pourrez résister !  The room is large and super cozy with a very confortable bed, fresh linens and warm feather duvet in a stylish, homey and friendly apartment!  Note that there is 2 lovely cats always available for a love cure you won't resist ;)
description: Chambre avec lit double ultra confo dans un appartement vraiment bien situé dans la Petite-Italie, quartier magnifique, à deux pas du métro Beaubien ou Jean-Talon, marché Jean-Talon et Mile End. Près de tout: restos, bars, épiceries, bus de jour et nuit. La chambre est grande, le lit très confortable et la couverture de plumes d'une chaleur réconfortante, dans un appart stylisé, tranquille et très accueillant ! Vous avez bien sûr accès à tout l'appartement et à la cour à votre guise ! À noter qu'il y a 2 adorables chats pour une cure de love zoothérapeutique à laquelle vous ne pourrez résister !  The room is large and super cozy with a very confortable bed, fresh linens and warm feather duvet in a stylish, homey and friendly apartment!  Note that there is 2 lovely cats always available for a love cure you won't resist ;) Vous avez accès à tout l'appartement en tout temps. Wi-fi, lave-vaisselle, laveuse et sèche-linge, machine espresso, petit déjeuner sur demande (frais suppémentaires).
neighborhood_overview: Point central entre le populaire Marché Jean-Talon (ouvert même en hiver), Le quartier Mile End et la rue St-Laurent où s'entre-choc bar hips, petits restos de quartiers et grands restos de renoms, cafés branchés et aussi à quelques minutes du centre-ville, cet appart est vraiment super bien situé! Between little italy and mile-end wich is two really cool spots in Montréal ! Good restaurants and little cute coffeshop on the street. Near downtown and Marché Jean-Talon and other really cool stuff like Jarry park !
transit: Transport publique à proximité/ Close to public transportation:  Métro stations: Beaubien Jean-Talon Bus: 18 Beaubien 30 St-Denis 55 St-Laurent 80 Du Parc
access: Vous avez accès à tout l'appartement en tout temps. Wi-fi, lave-vaisselle, laveuse et sèche-linge, machine espresso, petit déjeuner sur demande (frais suppémentaires). Wi-fi, dishwasher, washer/dryer, espresso machine, breakfast if asked (not included).
interaction: Nous sommes discrets et accueillants ! Mais nous sommes aussi toujours disponibles sur demande pour vous faire des suggestions ou vous éclairer et vous aider à chercher de quoi occuper vos journées :)  We're always available to point you in the right direction or to help you find something cool to do, but also respectful of guests who prefer privacy.
house_rules: Nous attendons des visiteurs la même chose que nous donnons, c'est-à-dire du respect et de la gentillesse :) We want good and kind people just like us :)

host.host_about: Étant hôtes Airbnb nous-même, nous adorons voyager en utilisant cette plateforme :)

reviews.comments: Je me suis tout de suite sentie chez moi! Félix est une hôte formidable! Je me suis sentie comme une amie en visite. La chambre était belle, propre et confortable et j'ai très bien dormi. Les chats adorables, et la déco vraiment magnifique! Le quartier est parmi les plus beaux de Montréal... J'ai trouvé tout ce que je cherchais, et ce, à pied! J'ai beaucoup aimé mon expérience et je relouerais cette chambre n'importe quand!

Séjour très agréable, la chambre mise à ma disposition était en tout point conforme à sa description: confortable, bien aménagée et fonctionnelle. L'appartement en lui même est aussi très sympa et très bien situé aux portes de la petite Italie. Enfin, mention spéciale pour les hôtes particulièrement sympathiques, dynamiques et impliqués qui m'ont notamment permis de découvrir un délicieux restaurant vietnamien!!!

Félix has a lovely place minutes walk from Jean Talon market and great restaurants, cafes and shops. 

The room itself was clean and cosy and, though we didn't see too much of Félix and her boyfriend, they were very friendly and made us feel very welcome and comfortable.
This is a cosy warm place to stay in with the most welcoming people you'll meet. Made my stay in Montreal a great experience.

Nous avons beaucoup apprécié le côté chaleureux et funny de Félix et son compagnon. En rentrant chez eux, nous nous sommes retrouvés dans un univers atypique et tout en couleurs: la déco est originale et vintage. C'est un véritable cabinet de curiosité! 
Vous serez certainement accueillis par Choucroute et Moussaka qui sont les stars de la maison ;-)

My stay with Felix was a disappointment. I booked with her because her and her boyfriend appeared to be friendly and provide a comfy living space, but my experience was to the contrary. Felix's communication skills as a host were not where I believe they should be. I didn't receive any messages until I contacted her, wasn't informed that she would be away from the apartment until a few hours before my arrival,  and received poor instructions regarding the location of the spare key (which lead to a drawn out process entering the apartment upon arrival).  When I later asked for her recommendations on places to visit in the city, she made no attempt to offer suggestions, instead directing me to look at a guidebook. 

The apartment was lacking in terms of comfort and cleanliness. The room itself was fine, but the mattress was very hard. The room is adjacent to the kitchen where most of the social activity happens. Additionally, the walls are thin, which meant that I could clearly hear the neighbor's crying infant baby  at various points during my stay. The kitchen sink was stacked high with dirty dishes during most of my stay and  clothes were placed on the bathroom floor for extended periods of time. The hosts are cigarette smokers and the smell (which i am sensitive to) entered into the kitchen and my bedroom. 

Overall, I felt unwelcome in Felix and her boyfriend's home. I booked on short notice, but if my stay was too much of a burden, I would have preferred that she not accept my request, as there were several other great options in the area. 

On the positive side, the apartment has interesting vintage decor throughout and is well situated in the city. The cats are really sweet.

J'ai passé chez Félix un séjour inoubliable ! Felix et son conjoint sont des personnes exceptionnelles qui ont su être à l'écoute de mes demandes. La communication a vraiment été trés bonne, dés la reservation faite ;) Ils m'ont donné les meilleurs conseils pour bien profiter du quartier et de la ville.

Du côté de la chambre, si vous cherchez quelque chose de calme, avec une décoration originale, vous ne pouvez pas mieux tomber. C'est un véritable cabinet de curiosité, l'appartement est plein d'objets vintage !

Il faut savoir que l'appart est à quelques minutes du métro et de tous les bus dont vous aurez besoin. Le quartier regorge de restaurants et de bars, et il y'a une vraie ambiance de quartier !

La propreté, l'acceuil, le côté chaleureux et original de la chambre … Pour moi c'est un 100%, je recommande chaudement à tout le monde Félix et son petit havre de paix ;)

Notre séjour chez Félix et Yvan fut encore une belle expérience! Nous savions qu'en y retournant nous ne serions pas déçus. Félix est toujours autant de bon conseil.
Beaubien reste le quartier que nous préférons! C'est vraiment proche de tout. Bref un bon point de chute à Montréal!

Our stay with Félix was fabulous. She was easy to communicate with, check in was a breeze, we were greeted by an open door and extremely welcoming flat! Her and her boyfriend were as nice as can be and I would absolutely stay here again! I can't recommend them enough!

I had an excellent stay at Félix's lovely apartment! Félix and her boyfriend Yvan were extremely kind and welcoming hosts. Félix was quick to respond to my last-minute request and made my arrival very easy.  

The room was very comfortable, and I felt right at home. Félix's apartment is filled with plants and cool vintage knick knacks. The location is perfect - a charming block in Little Italy near many great bars, cafes, parks, restaurants, and easy walking distance to Mile End and Jean Talon Market. I enjoyed spending hours strolling around the neighborhood during my visit, and found it easy to get downtown and to other parts of Montreal via the nearby metro. It was great to come home after a long day of exploring the city to a glass of wine with Félix and Yvan on their balcony. I had the best time staying here in Montreal!
Lovely home and hosts. Quintessential Montreal artist home, welcoming with very comfortable bed and excellent location. Our first choice in the city.

Felix and Ivan are lovely hosts who were very friendly and helpful. Their place is spacious and clean and artsy. You get the privacy you want if you want it but two lovely friends are always available to give you suggestions about where to visit and things to do. Location is in Little Italy, a really nice area with lots of cute restaurants and bars nearby. I really enjoyed staying there and would definitely recommend it to others!

The hosts made my guest and I feel very much at home. Both Felix and Ivan were helpful at making recomendations and urged us to contact them with any problem or concerns.Their artfully decor added a comforting aspect to our stay. The location is conveniently located minutes away from a metro station which made it easy for us to travel. Best part of all were the cats, Choupette and Moussaka :)

Everything about the trip was perfect! Felix and Ivan were very helpful and answered all of the questions I asked.  Even if you do not know anything about the city, the hosts will guide you in the right direction.  Their place has a warm and artistic feel to it which is very inviting.  The location is fantastic as it is in a "quiet" part of town, but still has many restaurants and bars nearby.  Even if you do not know anything about the city, the hosts will guide you in the right direction.  Felix and Ivan made my first Airbnb experience a fantastic one and I am sure others will also be impressed.

Félix and Ivan were amazing hosts, very helpful and friendly and not only did they make me feel completely at home, the room was light, comfortable and very clean and their two cats were very lovable and friendly.  The bed was incredibly comfortable especially the super soft sheets! 
They had an amazing coffee machine, and everything in the apartment was perfectly clean.
They are located in a vibrant and young  residential area that a good variety of restaurants and stores. 
I had a great time staying here and getting to know Félix and Ivan (to the extent that I have stayed twice!), and would strongly recommend theirs as the apartment you should stay in in Montreal!

A+++ Felix & Yvan are amazing! Their place is beautiful, clean and full of character. The house is in a lovely neighborhood, cafes and restaurants are an easy walk, as is Mount Royal. I would highly recommend staying here!
This place is great and location is perfect. Very close to the metro, local merchants and Jean Talon market. Hosts are very kind. I strongly recommend this place.

Accueil très sympathique par Felix et Yvan, nous avons apprécié notre chambre et aussi de pouvoir profiter de toutes les commodités de l'appartement.Très bon point de chute dans un quartier typique de Montréal. A conseiller.
Magnifique appartement où il fait bon vivre et où on se sent comme chez sois grâce à Félix et Yvan qui sont deux hôtes adorables.
Such a charming place, it had a very laid back, relax vibe.  Felix was a great host, and even though the location changed, it was still in a great spot.  I would definitely recommend!

I had a terrific stay. Felix and her partner were wonderfully welcoming hosts. The room was spacious and the desk was a nice bonus since I was coming into town on a work trip. The apartment is only a few minutes away from the nearest Metro stop, making it really easy to get around. There were also a ton of neat restaurants, cafes, and grocery stores in the area.

On n'aurait pas pu rêver mieux que ces derniers jours chez Félix et Ivan. Chaleur, amitié, simplicité et intensité des échanges, quel superlatif trouver ? Et en plus, pour les chanceux comme nous, vous aurez la chance de dormir avec Maria Carey. Bref, chez Félix  & Ivan, un must de la good vibe montréalaise !!

Je suis très heureux de mon séjour chez Félix et Ivan. Leur logement est très bien placé, l'accueil y est très chaleureux et leurs conseils avisés m'ont permis de trouver des solutions à toutes mes questions :)

L'annonce est totalement conforme au logement, la chambre et le lit sont très confortables et le logement est à quelques pas du métro.

J'espère avoir l'opportunité de vous recroiser dans le cadre d'un futur voyage. 

À réserver les yeux fermés si vous souhaitez vivre une jolie expérience Montréalaise !

Great location on quiet street in nice neighborhood.  Two block walk to subway and busses.  Necessary amenities close by.  Felix & Ivan were very hospitable and accommodating.  Speaking of accommodating, they speak English - this is Montreal where many people to not speak English.  (Perhaps I should learn a little French!)

Really awesome stay! Located in a lovely quiet neighborhood with access to metro and small restaurants. One of the cats is especially friendly and loves attention :) Sweet hosts too! Would highly recommend!

Un intérieur magnifique, plein de charme et de bonne humeur, à 5 minutes du métro et situé dans un quartier de Montréal à la fois paisible et bon-vivant.
Des hôtes toujours attentifs et souriants qui mettent tout de suite en confiance et justifient à eux seuls l'expérience. Sans oublier deux chats adorables. Top.
A bientôt j'espère!

Je recommande le logement de Felix et de son conjoint. Ils y ont accueilli mon papa qui me rendait visite à Montreal et ce dernier a vraiment apprécié son sejour chez eux. Le metro est a quelques minutes a pied et l'appartement est situé dans un tres chouette quartier. Bonne continuation

Super séjour chez Félix, la chambre est parfaite et très mignonne, super quartier, facile d'accès et vraiment à 2 pas de bons restos et bars! Accueil très chaleureux, et ils restent dispos si jamais j'avais une question. En tout très agréable, merci encore pour un super weekend!
Super séjour! Rien à redire. Appartement et hôtes parfaits! Aucune prise de tête, vraiment chouette!

Merci Félix et Ivan pour votre accueil, votre disponibilité et votre générosité, entre autres..Appartement stylisé et très bien situé, chambre des plus confortable et terrasse/jardin garni de belles plantes et autres herbes aromatiques. J'ai passé un très bon séjour. Merci

Super Accueil de Félix et Ivan ainsi que leurs deux chats :) très bien situé. La chambre es nickel. Très disponible, j’ai pu partager une soirée plus qu’agréables avec eux. Ravi de mon séjour, je recommande.
Great location near 2 metro stations. Very unique building character and fitout. The cats are very friendly.

Very welcoming people. They helped us with directions and eating places around and did not mind when we came in and out. The sheets were clean and there was soap and towels out for us.I am grateful I chose to stay at their residence.
Appartement très sympa et très bien placé et surtout des hôtes adorables et super cool de discuter avec eux, vivement recommandé !

name: Clean, New Private Garden Level Apartment in BKLYN
summary: 925 sq ft, newly renovated garden-level apartment in charming Kensington. Modern design. Private entrance. Brand new fixtures, including dishwasher, A/C, garbage disposal and in-unit washer/dryer. 2 blocks to F/G trains and large grocery store. Adjacent to city playground. 25 minute train ride into lower Manhattan. 15 minute walk to historic Prospect Park. It's the perfect place to unwind after a day exploring in the city and particularly well suited for traveling families and extended stays.
space: Our home was built in 1910 and is the last townhouse on a row of six, directly adjacent to a large city playground with basketball courts, jungle gyms, and summertime water features.  The garden apartment is completely separate from the rest of the home, with its own private entrance below the front steps, also known as an English Basement. The apartment will sleep 6 people comfortably and potentially more by request. We completely renovated the entire apartment in 2015 so everything is practically brand new. Because no one occupies the apartment on a regular basis, there is no clutter or other people's belongings in the space. We essentially operate the apartment as a hotel suite. As you enter, you'll walk into a small foyer. One bedroom with a queen-sized bed and large closet is located through the first door on the left. Proceeding down the hall, the bathroom is located on the left. It features brand new fixtures, marble tile, and a spacious shower with sliding glass doors.  The kit
description: 925 sq ft, newly renovated garden-level apartment in charming Kensington. Modern design. Private entrance. Brand new fixtures, including dishwasher, A/C, garbage disposal and in-unit washer/dryer. 2 blocks to F/G trains and large grocery store. Adjacent to city playground. 25 minute train ride into lower Manhattan. 15 minute walk to historic Prospect Park. It's the perfect place to unwind after a day exploring in the city and particularly well suited for traveling families and extended stays. Our home was built in 1910 and is the last townhouse on a row of six, directly adjacent to a large city playground with basketball courts, jungle gyms, and summertime water features.  The garden apartment is completely separate from the rest of the home, with its own private entrance below the front steps, also known as an English Basement. The apartment will sleep 6 people comfortably and potentially more by request. We completely renovated the entire apartment in 2015 so everything is practicall
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very safe and family orientated. It is nestled between Prospect Park and the historic Greenwood Cemetery, both of which are worth a visit. A city park is located directly next to the apartment and a full size grocery store is only a block away. Ft. Hamilton Parkway, which is one blocks to the north of us, has a number of great restaurants and coffee shops. We have also complied a short list of all our favorite neighborhood spots, which we have included on the backside of our welcome note inside the apartment and on our Air B&B guidebook.  Other local points of interest include The Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, Brooklyn Museum, Sunset Park and Prospect Park Zoo -- all within walking distance from the apartment.
notes: This rental is suitable for all types of visitors, however we feel it is particularly suited for families traveling with young children and tourists who are interested in exploring Brooklyn and Manhattan.  For those with walking disabilities, the apartment is all on one level, but guests do need to proceed down 4 stairs outside to gain entry to the downstairs unit.  The subway stop which is located just around the corner also has elevator access which most stops do not so if you are traveling with someone who needs assistance this is very convenient.  PLEASE NOTE that the rental may not be suitable for very tall people, as it is a garden level apartment. The ceiling height is around 78 inches throughout most of the space, but does dip down to around 72 inches in some places.  Our neighborhood is very quiet when compared to other neighborhoods in New York City, however please keep in mind that our apartment is still located within the city. Therefore there is a certain amount of urban n
transit: The closest subway stop is the Church Ave (F/G) stop, which is located 1 block south and 1 block east of our address. The F train will take you directly into downtown Brooklyn in about 10-15 minutes and into lower Manhattan in about 25 minutes. Getting to Central Park, Union Square, Greenwich Village, The Lower East Side, SoHo, Madison Square Park, Washington Square Park, Chinatown, Rockefeller Center, Roosevelt Island, Bryant Park, The Empire State Building, and Times Square are all very easy, as all of these sites are within a few blocks of an F train stop.  The G train will take you north through Brooklyn, into Fort Greene, Clinton Hill, Williamsburg, Greenpoint, and on into Queens.  The B16 bus is also located directly across the street from the apartment which runs directly up the westside of Prospect Park, which will provide quicker transportation to Prospect Park, The Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, The Brooklyn Museum, Brooklyn Public Library, and Prospect Park Zoo. Whenever we nee
access: My wife, Molly, owns her owns a holistic skincare line and crafts everything by hand  at her workshop called Brooklyn Herborium. Our amenities include a sampling of her goods, such as Anti-Yucky Spray for the bathroom and Clean & Green Hand Soap. When we are in town, we also curate a seasonal welcome basket at the beginning of the stay, which includes fresh fruit and breakfast items, to give our guests a little nosh when they first arrive.  I also own three restaurants and pubs in Manhattan and am more than happy to make a reservation for your group at any one of them. Should you be interested, the info on all of those businesses and Molly's businesses are all listed in our Air B&B guidebook. Please do not hesitate to inquire.  As mentioned, the apartment has its own washer and dryer in the unit and features a full kitchen with gas range, microwave oven, dishwasher, garbage disposal, and full size refrigerator/freezer. Direct TV and wireless internet is also available. Laundry and dish
interaction: The apartment is completely separate from the rest of the home, with its own private entrance to the front courtyard. Therefore, if guests are looking for total privacy, that is easily obtained.  There is a key pad on the door, which allows for keyless entry at anytime. This is also helpful for late check-ins. However, we live in the home just above the apartment and are very friendly! We are more than happy to greet travelers when they arrive and provide them with a short tour of the apartment. The choice is completely yours.
house_rules: We expect our guests to behave like they would want guests to behave in their own house. Courteous and respectful. We would consider small pets, but please inquire in advance. Smoking is absolutely not permitted inside the apartment. Smoking is encouraged away from the house in general as we have small children. Please do not use the rear exit except in case of emergency as the area outside is under construction and unsafe to enter. We encourage our guests to remove footwear inside the apartment to ensure health and cleanliness, but it is not required. We do not allow parties or public events in our space since the potential for damage increases.  We can comfortably accommodate 6 guests, and potentially more. Please inquire if you have a larger party. Thank you!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am married with two little girls, ages 7 and 4, and a 2 year old boy.  We recently moved into this amazing home in the Kensington neighborhood of Brooklyn so we could have more space for our growing family.

reviews.comments: The hosts were very nice and the whole place is brand new!  The space was clean - great appliances - full kitchen - washing machine, etc.  Good neighborhood with everything close, including trains, restaurants.  Street parking is easy if you drive in.  Definitely recommend this home and will try to stay here again next time we come to Brooklyn!

We loved our 2-bedroom in Brooklyn!  Our family's first visit to NYC was outstanding and truly memorable largely due to the great accommodations.  We had everything we needed from beginning to end.  Very kid-friendly & dog-friendly.  
Aron was great!  He made getting in & out quick & simple.  He was always available to help without being pushy.
We had concerns about finding parking, but were always able to find parking within 1 block.  One caution -- be aware that parking is restricted (for street cleaning) on all streets nearby between 9:30-11:00 AM on either Wednesdays or Fridays.  Plan accordingly.
Great neighborhood!   Convenient to local grocery stores, restaurants & subway.  My wife, children and I all felt very safe here.  We enjoyed walking around this eclectic neighborhood. 
We plan to come back to NYC to see the things we couldn't fit in and will definitely plan to stay at Aron's home, if available.
We had friends of our stay over at Aarons and they absolutely loved it! it was very comfortable and Aaron and his family were quick to help with anything they wanted. Thank you Aaron, for everything!
This space was glorious, clean, comfortable and convenient. Aron was super friendly and helpful to us. We would definitely stay here again!
The hosts were very friendly and welcoming- we felt that we could ask them for any help we needed. We also felt well provided for in the apartment generally, with everything we needed supplied.

Our stay was perfect. They had everything we needed. We had two kids and they had a blast! There were books and toys available they enjoyed (our 3 yr old said her favorite part was the reading). The home was also really cozy and felt like home. We had more things available to us at the house than we thought we would so didn't have to worry about anything. The location was perfect - walking distance to 2 stations, prospect park, and playgrounds. Aron was also great, checking in to make sure we had everything we needed but wasn't hovering. This was my first airbnb experience and it couldn't have been better!

Aron and his wonderful family were friendly and helpful hosts.  They even provided a little table and chairs that our 3-year-old loved using to play and eat on. The description and pictures accurately describe the apartment.  It was so great to have the space of the two-bedroom apartment with a full kitchen for our family rather than being cramped in a small hotel.  The layout is fantastic with one bedroom at the front and the other in back with the kitchen/living room in between.  It provided a lot of privacy so that the baby in our room didn't wake up our 3-year-old in the other room (and vice versa).   Enjoyed the very plush towels! Fair amount of noise during the day from the park/playground directly next door (although we largely found the playground to provide a pleasant background noise ).  VERY quiet at night.  The neighborhood was fantastic.  Quiet and family orientated. One block to a nice grocery store.  Our 3-year-old enjoyed exploring the toys/books provided in the apartment and he loved the playground next door.   He was sad to leave "our NYC apartment." We were somewhat worried about on-street parking but generally found it not be an issue. We twice got a spot directly across the street and twice had to spend a few minutes hunting for a spot.  But we never ended up more than a block away (and we were driving a minivan so had to pass up some smaller spots).  Also, the street out front doesn't have too much traffic so when necessary didn't seem to be a problem to double-park for a short time to unload and then find a spot to park.

Great neighborhood and excellent recommendations all around from Aron. Felt like a very safe area, family friendly, easy access to the subway, pretty easy parking in the neighborhood, and they gave a superb recommendation for NY pizza. Host was quick to respond to all questions. The ability to do laundry was really nice. I would recommend staying there, as long as you don't mind riding the subway into Manhattan.

l'hébergement est très propre et agréable. Le logement est à 2 minutes à pied d'un supermarché et de la station de métro ce qui est très pratique! Nous y avons passé un très agréable séjour. Petit bémol, le logement est un peu juste pour 6 personnes (le matelas gonflable pour 2 personnes n'étant pas très pratique).

We GREATLY enjoyed our stay in Brooklyn in part thanks to Aron's apartment!  Everything was as lovely as described, however, we felt the beds seemed a bit larger than a typical queen and double sized beds!  Both were very comfortable and we appreciated the choice of pillows with or without feathers.  With the temperatures rising in the summer, the fans were very welcomed and adequate and quiet. 
The location couldn't have been more convenient to where we wanted to go visit family who lives in Brooklyn, and the close proximity the the subway was GREATLY APPRECIATED!  
The apartment was perfect for our family (Grandma,Grandpa, grown "kids" and preschool grandchild! )  
Delicious restaurants reflecting the very diverse population of the Kensington area of Brooklyn and Aron's recommendations were right on!  (I don't remember if you recommended "Sake" for Japanese food, but it is close and I've been there a couple of times over the past 5 years and it is great!) 
Important note to anyone who is sensitive to fragrances:  Aron DIDN'T USE fragrance room spray prior to our arrival!  This is GREAT as they make my daughter sick....plus it makes one wonder if the owner is trying to mask a bad odor!  It was clean and fresh.
I can't say enough positive things about Aron and his family - they are delightful and I am hoping to see his girls grow over future visits to Brooklyn.  We will DEFINITELY contact Aron when traveling to Brooklyn again, and as you might guess, I would highly recommend Aron's place to whose looking for a place to stay in this area! It is especially family friendly!  Susan

Nice apartment  very close to the subway and supermarket. Nice and safe Brooklyn neighborhood, very fast and close to NYC. Just be aware that there is no A/C. Aron and his wife were very kind. Next to a playground and very close to Prospect park.

The place was lovely. We found everything in order. We really loved that it was just a two minute walk To Foodtown for our grocery shopping and to the subway. I would definitely advise anyone to stay there

We had a great time staying at Aron's place.  The apartment was a perfect family friendly place to stay.  They even had some books, toys and  games for our kids to play with which was a great way to relax after a long day of sightseeing!  We loved the diversity of the neighborhood and the fact that we could walk to the store and even to the pizza place down the road after dark and felt very safe.  Since this was another stop on our east coast road trip, having the opportunity to do a load of laundry was awesome!  We are very grateful to Aron and his family for their hospitality and would definitely recommend this apartment!

Thank you for the caramel! Keys where expected. WiFi ok. Full equipment (coffee, fridge, toaster, etc.). Close to Church Av subway (F), grocery store and Burger King if you want ;). Perfect for 6 people. Enough dishes and towels for us. No conditioned air, but if you open the front door and the rear door, you can create a draft :).
The only thing is noise from the upper floor early in the morning (6:30 am the first morning). Kids running, some stuff falls.
I would recommend!

Aron was awesome! Super welcoming of us and our nephews and niece (all of which are under the age of 6). He was very friendly when we arrived at the place, greeted us and showed us the unit. He reassured us that we could reach out to him if we needed anything. The place itself is EXACTLY as the pictures show it. Really clean and modern and kid friendly. It has everything you could possibly need for your stay. We highly recommend Aron's place and the neighborhood. Our family enjoyed staying here and hanging out at Coney Island :)

Aron & Molly were friendly, helpful & welcoming hosts. From the point of booking to our stay, we felt welcome & comfortable. This was out first visit to NYC - at the end of our first visit to the USA. The accommodation was ideal & comfortable for our family of 6 - 4 children aged 11 - 18. 

The accommodation was a reasonably short distance from Manhattan on the subway. We felt very safe & comfortable walking in the local area; even late in the evening. We would definitely return & happily recommend this as a very good place to stay.

Had a pleasant stay in Aron's place. The apartment matched exactly the descriptions, it was clean and equipped with all the necessary items and essentials. There was enough fans to deal with the summer heat, but I missed the AC a bit. 

The neighbourhood felt safe and peaceful. Subway station is just around the corner, so it is very easy to get around the city. Grocery store is also just a block away. 

Definitely recommend this place for everybody but notice the warning about ceiling height.
Lovely apartment - all very nice and easy (and clean!) Thanks Aron for everything!

My nuclear family stayed at Aron's place since they were in town for my wedding.  Aron allowed my family to check -in early to the apartment since they had taken a redeye flight.  The pictures depict very well the spacious apartment.

Aaron was very helpful and responded immediately to our questions and requests.  The Brooklyn garden apartment was a perfect getaway during our stay, very close to the subway and grocery store.  Aaron's suggestions for dining nearby were most helpful  and appreciated.  We were grateful to have a washer and dryer and completely stocked kitchen to use.  The apartment worked very well for four adults to stay comfortably.
Aron was welcoming and catered to our needs...
Wonderful stay for my brother's wedding. Great space, great host, great location. Very clean and comfortable.

What a lovely experience we had at Aron's and Molly's place! I was a little taken aback when we arrived. We'd just spent the week before in a very large spacious airbnb on 11 acres in Mass., and the fact that this place was in the basement with little light and low ceilings was a surprise. Kind of culture shock. But Molly happened to see us standing there, and welcomed us so warmly that we cheered right up. The key didn't work at first, but Aron ran right over with another one, and we went in. They had left homemade caramels to welcome us, and it was just so sweet! Once we realized how BROOKLYN, clean, and cozy the place was, it really added to our enjoyment of our visit right in the neighborhood where our son and his wife live! It was a quiet neighborhood, a great playground right next door, toys for our granddaughter which she loved, and easy walking distance to the subway! And from there, ALL OF NEW YORK CITY was within reach! The day we arrived we found a parking place right in front of the apartment! That was the last time. Parking was consistently touch and go after that. Aron was helpful and efficient. We enjoyed our stay so much! And we also enjoyed the caramels!! We would highly recommend these folks and their welcoming little apartment.

Aron and Molly are the bomb. Wonderful people who welcomed us warmly and I feel like we can now call them friends. The apartment was very clean, extremely well equipped, including a blender for my morning smoothies and the beds incredibly comfortable. It's close to the subway and supermarket. The perfect place for a family or group. You made our New York trip very special. Thanks x

Aron and Molly were fantastic hosts, super friendly and welcoming (but not too much!). The apartment was really nicely appointed and super comfy, even with our three kids. The neighborhood was really quiet and nice, and a one block easy walk to the Church Street subway station made taking the F train into the city a breeze. All in all it was great stay, zero complaints. Thanks Aron and Molly!

Aron and Molly were amazingly kind, generous and welcoming  to us to their apartment. 
It was our very first AirBnB and we hope to rent their space again! It is a roomy apartment with two bedrooms a large living room. There is a fully equipped kitchen and they graciously left snacks and eggs and coffee for our first morning. There were 4 adults and Aron and Molly greeted us with their two sweet little girls. There home is next to an elementary school and we were delighted to wake up during week days to the sounds of children playing on playground.
Their home is close to the subway. Grocery store, restaurants  and bars are close. 
The apartment is very comfortable and quiet. Aron was very approachable and generous with any of our requests and questions.
Our ride to airport on our last day did not come on time. Molly called a service they use and the driver was there in plenty of time. Molly and Aron are delightful. You will enjoy you experience and we will definitely stay with them again. You will enjoy yourselves.

Pam & Gary

what can we say ?
from the minute we arrived after the  long 26 hour flight from Melbourne we were made to feel so welcome.
the little touches make this bnb even more special - the bowl of caramels that were on the table , the basket of goodies in the kitchen of eggs, bread etc meant we did not have to go out and find dinner on that first night. 
this apartment is huge - it easily slept the 6 of us and the kitchen living room were roomy enough for the 6 of us ( 3 adults and 3 children) to move around easily.
 bathroom spotless, roomy shower, good water presuure , fluffy towels - aron and molly have obviously travelled heaps and know exactly what weary travelers need.
on top of all that they were so helpful in suggesting places to eat etc when asked.
.
this is more than an apartment - its an opportunity to meet a great little family who are around when you need them but never intrusive. we hope to stay here again when we return in 6 months.\thanks so much - we feel like we have made some new friends.x
this was our first airbnb experience - definitely the way to travel around the world

Aron and Molly made us feel very welcome and were very helpful with information about restaurants and grocery stores. The neighborhood felt safe and comfortable and was close enough to walk to Prospect Park and our son's apartment. The apartment worked very well for us and lived up to the description in the listing. (Including the low ceilings -- not a problem for us) The apartment was very clean. Thank you for making our stay in Brooklyn comfortable.

Aron, Molly and their bubbly daughters were extremely welcoming. We were grateful for the food gifts they left, in particular the "marathon fuel" granola bars, and they were kind enough to wish us well on race day.  We were not disappointed with the apartment either - fully stocked and spacious, it was easy to make ourselves at home. We picked this apartment for the proximity to a family friend in Brooklyn but we ended up in Manhattan almost every day, with great ease thanks to the nearby F/G train. It was my mother's first time using AirBnB and she was definitely won over and looks forward to staying here again on her next trip to New York.

Aron and Molly have a great space to offer with 2 private bedrooms, as well as couch beds in the living area, that can easily accommodate couples, a small group or family. The place is close to Prospect Park and very convenient to the subway, groceries, shops and restaurants.  Aron and Molly are attentive hosts who provide their guests with top of the line amenities (lovely food basket, fantastic towels, wonderful bath products made by Molly, etc...) The apartment was clean and very comfortable. We highly recommend this place!
Such a great space for a family. We had everything we needed, including toys, plenty of space for everyone, a playground right next door, and even a washer and dryer.
Host was easy to work with and the place was as described. Would use the host again.

I only had contact with Aron to book the apt. over the Thanksgiving holiday. I didn't stay in the apt. myself as I booked it for my parents and my sister and her husband because of its close proximity to my home in Windsor Terrace. Aron was a very helpful host. My family enjoyed their visit and found the apt. to be very clean and comfortable. The lay out worked well for the two couples.

Aron and Molly really make an effort to make their guests feel welcome. First of all a warm greeting at the door followed by a great apartment and the discovery of complimentary groceries lifts it above the usual Airbnb experience. Very thoughtful service and convenient for transport.

Aron and Molly were awesome.  They were great hosts and made us feel very welcome.  The apartment is well done with two private bedrooms and a kitchen that has everything that you would need to make a meal.  If you don't want to cook, there is plenty of options within walking distance of their place.  We would absolutely stay with Aron and Molly again.

I enjoyed my stay. The house was exactly like the pictures, Aron provided us with everything we needed in order to have a good stay including a book of interesting things to do in NYC, I call New York my second home because I am up here and spent a good chunk of my childhood here, but I did appreciate that he was kind enough to offer the book. My only complaint was that the noise level was high especially in the morning from upstairs, but other than that a good place to stay

Aron and Molly's place is a great find. Super clean and comfortable, a lovely breakfast basket, cozy beds, etc. it's perfect for a share situation as the bedrooms are on opposite sides of the apartment. As stated in previous reviews and in the listing itself, the ceilings are low, but it was not an issue for us. 
The hosts were warm and considerate, and in excellent communication throughout. Highly recommended!
All good.  My family if 5 enjoyed stay in there and visiting our old neighborhood.  Aron was very easy to work with and coordinate.  We would definitely stay there again when we visit.

Although Aron was away during our visit (it was Christmas holiday time) he was in contact with us before our trip and during our stay to make sure we arrived and found everything as he had arranged for us. The place is very clean, comfortable, with everything one could possibly need. Aron left a list of the best local restaurants (I would add the little Thai kitchen around the corner, please note). This was a very convenient place to stay, with full kitchen and laundry and a market as well as the Metro station about a block away. Neighborhood is an interesting mix of cultures. I felt safe, and the street is quiet.

Aron was such an amazing host. He was very kind and helpful even when he wasn't there in person. He was even kind enough to provide us with a blow up mattress since we had 7 people. Great place for us to rest after a long day in the city. The apartment is in a nice quiet part of town and is only a short walk away from the subway. Very convenient. The apartment had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. Overall had a great experience. Thanks for making my first trip to New York enjoyable !

Fabulous apartment! Plenty of room for 5-6 people. So we'll situated in a gorgeous neighborhood in Brooklyn, only 5 min from the subway. On suite laundry was such a treat. Aron was available to answer all our questions and was very understanding when our car troubles meant we arrived after midnight.
This place was awesome. It felt like a home. Aron and his family are lovely. They really nailed it on the details.
Great property.  Close to everything we needed.  Interiors are like new and very much homelike. Aron was helpful and easy to communicate with.  We will be back.

The place speaks for its self! It's a haven away from home, cozy, comfortable ,clean and more ",)
Close to all amenities and safe neighborhood... Bonus if u have teenagers Basketball court and Burger king walking distance.
All positive experience regardless of the negative cold freezing NY weather... 
Aron was patience with all back and fort msg,  courteous and remind us to about the space heaters.
Home made Caramel was nice touch.. along with cupbords of knicknaks!
Will be back for sure!

This location was great for our needs. The home is fully stocked with all items necessary to enjoy the hustle of New York and maintain your own pace. Conveniently located near a grocery story and train stop. My only drawback was the notice from basketball courts just outside the window and the low ceilings in the unit. Otherwise, immaculate location and would absolutely stay again.

Aron was SO nice! From the moment I walked in to check out the apartment to the moment we left. Everything was just like the photos! I loved the "hotel feel" and all the little personal touches, like his homemade caramels... Yummy! We had a really great stay and I would definitely stay there again, without a doubt.

Aaron and Molly are great hosts. They made sure that we are comfortable throughout our stay. Their place is very clean and nicely decorated and has everything that a modern house needs. It's a very kid friendly place, there are many toys and videos made available to keep kids busy. The house is on the main street with lots of stores restaurants and parks within a few mins reach. Thanks for your hospitality!!

Aron was great! The communication was excellent from start to end. The place speaks for itself. It was clean and cozy and the location was perfect.  We had a group of 6 of us and we were totally comfortable. Thanks again.

The home was very comfortable and modern, with all of the needed amenities. We enjoyed our stay, because Aron and his family made us feel welcome and made their home a great place to live. The location was conveniently located to the subway, shops and restaurants. We would definitely come back to this location when coming to NYC.

Buen lugar calidad precio, aunque está retirado de la parte turística de Nueva York la línea del metro está a 2 cuadras chicas, te deja en muchas de las zonas de interés turístico de forma directa  además de ser una zona tranquila y también cómoda para las compras  de comida puesto que hay varias tiendas y también un minisuper.
Amazing place!

Notre hôte fut très disponible lors de l'organisation de notre voyage: réponses rapides et efficaces.

L'appartement, les équipements et le quartier correspondent à la description faite sur le site et les pièces sont propres et rangées. Nous nous sommes sentis tout de suite chez nous et les enfants ont crié : "j'adore et je veux vivre ici". 

Les équipements pour les enfants (jouets, DVD, lits, poussettes..) sont très appréciables pour une famille. 

A notre arrivée en fin d'après-midi, nous avons eu le plaisir de trouver un panier garni de fruits, pain, confitures, lait pour notre petit déjeuner. Notre hôtesse nous a même cuisiné un pain maison la veille de notre départ, merci encore, il était délicieux.

Le quartier est animé, propre et sécuritaire, à deux pas des commerces et du métro (épiceries, restaurant) mais surtout à coté d'une aire de jeux pour les enfants.

Il faut préciser une particularité des logements d'Amérique du Nord: la quasi des sous-sols sont aménagés pour y vivre toute l'année. cela implique que les fenêtres sont petites et ne s'ouvrent pas. Cependant, nos hôtes ont très bien aménagés l'appartement et on ne s'y sent jamais enfermé.

Sans hésitation, nous reviendrions chez nos hôtes et cette fois-ci nous adapterons notre planning afin de partager un moment privilégié avec eux.

Enjoy in New-York City !!!

I rented this place for my parents, who were visiting. They loved it. It's even nicer than in the photos, very tastefully decorated. Everything was clean, beds and furniture were confortable, and both Aron and Molly were nice and welcoming. Would definitely rent it again!
The host is great! We arrived early on that day and they helped us to put our luggage first. The living conditions are great! An awesome experience!

Aron was always very helpful and efficient at replying to messages both before and during the trip, Him and Molly were also very friendly when we met them in person. Apartment is located in a nice part of Brooklyn about 15 mins walk from Prospect Park (worth visiting the Botanical Gardens in the park) and just 1 block from a subway station which is really handy for getting around. Subway station is right beside a decent sized supermarket. Basement apartment is done out very nicely (albeit in places the ceiling is a little low so may be a struggle for those over 6ft). All mod cons and very nicely decorated. Basic kitchen and bathroom supplies provided which was really good as well as things like washing up liquid and detergent for the washing machine. The welcome basket was also a lovely touch. The only downside was the noise from the young children upstairs. There seems to be very little sound proofing between the apartment and the house above (and I think probably Aron and Molly's house has wooden floors) which means that when the toddlers are running about and getting excited, you can hear it, and at times it can be quite loud. These are the things that young kids do (we know as we go on holiday with our hordes of young nephews and nieces regularly), so we did not complain, to do so would be unfair as its not the kids fault. It did mean however that unless you are very sound sleeper you are woken on the early side each morning and/or if you are staying in (which to be fair few people do when you are visiting New York) then it can be a little frustrating. Am sad to have to give this negative feedback as otherwise it's a lovely apartment.

Aron is a great host! He was at home when we arrived and personally introduced us to the house. Very responsive to the messages. He provided us with some food and snacks to start the trip. All the beds were very comfortable and the sofa (black) is different from the photos and is able to pull out to form a  bed which we slept comfortably in. Otherwise the place is gorgeous as seen in the photos. The shower is awesome too! His place is fully equipped with all the necessary kitchenwares and it is very clean too! Place is very near the metro and Batatas was a great recommendation. Basketball court was empty in the night and morning so not an issue in terms of noise for us too. My friends and family truly enjoyed our stay in Brooklyn with Aron.

Aron and Molly left us the nicest care package on the counter when we arrived, and we really appreciated the tips on where to eat, etc. (We ate at Wheated per their recommendation and it was great!) The apartment is cute, clean, and modern. We felt totally at home. They also had a great assortment of toys and books, which our two year old LOVED. They were very nice to put a little toddler mattress on the floor of our  bedroom for her too; we really appreciated it! They also left us a stroller, which came in super handy one day. They're the perfect hosts, especially for a family! We would definitely stay here again!

Aron and Molly really are the greatest care-givers! They supplied us with everything you could wish for (advise on where to go and how, freshly baked bread, brownies and the lot). The apartment is cozy and clean and provides everything you need (even more than I own myself at home, to be frank...). The neighborhood is quiet and equipped with nice little spots for coffee and food.
We would definitely go there again when visiting NYC.

Très bon accueil dans cet appartement cosy propre et chaleureux. Tout est fait pour passer un bon séjour avec à proximité métro et commerces. 
Aaron et sa famille tres sympa
A recommander +++

We stayed here for a week and had a great time. The space and clean and welcoming, just as described. The hosts are very nice and friendly and accommodating, we said hi but they totally gave us our space. The subway station is so close, and the neighborhood safe. I will definitely stay here again.

Aron and his wife were wonderful! The apartment was exactly what we expected and best of all it was very close to the subway.! Everything was new and well taken care of. The neighborhood was safe and clean.  We loved it. Can't wait to stay there again! Thank you!!!

This was our first time in New York and we had a great an amazing stay at Aron's place in Brooklyn! Aron was very friendly and made us feel welcomed and comfortable. He gave us some great recommendations and had left us a complimentary package with breakfast/tea items. Super Thoughtful! Aron's place was Clean and very well equipped, it had everything we needed.  The location is very convenient and in a safe neighborhood, with a bus and subway station just a block away. With any questions we had, Aron always replied within minutes, so that was really nice! Super reliable and went out of his way to help us out with a few things! Would definitely recommend and stay here again! Thanks Aron!

Aron and Molly have a wonderful place at a convenient location. We arrived at the location late in the night and they had left the key in a lock for us to pick up and enter the house. We were pleasantly surprised by their thoughtfulness, as they provided us with a complimentary breakfast package. This really helped us as we did not have time to shop in the night before arriving at the place. They were also very friendly and helpful in communicating everything to us.

Aron and his family are wonderful hosts and their place was even better than the pictures. It was very accurate as mentioned and was very clean upon arrival. Checkin procedure was very fluent and Aron explained us everything there is to know about the place and neighborhood. They have two cute and very active daughters as well. The kitchen was very well maintained and provided for containing all utensils and equipment one might need. The AC works well throughout the apartment and the place is very spacious for a family. The location of the house couldnt be better. It is a very nice neighborhood and subway station and market just a couple of minutes away. The internet was amazing and never got disconnected. Aron helped us with everything we needed and we would definitly love to stay at his place again. Thanks for a great Airbnb experience!

Everything was as was written by others.  Aron was easy and attentive.  The apt was better than advertised with much more offerings than other airbnb's I have stayed in and the area was quiet, clean, and vey accessible to BK and Manhattan.  Thank you Aron.

On our first night, we were very excited to walk into a great basement apartment in Brooklyn! Aron is a welcoming host and we'd be happy to stay again!!

Very responsive, great & convenient location (grocery store, metro, restaurants, etc.), and the place was very clean and well equipped.
They are a great host as they are good to at responding questions before staying. The house is clean and everything is there.

We had a great stay at Aron's place in Brooklyn! It was clean, well-appointed, and conveniently located. Our 4 year old son loved the toys and books in the living room. The kitchen was stocked with eggs, bread, milk, etc. which made preparing a quick breakfast very easy. The neighborhood is nice and very quiet at night. We met Aron briefly on our last night (he and his family were out of town during most of our stay) and he was very friendly.
Very welcoming and accommodative host, clean and comfortable place.

Prior to our check-in, Aron answered all our questions very promptly via email and this was very helpful.  Their space is lovely, clean and comfortable.  We hope to use his space again in the near future.

Aron made us feel so welcomed, with a basket of goodies and breakfast supplies.  The garden apartment was very clean and well organized.  There were even books and toys for our grandchildren!  The location is superb with a subway stop, grocery store and a park all within one block.  This is certainly a family friendly place and we enjoyed meeting Aron and his lovely wife.  I would recomend this location in a heartbeat.
Aron was a wonderful and welcoming host. The apartment was beautiful, clean and was stocked with everything we could need. Thank you Aron!

This apartment is even more beautiful than the pictures. We have spent a great time there .Perfect for family with kids: playground next door , toys available in the appartment, tv , dvd player, wifi....
The shower is very big so easy to use.
The place is neat, fully equipped and even more with comfortable beds.
Aron and Molly are great hosts and very welcoming , providing all the attention and help needed.
This place is to be recommended to enjoy visiting NYC. Very close to the F-line (subway), a supermarket 200m away and more. we will definitely come back.
Deborah, Raphael, Gabriella, Elinor and Liam

The house was very clean and ready for the whole family. We found many many pleasant details like breakfast in the fridge or toys for the kids. Aron  was very quick to respond to all of our messages and everything was super easy. Definitively a great value for money choice in New York.

The apartment is conveniently located near the metro station. It was super clean and well prepared for our arrival. The hosts were so welcoming and helpful. My friends and I stayed here for 3 nights and had no problem going back and forth from Brooklyn to Manhattan.

La petite famille d'Aron nous a accueilli très chaleureusement et a tout fait pour nous faciliter notre arrivée sur place (renseignements avant le vol, de quoi se faire un petit déjeuner pour le lendemain matin et les jours suivants, un apéro improvisé le lendemain au frais sur leur terrasse,...etc).
Nous avons également été gâtés pendant notre séjour (pain maison, cookies,...). Bref, le top !
Le quartier est super : le métro vers Manhattan ou Conney Island à deux pas, de quoi faire des courses complètes pour nos repas du soir à deux pas, des restaurants à proximité, quartier très calme et très sûr.
L'appartement est très bien agencé : deux chambres séparés, aux deux extrémités de l'appartement, une cuisine très bien équipée, un salon-salle à manger suffisamment spacieux, une salle de bain avec douche à l'italienne très agréable après une journée de marche !
Aron et sa famille sont disponibles à tout moment en cas de besoin, et surtout ne pas hésiter à aller manger, bruncher ou boire un verre dans l'un des établissements que tient Aron !
On recommande !

Great place in the suburbs which is very close to public transport and shops. 

Very cosy with plenty of room for all your luggage and well equipped with all modern appliances to make the stay more enjoyable.

Excellent apt, very nice and cosy. We felt like if we were at home. Aron was always interested in how was everything going. The apt has everything what you need, full equipped. Good for 5 guests. Near subway. We really recommend it.

Thanks Aron and Moly
房東訊息回覆快速! 還用心為我們準備了一些吐司､燕麥､蛋､牛奶､水果,設備非常齊全,除了靠近門口的房間收不到wifi,其他無線網路都非常快速,浴室乾濕分離,水壓很足夠,有洗衣機烘衣機很方便,離地鐵走路不到五分鐘,地鐵旁就有超市,路口就有郵筒可以寄明信片,附近的環境悠閒不複雜,入住前後都可以寄放行李,近乎完美~

I am so glad I chose to stay at Aron's place on my most recent trip with my family. He and his wife Molly are definitely Super Hosts!! From our arrival to departure we felt very welcome. The space is just as advertised and we had everything we needed for a pleasant stay. We loved being so close to the F train and felt completely safe coming and going. Aron responded very quickly to all communication. I would definitely stay here again!

In our opinion the apartment is accurately described in the profile. Functional and well kept, in a peaceful neighbourhood, close to subway and grocery store. Works well as a base camp for excursions.

Molly and Aron are great hosts. Helpful yet unobtrusive. They were particularly supportive and understanding when we lost a passport on our way home.

Yes, Aron is really A super host! We were six staying in the apt and were very comfortable. Very clean place and we got the best of help and tips from Aron and Molly. They made our stay in NY really great!

This house is amazing, very cousy. Like other people said, is block and a half from Starion F (that takes you to Manhattan). And next to it is a grocery store. The neighborhood is very nice, no problem. And Aron was very helpful, he receives you in the house with some groceries for you for the week. He comunicates with you as fast as you can. When I come back to NY, will DEFINITLEY come to this place again.
Awesome place to stay!!
Aron and Molly have been really nice and helpful!the apartment was clean and cozy, perfect for a family or friends, and really close  to the subway to Manhattan.
The property is warm, tidy and clean.  Really good location,  so handy to subway. Aron had been very helpful during our stay.  Thanks a lot.

Aron and Molly are great! The house is perfectly located just 2 minutes away from the F and G trains. Reaching Times Square is as close as it can be so that you don't have to overpay for a house in Manhattan and still be close enough to all the "action". Our stay was very pleasant and we had no issues. The apartment is big and very clean. Communicating with Aron was very easy and his replies were really fast. This particular house is a great value for anyone travelling on a budget!Thank you guys for everything you did for us! I will surely be visiting again!
This is Exhibit A for what you want out of an Airbnb.

This place is beyond great! It was what we called a "pimped out basement." Getting to Manhattan was very easy from this home. The subway is also conveniently located just a block down. There's also a Food Town right where the subway is if you decide to go grocery shopping. Aron responded very quickly, even when I texted him at 11 pm because we had a problem with the shower. The place seriously provided us with everything and anything we needed. It was more than what we expected. The neighborhood is very safe and quiet at night. I would recommend this place to anyone who is staying in New York.
Loved that it was two blocks from the F and G lines

This is a wonderful apartment, and truly great for kids! Its close to lots of things, and Aron and his family are wonderful hosts. They left us delish snacks, they have great books and toys for your kiddies to use, the beds are comfy, and the place even has a washer/dryer! It is situated next to a great playground and close to a yummy lighting-fast coffee shop. What more do you need for a super trip to Brooklyn?

My wife and I and our 18 month old daughter had a nice weekend at Aron's place. The space is as advertised, and worked very well for us. Being right next to a playground and half a block from the grocery store and subway stop was extremely convenient!

We will likely stay here again in the future.

Wonderful, clean, modern and convenient. This was the perfect place to stay when we came to town for a 40th bday party. We were able to walk everywhere. The neighborhood was nice and quiet. Easy parking on the street. Great mediterranean food at Batata nearby. Aron was always quick to respond to questions. The home is next to basketball courts, but this didn't bother us at all. Hope to come back again sometime!

This was our first visit to NY. Perfect place for family. Close to the F train, clean and welcoming.  All the extra touches from providing us some groceries (breakfast) to a well appointed kitchen and bath, plus the convenience of the subway, you cannot go wrong. Aron is also quick in responding to my inquiries. Enjoy this Brooklyn jewel!
Great location in Brooklyn  close to the subway and local store. Don't miss the things local like the wonderful cemetery just a block away full of History and Beauty.
Aron was a great host and very responsive. I highly recommend this place in Brooklyn!
Good place : quiet, near subway, big, enough beds, good confort, good deal, ...

Een fantastische locatie om te verblijven. Zeer rustig, subway dichtbij en gemakkelijke verbindingen naar Manhattan, winkel in de buurt. Aron en Molly zijn steeds bereid om vragen te beantwoorden. Contact verloopt zeer vlot. Een aanrader!

Tolles,großes,sehr gut ausgestattetes und frisch renoviertes (Website hidden by Airbnb) kurzer Weg zur Subwaystation und zum Supermarkt.Aron und seine Familie sind unheimlich freundlich,hilfsbereit und unkompliziert.
