Wir haben auch eine von Arons Bars probiert und können sie wirklich weiterempfehlen.Auf jeden Fall sollte man auch bei seiner Frau Molly im Herborium vorbeischauen.
Wir würden jederzeit wieder bei Aaron buchen, absolute Weiterempfehlung.
Een hele fijne, rustige plek op steenworp afstand van de metro en leuke restaurants. Appartement is van alle gemakken voorzien!

We cannot recommend Aron's place enough!!  We are a family of 3 kids and 3 adults and it was perfect for us.  Close enough to the city to get in there and get around.  We found the area family friendly - lots to do including prospect park, zoo, botanical gardens.  Our kids had so much fun.  Hosts are lovely, made us feel very welcomed.

Exactly as pictured and described. Make sure to read through so you are no surprised by the low ceiling. 

Aron and his family were very friendly and accommodating. He was very quick with any communications which made decision making for our group a lot easier. 

Subway is right around the corner which was great. Getting back and forth to Manhattan took a while but lyft and uber options help with the late nights.

Logement très pratique pour une visite express de New York. Même s'il faut environ 40 minutes par métro pour rejoindre Manhattan, ce logement permet par son équipement et la proximité des commerces et de la station de métro de bien s'organiser et de limiter les dépenses coûteuses de restaurant. Aron et sa famille vivant dans la même habitation, ce dernier est disponible immédiatement pour conseils. Il nous a aussi assurer la réservation d'un taxi pour notre départ.

Aron's place is a perfect place to stay for those visiting New York city.  It is less than 5 minutes walk to subway station which access directly to Manhattan.  The surrounding is very safe and very near to supermarket and restaurants.  Aron is an excellent host.  The place is clean and has all the needed amenities.  We are a party of 6 and we fit comfortably.

Nuestra estancia en el apartamento de Aron fue fabulosa,éramos 6 personas, 4 adultos y 2 niños, está muy bien ubicada en cuanto a paradas de metro, supermercados, lugares de entretenimiento..el apartamento está completamente equipado, entras y sales con puerta independiente, con lo cuál te aporta mucha comodidad...volveríamos sin dudarlo..los anfitriones son estupendos, siempre están ahí para lo que necesites.. gracias por todo.

This is a cute little basement apartment with everything you need. The kitchen and bathrooms are updated nicely and there was enough room for 7 of us. The owners are nice and also left little breakfast treats for us.
Good value apartment which was only 5 mins from the subway. It is a 30-40 minute ride into midtown Manhattan so be prepared for that. Aron was a great host and was very responsive and helpful.

This is a great neighborhood, and very convenient to the Church Ave. subway to get into Manhattan.  The price is very reasonable for a 2 bedroom in Brooklyn, and the owner was very responsive and helpful.  

From 6 a.m. until midnight, there is a constant basketball bouncing noise right outside the kitchen window, which is mildly annoying, but we spent most of our time seeing sights, so it wasn't too much of a bother.

Aron and Mollie's place was terrific - great location near the subway and a supermarket and within walking distance of beautiful Green-wood Cemetery and Prospect Park. The apartment itself is very well equipped -with high end appliances, washing machine, dryer, dishwasher,fridge, stove, pots and pans, etc.  It was particularly nice to find a quart of milk, fresh eggs and butter in the fridge and apples and granola on the counter. There was lots of room with comfortable beds, a large living room area and very nice bathroom.  Parking is available on the local streets.  We would stay there again in a heartbeat!

Très bon séjour chez Aron, le logement se trouve près du métro dans un quartier sympathique et est très propre et fonctionnel. Aron est très à l'écoute et répond vite à toute demande ou besoin et donne beaucoup de conseils de visite.
Ne pas oublier cependant que le logement se trouve en "sous-sol", c'est bas de plafond et on ne voit pas beaucoup le jour. Cela ne pose pas de problème en été si vous passez la journée en ville.

Nous avons apprécié l'attention d'Aron : nous avions du lait et des œufs pour faire un petit déjeuner des notre arrrivee. L'appartement est spécieux, propre et Aron est tres arrangeant, nous avons pu laisser nos valises dans l'appartement avant notre départ en voiture. À refaire !

Le logement se trouve dans un quartier calme de Brooklyn, tout proche de la station de métro Church Avenue qui permet de rejoindre très facilement Manhattan, et d'un supermarché.
Aménagé dans le sous-sol de la maison, il n'est muni que de petites fenêtres que l'on ne peut pas ouvrir. Mais il est surtout très spacieux et très bien équipé.
Le propriétaire, Aron, est très prévenant et réactif aux demandes.
Je conseille vivement ce logement.

Thanks Aron for your advice + beach towels, it was nice to spend one afternoon on a beach - unexpected experience in New York! The apartment is well located at metro station, food store and restaurants close. Quiet street, birds singing in the morning. Great place to stay overnight after all the sightseeing in Manhattan. Low ceiling and lack of day light but it was ok for us.
The apartment is exactly as described. It's well equipped. Aron is very friendly and attentive to details. My baby loved the toys.

A wonderful and well equipped apartment. Perfect place for our family trip to NYC. A great place to rest after a busy day sight seeing. We loved Central Park and The American Museum of Natural History the most- a must with four young boys! Lots of lovely touches like handmade caramels and breakfast bits and we loved all the eco friendly soaps etc.
Highly recommend this apartment to couples and families.

Hem estat 13 dies a casa de l'Aron, la meva dona, els meus dos fills i els avis. L'apartament és suficient per nosaltres la sala d'estar/cuina molt gran per jugar els petits. La vuina totalment complerta hem trobat tots els estris necessàris per cuinar. Habita ions grans amb llits d matrimoni molt còmodes que s'aprecien molt després d'un di d turisme. A les habitacions ens van deixar a la nostra disposició un bressol i un llit supletòri pels nens, encara q el llit d matrimoni va ser suficientment gran pel meu fill de 2'anys la meva dona i jo.
Està ubicat a Brooklyn en un entorn de cases típiques molt boniques, una zona molt tranquila i amb un parc a la paret del costat q anava genial pels nens, i gens molest un cop dins d casa. Hi ha a dos minuts un supermercat que obre tots els dies de 7 a 22 i al costat el metro lones Fi G que en 30'min et porten a manhattan.
La comunicació amb l'Aron genial, cualsevol dubte ens contestava ràpida i amablement. Una experiència molt agradable. Moltes gràcies família!

Aron & Molly are the perfect hosts. Friendly, kind, and helpful. The apartment is better (if possible) than the pics on Airbnb. Very clean and feels and looks newly refurbished with beautiful new appliances and bonus washer and dryer which really came in handy for me. The apartment is kid friendly with books and toys which delighted my granddaughter. Also, there is a playground next door, delighting my granddaughter again! The apartment is close to a grocery store, a couple Deli's, the post office, the Subway and more. Did I mention Molly & Aron are the perfect hosts? Well if I did, it bears repeating! Not only are they kind and courteous, but I believe I've made a couple new friends! ❤️

Tanto Aron como su familia son encantadores! Nos ayudaron en todo momento y nos facilitaron toda la información posible. Sin duda fue una buena elección. Apartamento cerca de super, metro y demás comercios en zona residencial y segura. Volveriamos sin dudarlo!
Good apartment. Had everything we needed and the owners were very helpful.

Nous avons passé une semaine inoubliable en famille à 6 dans l'appartement de Aron. Tout y est comme dans le descriptif, rien ne manque au confort. Proche du métro et d'une grande surface. Dans un quartier calme et sur. Aucune hésitation à avoir. Aron est très sympa et réactif. Bref une bonne adresse.
100 por ciento es un lugar super recomendado

This place is lovely and so accessible.  It worked well for my parents and my son and I for a weekend trip from Boston to see a Broadway show.... a dream come true. This is an excellent place because the neighborhood is cute - lots of places to eat including a large grocery store 2 blocks away! And loved the chance to take a run around Prospect Park. Definitely would return to this cute spot. (Plus on street FREE parking is a huge plus)

Aron was an absolutely amazing host. He truly went above and beyond to ensure we had a fantastic stay at his apartment. The basketball courts next to the apartment were a huge bonus. Close proximity to the subwaymade travel easy. An example of Aron’s great hospitality was when we had asked if there was a basketball we could borrow to use on the nearby courts. Although Aron informed that he didn’t have a basketball we came home to find a brand new basketball that he had purchased for us to use during our stay. It was an incredibly kind gesture and I strongly recommended those interested in visiting New York/Brooklyn to stay here.
Absolutely loved staying @ Aron’s place. Plenty of room for our party of 6. Quant, clean, and amazing price. Metro just around the block so traveling to NYC easy!
This is a great place to stay - excellent location close to subway and supermarket and also very good facilities and amenities . Aron is a very helpful host . Highly recommended for families !

Aron's place is super cozy, in a safe neighborhood, loaded of amenities and great for street parking. 

The noise from the upstairs can be a bit much, but you can communicate with the host to let him know and they will quiet down.  

Would recommend for short-term stays in Brooklyn.

The apartment is so close to the subway—super convenient. The trundle bed in the kids’ room allowed each kid to have a separate bed. 

The kitchen is fantastic— I wish we had stayed in more to use it.

El lugar de Aron está muy bien ubicado, es cómodo y limpio. La parada de metro está a una cuadra y tiene un supermercado a la misma distancia. Aron y Molly son excelentes host, definitivamente volveríamos a hospedarnos con ellos.
We had a great stay, very stylish and comfortable space and convenient to subway!
Hospitality and response from host is excellent, good location as concern with subway and market. Family environment. I would love to be a guest in future.

Wir sind mit 7 Erwachsenen und einem Baby in Arons und Mollys Apartment untergekommen und haben uns wie zu hause gefühlt, vor allem nach langen Tagen in der Stadt, die super zu erreichen ist. Die Ausstattung lässt keine Wünsche offen. Man kann dort in Privatsphäre entspannen und trotzdem jederzeit Kontakt zu Aron oder Molly aufnehmen, die immer zur Stelle sind. Alles war sehr unkompliziert und für uns genau richtig. Danke!

A casa é acolhedora, a cozinha muito bem equipada e os quartos confortáveis.
A proximidade do metro era excelente e a zona bastante segura, nas redondezas temos supermercados e restaurantes.  
Éramos um grupo de 5 e fomos todas bem recebidas,  sempre que mandava mensagem prontamente iam sendo respondidas.
Se voltar a NY, ficarei novamente aqui hospedada, sem dúvida alguma.
Muito obrigada Aron pela hospitalidade.

Tudo correu conforme combinado, o Aron é muito prestativo, localização próxima ao metro, supermercado, lanchonete, pizzaria, etc.
Minha ressalva é quanto a altura do "apartamento" eu tenho 1,83m e bati a cabeça várias vezes em uma coluna que atravessa o imóvel, praticamente eu andava com a cabeça curvada todo o tempo para evitar me machucar.
O Isolamento acústico do andar de cima também precisa ser melhorado.
No mais, tudo certo.
Great week at Aron's place. We'll equiped apartment, perfect for our family.  2 minute walk from the subway with easy access to Manhattan and beyond. Thanks!

Very nice apartment. We can definitely recommend this to small groups or families traveling together. 
The metro station is very close by as well as (grocery) shops. 
It’s a perfect location for a visit in NYC!

Très bel appartement dans un quartier calme. Métro ligne G et F à é minutes à pied ainsi qu'une supérette. Compter environ 30 min pour aller dans les différents sites touristiques. Les chambres sont propres, le couchage impeccable. Nous avons utilisés les 2 lits et le canapé lit, rien à dire. A l'arrivée nous attendais une boite d’œuf et du lait qui nous ont permis de manger lors de notre arrivée tardive. Burger King au bout de la rue si besoin. L'appartement est en sous sol il vous arrivera donc d'entendre le bruit de la maison selon l'heure à laquelle vous partez faire vos visites. Vraiment je recommande. Merci à Aron pour sa réactivité lors de nos demandes.

Aron's property is a converted basement of his home, and it is clean and beautiful. The kitchen is equipped with absolutely everything that you will need! Aron and Molly also added nice thoughtful touches such as having some light cereal snacks available, board games, children's toys (although I didn't need it), etc! It is also super close to the F/G subway, and a large grocery store. My family of 4 thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Aron's property!

Let me start by saying I never met the host ,but my friend did. The apart is nice and very clean. Ceilings are pretty low, but I'm 5'2 and the tallest person in our party was maybe 5'6. Everything you need is there and then some. Park right next door great for some pics. Can be costly traveling to the city on weekends, but that's New York. Unfortunately we locked my friend out on accident and he had to wake the host to contact me as his phone had died. I did apologize for that incident. The downside to staying here is, upstairs is very noisy in the mornings. No alarm needed, no sleeping in. You can definitely hear most of the movements. Otherwise it's a great place to stay for a small party. We followed the checkout instructions that were left behind also.
Overall nice place and very convenient. I would prefer to stay with Aaron if I ever get a chance to visit NY again.
Excellent home in central Brooklyn, on the subway, good value :-)
Aron's place was clean, comfortable and very pleasant. We will go there again if we need a place in Brooklyn. It had everything we needed and was very cozy.

A cute little place and the host was very responsive.  We had a problem with the bathroom sink and shower. It was taken care of right away.  The host was very accommodating in every way.

Be aware that being a basement apartment, the ceilings are low.  The property description states this so it was no surprise to us but even though I approved this property with the rest of the guests, the male guests were surprised when they got there.  The host lives upstairs and has children who start doing "children stuff" at about AM.  We get up early but if you are a late sleeper, you might consider a different unit. Just something to keep in mind.

The subway is a little further away than we expected and the lines running to Manhattan from there require changes.  We didn't use public transportation due to this, even though we had planned to.  You can always get an  Uber.
Aron's rental was exactly what we were hoping for - good value for three adults, good location, spaciousness and comfortable, and with excellent amenities.
thank you Aron for everything, the description is exactly as the flat is in reality. Thank you again for your availability and your reply to our messages. we spend a very good time here.
Exceeded our expectations in every way. Aron's place is incredibly clean and spacious - our new go-to spot when visiting New York!

Aron’s place was extremely clean. We did not meet the host but it was due to the busy schedule my mother and I had when we stayed there for 10 nights. He messaged to see if we needed anything but we didn’t- everything was there already!  They thought of everything. 
Great place to stay - hope it is available next time we go!

If Airbnb had a Lottery, then we just won the jackpot!
Perfect apartment, perfect location, perfect hosts.

We’ve just had a wonderful 2 weeks in New York staying at this terrific apartment.   It’s situated in a lovely area in Brooklyn, well appointed, spotlessly clean and with bus stops, subway, shops and supermarket virtually on the doorstep, we couldn’t have picked anywhere better.

From our initial enquiry to the day we left, communication from the hosts was superb.  They live upstairs, Aron even popped down and introduced himself when we arrived.  We mentioned one morning that we were going to Coney Island for the day, and within 5 minutes, Molly had popped in with a bag full of beach towels - you wouldn’t get that at The Plaza!

Thank you so much for allowing us to stay in your beautiful home.
Very comfortable flat and convenient location from Manahattan.

We had an amazing stay at Aron’s place. 
It was very easy to visit all touristic places in New York and never a long ride. We really enjoyed the quiet neighborhood when coming back from the dazzling and vibrant city of New York.
We had an issue with the bathroom during our stay but Aron was very reactive and even if he was abroad for the weekend helped us fix it as quickly as possible.
Thanks again for your reactivity! It was very appreciated.

We are looking forward to our second stay at Aron’s. He made our trip to NY and Boston very smooth and was always happy to help!
Clean and spacious place in a great location close to a subway and bus station and Prospect Park. Very responsive and helpful host.
Great place, great location, and a great host!

It was the second time we were staying at Aron’s place ! Like the first time, we really enjoyed being in this calm neighborhood of Brooklyn. Aron was a great host, very reactive and flexible, which made our journey to New York and Boston so much easier. You will need 30mins to 1h of subway to arrive to all important places in New York and the subway is just around the corner (great after long days of walking in New York)
Great place to spend a few days in NYC! Very good location, clean and with all that you need in the apartment. We were a family of 5 persons and we were all set and comfortable. I truly recommend!
Don’t hesitate...just book this place. Our 4 day stay in New York was made haste Free staying at Aron lovely garden apartment.

my family loved this place. thank you so much. only thing we are disappointed was that we had to wake up 6am in the morning because of the loud noise from upstairs.  like foot step, dragging the chair. 
 but other than that, spacious and clean, and location was perfect. we loved it.

My family of 6 stayed at Aron's place for my mother's birthday weekend and their apartment was amazing!! It was much more comfortable and homey than we expected and had an abundance of fans, which were extremely useful.  There were also many towels, bedding and other amenities available and were offered more if we ever needed them, although we never even got close to running out of anything. I highly recommend staying at Aron's place, especially if you have children as there is a park right next door where the kids can play basketball too!   Golden Tip: The subway is a quick 4-min walk around the corner, which is wheelchair accessible and has an elevator access, which was needed for my mother and a stroller for kids.
It’s very clean! Stylish and comfortable.
Aron was a great host. I would recommend his apartment to visitors to New York!

Aron was very accommodating towards check in and check out times. We appreciate that he allowed us to drop off our suitcase early, while we get to explore the city. The place was very clean and the location was very convenient to take the subway. If I come back to New York, I will definitely book his place again.
The place was charming. You won’t regret staying here. We felt safe and cared for. Every detail was thought of and we had a great time.

We carefully choose our Airbnb accommodation based on location and amenities. Aron and Molly's place ticked all the boxes for us. Kensington neighbourhood was fabulous and we used Church St subway daily - we always looked forward to the appearance of the Manhattan skyline as we passed through Smith Avenue.
The apartment amenities were excellent. The mattresses and bedding were super comfortable and the shower perfect. This was a great place to come back to after long days sightseeing and shopping. Foodtown supermarket being located next to the subway was a godsend.
Highly recommend this apartment.
Plenty of comfortable, usable space with everything you need to eat in and easy access to subway to get anywhere you want to go in the city.   Recommend it highly!

I highly recommend staying at Aaron’s place. His super host certification is well earned. There were many creature comforts in the apartment that made it feel like a true home away from home. The proximity to the subway, supermarket, and corner markets where we can grab a bagel, coffee or egg sandwich on the go were fantastic. We didn’t make use of the nearby playground but only because it was too cold. This was our first foray into staying at an Airbnb and I’m sure future stays at different ones in other cities will pale in comparison. When we return to Brooklyn, Aron’s place will be our top pick.
Clean and perfect place to know Brooklyn and New York. Subway just one block away, the place has everything a traveler might need. Details everywhere and the hosts very kind. Highly recommended.
Super place!!! Great host, super accessible, fully equiped and the perfekt place for a week of nyc sight seeing. Thanks again to the awesome hosts Molly and Aron!

Wir haben uns in der Unterkunft sehr wohl gefühlt und würden jederzeit wiederkommen. Die Wohnung war schön groß und super ausgestattet,man hatte wirklich alles was man braucht und noch mehr. Gerade für Kinder war eine tolle Ausstattung vorhanden. Die Subway war schnell zu Fuß zu erreichen und auch der nächste Supermarkt war gleich um die Ecke. Um nach Manhattan rein zu kommen war man ca. eine halbe Stunde mit der Subway unterwegs,also völlig in Ordnung. Aron war super hilfsbereit und schnell zur Stelle. Auch seine Bar The Brooklyneer können wir sehr für einen Drink oder leckeren Snack empfehlen. Alles in allem wirklich super.

Aron è un host molto atrento e professionale . la casa corrisponde perfettamente alla descrizione ed è perfettamente attrezzata. unico neo il tetto che in alcuni punti è veramente troppo basso.
grazie

Aron and Molly’s place is amazing.
They were  super nice and super helpful when we arrived.
The location is great because you can go to almost every place in NY within 30min-1h thanks to the F train which is 300m closed to the house.
The apartment is really well furnished and it’s a pleasure to cook there.
Thanks for all, we promise that’s a good deal to stay at Aron’s!

Excelente!!! Es un muy buen lugar para alojarse, hay de todo en el departamento. Si vas en invierno hay buena calefacción. 
Llegamos tarde y teníamos comida para prepararnos y todos los utensillos que se necesitan para cocinar, muy buena calidad de los platos, vasos y cubiertos.
Incluso jabón para el lavarropas y lavavajillas.
Muy buenas sábanas y acolchados.
La ducha excelente después de un día de mucho caminar.
El subte se encuentra a una cuadra y te lleva donde quieras haciendo transbordo en algunas ocasiones.
Solo mencionar lo de la altura del techo, pero es explicado muy bien en el detalle de la descripción.
Sin lugar a dudas es un lugar súper recomendable, los anfitriones siempre comunicados cuando se le requiere, muy amables y atentos.
Molly y Aron, muchas gracias por recibirnos en su casa!!!
Aron’s place is wonderful. It’s located in an ideal spot. I highly recommend it for families. I have had family members visit me while I’m there and they love it as well.

We had a wonderful stay at Aron's place. The place is really cute with a great location just a couple blocks from the subway. Parking was also not bad and despite coming in late at night, we were able to find parking within a couple blocks for our minivan. Aron was a great host with prompt and helpful communication. He was really thoughtful and offered a white noise machine for our little kids. There were a nice selection of toys and games available as well as some movies. The kitchen was well stocked with the basics. The comments about the height of the ceiling as well as there sometimes being noise from above are true although the noise started at maybe 8:30 or so when we were already up. The ceiling didn't bother my husband or me (5'9" and 5'11") but agreed that you should think about whether it'll bother you before booking! We hope to come back another time when the weather is nicer and we can explore Prospect Park and other Brooklyn destinations!

name: Nice and cozy 2 bedroom apartment in Rose Bay
summary: About This Listing A very nice, well-kept apartment will be available  from 9/4/19 until 30/5/19   . with two bedrooms, one bathroom and a large balcony. The apartment is about 5 minutes from Bondi beach and close to Bondi Junction, shops and the city. Please contact me for inquiries.
space: Great apartment in Rose- Bay fully furnished, Available from  9/4/19  until 30/5/19 There are 2 bedrooms and can accommodate up to  4 guests , a large balcony is great for lounging around. Guests have access to the whole apartment, kitchen, private laundry, shower and bath, 55” flat screen Smart TV  in the living room and two 30" TV in the bedrooms,  Free WIFI. The apartment is located in a very nice, clean and friendly neighbourhood. It is located about a five minute drive from Famous Bondi beach or a ten minute walk. Bondi junction is also ten minute drive away, along with the heart of Sydney, the City.  There is adequate public transport located a minute walk from the apartment. There are buses travelling to and from Bondi Junction where there is a main bus terminal and train station, allowing for easy travel.  Available from end of March (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) until the  end  of  May (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) phone number hidden)/night  $(PHONe no (Phone number hidde

The apartment is about 5 minutes from Bondi beach and close to Bondi Junction, shops and the city. Please contact me for inquiries. Great apartment in Rose- Bay fully furnished, Available from  9/4/19  until 30/5/19 There are 2 bedrooms and can accommodate up to  4 guests , a large balcony is great for lounging around. Guests have access to the whole apartment, kitchen, private laundry, shower and bath, 55” flat screen Smart TV  in the living room and two 30" TV in the bedrooms,  Free WIFI. The apartment is located in a very nice, clean and friendly neighbourhood. It is located about a five minute drive from Famous Bondi beach or a ten minute walk. Bondi junction is also ten minute drive away, along with the heart of Sydney, the City.  There is adequate public transport located a minute walk from the apartment. There are buses travell
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a very nice, clean and friendly neighborhood. It is located about a five minute drive from Bondi beach or a ten minute walk. Bondi junction is a ten minute drive away, along with the heart of Sydney, the City.
notes: The guests must respect the regulations of this premises.
transit: There is adequate public transport located a minute walk from the apartment. There are buses traveling to and from Bondi Junction where there is a main bus terminal and train station, allowing for easy travel.
access: Guests have access to a private laundry, shower and bath, 55״ flat screen  smart tv   in the lounge room and 2  30" tvs in the bedrooms. There is also wifi access available.
interaction: I will not be present during the guests stay but guests are free to contact me with any inquiries or concerns.
house_rules: Guest will have free reign of the house and we simply ask not to cause any permanent damage to the property.

name: Spacious and light-filled Manhattan apartment
summary: Sunny, high-ceilinged and beautifully furnished one bedroom apartment, on the 15th floor of a private elevator building in Manhattan’s leafy Upper West Side. Perfect for an individual, couple, or a young family. Steps away from the 1/2/3 trains that will take you to the center of the city or to Brooklyn, and only blocks from both Central Park and Riverside Park, making this a great place to come home to.
space: This inviting and calm apartment has a large double bed and the option of an extremely comfortable air mattress. The center of the apartment is open from the sitting area to the dining table and kitchen, and lined with windows that bring in tons of natural light throughout the day. The kitchen is great for cooking in and fully stocked, with a gas stovetop, refrigerator, microwave, and dishwasher. The living room has a Smart TV with cable and a full sound system with speakers integrated throughout the apartment, as well as WiFi and a study/office space available for use along one side of the bedroom. The charming bathroom has a tub, shower, and linen closet. In addition, there are washers and dryers in the building.
description: Sunny, high-ceilinged and beautifully furnished one bedroom apartment, on the 15th floor of a private elevator building in Manhattan’s leafy Upper West Side. Perfect for an individual, couple, or a young family. Steps away from the 1/2/3 trains that will take you to the center of the city or to Brooklyn, and only blocks from both Central Park and Riverside Park, making this a great place to come home to. This inviting and calm apartment has a large double bed and the option of an extremely comfortable air mattress. The center of the apartment is open from the sitting area to the dining table and kitchen, and lined with windows that bring in tons of natural light throughout the day. The kitchen is great for cooking in and fully stocked, with a gas stovetop, refrigerator, microwave, and dishwasher. The living room has a Smart TV with cable and a full sound system with speakers integrated throughout the apartment, as well as WiFi and a study/office space available for use along one side o
neighborhood_overview: You're just blocks away from  Riverside and Central Park, as well as an array of restaurants and shops. Short distance to theaters, concerts, opera, and museums.
transit: Just one block away from the 2 and 3 Express, or 1 Local train.  Only four blocks from the C or B trains.  Easy access to cabs and buses.
access: You will have full access to the entire apartment.
interaction: I will be staying for the month in Vermont but will have my assistant available for your arrival and departure, as well as for any needs that may arise during your stay.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am a psychotherapist and writer living in New York City and, as much as I can, in Vermont, one of the most beautiful and compelling states in the U.S.  I have spent time in Vermont since childhood and grown to love it more and more.  The schoolhouse is my second Vermont home and is indeed my sanctuary; my hope, for the time you visit, is that it will be yours as well.

name: Standard Double Room
summary: Private Double bed room for 2 people with private shower-wc,22' Tv (sattalite) Without Breakfast
space: ''Stay in the heart of Istanbul'' Located just a 5-minute walk to the Hagia Sophia and Topkapi Palace, Erenler Hostel offers free WiFi and private and shared accommodation. Bike and car rentals are available on site. Gulhane Tram Station is located 200 yards from the property. The Blue Mosque, Eminonu, and the Grand Bazaar are all within 0.6 miles of the hotel. Guests can walk 10 minutes to Sirkeci station, which connects to the south side of Istanbul.
