host.host_about: We are Mirror

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

nothing chic ... it's on the old town area  and so close to everything .... and they delivered 100% on clean, very useful room ... they were very quick to happily fulfill all our extra requests and helped us get around town.

name: Beautiful Brooklyn Brownstone
summary: Experience classic Brooklyn brownstone living! A private bedroom with shared access to kitchen and dining room in a beautiful neighborhood within walking distance to many of Brooklyn's best offerings. We are a quick subway ride to Manhattan on multiple lines. The perfect spot for those enjoying the city by day, and who want a comfortable, friendly space to rest at night.
space: Our guest bedroom is up one flight of stairs, and comes fully furnished with a queen-size bed (very comfy memory-foam mattress), dresser, bookshelves, and a 47" LED flatscreen (plus towels & sheets). There are two windows overlooking a luscious and green backyard, and receives beautiful light. Our apartment is the upper two floors of a classic brownstone on a quiet block in a historic neighborhood near downtown Brooklyn. Lots of original detail intact throughout the apartment, with charming (nonworking) fireplaces in each room. The full apartment spans two floors and is about 1600 square feet of space (two bedrooms, plus a nursery, kitchen, dining room, and living room). It is an original Brooklyn brownstone, built at the turn of the century. We’ve put a lot of work into furnishing it tastefully and adding a lot of greenery -- it’s a very peaceful space to visit.
description: Experience classic Brooklyn brownstone living! A private bedroom with shared access to kitchen and dining room in a beautiful neighborhood within walking distance to many of Brooklyn's best offerings. We are a quick subway ride to Manhattan on multiple lines. The perfect spot for those enjoying the city by day, and who want a comfortable, friendly space to rest at night. Our guest bedroom is up one flight of stairs, and comes fully furnished with a queen-size bed (very comfy memory-foam mattress), dresser, bookshelves, and a 47" LED flatscreen (plus towels & sheets). There are two windows overlooking a luscious and green backyard, and receives beautiful light. Our apartment is the upper two floors of a classic brownstone on a quiet block in a historic neighborhood near downtown Brooklyn. Lots of original detail intact throughout the apartment, with charming (nonworking) fireplaces in each room. The full apartment spans two floors and is about 1600 square feet of space (two bedrooms, pl
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in the historic neighborhood of Fort Greene, Brooklyn, on the corner of beautiful Fort Greene Park. We live in a two-family brownstone in a very safe neighborhood. Nearby are lots of fun bars, restaurants, and cafes along the more commercial streets of DeKalb Avenue, Lafayette Street, and Fulton Street. Dining options include wine bars, live jazz lounges, Ethiopian/Thai/Indian/Japanese restaurants, and beer gardens.
notes: - We have a cheerful and energetic toddler girl, who sleeps from 8PM -  7AM usually,  but upon waking does make standard toddler noises. During the weekdays she is away at preschool from 9AM - 6PM, but other times (early evening and weekends) we are in and out of the house for activities and mostly upstairs in the living room with her.  - While the bedroom is at the back of the house and typically quiet, during summer months the neighbors may have guests in the backyard on the weekends. Any noise usually is over by midnight and not distinctly audible unless the windows are open (there is an AC in the window during the summer).
transit: The apartment is only two blocks from Barclays Center as well as the renowned Brooklyn Academy of Music (BAM). For transportation, the G train (Fulton station) is right around the corner, the C train (Lafayette station) is 3 blocks away, and Atlantic/Barclays station (2/3/4/5/B/D/Q/R plus the Long Island Rail Road [LIRR] commuter train) is about a 4 minute walk. We are also close to the DeKalb station (Q/R/B/D) which is only one stop to Manhattan.
access: The apartment has a shared kitchen where you are welcome to make meals or just grab a cup of coffee in the morning. We also have a dining room you are welcome to use at your leisure. There is a shared full bathroom with shower & tub between the guest bedroom and our bedroom.
interaction: We are a married couple with a toddler daughter (Ryan) and friendly french bulldog (Frank) who will both happily greet you at the door. We are originally from the Midwest and Malaysia respectively, but have lived in New York City for over 15 years (with a recent 3 year stay in Burma). We've hosted on Airbnb and been Airbnb guests many times around the world, and love to meet new people. We adore our neighborhood in Fort Greene and are always happy to help with visit suggestions and finding fun things to do.
house_rules: - There is a small kitchen and dining room for shared use, though please no cooking meat. - No smoking inside the house or on the stoop. Guests may smoke on the sidewalk outside the house. - No shoes inside please.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I work in transportation planning and love to travel. I grew up in Malaysia and it seemed like we always had guests coming through to stay at our place. I love meeting new people and am always happy to share my favorite things about New York City.

reviews.comments: We spent 1 night in Megan's room. It is a very nice and large room. It is convenienty located. There are restaurants, shops and the subway stations located close-by (roughly 5-10 minutes walk). The room is surprisingly quite and you rather hear the birds in the backyard than the traffic. Megan and Jason are nice fellows and provide you with a coffee in the morning and information on the neighourhood.

Great house, beautiful home with two great dogs. Walkable to lots of cool stuff, and the room is private and very large. Megan and Jason were friendly and gave good tips on the neighborhood. Overall just a great stay.

My partner and I live near this apt, but we don't have room for guests. So when his mother visited us for a long weekend recently, she stayed here. The apartment is lovely, Megan was great to deal with and my partner's mother enjoyed her stay. We'll definitely recommend it for future guests.

Megan was an amazing host, very welcoming and helpful. Room is pretty big, beautiful, comfortable and has a great aesthetic design with attention to details! The whole apartment is lovely and located in a quiet neighborhood with lots of nice places nearby. Highly recommended!
Thanks again for everything, Megan!

Our intern Alice stayed here and totally loved it! She said that Megan and her husband were perfect hosts and that the space was amazing. I live nearby, so I know how great of a location this is, so I was happy to have Alice somewhere near tons of great restaurants, cafes, etc. -- as well as all the major subway lines. Alice said this was definitely a five-star experience and she'd be very happy to stay there again.

I stayed at megan and JT's beautiful home for 1 week! It was a wonderful experience that I would recommend to anybody visiting NYC. The house is decorated with thought and detail (lots of cute vintage memorabillia) and is located within walking distance to multiple subway lines. The surrounding neighbourhood is filled with delicious restaurants (go to Habana outbpost for the frozen mojitos!) as well as super cheap nail salons. I would love to stay there again! 

PS: Frank and Bean are two of the cutest dogs you will ever meet!
This is an inexpensive, clean, nicely appointed home.  We would certainly consider coming again.

We loved the apartment and its location.  Megan prepared everything for our arrival--a map, a letter about the area restaurants, towels, etc..  The bed we slept in was gloriously comfortable.  We strongly recommend our hosts to any future visitors to Brooklyn.
Thank you for a great stay! What a beautiful large room and bathroom in a fantastic location. The bed was great and we really enjoyed our stay.

Great location, friendly hosts (and cute dogs), and a truly beautiful brownstone...I can only strongly recommend staying here! Many trains arrive straight from Penn Station, so you can get here in under 30 mins from midtown Manhattan. Fort Greene is lovely neighborhood, and pleasant park at your doorstep. Megan was very helpful as we arrived later than expected, but it still worked out with getting in. We found water and restaurant recommendations waiting. Favorite part was the old, old house, immaculately clean yet pleasantly worn, which much reminded me of London. In short, I cannot say enough positive things about the "BBB!"

We had a very enjoyable stay at Megan and Jason's place. They were helpful when needed and discrete in sharing their apartment. Their two friendly dogs Frank and Bean were equally respectful and stayed calm most of the time. Their lovely  Brooklyn Brownstone is just a few steps away from the Brooklyn Academy of Music and equally close to several subway lines. So it is mostly a one-stop ride to anywhere in Manhattan and also other places of interest in Brooklyn and Queens. The guest room is spacious and tastefully decorated. The bed is very comfortable. In brief, what you see is what you get and we would readily repeat this experience which allowed us to find peace and rest in a cosy atmosphere while visiting the bustling concrete jungle.

Jason and Megan's gorgeous brownstone was a great place to wake up in each morning and come back to each evening. Their home looked as described in the photos and was warm, cosy and clean. Most importantly, it had a working shower with very decent water pressure. We had to share the common bath with them but scheduling wasn't a problem at all. The house is also beautifully decorated with lots of lovely knick-knacks that really capture Jason and Megan's quirky style and offers lots of photo ops. 

The subway is a short walk away and there are lots of convenience stores and eateries nearby. The neighbourhood is quiet and feels really safe even at night. They also left us a useful print-out of places to eat nearby. Really useful and thoughtful. 

Megan and Jason weren't around when we checked in but we were warmly greeted at the top of the stairs by their four-legged welcome crew, Frank and Bean. Real sweethearts. Never met such calm pooches before. You'll almost never hear them and there's no offensive doggy smell either. 

We'd certainly return to Jason and Megan's if we ever visit NYC again. Gorgeous home, friendly couple and wonderful dogs. Recommended!
This is a lovely place and is just as advertised. Very comfy bed, very cute dogs :)

This room in Megan and Jason's home is a wonderful place to stay. It is large, clean and very comfortable - quiet too. They provide dresser space and hanging space for your clothes so you can properly settle in. The kitchen is small but has all you'll need for making breakfast, etc. Oh, and they have a fantastic shower.

The location within Brooklyn could hardly be bettered, with many different subway lines all within a few minutes' easy walk, including fast lines into Manhattan and to JFK airport. The local area of Fort Greene is an excellent mix of original Brooklyn and some gentrification, making it feel like exactly the right level of 'authentic experience'. Not too full of hipsters but also very safe and serene. There were plenty of good cafes, restaurants and shops nearby for all my needs. Megan and Jason provided a list of their favourites - which was handy for my first foray out when I arrived rather tired from the flight.

Megan was very helpful and friendly by email in the run up to my visit. I had a few queries about some arrangements and she answered them all speedily. I found I was a little chilly on my first night so asked for another blanket and it was provided straight away. During my stay, I bumped into both Megan and Jason almost every day and we would have a quick friendly chat. I felt like I was at home, but was also completely independent. Their dogs are friendly but mainly keep to the other room, so there wasn't any overwhelming dogginess (or any doggy smells at all!) That said, if you don't like dogs or have any allergies to animal hairs you should think twice.

Overall, this is a lovely room with delightful hosts in a great location. Perfect!

Our stay with Megan was incredible. She and her partner have the most lovely house i've been to in Brooklyn. We had a beautiful big sunny room, with a really comfy bed. Their apartment is so convenient to all of Brooklyn and Manhattan (1 stop and your in Manhattan.. amazing!) Beautiful Fort Greene Park only 100m away, great cafes, restaurants and bars only minutes away. Made me want to move to Fort Greene! Thanks again Megan :) 
And thanks Frank & Bean, the most friendly, loving, fun dogs in NYC!

Awesome location, being situated near-ish 3 subway stations with a myriad choice of train lines. Especially helpful to be one stop away from Atlantic Terminal, which is where you can take the LIRR to/from Jamaica Station (for Air Train to JFK Airport). DeKalb Ave Station is only one stop away from Manhattan, so it's really quick to get in and out. 

There are numerous food options in the area. We especially loved La Bagel Delight on Lafayette for breakfast (poppy seed bagels are delish!). Unfortunately, I got food poisoning after eating at 67 Burger (although my partner was fine), so be warned.

Our room was spacious, airy and quiet (except when there was a dinner party in the backyard), and the charming old brownstone is tastefully decorated with little curios in unexpected places. Megan and Jason are a laid-back, easy-going couple. Arranging logistics with them was seamless and we had no trouble at all with check in/out and any queries, even though we hardly saw them. Frank and Bean are adorable and we missed having them around when they went on holiday over the weekend with their owners.

This is the perfect place where we stay when visiting our grandbabies, who live just across the street. The room is peaceful with garden views, the hosts are gracious, easy, and helpful sharing their lovely space, and the location is very convenient to park, restaurants, subway lines, BAM, the new sports center, etc.  We just love staying with Megan.

We had a really wonderful stay at Megan and Jason's beautiful home. The room is big and wonderfully decorated. In fact, the whole apartment is pretty amazing. Our favorite part: their two dogs. They're absolutely the sweetest! I would definitely recommend staying here.
The reservation was canceled 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We've had a wonderful stay at Megan's place. Her apartment is very cozy, full of small details. The room itself is huge, with big windows that let in a lot of light and a very comfortable bed. Better yet, the room faces a back garden, meaning it's very quiet all the time. We slept very well there.
The location is also very convenient, close to many subway stations that between then seems to serve every line in New York. Just to have an idea, in the five days we were there we never had to make a connection - there was always a line that would take us exactly where we wanted to be. I doubt that any location in Manhattan would be so convenient.
Last but not least, the apartment comes equipped with the most adorable dogs ever. We loved Frank and Beans, and sometimes we almost wished we could stay the whole day in the apartment just so we could play with them. Highly recommended.
Amazing neighborhood! Cute space.

Megan and Jason have a beautiful home, clean, quiet, and well-taken care of. They were both kind and welcoming, as were their dogs. Neighborhood is great. Easy access to restaurants, coffee shop, public transportation, and beautiful Fort Greene Park is around the corner.
Megan and her husband were great hosts! They let us drop off our bags early so that we didn't have to haul them around before check in. Lovely home, would recommend in a heartbeat.

Booking with Megan was a breeze! Her and her husband were so incredibly accommodating and it made our experience very pleasant. One thing about being in New York is that you have to walk, walk and walk  and this place had 3 things I loved: accommodating hosts (w/luggage before check-in), safe neighborhoods and good eats just one or two blocks away. 

The brownstone is about 25 minutes walking distance from the Brooklyn bridge, you can be sure to find very unique eclectic restaurants and cafes and only about a 6 min walk to the subway. The place came with all the amenities one may need. The room is very cute and BIG, vintage-like with a modern twist. I just loved that we stayed in an almost 100 year old place. You all you need: iron, dresser, side table, TV, hairdryer, towels, wifi, etc. We only really needed a place to sleep and whereas it may be a bit strange to be in someone's home, it didn't feel like that because there of the way this 3-story place is built and the hosts give you plenty of privacy. I'd definitely stay here again!

Megan was great—really accommodating in letting us check in early after a red-eye flight (so appreciated!). The room is a large and lovely —though a little noisy, if the neighbors are out back—and the location is close to a lot of restaurants, bars, and subway stops. Megan helpfully left us a map of nearby restaurants to check out.
Wonderful place! Would stay again! Very helpful and sweet couple. Adorable dog and quiet baby. Great room too. Cozy and comfortable.
I had a wonderful stay at Megan's. Megan was really easy to communicate with and made the check-in easy. The location is great. I would definitely come again.

The home and private space is well-lit, quiet, comfortable, clean and beautifully decorated. I had a lovely stay at Megan & Jason's home. I slept so well each night...I will miss that bed! 

Thank you again, Megan & Jason, for a wonderful stay. What wonderful hosts you are! I can't wait to return.

Super séjour passer à Brooklin, la chambre est superbe, spacieuse et propre. Megan et son époux son des hôtes charmant qui n'hesite pas vous conseiller si vous en avait besoin et laisse à disposition un plan du quartier avec les emplacements des stations de métro (environs 3 à 5min à pied).
Un vrai bonheur je recommence donc cet hôte à 100%
Thank you to this friendly family for let us stay at their place, I recommend to stay in this airbnb  100% is a great location
Great location and walking distance to everything! Beautiful brownstone area and cozy/unique.  The hosts provided everything we needed.

Megan's place was perfect for exploring. It's a beautiful room and after a long day of taking in New York the bed felt like heaven. It was easily accessible to transit and in a great spot in Brooklyn. I would definitely recommend it.

Love, love, love Megan's place! Spacious, clean, and beautifully decorated. The host is super attentive to detail and easy to talk to. How often do you get to stay in a charming turn of the century brown stone Brooklyn apartment for an affordable price? Would love to stay here again!

Megan's place is awesome, it is in a safe location and very close to restaurants, coffee shops, shopping and sub-stations. On the other hand, Megan was very friendly and respectful. I recommend this place to anyone!

It was a pleasure meeting Megan and her family. 

The place was clean and accurate to what was listed. I enjoyed staying at a spacious bedroom nicely decorated along with the entire house. Directions to and check in were very easy to understand with assistance they provided. I can feel the hospitality of the host from how they were responsive in exchanging messages and prepared a printout of the places recommended to eat in he neighborhood. 

They are close to a few stations which provide easy access to the city and to and from the airport. I would stay here again if I had a chance to be in the area. Highly recommended.
Megan's place was in a great location and was the perfect place for us to stay for our trip to New York! Megan and her husband were very helpful and kept the house very clean.
You will love this place. The room and the house is beautiful. Megan and Jason are very good hosts.

We had the absolute best stay at Megan and Jason's gorgeous brownstone!! They have amazing style and they've thought about everything you could possibly want and need. Close to almost every subway with tons of restaurant options around. Plus, we loved Frank and Ryan!
We loved our stay! Megan was so helpful and accommodating. They have such an amazing space that is so close to so many awesome restaurants and shops. Defiiitely loved everything about it.

L'appartement de Megan est parfaitement situé à 5 minutes à pied de 3 métros, et en face  d'un parc, dans un quartier très calme, à proximité de bons restaurants de quartier et de bars sympas avec terrasses. La maison sur 2 étages est charmante, joliment décorée et avec tout le cachet de l'ancien ; la chambre est grande, très propre, très claire, au calme sur un petit jardin, avec une literie très confortable et de jolies plantes vertes. La salle de bains est très propre et a une baignoire. Megan et son mari sont très chaleureux et permettent également à leurs invités de se sentir bien au calme et comme chez eux en laissant l'accès à toute la maison et en donnant de bons conseils ; l'accès à la cuisine et au percolateur est pratique pour le petit déjeuner en cas de besoin ; Bref grâce à notre havre de paix le soir chez Megan, nous avons passé de belles vacances pour découvrir à pied Brooklyn et son charme au printemps (la promenade de Brooklyn Heights, sous le pont à DUMBO, le jardin botanique etc). Merci Megan.

We had a super lovely stay with Megan and her family. We stayed with our 9m old baby and we're made to feel more than welcome! Megan's place is exactly as described and very easy to get around from. Very comfy bed, warm spacious room and gorgeously decorated house. We had a great time hanging out with Megan's family as well as heading out to explore Brooklyn and NYC. 
We definitely would recommend this place to others. Thank you!
Très bonne adresse, à tous les niveaux. Chaudement recommandée.

Nous sommes restés une semaine chez Megan et tout s'est très bien passé. Ceux sont des hôtes disponibles et très discrets. La chambre est très confortable et spacieuse. Gros plus pour la literie qui est vraiment confortable surtout après avoir passé la journée à déambuler dans Manhattan :)
Le logement est vraiment proche de plusieurs lignes de métro ce qui est très pratique pour se déplacer dans tout New York.
Enfin Frank saura vous faire un accueil comme il se doit ;)
Het huis en de kamer waren geweldig! Centraal gelegen en goed te bereiken. Ik raad deze airbnb zeker aan.

My sister and I had a lovely stay. Our room was delightful, spacious and comfortable. The whole apartment is beautifully put together. We were made very welcome and even with the heat wave Meghan and Jason were able to quickly install the air conditioning. Added bonus was their cute pooch Frank! Thank you!

Megan's place was perfect - great size room (especially considering what we heard about NYC sized rooms!), lots of great cafes & restaurants nearby, really easy to get to & from the city. Frankie was the perfect touch. We would definitely stay here again xx
Enjoyed our stay and had no problems at all. Would definitely recommend.
The host canceled this reservation 71 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had a brilliant stay at Megan & Jason's apartment. The room was lovely and big with an extremely comfortable bed. Great location handily located by several subway stations which made getting around town super easy. The neighbourhood itself is great with lots of lovely restaurants and cafes nearby. We didn't get to spend much time with our hosts due to very long days sightseeing, but found them to be friendly and welcoming when we did. Frank the dog is just the cutest!

This brownstone is in an excellent location on a lovely street in Fort Greene near the park. Reasonable walk to several subway lines. The hosts were easy to communicate with and we were comfortable during our stay.  Especially grateful for the quiet place to sleep and relax!
Megan and Jason's place was a one of a kind brownstone in the heart of fort greene. Amazing location and amazing room. Would highly recommend!

Best airbnb experience so far. We loved staying at this place.  Large, quite room, beautifully decorated, very clean, and amazing, comfortable bed. We got to meet Jason and he was so helpful and nice. He provided us with everything we needed for a wonderful stay. We stayed for 3 nights and it was never a problem to share the bathroom. Great location as well, only a 5-10 min. walk to the next subway station. We highly recommend this place and will definitely come back!

Megan und ihre Familie sind sehr freundlich. Das Bett ist so bequem! Die Wohnung ist wunderbar eingerichtet mit vielen liebevollen Details und sehr sauber. Da die Wohnung sehr in die Jahre gekommen ist, solle man einen guten Schlaf haben, da alles in bischen knackt und die Fenster sind sehr dünn. Wir haben aber wunderbar geschlafen nach den Sightseeing-Touren durch New York.
Die Lage ist hierfür perfekt!!
Grandioso lugar para pasar unas vacaciones en Nueva York, la casa está cerca de varios metros, también hay varios restaurantes, excelentes anfitriones, todo perfecto recomendable al 100%.

Preciosa casita marrón en Brooklyn. Perfecta para conocer barrio que es tranquilo, pero animado por las noches y con muchas opciones de restaurantes. Los dueños han sido muy atentos con nosotros y sólo hemos sabido de ellos cuando necesitábamos algo, siempre dispuestos a ayudar. Un placer haber estado en su casa.

Megan and Jason were fantastic hosts. Everything was seamless, from check-in to check-out. The apartment is just as advertised -- great location on a quiet street but also close to plenty of restaurants/cafes, and very accessible by subway. The room was spacious, sunny, and comfortable. I would definitely recommend staying with these folks!

Megan is an accommodating host and have to say we had a great stay at her home with spacious quarters and a very comfortable bed. Super clean everywhere. Lots of books for anyone wanting a good read. We'd highly recommend her place to anyone needing to stay in the city.

Megan's house provides a good experience quaint, old New York townhouses. The decor is nice and the room is very comfortable. Megan and her husband were friendly and helpful. The subway station is also close by so I was able to commuter to Manhattan very easily.

Megan's place is a beautiful house full of character. It is sparkling clean and has lots of lovely little touches in the room and bathroom. You can say that the hosts take pride in their home. We are happy that we chose to stay there as the location was very good, close to Manhattan but we still got to familiarise ourselves with Brooklyn - it was just 20 minutes walk to Brooklyn Bridge and Manhattan Bridge or there was a subway just a short walk away. Megan and Jason gave us subway map so it was easy to navigate through Brooklyn and Manhattan. We can't recommend Megan's place enough.

I am a world traveler doing extensive photography work. I stay at airbnbs at various places, like Paris, Northern Ireland, Iceland, New Zealand, etc. And this place of Megan and Jason is such a superb place to stay. The room is very beautiful, roomy, and clean. The location was very good with several subway stations nearby, safe even walking at night, lots of restaurants and grocery stores as well. Jason helped me with my luggage as well. Thanks Jason!

Hosts were nothing but polite and the room is charming; also a great location to public transportation, with several inexpensive and unique dining experiences (and very tasty!) within walking distance. Note: hosts are raising a little-one, so headphones are recommended if brief periods of screaming or crying can not be abided.

We had a lovely time at Jason’s and Megan’s place. It’s location is ideal — on a beautiful street, within several blocks of grocery shopping, subways, and restaurants.  The room is very roomy and quiet, the bed is comfortable, and everything was extremely clean. They are a delightful couple, easy to communicate with and very thoughtful. We  definitely would like to stay here again on our next trip to Brooklyn.

Megan and Jason's room is the best room you can wish for a short trip in NY. The house is tastefully decorated and very spacious. The bed is a real heaven after a day spent walking in the city. Also the house is very well located, close to metro lines and only 20mins from downtown.  Megan and Jason are adorable hosts. I would definitely recommend this Airbnb and will keep the address in my favorites for a new trip. Thanks so much.

I was looking for cozy room in Fort Greene and I found it.  You will be staying with a super friendly and hospitable family, I wish I had more time to spend with the puppy :)   The room was just as described. I can't get over how comfy the bed was! A big plus for me besides being cozy was that the apt is close to major subways.  I enjoyed my stay and look forward to staying again.

Lovely hosts and a beautiful spacious room. Megan and Jason kindly let us check out late and leave our bags at the apartment for a day as our flight wasn't until late at night which was a massive help. Thank you so much for a lovely experience in Brooklyn!

We had a wonderful stay at Megan and Jasons place. They're both very friendly hosts and have an adorable little girl and dog (dw, none of them ever woke us up at night). The apartment looks really nice and we had a very spacious room for ourselves. We also really enjoyed the neighborhood and our hosts provided us with some useful tips.

Nous avons séjourné une semaine chez Megan et Jason et avons été ravis. 
L’appartement est très joli, plein de charme et bien décoré. 
La chambre est spacieuse et la literie confortable ! 
Enfin, la localisation de l’appartement est un vrai plus. Bien que situé à Brooklyn, 4 lignes de métro sont proches de l’appartement, rendant l’accès à Manhattan excellent. 
Merci pour tout !
Bel emplacement au calme sur un petit jardin à 5 mn du métro.

Awesome stay! My fiancé and I came from Alabama to see a concert at BAM Opera House. It was a quick 3 minute walk! The home is beautiful, clean, and spacious. Feels very homey. The bed is insanely comfy too. The hosts were great. Very professional and nice. And their dog Frank is adorable Neighborhood is safe and pretty

Megan was a very responsive and helpful host.  Her place is exactly as described.  Bed was very comfy.  Location was convenient to eating, shopping, subway etc. I would definitely stay again.  P.s Frank is a girl and loves belly rubs.
Beautiful, comfortable space in a great location. The bedroom is huge (with a super comfy bed) and a great home base for visiting the city. Would not hesitate to stay there again.

logement idéal pour visiter NYC:
- quartier  très calme par rapport à Manhattan 
- proche du métro
- épicerie à 2 pas (idéal le matin pour avoir des pancakes chaud  )
-restaurants des alentours avec excellent rapport qualité-prix
-literie confortable
sans oublier les hôtes disponibles et discrets
The room was exactly as advertised and super comfortable. The size of the bedroom is rare for New York! Would definitely stay again and recommend to others.

We had an incredible week staying with Megan and Jason. Their house is beautiful, filled with lovely thoughtful touches. It is surrounded by great places to walk and eat and is conveniently located to numerous Subway stops. Highly recommended!

We had a wonderful stay with Megan and Jason, our room was lovely, large, and tasteful decorated as was the whole house. They’ve clearly put lots of thought into their gorgeous home. We never had issues using the bathroom, nor any noise issues, we slept very soundly - it also helped the bed was super comfortable, probably the best we’ve had on our travels! Frank definitely loved the belly rubs and we loved giving them to her! The location was great, safe and plenty of see and do nearby as well as easy access to Manhattan and subways. Definitely recommend this as a lovely place to stay.
Megan’s place was lovely in Brooklyn - thanks again for hosting us!

Megan and Jason’s place is beautiful. You can tell it’s very loved and has had a lot of thought and care into it. The room itself was huge, with the bathroom right next door. The location was great - in a quiet street yet still a stones through away from multiple metro stations, Fort Greene park and lots of shops. We walked into Manhattan everyday (granted we enjoy walking), but that shows how accessible and close it is to both Brooklyn and Manhattan Bridge. The place was extremely clean. Thanks again Megan and Jason!

Great location woth easy access to the city. Lovely home, loved the little touches around the house.
Megan and Jason kindly checked us in at 11pm coming from JFK. Jason even carried my heavy suitcase up the stairs. 
Also, amazong comfortable bed and pillows, better than a hotel!
Nice place! I felt like I was having a much more authentic Brooklyn experience than staying in a hotel. Hosts were great, complete with welcoming pup.

Megan and jaison are very nice hosts with warm hospitality. The house is beautiful with lots of plaisant and original objects . The room is really big with everything you need. It's close to Subway and many good adresses such as restaurant, theatre, parcs. You can go by foot to the heigths Brooklyn and make easy nice bike rides. The fort green parc is just at the end of the street. A really nice adress in Brooklyn !

I loved my stay! Check-in and check-out were a breeze.  The location was excellent, which made getting around super easy. And I loved how flexible Megan was to extend my stay a night.  I highly recommend a stay here when you're in town.
Fantastic room in the middle of Brooklyn! Very comfortable room and bed and no street noise. Megan and Jason were super accommodating and flexible. Definitely recommend!
Awesome place in a great location. Megan and Jason were friendly and welcoming. Had a great stay and enjoy their place. Thanks again!

Beautiful room with a very comfy bed. Location is great, easy walk to Brooklyn bridge and several subway lines around the corner. Also plenty of local restaurants and shopping in the area.
Jason and Megan were very nice and the dog is a dote. 
Would definitely recommend this room!
Very nice location to stay in Brooklyn with a lot of metro stations in the neighbourhood! The place was very clean and spacious! Sharing the bathroom was absolutely no problem.

We had a wonderful stay at Megan’s, a beautiful place tucked away in a quiet corner of Brooklyn, yet located centrally enough to provide easy access to JFK, Manhattan & other key locations via a variety of light rail & subway transport solutions. Megan provided a list of so many good recommendations we could barely work through all of them; those that we DID visit most certainly didn’t disappoint. Their house reminds me of something you’d see in a movie; highly recommended! We know where we’ll be staying next time we visit the Big Apple!
Nice comfortable accommodation. Felt at home.
We had a wonderful time in Brooklyn! The location is perfect and the recommendations from Megan were very nice. Their dog, Frank, is also wonderful. Would love to stay there again.

As a former NYer and Brooklynite, I can say this is an exceptional home in a great location, with a truly delightful family. A classic NY brownstone, close to ALL subway lines (15-25 minutes to Manhattan/15 minutes to Williamsburg), near parks and cafes, and yet very quiet. High ceilings, wood floors, and charming furnishings add to the experience. We would gladly stay here again and recommend it highly! Thank you for a wonderful time!

This was a really nice, clean stay in a very convenient part of Brooklyn. I was a little worried before we got there about the distance to Manhattan and things to do, but it turns out I had nothing to worry about. This apartment was convenient to the trains/subways, and good walking distance to many cute neighborhoods, restaurants and bars in Brooklyn and even into lower Manhattan if you're up for a stroll over the Brooklyn Bridge (not as long as it seems). The room was bright during the day and dark at night, not loud, and the bed was super comfortable. Their adorable dog is a major plus.

This was a really great place to stay.  The room is 'period', its furnished accordingly.  It was a nice room just to be in and to look at, in terms of its architecture and features.  The hosts were really accommodating and helpful.  The location - its on a lovely street, the wider area has really interesting things to see.  I walked a couple of times from the house into Manhattan, a lovely way to start the day.  Overall very pleased and would recommend.

Das Haus von Megan und Jason ist super gelegen - 4 U-Bahn Stationen innerhalb von 2-5 Minuten erreichbar, die einen durch ganz New York befördern. Supermärkte, Restaurants und Cafés sind ebenfalls in der Nähe. 
Das Zimmer ist sehr groß und gut ausgestattet (großes Bett mit bequemer Matratze, Föhn und TV). das Bad ist direkt nebenan und wird mit allen geteilt.

Megan und Jason sind sehr nett und hilfsbereit, man fühlt sich sehr gut aufgehoben. 
Es war insgesamt sehr toll und wir kommen gerne wieder!

We stayed with Megan and Jason for 6 days. It’s a beautiful brownstone house in a really great area. So easy to hop into Manhattan on various underground’s or go for dinner and drinks in the local neighbourhood. Would definitely recommend you take advantage of their local knowledge and suggestions of restaurants. Bed was really comfy too! Would highly recommend staying here for a trip to NYC.
This is a cute, clean and very convenient place in Brooklyn. Very close to BAM and tons of trendy restaurants.

Thank you Megan and Family for having Jessica and I to stay.  We really enjoyed your thoughtful touches.   The room had so many great books if I had have been there on my own might not have left for days so much to read.  Everything was put together in such a lovely way and neighbourhood is so convenient for the city and lovely eateries nearby.  Thank you for being so lovely to us and have a wonderful and very happy Christmas and a fabulous 2019.
My girlfriend and I had a lovely stay at Megans place. The house is extremely cozy and beautiful, and the location is fantastic. A perfect place to come back to after a busy day in the city.
The place is just beautiful, the bed great, good metro connections and a pleasant neighbourhood. 100% recommended!

We don't know from where to start with all the positive aspect of this place! First of all the location, it made our visit in NY. There are lots of subway to reach any borough of NYC! The house is beautiful, stylish, warm (in winter) and clean as our room too. In particular the bed was a cloud! Last but not least the hosts, Megan, Jason (Ryan and Frankie the dog)  are super nice, thoughtful and available to give you recommendation but at the same time they are very discreet. 100% recommended!

Staying at Megan’s place was such a treat! Their historic brownstone has so many gorgeous original details, and the location was beyond perfect (close to so many subway lines, Fort Greene Park, Barclays Center, downtown, tons of places to eat and shop!). The room was large and clean and light-filled and cozy, and sharing the bathroom with their family was no issue at all. We would definitely stay again!
Excellent communication and information. Great location and transportation links. Check out the Brooklyn Academy of Music nearby.

I enjoyed my stay and found the AirBnB to be exactly as described in the listing. The bed was very comfortable, the room spacious and clean with lots of natural light. I would easily stay there again.

Great location where a lot of subways are nearby. Sensitive and nice interior. A little shame that when i visit the family is out for traveling so i live in the house all by myself. If they were there, im sure it will be a convenient & local experience of New York life!

name: Beach Block 6bed Penthouse, Ipanema Best Location!
summary: Sunny terrace with side ocean view, 6 ensuite and plenty of living area! ••LOCATION LOCATION! •• In the heart of Ipanema, steps away from the beach ••Perfect for groups of friends & families•• Cleaning service and DELICIOUS BREAKFAST (optional). Recently remodelled clean and modern double bedrooms all with private ensuite bathrooms, AC, Cable TV.  High quality beds and sheets, fresh towels and all amenities needed!
space: ••• WHY AND HOW WE DIFFER ••• Our guest loves to stay with us, we hosted more than 500 of them, including a few famous ones and there is a reason why they all come back to us, send recommendations and leave great reviews!  •••LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION!!••• Right by the famous "Posto 9", the building is located only twenty seconds away from the beach sand. This is a clean, comfortable and beautiful beach block apartment located at the best possible location in Ipanema neighbourhood. In the heart of the trendiest and safest part of Rio, this side of Ipanema is packed with incredible restaurants, cafes, boutique clothing and nightlife. Tree lined, street and very safe environment, AWAY from the delinquency and mass tourism you would find in Copacabana. Ipanema is the best option to live the true Carioca life. •••SERVICE & SECURITY••• A warm welcome... We want our guests to enjoy their holidays to the fullest, to have the most comfortable home away from home. This is why we offer our serv
description: Sunny terrace with side ocean view, 6 ensuite and plenty of living area! ••LOCATION LOCATION! •• In the heart of Ipanema, steps away from the beach ••Perfect for groups of friends & families•• Cleaning service and DELICIOUS BREAKFAST (optional). Recently remodelled clean and modern double bedrooms all with private ensuite bathrooms, AC, Cable TV.  High quality beds and sheets, fresh towels and all amenities needed! ••• WHY AND HOW WE DIFFER ••• Our guest loves to stay with us, we hosted more than 500 of them, including a few famous ones and there is a reason why they all come back to us, send recommendations and leave great reviews!  •••LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION!!••• Right by the famous "Posto 9", the building is located only twenty seconds away from the beach sand. This is a clean, comfortable and beautiful beach block apartment located at the best possible location in Ipanema neighbourhood. In the heart of the trendiest and safest part of Rio, this side of Ipanema is packed with inc
neighborhood_overview: Located right on Ipanema Beach, Posto 9, only 30 meters from the ocean beach in the beautiful tree-lined, historical street and block,  of the famous "Girl from Ipanema".  Right by the famous "Posto 9", the building is located only twenty seconds away from the beach sand. This is a clean, comfortable and beautiful beach block apartment located at the best possible location in Ipanema neighbourhood. In the heart of the trendiest and safest part of Rio, this side of Ipanema is packed with incredible restaurants, cafes, boutique clothing and nightlife. Tree lined, street and very safe environment, AWAY from the delinquency and mass tourism you would find in Copacabana. Ipanema is the best option to live the true Carioca life.
notes: The apartment is on the 5th floor. The elevator goes to the 4th floor and there is one floor of stair until the Penthouse.
transit: The beach is a few steps away. Bus stop and taxi point right of the street corner, two blocks away from metro station.
access: Entire private unit, 6 bedrooms and terrace. No sharing space, it is your privatized unit for your group only. - A warm welcome! Either our maid, our hospitality manager, a representative or our doorman will welcome you upon arrival.  When you arrive, the apartment will be ready, all beds made and fresh clean towels, shampoos soap and conditioner (from Natura Brasil®), lights on, AC already fishing up the apartment, Sonos Speaker sound system ready to play bossa nova or any music you like with our premium Spotify linked account, or directly from your phone, wirelessly. We will try our best to have a gift a small welcome package to our guests when time allows us to do it and fresh drink on arrival.
interaction: Our apartments can be fully serviced if guests request it. Full breakfast, free laundry, and recommended local concierge service.
house_rules: CHECK-IN / CHECK-OUT INFORMATION o	The flexible check-in and check-out policy applies only when booking calendar allows it (no guests checking in or out the same day). o	Check In is 1:00 PM (for the room) but we (homeowners) are happy to welcome guest in the apartment as soon as you arrive in Rio upon calendar availabilities, we are very flexible. o	Check Out is Noon. but we (homeowners) are happy to have guest stay in the apartment if departure is later on the day (the room will be cleaned by the maid at noon), if our calendar allows it. o	As reservation can occur last minute and change calendar availabilities homeowners cannot guarantee late checkout (after 12) or early check-in (before 1PM) until 24h before the check-out time limit. SMOKING / PETS / GUESTS o	No smoking inside the apartment. (smokers are welcome in the outdoors only or by main corridor window) Smoking inside the apartment will result in loss of deposit. o	Pets are not allowed. o	We encourage all renters to purchase t

host.host_about:
Hi!

We are the lucky owners of these beautiful properties and penthouses in Ipanema and a luxury Mansion in Gavea.
We had the chance to host 300+ guests on Airbnb!

We  love to travel and try to do so as much as possible and we're excited to be a part of the airbnb community!

Please feel free to contact us should any questions arise. 

We are very open to your inquiries and will do our very best to make your stay in Rio fun, easy and comfortable! 

Best wishes and safe travels!

reviews.comments: we very much enjoyed our stay at sacha and hanna. the location is perfect, the apt gives everyone enough space and the terasse is the best place to hang out after a long day out. we have been provided with fresh fruits and water and most of all with a list of insider tips where to go, have food, take a drink, go clubbing...... def would come back another time again!
The host canceled my reservation 4 days before arrival.
The host canceled my reservation 7 days before arrival.
Amazing appartment, amazing location, amazing host! Next time we're in Rio we will definitely stay here!

I've been to Rio many times, and this is by far the best stay i had. 
Service is Great (internet, tv, hot water, laundry, cleanliness and more...), breakfast deliciious and i think it's the best location in the City.

Fantastic!

Will definetly be back

Could't possibly be better!  The place is very nice and clean, as well as spacious.  House personnel was adorable and super professional.  Great breakfast in the morning.  Location cannot be better...just a short walk from Ipanema beach and very close to the most popular bars and restaurants in the city.  And it is still a quiet place! We were a large group so we had some complaints for being a little loud the first night...but then everything worked perfect.  Thanks Sacha and your wonderful team for our wonderful stay!

Nous avons passé un séjour génial dans ce penthouse !
Il est idéalement situé, pratiquement au bord de l'eau ; proche des rues commerçantes, des restaurants, des banques... 
L'appartement est parfaitement entretenu au quotidient par une personne en charge du ménage et de votre petit déjeuner.
Outre son efficacité, cette personne est en plus juste adorable.
Sacha est un Pro ! Il devrait ouvrir un hotel ou une conciergerie :-) Il est hyper réactif à la moindre demande, c'est super agréable.
Je suis quelqu'un de particulièrement pointilleux et exigeant, et je recommande VIVEMENT ce penthouse pour un séjour réussi à Rio/Ipanema.

The place was comfortable and easy to get to. The owner is very helpful and accommodating. 
We loved the place, it provided a much needed haven after a very busy time at JMJ 2013.
The reservation was canceled 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had a fantastic Holliday staying in the 6 bedroom penthouse. And in the end much more value for money than staying at a random boutique hotel. 
The location is superb. Just around the corner from posto no.9 where it's all happening. We were welcomed by Maria the cleaning lady who had been a great help and made us feel safe and at home. 
I would recommend this place to any flashpacker like ourselves!

Sara

Excellent house excellent location. Very friendly maid and host responded quickly to any questions. Clean, nice, all expectations exceeded
Thanks

Las fotos no corresponden al apto que ofrecen, no es un apto sino son dos unidos por un pasillo. En la oferta decía 7 cuartos y cuando llegamos eran 6 cuartos, y nos toco enviar a otros amigos a un cuarto que el anfitrión ofreció como compensación, Los baños no cuentan con el servicio adecuado, de hecho no pudimos utilizar una habitación, por el mal olor que tenia el baño.  Adicional por el precio que pagamos no corresponde al apto.

Quedamos muy inconformes, lamentamos informar a todos los interesados que este apartamento es muy malo y no recomendamos su alquiler.

Great location on prime street in Ipanema less than a block from the beach. Very safe and nice area. Bath amenities and souvenir Brazil flags left in each bedroom.  Everything was very clean and lovely maids made breakfast every morning with eggs and coffee and fresh fruit. Great wifi service and Sonos as well. Also very good air conditioning in each bedroom. 

That all said, the apartment in real life does not look nearly as nice as it does in the photos. Each bathroom is a hodgepodge of different plumbing fixtures. One shower has the boiler controls in the wall inside the shower.  Water in the front unit (with balcony) ran hot and cold which made showering interesting.  Also a toilet in one of the front bedrooms has an electric pump to help it flush.  This is fine, except it also had a water leak from the tank to the bowl so the pump was activated every few minutes and the noise made sleeping in the bedroom impossible. The whole place could use a professional paint job. Overall it's a nice space with great potential but all feels a little too unfinished for what they are charging.
Lovely flat great location. Large inside with a fab balcony facing east so bathed in light in the morning

I totally recommend Alex's Penthouse for any group that wishes to be close to the beach in Ipanema.  The quality of the premises are five-star, the cleaning service is great and the breakfast is waiting for you every morning in the terrace.  Great experience and great service from Alex both prior and during our stay.
Alex was an amazing host and made us feel very welcome. The listing was accurate. The neighbourhood couldn't be any better - the apartment is 50 meters from the best beach in Rio (Ipanema).

Nos hospedamos en el Penthouse de Alex con 7 amigas y la verdad fue una muy buena experiencia. El espacio es súper confortable y cuenta con todas las amenidades necesarias para hacer una estadía placentera. Los desayunos son abundantes y riquisimos y el servicio de limpieza muy atento y predispuesto. El anfitrión también súper amable y ha respondido a todas nuestras inquietudes previas a la estadía. Súper recomendable, de viajar otra vez a Rio con amigas seguramente volveremos!

Nos fuimos a Rio con 9 amigos a festejar los 40 años, la verdad que el departamento fue una grata sorpresa!. Vimos las fotos y nos pareció espectacular, pero siempre uno tiene miedo de que haya algún truco. Realmente no fue el caso, el departamento era todo lo que decía, los cuartos en suite estaban todos muy buenos.  La terraza del penthouse estaba increíble, tenía vista a la playa muy linda, y era todo muy cómodo. Hacíamos todo caminando: la playa esta a 40 mts, y los bares y supermercados están muy cerca. Gracias Marta por todo! Algún día volveremos!. Slds Juan

when we arrived we found the appartment easily. the place is not on the front beach but very close. the place look a lot bigger in the picture but in fact is a lot smaller especially the rooms that are small. the wifi did not work for the hole stay and the cleaning ladies that were supposed to come did not show up the next day of our arivals. they came on he next days. the bose system also did not work and the air conditionning was only functionning in some of the rooms. the water pressure was very low so we could not have proper showers. the palce was ok but a lot too pricy for what is was. we had difficulties to get answers from the hosts even thought they always responded after some time.

We rented the whole penthouse. Most unfortunately nobody was in apartment at the agreed time of check in, neither the host was available over the phone during whole first day (neither ever replied SMSs messages). Once woman picked up the phone, quickly said the host will call back and hung up, then never returned the call. We got into apartment only by pure luck - previous guest was leaving and left us the keys.
Half of the penthouse bedrooms were not made up. In my bedroom bed sheets were not changed (! - noticed right before going to bed).
Next morning housekeeping lady arrived and sorted out everything. We were extremely happy with her and her peer services. However first day and night was a disaster :(
The location and neighborhood was perfect for us. 
Most of the rooms have very poor sound isolation from the street noise, which was quite annoying beginning 6am.
Muy buen alojamiento! Las mucamas un lujo y el desayuno muy rico!

Our group of 13 had a great experience. The penthouse apartment was clean, updated, and well maintained. It's in a perfect location a block from Ipanema beach. There was a doorman 24/7 and the building felt very safe. The maids were very friendly and provided light breakfast, coffee, and juice. They also offered a complimentary load of laundry. Alex was very responsive and flexible with our check-in time. I highly recommend staying here and would definitely return!

The only nice thing about this apartment is the location.  No one greeted us at the apartment, the apartment is extremely dated and all the furniture needs replaced.  The roof leaked so bad every night that we woke up to a flooded apartment everyday.  This was such a bad experience that I will never use Airbnb again.

The apartment was great, and we had an amazing time. The maids were very helpful and breakfast was ready every morning. The place was clean, comfortable, and perfectly located. The only issue we had was communication with the host. We tried contacting him a few times while we were there, and never heard back. I had issues with getting responses before the trip, so this was a continuation of that issue. Other than that, everything else was great.

O Alex e a Camille são simplesmente sensacionais. Não só como pessoas, mas também como anfitriões zelosos por seus hóspedes.
Só tenho elogios a fazer a eles e a simplesmente maravilhosa e paradisíaca mansão que com eles alugamos.
Graças ao tratamento que me deram antes, durante e depois da nossa estadia, posso dizer que foi um final de semana que jamais esquecerei e que, se Deus quiser, um dia não muito distante terei condições de repetir.
A mansão é linda, muito bem localizada, com ponto de taxi, farmácia, mercado e padaria no próprio quarteirão. Enorme, cheia de ótimos quartos e com uma área externa maravilhosa.
Alex e Camille, MUITO OBRIGADO. De verdade!


Alex and Camille are simply sensationals. Not only as individuals but also as zealous hosts for their guests.
I have only praise to give to them and simply wonderful and heavenly mansion with them rent.
Thanks to the treatment they gave me before, during and after our stay, I can say it was a weekend I will never forget and that, God willing, one day not too far I'll be able to repeat.
The mansion is beautiful, very well located, with taxi rank, pharmacy, market and bakery on the same block. Huge, full of great rooms and a wonderful outdoor area.
Alex and Camille, THANK YOU. Really!
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This place is Perfection ! It is modern, relaxing, beautifully designed and comfortable, we felt like staying in a luxury hotel. 
My friends and I spent the most perfect holidays and we would never want to leave this place.
We loved the location, litteraly close to everything, beach, restaurants, bar.. All were walking distance. It was really convenient as we were several people and we did not need to rent a car.

Alex was the perfect host. Welcoming, extremely helpful with local tips. 
We were thrilled to wake up every morning with a dreamy and fresh breakfast prepared by his lovely maids. 

Our only mistake was not staying longer in Alex's place! We will definitely come back.

We were Group of 12 and we really enjoyed our stay here, Alex and Camille were fantastic with great communication throughout, the penthouse is absolutely beautiful and the staff were always on hand to cater to our needs!  I would highly recommend this Penthouse to anyone and everyone. I will certainly be staying here again with family and friends. Thank you kindly Camille and Alex and your staff ! 

Nothing was too much trouble and Alex went above and beyond to make sure we were looked after, day and night.  The breakfast was also amazing - delivered freshly made to our door and prepared in our kitchenThe penthouse  is even better as it appears on the website and what a location, we were right on the Beach of Ipanema, steps away from our now new favorite brazilian restaurant Garota de Ipanema where I tasted one of the best steaks I ever had.

The only thing we missed was the nice weather during our stay as we came during a rainy week, however  we were able to watch movies in the living space on a projector screen which was pretty awesome!  There is a supermarket, bank, taxis, restaurants, metro station, ATM’s, Starbucks, Bar, and fast foods less than 5 minutes walk away and you must try ‘Polis Sucos’ just around the corner for the best fruit juices and Acai .
The other feedback is just to be clear about your expectations from the staff, they are happy to be working around your wishes and be present or absent depending on how you would like and plan your holiday, and it also comes down to the language barrier so just let Alex know what you would like when you arrive if you do not speak portuguese. We had a wonderful time and can't recommend the Alex or the Penthouse enough.

Our family LOVED our stay at the Penthouse...We were enjoying Rio so much that we tried to extend at our FAB 5 star hotel but that was not possible. We found Alex's place on 'instant book' and went for it with no (Website hidden by Airbnb) was in fact so much better than the hotel because we all had space to relax after full days at the Olympic Village ( a 5 min walk to the metro to get to the 40min ride to the O Village ) , beaches ,restaurants, sights & shopping...everything was close by..Alex was super helpful. It was wonderful to have the home help prepare breakfast & help with other chores.. (Hidden by Airbnb) translate was must to communicate with the lovely ladies or let Alex know and miraculously it happens! saying here made Rio even more enjoyable..keep up the great work....Would love to return and would definitely stay here again..
Everything ok, space as the pictures. Close to the beach. Very friendly maid service !
Great apartment! Very comfortable, and in an excellent location. Maid service and breakfast were amazing. I highly recommend it!
Alex is great, his team is great, the apartment is spectacular, this is our third year in Alex 's apartment. Looking forward to next year!!!
Muy buen departamento, la ubicacion es excelente , son 2 unidades conectadas muy comodas, es ideal para grupos grandes. servicio de limpieza muy bueno.Marina muy atenta

El departamento está muy bien ubicado, a pasos de la playa y en una zona muy buena. La atención y soporte perfecto también!! Recomiendo el lugar para todos aquellos que requieran de un depto grande con muchas habitaciones.
Excelente departamento y excelente servicio.

Wow, what an amazing experience we had staying at this property! It was a family trip and we couldn't enjoy it more, the house looks as good as in the photos and the team managing it are very polite and helpful.  We had our privacy, and no - the lack of curtains has not been a problem to us (because this could never be a real problem). The view from the terrace are great and we spent the afternoons having coffees and watching the sundown. The cleaning team is very nice and they did a great job, everything shined when we arrived. We also ordered the breakfast which was delicious, so fresh and healthy! The house is big and spacious and we liked the design. Location is perfect right next to the beach but also close to the city center. I would recommend this place to anyone staying in Ipanema and we can't wait to get back! Thanks a lot Alex and the team!
Maravilhoso o espaço! Fizemos o check in antes e o check out depois :) Nos receberam com frutas, águas e água de coco ! Recomendo fortemente

WOW - what an amazing stay we had here. The apartment is bright, spacious, surprisingly quiet (though it is located in a lively neighborhood), just a few steps from the beach and close to a large variety of restaurants, bars and shops. The host was super responsive, accommodating and the local staff was so kind. We were greeted with fresh fruits and warm smiles! The place looks just like the pictures (or better). We definitely plan on coming back!

Nice terrace and OK rooms in size. With the exception of two rooms in the back which are almost unacceptable. The air conditioning is very outdated and extremely loud in those rooms. That part makes the apartment a low value for money.

name: QUARTO NO CORAÇÃO DE COPACABANA II
summary: Quarto amplo:cama de casal queen,ar condicionado split, wi-fi,TV à cabo. Alugo outro quarto, no mesmo apartamento, pelo Airbnb, ha 5 meses.Procure por: quarto no coração de Copacabana e veja os 18 comentários excelentes.
space: O apartamento é bem confortável.  Possui 60 metros quadrados, sempre limpo, arejado. O Hóspede paga o preço de um quarto, porém pode usar o apartamento inteiro. Sinta-se em casa! Fique à vontade!O prédio fica a duas quadras do maior Reveillon do mundo!!

neighborhood_overview: O bairro de Copacabana é um bairro que não dorme. Tem tudo que se imagina: bares, restaurantes, bancos, supermercados, agências de viagem, praia, muitas lojas. Diversos pontos para aluguel de bicicleta. É o bairro mais completo do Rio de Janeiro. Copacabana é movimentado dia e noite.
notes: Voces podem chegar e sair a hora que quiserem. O check in e check out sao livres, ou seja, pode ser em qualquer horário.
transit: Metrô, pontos de ônibus e aluguel de bicicleta a menos de 5 minutos do prédio para todos os pontos turísticos e para qualquer bairro da cidade.

house_rules: Respeite as regras da casa. Nao é permitido fumar, trazer animais e crianças.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Apartamento em ótima localização de Copacabana, perto da praia, restaurantes e barzinhos. Nanda foi uma ótima anfitriã e nos deu boas dicas que facilitaram muito nossa estadia no Rio.
El cuarto muy limpio, cómodo y lo suficientemente amplio para tener una buena estadía. El departamento está ubicado a pocas cuadras de la playa, en una zona tranquila y segura.
Localização excelente e anfitriã muito prestativa.

name: Mauna Lani Golf Resort Townhouse with Beach Club
summary: Escape to our beautiful and tranquil paradise.  The Fairways at Mauna Lani Unit #206 is a luxury condominium in a gated community with resort style amenities, at the prestigious Mauna Lani Resort located along the sunny Kohala Coast of Hawaii's Big Island. Private Mauna Lani Beach Club Access  - with Key Card and Parking !!! RATES ARE INCLUSIVE OF 14.416% HAWAII RENTAL TAXES!!!
space: RATES ARE INCLUSIVE OF 14.416% HAWAII RENTAL TAXES!! (NO extra taxes will be added to your rates) This luxury townhouse is located between two world-class resorts. Mauna Lani Bay and the Fairmont Orchid (Many of our guests have chosen to conveniently stay at our Villa while they were on island to attend destination weddings at these two locations.) Each of these resorts is perched on one of the MOST beautiful beaches in the world, with white sand, clear blue water and the best weather Mother Nature can offer. This finely-decorated, spacious 1,600 square foot 'Fairways at Mauna Lani' villa 206 has an attached car park and is furnished in an Asian/Island motif and equipped with everything you'll need so you can enjoy your vacation with the comforts of home : fully-equipped gourmet kitchen, comfortable tropical furnishings and decor, quality bed and bath linens, and up-to-date technology: such as two LCD televisions and DVD Blu Ray players, digital cable with more than 500 channels, multi

neighborhood_overview: In addition to the easy walk to the beach or the Fairmont Orchid, there are a dozen dining opportunities a short stroll or bike ride away. No need to drive! Choices range from Tommy Bahamas, Ruth Chris and Brown's Beach House to Sushi, Vegetarian and Thai. There is also a nearby coffee shop where you may satisfy your caffeine fix, grab a breakfast to go or an afternoon drink smoothie. Want to enjoy your gourmet kitchen or grill in private? Then the upscale Foodland Gourmet Market and Deli will satisfy all of your needs. The villa is only a five-minute drive to six award winning golf courses and the best sandy and protected beaches in Hawaii. Hapuna has-been voted "Best Big Islands Beach" It also only a five-minute drive to the varied shopping and dining experience offered at the Waikoloa Beach Resort: The King's Shops includes many more upscale shopping, art galleries and restaurants, and next door is the Queen's Marketplace - a family friendly shopping, dining and entertainment comple

interaction: Privacy is assured for the guests. If there is anything that the guests would need, the property manager can be contacted anytime during the stay.
house_rules: Have fun on your vacation!! :-) However, noise between 10 p.m. and 8 a.m. should be kept to a minimum to avoid disturbing other occupants.

host.host_about:
My name is Anna Irish Price and, along with my husband Russell, am the proud owner of this villa. We are in the corporate aviation business and that requires us to live overseas and travel for work extensively. After several years of Asian living, we are currently located in the Middle East  (so we really enjoy the tropical lushness of Hawaii!). When we are on our downtime, we are either checking off our "bucket list" of worldwide places to explore, visiting family in New England or relaxing in the Big Island's embrace, where we enjoy the Aloha spirit and much of the Hawaiian culture. While Hawaii can bring many exciting experiences, being in Hawaii gives us a peaceful, relaxing and rejuvenating feeling that few other places in the world can offer, and our villa also adds the feel of Balinese serenity.

The Big Island has a special place in our hearts, as this was where we were married. This is the place that makes us the happiest, so we decided to finally own a piece of this paradise. We want a place to come home to and to call our very own.

In the meantime, we are sharing this home now with our family, our friends and our guests. 

We enjoy our visits to our villa. We are confident you will, too, and I pledge to assist you to make your dream vacation a reality.

reviews.comments:
While this unit was a great experience overall, I have to begin my review by complementing the owner on her incredible level of customer service. She is welcoming and gracious, and speedily replied to any questions that I had. Even the resort management were prompt and courteous in their response to a request that I had. 

The unit itself was very large - large enough to accommodate two couples with a child apiece. Also, it does come with a single car enclosed garage, so parking is not an issue. The soaring ceilings and comfy furniture (good stuff, not your typical cheap hotel furniture) are perfect for coaxing you into laying around and relaxing rather than heading out for activities. The whole place - from the appliances to the decor - just exudes a feeling of luxury and class that you rarely get in the typical vacation rental. I've definitely paid a lot more for a lot less. The outdoor grill and patio are so great for cooking, dining and post-meal lounging that we ended up just sticking around there for most meals rather than eating out. 

The resort grounds are very well maintained, and the pool area included a large kiddie pool that was only about 1 foot deep - perfect for our little ones. After experiencing the nonstop crushing crowds everywhere you go on Oahu, it was surprising how quiet and uncrowded this place was - even on a spring break week. If pools and jacuzzis aren't your thing, a few minutes drive gets you to the Mauna Lani beach club. There are lots of cabanas and lounge chairs to use, but get there early as the cabanas were full by 9am and the chairs by 10am. The condo also comes with plenty of beach chairs, so you can always bring those and skip the cabana hunt. The snorkeling was superb, and there are many beautiful paths meandering along the waterfront. Up and to the left were a few benches along the golf course for whale watching, while to the right were fishponds and several spots with lounge chairs tucked under palm trees. I highly recommend grabbing a book and a drink and hunting down one of these spots.

Lastly, the golf course. We played Mauna Lani South, and it was a good as advertised. The course is in great shape, and the views are stunning enough to help you forget all the balls you left in the lava rocks. 

I highly recommend this place, and we will be coming back!

Wow what a beautiful place to stay! immaculate both inside & out with everything we needed to make us feel at home. The resort was beautiful with lots of shops & restaurants nearby. We loved having the farmers market just down the road to quickly grab any food & supplies we needed. Anna was super generous & her communication was fantastic. She really made us feel welcome in her home even though we were not fortunate enough to meet her. I can't say enough about how beautiful the place was & how much we loved every second there. Very much appreciated for trusting us to enjoy your beautiful home for the week. I hope to return one day & explore the island more

Had a amazing stay while in The Big Island.
Anna's townhouse is so luxury and comfortable exactly described in Airbnb.
Anna and the resort manager provided lots of useful information about the house and the resort. Appreciate that very much.
We played golf everyday and loved bikes equipped in the house.
We highly recommend to stay Anna's townhouse. It will be an unforgettable vacation in Hawaii !

This was a great spot! it looked exactly like the photos. Very comfortable spot and in excellent condition. The patio was great too, w/ a big viking grill & lush green surrounding. Anna was excellent to work with -- answering a few email questions here and there. And the location is great - you can walk to the nearby shopping center (groceries, restaurants - guidebook has dinner recommendations too). We had a friend getting married at the fairmont but needed more space with our families/babies, and this location could not have been better! The pool was so convenient, a few steps away. The beach access was awesome too (5min drive away). We'd come back any time!

Awesome place - loved morning coffee and evening glass of wine on lanai 
Great location - close to amazing beaches 
Home was beautiful- and perfect for our family of four
Hope to be back soon

The entire home is lovely, from the furnishings, to the linens, decor even the small details like the candles, and other decorative touches. You will truly feel pampered here. The two outdoor spaces are superb, private and relaxing with lovely lounging spaces. All the beautiful and decorative lights are amazing. Very cozy and romantic. The lush and gorgeous landscaping is to die for. The smell of the wonderful flowers was heaven.

Nice t.v.'s , blue ray players and docking stations throughout make it very easy to watch your favorite program or listen to music as well. The whole house has a nice layout making it easy to feel comfy. Loved the washer and dryer amd roomy folding counter. 

The kitchen is amazingly outfitted. Lots of beautiful dishes and glassware for entertaining. Nice appliances as well for all sorts of things. Beautiful barbequing area, with counter space and a prep sink make it easy to prepare a meal outside.

The owners are thoughtful and really concerned that you enjoy their home. They make it a point to check on you throughout your stay which is very kind. They genuinely want you to have a great time in their home and you definitely will. Superb accomadations!

We LOVED our week at Anna's beautiful condo/townhouse. The home was spotlessly clean and luxuriously appointed. It was exactly as advertised so go ahead and book your holiday here with no qualms whatsoever.

The condo is part of a quiet, well-maintained complex with beautiful grounds and a lovely pool with spa and waterfall. 

Inside the home, we enjoyed the well equipped kitchen, the comfy master bedroom, the lovely walk in shower in the ensuite and the air conditioning. Everything was beautifully presented with lovely artwork and comfortable furniture.

Anna was very helpful and easy to communicate with and always responded to emails quickly. She was very kind in leaving us a welcome gift to collect at the local supermarket. 

If you stay here, make the most of the beautiful private club beach which has fabulous snorkelling. Having a car park pass and entry to this is a huge plus to the condo. There are other nearby beaches that are truly beautiful - e.g. Mauna Kea and Hapuna. We were particularly taken with the south (left hand) end of Mauna Kea beach which you can drive down to after requesting public parking at the resort entrance. It is a short walk downhill from the carpark to the beautiful beach.

There are local stores within the Mauna Lani complex including a small supermarket which has most of what you will need. If you require a big shop, there is a larger supermarket at Waikoloa Village about six miles away (inland - left off the main highway and not at the Waikoloa Beach). There are also plenty of places to eat around Mauna Lani and Waikoloa, although many of these were pricey for us Kiwis with a very week NZ dollar currently. Not so for people from the US.

The whole Kohala coast area is fabulous with lots to see and do. You will need a car.

I highly recommend staying at Anna's 2BR Luxury Golf Resort Townhouse. I would return in a heartbeat.

We stayed 6 nights at this comfortable, beautifully appointed townhouse. Anna was wonderful to work with, very responsive when a couple of things arose. Also, there are thoughtful touches that we haven't encountered at many other places we've rented in our travels: on the nightstand were three terrific reads: I read them some years ago and can state affirmatively that they were engaging and memorable, perfect for the beach; bicycles, so convenient for riding to the Mauna Lani beach instead of driving; a welcome gift card to start us off on provisions. The lanai is lush and private, and there's a settee out there that was my go-to place for reading, napping, sitting with my husband and a glass of wine way into the night. So much more I could say, but you'll have to come and find out for yourself how much of a treat this place is. Mahalo no loa, Anna!

This was the perfect base from which to see the big island. The condo was spacious, clean and modern. I recommend it to all. Pool/spa was quiet and nice. The pictures accurately represent the space. The host provided beach towels and chairs. The hosts were wonderful in all respects- recommendations, information, etc. everything about it was a breeze, from check in to check out. the area in which the condo is situated is nice, too. There's a great supermarket down the road, and also your own private beach. Thumbs up all around.

I stayed in Anna's lovely town home for six nights as I attended a wedding in the Fairmont Orchid Resort.
Anna was great at providing all of the details up front and while I arrived earlier than check in she had arranged for me to have access immediately upon arrival.  
The place is very private but wonderfully located so we had a 5 minute walk to be a part of the wedding activities and an eight minute walk to a small shopping area that has a great grocery store.
Anna has provided everything you could need to have a resort and beach style vacation.  Beach chairs, snorkel equipment, coolers, hundreds of towels, were all in the home.  The bicycles were great and while there were no bike locks for them a quick call to the resort brought them to us.  The resort manager is very helpful and responsive.  The wifi was powerful.  The home itself looks just like the photos.  Fairways is a group of similar homes built around a golf course and swimming pool but designed in such a way to give complete privacy!  And we had access to the private beach and some great snorkeling with the turtles as well the resort swimming pool and beach.  You won't be disappointed.

This condo is so nice! We stayed for 3 days and wish we had longer. There are great shops and a grocery store down the road. We grilled out on the patio and cooked breakfast every morning. There is also a beach club with the best snorkeling we have ever seen. It's private beach, not crowded at all, and has really great lunch/drinks. It's also a short bike ride from a nice resort. You can bike over to have dinner and watch the sunset. I highly recommend staying i. Anna's condo if you're visiting the Big Island.
Anna, thank you so much for a wonderful place we stayed in!!! We absolutely loved it! Mahalo!

The house is perfect for a wonderful vacation on Big Island. Not only because there is everything one could need but also because the location is perfect. Shops, excellent restaurants and Hawaiian dance and music performances are very close. My favorite place was the Beach Club of Mauna Lani where we did snorkeling, watched the breathtaking sunsets and walked along the costal trail.
The hosts were very helpful and concerned that everything was alright for us.
I would love to stay in this beautiful house again!
