Anna是个非常好的房东,房子由专门的公司来打理,但是Anna还是会在入住前和入住中以及入住后和我们保持积极的联系｡这个房子是一套很新的联排别墅,室内的装修以及配置的家电和家具都很齐全,楼上的主卧是一张Kingsize的大床,楼下是一张queensize的双人床,厨房的设施非常齐全,甚至有蒸米饭的电饭锅和热水壶｡小区应该是属于一个开发商建的度假村内,这个度假村有几个这样的小区,但是估计都是度假性质的,人都不多｡度假村有自己的私人海滩,海滩虽小,但是沙子算是大岛比较细腻的了,海滩提供躺椅､冲澡､停车以及救生等服务,非常好｡度假村内有高尔夫球场,球场分南场和北场共36洞,南场的风景非常漂亮,有若干个洞是建在海滩边上的,北场的某个洞旁就是Anna的房子｡度假村内有一片区域是商业设施,包括便利店､餐饮等日常生活设施,便利店虽小但是吃喝用的商品非常之齐全,所以不需要担心期间的日常用品补充问题｡房子离Kona机场20多公里,离大岛南侧的商业集中区大约50多公里,沃尔玛和餐馆等都在这个区域｡从度假的角度来看,强烈推荐Anna的房子,海滩､高尔夫球场还有美式的大房子真的很惬意｡最后感谢Anna的见面礼,希望我们有机会再见,也让我们第一次在AirBNB上有非常好的体验,谢谢｡

That's paradise. The house was clean and fully furnished with everything we needed, it has a perfect location and we were provided with an access card to the private beach (very nice beach btw).  You will feel like home.

Bei der Unterkunft von Anna & Russel handelt es sich wirklich um Luxus. Das Haus verfügt über eine sehr gut funktionierende Klimanlage, ist sehr gut ausgestattet mit Küchenutensilien, zwei Fernsehern und einer grossen Auswahl an DVD. Die Betten sind sehr bequem und das Haus ist stilvoll eingerichtet. Man fühlt sich sofort zu Hause. Unser Standard SUV hatte Platz in der hausinternen Garage, von der man direkt ins Haus gelangen konnte. Auch mit Strandutensilien, selbst für unsere 18 monatige Tochter, war das Haus sehr gut ausgerüstet. Es gab zwei Duschen und eine Badewanne. Der Aussensitzplatz und der Balkon im zweiten Stock sind ein Traum. Es gibt mehrere sehr nahe gelegene wunderschöne Strände und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten. Auch viele gute Restaurants befinden sich in der Nähe. Die Kommunikation mit Anna & Russel ist einwandfrei. Anfragen wurden innert Minuten beantwortet. Die Umgebung ist sehr sauber und ruhig. Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt sehr genossen. Wir können das Anwesen von Anna & Russel allen wärmstens weiterempfehlen - mahalo, wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.

Hola a todos,

Anna ha sido una anfitriona excelente, siempre hubo una comunicación fluida y agradable. Siempre estuvo atenta a nuestras peticiones lo que hizo mucho más agradable nuestra estancia en su casa. Cuando llegamos a casa, teníamos un regalo de bienvenida que nos gustó mucho.

La casa es como se muestra en las fotos, muy espaciosa, con todo lo necesario para unas vacaciones como en casa.

La casa esta dentro de una urbanización privada, con muchas áreas verdes, club privado(hay que ir en coche), piscina, vigilancia, etc. Aunque la isla es un destino de excursiones y playa, la casa tiene todas las prestaciones para descansar por las noches o disfrutar relajado los días que no se quiere salir de casa.

Esta muy cerca del aeropuerto de Kona, con un coche de alquiler es muy fácil acceder. Hay un centro comercial al aire libre(con supermercado) unos cuantos metros antes de llegar a casa, se puede comprar comida ya preparada, muy práctico cuando se ha estado todo el día fuera.

A pesar de lo bien que lo pasamos en la casa y de las atenciones de Anna, sucedió un incidente que ya hemos trasladado a Anna, la chica de la limpieza(Sra. Teresa) llegó a las 10:00 en punto, que dejáramos la casa ya que debía limpiar, no accedió a limpiar si no nos íbamos de la casa de inmediato. Tuvimos que salir corriendo de la casa ya que estaba enfadada, también nos llamó el servicio de vigilancia de la urbanización diciendo que debíamos dejar las instalaciones de inmediato o nos iban a cobrar una penalización por no salir a nuestra hora. Tuvimos que salir corriendo "literalmente" y estacionar en la calle para calmarnos del disgusto y relajarnos ya que incluso llegamos a pensar que podían llamar a la policía...fue muy desagradable. Lamento este incidente porque Anna es una anfitriona fantástica, pero creo que debe corregir el sistema de check out.

 Un saludo,
Very nice place to stay. We really enjoyed the unit and surrounding community. The beach club was definitely one of the highlights of our trip.

We had an amazing time on the big island. It was a much-needed getaway and this stay was exactly what we were looking for. The condo was clean and in perfect proximity to everything. The beach club access was one of the best amenities and we can't wait to return. Thanks Anna.

We felt the "Mahalo Spirit" of the Kohala Coast at Anna & Russell's 5 Star town-home.
All the amenities abound for that Big Island dream vacation. We lived "It's an Aloha Christmas" week to remember. It was the perfect Family Fun in the Sun... And when a chill takes hold, those treasured memories will warm our Heart! 
Mahalo, The Holt's & "Wild Orchid (Website hidden by Airbnb) ...."Feel the Force"2015
A place with impeccable beauty and serenity. We didn't meet Anna in person, but we can feel her hospitality through the communication and checkin arrangement. Would love to come back again.

This is an outstanding place:  I'd definitely recommend it to anyone coming to the Waikaloa part of the big island!  It is a private townhouse, large, 20 ft ceilings in the living area, two large bedrooms and a pullout bed in the living room, and as the pictures show is very well decorated.  Simply put, it is just fun to hang out in when away from activities (which was great for Christmas!).  It also has a beautiful patio that we used every evening for dinner.  For us, the private access to the beach was perfect:  you could either drive or bike there (ca. 1.5 miles), which we did nearly every day, and not have to worry about beach chairs:  just bring a towel and snorkeling gear.  On a side note, we stayed in several parts of the island, and found this area the best for our family:  it has most of the best beaches (e.g. Hapuna), lots of sun, and access to the rest.  Thanks Overall, I would absolutely recommend this to anyone coming to the Big Island.

안나와 러셀의 마우나 라니 골프 리조트에서 정말 환상적인 시간을 보냈습니다.
리조트 주변에 마트가 가까워 편리했고, 호스트의 하나하나 세심한 배려가 느껴지는 곳이었습니다.

빅 아일랜드는 처음이었는데, 이 곳에 다시 머물고 싶어 내년에 또 와야 할 것 같습니다!

Anna made us feel welcome in several ways; she accommodated our need for a late check out with a reasonable adjustment to the fees, she sent us several emails to make sure we had everything we needed and she also gave us a gift card to the local grocery store, which was appreciated.
This place is fantastic! It was a great size for a family of four and the amenities were spot on. Anna was also very responsive. We'd happily come here again!
We enjoyed our stay very much, the condo was lovely.

I have only positive things to say about my booking with Anna.  Anna and her property manager were very reachable when we had questions.  Even before our arrival, we asked to extend our reservation and Anna was so kind and patient with me as we went back and forth to rearrange our dates.   The house was exactly as described -- conveniently located, clean, and very comfortable.   My friends and I really enjoyed staying in Anna's home and would happily rebook for any future trips to the Big Island!

Everything is as presented. Anna is quick to respond to questions and requests. The house is beautiful, peaceful and fully equipped. The pool is beautiful, large with plenty of lounge chairs and shaded areas. We had a problem with the internet modem not working. We contacted the management company and they solved the problem in the same day. The location makes is easy to explore the island, visit multiple farmer's markets, relax on the beach or enjoy the ocean. We will be back.

It was a wonderful experience for my group to stay at Anna's beautiful resort house in Big Island. The facilities are very well maintained and provide easy access to the beach. Highly recommended to anyone who's traveling with families.
Great place to stay. Beautiful home with everything you could ever need. If I'm back in Hawaii I'm coming back here. Anna and team are pros and make it look easy.

Our son got married at the Fairmont, and this condo was so close and convenient to going back and forth.  Our daughter and son-in-law stayed with us, so was very nice to be able to cook and eat at the condo instead of eating out every meal.  The house was beautiful!  The furnishings are very comfortable and well done.   We enjoyed the outdoor grill and seating. Everything you need is in the kitchen.  
We didn't use the private beach but went to another beach that was close with the wedding party. Lots of beach equipment.  We rode bikes one day- that was great.  My husband played tennis at one of the tennis facilities that was close.  The grocery store and restaurants were not even 5 min. away.  It was a great location.  We definitely would love to stay here again if fortunate enough to return.  
Thanks so much for letting us stay in your beautiful home.

Our stay at this property was wonderful. It's incredibly well appointed and has all the supplies you could need for a great stay on the big island. We especially appreciated the outdoor space and how secluded it was facing towards a golf course. Just minutes from the pool and about a mile to the beach club - both of which were great! Anna was communicative and responded quickly to questions :) couldn't be happier!

This is an amazing property.  We just stayed there with our 3 children (Ages 6,5,1) for 3 nights.  The house is VERY well equipped with more than you need (Beach Chairs, Pool Noodles, Snorkeling Gear, Toy Box etc).  The house is spacious and beautiful.   The facilities the property has access to are great.  The pool is beautiful and the Mauna Lani Beach Club is just incredible; beautiful sand, clear water and snorkeling right off the beach.  Anna was an absolute delight to work with on booking this property and was very, very helpful and efficient.

ﾘｿﾞｰﾄｴﾘｱに到着した際に,入口のﾏｰｹｯﾄでwelcoming giftをいただきまず感動しました.実際に宿泊して,建物や内装は写真通りで,食器や料理器具,ﾋﾞｰﾁｸﾞｯｽﾞなど予想以上の物品の充実さに,ただただ感謝の一言でした.さらに,自分がｲﾝﾃﾘｱに興味あることもあり,素晴らしい家具やいたるところに,さりげなく置かれたｷｬﾝﾄﾞﾙ(ｽﾍﾟｱもあり)など,夜になるとまた違った雰囲気でﾃﾞｨﾅｰを楽しむこともできました.料金的にみても,周囲のﾘｿﾞｰﾄﾎﾃﾙと比べても極めてﾘｰｽﾞﾅﾌﾞﾙで大変満足しました.

contact frequents et amicaux par mail. cadeau de bienvenue
possibilite de garder lamaison quelques heures supplementaires

We had an amazing stay at Anna's place.  The condo was beautiful, the location was great.  We loved having access to the Mauna Lani Resort facilities and made use of much of them including an amazing catamaran snorkel trip and the bar at the pool!!  The condo had great access to gorgeous beaches, the observatory at the summit of Mauna Kea (which was amazing), restaurants.  We only wish we had more time there!  Everything was perfect and we will stay there again without a doubt!
Prompt communication, gift card to the grocery store, all around great experience.

Wir haben uns sofort wohl gefühlt, das Haus ist sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet mit zu Hawaii passenden Accessoires. Sehr gut ausgestattet, hübscher Pool in der Anlage. Der hauseigene Strand ist mit dem Auto in 3min erreichbar, schöner Sand, auch zum Schnorcheln für Einsteiger geeignet.
The house is beautiful, we did not have any problem checking in, the beach is also really close. I would recommend this place to everyone going to big island.

We were travelling from Australia with our toddler and I was 6 months pregnant, the Host - Anna, answered all of my extensive questions and gave me a lot of 'local' advice.

The Condo was very well appointed and comfortable. The complex itself was perfect for our toddler and we would stay at #206 again.

An absolutely lovely townhouse in a quiet neighborhood at the Mauna Lana resort on Big Island. The house is beautifully furnished and extremely well equipped. Just few minutes from beach, pool and nature, this place is a gem. We enjoyed the house, the pool, the beach and so much more.  

Our hosts, Anna and Russel were extraordinary. They sent kind welcoming messages to ensure that we had arrived well and offered to support us in any questions that we might have. 

Would come back any time and highly recommend it to all.

We absolutely enjoyed our stay at Anna's and Russell"s. The home was exactly as pictured and the location could not of been better. It was the perfect place to explore from! We so enjoyed the nearby beaches of Hapuna and Mauna Kea as well as the beach club itself. Communication with welcoming messages etc..and check in were all fantastic. I would definitely recommend their home!!  5 Star...Thank you for sharing your lovely home!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay there! The amenities were fantastic, the location was perfect, and I cannot say enough good things about it. The place was exactly as described. It was clean, well kept, and they even had a nice gift for us when we arrived. I would definitelyrecommend this place to anyone. 5 stars for these guys!

Anna's house was really good. Its condition is perfect and everything I needed is ready. Almost all kitchen tool, seasoning, beach towels, surf boards and even bikes. It has a pool near house and perfect private beach(5 mins. riding). I think the beach is better than others in the island if you will be with your kids.
I definitely recommand Anna's house and hope to be there again soon.

We absolutely loved staying at 206 at the fairways. We love the space, the proximity to the nearby hotels and the beach club was fabulous. It will be our number one choice next time we come to the big island.
The neighbourhood was pristine. Gated community, which I don't personally look for, was excellently kept. Very quiet, very nice neighbours.

Вторая половина октября 2016 года - пожалуй, это было лучший отдых в моей жизни. Ну, а Анна и Рассел - лучшие хозяева. Нам не довелось встретиться, но их поддержка ощущалась всегда. И при этом было очень, очень приятно получить сюрприз от Анны - подарочную карту в ближайший супермаркет. Впрочем, все по порядку.
Дом большой, просторный, хорошей высоты потолки, в нем легко дышится, в нем есть всё, и это всё - работает и функционирует по высшему разряду. Для особо интересующихся - целая папка инструкций по использованию имеющегося оборудования.
Постели удобные, подушек - пол-шкафа разных на выбор.
Свой гараж, пляжные кресла, даже "макаронина" для снорклинга. Ну вообще все идеально. Пожалуй, маловата частная территория самого дома - но мы практически не видели и не слышали соседей. До ближайшей плазы - на машине минут 5, пешком (по Гуглю) минут сорок. На плазе - мелкие магазинчики и супермаркет, в котором есть все необходимое. Подарочную карту от Анны мы с удовольствием потратили на вино, и с тем же удовольствием употребили его за здоровье Анны и Рассела.
Западная часть острова, где расположена Mauna Lani, поначалу производит удручающее впечатление - ни клочка естественной зелени, только черно-коричневая корка лавы, через которую едва пробивается ковыль. Тем больше начинаешь ценить рукотворную красоту зеленых садов. Зато дождей в этой части острова практически не бывает. Все восточное побережье острова - пышет зеленью. Это понятно, потому что очень редкий день там обходится без дождей, да и попрохладнее там. Осмотреть остров лучше всего при воздушной прогулке - на вертолетах (ближайшая площадка - около ближайшего к Mauna Lani светофора, напротив соседней плазы) или маленьких самолетах типа Cessna (водятся в аэропорту). Ну, и самое яркое впечатление - вулканическая жизнь острова, поэтому парк вулканов для посещения строго обязателен. 
Общее впечатление от отдыха - замечательное место, где живешь в комфорте, где можно не вылезать из воды, наблюдая за рыбками и крабиками, и где есть, куда пойти, помимо пляжа. Очень здорово!
staying here was awesome, very comfortable and owners communicated well
Great communication, house is perfect in every way""

What a lovely stay and a beautiful and comfortable home. Anna was communicative and easy to reach. We appreciated the extra little touches at her home. From bicycles in the garage to a Viking BBQ on the backyard Lanai, we had everything we needed to make our trip to Kona memorable. Her welcome gift certificate to a nearby grocery store was icing on the cake! Thanks so much for a wonderful stay.

Mauna lani is a good place to relax. The show at the Mauni Lani shops is great to watch.  The house is very pretty and very comfortable.  We only felt  it was a bit confusing to arrive to the house and many instructions to follow...

Our tenth visit to the Big Island was very memorable, aided in part, by Anna & Russell's beautiful town home.  We usually stay in Hawi, but this home is a more convenient location. Mauna Lani is a great resort area, and the Fairways town homes are perfectly upscale, Anna & Russell's home is immaculate, very well stocked and beautifully appointed. I hope to return again next year and would not hesitate to stay in this home.

Our family of 4 loved this beautiful home & location. Our kids are almost 2 and almost 5, so after a quick mom dash around the house to move some of the beautiful decor to safe locations, we were all set!  The swimming pool had a perfect 1 1/2 foot kid section, and was a very quick walk from our place.  We loved having a washer and dryer available, as well as a little garage attached to the unit to park.  We really enjoyed the beach club, which was just a quick drive down the road. We scored a cozy cabana nearly every day & brought along the boogie boards and sand toys that were stocked at the house.  It was such a nice comfortable beach, and safe place for our kids to play and swim, that we didn't feel the need to venture to any other beaches. Anna was very nice and communicative with us during our stay.  The grocery store down the road was also very nice had everything we needed.  Thank you for a great stay, your house is gorgeous and comfortable!
Great!
We loved this place.  The grounds are beautifully maintained, the house is gorgeous.  Kids loved the pool and beach areas.  Would love to come back and enjoy it again!

Really nice place.  Well decorated.   Nice patio . One of the nicest AIRBNB place that we have done.  Don't forget to use the beach cards.  It is a really nice beach there.  It was easy to communicate with owners and manager.

Really enjoyed staying here a couple nights.  Having at the table outside the kitchen surrounded by trees and birds was so relaxing and we didn't wind up having to drive anywhere to enjoy the area.  We borrowed the bikes to get to the beach, to the restaurants and hiking areas.  Loved it!
Wonderful home and location!

We enjoyed our stay VERY MUCH is Anna & Russell's lovely townhouse.  It is fully equipped and very comfortable in every way.  We hope to return to Hawaii next year, and if so, we would try to rent the same place if available!  The communcation and all directions/instructions were perfect!  Everything was GREAT!!!
Amazing place for family and friends....would go again in a heart beat
Beautiful home and great location!  Will definitely stay again!
Wonderful, quiet location! Great private beach access and very close to the community pool. Anna and Russell were very responsive. All as described.

We loved every minute of our stay! We've been traveling to Hawaii for decades, and this home stands out as one of the nicest accommodations we've experienced. From the easy check-in and check-out process, to the well-appointed interior, to the beautiful lanai, we were impressed. A pool is steps from the door, and amazing beaches are only minutes away. Plenty of dining and shopping options are around the corner. We also enjoyed walking to the Fairmont Orchid for dinner one night. Communication from Anna is thorough and responsive. We would definitely come back - THANK YOU ANNA and RUSSELL!

Gorgeous and delicate modern oriental interior design, quiet neighborhood, great facilities inside and within the complex, and was easy to get out to the beach and the surrounding areas. Our entire family including the kids (3 and 7) fully enjoyed the stay, including adventuring out to the open sea to go snorkeling with dolphins, which our whole family will remember for our rest of our lives!

Our stay was all we could ask for.  Anna and Russell's home very adequately accommodated our family of 4 plus 2 small children.  We used the barbecue, loved the pool and the ability to walk to beaches along with accessibility to local markets, restaurants, and activities.   The pool was used every day!
Beautiful house and a great experience!

The condo was really lovely and had everything you needed. Having access to the beach club was a great bonus.  There were some nice hikes/walks/bike rides around the area and plenty of restaurants nearby too. We would go back!

Der Aufenthalt bei Anna und Russell war super. Die Unterkunft ist der Wahnsinn..alles vorhanden was das Herz begehrt. War eine schöne Zeit in dem tollen Haus mit dem schönen Strandabschnitt im Beach Club.

This was our first Airbnb experience/our first trip to the big island and it was perfect. We had 4 adults (2 couples) in our party so having the 2 separate bedrooms & bathrooms was really nice. The kitchen was fully stocked with all of the cookware, utensils, glassware, etc that are needed to make your own meals. Having a BBQ & outside eating area was really nice. I loved having a washer & dryer too. It was easy to find and in a great central location for all of the activities we had planned. The neighborhood was very quiet and peaceful, so if you are looking for a wild nightlife, this would not be the place for you. It was everything we hoped for and more and would stay here again in a heartbeat.
We absolutely loved the place, had such a lovely time and felt as though we had a second home. Everything was smooth from checking to departing.

The house is fantastic and well positioned if you have a car to drive around the many stunning beaches in the area. There are two bedrooms, and a wonderful patio to enjoy breakfast or grill at sunset. We never meet Anna and Russell, but our communication via email was good and overall our staying was incredibly smooth and delightful. I would definitely recommend to stay at this place if you are traveling around the island and want to spend a few nights near the most beautiful beaches of the Big Island.
Lovely condo in a great location.  Perfect home base for exploring the big island!  Wonderful experience and would definitely go back.

Anna and Russell have a lovely home, my mother, 11-mo old daughter, husband, and I were very impressed with the accommodations and would love to come back. The place was very clean and perfectly located on a lovely gulf course. We enjoyed all the conveniences including nearby protected beach access, delicious food options at restaurants, shopping, and market. The place was spacious and nicely laid out and we were able to relax at this home away from home. The nearby beach club has fantastic snorkeling and the protected cove was perfect for our 11-mo old to enjoy splashing in the ocean. We only wish we stayed longer and we can't wait to visit again.

The place was immaculate and exactly as described.  It was secluded in that the area it is located is extremely quiet and you don't see a lot of people, but actually walking distance to the local restaurants and some stores. We visited the beach club a few times and highly recommend. Snorkeling there was wonderful and convenient. The hosts were really great communicators and answered any and all questions I had. Costco is only 30-40 mins away if you want to stock up. Overall, a great place to stay on the Big Island. :-)

Our family had a fantastic stay at Anna & Russell's home. We really enjoyed the outdoor dining area and grill and the quiet and peaceful location. There were fantastic beaches nearby, as well of plenty of shops and dining areas within biking distance. For our family it proved to be a great home base for our big island adventures. 

Anna and Russel provided a clean and nicely appointed home with plenty of beach gear and some helpful guides of the area. Even though they were away during our stay communication was excellent and prompt.

We had a fantastic stay and Anna and Russell will be our first call for a place to stay on our next trip back to the big island.

Our family of four had a wonderful time on the Big Island and loved staying at this beautiful townhouse in Mauna Lani.  The townhouse was very clean, was as it appeared in the pictures online and it was a great home base.  The resort is lovely.  We loved the secluded black sand beach in the resort and the resort beach (where we snorkeled and paddled boarded).  It was an amazing trip with lots to do on the Big Island.  Communication with Anna and Russell was quick and helpful.  Thanks again to both of you.
Repeat visitor. Great place to stay.

This was a family vacation for two parents and two adult children. We were able to use the upstairs bedroom for the parents (me and my wife) and the downstairs bedroom for our 22 year-old son and pull out sofa for our 18 year-old daughter. The kitchen had all dishes and utensils needed. There is a grocery store and coffee shop and many others stores/restaurants within walking distance. Drive though if you need to carry a bunch of groceries. The beach is great although there is a better public access beach some 15 minutes north. The cross island road beginning with Waikoloa is nearby. And the price is good. We would stay here again in a heartbeat.
My family and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay here.  Very convenient and very close to the grocery store and retail shopping area.  Ample parking.  Master bedroom was great.

Great location and accurately described. Our party of five (two toddlers) was perfectly comfortable in this condo and the beach access and amenities were exactly what we needed. We were attending a wedding at the Fairmont and were originally thinking of staying at the hotel, but really appreciated having a bit more space in a more family friendly setting. I personally appreciated the pre-checkin info and details to make sure we were able to quickly get settled. Looking forward to another stay here!

Anna and Russell were great hosts. Thoughtful and quick to respond when contacted. They were generous and accommodating to my family and I along with a 5 month old infant.  The place had everything you needed to enjoy a day at the beach or a day to lounge and cook on the BBQ. Very comfy space and slept 5 easily and could have easily fit another 2 if needed. The place was close to the fairmont where we needed to be for a wedding but a car was needed to reach other areas for touring.  Foodland farms was close and was very convenient for grocery needs. One suggestion for future guests is that they were very strict with outdoor noise. We were playing music on the provided cd player outside and got a noise complaint at 5pm which to me is a reasonable hour for music.  For family vacation this spot is perfect though. Lots of beaches nearby and with a car can reach all spots you desire. Airport is 20-25 min drive away.

What a wonderful spot to relax and enjoy Hawaii!  We enjoyed our stay by the pool just steps away and by the sunset beach just a short bike ride or drive away.  With a grocery store so close by, it made nightly grilling with fresh fish or steak extremely easy and delicious.

So amazing!! We absolutely loved staying at Fairways. It was immaculately decorated - the plush couch outside was especially wonderful. Being able to eat outside by candlelight or the beautiful hanging glass chandeliers was unbeatable. The amenities were awesome, and the location perfect. The access to the Mauna Lani beach club was also a must - it has some of the best snorkeling on the big Island, with covered cabanas and a delicious beach bar! Thank you so much! We are definitely coming again.
Anna and Russell were great hosts. They have a lovely home and even provided us with some extras we were not expecting. Thank you again for having us! We would definitely come again!

We traveled with our 10 and 12 year old boys, great space and location to explore anywhere on the Big Island, you are 90 mins from Volcano National Park...spend the entire day there, it is amazing! You are 30 mins to Kona for the best snorkeling and cool local beaches literally right up the street. It is also close to a grocery which was perfect and a Snorkel Bob's right in the same plaza. Great place and great hosts. Great to have the pull out bed in the living room, for an extra bed.

Enjoy the Big Island, my 10 yr old says "it is so chill!"
Beautiful condo! Loved our stay. Wish we had spent more time at the beach access, it is gorgeous and the restaurant there is wonderful.

It was wonderful experience. Villa facility and location was so nice. Specially we enjoyed marin activity. Because nice beaches are near and beach parasol, chairs, body boards are ready
Food market is also near. So you can get anything you need. Foods, drinks and any other items.
Beautiful house nearby amazing beaches! Very clean and great amenities!

Anna & Russell’s townhouse was exactly what we hoped it would be: a perfect retreat for our little family reunion which included 3 generations.  Among the many amenities, the organized closet filled with essential beach gear—namely boogie boards and beach chairs—stands out in my mind as it made an impromptu exploration to a nearby public beach so easy, stress-free and memorable. I would not hesitate booking again and would recommend it to families who want to spend quality time together.  Thank you Anna and Russell!!!

Great place to relax with family
Thank you

Anna's and Russell's place is outstanding. Very clean and just nice energy / decor. Everything was well taken care of and functioning. The location is perfect close to two world class beaches and still not too far away from town. 
It was fast and friendly dealing with the hosts. Will return for sure!
Hans Frykman MD PhD

We had a great time on the Big Island & staying at this villa was a big part of that. The location between the Mauna Lani & the Fairmont Orchid was perfect for us. The villa is spotless, upscale & in a quiet neighborhood, close to beautiful beaches & great restaurants. All communication about the property is accurate & helpful.
Really nice 2 story townhouse with lots of decorations and amenities. There's a foodland right down the street, so we were able to use the grill and make a great meal. Thanks, Anna and Russell!
Right on golf course. Very comfortable.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay, the location was great, the town home spectacular, had all the amenities of home.  The pool was beautiful, along with the grounds.  All in all better than expected along with wonderful host.  Look forward to our return!

Anna and Russell's place is at a wonderful location, was very nice and clean, and perfect for four guests. It was super easy to check-in and check-out. The amenities, restaurants, pool, and beach access were fantastic. Everyone was friendly and accommodating. Highly recommend and will be back soon!

This place was everything we wished to have for our family, being private, safe, quiet and close to restaurants and private beaches where our kids loved swimming into, seeing real fish swimming underneath them. The local supermarket is pricey but shopping in Kona would make the trip worthwhile if you are member with Costco and can shop at Safeway. However, we would recommend the local market in Kona for fresh fruits that are not comparable to what you can buy at any supermarket. We will definitely be back as we found the place very central, close to some historical walks like the Petroglyph park and visiting places like Hawi at the North tip of the Big Island, which will transport you in a different era.
Second stay there and we loved the idea of being in that quiet and safe location for our kids. The warmer weather made us appreciate the pool better. We would come back there again!

A complete gem in the Mauna Lani resort.  This place is beautifully decorated, more than spacious enough for our family of 4 and has any amenity you could think of.  I can't recommend a place more highly.

Had a magnificent time at this beautiful and relaxing home. Very spacious and beautifully decorated. The beach club is near by with comfortable lounge chairs and great snorkeling.
And many great beaches nearby.

Place was great. Upstairs suite was really spacious with tub, shower, dual sinks and lanai. Outdoor lanai and bbq plus a great kitchen and living room area made it a relaxing home base. Bikes were in disrepair and almost unusable but appreciated nonetheless.

We love many things here: beautiful views of the island and the golf course, beautiful villa internals and two bedrooms on different floors, good quality amenities including an efficient laundry, a gas grill, 2 smart TV sets, WiFi Internet, everything you may need in a kitchen for cooking your own meals. It is 15 min walk away from a nice small mall with a grocery store and restaurants, it is a 5 min drive to an amazing private and wave free sandy beach on a healthy reef with a great restaurant for lunch and dinner. We bought food and wine in Costco and Waikoloa village store and cooked most of our meals during the month of our stay, took a small group tour to the Volcano Park, visited a number of beaches around Mauna Lani., walked the historical trail over lava tubes to the beach, built sand castles with our 2 years old grandson, watched turtles, reef fish, birds and sunsets. The host was very friendly and accommodating, her responses were very quick and informative. We are dreaming to return to this place one day in the future. Thank you, Anna.

This is such a beautiful space in a well maintained, quiet estate. The pool area is fantastic, it's quite large and has a great kids pool. It was never busy all the times we went, sometimes just us. And it's quite close to the villa also. 
The private beach is a must! Gorgeous beach and not too busy. Such a bonus to have this included with the house. 
Very close to shopping areas, with Foodland down the road. 

We couldn't fault anything with this house, it was well equipped from beach gear to cooler bags (which came in handy on our big drive) and a well stocked kitchen. Comfy living space and decent sized bedrooms and bathrooms. 

Lastly, communication was excellent and Anna was so wonderful and pleasant to deal with. Unfortunately we never got to meet in person, but she was extremely accommodating with our requests and always quick to respond to my emails. Highly recommend this villa!

Great place to stay with seemingly every amenity and need thought of and provided. Very beautifully decorated and very comfortable. Good location although we ended up driving rather than walking to the beach and other nearby locations. Backyard looks out over some lava and trees and the golf course farther away, so was quiet and private.
Anna and Russell are outstanding hosts.  Their home had more than everything we needed to feel that we were at home on our vacation.  I can’t rate their home and hospitality highly enough.

The property was great and very tastefully furnished. The kitchen was well equipped and the beach supplies were plentiful. The outside area had a lovely, aspect looking onto a golf course and was very private. The pool area was fantastic - so spacious and the water was a prefect temperature. The complex was peaceful and relaxing and we wished we had more time there. The private beach access was really great too. I would definitely come back here if we return to Hawaii!

I enjoyed ever minute of my stay here. The area is quiet and beautiful. The pool is a short walk and never crowded. I love having access to the Beach Club area. It was a short drive but parking was easy. At the Beach Club there were covered and uncovered lounges chairs available and we were able to get them without difficulty every morning. The food at the Napua Beach Club was good and the Foodland Farms had sandwiches and snacks available for us to put in our little cooler. Snorkeling is nice off the beach in front of the Beach Cub also. Visibility was excellent especially in the morning. The house decor was very calming and the beds were very comfortable. It was nice having 2 bathrooms. My favorite spot was the outside couch. I loved sitting outside on it in the morning and the evening when we were not at the beach. I am so glad we chose to stay at Anna and Russell's. It ws the perfect ending to our 12 day trip to the big island.
Beautiful house, everything was super clean. The house has everything you could possibly need. It’s a few mins to Hapuna Beach which is incredible. Had a great stay here.

We enjoyed our first visit to the Big Island and this was the perfect place to stay! Condo is clean and well equipped for anything you may need. We loved the private beach club though you have to drive to get there. We snorkeled, saw turtles, rented a SUP which is a great way to see the fish from above. Beautiful quiet area with nice pool and jacuzzi. Hosts were responsive and easy to communicate with. We would definitely stay here again when we return. Mahalo!

The house is great and nice location and amenities. The beach extras were what me and my house mates enjoyed most. The hosts thought of everything!  Totally recommend this condo for families or friends visiting the Big Island. And the hospitality of the Fairmont Orchid and Beach clubs nearby was amazing.  We were able to use both facilities fully with no issues.
Beautiful property with great hosts, look no further for your next getaway.

Very nice house located in the villa district which near to the famous Hapuni beach.  The kitchen is well equipped and the living room/bedrooms are clean.  We like this area where the house located.  There are super market, restaurants and other shops in this area which is quite convenient.  We were thinking that we should have planned longer staying here.
Outstanding beautiful home.  The location is amazing.  My only regret was that we did not stay longer.
Space was awesome and the beach was phenomenal. Wouldn’t hesitate to come back again. Anna and Russell were great. Extremely responsive and excellent hosts.
Lovely place for a quick stay on teh big island!
Great location, very clean and spacious house and excellent communication with host.
3rd year in a row staying here. Perfect as always.

We happened to be at Anna and Russell's during Hurricane Lane! It was a wonderfully comfortable home to weather those rainy days. There are many great personal touches in the home and they were generous hosts. It is conveniently located near a great grocery and many restaurants. The pool is near the condo and we also had a few nice days to enjoy the private beach area. We highly recommend! Aloha!

We were recommended to this place by my sister who stayed there a couple years ago.  It's a classy place, with all the ammenities you could ever need, kitchen-wise, as well as beach supplies. They provided great communication,  and a nice surprise of a gift card. We really enjoyed our stay. 

Recommendation for your future guests....
We took a tour that was off the charts amazing ... (Website hidden by Airbnb) The owner, James, made this trip super memorable and personable.  Home run! Would highly recommend!

Very clean and spacious rental
Great location
Well equipped with pool and beach access nearby

Anna & Russell's place couldn't have been more perfect for our group.  
It was stylish, comfortable and had everything we needed for our stay. 
Our kids loved the yard space and pool.
We felt right at home. If we ever head back to the Big Island, we'd love to stay here again.
Thank you have for having us Anna & Russell : )

Anna and Russell's townhouse was super comfortable and beautiful!!
The pool and hot tub area was very relaxing and is perfect for families. The set of two cruiser bikes was a great addition as well. Perfect for a stroll around the fairways or to the store. We highly recommend their place and would stay here again!!

It's a Home away from Home. This is a beautiful place in a quiet neighborhood. The decor is well thought out to make it an exceptionally homy feel. The place has everything you could possibly think of to make it a perfect stay.
great condo very clean and tastefully furnished.  the access to the private beach club was clutch!
Excellent place to stay!  Great location and hosts were easy to communicate with.
Mauna Lani has much to offer,
Amazing!!!

Wonderful condo in a beautiful location.  I stayed at the condo for a medical conference at the Fairmont orchid.  It was a quick 10min walk down the road.  The condo is gorgeous! We loved having the beach chairs, bag, cooler, etc to use.  We easily drove to many different beaches.  The beach club had good food and wonderful snorkeling.  We would definitely stay again! Thank you!

Overall a lovely experience. The space is exactly as described. We enjoyed the outdoor grill and couch the best of all. The beach club access was great too. Bring your own shampoos and soaps as the start up amount provided is really just one nights supply. Anna and Russell were very responsive to emails and questions. We enjoyed our stay and would recommend their place for those visiting this area.

We had wonderful vacation!
Thznk you!
Great place to stay, highly recommended.

Our stay at your two-bedroom Fairview Airbnb condominium was extremely comfortable.  We appreciated how well-equipped the apartment was. We had picnic baskets, ice chest, a giant beach carryall, ample beach towels and beach chairs, that we used and enjoyed.  Your instructions for entry and exit were clear and easy to use. The private beach and the restaurant there were highlights of our trip. Particularly the shave ice martini!

Improvements? The master bedroom bed is quite soft for our taste. There were very few staples for food included, but the gift card at the market certainly helped. 

Overall our stay was fabulous. The kitchen equipment was ample; laundry was easy to do, and the exterior areas were beautiful. The hot tub, pool, and gym were also a positive.

Thank you for making our stay so comfortable.
We loved our stay!  The home is gorgeous and the private beach is awesome!

The house is lovely and very clean. We loved the closet full of beach chairs, boogie boards and umbrellas.  There is really everything you need for a day at the beach, including an ice chest. We also loved the bikes! Nice touch.

Anna and Russell's place is a great location, away from  crowds, near beautiful beaches.  Anna and Russell communicated well and were very generous.  The house has everything you will need to enjoy the nearby beaches.

Place was awesome. Anna and Russell have set it up very well. Quiet location. All the amenities, pool access, Mauna Lani beach club access and the beach gear is great. The garage use was perfect to store our bikes we brought with us. The two bikes available are good for going to the local market.  Highly recommended this unit.
This is THE Absolute BEST Airbnb we have stayed at.  The outdoor couch was a favorite spot during the rainy days. This home has ALL you need for an Amazing Holiday!
The place is clean and amazing! My kids especially loved that it was so close to the pool. We’ll definitely recommend this place to anyone!

name: Feel like home
summary: 4 rooms apartment, 3rd and last floor of a town house, very Montréal’s style with outside stairs, front bricks.  Lots of of cachet, wooden floors, heigh ceilings, molding, cozy & warm In Verdun area, SW of Montreal, nearby the St Lawrence river
description: 4 rooms apartment, 3rd and last floor of a town house, very Montréal’s style with outside stairs, front bricks.  Lots of of cachet, wooden floors, heigh ceilings, molding, cozy & warm In Verdun area, SW of Montreal, nearby the St Lawrence river

host.host_about:
French Canadian couple, globetrotters and roadtrippers, very social and easygoing
We are frequently travelling all around the world, so we open our place to travellers in need of a cheerful home in Montreal

reviews.comments:
Marie was very accommodating of our arrival and departure.
We felt more than welcome when she pre-approved our stay which excited us even more.
The place was spotless when we arrived and it was as cozy as a house of our own (as the title suggests). 
There was heating which kept us warm in Montreal's bitter winter.
Might I add that Marie prepares you for arrival with maps and some great restaurant recommendations that were all very useful to us. 

We would definitely visit this place again because the location was close to downtown and Marie made us feel very comfortable. I would recommend this house to anyone visiting Montreal with friends or family.

My friends and I had a great time staying at Marie's home! She was very accommodating and helpful. When we could not figure out how to connect to the Wifi, I had sent her a text message and within minutes I received a response and everything was fixed. Also, the house was very cute and accurate according to the pictures. I would most definitely recommend getting in contact with Marie when looking for a place to stay in Montreal. I hope to be back again next summer.

name: Cozy Penthouse between Copacabana and Ipanema
summary: BEAUTIFUL AND COMFORTABLE TWO BEDROOM PENTHOUSE  where Copacabana meets Ipanema - three blocks from Copacabana Beach in one direction and two blocks from Ipanema in the other with partial ocean views.  Secure neighborhood, on Rua Joaquim Nabuco, a lovely tree-lined street.  •Spacious terrace with shower •Open kitchen •Modern bathrooms   •Charming and comfortably furnished living room and bedrooms •Wireless connection, •Fully air-conditioned  •Maid service (optional) •Intercom
space: Penthouse in  Copacabana Where Copacabana meets Ipanema - 2 blocks from either Copacabana or Ipanema beach.  It is charming and comfortably furnished.  Open terrace with furniture, shower and an herb garden.  Wireless connection, fully air-conditioned (both bedrooms and living room), maid service (optional), telephone and intercom to building entrance.  It may sleep up to 4 adults comfortably and has an area of about 1.000 sq. ft.  There are two bedrooms, both with double beds.  One bedroom is a suite. Secure neighborhood, on tree-lined Joaquim Nabuco street.  •Top floor apartment with terrace - exceptionally quiet and sunny.   Located on the eleventh floor (top floor) of the building, which has two elevators.   •The condo is a classic building from the 70´s in a secure apartment complex with 24h concierge service and 1 apartment per floor and a few floors with two apartments per floor.  The elevators reach the tenth floor with access to the condo by a flight of stairs.   Partial view
description: BEAUTIFUL AND COMFORTABLE TWO BEDROOM PENTHOUSE  where Copacabana meets Ipanema - three blocks from Copacabana Beach in one direction and two blocks from Ipanema in the other with partial ocean views.  Secure neighborhood, on Rua Joaquim Nabuco, a lovely tree-lined street.  •Spacious terrace with shower •Open kitchen •Modern bathrooms   •Charming and comfortably furnished living room and bedrooms •Wireless connection, •Fully air-conditioned  •Maid service (optional) •Intercom Penthouse in  Copacabana Where Copacabana meets Ipanema - 2 blocks from either Copacabana or Ipanema beach.  It is charming and comfortably furnished.  Open terrace with furniture, shower and an herb garden.  Wireless connection, fully air-conditioned (both bedrooms and living room), maid service (optional), telephone and intercom to building entrance.  It may sleep up to 4 adults comfortably and has an area of about 1.000 sq. ft.  There are two bedrooms, both with double beds.  One bedroom is a suite. Secure neig
neighborhood_overview: Penthouse in  Copacabana Where Copacabana meets Ipanema - 3 blocks from either Copacabana or Ipanema beach.  The beach is a very democratic place.  Be suspicious of people who are way too friendly.  Look out for your belongings, especially phones, cameras and wallets.
notes: I suggest guests to use the service of Jaude Jr (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , he is a cab driver whose service I use in Rio all the time.  Jaude is available to take you around Rio (sightseeing), as well as on your way from and to the airport.  The rates are the same as a regular cab with the advantage of safety and the convenience of a taxi driver on call.  I also recomend the service of Marcelo Jesuíno (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) who lives in Buzios and also does transfer from and to Buzios and região dos Lagos.  Both professionals speak English and work on call basis.
transit: Yes, bus, cabs and subway to literally every location in town.  There is a 24h parking service located in a hotel nearby.  Bicycles can be rented a block away (bike stations) and you can ride it pretty much anywhere you are heading to and drop them in different stations.
access: Wifi, cable tv, air conditioning in all the rooms, outdoor shower and terrace.  I also provide, voley ball, beach chairs,  umbrellas, sarongues, hats, bags and Havaianas flip flops for guests to feel at home since their very fist day.
interaction: I welcome the guest on the day of arrival to show him/her around and answer questions.  I am available through phone or (Hidden by Airbnb) for a faster contact and also email.
house_rules: Maid service can be arranged upon request. The key rings ( 2 sets) have keys for the front door. The Zona Sul key ring allows for discount at the local markets. Remember to show it at check out. As a building rule, all air conditioning unit must be turned off whenever you leave the unit.  Air  conditioning units and other electric appliances should not be left running unattended.   Use the garage entrance when coming from the beach -  there is a tap to wash the sand off in the garage.     Sarongs, flip flops, hats and bags are there for you to use during your stay.  You can find them at the front door and hanging in the kitchen.  There are also beach chairs and umbrellas. Do NOT put any kind of garbage in the drains in the terrace.  The shower in the terrace stores a lot of heat.  Test the water temperature before opening it.   Henna tattoos artists on the beaches do not use sterile material and often use inappropriate ink in their art.  Henna stains sheet and towels irreversibly.  Any

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Hi and welcome to your apartment in Rio.  

I love to travel and to meet new people.  Hosting through Airbnb has allowed me to to do both.  

On my free time I like spend time with family and friends, travel and read - biographies and art are my favorite topics,   I also love history, interior decoration and photography.  Lately I have had a growing interest in reading about natural food and natural healing through meditation and yoga.  So I have been spending a lot of time cooking and attending to my herb garden.

I have lived most of my life in Rio. so I know the city well.   Since the 80´s, when I came back from a small liberal arts college in the US where I majored in History and Political Science, I started hosting friends vacationing  in Rio.  I have started hosting visitors from college  every year.   Some were coming for the first time, others came every other year.   This experience has enabled me to see the city through the eyes of new comers.  

It will be a plesasure to host you in RIO.

reviews.comments:
My friends and I stayed at Celia's apartment for NYE and had a fantastic experience. The apartment is very nice and has everything you need. It's also very well situated - walking distance from Ipanema and Copacabana beaches, metro station, lots of restaurants...

Celia was a fantastic host. She made sure we had absolutely everything we needed when we checked in and left us lots of things that you would typically not find in a rental apartment (beach bags, sarongs, discount cards for the supermarket). Before and during our stay, getting in touch with her was easy and the communication was very pleasant.

I would definitely stay in her apartment again, when I come back to Rio.

Celia is a wonderful host and her place is beautiful. The deck allows you to spend just as much time outside as inside the apartment. Her apartment is clean, the a/c worked well and it is in a perfect, clean and safe location.

Excelente!! el departamento con una ubicación estratégica. Muy cómodo, cálido, tranquilamente 2 parejas están bien! Celia una anfitriona muy amable.
Super recomendable!!
Dear Celia! Thank you for hosting us! Your place felt like my own home in Rio (cozy, safe, perfectly located with anything one needs). Hope to come back soon...

Celia's apartment is even better than advertised and made for an absolutely wonderful stay in Rio. The location is ideal, with easy access to both Copacabana and Ipanema beaches, and great restaurants and supermarkets nearby. 

The apartment itself is gorgeous with a great large balcony and modern new appliances and bathrooms. If you stay here you won't be disappointed!!

we had a wonderful stay at your place, Celia , and will definitely come back as soon as possible ! We felt totally at home in your lovely and "easy" appartment and we very much appreciated your disponibility and your discretion . The pix do show a lot but they cannot render that "home" feeling that was ours during our stay , notwithstanding the quite extraordinary location . My daughter , who could not come , is very jealous and will definitely make it the next time we come !

Celia is a very lovely person who received us extremely well!!! I definitely recommend her apartment and certainly would comeback! Great place, excellent location, all in all, perfect place to stay in Rio to enjoy the best the city has to offer!!!

We had a fabulous time in Celia's Arpoador apartment. 
The property is great. Large, bright, clean, well-equipped, and just great for families with children. It's a beautiful living space with comfortable bedrooms and a large living room. The penthouse terrace is lovely and allows for impressive views over the water at Copacobana and Ipanema. 
The best thing about this flat, however, is its location, which is just perfect for holidaymakers. It is 5 minutes to Copacabana beach and 5 minutes to Ipanema beach (by foot). There are loads of good restaurants within a stone's throw, several supermarkets, a metro station (Gen. Osorio) and plenty of shops. Being this close to the beaches, with easy access to the rest of the city (taxis available everywhere), was perfect for us.
Celia is a gracious, helpful and generous host and I can't rate her highly enough! She went well out of her way to make our stay special and those extra touches were really appreciated (especially the leftover carnaval costumes!) (oh yeah, and the delicious mountain cheese). She was very helpful when we arrived, and made herself constantly available to us during our stay if we needed anything. She had plenty of good tips for restaurants and other activities in the neighbourhood. 
Overall, a hugely positive experience for me. Recommended!

Celia was a great host, highly recommend staying with her! She met with us the first day and told us all the great things to do and places to eat around the house. The unit was exactly as pictured and is the perfect location in Rio. It's right near both Ipanema and Copacabana beach in a nice safe complex.
The apartment and Celia were great. Location of the apartment is perfect and the apartment is in perfect condition. Celia was most helpful and made our stay very relaxing. Thamks again Celia.

Apartment is in a great location, very central to both Ipanema and Copacabana and 1 block from the beach. The pictures are very accurate. Celia is incredibly responsive by both email and text. She met with us on the first day to give us some tips of what to see and where to eat. Incredibly helpful!
Buena es tida muy bonito apartamento

Wondeful stay at Celia's appartement : location is perfect, the apartment is super tidy and comfortable, the terrace is a dream. Everythinhg is arranged in perfect taste and Celia was always there for us when we need some advice or help. Thank you Celia!
The reservation was canceled 34 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Celia's apartment was fantastic, and perfectly situated right between Copacabana and Ipanema.  Her place is large, light, clean, and exactly as shown in the photographs.  I would definitely stay here again the next time I'm in Rio!

We stayed three weeks in the penthouse were Copa meets Ipanema. This is the best location you could ask yourself. The apartment is nicely furnished and has everything you need. The beautiful terrace offers morning and evening opportunity to sit outside. During the day the beach is around the corner. Nice restaurants are nearby. The Leblon shopping center is within walking distance. Celia is an excellent host and feels responsible for your safety. She is helpful in organizing transport and day trips. This apartment is highly recommended.

It was a perfect stay - the apartment was super clean, more then enough space for four people, tons of fresh towels etc.
celia herself was most supportive, even organized a doctor in the carneval time and brought to there with her car and translated!
late check in no problem, flexible according to check out time !
perfect location in a safe area!
could add a lot more, short version : best place to stay !!

Everything about this apartment was perfect.  Perfect host, perfect location, perfect/comfortable accommodations.   If you are debating on booking this place, don't question, just book.  I guarantee you won't be disappointed!

Amazing apartment, super location, very clean and beautiful.
Celia was very friendly, helpful and flexible.
I can absolutely recommend this place for a stay in Rio. It makes you feel "carioca".

The apartment is in a perfect location we thoroughly enjoyed our stay! The place is immaculately decorated and Celia is the best host. Definitely coming back here again when we go back to Rio! Celia provides excellent recommendations around town and truly invites you to their home. Definitely the best experience!

Célia a été très chaleureuse lors de notre arrivée, se déplaçant pour nous expliquer tous les détails sur son appartement.  Nous donnant également de nombreux renseignements sur le quartier, les bonnes adresses, restaurants, magasins.
Son logement est vraiment idéalement situé dans la rue qui relie Ipanema et Copacabana, à 5 minutes à pied de l'une où de l'autre de ces plages.

Short review:  Celia is a great host and warm person and this a bright, beautiful apartment with excellent amenities.  Highly recommended!

I booked this apartment last-minute.  Celia responded extremely quickly, approving my request.  After my booking was accepted, Celia was very communicative regarding the arrival of my friend and me to ensure she would be there to greet us.  Unfortunately, I missed my flight to Rio but Celia took this in stride and made sure to meet my friend after seeking pertinent details about him.  

Once I arrived, I found an apartment that is beautiful, comfortable, well appointed, eclectically and artistically decorated, full of natural light, and centrally located between Copacabana and Ipanema.  The building feels secure with 24-hour doormen and is on a busy street.  The location is convenient to the beach, many restaurants, and markets.  The internet was fast and reliable.  The air-conditioning, appliances, and fixtures are all new and work well. 

Celia is a wonderful and warm person who handled an unusual situation with grace and aplomb.  Unfortunately, my flight leaving Rio was canceled after I checked out of Celia's home.  With no cell phone signal and non-existant wifi at Santos Dumont airport, my best solution was to go back to Celia's apartment hoping to rent it for another night.  Unfortunately, Celia and her family had moved back into the space making it unavailable to me.  Celia was very understanding of my situation and was helpful in finding a new accommodation for the evening.  Although I felt like I was intruding, Celia (and her daughter their pet dachshund) understood the necessity of my coming back could not have been more warm and kind.  

I would highly recommend renting this apartment and hope I am welcome to do so again.   Celia speaks excellent English and is a very interesting person who I sincerely hope to meet again.

We spent a fantastic time at Celia and Ze's appartement; everything is perfect; it is clean, the location is good, there is AC which is important in Rio, the rooms are quiet (which is very rare in Rio!) the bathrooms are clean, well equipped and comfortable, and the terrasse is a big plus; we will come back for sure!!! You feel at home, Celia and Ze are excellent host, always prepared and ready to help, a fantastic experience!

Celia and her flat are the perfect choice for your holidays in Rio.
The host speaks a perfect english and she is super available to give all the information you need.
The apartment is perfect located to visit the city (5 min walking to Copacabana and Ipanema) and it is really comfortable:
- beautiful
- spacious
- fast wifi
- perfectly furnished

Me and my friends really enjoy it!!!

Let's keep this simple...  Me and my friend were traveling all over Brazil BASE Jumping and the last 4 days of our trip we wanted to treat ourselves to an amazing place with an amazing location.  Celia nailed it.  We loved the place and her communication was perfect and very very fast.   I think she confirmed my request in 2 minutes.  If your looking for greatness book this Penthouse.  Ralph

Had a wonderful stay at Celia's penthouse in Copacabana Ipanema. Her flat is located in one of the best areas and has 24 hour security. Celia is a fantastic host, and although I did not meet her, she could not have been more helpful and nice. She arranged a taxi pickup from airport and was very responsive/easy to get in touch with. Her flat is very comfortable and clean. I really enjoyed the unique design, terrace and super comfy beds. Thanks again Celia, and I look forward to staying at your place next time I am in Rio!
Terrific host, one of the best I have ever met.  The place is bright, homey very nice.  Obrigado Celia pelo usar seu apartamento!

Amazing apartment in the best location. Ipanema down one end of the street... Copacabana at the other. Celia is lovely and incredibly helpful. Loved the rooftop patio... Prime Rio real estate. Going back!
Celia est très attentionnée et son appartement plein de charme. Situé entre copacabana et ipanéma, en dernier étage, il est entouré de restaurants et commerçants.

The flat was just wonderfull and I have no words to thank the way Celia made as feel and all the tips she gave us to make everything easier and better for us. The place is amazing, a you can see in the pictures and is perfect located next to the best beaches in the city. I just felt in love with Brasil and its people. Hope to have the chance to go back again!

Celia was the perfect host. The apartment is stunning and in a great location. Fully equipped with everything you could need for a memorable holiday. The outside shower on the terrace was a particular highlight for me! Celia was always quick to respond to any question and gave helpful advice.

We stayed the second time in Celia´s apartment. The place is really beautiful and the location is perfect. The moment you step in there, you feel like home. Celia is super nice and very helpful. We hope to come back soon.

First let's talk about the host: kind, careful, available.
Then, the apartment is perfect, well decorated, and you will love the terrace with its outdoor shower, a must !
Finally, the location is ideal, at equal walking distance of both Ipanema and Copacabana...
Warmly recommended of course !

Celia es super amable y está muy presente para lo que uno necesita. Además de estar atenta a los detalles, nos ayudó con un taxi en nuestra llegada por ejemplo. Nos consiguió una pava para calentar agua rapidísimo y una tostadora. Ellas es muy agradable. Lástima que hubo algunas cosas en el departamento que no funcionaban y no pudo reparar: el agua de las duchas salía tibia y para los días frescos de invierno que nos tocaron no llegaba a estar lo suficientemente caliente. La habitación en suite en las fotos se veía blanca y al llegar nos encontramos con que las paredes estaban pintadas con dibujos hechos a mano que no eran muy agradables, de hecho nuestras hijas no se animaron a dormir ahí. Y en esa misma habitación había un vidrio roto en la ventana. Nosotros íbamos con dos nenas de 6 y 2 años, un peligro! El resto, el departamento es muy lindo, canchero, tiene un balcón precioso con lindas plantas y está muy bien ubicado.

This place is great value for money, perfect location, relaxed vibe, fantastic views and huge terrace with outdoor shower. Rio rocks showering while watching the stars, the sea and knowing everything is at your doorstep. The host Celia is the BEST!!!

Celia was a great host. She kept in touch with us prior to arrival and met us when we arrived at the property.  She responded to all request promptly and made frequent inquires to determine if we were satisfied with the accommodation as well if we needed any assistance during our vacation.  The property/Apartment was great and met our needs.  The location of the apartment between Copacabana and Ipanema proved to be an excellent location, just a few blocks to either beach. Also a few minutes’ walk to Metro/Subway.  Hope to stay there again the next time we visit!
foi ótimo. localização, limpeza e muito charmoso.

Gostamos muito da rápida estadia. Célia e José nos receberam de forma acolhedora, se preocuparam de modo sincero sobre como resolveríamos nossas necessidades de locomoção alimentação. E o fato de estarem no andar de baixo do apartamento também nos deu muita tranquilidade. foi nossa primeira experiência e nos causou uma boa impressão.

Celia is a very gracious and attentive host. The building is located in great safe location between Ipanema and Copacabana beaches. Morning jogs/walks along Copacabana for the sunrise and evening jogs/walks along Ipanema for the sunset are just a left or right turn out of the front of the building. The apartment is clean, spacious and as seen in the photos. The beds and pillows are comfortable and clean. The showers are spacious (unlike many Rio apartments) A bonus is the tranquility of the balcony during the day or night. We often slept with the windows open, and left them open most of the day. Traffic noise was almost non-existent. I suggest not using the A/C for those not accustomed to the Rio heat, the temperature changes will only make you sick. Although I've traveled to Rio many times before and am very familiar with the area, Celia was still able to suggest different places for us to try. We would definitely recommend Celia as a host and would return for another stay at this apartment without hesitation.

Beautiful apartment! The apartment is very stylish decorated and had everything we needed including a fully equiped kitchen, laundry machine, very nice terrace, beach towels etc. Celia was very helpful and easy to reach as she is living in the same building. She recommended a lot of nice places as well to go out for coffee, diner, drinks etc. We really enjoyed our stay and would love to come back again one day!

By far one of the coolest apartments (not just on airbnb) I have ever been to.  A gigantic collection of books and movies, along with cool decorations.  If Ernest Hemingway had been a Carioca, this is what his apartment would look like :)   

Celia was great.  I booked this apartment the day before I needed it, and only for a 2 day stay.  She met me there when I arrived, and went over everything.  I've been to Rio a lot so I know my way around, but if this is your first trip, this is the host to point you in the right direction.  I didn't really need anything from her during the stay, but she is in the same building and was responsive to all messages.  Check out was a breeze and she got the contact info of my Brazilian friend in case I forgot anything.  Really went the extra mile (or kilometer haha)

As she says in the listing, the building itself is from the 70s.  Compared to US standards, all apartment buildings in Zona Sul seem outdated and this one is no exception.  The building and apartment have quirks which obviously come with the territory.  Elevators are slow and you have to walk a few steps.  There were some issues with the AC working in the living room but it was a temporary problem that I'm sure future renters won't have.  Nothing negative or deal-breaking, but if you are the type that expects new, modern, and pristine, this isn't the place for you.  If you like vintage and eccentric, this is definitely the place.  There is also a giant outdoor patio.  Rio is meant to be explored but I will admit my days got started later than normal as I enjoyed laying around so much.  And when it was raining outside, being cooped up in here was perfection.  Kitchen has about every single cooking implement imaginable, preparing a meal here would be easy.

The doormen were great and even during my short stay, the ones I hadn't met asked for my name.  Celia gives you a list of their names also, and its obvious these are real doormen, not the standard fare of guys sitting there watching tv.  Location is great and is a couple of blocks away from grocery stores, restaurants etc, not to mention Copacabana and Ipanema 2 blocks in either direction.  There are tons of apartments on airbnb that have similar looks and pricing.  If you want something unique for a great price, I highly recommend this apartment and host!

Nous avons particulièrement apprécié d'une part le Penthouse de Célia parfaitement équipé, confortable, situé à moins de 5 minutes à pieds des plage de Copacabana et Ipanema et d'autre part du parfait fonctionnement des climatiseurs présents dans chaque pièce.

A casa e a proprietária são ótimas. Se você gosta de agito a localização é excelente. Há bares, restaurantes e três praias muito próximas: Ipanema, Copacabana e Arpoador. A casa é limpa, funcional, aconchegante e bem decorada. A Célia é muito gentil e prestativa. Adoramos❤❤❤

Celia has been great, always available and flexible in understanding our necessities. Also a friend got sick for few days and she provided lots of suggestions, food, and general help. She definitively took care of us more than just guests. Bye Celia! Thank you
El departamento es hermoso, muy bien puesto. Tiene todo lo necesario, esta excelentemente ubicado y Celia es muy amable, siempre dispuesta para ayudar en todo lo que se necesite. Muy recomendable.

Todo perfecto! El apartamento es increíble. Buena ubicación a 2 cuadras de Copacabana e Ipanema. Cerca de bares y restaurantes. Tiene una terraza super amplia con linda vista. El apartamento tiene todo lo necesario para pasar una vacaciones de lujo! Celia y su esposo siempre fueron receptivos y de buena comunicación. Cualquier duda que teníamos estaban ellos para solucionar. Son unos excelentes anfitriones! Muchas gracias Celia!

Celia's property is a Rio Gem. The apartment is in a great location, right in between Copacabana and Ipanema. The Arpoador, best sunset in town, is also only a few blocks away. The neighborhood offers all the conveniences needed like banks, pharmacy, and grocery store.
The apartment is beautifully decorated and Celia is a very friendly host. We loved our stay and we will be back.

Celia was a great host and her appartment is absolutely beautiful. Perfecly located, spaceious and clean this should be your go-to spot if you want to stay in the Ipanema/Copacabana area. We received great tipps from Celia and everything went very smooth.

The Celia's place is perfect, full of amenities and the location is even better. Celia is the best hoster I've ever had, indeed. I recommend to everyone'd like to book an apartment in rio for vacations.
Best!
Leo.-
Amazing apartment, we stayed one night in the Fasano hotel which was no where near as good. Great value for money and a great host.
Lugar agradável e bem localizado. Anfitriã muito gentil e prestativa.

Nossa estadia foi simplesmente incrível! Tudo estava organizado, limpo, muito bem decorado e equipado! Não nos faltou nada! A Celia estava sempre pronta para responder nossas mensagens com dúvidas e também dando dicas do que fazer no Rio de Janeiro! O que mais me surpreendeu foi que o apartamento é idêntico às fotos, nem menor nem maior! Espero poder voltar para o Rio e com certeza já sei onde ficar :)
Cheerful apartment, with balcony views, centrally located, cozy, bright, easy to access, safe. Highly recommended.

Celia was the best host! Very friendly and easy to communicate with.
The appartment is cosy, well furnished and with a very cool arty atmosphere . Celia offers beach towels, surf boards, flip flops, sarongs to borrow..even tooth paste is at your disposal! We immediately felt like home and enjoyed the large terrace. I highly recommend Celia's place if you stay in Rio. Wish I could have stayed a bit longer;)
Apartamento muito limpo, estiloso, e de bom gosto. Tivemos um pequeno problema com um dos ar condicionados mas foi resolvido da melho forma possível. Voltaremos!
Todo perfecto, la ubicacion es inmejorable, el depto es muy luminoso y fresco. Celia es una gran anfitriona.
Great place! Will book it again!
Ett helt strålande boende i Rio! Celia har allt man önskar av en värd! Lätt att kommunicera med och svarade snabbt på eventuella frågor.

Difficile de trouver une hôtesse plus extraordinaire que Celia !
avant notre arrivée elle a tout fait pour nous faciliter les choses : nous trouver un taxi pour l’aéroport, et une personne pour nous emmener à notre destination suivante ...

pendant notre séjour elle était prête à chaque instant à répondre à nos questions et à nous aider , toujours avec le sourire!

ensuite l’appartement est absolument parfait :situation idéale, déco charmante et personnalisée , propreté irréprochable , et surtout cette impression finalement assez rare de rentrer chez soi!
Nous recommandons chaudement cette super adresse !

Outstanding!!! Our stay at Celia's place was simply amazing. She's the host I would always have in any of my trip. She's lovely and very kind!! The place is so comfortable and charming. Very well decorated. Sometime we prefere enjoy our time at home than going out. The location is the perfect one between Copacabana and Ipanema. You wouldn't find any better. I definitely recommend to any one and for sure once I will be back in Rio this is the place I would like to stay again. Thanks sweet heart

Great floor plan and nice touches to the apt.  It was larger than I expected. Celia is a great host and was timely and accommodating with everything.  Plenty of towels to use (which is unusual I think), extra large American style double door fridge / great kitchen to use if you need it.  Location is excellent for Copa or Ipanema beaches.

What a beautiful place! Our expectations were overly met . Our host Celia is a super helpful, friendly, and kind host. She settled us all in and was great. The photos do not do this place justice; the reality is it’s much much nicer, bigger and has an amazing and warm ambiance. The apt is thoughtfully decorated and has everything a traveler would want and need. 5 min walk to Copacabana and Ipanema beach ( best of both worlds). I would definitely recommend highly and also repeat . Thank you so much !!!

Excelente cobertura, bem posicionada em relação as praias de Copacabana, Ipanema e Arpoador, acesso a pé a todas elas. Todos os serviços nas imediações, comércio, restaurantes....
Acolhida calorosa pelos proprietários. Celia organizou um conjunto de informações essenciais sobre o Rio d Janeiro. Além disto se mostrou acessível durante todo a nossa estadia.
O apartamento corresponde exatamente às fotos de divulgação, charmoso, confortável e decorado com relativo bom gosto.
Certamente retornaremos!!

Amazing Experience

The apartment was really clean an the fotos are exactly as it looks like.Really well organized with all furnitures that you need. Really good location. Everything you  found in the area as supermarkets and restaurants. Celia was amazing and was really helpfull all the time. We could really feel at HOME. For sure we will come back next time.
Aliado a uma localização perfeita, um local super aconchegante! Atenção foi fantástica e todas as questões respondidas rapidamente ! Vale a pena !!

I cannot recommend Celia’s apartment enough. Not only is she the sweetest host but she took time to make us personalized recommendations for restaurants and bars. The apartment itself is vast, well conceived, in a super safe building and right between Copacabana and Ipanema.

Que maravilha de apartamento e localização. Não poderíamos estar mais felizes. A viajem foi perfeita com a ajuda da Célia.
Ótimas recomendações!
Amamos tudo a respeito. Estaremos de volta em breve ;)

This is the ideal place to stay in between the 2 beaches .
Awesome terrace and amazingly cool interior design

This stay was PERFECT. 
We were 4 and stayed 3 nights. 
The apartment is perfectly clean. The two bedrooms have air conditioner, the beds are comfy, and the door-windows are on the great terrace (with a shower ! On the terrace !). 
We spent awesome late evenings on the terrace. When you look left, Copacabana ; right, Ipanema with sunset ! The apartment is on the last floor.
The bathrooms are really nice, with towels, shampoo, soap, toothpaste ...
We also loved the kitchen, the decoration is tasteful and useful ! There is a big fridge, a lot of kitchen tools, plenty of seeds and seasonings free to use, filtered water tap ...
Everywhere in this house, we felt good, at ease, at home.
The wifi is fast. Copacabana is 2 minutes by feet, Ipanema 5. Shops, bars and restaurants around. Down the block, a fresh juice shop perfect for breakfast ! Very secure area. Building guard 24h/24.
From the beginning of the reservation until after the stay, Celia was the nicest host. She always responded immediately ! She welcomed us warmly and even came to say goodbye. She was really nice and super helpful for a lot of things, and she gave us precious advices.
Well, that's it : we only can recommend this place ! 
Thank you Celia !!

El apartamento de Celia es un ático bohemio con mucho encanto. Tiene una agradable terraza desde la q se divisan a lo lejos tanto Ipanema como Copacabana. Celia es extremadamente hospitalaria: nos permitió llegar antes de tiempo y salir tarde en función de nuestras necesidades. Muy recomendable!
You'll be hard-pressed to find a better hostess, space and location. Celia, with the love, care, and devotion, she put into our stay, make Airbnb and its business model sparkle.  Thank you, Celia!

Apesar de curta, minha estadia na Celia não poderia ter sido melhor. Estava exausta depois de uma semana intensa de trabalho, e mesmo estando no RJ para o trabalho, consegui descansar a mente e o corpo na casinha dela. O lugar é realmente muito especial, cheio de toques especiais, muita luz natural, uma varanda incrível com bastante verde e vista para o mar e quartos ultra confortáveis. A Celia é um amor de pessoa e me recebeu como uma verdadeira superhost. Pode reservar sem pensar duas vezes pois aqui é o paraíso. Super obrigada Celia por toda sua hospitalidade. Pretendo voltar em breve!
Foi tudo perfeito. O apt tem tudo que precisamos. A Célia é um amor de pessoa. A localização é excelente. Tudo muito limpo e agradável. Adorei tudo. Espero voltar em breve.

Great rooftop apartment that was perfect for our 2 couples to share. The location is wonderful. Celia is amazing communicating with you about the apartment and with tips and suggestions while you are in Rio. Would stay again!
Nice apartment with a nice terrace
