Everything was perfect! Celia's place was stunning and  was really helpfull.  I can only recommand to stay there and enjoy  Rio life!

Celia’s apartment was amazing! Fully equipped with everything you could possibly need, and the balcony has an incredible view to see the water at Copacabana and Ipanema. Location is amazing and very convenient to a grocery story and both beaches. I hope to be back again very soon!
Limpo, organizado, estiloso, bem localizado. Ótima comunicação com a anfitriã!

Amazing flat in great location!! Very safe! Roof terrace is a bonus! 

Communication between Celia and Nina was great and super helpful! 100% recommend to stay here!

name: MONTHLY COZY SUNNY - SAGRADA FAM.
summary: Estudio para 2 personas ( ideal para 1 persona sola) en Sagrada Familia. Solo disponible para estancias superiores a 31 noches (máximo un año).
space: STUDIO - ATICO IN SAGRADA FAMILIA. ONLY FOR MONTHLY RENTAL. Quiet and sunny. Plenty of day light.  It is an atico floor (floor 6th) in a building with elevator . There is a small open kitchenette (fridge, microwave, coffee machine, toaster, utensils to cook ..), a bathroom with shower (towels and hair dryer are provided) , a closet, a drawer, a study zone with shelves and a table , one or two single beds (sheets are provided), and a wide window with a view to the terrace that lead to the Sagrada Familia that is touched by the sun the whole day.  Wifi internet available. The terrace is equipped with a table , chairs and sunbeds where you can have breakfast or take sunbathes without anybody bothering you.  The apartment is in a superb location. It is next to La Sagrada Familia and few minutes walking from some of the most characteristic Antoni Gaudi’s buildings in town as La Pedrera or La Casa Batlló.  There are bus stops 1 minute away and the Metro-Tube with blue and purple lines that w
description: STUDIO - ATICO IN SAGRADA FAMILIA. ONLY FOR MONTHLY RENTAL. Quiet and sunny. Plenty of day light.  It is an atico floor (floor 6th) in a building with elevator . There is a small open kitchenette (fridge, microwave, coffee machine, toaster, utensils to cook ..), a bathroom with shower (towels and hair dryer are provided) , a closet, a drawer, a study zone with shelves and a table , one or two single beds (sheets are provided), and a wide window with a view to the terrace that lead to the Sagrada Familia that is touched by the sun the whole day.  Wifi internet available. The terrace is equipped with a table , chairs and sunbeds where you can have breakfast or take sunbathes without anybody bothering you.  The apartment is in a superb location. It is next to La Sagrada Familia and few minutes walking from some of the most characteristic Antoni Gaudi’s buildings in town as La Pedrera or La Casa Batlló.  There are bus stops 1 minute away and the Metro-Tube with blue and purple lines that w
notes: SOLO MÁS DE 31 NOCHES. NO HUT
interaction: Estoy disponible 24h para atender a los huéspedes ante cualquier incidencia
house_rules: •Respetar el descanso de los vecinos. •No fiestas por la noche. Por favor, modera el volumen de la televisión y la radio, hay vecinos durmiendo en el edificio (incluyéndome a mi...)  •Solicito huéspedes maduros, responsables y no fumadores. Si eres fumador puedes fumar en la terraza. •Los suministros de internet, electricidad , agua y las sábanas y toallas estan incluidas en el precio.

host.host_about:
Llevo una vida tranquila y me gusta viajar sin grandes lujos para conocer tantos sitios nuevos como sea posible.  
El haber viajado me ha hecho descubrir esas pequeñas cosas que te hacen sentir cómodo cuando estás fuera de casa.
Me encanta conocer gente de otros países, compartir experiencias y de paso practicar el inglés.
Siempre que puedo participo en cualquier actividad propuesta por Airbnb o los miembros de su comunidad en Barcelona.
Un par de datos más sobre mi: Me encantan los perros y disfruto cantando en coros de música gospel.

reviews.comments:
El piso -la azotea, más bien- es pequeña y, aunque no es nada lujosa, está bien equipada con un pequeño baño y una cocinita. El único inconveniente es la cama, algo pequeña y no especialmente cómoda, aunque tengo entendido que la cambiará en breve. También hay una terraza con muy buenas vistas y muy agradable. Alicia ha sido muy atenta y puntual, perfecto. 

¡La relación calidad-precio está muy bien!

Alicia es una perfecta anfitriona, muy amable y atenta. El apartamento es precioso. Es pequeño, pero muy confortable. Esta todo muy bien organizado y limpio. Ademas cuenta con una terraza muy grande, que es un lujo. El apartamento esta situado muy cerca del metro y de la parada del bus, por ello, es muy facil moverse por la ciudad.
Alicia was a nice and friendly host. The apartment was neat, clean and tidy, and it looked exactly how it appeared in the pictures. It's a good deal for the price, and I recommend staying here.

Gracias por todo, los dias en el apartemento de Alicia eran muy  recreativos, Alicia es muy amable y ayuda mucho. En el apartemento no falta nada. La mejor es la muy grande teraza. Me alegro a visitar pronto de nuevo Barcelona y deseo estar de nuevo en el apartemento de Alicia.

Alicia was a nice and friendly host. The apartment was neat, clean and tidy. It's a good deal for the price and the view is amazing.
The terrace is a big plus
I recommend staying here

Alicia was very helpful prior to our trip and an excellent hostess. We had a great time in Barcelona and loved the location of the apartment. The space was clean, cosy, and we felt safe. Thank you Alicia!

The apartment is in the perfect location to see all of Barcelona! The apartment has everything you need while you stay, and a great price! The only drawback was the bathroom - which was tiny and a little smelly, but you can't have it all with old buildings. The kitchen and bed area were perfect for a couple on holiday. Alicia was helpful and easy going. We had a wonderful time.

We had a great time staying at Alicia's place.  She was an amazing host.  Her schedule worked out such that she was able to pick us up from the airport.  She provided maps and water for us as well.  

The studio is a bit small but it is very fair for the price.  It is located a block from Sagrada Familia and a block to the subway station.  The rooftop deck was a huge place.  We would stay there again.

Alicia's appartment is cosy, very clean and situated perfectly, very near to the Sagrada Familia. There is everything you need and the terrace with its incredible view over Barcelona is terrific! Alicia is an especially nice host, she helped us with everything and her recommendations were great. It was a real pleasure to stay there.

Alicia is a very friendly host and gave us helpful tips when arriving at her apartment - for example, buy the 10-trip metro ticket to save money! Her apartment is quiet, bright and well-equipped, with lots of brochures, maps and guides to help you on your stay in Barcelona. We especially enjoyed sitting on the terrace, which has an amazing view of the city. We would definitely recommend Alicia's apartment to future visitors!!

We stayed with my boyfriend for 2 days in September. Alicia was very helpful and advised on a couple of great places to see and visit. The flat itself is small, but presents that Barcelonian feel and has everything required for a pleasant stay - including a wonderful terrace facing Sagrada Familia.
HIGHLY Recommended!
Muy agradable y acogedor apartamento. Lo recomendo ! La terraza es un puntazo. Alicia un encanto.

Alicia was a great host, very kind and helpful. She gave us some nice restaurant and cultural tips about Barcelona. The studio is very cozy and has everything you need. The terrace is huge and offers a great view. Thanks, Alicia!
Es war einfach super!

Alicia was an incredible host who I would thoroughly recommend! The studio was clean and delightful, everything worked well and the view from the roof is mindblowing! Alicia was so kind to me before and during my stay, and gave me tips on where to go in Barcelona before arriving. She is a lovely, friendly and very funny person, and I look forward to staying with her again soon. She provided towels, clean sheets and food in the pantry too - always a plus! Many thanks Alicia, i loved Barcelona!
Traumhaft schöne Stadt, das Apartment liegt so zentral, dass man vieles auch zu Fuß machen kann. Umbedingt in den Parc Güell  gehen!
nice and clean place to stay. very complete. Bathroom very small but cosy. Gorgeous view to the Sagrada Familia and close by the metrostation. Entrance is beautiful!

La anfitriona muy profesional y amable, incluso deja un surtido de infusiones y cafes como bienvenida. El estudio esta perfectamente dotado de todo lo necesario, no es nuevo, pero todo limpio y cuidado. Interesante la enorme terraza y la panorámica.

Alicia is a fantastic hostess! She was waiting for us when we arrived and told us all about Barcelona! Gave us tips and helped us whenever we needed. The apartment is small but cozy. It's clean and has everything one might need. The bathroom and shower are very small, but overall the stay was very good! Oh, the view from the patio is great!!!

We had a great time staying at Alicia's apartment in Barcelona. It is a small studio locted virtually on the roof of an elegant tenement house (yes, there is elevator ;-) surranded by a huge terrace with a splendid view as it is located just beneath Sagrada Familia. Highly recommended!

Alicia was a gracious host. She greeted us and took very good care of us. The place is very nice and provided with everything you could need. I enjoyed the amazing view of la Sagrada Familia, the closeness to many attractions and the attentions of the host. From another host, I recommend Alicia to everyone in the community.

We liked Alicia studio. It is not big, but quite nice. I found all necessary staff and even more (poker cards for example). It was inconvenient to switch on water heater before 1 hour to have a shower and weak Wi-Fi.
The rest was good.
Terrace was amazing:)

Alicia is a great host. She is very outgoing and helpful. She told us a lot about Barcelona, places to visit, and restaurants. 
The apartment is nice. Very good location with a view to Sagrada Familia. An outstanding roof terrace. In summer, it must be a real delight to relax there and enjoy slices of jamon iberico de bellota with a glass of good wine. Beautiful ceiling decorations in the hallway. However there were some little problems: the place was a little bit dusty (however, it is the duty of the guests to clean it, so maybe not the host's fault); there was no hot water in the kitchen; the bathroom is very tiny and you have to wait around half an hour to get hot water (boiler); rather weak Wi-Fi. Yet, the apartment if fairly priced and a warm welcome can make up for all of this.
Perfect
El apartamento de Alicia tiene una situación inmejorable y unas vistas preciosas. Es perfecto para pasar unos días y ella es muy amable, estuvimos fenomenal. Esperamos volver pronto!!

Alicia is a great host, helpful and she suggested us some very nice places to visit in Barcelona.
The apartment is nice, it has everything you need and it's close to the metro station and to a lot of touristic attractions. The terrace has an amazing view to the Sagrada Familia (perfect for a drink getting some sunshine :) )
The only little inconveniences: weak wi-fi and you have to wait half an hour to have the hot water for the shower. The overall stay was very good, I recommend this place, it's a good deal for the price

We spent a wonderful holiday in Alicia's flat . Well equiped, Alicia did everything to make it comfortable and has everything you need. ( She also manged to blow away the clouds from the sky :) Also its location is very good one the best parts of Barcelona with its small familiar shops.
Thank you!

We had a great time in Barcelona. Alicias studio is a very good place to stay. Very small, but it's cozy, has everything you could need, also a very big sunny terrace and is located perfectly. It was very clean and Alicia is a friendly and helpful host. Only the wifi is a bit weak. Everything else was just like we wished. We definitely recommend Alica and her studio!
We booked the studio for 5 nights, and our airline went on strike, so that we had to leave 1 night earlier. During our trip Alicia left to London for 3 days an when she got our message about the strike, she didn't knew, that we already had to leave Barcelona, so that she offered us the studio for free for 2 more days to have time to concern about a new flight. We were very pleasant about this helpful offer and would like to thank Alicia on this way once more officially!
On our next trip to Barcelona we would chose this studio again!

Alicia was an outstanding host and her place is a great place to stay while visiting Barcelona.  The very clean and tidy studio has everything you might need -- very comfortable beds, well arranged storage, nicely equipped kitchen and tourist info. It's very quiet and also well-located for visiting sites via foot or metro. Alicia anticipated our needs and was very responsive. Best, volunteered to pick us up at the airport, and even when we missed our flight and came in 4 hours late, she still came and got us. That was a blessing because we were so tired after traveling for 24 hours.  As a native, she knows all about Barcelona and will happily provide whatever info you want.  Her English is very good. No communication difficulties. We will recommend her home to our friends.

Alicia is a very kind and warm person, the communication went very well.  The location of the studio is perfect to sleep: it's very quiet so for the first time in Barcelona I slept well!  The metrostation is closeby to bring you to the centre in 10 minutes.

We used the studio only to shower & sleep because it is very, very small (there is no real bathroom, just a toilet and shower) but the terrace is lovely! Very huge and sunny.
Thanks to Alicia for our wonderful stay in Barcelona! Great location of the flat coupled with the spacious teracce made out trip successful and memorable!

Alicia, as a host, went over and above to meet our needs! She was there on time to meet and greet us (even checked to see if we were lost), small supplies of anything that we may need was in the kitchen, let us use her internet when system went down, ordered cab for us - as there was no service in English...

Thank you Alicia,
Dragana and Ivan

Alicia is a lovely lady and my friend and I had a great time staying in the studio! The terrass has the best view of Sagrada Familia and the flat is located in a nice area and it is close to the tube station and shops. We are very likely to come back!
Thank you Alicia!

We enjoyed our stay in Barcelona a lot! Alicia is a great host and gave us lots of useful information and recommendations when we arrived and would have been available in the house, if we would have needed help. You reach the indeed cozy studio on the top floor with the elevator. A highlight is the terrace with a view of the Sagrada familia. You have access to the terrace via the staircase, but use it exclusively (at least we never met anyone). Ideal for a breakfast in the morning sun! The bed is just like described and shown on the photo and works for two people. The Wifi worked, but don't expect the fastest and most stable connection. For our purposes it worked fine. The kitchen has everything you need for a small cooking session, though we never used it for this. A plus was that Alicia provided tea, coffee, milk and biscuits already. The bathroom is very small and does not have a separate sink. You also need to put the boiler on an hour before the shower, if you want hot water, which was not a problem for us. 
In general, we enjoyed our stay. The apartment has a very good location and with the subway you easily get anywhere in the city.
Thanks Alicia!

I almost forgot to leave a rating on the Sagrada Familia Studio.
Alicia is a quick communicator, she was very nice and pleasant to deal with as was her family.  A safe and secure building with easy access to the whole city!  Wonderful views from the rooftop which the studio is located.  We had a blast in BCL!
thanks again!
Alicia was a very friendly and lovely host. The flat is comfortable and in a great location with the best view from the terrace. We had a great time in Barcelona, thank you Alicia!

The staying in the studio was very pleasant .We spent seven nights in Barcelone. Near the Metro Sagrada, which was very usefull.The beds were good, and we had all facilities for cooking.
Good address for a stay in this town , we'll recommand it to friends and family.

The studio apartment is just the right size and the terrace views are amazing of the city.  The area is safe and the metro is right around the corner.  Alicia was great to work with and was so helpful when my luggage was lost at the Barcelona airport.  I recommend this apartment for anyone who wants to stay in middle of it all for a great price.

This is an excellent apartment that located to five minutes afoot from subway. Apartment has all and more things that need for casual life. Very comfortable for sleeping bed is in it. Magnificent view is opened from its terrace. Recommend!!!

Minha estadia em Barcelona foi maravilhosa, a cidade é LINDA, de fácil locomoção, o povo é muito acolhedor. A Alicia foi muito gentil comigo, o trem que eu viajei de Paris para Barcelona atrasou duas horas, cheguei a Barcelona por volta de 23 horas, a Alicia me esperou e me recebeu muito bem!
O apartamento é ótimo, boas acomodações, excelente localização! Recomendo a todos

We spent wonderful holidays in Alicia's flat.
Thank you for your welcome.
The flat is very cosy, and has an enormous terrace with a beautiful point of view on the Sagrada Familia.
I recommend this place !

Alicia is a very helpful and nice person. And her apartament is in a really great spot in the city. If you want to get anywhere-everywhere is so close! And the tarrace couldn't be better! Thank you Alicia!

Great location, a few mn away from the Sagrada Familia and the subway station. Very convenient to visit the city from there. The view from the terrace is amazing and Alicia is very helpful. If we were to go back to Barcelona, we'd definitly go to hers again !

Alicia has the perfect cozy loft which i can describe as "home away from home". It has everything that one could need/ require. The loft is centrally located and within walking distance to many places - even the city as i strolled through in summer. The views from the terrace are breathtaking and is a feature entirely on its own. The perfect little place i would advise/ recommend to anyone. Should i return to Barcelona - i would definitely look no further. Thanks for everything!!!

Alicia,thank you and your cozy studio for great hospitality!Lovely location and wonderful wiev from the teracce!Near the house is very tasty bakery,where I went every morning and bought magic croissants!recommend))
Еverything you need you will find in studio.
I can write a lot of words,but it will be better if you will see all this by your self! :)

Отдыхали в конце августа 5 дней. Хозяйка квартиры, Алисия, очень доброжелательная и общительная: отвечала на все наши многочисленные вопросы, очень помогла при возникших трудностях с покупкой билетов на футбольный матч (ходила с нами в банк, связывалась со службой поддержки).
В квартире есть все самое необходимое - 2 одноместные кровати, шкаф для одежды, кондиционер, холодильник, чайник и кофемашина (чай, кофе и сахар тоже есть), посуда и магнитофон, электрическая плитка (мы ей не пользовались). Вид с террасы на Саграда Фамилия очень впечатляет. На террасе есть лежаки, стол и стулья. Место достаточно тихое, можно и с открытым окном спать.
До метро идти 2 минуты.
Рекомендуем эту квартиру для непродолжительных поездок в Барселону. Потому как все-таки квартирка совсем небольшая, а туалет с душем просто мизерные (но все очень чисто), wi-fi сигнал неустойчив.
В качестве бюджетного варианта эта квартира подходит идеально!

We really enjoyed our stay in Alicia's flat - especially breakfast with the Sagrada Familia jingles. The terrace is very amazing and we fall in love with this studio. Alicia was very helpful. Thank you for your tips and everything else!

We loved the apartment- it was clean, centrally located, and had a great view!  Alicia was extremely helpful and accommodating, giving us great tips and recommendations for our short stay in Barcelona.  We would stay here again!

Отдыхали 2 недели в конце сентября. Как уже было описано ниже в квартире есть все необходимое, отличное место расположения. Алисия предоставила нам всю информацию о достопримечательностях и указала на карте нужные нам места, такие как супермаркеты, кафе, аренду велосипедов и прочее. Благодарим Алисию за радушный прием. Желаем всем прекрасного отдыха в солнечной Барселоне!

We had a perfect stay at the apartment of Alicia. It is a small flat, but there is all you need. Because it was pretty hot, we appreciated the air conditioning in the room. The big roof terrace is wonderful, with an amazing view on the Sagrada familia and over the city. When we were there we always had the terrace all for ourselves and enjoyed to have breakfast or spend the evening there. The flat is located very central, but inside you almost didn't even hear the bells of the sagrada familia or any traffic noise. 

Alicia was really, really kind and even offered us to pick us up at the airport. She also told us what we have to see in Barcelona and where are good places to have dinner. 
We would definitly come back to Alicias apartment and already recommended it to our friends!

A great location: transportation, groceries, 20 min lazy walk to well known Gaudi's  buildings). Unforgettable vacation in Barcelona. Internals looks exactly like in the pictures - no more and no less. Clean, compact and comfortable. Available set of appliances. Amazing  terrace - great view, great place for a "petit-déjeuner" or a dinner to the sound of bells. Alicia - hospitable hostess, provide the necessary information about environment: restaurants, groceries, point of interests, etc. 

Alicia, Gracies per l'hospitalitat.

Appartement symphatique et particulièrement bien situé. Environnement agréable avec de nombreuses commodités tout près dont une excellente boulangerie-patisserie. Terrasse appréciée pour la vue exceptionnelle sur la Sagrada Familia.

I stayed in Alicia's studio for a month and it was exactly what I needed. The location is excellent and the rooftop terrace is fabulous! Alicia is an excellent, well organized host and she went out of her way to make sure I had everything I needed. The Wifi was fast and reliable. I would highly recommend the studio to anyone staying in Barcelona.

100% Recomendado!!! Ubicación, atención, vistas desde la terraza, espacio... Inmejorable!
Si buscas un espacio sencillo y acogedor...este es el lugar.

No he conocido a Alicia personalmente, aunque la relación con ella ha sido satisfactoria. Atenta y guía en todo momento! La recepción me la hizo su hermana: una persona puntual, cortés y muy correcta.
En cuanto al estudio, un espacio bien equipado y confortable, ideal para pasar tres días de tranquilidad. He podido relajarme y disfrutar de las vistas desde la terraza y del cielo de Barcelona. 
Espero volver. Totalmente recomendable!

My friend and I had an amazing time in Barcelona. We stayed at Alicia's for 3 days, and enjoyed the location of the flat. Ideally situated nearby the Sagrada Familia train station, it is also closed to everything (bars, restaurants, supermarket, etc.).

The flat has an amazing terrasse with great views on the Sagrada Familia and the the Torre Agbar (we loved it at breakfast time!). It is quite small, with basically everything you may need for a short stay. We found the fridge a little bit noisy, especially at night, but on the overall it remains really quiet.
Alicia et Rafa ont été très agréables, en nous fournissant des conseils sur les visites et en répondant très rapidement à nos demandes. L'appartement est très agréable et la terrasse, géniale!

End of April I stayed several days in the studio with my son (13 y). Location is great with privale view on Sagrada. Great to have breakfast and late afternoon rest on terrace! Beds slept perfectly; bathroom is very small but okay. Alicia and sister were very friendly and informed us about special events during our stay. Camp Nou experience was great (metro Collblanc) as well as the burgers in the Argentina restaurant across the street.

Emplacement exceptionnel près  de la Sagrada Familia 
Si le soleil est au rendez-vous vous bénéficiez d'une immense terrasse
Le studio est petit , bien , mais une salle de bain minuscule dont l'état laisse à désirer 
Parking à proximité cher 15 € / jour

Best Host)))
everything was awesome.
Lovely view. 
Alicia helped us with any our problems. 
Thanx a lot)

Mi experiencia como huésped del Cozy Sunny Studio ha sido inmejorable. El estudio es tal cual se presenta en el portal de airbnb, no exagera virtudes ni disimula defectos. Viajé a Barcelona solo, me alojé algo más de un mes y por cuestiones laborales muchos días tuve que pasar horas en casa trabajando, siempre me sentí cómodo, sobre todo por la agradable luminosidad y por la amplia y hermosa terraza que balconea sobre la mismísima Sagrada Familia de Gaudí.
Es un estudio austero pero confortable que respondió perfectamente a mis expectativas y objetivos. Su ubicación es muy buena, muy bien comunicado con autobuses y metro aunque casi todas mis idas y venidas al Eixample, a los barrios del casco histórico o a Gràcia los hice caminando porque es la mejor manera de disfrutar de Barcelona y porque son trayectos que no superan los veinticinco o treinta minutos de paseo.
En las inmediaciones del Cozy Sunny Studio hay multitud de bares, restaurantes de todo tipo y comercios de alimentación, lo que hace muy cómoda la vida cotidiana.
Como anfitriones Alicia Busquets y su familia son espectaculares. Siempre dispuestos a solucionar cualquier problema que pueda surgir, a asesorar al huésped en aquello que pudiera necesitar, a brindar atención y hospitalidad. Su hermana Mayte y su sobrino ( el Gran Charly, experto informático ) me sacaron de más de un apuro producido por mi natural torpeza durante mis primeros días en el Cozy Sunny Studio.
Para redondear mi percepción de la calidad como anfitriones de Alicia y su familia bastará decir que mi almuerzo de despedida de Barcelona - horas antes de abordar el vuelo de regreso -  lo disfruté en su casa en compañía de unas amigas suyas y de su simpático padre. Nos zampamos unas exquisitas empanadas santiagueñas hechas magistralmente por Liliana, una argentina de ley curiosa de las actividades artísticas y de las manifestaciones culturales de Catalunya.
¿ Se puede pedir más ?
Amazing location and neighbourhood. Everything you need is within walking distance. Small but lovely studio. Alicia was very helpful. Enjoyed our stay. Would definitely recommend.

A localização do studio é muito boa, perto de duas linhas de metrô, próximo a restaurantes, mercado e da Sagrada Família (linda por sinal). A anfitriã Alicia foi super simpática e prestativa, passou todas as informações sobre o studio e a cidade, dando muitas dicas. O apartamento é bem pequeno, mas bem confortável e tem um vista linda para a Sagra família no terraço.O banheiro é bem pequeno.A internet funcionou muito bem.

My wife and I stayed at Alicia's flat in Barcelona and we had a wonderful experience. The flat is perfectly positioned (just behind Sagrada Familia) and Alicia is a great host. She was very helpful and polite all the time, even though we arrived a little bit late due to our plane delay.

The flat is small but it is perfect for two person and it has essential amenities you need. The roof terrace is huge and very convenient.

My friend and I were really shocked by this place. We expected to see a cozy studio - but it turned out to be so tiny and cluttered  that it was almost impossible to be there. The picture does not reflect the real size of the flat   - actually the flat is much much smaller.
There was  a smell of cleaning substances in the flat - the cleaning had just been done and the smell was there until the very morning.
The so called bathroom was extremely small - we could not take a shower, besides, the water was not warm enough.The  bed sheets had pills on them, etc.
So we decided to leave the flat  in the morning and we were not going to stay for the second day (as we planned) - we had to go to the nearest hotel, with  our suitcases again.
When I texted Alicia about that she did not answer. Neither did she later in the evening.  Or the next day. Alicia did not answer us or call us back. It seemed she just did not care.
So we stayed in a hotel near Sagrada Familia with a beautiful terrace - which was very much different from the so called terrace of the studio (it was very dirty and not so nice as in the photo).

I find this situation very unpleasant. Maybe this flat is ok for some people  (and the location is good) - but pictures should reflect the real situation. In reality it is tiny and everything looks like  second-hand stuff.

We stayed in the apartment a bit longer than a week and it was amazing. Alicia was a lovely host. The flat was simply brilliant. Although small, it is nicely furnished and absolutely cosy. The highlight of the flat is perhaps the AC. After a long hot day at the beach we could hardly wait to get back to the nicely cool apartment. 

The apartment is very well situated. It is near the metro station, so you can reach all the sights by public transport. The beach is also only a short metro-ride away. Sagrada Familia is just round the corner. And now comes the most brilliant part: you can see this spectacular church every single day from the terrace. Despite the "touristy" location, the house is very safe and Alicia makes sure that it also stays safe. 

There are plenty of nice restaurants just rund the block. You will find Spanish and Italian cuisine, several fast food restaurants and snack bars. There are also nice places where you can get a cold mojito or sangria. If you'd rather cook your own meals, there are plenty of small shops where you can buy your daily essentials, fresh fruits, veggies, or spanish specialities. The kitchen is equipped with everything you could possibly need (even a hand blender for making fresh smoothies if you wish). 

To sum it up in a nutshell, if you're looking for a great stay in Barcelona and an awesome location, you definitelly should book this flat! I don't think there are many other places with such a great location.

Alicia's studio is perfectly located one block away from Sagrada Familia and the metro station! It's a great fit for one person but the fold out bed accommodates two. It was a pleasant surprise to see how much privacy one gets as the studio is on the top/last floor (with lift) and you have the whole roof terrace to yourself...with stunning views of Sagrada Familia and Barcelona rooftops. Wifi worked great and so did the air conditioning unit. There was a ready to use beach bag, umbrella, blow dryer and plenty of closet space/drawers to put your stuff in. 

My only concern was that the studio was a bit dusty (cleaning depends on previous guest) and the shower was a  tad too small. Nonetheless, I truly enjoyed my stay.

I never met Alicia, however her friend Rafa was waiting for me and thoroughly explained everything. Alicia was prompt in responding to emails and phone calls.

Thanks again, Alicia!

The studio is indeed very sunny and cosy, though a bit small for two people. However, it has everything you need. Very nice thing is a board with a recommendations from previous guests: you may some useful info about places to go. In my opinion, the main advantage of this appartment is access to the roof! We enjoyed sitting there in the evenings, looking at Sagrada Familia and Barcelona roofs.

Très bon accueil ,le logement est propre .
L'immeuble est calme et le quartier bien desservi au niveau des transports.
Il n'y a pas de salle  de bains et la douche est vraiment très petite.
La terrasse  n'est pas du tout aménagée , elle n'est pas  contiguë au studio et donc peu utilisable dommage!...
Alicia, se comporto muy bien con nosotros, muy buen anfitrion, la ubicación es muy recomendable muy accesible a todo y la vista a la sagrada familia desde la terraza es impresionante.

Wir haben ein Monat in Barcelona verbracht und haben uns in der Wohnung sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Gastgeberin war sehr sehr nett und freundlich und hat uns jederzeit Ihre Hilfe angeboten. 

Das Highlight war sicherlich die nur für uns zugängliche Dachterrasse von der man fast die ganze Stadt sehen kann. 

Der einzige Nachteil war das sehr kleine Bad und das Fehlen des Waschbeckens.

It’s really sunny and cozy studio. It’s on the top of very quiet building but with a terrace view on Sagrada Familia. Alicia was very thoughtful and good host. She provided us maps, city guides as well as helpful tips to move around the city. The near metro station connects you quickly to any part of the city. She also provided us a food for first couple of days which was very helpful. The only thing that bothered us was a small bathroom. However, we had really everything at our fingertips. Thanks to Alicia, there was really everything necessary for a comfortable stay.

Nos hospedamos dos personas durante un mes. 
La ubicación perfecta. Junto a Sagrada Familia, metros, parques, supermercados...
El estudio es muy acogedor y soleado, con todo lo necesario. Tal como indica en el anuncio, la terraza es muy amplia con vistas a toda Barcelona.
Alicia como anfitriona, fue muy atenta, amable y cuando necesitamos algo, siempre estuvo disponible!
Excelente trato
Recomendable a todo aquel que quiera pasar por esta hermosa ciudad.
El piso tiene excelente ubicación. La anfitriona te hace sentir seguro, en casa y siempre atenta a tus necesidades.

Alicia replied to emails in a timely manner. I arrived at 23:00 and Alicia met me at the apartment. The apartment looks better in the photos than in real life. Internet worked well, and metro is nearby. The area is a bit overcrowded with tourists, and restaurants are uninspiring, but one can walk to Gracia in 15-20 mins, where the offering is better. The apartment is ok for short stays.

Alicia quickly dealt with and solved an issue that was of fundamental importance to me - namely a FAST and reliable Internet connection for my online work (which comes with me when I travel). That allowed me then to enjoy this extraordinarily-positioned place, a rooftop apartment with an unobstructed view of Sagrada Famlia. I had a wonderful month here, and plan on returning asap.

Excelente lugar, ubicación y anfitriona. 

"En la Sagrada Familia todo es providencial: su emplazamiento se halla en el centro de la ciudad y del llano de Barcelona; hay la misma distancia del templo al mar y a la montaña, a Sants y a Sant Andreu, y a los ríos Besòs y Llobregat" Antoni Gaudí

Hemos pasado tiempos alegres en este studio atico frente a la Sagrada Familia..
Un buen tiempo ayudo a gozar este alojamiento.
El studio esta muy bien ubicado.
Todo esta muy cerca.
Con la hermana de Alicia que nos recibo y fue tambien presente para nuestra despedida, ella fue muy amable.
Saludos Cordiales 
Emmanuel y Laura
A perfect place for anyone who wants a house for their stay in Barceona. I've lived there for 5 months, would go back anytime
Alicia was an amazing Host, great communication and a great accommodation. what a great place to experience amazing Barcelona.

Alicia’s place is in a perfect location, city center. Close to L2 and L5, and the view from the rooftop cannot be beaten anywhere else in the city. Highly recommend staying at Alicia’s place. You won’t be disappointed

Experiencia agridulce. Tiempo: 77 noches. Asunto: por trabajo. Cuando llegué era de noche, y aparentemente no había mucha suciedad, aunque algunas manchas en las paredes y muebles se veían. A la mañana siguiente, cuando a la luz del día pude ver todo mejor, me encontré con mucha suciedad. Al recibirme Alicia, me dijo que si veía algo, que se lo comentase, puesto que el inquilino anterior había dejado todo "asqueroso" y que su sobrino había limpiado, pero que no era el habitual en hacerlo. Pues bien, los muebles de la cocina tenían una cantidad de moho, polvo, arenilla... la cubertería sucia, tazas con manchas marrones.... En las paredes había muchísimo polvo y marcas. La ventana de la cocina llena de grasa, el estor... El baño no estaba muy sucio, pero el fondo del váter tenía una costra difícil de quitar incluso al rascado, aunque con el tiempo la conseguí eliminar. Empecé a limpiar, me di una paliza en la cocina, pero aún así era interminable. Se lo comuniqué, me pidió disculpas, y a los 2 días vino la hermana (muy simpática y atenta) a limpiar durante la mañana el estudio. Subió con aspiradora, y sí limpió. y quitó la mayoría de marcas en las paredes. Pero para mi un par de horas no fueron suficiente. Porque cuando compré unas sábanas más abrigadas, al cambiar la cama, me encontré que debajo del colchón y entre el somier había monodosis de gotas oculares, bastoncillos de los oídos... polvo, mucho, debajo de la cama. La silla del escritorio tenía la tela con muchas marchas amarillas de sudor, y la acabé fregando. Fue una sorpresa muy desagradable. Ya decidí ni comentar esta segunda parte, me dediqué a limpiarlo yo mismo. Es cierto que en todo momento fueron muy atentas, cualquier cosa que les dijese lo atendían, me subieron un calefactor de aire nuevo, etc.. Lo cierto es que el estudio es muy básico, pero con lo necesario, para un par de meses se adapta uno. Le falta la lavadora, que no si si habría o no espacio físico para ponerla. No obstante, en la calle a poco metros y en sentido opuesto hay 2 lavanderías. Allí mismo se puede secar la ropa, pero en la azotea justo en frente del estudio hay un tendedero, y además coloqué cuerdas. Con el viento que corre ahí arriba se seca de momento todo. La cocina es muy básica, con 2 hornillas portátiles eléctricas, así que no se puede cocinar muy a gusto. La localización es inmejorable. Vistas desde la azotea a la Sagrada Familia y torre Agbar. Al torcer la esquina la boca de metro. Mucho comercio alrededor (en frente varias farmacias, supermercados.. en la misma calle Condis, cerca de Día, Mercadonas..) Pero a mi parecer necesitaría unas reformillas: el baño, la zona de la ducha, se está agrietando, y se ve ya la raja junto a la nevera, pintar o forrar los muebles de la cocina... cableados, etc etc. Se ve más nuevo en las fotos...

Excelente mi estadía en lo de Alicia, el departamento es tal cual la foto excelente para una persona , cuenta con todo lo necesario esta súper equipado. Alicia está siempre cuando la necesitas y supo resolver lo inconvenientes que sucedieron . Volvería a alquilar la zona inmejorable . Saludos

The location is great and the view from the really big terrace is great. The room is equipped with everything. The area has nice shops and is very central. It is less than 5 minutes to the metro where you can get trains to the beach and other parts of the city. There are nice gyms around and the view on the Sagrada Familia is brilliant. There are cafes and restaurants around. Alicia is very friendly and approachable.

Es un ático súper acogedor, con una ubicación excelente. Realmente es lo que se muestra en las fotos. Alicia y su hermana Cristina son increíblemente amables! Súper recomendable para jóvenes que estén de paso unos días por Barcelona.

muy recomendable! excelente ubicación a apenas 1 cuadra del metro y de la sagrada familia. tiene todo lo necesario para pasar una larga estadía la ciudad. la anfitriona siempre me respondió rápido cuando necesite consultarle algo. muy buena experiencia.

Alícia fue un host increíble. Siempre dispuesta a solucionar cualquier problema o duda y a mejorar la experiencia con sugerencias de interés cultural. Es más que generosa en la atención y los demás vecinos del edificios también son muy agradables en el trato. 
La ubicación del lugar es perfecta. Es de fácil acceso de cualquier parte de la ciudad inclusive el aeropuerto. La vista desde la terraza da directo a la sagrada familia , por la cercanía se escuchan a diario sus campanas :)
-
Alicia was an incredible host. Always ready to solve any problem or doubt and to improve the experience with suggestions of cultural interest. She is more than generous in attention and the other neighbors of the buildings are also very nice.
The location of the place is perfect. It is easily accessible from any part of the city including the airport. The view from the terrace gives direct to the sacred family, because of the proximity you hear their bells every day :)

name: A room of one's own
summary: Hi,  My appartment is an historical house. İt is a 100 years old building with high ceiling, and near of Galatasaray Square. I'm a philosopy teacher in a high school, I like smoking at home and once in a blue moon I listen to music loudly.
description: Hi,  My appartment is an historical house. İt is a 100 years old building with high ceiling, and near of Galatasaray Square. I'm a philosopy teacher in a high school, I like smoking at home and once in a blue moon I listen to music loudly.

host.host_about: Hi, I'm a philosophy teacher in a high school, I like smoking at home and once in a blue moon I listen to music loudly.

reviews.comments: I love the place it was amazing week thank you

name: KAPAA, KAUAI 2 BEDROOM SUITE, NICE!
summary: Kauai is so lush and green it’s known as The Garden Isle! And what a garden! Waterfalls plunge into pools lined with exotic flowers, rare birds call out their unique songs. This is a PERFECT location in the middle of Kauai! Beautiful Suite,sleeps 6
description: Kauai is so lush and green it’s known as The Garden Isle! And what a garden! Waterfalls plunge into pools lined with exotic flowers, rare birds call out their unique songs. This is a PERFECT location in the middle of Kauai! Beautiful Suite,sleeps 6

host.host_about: My husband and I have been privileged with the opportunity to make our DREAMS our MEMORIES and we're here to help assist you with yours'..........Traveling is TRULY what life is about!

reviews.comments: Holly was great to work with. Extremely responsive and had answers to all my questions.
If your looking for a great place and host, call Holly. Holly the best!

Location, staff, and amenities were great! Spacious unit, washer & dryer in unit, beautiful ocean view! DVD players, closet door, & one bathroom door was not functioning. Bathroom light stopped working on the last day of our weeklong stay. Ants were a constant problem despite trash removal twice a day and keeping food contained in refrigerator.  Staff was very friendly & responsive to request to fix DVD player.

name: Apartamento de Cobertura no Rio de
summary: Nosso espaço e confortável, amplo e agradável. Nosso bairro dispõe de mercado, lojas, shopping, proximidade do mar, da floresta.  Próximo ao polo gastronômico, e ao Maracanã estadio de futebol conhecido mundialmente.
space: Apartment type coverage, super safe with 3 bedrooms, large balcony with pisicina the sun all day, airy, clean and large, 23 min from the beach of Barra da Tijuca and Copacabana 34 min, 20 minutes from the city center. Location meters next to several bus lines, plentiful supply of taxis, a variety of trade, close to shopping furnished, very close to the gastronomic center, 4 km distant Tijuca forest, 3 km from Maracana Stadium (in works cup to 2014). The Rio de Janeiro is the main tourist destination in Latin America, with its tropical climate, landscapes and cultural icon known worldwide. The exuberant nature Rioincludes 90 km of beaches, the Tijuca National Park, home to one of the largest urban forests in the world with 3200 hectares of Atlantic Forest and the beautiful LagoaRodrigo de Freitas, among other wonders, like the Christ Redeemer and enjoy the look of the Sugar Loaf. Who knows never forget!
