neighborhood_overview: Farto comércio, polo gastronômico, proximidade do mar, metrô na porta
transit: Estamos bem servidos de transporte, ônibus, metrô, taxi. Fácil acesso.
access: Os hospedes poderão acessar o quarto onde irá ficar, as áreas comuns como, sala, varanda, cozinha, banheiro, área externa.
interaction: É possível que estarei disponível para ajudar o hóspede durante a sua permanência em nossa casa.
house_rules: Informar tempo de partida e de chegada, siga as regras do condomínio para boa socialização entre outros moradores

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Pessoa, extrovertida, vejo a vida com olhos de alegria, gosto de trabalhar, estudar e viajar.  vou atras de meus sonhos, procuro viver intensamente cada  minuto. acredito no trabalho, gosto de compartilhar coisas e experiências, muito bem casado a mais de 2 décadas,  sou professor universitário, e pesquisador, gosto do campo da educação, e do empreendedorismo. Já tive a oportunidade de viajar  e ser recebido por anfitriões em diversos países e agora estou receptivo a pessoas interessadas em descobrir as belezas que o Rio de Janeiro tem a oferecer.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Me sentí muy cómodo con muy buena atención de toda la familia, siempre predispuesta a conversar y ayudar en lo que sea necesario. No pude compartir más tiempo por la gran cantidad de horas que permanecí afuera. Un sitio a pocos metros del subte, con muchas opciones de servicios en los alrededores. Buena estadía, buena atención, muy buena experiencia.

name: luxurious studio center stage
summary: Fantastic studio right next to metro Mont-Royal, ten minutes by foot from all the attractions of the city: Parc Mont-Royal, Oratoire, city center, Vieux Port, with all the amenities such as internet, TV, fridge, washer-dryer, kitchenware.
space: Renting in the most interesting neighborhood of Montréal, and above all next to a metro.
description: Fantastic studio right next to metro Mont-Royal, ten minutes by foot from all the attractions of the city: Parc Mont-Royal, Oratoire, city center, Vieux Port, with all the amenities such as internet, TV, fridge, washer-dryer, kitchenware. Renting in the most interesting neighborhood of Montréal, and above all next to a metro. Virtually everything is included. As I am working in the travel sector, I can help my guests with any type of advice or service. A young and lively neighborhood with plenty of interesting cafés, boutiques, and restaurants. Access by metro Mont-Royal
neighborhood_overview: A young and lively neighborhood with plenty of interesting cafés, boutiques, and restaurants.
transit: Access by metro Mont-Royal
access: Virtually everything is included.
interaction: As I am working in the travel sector, I can help my guests with any type of advice or service.

host.host_about: mon nom est zaki j ai 38 ans je suis agent de voyage je suis d origine algerienne et je vit a montreal j adore le football  la plage les voyages et les gens en general

reviews.comments:
Appartement très sympa et propre. L'appartement est très bien situé et Zaki nous a très bien accueilli et nous a donné des conseils pour visiter Montréal.
Ce fut un super séjour ! Je recommande fortement cet appartement !

Zaki est un très bon hôte, accueillant et disponible.8 L'appartement est très sympa et idéalement situé pour visiter cette belle ville. A recommander!


Zaki is a very nice host, available and welcoming. The flat has an perfect position to enjoy this beautiful city. To recommend!

Appartement super, extrêmement calme à la joie de mes parents qui ont aimé leur séjour. 
Ressemblance parfaite avec les photos. 
Situé à deux pas du métro et de l'avenue Montroyal, parfait pour les tous les achats ! 
Très propre. A recommander !

My host, Zaki, was welcoming and responsive.  I had a very late arrival (close to midnight) and he was there to great me and see me into the place.  The place was just as it was described and was away from the street noise and quiet which was great when I needed to sleep.  The place is situated in a great spot with easy access to the metro and Bixi bike rental which I used.  Cafe's and places to eat are a block away.  Overall it was a great experience, with a great host, in a great place!

Lovely apartment, sparkling clean, well equipped and a super comfy bed! Well located on a pretty street very close to the Metro, it doesn't overlook the street so very quiet (not that it's a noisy street!) Great to have a laundry room right next to the flat - $1 each for wash and dry. Fast wifi. We loved it there.  Highly recommended!

Appart très bien situé sur le plateau et super tranquille. Stationnement très facile à trouver à proximité. Communications excellentes avec le proprio. Idéale pour un weekend en couple mais l'espace est restreint j'hésiterais à y passer un plus long séjour a moins d'être seule. Je recommande si vous prévoyez profiter du quartier.
Quartier très sympa proche de toutes commodités.

The host arranged to have his brother waiting for us on the doorstep with the keys. It was very convenient. The neighbourhood is central to the plateau in Montreal and yet it was quite quiet ... just as advertised.

Very accommodating! We arrived late and Zaki was very nice and patient. Apartment true to photos and in a great location! Host very helpful. We stayed one night, there was free parking out front. Worked out great!

Really great location!
Close to the metro and bixi bike is on the corner of the street!
Mont royal was a really nice neighborhood and with being polite to everyone about not speaking French the hospitality industry were happy to speak English with a polite attitude
Zaki was able to meet us before our stay and let us know any small details about the place, clean and tidy apartment perfect for 2 for a week getaway!
Would come back to stay here in a heart beat! :)
Was easy and great!

Zaki very kindly met up with us to deliver the keys and gave us a few tips on where to go to enjoy the neighborhood. We loved the street and the neighborhood where Zaki's place was! The apartment was comfortable and had basic amenities such as towels and wifi. Highly recommended place for a weekend getaway to the true Montreal!

The place was everything we needed. It's a nice quiet neighborhood with street parking. Zaki helped us understand the parking signs. The kitchen was equipped with what we needed to enjoy our market goodies. The porch pictured faces the back yard, which allowed us to sleep with the doors open and screen closed. I suggest bringing dvds or a tablet for movies because there is no cable. There are many bars and restaurants you can easily walk to. Great stay!

Zaki a été formidable.
L'appartement était propre, central, tel qu'annoncé.
Hautement recommendé.
Zaki is flexible with our check in and check out time,easy to communicate. The house is clean and tidy, and has every thing you need. Great host.

Zaki was a perfect and fantastic host! The apartment was everything you would need for a stay in the best neighborhood in Montréal. Clean, tidy with all the necessities. A short walk from shops, bars and restaurants. Would stay again!
Zaki was a great host. The studio was clean and in a convenient area. I would definitely recommend.

Zaki's place was great! Very clean, comfortable and quiet, and exactly what we needed. Zaki was very easy to deal with and always quick to respond to any questions we had. He was very accommodating with check in / check out times and the neighbourhood is amazing! So close to the metro and lots of great coffee shops, bars and restaurants right around the corner. Would stay here again for sure! Highly recommend!

I loved the location, near subway and restaurants and bars. The stairs to door were very steep and not suitable for elders or drunks. The unit was not bright or cheery. The TV should have cable TV or at least hd cables for your computer. Also toilet paper would be a bonus!

Zakis apartment was clean and functional, although a bit sparsely decorated. I was a great place for us to crash during a weekend in Montreal, we could walk to all the best bars, restaurants and boutiques in and around Le Plateau and Mile End within 35 minutes. Actually, we hardly left the area except for a shorter visit to the old city. The check-in process could have been smoother as we had not received adequate information on what floor or apartment that was for us, however, Zaki was quick to reply when we texted for more info and was very flexible in regards to our stay.

Très sympathique logement, fidèle à la description. Zaki était particulièrement arrangeant et très sympathique. 
Seul petit bémol sur la literie qui n'avait pas l'air d'avoir été changée alors que des frais sont prévus justement pour cela. 
L'accès se fait via un escalier colossal alors prévoyez un ami aux gros bras si vous avez quelques valises à monter.

L'appartement est très bien situé dans le quartier du plateau. Le métro est tout prêt et le quartier plein de restaurants et bars.
L'accès à l'appartement est simple. Tout le nécessaire est présent, tous était propre et confortable.

Nous n'avons pas eu la chance de rencontrer Zaki mais il est resté disponible et réactif à nos messages. 

Je recommande sans hésiter !

The apartment is exactly as seen in the pictures. The location of the place is superb, 5 min walk from Mont Royal station and in the midst of a great cafe/restaurant scene. There are multiple gems on the side streets of Mont Royal Rue too! Overall, we had a great time in Montreal and this place was exactly as we expected! 

For future stayers- 
It's a no frills, basic place with most amenities. The cable TV does not work and there were no toiletries - so bring your own shampoo and soap! Per previous reviews, the steps leading up the apartment are extremely steep, so it's difficult if you have a large suitcase.

Very close to metro. Some really greater local diners in the area. Zaki was very easy to reach. We had some internet problem when we first arrived due to snowstorm but he fixed it as soon as he could. The TV didn't turn on but we didn't really need it. Great stay overall.

When we arrived at Zaki's place the temperature was about -10 degrees Fahrenheit. The apartment heated up quickly and was very cozy. It is clean, simple, and well-equipped. Some amenities we appreciated were two bed-side lamps, hooks in the bathroom, and an extra comforter for the bed. The apartment is in an excellent location--near Avenue Mont Royal, Rue Rachel, and Rue du Duluth. There are so many appealing restaurants nearby. It is also very close to the beautiful Parc La Fontaine. We had planned to be out and about far more than we were, but due to the frigid temps, we were inside quite a bit and it was so comfortable and pleasant. We hope to be back!

This is a great location in Montreal.  Close to great restaurants and not far from downtown.  Zaki was great and made it very easy to check in and out.  The apartment was very clean and much more cost than a hotel.  Couple things to note, parking is a problem as street parking is for permit holders so you risk getting a ticket.  Also the tv didn't work for us.  It turned on but we couldn't switch the media source to use the DVD player.  Wasn't a big deal as we were only there for the night but something to note for longer stays.  All around a great place to stay.  Thank you Zaki!!

The neighborhood is amazing. We walked everywhere - lots of cafes, shops etc. The street is also nice and very typical of Le Plateau. It's a stretch to call the apartment "Grand Luxe" as it's very basic and functional. It would have been helpful to have better instructions for the lockbox as we had lots of difficulty getting entering the apartment. The TV didn't work for us and there were no instructions for the WiFi but it was clean and quiet.

Zaki's studio apartment was clean and cozy when we arrived.  It's small but has everything you need.  It's in a multi-unit building, but it was very quiet.  And the location is terrific!—very close to the Mont-Royal metro station and rue St-Denis so you have quick access to the whole city.  And there are plenty of great places to eat right in the neighborhood as well.   

Parking is on the street which can be a challenge, as per usual for Montreal.  Just read the signs closely and be prepared to park a couple of blocks away.  

Zaki was very gracious to me about my stilted French and we managed to communicate well, so don't worry if you're not a French speaker.  My husband and I highly recommend booking with Zaki.  Merci mille fois, Zaki!
The apartment was ideal for a weekend in Montreal. It is well-appointed and clean, although not "luxe," as described. The neighbourhood is lovely and lively, but the apartment is quiet.
Zaki was a wonderful host! Incredibly fast to respond and very helpful. The apartment was perfect, clean and in the best spot in montreal! Highly recommended!

Studio was as described. A perfect place for exploring Montreal and feeling relaxed and comfortable after a long day touring. We found the Studio to be in a very quiet area. Neighbourhood pleasant and refreshing. Zaki had left great instructions on making arrangements for the keys. No problems at all and no surprises. Everything required was available in the Studio.
Great, comfortable little spot. Great location. Clean. Zaki was available through messaging easily. Would stay again in a heartbeat.

Agréable studio, calme et bien placé sur le plateau entre métro Mont-Royal, et "La Banquise" haut lieu de la Poutine. Attention, l'accès a la cour intérieur n'est pas autorisé. Zaki, est vite joignable, toujours avec une solution. Une remarque cependant, le minimum permettant de faire un café ou un thé en arrivant n'était pas assuré. il a fallut vite recourir au dépanneur, c'est le seul bémol à apporter à notre trop court séjour chez Zaki. l'appartement de Zaki est a recommander.

We didn't see or meet Zaki which was fine as we were busy. The place was pretty clean although the corners had dust and the cracks of the chairs had crumbs. One block form the Metro station with bixi bikes even closer. Galley kitchen with pots, pans, glasses, cutlery etc but no supplies (salt, pepper, sugar, oil etc.) Good for reheating leftovers or pre made meals. It was quiet as it's in the back of the building although there is only one window, the sliding door in the bedroom, and when the heat exchanger for the building is running it is fairly loud as it's directly below the door. When we were there the screen door was  unusable, just leaning against the side of the building and the garbage can was full, stinky and 3 feet from the sliding bedroom door. Fortunately it wasn't really hot while we were there so we only had to close the door once because of the stink. I noticed a bike rack in the backyard, good spot if you brought your own bikes although at $100/night you're probably going to spend another $5/day for a bixi pass if you want to bike.

Great location clean and great price. Really tough to beat. I did not have the chance to meet Zaki but he was responsive and a great host. 

Highly recommended if you are traveling alone or as a couple.

Très bon séjour à Montréal et l'appartement de Zaki y est pour beaucoup. Fidèle à la description il est propre et dispose du nécessaire à la première journée. Dans un immeuble calme et silencieux. Le seul bruit du matin est le chant des oiseaux de la cour arrière. Plutôt agréable. Zaki à été très clair pour la remise des clefs et très réactif lorsque j'avais des questions. Je reviendrai à Montréal, je reviendrai chez Zaki.

The room was clean and in quite a nice area but dont be decieved by the shot from the street its very small and was very hot only a fan which barely helped and a TV with no service just a dvd and no selection. I guess you get what you pay for. Also very steep stairs to access. Good value for young people with little luggage.

Earlier this month, we stayed in the studio apartment in the Plateau  neighborhood of Montreal (hosted by Zaki).  We loved the charm of the building & neighborhood (and the cleanliness of the apt).  The studio apt. was the right size for two of us who were more interested in exploring Montreal than staying around in an apt.  The apt. is a short walk to the Metro station (at Mont Royal) and a short walk from MANY dining and entertainment options.  Zaki even recommended a couple of places for dinner (we choose the "best poutinne in Montreal" spot).  We knew that the apt. didn't have air conditioning (as stated) but we were disappointed that the only screened opening in this interior apt. was broken.  If you are thinking of visiting in the heat of summer, this is less than ideal.  The other issue that people traveling by car have to be aware is the lack of parking in this entire area.  There is free parking in limited spots but it is only for certain times of day, so we either had to hang around the neighborhood jumping from spot to spot or risk getting a ticket (they don't tow)...we got ticketed (but were lucky because we only received one ticket in a two day period of time).  But, even though there were some issues to deal with, we loved the feeling of being a part of this active Montreal neighborhood.  P.S. The eclairs at the bakery in the Sherbrooke were the best!!

Comfortable and clean place to stay. Many amazing places to eat within 5 minutes walk from the location. The main "downtown" to see in Montreal was about 40 min walk away.

Parking: there is a spot for about 4 cars right in front of the building where you can park most days and overnight (minus the few hours on the day listed on the street parking sign) 

Host was wonderful with responses. Only thing missing was that we ran out of toilet paper during the 2 night stay because there weren't any extra in the apartment. Host was apologetic that he hadn't gotten a chance to restock before our arrival.
Logement très bien situé dans un quartier très vivant, tout près du métro et des commerces, tout en étant agréable à vivre. Le propriétaire a été très accommodant pour les horaires, merci!

Zaki's house is in the great location, very close to the Metro station and local shops and restaurants. However it is very small and some amenities were lacking. Zaki is very responsive and tried to sort out some of the issues the best he could.
Great stay. Close to EVERYTHING. Location perfect.

The apartment was absolutely perfect for a weekend in the city. Everything was clean, and the check-in process was quite smooth. The location couldn't have been better. There are tons of cafes, bars and restaurants within walking distance - we hardly had do use public transportation at all! (Although the metro is conveniently nearby the apartment as well.)

10/10, would recommend. Thanks, Zaki!

super quartier prêt du métro mont royal.
Zaki nous a mis les clés à disposition.
Magnifique bâtiment, appart très agréable et balcon privatif ainsi que laveuse et sécheuse accessible.
Super rapport qualité/prix
organisation rapide simple et efficace. l'appartement et très calme et bien situé.
Great place with an even better location. Walking distance to all of the main streets. Tons of shops and restaurants nearby. Would definitely stay again.

The location of this space is AMAZING...the space is perfect, it's got all you need...but it was a bit pricey and some things need to be taken care of in term of cleanliness...I've informed Zaki...I'm certain he will work on it. 
Also Zaki was very accommodating and responsive.
Bonne communication, bonne localisation, photos authentiques, rien à dire!

L'appartement est tout à fait conforme à la description. Il est très, très bien situé dans un quartier que nous avons beaucoup apprécié.
Nous y avons séjourné 6 nuits pendant les fêtes de Noël et nous avons été sous le charme. Si nous devions revenir à Montréal en Hiver, nous le relouerions, et cela nous donne envie d'y revenir en été.
Merci, ce fut une excellente expérience!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Endroit idéal pour séjourner à Montréal. Appartement propre, bien situé, tranquille. À recommander sans hésitation!
Incredible apartment. We couldn't have found a more perfect place to stay one Montréal. We were close to great restaurants, the neighborhood was great, and the apartment was very clean!
Appartement très bien situé et très bon rapport qualité prix.

This apartment is amazing for up to 2 people for an indefinite amount of time. The location is amazing, 1 block in any direction to food and sights. Bed is comfortable, with plenty of space in the bedroom. Full bathroom and kitchen, with breakfast table was more than you need for a trip where the main purpose is to binge eat! Quiet apartment, never heard or saw any neighbors, and the street is mostly families so no problems with rowdy folks. Multiple "out of town" parking spaces located right in front, just read the signs on the street! Easy check in/check out/ Great communication! We would/are absolutly going to stay here again!

Zaki was great to stay with. We never actually met but he assisted on very short notice when our other airbnb screwed us around... His communication was great and everything about the place was as advertised. Easy and convenient for us and we were able secure a parking spot right in front of the apartment
Lieu agréable, tranquille et central.
Appartement idéal pour découvrir Montréal.  Le métro est à 2 pas. Le quartier est sans doute le plus agréable de la ville. Rien à redire. Zaki est très sympa et arrangeant. A recommander absolument

The location was great! The apt was clean for the most part with the exception of a dirty towel hung on back of bathroom door, no toilet paper upon arrival, and I also found some of other guests' hairs on the bed linen (definitely were not mine). The apt has the basic amenities EXCEPT the wifi did not work at all. I reached out to the Zaki and he said he was out of town and that he would call me the next day but I never received a phone call or any form of follow up.

Studio calme et bien situé.
Pas de WI FI et TV. Aucun élément de confort à l'arrivée, boisson, papier toilette, café, lait.
Le propriétaire n'était pas présent durant 3 jours. correspondance que par sms.

Zaki's apartment was just as described: clean, comfortable, and perfectly situated. It is just around the corner from a big park and a five minute walk from the metro as well as the best areas in the city for shopping, eating, going out. The kitchen had all the cooking utensils we needed to cook but isn't stocked so if you plan on cooking bring your salt and pepper etc. There was an issue with the wifi before we arrived but Zaki communicated with us and had the issue fixed shortly after we arrived.

Zaki's place is quite nice. It is in a fantastic location! Very close to the Metro, restaurants, bars and shops but on a quiet street. Best of both worlds. Zaki was quite good at helping out with a couple problems that arose like letting me keep my bags there a few hours past check out.

This is a great studio.  Everything you need for a comfortable retreat.  It was surprisingly quiet given that it is centrally located.  Just tucked away above a courtyard. I would definitely  stay again.

Logement calme et proche de toutes les commodités, commerces, restaurants, transports en commun...
Idéal pour 1 ou 2 personnes sans problème physique compte tenu de la pente de l'escalier extérieur.
La cuisine et la salle de bain sont des pièces aveugles.
We stayed in unit 3 and while it was not the worst place to stay it was not great. It is not a home. It looks like a full time rental with essential needs met but not very clean.

Bon emplacement sur le plateau du Mont Royal.  Appartement calme, bonne literie. Salle de bain agréable. 
Dommage que l'appartement soit sombre. Les jours de chaleur, le ventilateur est insuffisant... Une climatisation serait bienvenue.

Studio confortable et pratique (buanderie dans l'immeuble, cuisine et salle de bains très bien équipées), très bien situé, proche du métro, des commerces, restaurants  et d'une piscine gratuite rue Marie-Anne. Grande disponibilité du propriétaire . Le quartier est très agréable, rien que pour s'y promener en admirant les maisons et les jardins et en rencontrant des Montréalais, toujours prêts à parler avec des Français ! De bonnes conditions de logement pour un excellent séjour !

Zaki's place was centrally located and in a great neighborhood. It was also quiet at night. I appreciated the fact that he had a fan in the apartment as it could get stuffy during the evening. We had a great stay in Montreal!

Great location but had a couple of issues both of which should be easily corrected by the host for future guests.
The big problem was unit had no a/c and it was summertime hot and we could not cool the place down - net effect was two difficult to sleep nights. I called the host and he text me that there is no a/c and will just have to sleep with the sliding doors, to the outside, open at night - there are no windows in the unit. There's a fan that we kept on but it just blows hot air around. I tried a bucket of ice in front of the fan but could not cool the place down.
The other issue is given a $40 cleaning fee, while the place looks clean, when I turned on the shower the water back up because of hair and guck in the drain. Some towels did not smell clean and bedspread/sheets had some stains.  Not a big deal but when charging a $40 fee not acceptable. 
Overall, we were mainly disappointed because it should not cost the host much to have a small a/c unit that can be turned on for hot days and nights and that would have made all the difference.

We unfortunately found ourselves in a situation where our airbnb was completely uninhabitable, but our host was not willing to provide a refund. On the evening of our arrival, we soon discovered that the bathtub faucets were in such disrepair that the water could not turn off after use. As the tub filled up quicky with water from the broken faucet and a bad drain, we had to use kitchen pots to bail water out of the tub for 40 min until the host arrived. Although Zaki was immediately reachable by phone, we were unable to communicate our issue due to the language barrier. After hanging up to write to Zaki on the airbnb app, he said he would come to the apartment in 20 minutes. He did arrive until 40 minutes later.

He arrived and managed to turn the faucet off by jamming and twisting the shower head toggle and tap at the same time. Clearly, he knew the faucets were broken before but did not bother to fix it. Further, it seemed that he had broken the faucet even more in the process of turning the water off. So at this point the hot water knob no longer worked and water could only come out of the bottom spout, and not the shower head. Then, Zaki tried to tell us that this was due to "city work" when clearly, anyone could look at the shower and tell that it was in bad shape to begin with. He then suggested we could shower by using the KITCHEN POTS to catch water and pour over ourselves. We told him that we were leaving and he agreed to refund us the rest of the trip (2 nights). Later, when Zaki had left, he messaged to tell us that he would only refund us $200 even though we paid $108 per night plus $100 in service fees and cleaning fees.  We ended up wasting the entirety of our first day and half in Montreal dealing with the bathtub situation and filing a complaint with airbnb customer service. Luckily, they were extremely helpful and got us the full refund. 

Another thing to note is that the apartment was not clean. There is a strong odour that is noticeable as soon as you walk in. The coffee maker easy used by the previous guest and was left dirty.

Zaki's place was great- quiet, clean just as advertised. Loved the neighborhood as well.
Zaki was very attentive and quick to respond as well
It was a perfect location and a comfortable bed. I walked virtually everywhere I wanted to go (grocery store, restaurants, bars, etc)

Just for the neighborhood, it is a great place to stay. It is perfectly located on the Plateau Mont-Royal, near SO MANY restaurant and hot spots, near the subway or at a walkable distance from downtown. The home itself is a bit small, but very clean and quiet. We had a few problems with the shower (hot water not closing), but we were warned by Zaki about it (even if a  bit late : two hours before arrival). Except these few details, we had a great week-end in Montreal !
My stay was great! Zaki always got back to me when I tried contacting him. Would definitely stay again!

Le studio de Zaki est vraiment très bien situé sur le Plateau, proche du métro Mont Royal et de nombreux restaurants. 
Le studio est bien pour dormir (en journée il est très peu lumineux). 
Lors de notre séjour (3 nuits), des poubelles étaient abandonnées devant la maison, ça faisait très sale par rapport au reste de la rue. 
Nous n'avons pas vu Zaki mais il a été disponible par messages et nous a très bien expliqué le check-in/check-out. 
Ce n'est pas un studio "grand luxe", mais bien pour quelques nuits.
Amazing location! Zaki responded message very quickly and solved our problem very soon.

Le logement est vraiment bien placé, à 5-10 min de marche du métro. Il est un peu sombre, mais très très calme, pas entendu un seul bruit en 3 nuits.
Zaki est vraiment disponible à tout moment, c'est très appréciable !
Perfect location! Literally walking distance from the metro, must-try restaurants and shops.
Super appartement pour un court séjour à Montréal!
Nice place to stay in Montreal ! Quiet and close to nice places in the « plateau ». Highly recommended to everyone !
Appartement très calme dans un quartier agréable.
Perfect stay in a perfect studio, just right for a couple or a lone traveler visiting Montreal for a few days!

This apartment is in a nice location between two main areas. Zaki communicated well with us and had excellent food recommendations! However, the place was not as clean as we would have liked with leftover food in the cupboard and microwave, and unclean bedspread. Other than that we enjoyed everything available in the kitchen and the easy location.
Zaki was a great host. He goes above and beyond to make sure that their guests are happy. The apartment was great and we had a lovely time in Montreal. Would recommend the place wholeheartedly.
Well located and quiet location. Very helpful host that replies quickly. Kitchen is manageable for basic cooking if need be.
Loved our stay at your place, luxurious apartment and great location and great communication. Thank you Zaki.
Studio idéalement située - un climatiseur serait un plus en période chaude

I was in Montreal in November 2018 ! Zaki, the owner was very welcoming and helpful ! He came to meet me , told me everything, was attentive and responsive ! The apartment is in a very convenient location , everything you need is available , beautiful apartments and the owner ! I recommend

name: Minyon Istanbul room no:4
summary: Welcome to Minyon İstanbul Apartment. We have 5 lovely decorated rooms, perfectly located for all of the tourtistic purposes. 5 minutes walking distance to Taksim Square.  This room has a sea view!!! :)
space: There is 1 DBL bed in the apartment. There is also a couch that turns into a bed. A child, or a small person can sleep.
description: Welcome to Minyon İstanbul Apartment. We have 5 lovely decorated rooms, perfectly located for all of the tourtistic purposes. 5 minutes walking distance to Taksim Square.  This room has a sea view!!! :) There is 1 DBL bed in the apartment. There is also a couch that turns into a bed. A child, or a small person can sleep. We also provide laundry service.
notes: We also provide laundry service.

host.host_about: I am a travel addict! I travelled all around the world and lived in different countries. I know what a traveller is looking for during the trip and I will do my best to provide you with an unforgettable experince in Istanbul.

reviews.comments: She was always available and friendly. I loved the location is in between taksim and kabatas and so close to Eminonu and transportations   I will TOTALY recommend it

Ottima sistemazione, pulita e arredata con tutto il necessario.
La posizione è ottimale, quartiere tranquillo, molto vicina a ristoranti, bar, negozi e servizi.
L'host è stata molto cordiale inviandomi indicazioni per raggiungere l'appartamento e una guida di Istanbul.
Muge was a great host! The apartment is very central, very clean and new. It felt like being in a hotel! Apartment exactly like the pictures....Highly recommended!

Was my first time with AirBnB and I loved Muges minyon apartment. We had apartment number 4 with the described sea view. It looked like the photos and was fully equipped with everything you need for a few days/ nights. Everything was very clean, there were fresh towels and a hair dryer.
The neighborhood is quiet and the house is only 5 minutes from Taksim Square. Also in 5 minutes you can reach the tram in the old city center and the ferry.
The communication with muge was totally easy and simple. The Wifi problem that we had one evening was solved next day and we could leave our luggage in a extra room on departure day -the flight was in the evening. I would recommend it for sure! Was a great city trip! THANKS A LOT, MUGE!
The reservation was canceled 36 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

İlandaki fotoğraflarla birebir uyumlu güzel, temiz ve sessiz bir odaydı. Apartman, Taksim'e ve Kabataş'a oldukça yakın, üstelik yaşayan ve eski bir mahallede. Kaldığımız süre boyunca çok rahat ettik. İsteklerimizi geri çevirmeyen, bize yardımcı olan ev sahibi Müge'ye ve evi tertemiz yapan temizlik işçisine çok teşekkür ederiz.
Super schönes Appartament. Tolle Lage. Gute Kommunikation. Würde ich jederzeit wieder buchen. Wir hatten wunderschöne Tage im Istanbul

The apartment was very nice, especially for the price. The apartment is new, clean, equipped, just as described on the web and on the photos.  It was about 5 minute walk from the Kabataš tram station and the funicular to Taksim. We didn't meet Muge, but she responded on our email requests promptly, kindly and helpfully. Muge sent us all necessary information about Istanbul and the apartment, even short instructions for the taxi driver in Turkish. Because of our late arrival in Istanbu, we arranged late check-in without any problems, her cleaning lady let us in. She does not speak English, but generally it was not a problem. The neighborhood is safe, very quite, only you should expect a few minutes of climbing on very steep street from the tram station to the apartment. The WiFi was functioning properly. We highly recommend this place.

Minyon No. 4 is located in a safe neighborhood that is in close proximity to Taksim Square and numerous taxi/public transit options.  The apartment itself is secure, bright, stocked with useful amenities, and offers a lovely view of the Bosphorus.  I would not hesitate to recommend this to my friends.

For my first experience with AirBnB, this listing was superb. Muge was a great host, left helpful information in the house, and even helped me book a cab last minute when I had to catch my flight. Great views, can't saw enough about how great the neighborhood was, too--very residential, comfortable, safe.

Bonjour,
Logement propre et conforme aux photos. Très sécurisé.  Le seul petit problème c est qu il faut être sportif il y a trop de pente il est au milieu d une sorte de colline.

I loved this apartment and for sure I will come back and stay there again. The apartment looks exactly like the one shown in the pictures. Everything was so clean and the cleaning lady was so friendly. The security of the building is up to date. The communication with Müge was totally easy and simple. The WIFI connection was absolutly perfect. I can say it again and again, I looveed the apartment.
Harika konum, tertemiz bir oda, sakin muhit. Herşey için teşekkürler.
The place is nice and cozy. But you have to agree with the owner all the exact details re arrival or any further communication.

Muge's studio is very fine for a nice stay, warm and cosy, with the basics in kitchen (especially to boil tea!). It is very close to Kabatas tramway station that quickly takes you to the old city center, or boat connections in Eminonu, as well as Taksim metro station.  I really appreciated staying there, although there was kind of a mistake at the start. Indeed I was given a completely different flat than the one I booked. Fortunately, after a call, Muge sorted this out, and all went well.
İlanda olduğu gibi oldukça temiz ve ferah bir oda. Konumu ve ulaşım imkanı oldukça rahat. Tavsiye ederim.
Everything perfect! 5 stars!
Kalınabilecek bir yer gayet temiz ve güzel tavsiye ederim
The apartment and the view were very nice
Very clean and new stylish (Website hidden by Airbnb) close to the taksim square(10 min by walk)and reasonable price!really recommend it!
Yer guzel ve ozenliydi gayet temiz bakimliydi hatta bogaz manzarasi bile var

This place is fantastic. The location was perfect for us. Close enough to all the awesome stuff in Istanbul but not so close that you feel suffocated. Quiet neighborhood, close to the water, tramline within a 5 minute walk. What more could you want?
Lovely apartment! Helpful host and was kind enough to let us check in earlier too.

House has a great location and easy check in also muge was so kind. But bed was bad, shower door was broken and rampy road to the appartment which makes it hard to walk if you have a big luggage. It was still a nice stay :)
Great location, great view. It was also pretty clean & neat. I’d recommend this studio to short stays.
Perfectly clean, cozy and comfortable room in center of Istanbul for the very reasonable price!
Отличные апартаменты. Небольшие, но для жизни есть все необходимое. До площади Таксим 10 минут неторопливым шагом, до причала Кабаташ 5 минут, тихий район, рядом небольшие магазинчики.
Excellent location and so clean and beautiful apartment.

It was a nice and a quite place where I could spend a good time during my two weeks stay. Communication with Mrs. Muge was professional and anything needed was delivered in a professional way as well. Mrs. Muge can serve you with all your needs, you just need to ask.
The place is as I expected, it’s a walking distance to the most famous Taksim Square that offer a lot of shops & delicacies as well as the main hub of Istanbul main public transportation.

İlandaki fotoğraflarda görüldüğü gibi birebir aynısıyla karşılaştık.Çok güzel,özenle döşenmiş ve temizdi.Odada ihtiyacımız olabilecek herşey düşünülmüş.Beklentilerimizi fazlasıyla karşıladı.Ayrıca apartman Beşiktaş,Taksim ve Kabataş'a yürüme mesafesinde.Müge hanıma ve bizi güleryüzle karşılayan odaların temizliğini sağlayan yardımcısına çok teşekkür ederiz.
It is a beautiful little apparment and the view is wonderful. The communication was super easy and also the location is great!

It was a wonderful stay, I loved the key card access and door code for convenience and security. It was an easy check in, great location near the main road and many shops and restaurants in walking distance, 5 min walk to the stadium, and lovely view of the sea!  It was a perfect little studio apartment, I loved the little kitchen, the great air conditioner with remote control, and my own wifi router! Would stay here again and I already recommended it to my friends.
In the pictures it looks bigger than it  is but if you only want to crush there it’s clean and in a good location.

Muge was a great host and the apartment was exactly what we had hoped it would be. Clean, tidy, easy check-in / check-out and good location. Muge was able to organise luggage storage after check-out and also arranged a taxi for us to the airport from the apartment. Would definitely recommend this as a great place to stay in Istanbul.
Nice but difficult to find and to get to location. Helpful tips from Host
Perfect clean modern apartment in a good location, Very reliable with communication and check in was very easy. Highly recommended
Good location and view. Small but nice and convenient
Oldukça temiz ve manzarası güzel. Konumu biraz yokuşta kalıyor ama bize çok sorun olmadı :)
Sehr schönes Apartment mit tollem Blick aufs Meer! Es war sehr sauber! Nur zu empfehlen!

The place is well located  close to Taksim and its many attractions. Attractive decor and with a great view of The Bosporus, the room is really welcoming! Muge was accommodating and very quick in responding to any inquiries. Definitely recommend!
Great host and the house was as explained!! All good)

These lovely apartment are very near to taksim square (1km uphill walk) and tram Station (700 mt) so yo can travel to different places Easily. Apartment is very comfortable, clean and stylish to be in. Walking to place with luggage can be tough as nearby area is hilly but once sorted near its a very convenient location to live in.

Muge's apartment was just what we needed! Very clean, no frills, and close to two forms of public transportation (tram and metro). The neighborhood is quiet with lots of cats and a few cute local restaurants near the water; it's close enough to the tourist areas without being directly in them. Two things to note is that it's smaller in person than it looks in the photos, and to get to and from the apartment, you have to climb either a steep set of stairs or a steep hill, so it wouldn't be good for folks who are disabled or have trouble walking (but we didn't mind the workout!). Thanks to Muge for a great week in the city!

Nice, clean and well decorated apartment. Easy to find and close to two metro/tram stations. 
Not recommended though if you find it hard/difficult to walk up and down a very steep hill!
There wasn’t hot water in the mornings, so recommending having a shower in the evenings. Not sure if the person who welcomed us was the same as the one on the pictures on her profile and therefore the communication in English was very very hard, not like when messaging through airbnb before our arrival...
But overall very nice stay and would definitely recommend!

Sparking clean and great location. Muge responds very quickly to messages.  Just be aware it is VERY small. It's great for a quick stopover in Istanbul. But probably not the best for two large people.  It is a studio with a bathroom.
We found a nice place with a good view. Its good to be near to the port and also to Taximplace
muge is a great host. located near taksim square. metro station also nearby. super market is close by open til late. had a great time and worth everything. connected to other part of city easily.

Super Zimmer, Preis-Leistungsverhältnis war Super. 
Die Lage war Super.
Die Kontaktperson war immer ansprechbar. 
WLAN hat Einwandfrei funktioniert.
Çok temiz ve güzeldi
Gayet güvenilir ve temiz
The apartment is well located and will provide for a center location near Taksim square from where you can go anywhere you want in the city....

Muge's place is in a great location and a good choice people who want to do a lot of sightseeing and don't plan to spend much time at the Airbnb. Istanbul in general is a very hilly city so be prepared to walk up and down some STEEP terrain. As far as the apartment goes it had all of the listed amenities and wonderful water pressure in the shower (which is important for me). As far as comfort it is a bit smaller than it looks in photos (a couple other reviewers pointed this out as well so I didn't have high expectations) My one complaint would be how uncomfortable the bed was... I'm a side sleeper and woke up sore in the mornings.

My stay at Muge's apartment was great! The apartment is cozy and has great view of the Bosphorus gulf! It is very close to Taxim square less than ten minutes! It was very clean and the mattress was very comfortable! I would totally recommend Muge's place!
Muge is very accommodating and easy to communicate with. The apartment is a short walk to both Taksim and Kabatas Metro stations. The place is also very clean and stylish!

Ubicación y limpieza de 10!

Una maravilla de apartamento, muy cómodo y muy limpio. 

Amplio y solo a 10m caminando de Taksim.  La anfitriona súper atenta y respondiendo muy rápido a todas las dudas. 

Sin duda, entre el alojamiento y la cuidad podemos decir que ha sido de los mejores viajes que hemos hecho.

Gracias
Очень комфортная комната.
Oda son derece temiz ve düzenliydi. Konum da mükemmeldi. Müge Hanım'a çok teşekkürler.
its safety and clean place
cok iyi
Konum ve manzara olarak kesinlikle tatmin edici, fiyat performans olarak kiralayabiliceginiz en iyi yerlerden. Bir sikinti yasadiginizda direk iletisim kurabilmeniz mumkun.

name: Kanimbla Vista Apartment
summary: This modern apartment offers all the convenience of a home to travelers seeking a quiet residence with a great outlook across the blue waters of the Pacific Ocean and down the coastline of Sydney's northern beaches
space: This is a two bedroom apartment separate from the main home with space for three people to reside in comfortably during their stay. Additional sleeping facilities can be arranged with advance notice.
description: This modern apartment offers all the convenience of a home to travelers seeking a quiet residence with a great outlook across the blue waters of the Pacific Ocean and down the coastline of Sydney's northern beaches This is a two bedroom apartment separate from the main home with space for three people to reside in comfortably during their stay. Additional sleeping facilities can be arranged with advance notice. Guests are able to use garden and kids play equipment
access: Guests are able to use garden and kids play equipment

host.host_location: Bilgola Beach, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about:
Our home is situated on Sydney's beautiful Northern Beaches, we love to travel and enjoy the wonders of the world.

When at home we use the golden beaches regularly and Pittwater for all sorts of water activities

reviews.comments: My daughters and I had a great stay at Peter’s place! It was clean and spacious and the location is just great. Up in the hills with a view of the ocean and the valley below and only a few minutes drive to shops, restaurants and the beaches. Peter is a great host and we had a great experience overall!
It’s a granny flat and the aircon doesn’t reach the bedroom so was hot. Peter was nice but the price for the place that we were provided was poor

Fantastic hosts and beautiful apartment, would book it again any time. The apartment has everything you need and Peter and Pauline have been great with communications and made the entire process super easy and convenient.

House is in a stunning location nestled in the hills of Bilgola. 

Really enjoyed the privacy ,light filled rooms and stunning views. 

Would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking to get away from the hustle and bustle of Sydney while still being in a central location to access some of Sydney's best beaches.

The place is in a beautiful, peaceful location with an amazing view and sounds of the ocean. The apartment is very private and self contained - great amenities. I highly recommend this place and Peter was great to communicate with.
Beautiful apartment with amazing amenities!
Clean and tidy, well appointed, easy check-in, stunning view from the balcony, short car trip to beaches and Pittwater. A perfect spot for a weekend at the northern beaches.
Great place and hospitality, we had a short stay but it left a great impression!
Great place for a weekend away with great private views!

Great place to stay for a weekend away on the northern beaches. The apartment was clean with modern amenities and a great view in a lovely location. Our host was very reliable to contact and we would definitely stay here again!
