host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Atuo na área do turismo há 12 anos e o destino me levou a investir no mercado imobiliário, pelo qual não me arrependo nem um pouco.
As duas atividades me renderam altíssimo conhecimento de vida e relacionamento com o próximo e a importância da hospitalidade .

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Listing was exactly as shown on the pictures. Very clean and comfortable. Building is very secure and convenient to everything, including the beach. Host was excellent throughout the process. He speaks great English. He took the time to walk me through the apartment to explain how things work and how the apartment should be maintained throughout my stay. He provided excellent restaurant options along with additional security tips when touring the city. I would definitely stay here again. 5 star service
The apartment was better then described. Amazing location and Ricardo was very helpful with anything we needed. Would love to stay again and would highly recommend.
Ricardo is a great host! His place is just what you want it to be and where you want it to be. Stay here if you want to experience Copacabana side of Rio!

Definitely a place to stay in Copacabana! Ricardo was a great host and was very helpful during our entire stay, and also speaks great English! He was always available via a phone call or a text. The apartment was cute, cozy and clean and was enough for our one week stay. The area was safe with great restaurants around and also just a 5 minute walk to the beach. We would recommend this place for your next trip to Rio!

Minha primeira experiência no airbnb foi muito legal. O Ricardo foi excelente anfitrição, gentil e correto. O apartamento é muito bem decorado, com bastante conforto e praticidade. A localização é excelente, perto de tudo, comércio, restaurantes e da praia de Copacabana. Ficamos muitos satisfeitos e queremos repetir!
The listing was accurate, and the neighborhood was great - so close to the beach, and a supermarket in every direction!  The apartment is modern, clean, and quiet.

Ricardo's place is very modern has 24 security. The elevators get to the 11th. floor fairly quickly.  On the inside everything is spot on! Beautiful furniture everything works great. There are also two AC units one the the living room and one in the bedroom. I really didn't need them since I was there in the winter months. Theres plenty of closet space to store all your gear. 
  The view is awesome too. It's a mountain in the back and there aren't any neighbours on top of you so you have privacy. 
  I had a couple of questions while I was staying there and Ricardo respond very quickly, he even helped me purchase a SIM card so I have access to (Hidden by Airbnb) . I highly recommended to  look into a smart phone with a SIM when you arrive. You will not have access to making calls but you will have access to intent. 

   All in all this is a very beautiful space with tasteful furnished in a decent neighborhood.

Great location. The apartment is on a busy street but well located for getting around. The beach is only a couple of blocks away, a few blocks away is the Metro. Really great space looks exactly like the pictures and Ricardo was a great host my flight was a bit late and he was very accommodating I would recommend anyone stay here

Ricardo nos recibió con mucha amabilidad, nos indicó como funcionaba todo en el departamento, el cual es tal como se ve en la publicación, muy equipado, todo funciona muy bien, moderno y lindo. Muy recomendable. Todo 10 puntos. Sin duda volvería. Gracias Rick

We chose Ricardo's Flat to stay based on the very affordable cost and was a bit hesitant at first as we couldn't believe what a bargain it was. How very lucky we were!!
Ricardo was so awesome from the start to finish!!!

 First of all,  we  stayed for 5 days and the Location is perfect! about 2 mins walk from copacobana beach and extremely close to all the shops and restaurants.

 Also very easy to find from the onset.

We had no problems getting taxis to get around as it was very close to the main road.

The Flat itself is extremely modern ,very Clean and very well decorated. The bed was so comfortable we always had a struggle to get out of bed.
 Check in and Check out was very efficient and Ricardo was so laid back about everything.
 I cant recommend enough !!!
Brilliant !!
Apartamento excelente, muito bem equipado e decorado. Localização otima, duas quadras da praia e proximo a supermercados, bancos, farmacia, padarias, bares e restaurantes. Recomendo!!

El departamento era exactamente como en la foto! Un lugar muy comodo para estar varios dias en Rio, tienes todo lo necesario. Muy cercano a lugares de interes. Buses en la misma calle del edificio.  El departamento esta en el piso 11 por lo que no hay ruido ambiental.  Excelente opcion. Definitivamente volveré y lo recomiendo! Ricardo un 10 total disponibilidad y amable en el checkin! Todo perfecto

listing is 100% accurate 
neighborhood is 2 blocks from copacabana beach, felt very safe

Nos encanto el departamento, arreglado con muy buen gusto. Todos los ambientes muy confortables.
Ricardo un excelente anfitrión, nuestro viaje se demoro un poco y no llegamos a la hora prevista, igual nos recibió muy amablemente y nos enseño el departamento y todos los detalles a tener en cuenta. 
Las instalaciones del departamento son iguales a lo que se muestra en las fotos. Esta totalmente equipado. Muy cómodo!
Nos encanto la estadia en el departamento!
Muchas gracias Ricardo ! Una ciudad maravillosa con gente maravillosa!!!

We have recently come home from a fantastic 2 weeks in Rio. The apartment was a fantastic base to see and explore everything at ease. 
Ricardo was a brilliant host and was available for any queries we had in the run up and during our stay. 
I very much recommend this apartment to everyone.
We really loved our stay, the apartment was amazing the bed was so comfortable to sleep on 10min walk to beach I will definitely be coming back

The apartment looked exactly like the pictures.  It was very clean, comfortable, modern and chic inside.  All the appliances worked well, including the shower and air conditioners, which is very important if you are staying in Rio during the summer!  The host (Ricardo) was extremely helpful.  He arrived at the scheduled time, explained in detail how all the appliances and amenities (including Wi-Fi) worked, and the check-in and check-out process were very quick and efficient.  He also gave me some great recommendations and tips regarding Rio and the area.  The apartment is in a great location, close to the beach, restaurants, and shops in Copacabana and was a great value for the price.  You can walk to most of the places you want in Copacabana and it was also convenient to get a taxi from the apartment.  I would definitely recommend the apartment to other guests and would stay there again.

O Ricardo foi um ótimo anfitrião. Sempre respondeu aos meus questionamentos rapidamente e foi super pontual no check in. O apartamento é exatamente como descrito no site. Localização muito boa, próximo da praia, de estação do metrô e com supermercados e muitos restaurantes e padarias próximos. Completamente reformado e com móveis e utensílios de alta qualidade. Cama ótima, TV com NET, ar condicionado e ventiladores, tanto na sala como no quarto. Me hospedaria novamente nesse apartamento com toda certeza.

We stayed in Rio for 6 days and were very happy about having chosen Ricardo's place for this purpose! The apartment looks exactly as in the photos, while being even brighter in reality (in the bedroom there are several large windows which we did not see on the website before). It is located in plain Copacabana, two blocks from the beach and 5 minutes walking to the Metro - making it perfect for a first stay in the city. Also at night we felt safe in the neighborhood, even though regarding restaurants and bars there is not much around and one has to go to other areas by Taxi. Unfortunately, while the rest of the apartment could be easily sold as "Luxury 1 bedroom", the kitchen is not so much of a luxury place to stay in and is only very basically equipped. While it is possible to cook, it's not so much of a fun experience and we did not encounter any basics such as olive oil, salt or pepper. On the other hand, you have a washing machine with dryer which is especially helpful while traveling. Finally, Ricardo is a very attentive host and waited for us in the apartment upon arrival. Every time we contacted him before and during the stay, he responded immediately and seemed to be available 24/7. As this is not the rule on AirBnB, we were very happy to have him as a host! So overall, Ricardo's place is very recommendable and we'd always like to come back!
Had a great time staying here. Bed was comfortable, it was in a convenient place, next to many restaurants, and close to copacabana. Ricardo was very helpful at check in.

Ricardo did a great job welcoming and showing us around. His apartment is perfectly located for discovering Rio. The place is very modern and well equipped to the highest standards. Highly recommended and my first address if coming back to Rio!
Ricardo was a very nice host. The apartment was modern and comfortable. Good location, the beach is close and other parts of the city are easy to reach by uber.
it was a very nice apartment ,with very good location and the owner is very helpful:)we spend a nice trip there!
The appartment is very close to the beach, it looks great and the bed is very comfortable!

Ricardo foi um ótimo anfitrião!!
Apartamento excelente, confortável,  boa localização em Copacabana. Sem dúvida me hospedarei novamente.

Ótima experiência, apartamento muito bem decorado e moderno, muito confortável, localização excelente e tivemos um ótimo atendimento do Ricardo, nos recebendo e explicando como funciona cada parte do apartamento, sendo muito atencioso!
O Rodrigo está presente para entregar as chaves e foi super atencioso. O apartamento é lindo, e exatamente como apresentado nas fotos. A localizacão é (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza recomendo!
Igual a las fotos! Súper recomendable

Ricardo fue muy amable desde el principio (nos pareció muy buen detalle que nos dejara agua en la nevera). El apartamento es tal y como aparece en las fotos, muy bonito. Las luces pueden ajustarse, más o menos intensidad. La cama fue súper cómoda. La lavadora funcionaba muy bien.  El edificio está muy muy muy bien situado y además tiene portero 24horas que también fueron muy amables, eso le da seguridad a la casa ya que te tienen que abrir desde dentro para poder entrar al edificio. Estaba todo muy limpio. El único inconveniente era la ducha que no había mucha potencia de agua. Todo lo demás fue ¡perfecto! GRACIAS RICARDO

The apartment was exactly as described. It is a very comfortable living space. There is a gym across the street (one of the best chains in Brasil),   many restaurants in walking distance, you just have to step out of the building to catch a taxi. Ricardo was a great host. I stayed for over a month and really enjoyed my stay at this apartment
Ótimo Anfitrião, recomendo o apartamento a todos, lugar muito bem localizado, perto de tudo. Bata pegar uma bicicleta Itau a passear do Leme ao Leblon tranquilamente. Muito Obrigado Ricardo.

Ricardo es un gran anfitrión, siempre atento a las necesidades de sus huéspedes, el departamento es idéntico a las fotos. 
El departamento es muy moderno y tiene una inmejorable ubicación, cerca de supermercados, bares, restaurantes, playa de copacabana y de todo lo que puedas necesitar si deseas pasar unos días de descanso y relax en Rio de Janeiro.
Espero volver lo antes posible.

Recomendamos muito!
Ótimo apartamento com excelente decoração e espaço ideal. Bem localizado.
Anfitrião Ricardo foi super prestativo e pontual. Agradecemos por tudo.

A acomodação faz jus às fotos, apartamento está reformado e tudo funcionou bem. Espaço bastante confortável para casal. Ricardo esteve sempre disponível quando entrei em contato e me recebeu no dia do checkin.  Recomendo o apartamento.

Muy lindo departamento. Parece todo nuevo y muy moderno.
Muy bien ubicado. Cerca de todo. 
Ricardo es muy hospitalario. Nos explicó en detalle como usar cada una de las cosas.
INCREIBLE la cama, muy cómoda. También las almohadas. Los aires  acondicionados silenciosos. 
Excelente !
Lo único que no llegó a ser grave, pero sorprendió, es que deja pasar un poco el ruido de la calle a pesar de estar en el piso 11.
El resto, todo 10 puntos!

Das Apartment ist sehr gut gelegen. Super nah zur Copacabana Beach und die U-Bahn ist auch in der Nähe. Gleich um die Ecke ist ein super Frühstücksladen und im Nachbarhaus ein typisch brasilianisches Buffetrestaurant, was auch sehr leckeres Essen bis spät Abends hat. Ricardo ist der perfekte Gastgeber! Jede SMS wird sofort beantwortet und er versucht alles für einen zu regeln und organisieren. Da unser Abflug erst abends war, hat er uns gratis ein anderes seiner Apartments für den Nachmittag zur Verfügung gestellt. 
5 star host!

O apto é ótimo e bem localizado. Tudo novinho e limpo!
O Ricardo já estava me esperando e deu dicas e me ajudou com infos do apto.
Super indico!

Adoramos o apartamento. Ele é igualzinho ao que está nas fotos. É bem equipado e não deixou nada a desejar. A localização é ótima, fica numa avenida super movimentada e com muito comércio, que fica aberto até 22 horas. Pertinho da praia de Copacabana, um local maravilhoso e bem frequentado. Andamos tranquilamente pelas imediações e não tivemos nenhum problema. Agradecemos ao Ricardo pela recepção e por todo suporte que nos deu durante nossa hospedagem. Recomendamos e com certeza voltaríamos.
Apartamento confortável, ótima localização a duas quadras do Mar, próximo à Restaurante, Farmácia, Lojas. Bairro seguro e apartamento silencioso.

Estadia excelente, apartamento completo com móveis, utensílios, ventilador e ar condicionado, próximo a restaurantes, lancherias, padarias, mercados, lojas e farmácias. Uma quadra da praia. Foi tudo ótimo, recomendo!

Location of this apartment is superb. It’s just a short walk from the center of Copacabana beach and easy to grab an Uber anywhere else in the city. The doormen at the apartment are very helpful and friendly. They even watched our bags for a few hours before we could check in after an early morning arrival. The apartment itself is nicely updated with a comfy bed and good AC. Ricardo is really easy to reach and very flexible. All in all, definitely recommend as a home base for your trip to Rio!
Ótimo apartamento, muito aconchegante.

Ubicación inmejorable (cerca de todo lo necesario y cerca de la playa), los porteros del edificio súper amables al igual que Ricardo.  El depto es tal cual como en las fotos, más que cómodo para dos personas. Perfecto desde que llegamos hasta que nos fuimos, no tuvimos ningún inconveniente. Muy conformes seguro volveremos!!

Nos hospedamos con mi novia,un hermoso departamento con una excelente ubicacion ( 2 cuadras de la playa de Copacabana),mucha seguridad,ya que se encontraban 3 personas las 24 hs del dia tardando no mas de 5 segundos en abrir las dos puertas para ingresar al edificio,el departamento es muy confortable y con todas las comodidades,aire acondicionado con muy buen fucionamiento,la cama muy comoda y limpia,cocina con TODO lo necesario para una comoda estadia y un baño super limpio y comodo tambien,recomiendo 100% a Ricardo por su trato y atencion despejando todas las dudas que teniamos,nos sentimos muy bien en nuestra primera visita a la bella ciudad de Rio de Janeiro!!
Place is in a great location. Close to bars, restaurants and a short walk to the beach. Had a wonderful stay.
Local muito bom, imóvel bem legal e tudo muito bom, valeu a viagem.

Die Unterkunft war ein Traum. Nicht nur, dass sie wunderbar eingerichtet war sondern vor allem der Gastgeber. Ricardo war sehr hilfsbereit (unter anderem Late Check Out). 
Aber das Beste war, dass er mir das Gefühl vermittelt hat, dass er bei jedem Problem, welches ich in Rio erleben könnte, helfen würde. Er hat eine Problemlöser Persönlichkeit, welche mir eine enorme Sicherheit in dieser Stadt  gegeben hat.

Nice flat very well located : close to the beach and there are many shops around. 
The neighborhood is safe and the residence has a private guardian.
The Ricardo was very nice. I recommend.

Great host and great spot in Copa.  Really nice apartment and everything you need to be comfortable as a couple or solo.   Nice touch with washer/dryer and plenty of towels and linens.   Doorman were super nice as well and location is easy--everything you could possibly need is within one block or two.  And Ricardo is a pleasure to deal with.

Ricardo’s place is one block from Copacabana beach and within walking distance to many markets and restaurants. The unit is stylish and has everything needed for a comfortable stay. Front desk staff were super helpful and nice. Hope to be back soon!

Absolutely fantastic apartment. It appears just as in the pictures and in person is much bigger. Ricardo has gone above and beyond to make my stay memorable. The location is impeccable. it’s near shops, banks, bars and one block from the beach. Everything is good. Great staff as well. 
Will definitely stay again!!
Great location.  Everything is within walking distance, including the beach.
Fui con mi hija pasamos genial. Solo algún utensillo de cocina hubiera necesitado. Y más presión en la ducha!!!

El apartamento de Ricardo está muy bien localizado queda a una cuadra y media de Copacabana  tiene muchos restaurantes en el area  muy buenos 
La atención de Ricardo exelente  el apartamento muy limpio la cama muy cómoda para descansar 
El apartamento  nos encanto
Nice place at a good location. The doorman doesn't speak any English so checkin was a little tricky but when that was out of the way we had a great time in Rio at this apartment

Ricardo is one of the best hosts out there.  Just a great guy and always reachable.   

Place is awesome—great locale and quiet and peaceful to sleep at night.

Washer/Dryer is great to have after all the beach and gym runs!  Doormen are super nice and will recognize you after a few visits and always greet you with a smile.

Can’t go wrong if you want a place in the middle of Copa, 2 blocks away from the beach, and everything that you would ever need within walking distance.

Great apartment. Beautiful interior and great location. Near bars, banks, shopping and Restaurants. I’ve stayed here before and look to stay again. Ricardo was a great host. He responds quickly and helped me with everything I needed.
La verdad recomiendo el departamento, todo hecho a nuevo, cómodo, limpio y bien ubicado.

Ricardo es un muy buen anfitrión me he encontrado muy a gusto en su casa. Veracidad en la información y ubicación del inmueble inmejorable. Siempre disponible y responde rápido. Gracias Ricardo. Recomiendo este apartamento.

Superbe séjour chez Ricardo! L’appartement est propre, spacieux pour 2 personnes, identique aux photos, situé pres de tout commerces, a 5 m de la plage a pied, bonne wifi, climatisation dans la chambre et le salon. Ricardo m’a tres bien accueilli a l’arrivée, sympathique et reactif.
Ricardo's place is very nice.  It is stylish, clean and in a great location near the beach.  This is the second time I have stayed at his place and I very much enjoyed it and would stay there again.

el departamento es muy lindo y el anfitrión siempre se comportó muy atento y respondiendo todos los mensajes rápidamente,  la zona es muy céntrica rodeada de locales y gran opción  de comida , lo único a mejorar es el estado de limpieza al ingreso

No recomendable el apartamento, tiene serios problemas eléctricos el edificio por ser muy antiguo, se nos cortó la luz 2 noches seguidas la primera por dos horas y la segunda vez  toda la noche por lo que no se podía dormir al no tener aire acondicionado, el calor insoportable con los mas de 30° durante la noche y tuvimos que dejar el departamento 3 noches antes e irnos a un hotel, es un espacio muy chico sin ventanas en la sala de estar y la ducha muy poca presión de agua, además de faltar elementos ofrecidos como secador de pelo y la secadora no funciona, no volvería por ningún motivo y por lo mismo me fui antes sin importar tener pagada toda la estadía.

name: 1 bd apt in Astoria
summary: Greetings, I am offering a 1 bedroom apt. Located in the heart of Astoria (30Ave stop) only 15min from midtown. Fast and easy commute with the N train- very safe and lively neighborhood. Kitchen/Livingroom/Bedroom If you have questions, please, ask.
space: The apartment is located in Astoria, Queens. It is  a short walk from the subway (N/Q lines) and makes for an easy commute to the city. This train line is extremely reliable and the neighborhood is very safe. In addition, there are plenty of restaurants, bars, and stores all within walking distance. The apartment is located in a prewar 3 story building. The street it's on has very little traffic. The apartment is on the first floor, facing the back, so it is very peaceful and quiet. The space consists of a living room/ kitchen combo. The kitchen is equipped with all cooking necessities and utensils, a coffee maker with free coffee for you to have. It has a high bar type table with two stools for dining. In the living room there is a couch, coffee table and a flat screen TV. In the bedroom there are a queen size bed, nightstands with lamps and a built in closet. Iron board and iron for your use. The apartment has an AC unit, microwave, hair dryer for your stay, stove/cook top, a refrige
description: Greetings, I am offering a 1 bedroom apt. Located in the heart of Astoria (30Ave stop) only 15min from midtown. Fast and easy commute with the N train- very safe and lively neighborhood. Kitchen/Livingroom/Bedroom If you have questions, please, ask. The apartment is located in Astoria, Queens. It is  a short walk from the subway (N/Q lines) and makes for an easy commute to the city. This train line is extremely reliable and the neighborhood is very safe. In addition, there are plenty of restaurants, bars, and stores all within walking distance. The apartment is located in a prewar 3 story building. The street it's on has very little traffic. The apartment is on the first floor, facing the back, so it is very peaceful and quiet. The space consists of a living room/ kitchen combo. The kitchen is equipped with all cooking necessities and utensils, a coffee maker with free coffee for you to have. It has a high bar type table with two stools for dining. In the living room there is a couch,
interaction: My guests are welcome to contact me whenever they have question or concerns even if it doesn't refer to the property.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: L'appartement d'Irena est situé dans le Queens, à Astoria, dans un quartier tranquille et très agréable. De nombreux commerces et de lieux de restauration. A quelques centaines de mètres de la station de métro (ligne N), et à une vingtaine de minutes de Manhattan. Idéal pour une immersion dans la vie new-yorkaise. L'appartement est très confortable, propre et bien équipé. La communication avec Irena s'est bien passée : elle s'est montrée disponible, a répondu à mes questions et ses explications pour arriver à son appartement depuis JFK furent précises et très utiles. Je recommande vivement cet appartement. Thanks Irena !

I had a good time at her apartment. It was clean, cozy and it was exactly that what i saw in her advertisement.
She is a very nice person and very helpful too. I would recommended her

My primary reason for my NYC was to visit friends and family in Queens. Irena's apartment served me very well. It was convientently located close to family/friends homes but also near restaurants, bars and shops; it was about a 15 min train ride to Midtown Times Sqaure and 20-25 mins to Union Square. Ire a was very accommodating when it came to checking in/out. She also followed up with me to see how my son and I were doing, which was very nice of her. She was also responsive to any questions I had. Her apartment was very clean; the photos she has posted are accurate. Enjoyed every minute being in her apartment. Cozy and warm. Although there is no cable there is wifi and Netflix. But why would anyone stay in to watch cable TV during their stay in NYC? ;-) 

I recommend this apartment.

Me and my friend has a really great experience at Irena's apartment. She was super accommodating and her place is right beside the city. Safe neighbourhood and close to the subway! Would really recommend staying there!
Everything was good, especially location. Thank you Irena.

My train was delayed and Irena went above and beyond to make sure I found the apartment and got settled in even though I was late. The neighbourhood is quite residential but a short walk to take the train into the city and there's an incredible coffee place right around the corner. Exceptionally clean, this was a great place to come "home" to :)

Stayed at Irena's Astoria apartment while in NY for my daughter's wedding, it was everything we needed. Close to trains, lovely, diverse neighborhood, comfortable and secure place. Irena was great with communication once we finally connected (had a bit of trouble with timely communicating in the week before our trip), and responsive and helpful when I had questions. Would reach out to Irena again next time I go to NY.
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We spent 6 nights at Irena`s apartment with my sister. The flat is at great location, about 8 min walk to the subway and about 15min to Time Square. The area is safe and clean. There are some shops, restaurants and cafes nearby. The bed is very comfortable. We had some issues with cleanliness. We felt the apartment wasn`t cleaned before our arrival. Also to work out how the shower works was a bit difficult, but Irena came over and showed us. There is no cable, but you van use Netflix. Anyway, watching TV is not necessarily what you want to do in New York. The flat has everything you need for a short stay. Irena was helpful.

It was very easy to book Irena's cute apartment. Checking in was also a breeze: she met us at the apartment to show us around and hand off keys. 
Good location: starting with a cheap fare from LGA. The N Q train was less than a ten minute walk. The Trade Fair was easy for groceries: on the way to/from the apartment and also open 24 hours. 
It was a nice treat to settle down at night on the couch with a cup of tea and a Netflix show on her smart TV.

We lovers our stay at Irena's apartment. She met us upon arrival and checked in with us via text during our stay. Perfect size apartment for two, bed was very comfortable, a short walk to the train and we felt very safe in this beautiful neighborhood. We would have liked a coffee maker and she forgot to stock us with washcloths but we did fine with instant coffee and made do just fine. Would stay here again.

Staying at Irena's place was lovely. She was extremely accommodating and the location was quiet but extremely convenient. I was in town for a conference and this was a great location to jump on public transportation and be in midtown in 20 min. Thanks for a great stay!

I had a lovely time staying in Irena apartment, I felt completely in home. All was clean, tidy and working. 
Irena checked me in showing me everything of her apartment, was since the beginning very communicative and considerable.
The bed is super comfortable, the neighbourhood is safe and quiet, 5 mins walk to N subway going to Manhattan, full of shops arround part of them open 24 hours.
VERY RECOMMENDED!
Irena's apartment was very comfortable, and she has been very nice and helpful. Neighbourhood was very safe and we were a short walk from the subway. Very recommendable!

L'appartement est encore plus joli que sur les photos. Il est douillet et propre: parfait pour se reposer après avoir marché toute la journée. Le logement est plutôt bien situé. Le quartier est assez sympa, il y a beaucoup de petits restaurants du côté de la gare sur la 30th avenue. Irina a été réactive sur les messages et nous a facilité les choses.
Je recommande.

Irena has been a helpful and flexible host -- she organized the keys for me when I could not confirm exact time of arrival and send message with all useful information.  The apartment is conveniently located for local amenities -- a few good Greek restaurant around. The flat itself was in an old building and it is clean and neat. There is free on the street parking although one has to pay attention to street cleaning rules. Overall we had a good time.

Irene kindly made her apartment available to us early, as soon as we arrived in New York.  The apartment was just as described - cozy, very quiet, and with everything we needed to feel "at home."  Astoria is terrific.  The neighborhood felt very safe, there were many interesting restaurants nearby, and a great subway line (very quick access to Manhattan) was within easy walking distance. We were sorry that we didn't have an opportunity to meet Irena, but she was immediately responsive when we texted her with questions.  This is a great NYC bargain!

I didn't get to meet Irena in person, but she was kind to leave the keys behind to help me get into the apartment. The place is cozy and comfortable for two people. It had all the necessity we would find in our own home. We drove from Boston and it was really easy/safe to park our car overnight. I love how close Irena lives to the trains (N&Q lines). I would definitely come back in the future! 

Oh yeah, the bed and pillows are super soft! It was really hard to get up in the morning.
Great location near all kinds of cool local stuff in queens. Easy walk to the subway to get straight into manhattan. No complaints whatsoever
Great AirB&B'er ;  great w/ communication and super friendly.  Thanks!

Our experience seems to be quite consistent with that of the other reviewers. Irena was really good with communication and made staying there seamless. As others have mentioned, she had everything you would need in the apartment to have a comfortable stay. The place was clean and great for the two of us. Anything you would need (food, market, pharmacy, tailor, cell phone, laundry, coffee, gym, nails, etc) is within a 7 block walk, and you have a quiet place to come home to. The neighborhood is safe and very convenient to Manhattan. The walk to the subway stop felt much shorter than it looks on (Hidden by Airbnb) maps and felt very safe at any hour with people always out and about, but mellow. The internet, which we needed for work, was reliable too. As a native New Yorker, I liked getting a chance to stay in Astoria too. It's a cool neighborhood in central to everything for us. I would highly recommend it. Thanks Irena!

Irena was a great host! She provided me with clear directions on how to get into the apt. and was flexible with her check-in/check-out policy.
The apt. was clean and just as pictured. It was a hot time in NYC but the place was comfortable due to a accommodating air conditioner. The kitchen was complete and allowed us to make a meal or two.
The area in Astoria was convenient and we were able to fine onstreet parking easily. There are plenty of fun restaurants within walking distance. I would definitely go back. Thank you Irena for helping to make our 1st visit to see our new grandbaby perfect.

I stayed in Irena's lovely apartment for a month. The neighborhood is great, the street of the apartment is very quiet at night and you'll find many nice restaurants and cafes within walking distance. Great location and super convenient, near the trains and easy access to Manhattan. Irena was a great host, was very quick to respond to any issues and made herself available straight away if there was a problem. I would definitely stay again and fully recommend the apartment to others!

We loved our weekend stay at Irena's apartment. It was cute, cozy and quaint!! She did a great job being accurate with everything. Clean, comfy bed and just a great little place!! She is awesome with communication and texts/calls asap if you have questions. The location is very convenient  (walkable) to lots of little eateries and corner stores. Would not hesitate to stay again.

We arrived in NYC in the afternoon and got to the apartment in the evening with cell phones lacking power.  Irena had provided directions via email that afternoon but with the failing batteries on the cell phones it was difficult to pull-up the information (no fault of Irena).  Once we accessed the emails from Irena we had no issues getting into the apartment.

The apartment is very conveniently located to the 30th ave N/Q subway line (about 5 blocks walk), a grocery store on 30th,  a Smoothie place on Crescent, & downtown Astoria with a lot of choices of good restaurants.  The neighborhood was very quiet and safe..... Astoria is quieter and more residential compared to staying in NYC where apartments are much more expensive and noisier.  The apartment itself is small as expected but nicely decorated with bathroom, living area, kitchen, and bedroom as depicted.  We ate out all meals except breakfast so did not really use the kitchen much but it was very convenient to have use of refrigerator and microwave.  The apartment was clean, the bed comfortable, and the air conditioning a blessing for the muggy weather of NYC in August.  Irena did a great job of communicating, ensuring that any issues were quickly resolved (the breaker on the air conditioner popped and was resolved with a quick email to Irena).   Would definitely stay again at Irena's apartment in any future trip to NYC!

We did not meet Irena, but it was very easy to check in and get settled, and she responded to all messages right away.  The apartment was cozy, the bed comfy, and the shower hot.  The stove is gas so make sure you know how to use that safely.   The apartment is quiet, close to the subway and a ton of restaurants, cafes, and fro-yo!

Irena was available and helpful and responsive.  Her apartment had everything we needed for our stay.  We had lived in Astoria a long time ago and enjoyed the neighborhood very much;  we found comfort food at Crescent Kitchen and great Peruvian food at El Ancla and baked goods at El Fournaio.  There was easy access to Manhattan on the N subway line, and we had good experiences with Ecua car service when we needed a car.

L'appartamento è carino e confortevole, il letto è molto comodo! Il quartiere è tranquillo, a pochi passi si trovano un supermercato e posti per fare colazione o mangiare qualcosa la sera. La metropolitana è abbastanza vicina, 5 min a piedi e in circa 15 min si arriva a Manhattan. Non abbiamo incontrato Irena personalmente ma abbiamo comunicato facilmente con lei per metterci d'accordo e avere le indicazioni. Consigliatissimo.

Irons apartment is great for a trip to New York! The space is plenty for two people. The apartment was very clean and easy to get to and located extremely close to the subway to get into manhattan. Irene left us fresh towels and snacks and was easy to communicate with. Highly recommend!

This apartment is very comfortable and exactly as advertised. Irena has supplied everything you'd need to feel at home. It is on a quiet side-street but close to everything - restaurants, subway, etc. Irena is a perfect host, very polite and accommodating. I would stay again.

This place is great. The subway station to manhattan is a 5 minute walk. At night its quiet enough that you can retire from the city in peace each day. There are numerous places to eat all within walking distance. You know it's a safe neighborhood when you see kids running around at 9 or 10pm on their bikes. We would definitely stay here again!
It wàs very clean and convenient location.  Easy access to metro.  Everything one needs was available.

I lived in Astoria for a long time and know the neighborhoods well. Irena's apartment is located in an optimal position, on a quiet street close to the lively 30th Ave and also the park. The apartment was very comfortable and clean. Irena was always quick to respond to all inquiries. I recommend her and the apartment highly.

Nice place. Easy to get subway and some affordable restaurants near. Irena is a
 Nice person. Recommend
Location is great and Irena is easy to communicate with.

Great location.  Very easy and fast to get into Manhattan and see attractions.  I loved the fruit markets and grocery stores in the neighborhood.  If you don’t feel like going into Manhattan, there are great restaurants and bars close by.  I highly recommend staying here.

name: VICTORIAN SUNFILLED APT DREAM VIEW
summary: This is a very charming private bedroom ,in a 3 bedroom apartment, situated in the heart of LIC, conveniently located one stop from Manhattan and Brooklyn, 4 subway lines at your doorsteps, super spacious, sunny and the best view of Manhattan! Close to everything you need plenty of restaurants , bars and groceries near by my apartment.
space: Hello! :) I have a beautiful, clean room for rent in my spacious apartment in the heart of Long Island City. A true oasis for peace and relaxation. It is located on the first floor (just one flight up!) of a victoria New York walk-up building.  The room I am renting is the most spacious one (see picture). Perfect for a single person or a couple looking for a great gateway in a key location! The apartment is located in Long Island City. You can't beat the location! It is situated on a lovely, quiet tree-lined street, close to everything you might need. 24/7 diner and deli at corner. Four major subway lines are just at the corner, less than a minute walk away. You have the E, M, G and 7 train pretty much at your doorsteps. Right across the street there is John Murray Park. The MoMa PS1, independent museum of modern art is less than 5 minutes walk from the apartment. Vernon Boulevard is around the corner, filled with amazing restaurants and cute boutiques. On the east river (5-10 minute w

Close to everything you need plenty of restaurants , bars and groceries near by my apartment. It is located on the first floor (just one flight up!) of a victoria New York walk-up building.  The room I am renting is the most spacious one (see picture).
