It is situated on a lovely, quiet tree-lined street, close to everything you might need. 24/7 diner and deli at corner. Four major subway lines are just at the corner, less than a minute walk a
neighborhood_overview: Long Island City is conveniently located one stop from Manhattan on major subway lines located at the corner. You also have access to Brooklyn one stop away. It is close to everything you need, there are amazing restaurants and shopping nearby, and always a taxi available.
notes: Have an amazing time!!!
transit: Yes! Four major subway lines just at the corner (E, G, 7, M)
access: Guess will have access to the bathroom and kitchen. Cooking is allowed but minimum. U are more than welcome as well to dine into the living room on the coffee table ,were I usually dine in my self as well :) This is a bit of a bohemian style apartment , therefor I don't really have a traditional dining table. There is no microwave. No cooking meet , fish or frying on the stove. Meet and fish is allowed to be cooked only in the oven. As this is a whole one big space between the leaving room and kitchen and there is no exhaust to let the smell out for exception of the Windows . U are more than welcome to use the leaving room but I kindly ask to not use it as your personal space , specially when I am around my self.
interaction: Minimum, but i'll always be available if they need something
house_rules: • Please keep front door locked at ALL TIME. Both locks. • Please make sure kitty doesn't escape when entering and exiting the apartment. He's a little escape artist.  •Please do not feed any food to kitty , he is on a special diet.  • Please take your shoes off when u are in the apartment. • Please turn all the lights off in YOUR ROOM, only your room , when u are not home.As well turn off all electric appliances, in your room, such as heat or fan , according to the season, thank U.  • To recycle is mandatory!!! It is the guest responsibility to separate and dispose the trash in the appropriate trash bins. Recycles must be rinsed and clean before being tossed in the trash can.  • Because this is an Earth friendly listing , I kindly ask to use the reusable shopping bag that I have provided to U in the room, to avoid the use of plastic bag. This kind action of towards a cleaner environment would be very much appreciated:)  • I kindly ask my guest to not use any of my personal products in

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I've been living in New York for the past 10 years, this city is my home now but I am originally from Naples, Italy and I love to travel.

reviews.comments: If I had to pick a single word to describe Nika, it would be "charming".  She was a delightful first time host and I am happy to back both her and her abode.  Her place is spacious - a rarity in so many NYC homes - and very comfortable.  Loved the exposed brick and lots of white.  Also, the convenience to Manhattan and nearness to PS1 were great benefits.  We met her flatmate briefly, and she, too, seemed nice.  Nika also has a gorgeous snow white cat - who doesn't seem to shed at all.   Ahead of time communication was excellent, as was check-in.  Hope to be able to return.
Very good time at Monica's place !

Monika was a wonderful host. Very welcoming and accommodating. Had no problems communicating about keys and needs. She ensured all the essentials were provided and was super helpful and sharing if we needed something. The neighborhood is very convenient. 24 hr stores and subway access within mins. A cool view of the Manhattan skyline from the windows (next to TV in the picture). I used to walk to the river view (a couple of blocks from the place) for a gorgeous view of Manhattan. The room had a closet, bed and a work-desk. Nothing unnecessary. Keela, the cat was fun.

Tout était bien préparé : l'immeuble n'est pas magnifique mais son emplacement est pratique ; sans être dans le centre de NY, il n'y a que 3 ou 4 stations pour se retrouver en plein cœur de Manhattan.
Nika n'était pas là (elle travaillait et est rentrée tard) et je l'ai à peine vue 3 minutes pour lui dire que nous partions. Elle a l'air très sympa....

So nice we stayed twice.  This was our second time staying with Nika as we had such a great experience the first time around.  Love the area, found a few great local haunts (two that she recommended).  Also took the ferry over to Manhattan which was convenient and easy to do.  It was a brief stay but felt like a total vacation.  And Nika is such a congenial and considerate host.

Nika was an excellent host, happy to work with my schedule to pick up the key. The apartment is as pretty as it appears in the pictures, and Nika was ready to help in any way she could. I was only in town for one night, but this would be a good place to base for exploring the city. Only two short blocks from a subway that puts you in Manhattan very quickly. Thanks Nika!

Понравилось абсолютно все. Удобное расположение: До метро всего один квартал, на метро до Times Square - 5 остановок. Nika очень приветливая хозяйка, готовая помочь в любую минуту. Это было очень комфортное соседство с таким добрым и веселым человеком.

Had a great stay with Nika! The apartment was in a great location just 5-15 minutes on the subway (depending where in Manhattan you wanted) but on a quiet street. Grocery store around the corner was convenient and the kitchen was great. The room was plain but more than enough space for 2 of us and the exposed brick added charm :)
We barely saw Nika but the little bit we did she was lovely!
We would 100% stay here again!!  Great find!
Thanks for a great getaway Nika!

This is a awesome place to live. Very comfortable, clean, organized and super close to the trains! Nika is very sweet! She gave us so many suggestions about this city! We had a great time in NY. Thanks a lot!
I highly recommend this place to the tourists who is the first come to NY! This is a good deal as well! I'm sure you will like it!
Overall, fantastic!

Had a great stay at Nika's apartment, she was a lovely host. Apartment is clean and spacious. The area was fine and safe, only one stop away from Manhattan on the subway. Laundromat a few doors down the road which is handy. Great view of Manhattan from the top of the building, be sure to check that out (especially at night).

We enjoyed our stay at nikas very much. 
Due to us being out all the time and Nika being at work we didn't see her much but she provided us with all the necessary information. 

The apartment is just two blocks from the next metro lines and at night you have a beautiful view over the skyline! 
The room itself was not that big, but it was big enough for a stay of just a couple of nights. The furniture was more practical. 

Unfortunately the "personal" touch which makes air bnb stays so special to me was missing. 
Nevertheless we can recommend the stay at nikas home to anyone who wants to be close to Manhattan :-).
Nika is a very responsive host, warm and nice. But sadly some urgent things happened so I could't make it.

My boyfriend and I visited Queens for the first time to participate in a nearby dance marathon. Nika and Kila made us feel so welcome! She was very responsive and patient with us as we worked our way through Manhattan rush hour traffic. We loved staying in Nika's neat and sun-filled apartment. After staying in Manhattan a few times prior, Nika's place was a welcome surprise with its spaciousness and proximity to lots of great places to eat and drink. Being close to the E line was also fantastic for us.

The neighborhood felt quite safe to us (especially since we were walking around late at night and early in the morning), and Nika gave us fantastic recommendations for places to eat and also to walk and check out the Manhattan skyline. Be sure to hit up LIC Market for top-notch brunch/lunch and Manducatis Rustica for delicious dinner and mind-blowing desserts.

Our favorite things about staying with Nika? Chatting with Nika and with Kila, her awesome cat! Best cat ever. :)

Nica was super nice. She had great tips about the neighboorhood. The place was exactly as described - lovely, quiet and clean. :)

We totally recommend this place!!

Location was amazing (very close to subway hub), apartment was comfortable & quiet, & Monika was super sweet! And her cat was super well behaved, and I've had a lot of bad AirBnb animal experiences so I'm picky! Just block him when you open the door (little escape artist!) Would 100% stay here again!

Nika was very sweet and helpful, she was kind and responsive to our needs. The house was as she described, It was the NY experience we had hoped for. the cat was cute and everyone should check out the view from the roof, its incredible. the train was so close and that made our trip SO much easier and more fun. The neighborhood was awesome, safe and alive enough to make it practical.

We stayed at Nika's for one night. We highly recommend it! The apartment was great, very well located. It was less than 30 seconds from a metro station and it took us less than 10 minutes to get to Time Square. The apartment was spacious, bright, clean and cool. Nika has the AC and fans. The neighbourhood was also very safe. The only thing that the bed was a bit hard, but it was otherwise great.

My boyfriend and I spent 5 nights in Nikas apartment. She is a very welcoming and kind host, quick to answer messages, and was happy to answer any questions and give tips of where to go etc. The apartment was quite big with a nice and bright living room and kitchen. The apartment had a great location with only 3 minutes to the closest subway, which was only one stop away from Manhattan. The only thing we would like to mention is that the bed is a bit hard and uncomfortable. Other then that the place is great, and we highly recommend it to anyone!

It was a nice place to stay. Very easy to get downtown NYC.
Nika is a very nice and friendly host. 
This place is very good for young people.
It wasn't me, but my 28 old sun stood with her and he would come back any time.
She is very flexible, responded very quick since I booked and arrived at the same day.
Everything worked out fine.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nika was very welcoming, her place was actually bigger than it looked.  Clean and comfortable.  Street parking was available, and the train was at the end of her street.

Nika and her cat are great hosts, she is very outgoing and nice. The place is perfect, just 15 minutes (in total!) From the apartment to Manhattan with the tube :) the neighbourhood is safe and the view  from the roof is amazing!

Nika e il suo gatto sono fantastici,lei è molto solare e simpatica. Il posto è perfetto,solo 15 minuti dalla porta di casa a Manhattan con la metro. Il quartiere è sicuro anche di notte e la vista dal tetto è meravigliosa! :)

Io e il mio fidanzato abbiamo passato una notte a casa di Monica e ne siamo rimasti più che soddisfatti!
L'appartamento è molto bello e ben arredato, luminoso e tranquillo. 
L'host è stata prontissima nelle risposte e super disponibile a far coincidere i sui spostamenti con i nostri orari.
Abbiamo raggiunto l'appartamento molto facilmente con la metro da Manhattan, e al nostro arrivo siamo stati accolti da un bellissimo micio bianco.
Nika made it easy to get in and out of the apartment even when I showed up early, and the location is very convenient!

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour a NYC. L'appartement est proche de toutes les commodités (restaurants, supermarché,métro). Le quartier est calme. Nika nous a accueilli chaleureusement et nous a donné de bons conseils pour nos visites.

Nous vous conseillions vivement ce logement.

I was happy with my experience at Nika's place.  Nika is very friendly, though not around that much.  The location is great if you want to stay in Queens but take the train to Manhattan--it's a quick trip.  The E train and 7 train are both nearby.  The bedroom is very pleasant, with plenty of space for your things.  The room does not have A/C, but does have a good ceiling fan.  If you are allergic to cats, you probably don't want to stay here, but if you like cats, this awesome little dude named Kila is really fun to hang out with, but won't bother you much if you don't want him to.  One note:  If you have a lot of bathroom stuff, there is not much extra room in the bathroom, with limited counter space and all of Nika's things and her roommate's things in there.  Was ok for me, though.  All in all, a good experience, and I would go back.  Thanks, Nika!

Nika was a tremendous host!! If you're looking for somewhere that's comfortable, clean, and affordable to stay that is conveniently located (just a few stops from Manhattan on multiple lines), this is definitely a great option. I would definitely book Nika's room again in the future - thanks for a great weekend!
Nika was very friendly. We felt like at home. The area is safe and a great starting point for exploring magnificent NYC!

What should I say. The place is nice. The room clean. Monica is a great host, with an artistic hitch. It's close to midtown, but also a good campground to explore Brooklyn and its treasuries (please go and spend a few hours on Coney Island beach).

Nika's home in Queens is a wonderful little place. Both Nika and her cat are very friendly. We were staying during the summer and a tad concerned that the lack of AC would be a problem but there is a ceiling fan in the room and keeping windows open helps too.The subway is a one minute walk from her place and a couple stops from Manhattan. It was very convenient since that was our primary mode of transportation in NYC and we were always able to transfer to a line that took us to her place.  A few notes though, there isn't a microwave available and the shower has a window in it (there are blinds but quite hard to maneuver).

Hey Nika was great. I was out & about in the city most of the time; I wasn't at the apartment much, and neither was she; so our paths didn't cross that often but when they did I enjoyed our conversations. She's warm & personable but she will give you privacy if that's what you want. Great hostess!
Easy get into downtown, very comfortable to stay there, highly  recommend to stay!! Nika is a very nice host!

Nika's home was the perfect place for my girlfriend and I to stay for our visit to NY. We were able to get the full experience because we stayed here. The subway was easy to navigate and very close so getting in and out of Manhattan was a breeze. We came out to New York to look for an apartment of our own, and staying at Nika's allowed us to explore all the different neighborhoods to see which would be the best for us. A great experience that I would highly recommend for anyone.
All the communication was through a friend. My flight got cancelled the same night so I didn't end staying at her place. Couldn't reach out to her until 3 days later.
Nika' place was perfect for us. We enjoyed the location a lot. It is very close to the Metro station. The flat had everything we need es and was perfect for our stay.

Nous avons passé un merveilleux voyage à New york ! Nous sommes restés 10 jours chez Monica et il faut dire que son appartement est idéalement placé par rapport au métro. La chambre était grande et bien préparée pour notre arrivée. Au bout de la rue se trouve un Diner ou nous allions prendre un petit déjeuner américain typique. On trouve toutes les commodités à proximité : supermarché , fast food....C'était un appartement charmant , loin du bruit incessant de Manhattan. Bonus : Montez sur le toit et appréciez cette vue !!

Sono stato nell’appartamento di Nika per 6 giorni e mi sono trovato molto bene. Premessa: l’appartamento si trova al primo piano di un palazzo posto in un punto strategico per raggiungere Manhattan, infatti è a 100 metri sia dalla fermata della metropolitana linea (E) che dalla  linea (7) . In appena 10 minuti si raggiunge Manhattan, infatti l’appartamento si trova ad una sola fermata da Manhattan. L’appartamento è così composto: un ampio e luminoso soggiorno con angolo cucina e bella vista sulla skyline di New York, un bagno e 3 camere da letto, in una ci sta normalmente Nika (durante la nostra permanenza era affittata anche quella su Airbnb dato che Nika è stata in vacanza per un mese), la seconda è occupata in pianta stabile da un ragazzo e per finire c’è la camera vera e propria a disposizione degli ospiti. Dimenticavo il bel gatto bianco che è il vero padrone di casa, che vi farà capire quando ha fame miagolando e correndovi dietro,  ma del resto è molto amichevole e giocherellone. La camera è abbastanza spaziosa e fornita di un armadio ed una scrivania ed anche il letto è confortevole nonostante sia molto basso. Nonostante la cucina sia completa di tutti gli accessori di base, noi abbiamo utilizzato solamente il tostapane e l’uso del frigorifero, manca però un tavolino su cui fare piccole colazioni. Dato che Nika era in vacanza, abbiamo comunicato tramite sms o telefono con una sua amica che ci ha dato tutte le istruzioni per raggiungere ed entrare nell’appartamento. Nika comunque ci aveva già fornito tutte le indicazioni su come raggiungere l’appartamento tramite metropolitana e siamo rimasti in contatto via mail fino a quando non ci siamo incontrati la sera prima di partire. Il quartiere in cui si trova l’appartamento non l’abbiamo visitato , ma posso solo dire che ci sono un supermercato ed un paio di caffetterie a 50 metri oltre chiaramente alle due linee metropolitane, mi è sembrato comunque molto tranquillo anche di sera. In definitiva consiglio vivamente l’appartamento di Nika.
It was really nice to stay at Nika's apartment as the location was perfect and the apartment was exactly as described, i would definetely recommend it.

Nika was great! I came with my partner and we felt so comfortable and at home with Nika, her roommate, her adorable kitty, and with her friends. She was so welcoming and warm. What a great place! The apartment is full of light and beautifully decorated. The neighborhood was quiet and we felt very safe walking back from the subway and/or bus. The room was lovely. It had everything we needed and then some. She even provided us with individual towels. Everything aside, Nika personally went above and beyond in welcoming us. She was so open with us and we both very much enjoyed her company.

Todo estaba como nos lo esperábamos. El apartamento se reflejaba perfectamente en las fotos que habíamos visto. La habitación estaba lista cuando llegamos, todo ordenado y como se describía en el anuncio. Nika fue muy agradable con nosotros. Se preocupó en todo momento de que estuviéramos cómodos. Kila (el gato) es un encanto de animal, muy cariñoso. El barrio era ideal. Tranquilo, sin peligro y muy muy bien comunicado con Manhattan. Sin duda repetiríamos la experiencia si tuviéramos que volver a la ciudad.

That was definitely my best experience in the city! Nika and her beautiful cat are so lovely, the room and especially the bed is so comfortable. Everything Nika provides really lit up the whole trip! Me and Elijah are looking forward to seeing you again Nika! :)))

I had to stay in LIC for the weekend to do some overtime. Nika was very helpful and a wonderful host the whole trip. She was flexible with scheduling and a really cool person. We even discovered that we randomly work in the same building! I definitely recommend her apartment for short or long stays.

Very nice place which has a lot of character to it. The room was clean and spacious. The location is great - it's a safe neighborhood, and a subway station is less than two minutes away (walking) with a direct line to Manhattan. Would definitely recommend.
Nika is a charming host, very welcoming.

Great host, great spot and location, super clean and tidy room and bed, and great cat. What else could you ask for?!

I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again. It's a super close location to Manhattan (1-2 stops away) and gives you some peace from the hustle and bustle of the city.
Thanks again! Great host and great location!

Super appart et hôte très avenante. Le quartier est calme et sécurisant, le météo est proche, on est sur la ligne direct de jfk et de manhattan. La chambre est calme et assez grande pour 2. On a passé 5 nuits avec mon amie sans aucun soucis.

My partner and I decided to extend our trip by another day so we booked Nika's Airbnb on short notice. She was very accommodating and kind. Her place was very clean,comfy bed,nice room, awesome view, located above a cafe (which was pretty good itself), and near the train. Really enjoyed staying there, definitely would like to again.

Nika is a great host, nice, flexible and always trying to be on top of everything. The property is remarkably well located and has an amazing view of NY. The E and 7 lines are 1 block away and there are many restaurants in the area. The room was clean and kitchen had everything you need. Would stay here again!

Nous n'avons Jamais vu notre hôte. elle nous a dit qu'elle allait partit le wk quand on arrivait et elle n' a jamais apparu depuis ( des vacances prolongées certainement ?! ). 

Toute les communication s'est effectuée pas les sms ( ou il faut laisser les clés , de ne pas faire sortir le chat de l' appartement etc ). 
Par contre, pas d' indication pour l' utilisation de la cuisine. En occurence, pas d' échanges nécessaires concentrant notre séjour. Un peu décevant ! Le seul moment positif c'est l' emplacement de l' appartement par rapport au centre ville.

Nika's place complies with the description, the room is comfortable and has enough space for two persons plus the belongings. Nika is friendly and takes care of their hosts. The apartment has a good location: only 5 minutes walk to the subway and 2 stations from Manhattan. There is also a  restaurant at the end of the street. We spent a week here and had a great time in NYC. Bonus: pet the lovely cat and enjoy the view from the roof. Thanks Nika ;)

Nika was extremely helpful in accommodating two arrival times between my mother and me.  The bed was extremely comfortable and the area is very close to public transportation, making getting to and from Manhattan extremely easy.  She's got a great cat, and although I didn't see Nika often because of my busy schedule, she was very warm and welcoming to my mother and myself over text.  When I had to come home late one evening, she was very accommodating and understanding.

All in all, this was a cozy, chic, and well located place to stay!  Also, there is an adorable and delicious café right next door to the apartment.  Definitely check out their sticky cinnamon roll while you're there!

Sehr schönes Appartment, sehr freundliche Gastgeberin, Zimmer zwar klein, aber mit genug Stauraum für 2 Personen und vor allem ruhig - was in New York ein echter Luxus ist.

Ein kleines Manko waren die beiden weiteren Mitbewohner im Appartment, die im Beschreibungstext nicht erwähnt werden und die von der Freundlichkeit und Kommunikation her leider das komplette Gegenteil von Nika darstellen. Einzig deswegen ziehe ich einen Stern ab, ansonsten kann ich Nikas Zimmer nur weiterempfehlen.

Loved Nika's apartment.  Great stay. 

The place is close to both 7 and E trains. It's about 20 min from Manhattan. 

The apartment was roomy and very cozy. And the room was clean and well maintained. 

It really felt like Nika and her roommate put in a lot of effort to make the place feels like home.

Very convenient location, quick and easy to get into Manhatten. As the description says, you can expect an authentic Victorian flat with an entrance door that requires some patience ;) Make sure you are available via phone. Nika was almost not there and my German cellphone not yet equipped with an American SIM card, so we had troubles communicating. Big plus: the huge living room is beautiful with a great view. Only sitting/having breakfast somewhere else than in my room (which is perfectly fine but it has almost no sunlight) seemed to be difficult: one will get covered in white fur of her adorable cat :D  Otherwise, I had a pleasant overall experience and can recommend it if you don't expect a lot of interaction with the host.
Très bonne communication. Nous avons eu quelques inorévus mais finalement tout s'est bien passé.

Staying with Nica at her LIC apartment was nothing short of wonderful. The room was great, and the outer living area was a delight in decoration and kitty time! Located a mere steps from the E and the 7, and sitting atop a quaint neighborhood cafe (their baguette and ham sandwich is a great breakfast-grab), the location is great for getting in and out of Manhattan. Nica was very friendly and always had a kind word to say.
Very convenient. Bed was so comfortable. Her cat was so pretty. Manhattan hangout just 10 minute from Nika's home!!
Very cute cat! Nika is also a nice person.

Nika, a great bnb host, lives in a charming house 1 block off PS1 and the Court Sq Metro station. A sweet neighborhood coffee shop downstairs and a lovely view from the living room windows are priceless. Its a great place to live offbeat the noisy city but still be everywhere in a few minutes. Would go again!

The place is very convenient as it is located walking distance to 2 Metro stations. It only takes about 30mins by metro to get to Manhattan. In fact, the E line is directly connected to the JFK sky train. Nika's place is very charming. There's a nice cafe right on her building's corner and a supermarket just a few blocks away, which comes very handy when you wish to buy groceries and fresh fruits.

What a great find!  Nika's home is in a great location in LIC, near the PS1 museum, restaurants, and the subway, and there's a little park right across the street.  Was easy walking distance to a wedding I attended at the Metropolitan Building.  She also has a great, playful cat -- and my girlfriend and I love cats, so that is a plus for us!  Nika was also very flexible and accommodating when my arrival time was delayed because of work.

My stay at Nika's apartment was just great for my quick three day trip to NYC.  I loved the location.  Nika's apartment is located just a block away from E train.  The thing about E train is that it is convenient in getting to / from JFK as well as all major spots in Manhattan like Time Square, Port Authority Bus Terminal, and World Trade Center.  Nika's apartment is also located 10 - 15 min walking distance from great selection of restaurants and watering holes along Vernon Blvd. and Jackson Ave.  Another big plus for me was that a great coffee shop is located just on the first floor of the building.  Second is comfort.  I found the apartment fairly quiet from the street noise and the bed is very comfortable. I was able to get restful sleep.  Nika's apartment is clean and well organized.  It is worth mentioning that the building itself is quiet old but I think this actually adds a charm to the place.  Another thing to keep in mind is that there is no elevator to Nika's apartment from the ground level.  This was not a problem for me as I travel light and the apartment is located on the 2nd floor.  Nika's apartment will be high on my list of places to stay for my next visit to NYC.

Super location !! Très bien située , à  2 pas du métro qui amène partout ! Donc très facile de se déplacer car il est en plus sur la ligne du métro pour l aéroport JFK ! 
Il y a un supermarché juste en bas ouvert jusqu'à 10h du soir donc très pratique.
Une belle vue sur Manhattan depuis le toit de jour comme de nuit et des quais de Long Island ou l on peut prendre un bateau "taxi" qui va jusqu'à wall Street et  profiter de la vue pour 5 dollars.
Nika a été très accueillante et ouverte et nous a donné de bons conseils ! 
L appartement est très bien , la chambre spacieuse avec tout ce qu'il faut. Appartement calme malgré la présence d un autre couple mais très discret. 
Juste quelques difficultés pour trouver comment récupérer les clés mais pas d autres soucis ! 
On recommande!! 
Merci Nika!
Great place, very warm and welcoming

Nika was great, very amenable and liaised with us after our flight was delayed to allow a smooth check-in.
The place is beautiful, light and comfortable with a great, quiet bedroom.
Close to trains, pleasant neighbourhood and a short walk to a great view of Manhattan!
Bright and beautiful apartment, conveniently located near a great cafe and the subway. We only saw Nika briefly due to our schedules but she and her beautiful cat were both super nice!

Our host Nika was wonderful! We can't say enough about how awesome it was to meet her! This was our first AirBnB experience and it was delightful! The listing lived up to all it showed and more. We were fortunate to find on street parking for free only a block away, unheard of in NYC! We were a block from the subway, a quaint park across the street, had a lovely view of the city, and great food around the corner. It was a nice neighborhood, we felt very comfortable and safe. My partner and I were very impressed with the awesome accommodations, the location, and especially meeting and getting to know our host. She made us feel very welcome, provided a clean environment, helped answer any questions we had and over all made our stay very pleasurable! We connected better than expected with our host having many things in common, we now consider her a friend. We look forward to visiting her again on our next trip to NYC and are excited to use AirBnB when traveling elsewhere. All thumbs up here!!

Nika was a nice host. She stored the purchases we made online and had delivered there a week prior to our arrival and she waited for us to arrive on a Friday night when our flight got delayed. 
We wished that she would've mentioned that other people were staying in the house while we were there. Everything went fine, but it could have created some awkward situations. 
She has a very lovely cat which we were happy to tend to went she wasn't around. 
All in all everything went smoothly and the house served the purpose that we wanted to. Queen is a nice neighborhood and close to her house, there're some restaurants, diners, cafes and the subway. We felt safe to get to the house at all times. And when needed it was easy to call for a Uber or cab.
We had a great little stay here. The room was clean and quiet, and Nika was friendly and helpful (great coffee and entertainment suggestions, too). Thanks for the hospitality!
Nika and her friend are both lovely people! Her home is close to multiple subway line, and steps away from the river. Super cute kitty as well :)
Nika's place is in an excellent location- very close to the Subway and many great restaurants!
Good location 1 min away from train station
Good!

Was a great place to stay! Very convenient to both Manhattan and Brooklyn, but also led to exploration of the neighborhood which includes some great museums like PS1 and Museum of the Moving Image. There are also diners and local restaurants in case you come in late from a day of exploring. Nika was very sweet, accommodating, and both she and her cat made us feel at home. The one surprise was that there were other guests staying in another bedroom at the same time. It was no big deal, but it is a lot of people to share one bathroom. It also did not include a hot tub, as listed.  But all in all, it was a great spot, and would recommend.

Nike's place was just what we expected - kinda bohemian, artsy, friendly.  we didn't spend a lot of time there but when we did, we enjoyed Nika's company and her lovely kitty....  It was our first Air B&B experience and it felt like home.

Our stay at Nika's place was great! We stayed there 5 nights with my mom and my sister. Nika was super nice! She (and her adorable cat!) made us feel welcome and made sure we had everything we needed. The communication with her was very good. We arrived very early in the morning but we had no problem getting the keys and settling in in our room. The appartment is ideally situated, in a calm neighborhood just a few subway stops from Manhattan, with two subway stations nearby. There is a nice coffee shop around the corner as well as a deli. Our room was clean and comfortable, perfect for 2, just big enough for 3. A little bonus: the view of Manhattan from the rooftop of the building is amazing! We would definitely stay  stay there again!
I booked the room for my family. The room was cozy and it's very close to the train station. My family had a good time staying there.

I knew I would love New York as I had been a few times before but I didn't know about the accommodation as this was my 2nd ever airbnb experience.  I knew the location would be great as I used to stay just a couple of hundred yards away but sadly that apartment has been demolished :(

The location really is perfect; being just outside Manhattan in Long Island City you are slightly away from all the craziness but only 4 Subway stops from Times Square!  The apartment itself is lovely and forms part of a Victorian building.  The views from the light & airy living room are stunning; especially at night!  Being on the mainland you get some amazing views of Manhattan that you would not get if you were staying in it!  Ask Nika for places you can walk/drink/eat and get a great view!  

As I said, the apartment is conveniently located for access to Manhattan and there are also a number of great bars, restaurants etc in close proximity.  

Nika as a host was great fun and made our trip even more enjoyable!  She is very chilled out and kind of 'adapts' to your personality.  For example, myself and my partner were there for a week, so after rushing around all day we'd like to chill in the apartment.  If Nika was around she'd happily join us for a chat/glass of wine etc and gave us recommendations of where to eat/drink.  Another couple were there at the same time and weren't quite so sociable so Nika let them get on with what they needed to do and helped them out when they asked any questions.  What more can you ask from a host than one that fits in with you?!

Nika also has a beautiful cat whom we completely fell in love with!  If you're not a cat person he will leave you be :)

I don't know when we'll get back to NYC but when we do we'd love to stay with Nika again if she's still doing this caper!  We got on very well together and we're now working on her to visit us in England :)

we were only in the city for one quick night,  but Nika's hospitality was incredible.  Very beautiful apartment,  and she was helpful with the entire process.  The room was clean and cozy, providing a great place to crash after a long day.

Nika's place is in a super location. It is close to the subway (one block), parks, and many restaurants. The room was a bit small for our party of three (not unexpected), but we rested comfortably. Nika was happy to accommodate us. A great value!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nika is very attentious and flexible. The house is beautiful and very close to the metro. Good cost/benefit. Recommended.
Perfect!

Ho soggiornato da Nika con mia figlia di 16 anni. La posizione dell'abitazione è davvero buona perché pur essendo a Long Island City è a 100mt dalla subway (linee E ed M) e a 2 fermate dalla 5a Av. Monica è disponibile per qualsiasi consiglio o necessità. Il quartiere è molto tranquillo e dalla finestra del soggiorno si ha uno scorcio dello skyline di Manhattan.

The place is close to public transportation and there is a skyline to see which 10 min to walk. Ther are a lot of stuff lying around her place.
Very nice view of manhattan.
Great rotation, Lovely host and cat :)
Loved staying here!!
The place was great. It is near to many places, in walkable distance. I had a good time.

The room was comfortable and cozy, and the apartment was so close to subway. I don't take the subway often so I thought I'd get lost but the location was so perfect and Nika was very welcoming for the stay.
Nika is very kind person, location is near subway easy to go Manhattan or Brooklyn, cute kitty.

Muy buena situacion, hay tres líneas de metro que llegan a la zona, una en la misma calle, la 7, a tres paradas de Times Square, muy tranquilo y con vistas a Manhattan desde el comedor, no te pierdas las de la azotea

Nika is a very nice person and good talker,though she is busy.  
The location is very good with 5 min walking to the subway, which leads to time square. 
The cat is pretty, I love him. 
It is also safe neighborhood with one 24h store?  I used to come back at 11 o'clock .
Anyway I recommend it to you.

Parfait. Pas loin des transports, bel appartement. Nika est très sympa arrangeante. Elle nous a très bien indiqué la marche à suivre pour notre arrivée.
La chambre était propre. Pour visiter New york et ses environs c'est parfait !

Perfect place to stay! Close proximity to the subway & a short trip to Manhattan. Yet you'll feel more like a local than a tourist while you stay in this quaint neighborhood. Nika is both friendly and accommodating, and her cat is the most precious roommate you'll have in an AirBnb! Red Café and Court Square Diner are great places to grab breakfast before you hop on a subway.
Everything was perfect and according to described in the announcement. Nika was very helpful and friendly. Kila  was cute and charming. We enjoyed our stay with Nika. Thanks for everything

The location is good and the bedroom small but fine, unfortunately the living room was a total chaos with staff all over and bad smells. The most annoying part the bathroom, the toilette wasn't working well. I saw the other reviews (pretty good) probably just a bad experience.

3線の地下鉄の駅から近く､2駅でｾﾝﾄﾗﾙﾊﾟｰｸに行けます｡ｵｼｬﾚなｱﾊﾟｰﾄで超人懐っこい猫もいます｡Nikaは親切で連絡もすぐにくれました｡ﾌﾞﾙｯｸﾘﾝにも近くﾏﾝﾊｯﾀﾝよりはるかに静かな町､徒歩1分で大きなｽｰﾊﾟｰもあります｡
Thank you Nika. Great location with metro station, supermarket, quiet town. I spent very nice time. The room was very nice and cozy and cute. Nika is very friendly person, and her cat is soooooo cute.
Nika is very good person. I past 5 day in this apt and it was perfect...( sorry for m’y english)
The apartment is well located but we did not have the chance to really talk to Nika.
Nika es una excelente anfitriona, siempre estaba para lo qu que necesitabamos y nos ayudo mucho con la estadia ahi
It was definitely a NYC experience. The apartment is very well located and close to the train. Nika was friendly, very accommodating, and  pleasant to deal with.

Public transportation was close to our location and a good start for our trips. Host was nice, friendly and helpful. However, it was a little bit noisy during the nights as we could hear people using the kitchen.

We spent 6 days during christmars holidays in Nika’s Apartments, the apartment is well located close to the subway but it’s very dirty. The bathroom is full of hairs. Even if the price is really good, the apartment should be cleaner!!

Great location to get everywhere in the city - super close to a bunch of subway lines. Host Nika was great, very welcoming and hospitable. Having Kila the Cat as a roommate was wonderful :-) Would definitely recommend!

Me and my friend Alex were more than happy to live in Monica's apartment. It is situated in a quite picturesque area full of necessary shops and cafés. Also it takes just 2 minutes or less to reach the nearest metro station and 15 minutes to Grand Central and Times Square. Monica is a very flexible and understanding person always ready to help. We are looking forward to going back some day! Thank you, Monica!

Es lugar idóneo para disfrutar de Nueva York, en primer lugar porque el apartamento es amplio y cómodo, y también porque su ubicación es perfecta para utilizar el Metro y acceder fácil y rápidamente a cualquier lugar, ya sea Manhattan u otros barrios.

Los alrededores del apartamento en Long Island City son tranquilos y con restaurantes cercanos y variados

I loved Nina's place and Nika's character! Super central, convenient, spacious apartment. Nika is very easy going, interesting and willing to help you out with anything! Thanks for everything and see you in Greece!

Nika’s place was hands down one of the absolute best Airbnb’s we’ve ever stayed in. 2 minute walk to the subway, delicious cafe right downstairs, and a HUGE apartment (especially for NYC) with only one floor to walk up! It was a dream. Nothing better than enjoying the morning bustle from her gorgeous corner window. She was super nice and hospitable, always doing everything she could to make our stay comfortable! Highly recommend Nika’s place if you’re planning a trip to NYC!

Awesome apartment, very well located (a few steps from the subway, 15 minutes from Manhattan, great area full of nice restaurants and coffee shops, etc) and Nika was great at welcoming us! Recommend to all!

My friend and I had a nice stay at Nika's. We didn't have the chance to talk much, but she's an easygoing host. Perfect location, two blocks from the subway and one subway stop from Manhattan. Thanks for hosting us!
Very close to Metro and was personally able to find parking on the same street. Space is a bit tight but would recommend!

We spend 4 days at Nika's place with my sister and her boyfriend. The apartment is lovely and luminous.the neighborhood is nice: 5min waking from the subway station  (M F lines) and 5min walking from the waterfront. Nika is a great host, very kind and helpfull. Cleaning was done just at our arrival in common space. Another room was rent during our stay and there is a cat in the apartment.

Nika's apartment is a great location, and was convenient for me to stay in. I never met Nika but she was cordial in communication. The room is small but generally in good condition and clean. I was disappointed with the cleanliness of the rest of the apartment - there was cat litter on the floors and things were generally not very tidy. Secondly, as I was in NYC for work, I mostly used the apartment to sleep in, and was woken up 2 nights around midnight due to people conversing loudly in the living room til 2 or 3 in the morning. The sound insulation is not strong enough for this to happen (especially on weeknights). If you're looking for a quiet place to sleep, I unfortunately cannot recommend this spot. Otherwise, very convenient location for exploring LIC and access to the city.

Nika's place is spacious and inviting.
We knew that Nika wouldn't be home when we arrived but were surprised to find 2 other people there. They were super sweet and it wasn't a problem, just surprising when you don't know what your walking into at 10 pm.

Our room was good size and we were delighted to have an air conditioner! Bed and the little pull-out chair futon were very comfortable. Nika left bottles of shampoo, conditioner, water, and towels for our use.

We found free on-street parking close by and instructions to get in were easy.

Very much a student vibe and I had flashbacks of crashing at people's apartments back in college. Nothing fancy but perfect for our needs.

Oh, and complimentary nudges from the cutest and friendliest kitty were a bonus!

Nika is a really good host, she was very nice and friendly to me and my friends. The place is close to Manhattan, we had no transport problems since the subway station is only a block away. We recommend the room for two people if you have many luggages; we were three with 5 luggages and were a little tight, but we have been outside for most of the time so it was not a big deal for us in fact.

We have spent only two days in Nika's apartment. The apartment was tastefully furnished, our room was also lovely. We have slept in the most comfortable bed in the world! Our room and bathroom were very clean, the rest of the apartment was a little bit messy, but it is normal when the cat lives in the house. It wasn't any problem for us. The location was very good, close to the metro stations. Nika was great with communication and with helpful tips. Easy check-in and check-out. Thank you Nika!
Best Airbnb in Queens, 2 min away from the subway station and a lot of restaurants. I will definitely stay here again. Thanks Nika for an amazing experience!!!
Good location and worth the price.
Nika is a great host that is very accommodating and welcoming. The location is great as accessibility to transit is less than 5 min walk.

Camera spaziosa e calda, l'ideale dopo una giornata fuori. Posizione perfetta, quartiere tranquillo e alloggio a 200 mt dalla metro che in una fermata porta praticamente in centro. check in rapido e facile, consigliato!
Nika is incredible and location is great, it does not take longer than 10 min to 5th ave
Nika's place was just as described and worked well for a quick trip to NY.

It was really easy and convenient to stay at Nika's place. The flat is well located and the subway is close and easy to find. It takes you to the city center in 15min. It is a really nice place for a 4 or 5 days stay in NYC. Thank you Nika!
thanks~ Happy New Year✨

I lived with Monika for 14 days. 
Her apartment is exactly as described and shown on the picture. She is a super nice and helpful girl with a cute and cuddly cat. The communication was always great and she gave always useful tips if some were needed. From her apartment it is a 5 minute walk to the Subway station court square, where you can get to the 7, E, M and G train.
From court square you are within 10 minutes in the city (3 stops to Grand Central). There are also supermarkets and some nice restaurants around the apartment and the Hudson River, with a great view of the Manhattan skyline, is not so far as well. I really enjoyed the stay at Monika’s place and can really recommend it to anyone. Thank you, Monika for a great stay!

name: Serras - Oporto Stories Apartments
summary: The apartment in Oporto  has capacity for 2 people.  The apartment is cozy, is fully-equiped, and  is 45 m².  The house is situated in a lively neighborhood close to a shopping area and restaurants.
space: The apartment in Oporto  has capacity for 2 people.  The apartment is cozy, is fully-equiped, and  is 45 m².  The house is situated in a lively neighborhood close to a shopping area and restaurants. The accommodation is equipped with the following items: lift, iron, internet (Wi-Fi), hair dryer, air-conditioned, covered parking in the adjoining building, 1 TV. In the vitroceramic kitchen, refrigerator, microwave, oven, freezer, washing machine, dishwasher, dishes/cutlery, kitchen utensils, coffee machine, toaster, kettle and juicer are provided.

If you nee a transfer/taxi just tell us and we book one for you. You can be drop off or picked up in front of our building or in any other place in town. If you´re driving, we have a rate agreement with a car park nearby that is 24h open.

reviews.comments:
Appartment was very clean and the pictures represent the apartment correctly. Also the location was very good, as well as our late night check-in!

The big point which cannot be improved is the fact that due to the location - shopping street - we did not have good night rest. Maybe we were unlucky. Day one a very loud cleaning service, day two sudden fireworks, day three homeless people fighting each other.

Very nice, cosy and clean place to stay in the city centre of Porto. Situated in the shopping street. Can be quite noisy but keep in mind that you are in the hart of the city so it is normal. Some heating in the room would have been nice because it was a little cold in the evening.
É um apartamento bastante acolhedor, muito bem localizado e com tudo o que é necessário para ter uma ótima estadia. As proprietárias foram muito simpáticas e disponíveis. Recomendamos.
perfect appartment!

Foi a primeira vez que me hospedei pelo airbnb e não podia ter sido melhor. Apartamento situado em pleno Porto, a um passo de tudo, num prèdio reabilitado e que manteve o bonito estilo antigo. Muito acolhedor, bem decorado, lindíssimo. ..airoso, resumindo: fantástico. Os anfitriões foram de uma enorme simpatia e super prestáveis. Recomendo vivamente.

A descrición do anuncio é totalmente correcta.A anfitriona estivo pendente en todo momento de solucionar as nosas dúbidas.É un apartamento moi cómodo,salvo que non ten calefacción.O único inconveniente foi o tremendo ruído a causa das obras que estaban a facer na tenda de abaixo,é unha rúa moi comercial.

Ana y Claudia fueron muy atentas y amables en todo momento.
El anuncio era del todo correcto.
Nos quedamos en otro de sus apartamentos, porque el inicial no iba a estar disponible para ese día, pero en el que nos alojamos fue realmente cómodo, agradable y muy bonito.

Nos encantó quedarnos allí y si regresamos, nos alojaremos allí sin duda. 

La calle donde está ubicado es  muy céntrica  por lo que te permite moverte fácilmente por los alrededores. Estamos muy contentos con todo en general. Volveremos!

We stay here for two nights, we enjoyed it so much, the apartment is very clean and have every equipment we need, the location cannot be much better, it is located in the central of Porto, we definitely will come back and stay here for our next trip in Portobello!

The apartment is beautiful and very clean. We had a pleasant stay there. the host made sure the check in and check out would be smooth, allowing us to leave our bags in a locker. It is ideally located in a very busy   shopping street. The only down side is that such a good location also comes at a price: the noise from the street can be heard from within the apartment and if you are like me, you may want to bring along some hear plugs and a mask to sleep tight. I would recommend this listing

Nous avons réservé notre nuit à Porto à la dernière minute, cet appartement a malheureusement été booké entre-temps. Ana nous a immédiatement contacté pour nous prévenir et nous proposé un autre studio proche de celui-ci. À partir de ce moment, Ana a été disponible a tout moment et très serviable - un gros soulagement pendant ce gros moment de stress.
Le deuxième appartement était central - pratique si on ne veut pas prendre les transport en commun - et très propre. Nous avions tout ce dont nous avions besoin: shampoing, gel douche et savon; et même ce dont nous n'avions pas besoin: une mignonette de Porto avec deux verres nous attendaient sagement sur le comptoir. 
Si nous retournons à Porto, c'est avec plaisir que nous choisirons ce studio - ou un autre des studios de Ana, hôte que je recommande chaudement.
Everything was perfect !

Awesome apartment. Beautifully clean and  right in the centre of Oporto with loads of shops and restaurants on your doorstep. Lots of lovely little extras to make you feel at home. Perfect communication and check in.
Óptimo apartamento!

We were in the apartment 4 nights, and it was a very pleasant stay. Before our arrival they changed us to the atic due to some noise issues and we appreciated a lot; the atic was very nice. For everything that we needed they were available and nice to us. Its very centric and everything is walk distance.

El apartamento es tal y como parece en las fotos, limpio y muy bien ubicado. La recepción al llegar fue genial y las recomendaciones de qué ver, dónde comer en la ciudad buenísimas. Lo mejor sin duda la ubicación, ¡muy recomendable!
